main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast glutenfree  seeds, whole, fenugreekseeds, capsicum, pudina, jeera
description: Mini Bajra Uttapam Recipe is essentially a millet based Uttapam batter that is made by combining bajra or pearl millets with urad dal and rice.

name: Kadalai Puli Kuzhambu With Mangalore Cucumber & Drumstick Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  brownchickpeas, haldi, sambaronions, raikadugu, gingelly, dhania, fenugreekseeds, split
description: The Kadalai Puli Kuzhambu is delicious tangy curry that is packed with a perfect blend of spices and simmered in a coconut gravy. When combined along with Mangalore cucumber and drumstick it adds a variety to the curry making it rich and delicious.

name: Paneer Butter Masala Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, jeera, salted, driedfenugreekleaves
description: Paneer Butter Masala is a classic all time favorite dish of the North Indian Cuisine. In this recipe the Paneer, the Indian Cottage cheese is simmer in creamy tomato based gravy. Paneer Butter Masala is one of the most popular vegetarian dish in the menu of restaurants in the Northern province.

name: Chilli Cheese Paratha Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian  pudina, jeera, onionnigellaseeds
description: The Chilli Cheese Paratha Recipe is something that I make when I am short of vegetables at home.

name: Chickpea Coconut Milk Curry Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  whitechickpeas, haldi, jeera, dhania
description: Chickpea Coconut Milk Curry Recipe is simple and delicious. Cooked Kabuli Chana is simmered and cooked along with tomatoes, spices and coconut milk making this curry absolutely flavourful.

name: Karnataka Style Avarekalu Akki Rotti Recipe
main_tag: karnataka southindianbreakfast vegetarian  dahiyogurt, jeera, dhania, hing
description: Karnataka Style Avarekaalu Rotti Recipe is a regional recipe from the region Bengaluru, where they celebrated “Avarekaalu Mela” during the month of January. The mela consists of series of stalls selling out dishes that are made from these field beans or avarekalu beans.

name: Rajasthani Sweet & Spicy Ker Sangri Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani lunch vegetarian  caromseeds, hing, haldi, drymangopowder, dhania, dhania
description: The Ker Sangri Recipe is a traditional Rajasthani dish that is made from with a combination of dried beans and berries that are grown locally in Rajasthan. It is often made into a spicy dry vegetable, but, I have added a little bit of sweetness to the spice and the taste was delectable. If you plan to make it , do first try it without the jaggery and then add jaggery to find the difference. The addition if raisins to the sabzi adds to the richness of Ker Sangri. At home I served it along with a Kadhi, Phulkas and Steamed Rice and not to forget the ghee that I had along with.

name: Karnataka Style Sorakaya Palya Recipe - Karnataka Style Bottle Gourd Sabzi
main_tag: karnataka lunch vegetarian  lauki, jeera, dhania
description: Sorakaya Palya is a classic karnataka dish made from bottle gourd which is packed with simple from the very versatile sambar powder. Did you know bottle gourd is very low in saturated fats and cholesterol. In addition, it contains all the essential nutrients like Vitamin C, Vitamin B, Vitamin K, Vitamin A, Vitamin E, Iron, Folate, Magnesium, and Potassium which are required for healthy growth and functioning of our body.

name: Palak Paneer Recipe | Cottage Cheese In Spinach Gravy
main_tag: punjabi dinner highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, palak, jeera, haldi, jeera, tejpatta, dalchini, salted
description: Palak Paneer Recipe (Cottage Cheese In Spinach Gravy) is a preparation of spinach that is steamed, pureed and simmered along with subtle spices and cottage cheese (paneer) .

name: Puran Poli Recipe | Gujarati & Maharastrian | Sweet Spiced Stuffed Paratha With Jaggery
main_tag: gujarati﻿ dessert vegetarian  splittoordal, elaichi, besan
description: Puran Poli is also called as Vedhmi in Gujarat; Puran Poli is one of the favorites with my family. Come every special occasion or a festival Puran Poli features in the menu along another family favorite Undhiyu. Though puran poli is sweet dish; many Gujarati families have them along with the vegetables as an alternative to other flat breads.

name: Bengali Cholar Dal Recipe
main_tag: bengali lunch highproteinvegetarian  bengalgramdal, kopra, haldi, jeera, laung, dalchini, tejpatta
description: Bengali Style Cholar Dal is a delicious lentil dish cooked with Bengal gram or chana dal. This dish of dal is flavored with coconut, ghee and an assortment of whole spices. Bengali Style Cholar Dal tastes mildly spicy and packed with nutrition. Once the Bengal Gram is cooked in the pressure cooker it only takes a few minutes to prepare the whole dish.

name: Valor Muthia Nu Shaak Recipe - Flat Beans Stir Fry With Dumplings
main_tag: gujarati﻿ lunch vegetarian  bainganeggplant, caromseeds, raikadugu, hing, haldi, dhania, jeera, fenugreekdumplings, fenugreekleaves, besan, haldi, hing
description: The Valor Muthia nu Shaak Recipe is a recipe made from flat beans and brinjal that is cooked in tomatoes and spices and tossed with fenugreek dumplings. If you don't find Valor or a particular kind of flat beans used in Gujarat, you can use any locally available flat beans as well.

name: Pineapple Gojju Recipe (Karnataka Style Tangy And Spicy Pineapple Curry)
main_tag: northkarnataka lunch vegetarian  split, raikadugu
description: Pineapple Gojju Recipe is a sweet and spicy, tangy curry made using pineapples, typical to Karnataka. It is a festive dish and served during weddings and other celebrations when a traditional meal is served on a banana lead. It is rich in flavour, thanks to the pineapple and freshly ground spices that are used. It is best served with hot Steamed Rice, but can also be served with Chapatis.

name: Spicy Egg Biryani Recipe with Figaro Olive Oil
main_tag: indian lunch eggetarian  pudina, dahiyogurt, haldi, tejpatta, dalchini, laung, dhania, dhania
description: Spicy Egg Biryani is made with the combination of rice, eggs and a lot of spices. This is a perfect dish when you have guests at your home or if you are planning to organize a house party.

name: Hara Chana Masala Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  dalchini, dhania, dhania, dalchini, laung
description: Hara Chana or popularly known as Choliya or Green Chickpeas is a winter speciality of the Northern India. The fresh green chickpeas are tender, sweet and a delight to munch on. It has ample amounts of dietary fibres making it a super food to include in our diets. This recipe however, makes use of the dried green chickpeas variety. It is cooked with mild aromatic spices, making it a perfect accompaniment with roti's or steamed rice on a rainy evening.

name: Menthi Aaku Badeela Koora Recipe - Besan Muthia Cooked With Methi Leaves
main_tag: andhra sidedish diabeticfriendly  fenugreekleaves, besan, haldi, jeera, raikadugu
description: Badeela Koora is a traditional dry curry recipe of Telangana household made using just a handful ingredients where Fenugreek leaves and Chickpea flour are the main ingredients.

name: Gavar Pumpkin Sabji Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  kothavarangaiclusterbeans, parangikaipumpkin, or1teaspoonredchillipowder, fenugreekseeds, hing, saunf, dhania, jeera, raikadugu, drymangopowder, moongphali, optional, haldi, dhania
description: Gavar (Gaur or Cluster beans) and Pumpkin (Kaddu/Lal Bhopla) sabji is a simple and healthy accompaniment for rotis or rice. The sweetness of the Pumpkin balances the slight bitterness of the Gavar beans and both these vegetables pair up well in this humble sabji. There are various ways to prepare the sabji, this recipe uses basic spices, easily available in the pantry.

name: Marwadi Gatte Ki Kadhi Recipe - Gram Flour Dumpling In Yogurt Curry
main_tag: rajasthani lunch vegetarian  besan, caromseeds, dahiyogurt, besan, dahiyogurt, haldi, dhania, jeera, dalchini
description: Marwadi Gatte Ki Kadhi Recipe (Gram Flour Dumpling In Yogurt Curry Recipe) is an authentic Rajasthani Khadi made by simmering the yogurt based curry with spicy gram flour dumpling. This curry compliments very well Phulka and Steamed rice and is served with a dollop of ghee.

name: Bhindi With Cashews & Coconut Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, raikadugu, jeera, bengalgramdal
description: Bhindi with Cashews & Coconut Sabzi Recipe is a nice way to cook bhindi as a side dish. This sabzi recipe is apt when you have guests at home, since it's easy and impressive side dish. This recipe of Bhindi with cashews and coconut sabzi goes well with rasam.

name: Hari Dhania Ki Sabzi ( Fresh Coriander leaves Dry Curry) Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  dhania, besan, aloo, haldi, gingelly, raikadugu, jeera, hing
description: Hari Dhania Ki Sabzi is a dry Indian curry made from fresh coriander leaves. Typically the leaves are used as a garnish for many Indian dishes. But in this recipe, the coriander is cooked along with gram/besan flour which bring the dish together.

name: Plain Dalia Recipe- How To Cook Broken Wheat In Pressure Cooker
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  daliagodumairava
description: Plain Dalia/ broken wheat is a high fiber, full of nutrition tasty carbohydrate. It can be easily made in a pressure cooker. Broken wheat is great to be included in your diet. There are lots of recipes that you can make with broken wheat. They can all easily be cooked in a pressure cooker but if you like you can cook the broken wheat in a saucepan as well. When cooking in a saucepan ensure that you put enough water. Remove any excess water in the pan after the broken wheat/ dalia is cooked.

name: Kongunadu Urulai Kurma Recipe (Curried Potatoes from Kongunadu)
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  aloo, haldi, dhania, bengalgramdal, saunf, jeera, laung, dalchini, tejpatta
description: Kongunadu, the areas around Coimbatore and Erode is a fertile region. Every home in the village has their own garden and the people are passionate about growing their own fruits and vegetables. In the Kongunadu Cuisine lots of coconut and tomatoes are used as they are widely grown in these areas. Of course the taste of tomatoes grown there cannot be matched with the ones available in cities. The masalas are mildly spicy, tangy and tasty. Their dishes can be made quickly with simple ingredients in your pantry with very less effort. Potatoes are cooked in a tangy tomato-onion gravy .

name: Hara Dhania Paratha Recipe - Coriander Paratha
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  jeera, haldi, dhania
description: The Hara Dhania Paratha also known as the Coriander Paratha is a simple and healthy paratha that is extremely rich in fiber and nutrition. This paratha is a refreshing change from the regular roti and phulkas and can be had as snack or packed into your kids lunch box.

name: Manipuri Style Mangal Ooti Recipe - Yellow Peas Curry Recipe
main_tag: northeastindia lunch vegetarian  vatana, jeera, tejpatta, haldi
description: Manipuri Mangal Ooti is a Manipuri side dish served  during Kang festival in their region. A simple peas dish that is very popular  as a breakfast or dinner option. It is cooked in soda and mustard oil tadka and makes for a delicious accompaniment along with any Indian Bread.

name: Goan Style Recheado Bangdo Recipe | Stuffed Mackerel
main_tag: goan maincourse highproteinnonvegetarian  semolinarava
description: Recheado or reshad Bangdo is one of the Goan Speciality where Bangdo or Mackerel is stuffed with Goan Recheado spice masala. This spice or masala can be prepared and stored in the refrigerator and be used whenever required. In Recheado Mackerel, the masala is stuffed inside the Mackerels and pan fried using cooking oil. For more better taste, it is always good to stuff these Mackerels and refrigerate overnight which helps in marination and the flavours also be absorbed better.

name: Karlyachi Ambat Goad Bhaji Recipe - Maharashtrian Sweet & Sour Karela Sabzi
main_tag: maharashtrian maincourse diabeticfriendly  bittergourdpavakkai, haldi, raikadugu, hing
description: Kaarlyachi Aambat Goad Bhaaji is a Maharashtrian Bitter Gourd Sweet And Sour Curry that is extremely healthy and simple to make.

name: Goan Vegetable Curry Recipe
main_tag: goan lunch vegetarian  haldi, dhania, jeera
description: Goan Vegetable Curry Recipe is a classic dish from Goa. It is a part of day to day meal. It is made with mixed vegetables. This dish is simple and easy to make.You can add vegetables according to your taste and preference. Its creamy and coconut based and will spice up your everyday meal.

name: Pacha Manga Pachadi Recipe - Raw Mango Pachadi
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish vegetarian  raw, haldi, raikadugu, jeera
description: The Pacha Manga Pachadi Recipe is a tangy and sweet chunky mango chutney that is packed with taste and flavours from raw mango, jaggery and a delicious seasoning.

name: Baingan Methi Ka Bharta Recipe with Pomegranates
main_tag: punjabi lunch vegetarian  fenugreekleaves, bainganeggplant, haldi, dhania, salted, pomegranateseedpowder
description: Baingan Methi Ka Bharta Recipe with Pomegranates is a twist to the classic Punjabi Recipe that is made from smoked and chargrilled brinjals then mish-mashed and cooked along with a combination of spices. Along with the main ingredients that flavor, this recipe also has methi leaves, that are sauteed and added to the Bharta to pack it with flavors. And to add color and subtle sweetness to this dish, when serving the Baingan Methi Ka Bharta, I sprinkled it with Pomegranate seeds and served it along with Phulkas and Punjabi Kadhi Pakora.

name: Vendakkai Vengayam Sambar Recipe (Okra in Tangy Lentil Curry)
main_tag: southindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, ladyfingerokra, gingelly, raikadugu, hing, dhania
description: The Vendakkai Vengayam Sambar Recipe is a simple and quick method of making sambar that is packed with flavors from the okra (bhindi) and the most important ingredient, the homemade sambar powder.  The Vendakkai (okra) when cooked along with the tamarind water and sambar powder, absorbs the spices so well, that it imparts a delicious taste to the sambar. Serve the Vendakkai Vengayam Sambar along with Steamed Rice, topped with Ghee and Potato Roast

name: Andhra Style Patoli Recipe (Dal Usli/ Crumbled Dal Recipe)
main_tag: andhra sidedish vegetarian  bengalgramdal, raikadugu, split, jeera, hing, haldi
description: Andhra Style Patoli Recipe (Dal Usli/ Crumbled Dal Recipe) is a dish made from chana dal that is ground to a paste and stir fried with crispy onions and fresh coriander leaves. You can also add extra vegetables like capsicums, carrot to add up to your crunch. The dish very tasty as it is and can also accompanied with rotis of phulkas.

name: Karatyacho Fodi Recipe - Pan Fried Bitter Gourd
main_tag: goan sidedish vegetarian  bittergourdpavakkai, haldi, semolinarava
description: Shallow fried bitter gourd, also called as Karatyachyo Fodi in Goa is one of the most easy and healthy recipe. These are prepared by shallow frying the bitter gourd pieces using spices until they are nice and crisp and served with any vegetarian Thali.

name: Ringan Methi Nu Shaak Recipe - Gujarati Style Eggplant & Fenugreek Leaves Sabzi
main_tag: gujarati﻿ lunch vegetarian  bainganeggplant, fenugreekleaves, haldi, dhania, jeera, drymangopowder, raikadugu, jeera
description: Ringan Methi Nu Shaak Recipe is a Gujarati style eggplants cooked with fresh fenugreek leaves. Here the eggplants along with fenugreek leaves are mildly flavoured with the regular spices - red chilli, turmeric, coriander, cumin powder and finished with a bit of jaggery and amchur, which lends the dish a slight sweetness and tanginess. The subzi is spicy, sweet and tangy making it perfect to be had with hot phulkas.

name: Mudaliar Style Omelette Curry Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch eggetarian  dhania, dhania, dhania, pudina, greekyogurt, haldi, dalchini, elaichi, dhania
description: Mudaliar Style Omelette Curry Recipe is recipe that has been originated from vellara Christian community which is one of the cuisines of Tamil Nadu. The usual egg curry is made by adding the whole boiled egg in the curry and simmered. But in this recipe, we use the egg as an omelette which is made separately to a thin layer and then simmered in a thick and luscious curry which consists of three different base.

name: Kerala Style Mutton Pepper Fry Recipe
main_tag: kerala appetizer nonvegeterian  jeera, dhania, haldi, 12inchsize
description: A simple delicious fry recipe with mutton that goes beautifully with rotis, rice and dal, or even dosas is this kerala mutton pepper fry. The pungency from black pepper corns goes very well with meat dishes especially mutton. Indian food is known for its spice levels and Kerala been the land of spices uses a lot of peppercorns in their dishes. Coconut oil is highly recommended for this dish.

name: Karwar Style Bibya Usal Recipe (Spiced Cashew Nut Sabzi)
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian  split, raikadugu, adjusttotaste, haldi
description: Karwar Style Bibya Usal Recipe (Spiced Cashew Nut Sabzi) is the Konkan and Karwar style cashew sabzi. A customary side dish, in any function or festival in Konkani cuisine. Fresh, tender cashews are sautéed along with few spices to make this tasty and simple stir fry.

name: Masala Couscous Pulao Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian  gajjar, matar, dhania, pudina, tejpatta, laung, dalchini, dhania
description: Couscous is a staple of North African cuisine and is a dish of steamed balls of semolina usually served with stew on top. Traditional couscous is prepared with semolina, but in recent days, it is prepared with wheat and barley. Coarsely ground wheat is moistened, rolled into small balls and dusted off with wheat flour.

name: Puli Keerai Recipe (Tamarind Spinach Curry)
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  palak, raikadugu, bengalgramdal
description: Puli Keerai is a traditional South Indian Recipe that serves a main course. It is more like a sambar or rasam that goes well with rice. Puli Keerai is a simple recipe that doesn’t need any special ingredient. The spinach that is used gives good amount of iron to the body. This can be packed even for lunch. Puli Keerai is a quick dish that can be prepared in minimum time on a busy day.

name: Methi Malai Paneer Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  fenugreekleaves, homemadecottagecheese, driedfenugreekleaves, salted, jeera, tejpatta, haldi, dhania
description: Methi Malai Paneer Recipe is a famous North Indian dish that is very common in restaurants, parties, and get-togethers. It is a very tasty, aromatic yet easy to make recipe. Bursting with flavors of fresh methi leaves this creamy gravy tastes just awesome. This recipe will win everybody's heart at the dining table and we are sure you will make it again and again.

name: Batata Saragva Nu Shaak Recipe-Spicy Aloo & Drumstick Vegetable
main_tag: gujarati﻿ lunch vegetarian  aloo, dalchini, tejpatta, hing, dhania, haldi, dhania
description: Batata Saragva Nu Shaak is made with a combination of fried potatoes and steamed drumsticks cooked in an onion and tomato gravy.This one was one of my childhood favorite dishes and I especially love it for french fried potatoes that make it special and tempting for everyone in the family.

name: Jain Style Dal Makhani Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  whole, largekidneybeans, jeera, dalchini, laung, badielaichi, optional, optional
description: Dal Makhani is a very popular recipe, which everyone loves. Its rich, creamy, spicy and delicious. Here, we have a Jain version of it, without the use of onion and garlic. Its simple to cook and the addition of dry ginger powder gives it a beautiful flavour. This is an ideal recipe that you can make during the fasting days.

name: Rava Fried Prawns Recipe
main_tag: goan lunch nonvegeterian  haldi, semolinarava, haldi
description: Rava Fried Prawns is a traditional Goan dish. In Goa, we make different kinds of rava fried dishes to have as an accompaniment with rice and fish curry. No Goan thali is complete without rava fried delicacies. Prawns are a good source of protein and calcium and is a good source of vitamin A and E. They also contain zinc which maintains the immune system. However, anything in excess is not good. Rava fried prawns or tiger prawns tastes yum and can be served as starters for parties.

name: Chicken Chops Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer nonvegeterian  dhania, pudina, haldi, dhania
description: Chicken Chops belong to cutlet family. This chicken chops recipe is the simplest chicken recipe. These chops are perfect finger food for parties.

name: Shimla Mirchi Panchamrut Recipe | Konkani Capsicum Cashew Peanut Sabzi
main_tag: konkan maincourse vegetarian  capsicum, moongphali, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, hing, haldi, laung, dalchini, dhania, jeera, fenugreekseeds, moongphali
description: Shimla Mirchi Panchamrut is a Konkani dish which is made from pan roasted capsicum, along with cashew nuts and steamed peanuts that is cooked along with freshly roasted and ground spices along with tamarind and jaggery. It has a spicy, sweet and nutty taste and flavour making it a refreshing dish.

name: Dahi Achari Bhindi Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, haldi, dhania, dahiyogurt, besan, saunf, jeera, onionnigellaseeds, raikadugu, caromseeds
description: Dahi Achari Bhindi Recipe a delicious combination of Bhindi with Achari flavors cooked in yogurt curry, makes for a excellent combination. The bhindi is sautéed till it is crispy and then tossed along with caramelized onions, freshly ground achari masala and then slowly cooked in thick yogurt.

name: No Onion No Garlic Rajasthani Gatte Ki Kadhi Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani lunch vegetarian  gramflourdumplings, besan, caromseeds, dahiyogurt, yogurtcurry, besan, dahiyogurt, hing, haldi, tejpatta, dalchini, dhania, raikadugu, jeera
description: The Rajasthani Gatte Ki Kadhi Recipe is a traditional yogurt based curry that is simmered along with a spiced gram flour dumplings. It's most often had along with millet based rotis or along with steamed rice, Kachumber Salad and Boondi Raita.

name: Pahari Style Phanu Recipe - Delicious Mixed Dal
main_tag: uttarakhand-northkumaon lunch highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, split, haldi, hing, jeera
description: Pahari Style Phanu Recipe is a delicious blend of two different dals. The creaminess in the dal is wonderfully complimented with the subtle flavours from the whole spice. A simple tadka with mustard oil, cumin seeds and green chillies are poured on top before serving.

name: Soya Chunks Masala in Coconut Milk Recipe
main_tag: southindian dinner highproteinvegetarian  nuggets, jeera, haldi, dhania
description: Soya Chunks Masala in Coconut Milk is a spicy preparation of protein rich soya chunks in coconut milk which has its own list of benefits. This gravy pairs up perfect so well not only with hot steamed rice but also with wheat phulkas. The spiciness of the gravy can be adjusted according to the palate. The preparation of the soya chunk masala is an effortless affair with subtle flavours of spices and coconut milk, hence can be a top option of a lazy weekend menu.

name: Khatti Arbi Ki Sabzi Recipe - Colocasia In Yoghurt Curry
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  arbi, dahiyogurt, raikadugu, haldi, jeera, fenugreekseeds
description: Khatti Arbi Ki Sabzi Recipe (Colocasia In Yoghurt Curry) a dry yogurt based arbi dish that has mild spice which is well balanced with the sourness from the yogurt. The flavors from the fenugreek seeds, peppercorns, cumin seeds and coconut when ground and added to the curry along with yogurt creates a delicious dish.

name: Kolambi Bhaath Recipe (Maharashtrian Prawn Rice)
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch nonvegeterian  haldi, laung, dalchini, elaichi, tejpatta, hing, jeera
description: Kolambi Bhaath is a marathi style rice preparation with Prawns. To my mind it closely resembles tomato rice with added prawns. Cooked rice is mixed with prawns stir fried with onion and tomatoes along with some dry spices to make a delightful and yet easy lunch/dinner.

name: Methi Turai Ki Sabzi (Fenugreek Leaves And Ridge Gourd Stir Fry)
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian  turaipeerkangai, fenugreekleaves, jeera, dhania, haldi
description: Methi Turai Ki Sabzi is a dry vegetable preparation of fenugreek leaves and ridge gourd stir fried together with some spices. This healthy combination makes a delicious quick comforting addition to a homely lunch or dinner. Enjoy the combined goodness of both these vegetables packed into one delicious dish. Serve Methi Turai Ki Sabzi along with hot salad.

name: Ambur Star Chicken Biryani Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu maincourse nonvegeterian  jeeraga, tejpatta, dalchini, elaichi, laung, dhania, dahiyogurt, pudina
description: Ambur Star Chicken Biryani is a delicious South Indian Biryani Recipe, in which the flavour of the chicken is predominant and the spices are rather mild. With tender pieces of meat on the bone, simple whole spices and the short grain rice-Seeraga Samba, this non-vegetarian recipe is an absolute winner.  Serve it as main course at your parties or on a Sunday afternoon for lunch.

name: Dum Pukht Gosht Recipe - Slow Cooked Mutton Curry
main_tag: lucknowi lunch nonvegeterian  dahiyogurt, elaichi, badielaichi, laung, dalchini, jeera, dhania, haldi, dhania
description: Dum Pukht is a slow cooking technique where food is cooked in a sealed vessel. Dum means "to breathe" and Pukht means "to cook". Lucknowi Nawabs used this technique of cooking and the Lucknowi dum cooked recipes like their biryani is quite popular.

name: Sindhi Pakwan Recipe - Crisp Delicious Puri
main_tag: sindhi northindianbreakfast vegetarian  maida, caromseeds, jeera
description: Sindhi Pawan is a classic in Sindhi Crisp Puri recipe that is served along with Sindhi Chana Dal. Together the Dal Pakwan is considered to be a royal breakfast garnished with chutney and chopped onion. Pakwan is crispy fried pooris made with a mix of both wheat flour and all purpose flour. As the pakwan is fried and teamed up with chana dal, it becomes rich and heavy to digest. Hence a teaspoon of ajwain is mixed with the flour while making pakwan that consist amazing digestive properties and prevents you from feeling bloated.

name: Kerala Style duck curry with Coconut Milk Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch nonvegeterian  haldi, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, 2ndextract, 1stextract, haldi, dhania, elaichi
description: Kerala Style duck curry with Coconut Milk Recipe, is very dear to my heart and has an influence from Kerala cuisine. This is one of the famous dishes in Alappuzha district of kerala. There is something mystical about this duck curry as the aromas awakens your senses which in turn fires the appetite and it is hard for the taste buds to resist the temptation of this mouth watering duck curry. The sharpness of spices and pepper is well balanced with the richness of the coconut milk.

name: South Indian Paniyaram Recipe - 3 types - Classic, Carrot & Spinach
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  gajjar, raikadugu, sambaronions, dhania
description: Paniyaram can be a handy recipe when you want to use the leftover idli-dosa batter when the batter starts to become sour. Whenever you are in a hurry then you can just add salt, few vegetables like grated carrots and spinach make a nutritious paniyaram and serve it along with idli podi or chutney.

name: Gutti Dondakaya Vepudu Recipe - Stuffed Ivy Gourds | Stuffed Tendli | Kovakkai
main_tag: andhra maincourse vegetarian  dondakayakovakkai, raikadugu, jeera, hing, haldi, split, bengalgramdal, dhania, jeera, tilseeds
description: Gutti Dondakaya Vepudu Recipe is a spicy and delicious preparation of ivy gourd or tendli in an Andhra style. Andhra cuisine is classified under the most spiciest ones, yet this recipe is a mix of amazing flavours and textures.

name: Milagu Rasam Recipe - Miriyala Charu | Pepper Rasam With Fresh Ground Rasam Powder
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  splittoordal, haldi, dhania, jeera, dhania, splittoordal, fenugreekseeds, raikadugu, jeera, hing
description: Milagu Rasam also known as the Miriyala Charu is a rasam that made from freshly roasted and ground spices simmered in a tamarind and tomato gravy. It makes a perfect dish to have as a soup or along with a south indian meal.

name: South Indian Poli Recipe - Boli | Obbattu | Bobbatlu | Holige
main_tag: southindian dessert vegetarian  haldi, splittoordal, elaichi
description: The South Indian Poli Recipe is a very traditional recipe that is made with a combination of lentils, spices and coconut. The addition of coconut along with cardamon in the filling gives the poli a rich and delicious taste.

name: Ajwaini Tamatar Bhindi Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch noonionnogarlic  ladyfingerokra, caromseeds, hing
description: Ajwaini Tamatar Bhindi is a delicious version of bhindi which is gravy cooked in tomato gravy with a twist of ajwain flavour and can be served in lunch or dinner for your special guests.

name: Kumror/Kaddu Posto Recipe (Spiced Pumpkin with Poppy Seeds and Tomatoes )
main_tag: bengali dinner vegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, haldi, dhania, dhania
description: Kumror/Kaddu Posto Recipe is a simple, quick twist to a traditional Bengali recipe of Aloo Posto. In my endeavour to experiment with vegetables and spices, this posto recipe came by chance and I must say we loved it, even my vegetable loving children ate it with delight. The subtle hint of garlic, along with lots of coriander and garam masala, makes this Kumror/Kaddu Posto a vegetarian delight.

name: Chow Chow Sambar Recipe (Chayote Squash Sambar)
main_tag: southindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, chayotesquash, haldi, dhania, gingelly, raikadugu, hing
description: Sambar is a very versatile dish in the South Indian Cuisine. It pairs very well with the breakfast dishes like idli/dosa and one can also have it for lunch along with the steamed rice. Chow Chow Sambar (Chayote Squash Sambar), is one of the kinds of sambar usually had along with the steamed rice. Chow Chow, also known as chayote squash belongs to the gourd family and has a good amount of folates, making it a healthy choice for cooking.

name: Padpe Uppukari -  Harive Soppu Palya Recipe
main_tag: mangalorean sidedish vegetarian  raikadugu, split, hing
description: Padpe Uppukari Harive Soppu Palya Recipe is a lovely South Indian Style Spinach stir fry. The flavours are simple and well balanced that is made Mangalorean style with added goodness of coconut.

name: Gujarati Vaghareli Mag Recipe - Whole Green Moong Dal Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ lunch highproteinvegetarian  whole, jeera, haldi, dhania
description: Jain Style Whole Green Moong Dal Sabzi Recipe is a dry moong dal dish which uses absolutely no onion and no garlic, making it a Jain dish as the name suggests.

name: Mughlai Aloo Matar Gobi Recipe
main_tag: mughlai lunch vegetarian  gobi, aloo, matar, dahiyogurt, haldi, dhania, laung, elaichi
description: Mughlai Aloo Matar Gobi as the name suggests is a typical Indian side dish higher on spicy side with the flavors of Ghee, Curd and fried onion. If you are planning Indian menu for the party than this dish would fit in well and compliments almost all kinds of dals, curries. During winter cauliflower and green peas are abundantly available in market so this recipe could be tried during the season with the best of local produce.

name: Shahi Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  whole, badam, haldi, jeera
description: Shahi Dal Recipe is a creamy and rich dal made from whole urad dal. The dal also has soaked almonds for the crunch and is then topped with sautéed onions, tomatoes, cumin seeds and red chili powder on top.  The dal is so easy to make and can be served along with any Indian breads like phulka, thepla and tawa paratha to enjoy your lunch meals. It is so comforting as well and can had with a just a steamed rice topped with some ghee.

name: Potato And Peas Curry Recipe In Coconut Milk Gravy
main_tag: indian maincourse vegetarian  aloo, matar, laung, jeera, dhania, haldi
description: Potato And Peas In Coconut Milk Curry Recipe is a delicious and mildly spiced curry cooked in coconut milk. Potatoes and Peas are perfect match and a crowd pleaser.

name: Arbi Jhol Recipe -Uttar Pradesh Style Colocasia & Lotus Seeds Sabzi
main_tag: uttarpradesh sidedish vegetarian  arbi, lotusseeds, jeera, hing, dhania, jeera, haldi, driedfenugreekleaves, dhania
description: Arbi Jhol Recipe is Uttar Pradesh Style Colocasia & Lotus Seeds Sabzi prepared without onion and garlic. But at the same time, this sabzi is so flavourful that you will make this recipe often. Everyday spices and kasuri methi makes this gravy recipe packed with flavours.

name: Fansi Muthia Nu Shaak Recipe - Green Beans With Gram Flour Dumplings
main_tag: gujarati﻿ maincourse vegetarian  frenchbeans, raikadugu, caromseeds, hing, dhania, haldi, drymangopowder, besan, driedfenugreekleaves, haldi, hing
description: Fansi Muthia Nu Shaak Recipe is a very famous Gujarati Recipe that has a stir fried green beans and muthia that are made from roasted gram flour. Muthias are nothing but dumplings that add a different texture to the dish when added.

name: Masoor Dal Makhni Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  whole, tejpatta, laung, jeera, dalchini, dhania
description: Masoor Dal Makhni is a delicious, creamy and healthy lentil recipe. Masoor Dal is considered to be very healthy as compared to other lentils. It is a mildly spiced nutrients enriched dish which is perfect to serve for a weeknight dinner.

name: No Onion No Garlic Cabbage Kofta Curry Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian  pattagobimuttaikose, besan, dhania, jeera, haldi, besan, dahiyogurt, dhania, haldi, jeera, tejpatta, elaichi, dhania
description: The festivals are arriving and this is the time when some particular religious communities quit eating Onion and Garlic. As India is a multi cultural country, hence their are certain casts who never intake onion garlic, such as Jainism. In Jain community the intake of Onion and Garlic is strictly prohibited, or anything that grows beneath the soil is not acceptable to eat. Thankfully our food culture is so vast that for every ingredient we have some substitutes ready. Hence making a No Onion No Garlic Cabbage Kofta Curry was over all a great experience. Grated cabbage mixed with Indian spices and bind with gram flour is later shaped into balls and deep fried. The curry has a great use of tomato, gram flour and fresh cream to give texture, colour and flavour to the gravy.

name: Tadkewali Masoor Dal Recipe - High Protein Masoor Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  hing, haldi, whole, dhania, jeera, hing
description: Tadkewali Masoor Dal Recipe is a simple recipe made in a pressure cooker with the most basic ingredients. The masoor dal is soaked for a couple of hour and then pressure cooked along with the ginger garlic onions and simple masalas and given a hing and red chilli tadka.

name: Cheesy Aloo Paratha Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast vegetarian  aloo, jeera, hing, haldi, dhania, jeera, dhania
description: Aloo parathas are Indian Potato Flatbread made from whole wheat flour and stuffed with a spicy mixture of onions and potatoes. These Parathas are a bit different from the usual aloo parathas. They are stuffed with a combination of potatoes, onions and cheese. You will love this twist to the routine aloo parathas.

name: Pui Shaager Chorchori Recipe - Mixed Vegetable Curry With Malabar Spinach
main_tag: northeastindia sidedish vegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, radish, aloo, bainganeggplant, jeera, haldi
description: Pui Shaager Chorchori Recipe is a traditional Bengali vegetable side dish that can be made for your everyday meals. In Bengali Chorchori means a combination of vegetables.

name: Vazhakkai Milagu Kootu Recipe - Plantains Pepper Curry
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  raikadugu, split, bengalgramdal, jeera, hing
description: Vazhakkai Milagu Kootu is a delicious recipe of plantain stem,cooked in a curry made from freshly roasted masala, that adds great flavours to the curry.

name: Goan style Caril De Camarao Recipe (Prawn Curry Recipe)
main_tag: goan lunch nonvegeterian  haldi, dhania
description: Goan style Caril De Camarao Recipe (Prawn Curry Recipe) is a simple prawn curry that can be made quickly with few ingredients. The curry has a coconut base which is spicy and as well as tangy by the use of tamarind pulp. Traditionally ground coconut are used to make this rich curry but we have changed and added coconut milk to suit the busy home cooks keeping the flavors also intact. Fresh prawns are the best to add more flavor to this dish. The goan cuisine is famous for its seafood and spicy flavor that are ground with whole spices. The cuisine also has slight influence with Portuguese as well.

name: Sindhi Karela Bhaji Recipe - Sindhi Style Bitter Gourd Sabzi
main_tag: sindhi lunch diabeticfriendly  bittergourdpavakkai, dahiyogurt, jeera, dhania, elaichi, haldi, pomegranateseedpowder, dhania
description: Sindhi Karela Bhaji Recipe is a delectable bitter gourd side dish cooked in Sindhi style. Though bitter gourds are bitter, here it is cooked in a tangy onion, tomato and yogurt based curry, which makes its taste much palatable.

name: Goan Lady Fish Curry Recipe - Muddoshi Hooman
main_tag: goan lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  haldi, radish, dhania, haldi
description: No coastal cuisine is complete without fish curries. In Goa, fish curry will be cooked almost everyday for lunch. Since various types of fish are available in Goa, various types of fish curries can be made and the recipe differs according to the type of fish used.

name: Chettinad Chicken Roast Recipe | Chicken Ghee Roast Recipe
main_tag: chettinad appetizer highproteinnonvegetarian  greekyogurt, haldi, jeera, dhania, fenugreekseeds, onionnigellaseeds, saunf, dalchini, laung, elaichi, raikadugu, raikadugu
description: This Chettinad Chicken Roast Recipe is a semi gravy recipe that you can either serve as a starter or a side dish with your meal. This Chicken recipe is flavoured with whole spices, gets its zing from the tamarind and sweet from the jaggery. Above all, the flavour of ghee takes this recipe to a different level altogether.

name: Andhra Pepper Chicken Recipe - Dry Restaurant Style Pepper Chicken
main_tag: andhra maincourse nonvegeterian  haldi, dhania, dhania
description: Andhra Pepper Chicken Recipe is a delicious chicken recipe famous across most Andhra Non Veg Restaurants. which you can serve either as a starter or as a side dish along with your meal. The

name: Methi Murgh Recipe - Chicken with Fenugreek Leaves
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  fenugreekleaves, saunf, dalchini, haldi, jeera
description: Methi Murgh Recipe also known as Chicken with Fenugreek Leaves Recipe is a classic combination of chicken and fenugreek leaves. The chicken is cooked in fresh methi leaves that compliments really well with the tender chicken.

name: Bhopli Mirchi Chi Peeth Perun Bhaji Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian sidedish highproteinvegetarian  capsicum, besan, haldi, drymangopowder, dhania, jeera, raikadugu, jeera, hing
description: Bhopli Mirchi Chi Peeth Perun Bhaji is basically Maharashtra style green Capsicum besan sabzi. When you are mixing besan into the sabzi, you need to add it little by little with constant stirring. Also remember that you can add plain water instead of about 2 tablespoons of oil to make sabzi not too dry.

name: Gujarati Style Bhakri Recipe-A Multigrain Flat Bread
main_tag: maharashtrian northindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  sorghum, caromseeds, haldi
description: Bhakri recipe is a delicious flatbread that is made from a combination of flours. Bhakri's are prepared differently in every Gujarati home. It has varied textures, thickness and most often a made from a mixture of flours. Almost every Gujarati and Marathi home makes them with either wheat flour or jowar flour or both. Bhakri has a crispy outer layer and soft inside.

name: Hyderabadi Vegetable Biryani Recipe | Vegetable Dum Biryani
main_tag: hyderabadi lunch vegetarian  frenchbeans, gajjar, aloo, grindthebelowingredientstoapasteandkeepaside, jeeraga, dahiyogurt, dalchini, elaichi, tejpatta, haldi, dhania, pudina
description: Hyderabadi Biryani is a traditional celebration meal made using meat and rice and is a staple of Hyderabadi cuisine. This recipe was shared to me by a Muslim friend who makes the most awesome Biryani that I have tasted. The recipe of Hyderabadi Biryani has a few stages to making it. I make it in many different ways and the one mentioned below is one of the methods to make it super delicious.

name: Hariyali Machali Recipe - Carp Fish In Green Spinach And Coriander Gravy
main_tag: indian dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  jeera, dhania
description: A very healthy version of cooking fish in green gravy is explained in this recipe. Hariyali Machli/Fish cooked in spinach puree with mouth watering green chilly, coriander and lime is very common in Indian cuisine especially in Punjabi kitchen.

name: Himachal Style Pahari Sidu Recipe -Stuffed Bread Recipe
main_tag: himachal lunch vegetarian  moongphali, matar, homemadecottagecheese
description: Himachal Style Pahari Sidu Recipe (Stuffed Bread Recipe) is a traditional stuffed bread made with whole wheat flour dough. The filling is a mixture of green peas and nuts.

name: Kerala Style Beetroot Pachadi Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, haldi, raikadugu, jeera, raikadugu
description: Beetroot pachadi recipe is very good accompaniment for rice and it is usually prepared by people in Kerala during Onam feast. The beetroot pachadi has light sweetness, sourness and spiciness. This pachadi has a pleasing pink colour and prepared by adding curd to the cooked beetroot. Serve this Kerala Style Beetroot Pachadi Recipe during a meal along with steamed rice, Vendakkai Uppadan and Jack Fruit Seeds Stir Fry Recipe.

name: How to Make Homemade Jalebi Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  maida, dahiyogurt, haldi
description: The Homemade Jalebi Recipe is a delicious mithai dish that you can make right in your own kitchen. The Jalebi is a traditional sweet dish that is made on every festival, special occasions and monsoons. And so much so even homes make this dish to celebrate the occasion. This homemade Jalebi recipe is actually very easy to prepare and tastes absolutely delicious. Festivals like Holi and Diwali are incomplete without the preparation of this class Indian dessert - Jalebi.

name: Sorakkai Kozhukattai Paal Kuzhambu Recipe - Bottle Gourd Curry
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  lauki, bengalgramdal, raikadugu, split
description: Sorakkai Kozhukattai Paal Kuzhambu is an authentic recipe from Tamil Nadu. It is a mildly spiced curry with coconut and tiny rice dumplings (kozhukattai) that are cooked along with bottle gourd. Sugar is added to give a little sweet taste .Tiny rice dumplings and chopped bottle gourd gives nice texture to the curry. As it is mildly spiced we can pair it up with any tangy and spicy gravies like puli kuzhambu for lunch.

name: Aloo Bhindi Masala Gravy Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, hing, aloo, hing, jeera, haldi, dalchini, tejpatta, haldi, dhania, driedfenugreekleaves, dhania
description: Aloo Bhindi Masala Gravy Recipe is an everyday gravy sabzi that is cooked along with spices in a tomato and onion gravy. It is simple to make and uses everyday masalas to make the gravy flavourful. It makes a delicious side dish to be served along with phulkas and a dal tadka for lunch or dinner.

name: Mushroom Tikka Masala Recipe (Mushroom & Bell Peppers In Spicy Tomato Gravy)
main_tag: northindian sidedish highproteinvegetarian  dahiyogurt, hungyogurt, haldi, besan, capsicum, jeera, laung, dalchini, elaichi, tejpatta, driedfenugreekleaves
description: Mushroom Tikka Masala Recipe is a perfectly roasted chunks of marinated mushrooms and bell pepper in a fragrant and spicy tomato based gravy. Skillful to make and a crowd pleaser for sure. Mushroom Tikka Masala Recipe can be served for lunch or dinner along with Pudina Tawa Paratha or Butter Garlic Naan Recipe and Bharma Baingan Aur Pyaaz Ki Sabzi Recipe (Spicy Stuffed Brinjals With Onions).

name: Khatte Chole Recipe - A Delicious North Indian Chana Masala
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  whitechickpeas, dalchini, laung, caromseeds, dhania, drymangopowder
description: Khatte Chole Recipe is a very popular Delhi style street food. It is spicy and tart making for a perfect accompaniment with Gehu Bajra Thepla or even a Kulcha for those special monsoon days. The tartness comes from the addition of dried mango powder or amchoor and the ginger in the recipe makes it flavourful and delicious.

name: Sookha Aloo Matar Methi Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  aloo, matar, fenugreekleaves, dhania, haldi
description: Sookha Aloo Matar Methi Sabzi Recipe is a delicious easy to make sabzi recipe. It has the goodness of the fresh fenugreek leaves, potatoes and green peas combined with mild spices. It makes for a great accompaniment for phulkas or parathas. If you have all the ingredients ready, it is the quickest recipe to cook for the rushed mornings.

name: Chicken Cooked in Banana Leaves Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer highproteinnonvegetarian  dhania, laung, haldi
description: Long marination makes the chicken tender and succulent in this Chicken Cooked in Banana Leaves Recipe.

name: Kashmiri Style Dum Oluv Recipe - Dum Aloo Recipe
main_tag: kashmiri lunch vegetarian  tejpatta, laung, dalchini, elaichi, saunf, badielaichi, jeera, greekyogurt
description: Kashmiri Style Dum Oluv Recipe -Dum Aloo Recipes is a traditional recipe from the region of Kashmir. The spices that they use is a blend of cloves, cinnamon, bay leaf, cardamom, fennel and cumin seeds. The gravy is yogurt and chilli flavored curry which is simmered in roasted baby potatoes.

name: Raw Mango Dal Fry Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, raw, haldi
description: Raw Mango Dal Fry Recipe is a wonderful and tangy twist to the regular dal fry recipe, with addition of raw mangoes. Grated raw mangoes are added to the arhar dal and other basic spices to prepare this side dish.

name: Bihari Aloo Bhujiya Recipe
main_tag: bihari lunch vegetarian  aloo, haldi, jeera
description: Bihari Aloo Bhujiya is a simple and humble recipe prepared in the households of Bihar. It requires the common ingredients available in the kitchen pantry and doesn’t involve much complex cooking techniques. It can be served as breakfast with parathas or as lunch with rice and curry.

name: Arbi Ka Saag Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  arbi, raikadugu, hing, dahiyogurt, haldi, dhania, dhania
description: Arbi Ka Saag is a spicy and delicious curd based gravy which is very famous among the Rajasthani households. Due to its unique taste, it can also be served during weekend dinner or lunch parties.

name: Gajar Pulao Recipe - Spiced Carrot Rice
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  gajjar, dhania
description: Carroty Flashed Rice as I like to call this Gajar Pulao is packed with nutrients, along with the Basmati Rice is pleasantly aromatic for your weekday lunch and dinner. Simple to make and delicious to eat, you should definitely give this recipe a try.

name: Gehu Bajra Thepla Recipe - Bajra Masala Paratha
main_tag: gujarati﻿ maincourse diabeticfriendly  pearlmillet, haldi, dhania
description: Gehu Bajra Thepla Recipe is a healthy preparation of the Gujarati Indian Flat Bread known as theplas. The addition of ginger, green chillies, black pepper gives the thepla and additional punch, giving the millet thepla a good taste.

name: Narthangai Curry | Sweet and Sour Citron fruit Curry
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  narthangai, haldi, fenugreekpowder, raikadugu
description: Narthangai Curry in the South Indian cuisine, especially tamil cuisine, citron is widely used in pickles and preserves. Here is delicious sweet and sour recipe of this fruit that can be had with steamed rice, dosa's or even along with phulka's.

name: Bengali Style Kaddu Lobia ki Sabzi with Panch Phoran Masala
main_tag: bengali lunch highproteinvegetarian  lobia, parangikaipumpkin, raikadugu, haldi, dhania, bengalifivespicepowder, jeera, raikadugu, saunf, onionnigellaseeds, fenugreekseeds
description: The Bengali Style Kaddu Lobia ki Sabzi is a delectable dish that is wholesome, packed with nutrients, proteins and the special Panch Phoran, that is a classic Indian five-spice powder. The addition of the freshly roasted spices, along with ginger, onions and tomatoes roasted along with the kaddu brings our the perfect blend of taste and texture.

name: Lauki Badi Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani maincourse vegetarian  lauki, wadi, jeera, raikadugu, hing, haldi, dhania
description: Lauki Badi Ki Sabzi is a perfect recipe for the days when you want to make something in jiffy but tasty. This is very popularly made in Rajasthani households and usually served with roti and parathas. It is easy and takes very few basic ingredients to prepare this recipe.

name: Pakistani Chickpeas Pulao Recipe With Sweet Hot Date Onion Chutney
main_tag: pakistani lunch vegetarian  whitechickpeas, elaichi, tejpatta, dalchini, laung, haldi, dhania, jeera, dhania, gingelly
description: Chickpeas Pulao is one of the common dishes that is often prepared in Pakistan. Pakistani Chickpeas Pulao Recipe is slightly saucy with the mixture of rice and chickpeas and is packed with spices. This is surely a warm and comforting food.

name: Palak Gobi Sabzi Recipe (Indian Style Cauliflower with Spinach)
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  palak, gobi, jeera, haldi, dhania
description: Palak Gobi Sabzi is a simple and healthy recipe that can be made for a quick weeknight meal. It is very similar to the Aloo Gobi Sabzi, the only addition is the spinach that adds more nutrition, colour and taste to the vegetable. Adding just a few spices into the vegetable brings out the best flavors from it. Serve Palak Gobi Sabzi with hot Phulkas or Tawa Paratha.

name: Parangikkai Keerai Kuzhambu Recipe (Pumpkin Spinach Curry)
main_tag: southindian sidedish highproteinvegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, orbutternutsquash, bengalgramdal, palak, split, raikadugu, jeera, dhania
description: Parangikkai Keerai Kuzhambu is a yellow pumpkin curry combined with spinach to make a delicious weeknight dinner. This is a favorite preparation where the combination of green chillies and coconut along with coriander seeds and jaggery adds a touch of spice and sweetness. We love the pumpkin spinach curry (Parangikkai Keerai Kuzhambu) at home and typically savor it with steamed rice or broken wheat.

name: Missi Roti Recipe (Spiced Gram Flour Flat Bread)
main_tag: rajasthani dinner vegetarian  besan, haldi, kalanamak
description: Missi Roti is delectable flatbread from Rajasthan that is made from gram flour and spiced with green chilies and flavored with black salt and ginger. The Missi roti tends to get dry, so it good to serve it hot along with butter and jaggery, accompanied with Sev usal or Palak Makhana Recipe.

name: Chettinad Paruppu Urundai Kuzhambu (Steamed Lentil Balls Cooked in a Tangy Curry) Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  lentilballs, bengalgramdal, splittoordal, saunf, jeera, hing, dhania, split, saunf, dhania, haldi, dhania, raikadugu, saunf, hing, gingelly
description: Chettinad Paruppu Urundai Kuzhambu (Steamed Lentil Balls Cooked in a Tangy Curry) is a traditional curry from the chettinad region of the Tamil Nadu. Chettinad cuisine is believed to be one the spiciest cuisines in India. The preparation is fairly simple, but has a perfect mix of flavors. Paruppu Urundai Kuzhambu, means steamed lentil balls dunked in a spicy, tangy curry in tamil.

name: Healthy Methi Matar Malai (No Cream) Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  fenugreekleaves, matar, jeera, greekyogurt, haldi, badam
description: Light & Healthy Methi Matar Ki Sabzi is a classic dish that is most often made with a lot of cream and cashew nuts, making it heavy. This recipe is light and nutritious and made with ingredients like hung curd and almonds to neutralize the bitterness of the fenugreek leaves. You can serve the Methi Matar Malai along with Tawa Paratha for a weeknight dinner.

name: Parsi Style Vegetable Dhansak Recipe- Parsi Vegetable Dal
main_tag: parsi dinner highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, split, bengalgramdal, fenugreekleaves, pudina, bainganeggplant, parangikaipumpkin, haldi, jeera, laung, dalchini, dhania
description: Parsi Cuisine is one of the traditional cuisine of the Parsis of India. Parsis are known for their love for good food, good music. Parsi cuisine has a West Indian cuisine influence. They also retain their food flavors and techniques from ancient Persian cuisine. One of the most popular Parsi foods is Dhansak. It’s traditionally meat and vegetables cooked in lentils. A very flavorful special masala called the dhansak masala makes this dish special and unique. Though Parsis are enthusiastic non-vegetarians, they have some delicious vegetarian recipes too.

name: Sesame Peanut Potato Mix Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  tilseeds, adjustaccordingtoyourtaste, moongphali, aloo, drymangopowder, jeera, dhania
description: Sesame Peanut Potato Mix is a delicious combination of potatoes and peanut. It is spicy and tangy in taste and can be served as a side dish with your meals.

name: Pandu Mirapakaya Pachadi  - Andhra Red Chilli Chutney Recipe
main_tag: andhra sidedish vegetarian  raikadugu, hing, fenugreekpowder
description: Andhra Ripe Red Chilli Chutney also known as the Pandu Mirapakaya Pachadi is a simple South Indian chutney which is made with fresh red chillies. This chutney is easy to make and requires very few ingredients. This is a perfect chutney to serve along with Dosa, Idli and Uttapam for your breakfast.

name: Fruit Pachadi Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  iusedpineapple mango kiwi apple  xa0pear  wholegrapes 112cupcurd dahiyogurt, haldi, raikadugu, raikadugu
description: A sweet, juicy and tasty fruits and yogurt delicacy with lots of coconut and green chilies makes Fruit Pachadi Recipe. This is a South Indian style fruit raita where fruits are cooked and then mixed with yogurt and tempered with chilli and mustard. The pachadi tastes heavenly when served with lunch or dinner and of course, it suits to play the role of mock role of dessert as well. Serve Fruit Pachadi Recipe with Fried Samvat Rice recipe or with Amritsari Ajwaini Paneer Recipe with hot Phulkas.

name: Chingiri Paturi Recipe
main_tag: bengali lunch nonvegeterian  raikadugu, cutinto4halves
description: Chingiri Paturi or Prawn Paturi is a famous traditional dish from Bengal cuisine that also belongs to the coastal region of West Bengal. Prawns cooked with minimum ingredients are parceled in banana leaf and then steamed is a delicious recipe that comes from my mother's diary. The dish is typically enjoyed with plain hot rice with a tinge of lemon on it.

name: Green Chilli Vegetable Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani lunch vegetarian  raikadugu, haldi, dhania
description: Green Chilli Vegetable is a quick and easy recipe which can be served with paratha or roti. It is best served as a side dish along with your Rajasthani or Gujarati meal. The spiciness and the sweetness of this dish makes the entire meal more tasty and flavourful.

name: Hariyali Tawa Fish Fry Recipe
main_tag: northindian appetizer highproteinnonvegetarian  rohufishisusedhere, haldi, dhania, pudina, dahiyogurt, besan
description: Hariyali Tawa Fish Fry Recipe is a lip smacking non vegetarian fish recipe where the fish is marinated with a hint of traditional spices like garam masala powder, lemon, coriander leaves and also mint leaves and then pan fried.

name: Aloo Gobi Matar Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  gobi, aloo, matar, dhania, haldi, fenugreekleaves, dhania
description: Aloo Gobhi Matar Ki Sabzi Recipe is made of potatoes, cauliflower and green peas mixed with spices. This is a wholesome dish that is perfect when served with hot Chapatis, pooris, or dal rice for lunch or dinner. The veggie Aloo Gobhi Matar Ki Sabzi Recipe is very simple to make and requires very basic ingredients. This sabzi is great also for kids lunch boxes with plain parathas since potatoes, cauliflower and green peas is a good combination.

name: Gobi and Soya Keema Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  gobi, nuggets, matar, haldi, dhania, tejpatta, dhania
description: Keema is a South Asian meat dish that literally means minced meat in Turkish. Keema can be made with any meat but usually Keema is associated with mutton mince. Most Keemas are minced meats that are mixed with aromatic spices that are either eaten by itself or added to rice or stuffed in breads.

name: Tamil Nadu Style Kothamali Aval Upma Recipe - Coriander Poha Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu southindianbreakfast vegetarian  flattenedrice, haldi, dhania, raikadugu, split
description: Tamil Nadu Style Kothamalli Aval Upma Recipe is an easy recipe made with flattened rice flakes (poha) that is tossed with fresh and aromatic coriander paste. Toasted peanuts are also added to this poha to give it an extra crunch while eating. In many states, this type of preparation is common and called different names such as poha in North India and Upma in the South part of India.

name: Kashmiri Style Rista Recipe - Mutton Kofta Curry
main_tag: kashmiri lunch nonvegeterian  elaichi, laung, dalchini, saunf, jeera, haldi
description: Kashmiri Style Rista Recipe -Mutton Kofta Curry is a recipe that a take a lot of efforts and time to create a wonderful dish. The meatballs are made from a finely minced mutton mixed along with pound spice mix and caramelized onions. It is then fried in oil till it is crispy and brown outside. The meatballs are cooked in a tomato and onion gravy. The gravy is simple and light but it will soak up the meatballs completely.

name: Milagu Keerai Poricha Kootu Recipe - Palak And Moong Dal Kootu
main_tag: southindian lunch diabeticfriendly  split, haldi, jeera, raikadugu, jeera, split
description: The Milagu Keerai Poricha Kootu Recipe is a wholesome dish from Tamil Nadu which is packed with flavors from the roasted urad dal, black pepper which is ground along with coconut. Kootu is essentially a dal and vegetable combination which is coked with some everyday masalas.

name: Methi & Pudina Aloo Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  aloo, fenugreekleaves, pudina, haldi, dhania, jeera
description: Methi & Pudina Aloo Sabzi Recipe a quick, simple and nutritious vegetables that is packed with flavors from the sautéed pudina leaves and methi leaves also known as fenugreek leaves. The Aloo Methi & Pudina Sabzi when combined with the sautéed caramelized onions and mild spices, makes this dish simple and yet delectable to the palate. Pudina gives it a different flavor as well as it helps in stomach indigestion. Methi is a healthy herb that is good for hair and skin.

name: Ajwain Puri Recipe - Puri Flavoured With Carom Seeds
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast vegetarian  caromseeds, haldi
description: Ajwain Puri Recipe is a very simple Indian bread which is made from wheat flour and flavoured with a pinch of turmeric and some toasted Ajwain seeds.

name: Chutney Podi Sadam Recipe - Rice Flavoured With Chutney Podi
main_tag: tamilnadu maincourse vegetarian  raikadugu, split, bengalgramdal, moongphali, haldi, milagaipowder, dhania
description: Chutney Podi Sadam Recipe, is a South Indian Rice recipe which is a quick mixed rice recipe made with ghee and chutney podi. Make it with your leftover white rice or make fresh rice and try this recipe. Serve it either for South Indian lunch or dinner.

name: Chana Methi Dal Recipe - Fenugreek & Split Bengal Gram Curry
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  bengalgramdal, fenugreekleaves, hing, dhania, haldi, jeera
description: Chana Methi Dal is a delicious lentil curry made with split Bengal Gram lentil and fresh fenugreek leaves. This recipe is a healthy menu choice for the intake of everyday protein and is also packed with vitamins and minerals. Chana Methi Dal is a fantastic way to sneak in greens in your kids diet as well. Serve Chana Methi Dal along with Phulka and Raita for a wholesome weekday lunch.

name: Pan Fried Brussel Sprouts Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  dried
description: Brussels Sprouts resemble mini cabbages and are an excellent source of Vitamin C and K. Brussels Sprouts contain the highest amount of glucosinolate, which helps in fighting cancer. It also has the highest amount of omega-3 fatty acids, good for lowering high cholesterol and aiding in weight loss. Pan Fried Brussels Sprouts Recipe is a quick stir fry using brussel sprouts. The garlic adds a nice flavour to the dish.

name: Mulyachi Bhaji Recipe - Goan Style Mooli Ki Sabzi
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian  radish, split
description: Mulyachi Bhaji is a dry sabzi prepared using mooli, popular in Maharashtra and Goa served for lunch or dinner.

name: Gulab Phirni Recipe - Rose Flavoured Rice Pudding Shots
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian
description: Gulab Phirni Recipe is a freshing rice pudding packed with flavours from gulab jal and saffron and sweetened along with dates. It's easy to make, looks beautiful when served in small shot glasses, ensuring you are having the right portions and will light up your festive meals instantly. Make and serve Gulab Phirni at your next house party and wow your guests.

name: Spicy & Masaledar Aloo Gobi & Beans Tawa Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  aloo, gobi, frenchbeans, haldi, dhania, jeera, drymangopowder, dhania
description: Spicy & Masaledar Aloo Gobi & Beans Tawa Sabzi Recipe uses a blend of Indian spices and is tossed in a tawa to give it a roasted flavor. It is a semi dry dish that is cooked with lots of onions, ginger and garlic which adds to the extra flavors of the dish.

name: Chamadumpa Sabzi Recipe - Andhra Style Dry Baked Masala Arbi
main_tag: andhra sidedish vegetarian  arbi, dhania, pottukadalai, jeera
description: A delicious dry style Arbi made Andhra style, this Chamadumpa Sabzi is made a bit healthier as in this recipe we have baked the Arbi

name: Ilish Macher Korma Recipe - Hilsa Fish Curry In Rich Gravy
main_tag: bengali sidedish nonvegeterian  greekyogurt, dalchini, tejpatta, elaichi, haldi
description: Ilish Macher Korma Recipe is one of the authentic and traditional recipes of Bengal, especially during the days of Durga Puja. Bengalis have a culture of celebrating festivals intertwined with delicious food, like most part of India does. Delightful fish recipes are just a part of the menu. Here is a Ilish Macher Korma Recipe which is cooked in a gravy of onion, garlic, ginger and more.

name: Bhindi Masala Recipe - Bhindi Tamatar Ki Sabzi
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, haldi, dhania
description: The Bhindi Masala Recipe is a simple and quick recipe that you can make in a jiffy for a weeknight dinner. All you need is Bhindi (Okra/lady's finger), tomatoes and onions and a few basic spices.

name: Bhindi Masala Recipe - Bhindi Tamatar Ki Sabzi
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, haldi, dhania
description: The Bhindi Masala Recipe is a simple and quick recipe that you can make in a jiffy for a weeknight dinner. All you need is Bhindi (Okra/lady's finger), tomatoes and onions and a few basic spices.

name: Bhindi Masala Recipe - Bhindi Tamatar Ki Sabzi
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, haldi, dhania
description: The Bhindi Masala Recipe is a simple and quick recipe that you can make in a jiffy for a weeknight dinner. All you need is Bhindi (Okra/lady's finger), tomatoes and onions and a few basic spices.

name: Bhindi Masala Recipe - Bhindi Tamatar Ki Sabzi
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, haldi, dhania
description: The Bhindi Masala Recipe is a simple and quick recipe that you can make in a jiffy for a weeknight dinner. All you need is Bhindi (Okra/lady's finger), tomatoes and onions and a few basic spices.

name: Aar Macher Jhol Recipe - Bengali Style Fish In Tomato Gravy
main_tag: bengali dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  fish, cutintothicksteaks, tejpatta, jeera, dhania, jeera, haldi, optional, dhania
description: Aar Macher Jhol Recipe is a Bengali Fish curry prepared with Aar/ Katla/ Rohu fish. Aar fish also known as the Giant River Catfish is a delicious fish that is commonly found in freshwater and brackish water.

name: Badusha Recipe | Balushahi Recipe - Sweet Indian Doughnut
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  maida, dahiyogurt, elaichi
description: Badusha or Balushahi is a recipe for a crunchy sweetened Indian doughnut-like dessert. A favorite during Diwali among other special occasions, this is a labor of love. My mother never failed to make this recipe and I have kept up with her tradition and make in my home for Diwali every year too. After years of experimenting, I have arrived at the perfect method for making this sweet and hope you enjoy making it as well.

name: नुव्वुला पचड़ी रेसिपी - Nuvvula Pachadi Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  सफ़ द
description: नुव्वुला पचड़ी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट चटनी है जिसमे सफ़ेद तिल का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसे बनाने में बहुत कम समय लगता है और आप इसे अपने डोसा, इडली, वड़ा या उत्तपम के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: Andhra Style Kandagadda Vepudu Recipe - Yam Stir Fry Recipe
main_tag: andhra appetizer vegetarian  suransenairatalu, raikadugu, haldi
description: Andhra Style Kandagadda Vepudu Recipe (Yam Stir Fry Recipe) is a typical Andhra style of cooking a dish. The word “Vepadu” literally translates to stir fry in Andhra. So therefore any ingredient that has been tossed and fried with Indian masala can be called as vepadu in Andhra cuisine.

name: Radish Leaves Pachadi Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish diabeticfriendly  radishgreens, adjust, haldi, raikadugu, split, fenugreekseeds, hing
description: Radish Leaves Pachadi Recipe is a healthy South Indian side dish recipe which is diabetic friendly too. Radish greens are a source of wholesome health and a low-calorie food. Serve Radish Leaves Pachadi Recipe as a side dish with dosa, steamed rice, or chapati.

name: Kashmiri Style Paneer Masala Recipe
main_tag: kashmiri lunch vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, hing, dalchini, tejpatta, elaichi, caromseeds, dahiyogurt, saunf, dhania
description: Kashmiri Style Paneer Masala Recipe is a made with toasted paneer cubes soaked in tomato and yogurt gravy flavored with whole some spice. Kashmir Cuisine uses a lot of whole spices in their gravy and prefer to have a rich gravy texture.The gravy is usually had along with Kashmir Style Mudor Pulao which makes it a perfect lunch meal.

name: Suran Kofta Curry Recipe - Yam Kofta Curry
main_tag: northindian maincourse noonionnogarlic  suransenairatalu, besan, pudina, jeera
description: This delicious Suran Kofta Curry Recipe, is a sattvic recipe as the kofta curry is made without the use of onion and garlic and cooked in a delicious and mildly spiced tomato curry. The koftas are cooked in a paniyaram pan using less oil, yet they are made crisp on the outside and soft inside.

name: Kanchipuram Idlis Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  whole, fenugreekseeds, jeera, hing
description: Kanchipuram Idlis Recipe is a variety of idly from Tamil Nadu - an Indian state known for its variety of breakfast options including Idli, sambar and chutney, dosa, vadas and so many more. Some particular South Indian towns have their own variations of idlis, and this one is from the town of Kanchipuram. You could call it the signature idli of the area. Prepared with assorted spices, these idlis are a mouthwatering treat and a lovely deviation from the regular idli. Traditionally, they are steamed in mandhari leaves but I have seen my mom make them in steel bowls and glasses, which always made a fun idli eating experience for us, as kids. Kanchipuram idlis can be made in regular idli plates too and can be served with Sambar, Kathirikai Gothsu, Chutney Podi, or Coconut Chutney.

name: Methi Lachha Paratha Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  fenugreekleaves
description: Methi Lachha Paratha Recipe is one of the Basic staple food from the North part of India. It comes under the category of thepla, but in this recipes, we have added a twist by folding it and rolling it so that it becomes flakier.

name: Ilish Pulao Recipe - Bengali Style Hilsa Fish Pilaf
main_tag: bengali maincourse highproteinnonvegetarian  pieces, adjust, tejpatta, dalchini, elaichi, laung
description: Ilish Pulao Recipe (Bengali Style Hilsa Fish Pilaf) is an extremely fragrant and delicious Bengali style Fish Pilaf cooked with Ilish mach or Hilsa. This flavoursome Bangladeshi delicacy is one of the traditional dishes of Bangladesh.

name: Stuffed Palak Paneer Paratha
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, palak, driedfenugreekleaves, haldi, drymangopowder, jeera
description: Stuffed Palak Paneer Paratha is a protein packed dish made using spinach/palak and paneer as main ingredients. The added flavors of spices just enrich the parathas even more. We have used freshly made paneer, tossed it in kasuri methi leaves and some spices giving it that delicate taste and flavour to these palak paneer parathas.

name: Muringakka Manga Mulakushyam - Mango & Drumstick Kootu Curry
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian  raw, splittoordal, haldi, jeera, raikadugu, split
description: Muringakka Manga Mulakushyam is a traditional Kerala recipe made up of Mangoes and drumstick cooked in toor dal and coconut paste. It is also called Moloshyam in Malayalam and Kootu in Tamil Nadu.

name: Smoked Dhaba Dal Recipe
main_tag: punjabi lunch highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, whole, jeera, dhania, haldi, kalanamak, jeera, dhania
description: The Smoked Dhaba Dal Recipe is a classic recipe of lentils that are spiced together and given a smoked flavor. I absolutely love dal at the dhabas on the highways up north of India. The Dhaba dal when smoked from the burning coal, brings out delicious flavors and works magic on my palette. Through this recipe, I've tried to achieve similar flavor. Hope you all like it. Dals (Lentils) are a staple part of the Indian diet. From fritters to soups to desserts, I use lentils every single day!

name: Podi Potta Pachhai Kathirikai | Brinjal Stir Fry Recipe With Curry Powder
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  dhania, bengalgramdal, split, raikadugu, greenaubergine, haldi, dhania, raikadugu, hing
description: Podi Potta Pachhai Kathirikai is Brinjal Stir Fry Recipe With Curry Powder. This recipe is made with green brinjal. The long green brinjals are slit lengthwise and shallow fried with spice powders. Fresh 'curry podi' is then sprinkled over it, before tossing the veggies so that they are evenly coated with the masala all over. It's a traditional recipe that I learnt from my grandmother.

name: Cabbage & Dal Stuffed Paratha Recipe
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  pattagobimuttaikose, split, jeera, haldi
description: Cabbage & Dal Stuffed Paratha is a healthy breakfast option and is packed with nutrition. It is a perfect nutritional combination of cabbage and yellow moong dal. This recipe is also perfect to be served in your kids lunch box.

name: Thengai Paal Sadam Recipe - Coconut Milk Pulao
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  laung, saunf, tejpatta, pudina
description: Thengai Paal Sadam or Coconut Milk Pulao is a deliciously aromatic, mildly spiced one pot rice dish that is easy to prepare in a jiffy.

name: Udupi Style Alsande Kayi Saaru Recipe (Long Beans Gravy Recipe)
main_tag: udupi lunch vegetarian  chavli, dhania, fenugreekseeds, raikadugu, raikadugu, raikadugu
description: Udupi Style Alsande Kayi Saaru Recipe (Long Beans Gravy Recipe) is a favorite among the locals in Udupi. It is a gravy that is made out of long beans. It is rich in Vitamin A which is one of the essential requirement for our body as it helps to improve our skin completion. The curry is made by grinding the roasted spices to provide the authentic flavor from the Udupi.

name: Goan Style Brinjal Bharta Recipe
main_tag: goan lunch vegetarian  bainganeggplant, dhania
description: Traditionally Goan Brinjal Bharta Recipe is cooked by roasting brinjals on charcoal. But the brinjals also can be grilled on a grill or directly on the gas by keeping a wired mesh. I have roasted it on a wired mesh in this recipe.

name: Dry Navratan Korma Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  gobi, gajjar, frenchbeans, matar, capsicum, aloo, dhania, orkitchenkingmasala, tejpatta, dalchini, elaichi, caromseeds, homemadecottagecheese, pomegranateseedpowder, dhania, dhania
description: Dry Navratan Korma Recipe is a variation of the curry version of the same. Navratan Korma aka Nine- Gem-Curry gets its name after the nine ingredients 9 vegetables, fruits and nuts used in making a creamy, semi-sweet Mughlai Curry.

name: Tirunelveli Mor Kuzhambu Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  ashgourdwhitepumpkin, dahiyogurt, split, fenugreekseeds, jeera, raikadugu, split
description: Tirunelveli Mor Kuzhambu recipe that has a perfect blend of spices and a curry simmered in yogurt gravy. The addition of red chillies, cumin seeds, methi seeds roasted and ground along with coconut makes this curry absolutely delicious. You can add a variety of vegetables into the mor kuzhambu like carrots, drumstick, chow chow and even green capsicum to make it nutritious and tasty.

name: Karnataka Style Badanekai Yennegai Gojju Recipe (Stuffed Brinjal Recipe)
main_tag: northkarnataka lunch vegetarian  bainganeggplant, raikadugu, dhania, sambaronions, caromseeds, laung, dalchini, tilseeds, dhania, moongphali
description: Karnataka Style Badanekai Yennegai Gojju Recipe (Stuffed Brinjal Recipe) being the signature dish of “North Karnataka” are stuffed with brinjal also called as eggplant and fried in oil. The dish has a whole lot of rich and ground masala flavor to the gravy itself. At Archana’s Kitchen we have made it by consuming less oil by sauteing well on the pan itself.

name: Pohala Jhola Recipe (Pohala Fish Curry)
main_tag: oriya lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  haldi, jeera
description: ‘Pohala’ fish is a common variety we get in local fish market. Usually small sizes are available through out the year. Few days back when I went to the biggest Fish Market in Bhubaneswar I managed to get some big sizes.This curry is a spicy fish curry which can be enjoyed with hot steam rice. Fish are fried first with a generous amount of Mustard Oil. You can use different cooking oil too.

name: Panjiri Recipe - Healthy Punjabi Dry Fruit Snack
main_tag: punjabi snack vegetarian  naturalgum, lotusseeds, badam, kopra, elaichi
description: Panjiri Recipe is a popular Punjabi sweet that people snack on during winters.

name: Peas Pulao Recipe -  North Indian Matar Pulao
main_tag: indian maincourse vegetarian  jeera, tejpatta, elaichi, laung, dalchini, matar
description: Peas Pulao Recipe is a lovely rice preparation made with green peas as the star ingredient. Long grain basmati combined with whole spices like bay leaf, cumin seeds, cardamom, cloves and star anise, tempered in ghee and cooked along with fresh green peas.

name: Spicy Rice Stuffed Paratha Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  leftover, dhania, jeera
description: Spicy Rice Stuffed Paratha is a perfect recipe, if you have leftover rice in your fridge. We are usually left with rice after our meal and we end up throwing them. From now, don’t throw them instead use them in making stuffed parathas for your filing breakfast.

name: Vatanyacha Phadna Recipe - Sugar Snap Peas Stir Fry
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian  tilseeds
description: The Vatanyacha Phadna Recipe is a simple stir fry of the Sugar Snap Peas. Spring brings fresh sugar snap peas into the season and Vatanyacha Phadna is a simple and delicate dish that makes the most of these jade beauties.

name: Rajasthani Kachri Phali Ki Sabzi Recipe -Wild Cucumber And Beans Sabzi
main_tag: rajasthani sidedish vegetarian  kothavarangaiclusterbeans, wildcucumber, jeera, hing, haldi, dhania, drymangopowder
description: Kachri is a wild variety of cucumber that resembles a brown yellow small melon.They come in different shape and size. Kachri Phali Ki Sabzi Recipe (Wild Cucumber And Beans Sabzi) is famous recipe in Rajasthan. It is easy to make and can be made with few ingredients and hence can even be made on weekdays. Serve Kachri Phali Ki Sabzi Recipe (Wild Cucumber And Beans Sabzi) along with Phulka, and Smoked Dal Makhani Dhaba Style for a weekday lunch.

name: Pudina Moong Dal Recipe (Mint Moong Dal)
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  split, haldi, jeera, hing, pudina
description: Mint has many health benefits as it is good for digestion, detoxifies the body etc. This recipe is simply a moong dal just flavoured with mint leaves. Really an aromatic tasty dal it is and is perfect for your weekday meals.

name: Awadh Style Bakarhani Roti Recipe ( Thick Spiced Flat-Bread Recipe )
main_tag: awadhi maincourse vegetarian  maida, semolinarava, elaichi
description: Awadh Style Bakarhani Roti Recipe ( Thick Spiced Flat-Bread Recipe ) is soft flaky  bread which is seasoned with cardamom and also sweet on the palate. It is usually cooked in a tandoor which helps to give a charred and smoky flavour to the bread.

name: Manathakkali Kootu Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch diabeticfriendly  split, haldi, gingelly, split, raikadugu, hing
description: The Manathakkali Kootu Recipe is a very classic South Indian recipe that is packed with proteins, vitamins and minerals. Kootu is a combination of dal and vegetable, with or without coconut. Manathakkali Kootu is a simple yet nutritious gravy that helps in controlling and treating acidity related problems.

name: Paalkatti Chettinad Curry Recipe -Chettinad Style Paneer Kurma Recipe
main_tag: chettinad maincourse vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, sambaronions, raikadugu, dhania, laung, dalchini, elaichi, dhania
description: Paalkatti Chettinad Curry Recipe (Chettinad Style Paneer Kurma Recipe) is a recipe that has been originated from the traditional Chettinad style curry. The authentic Chettinad masala is prepared by roasting a blend of spices and blending it into a smooth paste and then adding it into the sauteed pearl onion and tomato to give it a rich and spicy flavor. The paneer is just simmered into the curry.

name: Soya Methi Palak Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian maincourse highproteinvegetarian  palak, nuggets, fenugreekleaves, jeera, salted
description: Soya Methi Palak Ki Sabzi Recipe is made from soy protein chunks along with spiced and pureed spinach and fenugreek leaves. Adding soybean to makes this dish high in nutritional value, as soybean is fabulous source of protein.
