name: Lal Bhoplyacha Bharit Recipe (Red Pumpkin Raita)
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, greekyogurt, adjust, orghee, jeera, hing, dhania, optional
description: Lal Bhoplyache Bharit is a Maharashtrian side dish made by mixing steamed red pumpkin, curd, crushed groundnuts and is then tempered with flavourful spices. The recipe is very quick and uses simple day-to-day ingredients. This appetising raita is a great side dish even if you are fasting and is sure to win over even those who do not like pumpkin.

name: North Kanara Sweet And Sour Raw Mango Chutney Recipe
main_tag: coastalkarnataka sidedish vegetarian  raw, hing
description: North Kanara Sweet And Sour Raw Mango Chutney Recipe is a very flavoursome raw mango chutney from the Goud Saraswat Brahmin (GSB) Cuisine of North Kanara. The basic cooking of the Karwari GSBs of Karnataka includes a lot of coconut, red chillies and jaggery.

name: Karela Besan Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani lunch diabeticfriendly  bittergourdpavakkai, besan, haldi, dhania, drymangopowder, caromseeds
description: The Karela Besan Sabzi is an absolutely simple, healthy and delicious recipe to make. Rajasthani food uses besan extensively along with vegetables and this karela sabzi is one such dish which is packed with flavours. From sauteed onions, to garlic along with amchur powder and other masalas which add to the deliciousness of this tasty sabzi.

name: Andhra Style Sarva Pindi/Gine Pindi Recipe (Rice Flour and Chana Dal Flatbread Recipe)
main_tag: andhra southindianbreakfast vegetarian  bengalgramdal, tilseeds, haldi
description: Andhra Style Sarva Pindi/Gine Pindi Recipe (Rice Flour and Chana Dal Flatbread Recipe) is a delicacy of Telangana which is one of the cuisine of Andhra Pradesh. The dish is similar to the “Akki Rotti” made in Karnataka but the only difference it has few spices added and Channa dal mixed. Traditionally the flatbread is made on a Kadai and patted flat so that once it is cooked it shapes up like a bowl. But we have used a flat griddle to make the rotti. By using different vessel also will make a difference to the taste and texture of the rotti.

name: सिंधी करेला भाजी रेसिपी - Sindhi Karela Bhaji Recipe
main_tag: sindhi lunch diabeticfriendly
description: सिंधी करेला भाजी रेसिपी एक स्वाद से भरपूर सिंधी डिश है जिसमे करेले को प्याज, टमाटर और दही के मसाले के साथ पकाया जाता है. अगर आप करेले से कुछ नया बनाना चाहते है, तो आप यह भी बना सकते है. आप इसे अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: Raw Papaya, Apple & Carrot Salad Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish diabeticfriendly  gajjar, moongphali, pudina
description: Raw Papaya, Apple & Carrot Salad Recipe is a healthy Salad that can be had along with your meals. Salad is a good option to fit in as many vegetables as possible into your everyday diet. Having freshly cut vegetables gives you the entire nutrients and benefits, as cooking takes some of the nutrients away.

name: Mughlai Zafrani Murg Recipe
main_tag: mughlai sidedish nonvegeterian  dahiyogurt, jeera, dhania, dhania
description: Mughlai Zafrani Murg Recipe is a delicious recipe made with chicken in yogurt gravy, flavoured with saffron. Chicken is marinated with lot of yogurt, fresh cream and handy spices and spice powders like cumin powder, coriander powder and lemon juice. This a quick method of preparing the dish since I have used microwave oven to cook the dish. You can also make it in kadai which will take about 40-50 minutes. Make sure you prepare this dish in a non stick pan since there is absolutely no oil used in the recipe. You can pair this recipe along with Naans or side it with biryanis or pulao.

name: South Indian Style Vegetable Kurma Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  dhania, haldi, dalchini, elaichi, laung, dhania
description: South Indian Style Vegetable Kurma is a delicious mild flavored mixed vegetable curry that is usually paired with chapathi or poori. Wonderful aromatic spices are subdued with thick coconut paste and cashew paste to give it a rich creamy texture. Poppy seeds are must that goes into the kurma. Grind it with cashews to get a nice thick creamy paste. The flavor of poppy seeds in the kurma makes a lot of difference. Add any vegetables of your choice to this kurma, but the best options are carrots, beans, green peas, potatoes and cauliflower.

name: Vaalachi Rassa Bhaaji Recipe - Maharashtrian Style Aloo And Vaal Sabzi
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian  aloo, haldi, raikadugu, hing
description: Vaalachi Rassa Bhaaji Recipe is a Maharashtrian dish made using ‘Kadve Vaal’ and coconuts. Kadve vaal are referred to as ‘field beans’ in English. We get different types of vaal in India, like Kadve Vaal (bitter field beans), Goade Vaal (dalimbi / sweet field beans), Surati Vaal, Pavta, etc.

name: Kadai Vegetable Sabzi Recipe (Mixed Vegetable Saute with Spices)
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  gobi, gajjar, frenchbeans, capsicum, elaichi, haldi, dhania, driedfenugreekleaves, salted
description: The Kadai Vegetable Sabzi Recipe is a quick and easy sabzi to make that has the goodness of a variety of vegetables adding colour, taste and nutrition to your weeknight dinner. This recipe I have steamed the vegetables a little but before tossing them on the kadai to make the sabzi. By doing this, we preserve nutrition and also helps in the faster cooking process.

name: Homemade Soft Idli Recipe - Steamed Rice and Lentil Cake
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  whole, fenugreekseeds
description: The Homemade Soft Idli recipe is a simple wholesome dish that you can make with ease. This idli recipe also has a video of how to make the Idli Dosa Batter and how to make soft Idli. Idli is all time South Indian breakfast dish that is savoured all over India and the World . It is made from fermented rice and lentil batter and steamed into Idli moulds to get the round shape.

name: Pita Saga Bati Basa Recipe
main_tag: oriya dinner vegetarian  glinusoppositifolius, aloo, bainganeggplant, wadi, sundriedlentildumpling, raikadugu, jeera, haldi
description: Pita saga (glinus oppositifolius) bati basa - Pita saga (glinus oppositifolius) is cooked in a coarsely pounded mustard-garlic green chilli paste along with chopped eggplant, tomato and potato.

name: South Indian Style Sorakkai Kootu Recipe - Bottle Gourd Cooked with Lentils
main_tag: southindian sidedish diabeticfriendly  lauki, split, haldi, jeera, raikadugu, split, hing
description: South Indian Style Sorakkai Kootu Recipe -Bottle Gourd Cooked with Lentils Recipe is a delicious combination of lentil and vegetables. The flavors used in this recipe are typically used in day to day cooking in the South Indian Style Kitchen. Coconut is one of the key ingredient present for all of their dry vegetable side dishes.

name: Besan Methi Paratha Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast vegetarian  besan, hing, caromseeds, jeera, dhania, jeera, drymangopowder, fenugreekleaves
description: Besan Methi Paratha Recipe is a filling paratha, where the dough is stuffed with methi leaves combined with besan that is roasted along with spices, that gives the paratha a punch.

name: Mughlai Keema Paratha Recipe
main_tag: mughlai maincourse nonvegeterian  maida, pudina, dhania, dahiyogurt, dhania, haldi, elaichi, laung, dalchini, badielaichi, caromseeds
description: Mughlai Keema Paratha is a classic recipe of street food found on the streets of Bengal of a stuffed paratha with a layer of egg and spicy mutton keema wrapped to make a lifafa-envelope style flaky parathas

name: Angoor Raita Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, jeera, pudina
description: Summers give us enough reasons to enjoy our favourite fruits as much as we can. One such summer fruit that happens to be my most favourite is Grapes. All those who have tasted fruit raita shall agree with me that grape raita is another variant that tastes amazing as a side dish with veg biryani or Kashmiri Pulao. Well this raita can be made both with green or the black ones. Thick curd whisked and folded with grape slices has mild sweet flavours along with some cumin powder. The red chilli powder gives a lick to your palate initially and then the sweetness soothes it all.

name: Maharashtrian Green Chilli Thecha Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian sidedish vegetarian  raikadugu, hing
description: Maharashtrian Green Chilli Thecha Recipe is an exciting side dish had along with many of the Maharashtrian thalipeeth. The spicy green chilli and the pungent garlic is coarsely ground and tempered with mustard seeds, hing to give it a spicy chatpata taste. You can make this in small batch and store it in your refrigerator for later use as well. The Thecha might be quiet fiery to taste but it goes very well with a nice hot Bajra Roti or Jowar Bhakri.

name: Mooli Gobhi Aur Methi Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish diabeticfriendly  gobi, radish, fenugreekleaves, haldi
description: Mooli Gobhi Aur Methi Sabzi Recipe is a simple stir fry of winter vegetables. We have added very little spices to bring out the flavours of the winter produce. Fresh fenugreek leaves are a great source of iron and antioxidants, hence it is good to include in our diets regularly. Serve the Mooli Gobhi Aur Methi Sabzi Recipe along with Phulkas and Tomato Onion Cucumber Raita for a simple weeknight dinner along with Carrot Cucumber Tomato Salad.

name: Onion Raita Recipe - Pyaz Ka Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, dhania, pudina, jeera
description: Crunchy onions thinly sliced, dunked in smooth yogurt along with green chilies, mint and coriander leaves and simple Indian masalas, makes this refreshing Onion Raita. It can be served with absolutely anything, be it dal-roti or biryani.

name: Instant Cucumber Pickle Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer vegetarian  hing, haldi, fenugreekseeds
description: Instant Cucumber Pickle is a perfect recipe when you want to try something spicy and tangy with cucumber. It tastes amazing and can be prepared in less than 15 minutes without oil.

name: Bengali Style Chicken Rezala Recipe - Chicken Korma Recipe
main_tag: bengali lunch nonvegeterian  tilseeds, tejpatta, laung, elaichi, dalchini, dahiyogurt
description: Bengali Style Chicken Rezala Recipe - Chicken Korma is an authentic white coloured gravy dish that has got its roots from Bengal. The chicken thighs and drumsticks are usually used in this curry to lift up the flavour well and make it quite rich.

name: Konkani Style Dangar Recipe-Cabbage Fritters
main_tag: konkan snack vegetarian  splittoordal, pattagobimuttaikose, haldi, hing, dhania
description: Dangar is basically a spicy, crispy fritter that is prepared by making a coarse rice and lentil based batter, which is then mixed with cabbage, onions and some dry spices, then finally, deep-fried.

name: Thengai Poli Recipe - Coconut Poli Recipe
main_tag: southindian dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Thengai Poli is a classic sweet Indian flatbread stuffed with a filling of coconut and jaggery. Also known as Obbattu or holige in Karnataka,  puran polis in Maharashtra.

name: Avarakkai Poricha Kootu Recipe - Broad Beans Kootu Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish vegetarian  broadbeans, split, haldi, jeera, raikadugu, split
description: Avarakkai Poricha Kootu Recipe is a comforting side dish from south India. Avarakkai in other words called as broad beans is a wonderful legume which is rich in proteins and fibre. It is also a good source of minerals like potassium, iron and zinc.

name: Dahi Baingan Recipe - Brinjal In Curd Based Gravy
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  bainganeggplant, dahiyogurt, besan, dhania, adjusttotaste, haldi, adjusttotaste, tilseeds, dhania, jeera, raikadugu, split, laung, elaichi, tejpatta, dalchini
description: Dahi Baingan Recipe (Brinjal In Curd Based Gravy) is a famous North indian dish. The combination of brinjal and yogurt with spices gives a unique taste and goes very well as a side dish with the main meal.

name: Punjabi Kadhi Pakora Recipe - Delicious Punjabi Kadhi
main_tag: punjabi dinner vegetarian  besan, aloo, caromseeds, dahiyogurt, besan, haldi, raikadugu, hing, dhania
description: Punjabi Kadhi Pakora is Creamy Yogurt Kadhi that is simmered in Potato Pakora and given a delicious ghee tadka.

name: Indian Tea Masala Powder
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  elaichi, dalchini, laung
description: Indian Chai masala powder is an aromatic spice powder used for making masala tea. Indian tea is a common beverage for us. We start our day with a hot ginger-cardamom tea. If you make the masala tea powder, then you don't have to add any spices to the tea while making it.

name: Poha Buttermilk Idli Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  flattenedrice, semolinarava, dhania, raikadugu
description: Poha Buttermilk Idlis are a tasty and simple idli recipe. There is no need for grinding  any rice or dals to make these soft and tasty idlis. Poha or flattened rice, suji and rice flour are all mixed along with a tempered buttermilk and left to ferment for about 4 hours. Then the batter is poured in an idli steamer and steamed to make delicious and soft idlis.

name: Till Wale Aloo Recipe - Sesame Potato Sabzi
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  aloo, tilseeds, jeera, dhania, date tamarind, dhania, few
description: Till Wale Aloo Recipe is an easy recipe and gives our routine potato veggie a twist. It can be served in lunch or dinner. You can also stuff the leftover sabzi into paratha and give a twist to your aloo paratha. Pack this sabzi for you and your kids lunch box or serve it as a side dish along with your meal.

name: Cheesy Paneer Masala Curry Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, badielaichi, haldi, driedfenugreekleaves
description: I always prefer dhaba style cooking might be for their rustic charm or for their earthy flavors. Paneer butter masala is one of famous delicacies of North Indian cuisine. Cheesy Paneer Masala Curry Recipe definitely stands out in comparison to its regular counterpart.

name: Mini Rava Idli With Tomato Chutney Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  semolinarava, greekyogurt, dhania
description: Mini Rava Idli with Tomato Chutney recipe is delicious and you get spongy soft and so flavorful idlis. For this yummy rava idli, i also made tomato chutney which will go hand in hand with the dish. You can add few cashew nut to the batter to give a nice crunch to the dish.

name: Broccoli Malai Kofta Recipe
main_tag: lucknowi sidedish noonionnogarlic  homemadecottagecheese, besan, jeera, haldi, haldi, dhania, elaichi, greekyogurt, driedfenugreekleaves
description: The Broccoli Malai Kofta Recipe, is a wholesome and nutritious way to combine the broccoli and paneer into a Kofta.

name: Patra Ni Machi Recipe - Fish Cooked In Banana Leaf
main_tag: parsi lunch nonvegeterian  dhania, pudina, jeera
description: Anything wrapped in banana leaf and cooked to perfection is the most amazing food to eat in the whole world! I love food cooked in banana leaf. The flavour which the leaf imparts to the dish is just amazing. This kind of food is rustic, homely and lip smacking delicious!

name: Chilka Roti Recipe (Jharkhand Style Rice and Lentil Roti)
main_tag: jharkhand northindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  bengalgramdal
description: Chilka Roti Recipe is famous dish from the state of Jharkhand made using Rice and Chana dal. It is fairly a simple recipe which requires minimal preparation. The rice and chana dal is soaked overnight, and ground in the morning to make thin crepes. It is a nutritious breakfast recipe loaded with the right amount of carbs and proteins. Serve the Chilka Roti Recipe (Jharkhand Style Rice and Lentil Roti) along with Lahsun ki Chutney | A Spicy Garlic Chutney and Baingan Ka Chokha Recipe for weekday breakfast.

name: Parsi Style Sekta Ni Sing Recipe-Sweet & Spicy Drumsticks Cooked In Coconut Water/Toddy Recipe)
main_tag: parsi lunch vegetarian  dhania, laung, haldi
description: Sekta Ni Sing Recipe - Sweet & Spicy Drumsticks Cooked In Coconut Water/Toddy is an interesting recipe made from tender coconut water which is combined with the drumstick. The curry gives a sweet and rich taste from the coconut that is being used. The other ingredients such as green chilies , coriander, and ginger compliment really well with the tender coconut that is being used in this recipe.

name: हैदराबादी वेजिटेबल बिरयानी रेसिपी - Hyderabadi Vegetable Biryani Recipe
main_tag: hyderabadi lunch vegetarian
description: हैदराबादी वेजिटेबल बिरयानी रेसिपी एक बहुत ही प्रसिद्ध रेसिपी है जिसमे चावल, मीट और रोज के मसालो का प्रयोग किया जाता है. यह एक बहुत ही स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसे आप किसी भी ख़ास अवसर पर बना सकते है. फ्लेवर से भरपूर और बनाने में आसान, आप इस बिरयानी को हाउस पार्टीज के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: Godhuma Rava Payasam - Dalia/Broken Wheat Payasam
main_tag: southindian dessert vegetarian  daliagodumairava, split, elaichi, optional
description: Godhuma Rava Payasam is a Dalia/Broken Wheat Payasam that is a Tamilian speciality prepared during festivals and celebrations. This particular payasam uses Broken Wheat and is a healthy alternative to the usual Rice Kheer. Instead of sugar, it also uses jaggery which is pumped with iron. This wholesome, satisfying kheer can be prepared in little time, making it a good option when your guests show up unexpectedly.

name: Sprouted Green Gram Kosambari Recipe- With Pomegranates
main_tag: karnataka sidedish diabeticfriendly  gajjar, optional, dhania, optional, raikadugu, hing
description: Sprouted Green Gram Kosambari is one of our favourite healthy salads, with the addition of sweet pomegranate pearls.

name: Ridge Gourd Peel Chutney Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish diabeticfriendly  turaipeerkangai, tilseeds, jeera
description: The nutritive peels of the humble Ridge gourd (Dodka) can be used to make a quick, lip smacking chutney. Sesame can be added along with the ridge gourd for an extra crunch, and to increase the health quotient of the chutney. Flax seeds can be another addition to increase the nutritive value of the chutney.

name: मेथी मूंग दाल रेसिपी - Methi Moong Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: मेथी मूंग दाल रेसिपी एक स्वाद से भरपूर दाल है जिसमे दाल के साथ मेथी का प्रयोग किया गया है. मेथी में आयरन की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है इसलिए इसे अपने रोज के खाने में शामिल करना चाइये। यह एक सरल दाल है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है.

name: Achari Masala Puri Recipe
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast vegetarian  caromseeds
description: The Achari Masala Puri Recipe is a delicious recipe of the Indian Puri that is spiced with achar masala or even a pickle masala. All you have to do is combine the pickle into the wheat flour and make a dough and fry it. It makes a great snack as it is and even adds a twist to the regular Puri.

name: Karela Kadhi Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani sidedish diabeticfriendly  dahiyogurt, besan, bittergourdpavakkai, jeera, raikadugu
description: Kadhi is a comfort food for all seasons. Kadhi chawal is one of its best combinations and Karela Kadhi Recipe is a kadhi made with bitter gourd.

name: Jeera Milagu Rasam Recipe  - South Indian Pepper Cumin Rasam
main_tag: southindian lunch noonionnogarlic  jeera, haldi, raikadugu, jeera
description: The Jeera Milagu Rasam Recipe also known as the Pepper Rasam is a very classic dish of the South Indian Cuisine. This rasam is simmered with tamarind water along with freshly pounded pepper, cumin and a tempering with ghee. A lot of times this rasam is given when one is suffering from a cold or sore throat making it very soothing because of the black pepper.

name: Banana Stem Poriyal Recipe With Curry Powder
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian  haldi, jeera, dahiyogurt, besan, raikadugu, jeera
description: Banana Stem Sabzi Recipe With Curry Powder is a semi dry sabzi that is made by stir frying the banana stem. A touch of yogurt to add in a tinge of sourness, South Indian curry powder, cumin powder and chilli powder are added to make it flavourful.

name: Spicy Tomato Rice - Tomato Pulihora Recipe
main_tag: southindian maincourse vegetarian  bengalgramdal, split, jeera, raikadugu, hing
description: The Tomato Pulihora Recipe is an authentic andhra recipe where plain rice is flavoured with spices and tangy ingredients and spiced along with bisi bele bath powder.

name: Methi And Palak Paratha Recipe
main_tag: indian northindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  fenugreekleaves, palak, jeera, haldi, dhania, jeera
description: Methi and Palak Paratha Recipe is a wholesome Indian Flat bread that is made by kneading the dough with the spinach and methi leaves. Adding greens to the paratha is a great way to incorporate an additional green vegetable into your daily meal. It is also a great way to use leftover vegetables from the previous meal by binding dough to make parathas. Serve Methi and Palak Paratha for breakfast along with curd and pickle. These parathas can be packed for the kids school lunch box as well.

name: परवल मसाला रेसिपी - Parwal Masala Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian
description: परवल एक ऐसी सब्ज़ी है जिसे रोज के खाने के लिए बनाया जाता है. परवल मसाला एक ग्रेवी रेसिपी है जिसमे परवल को पैन फ्राई करके टमाटर, अदरक,  तरबूज़ और दूसरे मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है.

name: Ragi & Whole Wheat Halwa Recipe - Finger Millet Pudding
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  fingermilletnagli, elaichi, badam
description: Ragi Halwa or Finger Millet Pudding is a delicious alternative to the Wheat Flour Pudding / Gehun Ka Halwa that we make at home. The distinct taste of the finger millet along with the ghee and almonds make it nutritious and wholesome too.

name: Idli Dosa Milagai Podi Recipe - South Indian Chilli Chutney Powder
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  whole, bengalgramdal, tilseeds, dhania, hing
description: Idli Dosa Milagai Podi or Chilli Chutney Powder is traditionally used in south indian homes and served along with Idlis and Dosas. It is used as a substitute to chutneys or sambar to accompany breakfast dishes like idli or dosai. This powder can be stored in airtight container for days and can be used for multiple purposes. This Podi can be used instead of chilly powder while making other vegetable curry also.

name: Andhra Style Peanut Chutney Recipe With Tomatoes
main_tag: andhra sidedish highproteinvegetarian  moongphali, raikadugu, split
description: Andhra Pradesh is famous for its spicy powders and chutneys. This Andhra Style Peanut Chutney also known as Palli Pachadi  is high in protein chutney and makes for a healthy side dish with idli, dosa and even paranthas.

name: बंगाली आलू दम रेसिपी - Bengali Aloo Dum Recipe
main_tag: bengali maincourse vegetarian
description: बंगाली आलू दम रेसिपी एक स्वाद से भरपूर रेसिपी है जिसमे आलू को टमाटर, प्याज और लहसुन के साथ पकाया जाता है. इसमें आलू को करी में 30 मिनट के लिए पकाया जाता है ताकि आलू अच्छी तरह से ग्रेवी सोख ले.

name: Chow Chow Poricha Kootu Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  split, haldi, jeera, raikadugu, split, bengalgramdal
description: Chow Chow Kootu is made from a white squash called chow chow. It is combined with moong lentils, ground coconut, cumin, yogurt and curry leaves to form its delicious gravy base. The taste is fantastic and goes well with hot phulkas or Spicy Potato Roast Recipe (Urulaikizhangu Poriyal) and steamed hot rice. So enjoy cooking this delicate preparation of a chow chow kotu, which is simple and delicious and makes a one dish healthy meal. Alternate vegetables that can be used are chayote squash, bottle gourd, white pumpkin.

name: मिनी इडली उपमा रेसिपी - Mini Idli Upma Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian
description: इडली उपमा बहुत ही आसान है. इसमें इडली को काटकर रोज के मसलो के साथ पकाया जाता है और यह एक अच्छा तरीका है बची हुई इडली का प्रयोग करने के लिए. यहाँ हमने छोटी इडली का प्रयोग किया जाता है लेकिन आप बड़ी इडली को काटकर भी यह उपमा बना सकते है. इसमें हरी मिर्च और प्याज का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है, जो इसे और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है.

name: गाजर गोभी मटर सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Carrot Cauliflower Peas Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch diabeticfriendly
description: गाजर गोभी मटर सब्ज़ी रेसिपी एक सरल सब्ज़ी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. इसमें अजवाइन, काली मिर्च, तेज पत्ता और इलाइची का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसे और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है. यह एक सात्विक रेसिपी है जिसमे प्याज और लहसुन का प्रयोग नहीं किया गया है.

name: Chocolate Cheese Gujiya Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  maida
description: Chocolate Cheese Gujiya Recipe is made up with the 2 evergreen ingredients - chocolate & cheese and when it comes together, it gives you a delectable treat. Gujiyas are pastry crusts filled with different savoury or sweet ingredients and deep fried. Gujiyas are served during family occasions or festival seasons such as Holi or Diwali.

name: केसर पिलाफ रेसिपी - Saffron Pilaf Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian
description: केसर पिलाफ रेसिपी, एक फ्लेवर से भरपूर रेसिपी है जिसमे चावल को केसर के साथ पकाया जाता है जो इस पुलाव को बहुत ही अच्छा रंग देता है. यह बहुत ही आसान है बनाने में और आपको हाउस पार्टीज के लिए भी पर्याप्त है अगर आप उत्तर भारतीय खाना बना रहे है.

name: Achari Aloo Sabzi Recipe - Potatoes In Spicy Pickle Masala
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian  aloo, hing, jeera, haldi, dhania
description: Here is a lip smacking Achari Aloo Sabzi Recipe that is packed with flavours from a Punjabi Mango Pickle and cooked in an electric pressure cooker. The addition of jaggery lends to a balance of a delicious sweet and spicy taste that makes this dish stand out.

name: Rava Upma Recipe With Peanuts, Peas & Corn
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  semolinarava, raikadugu, moongphali, jeera, hing, split, gajjar, capsicum, matar, freshorfrozen, dhania, adjust, optional, dhania, optional, pomegranateseedpowder, forgarnish
description: Rava Upma Recipe With Peanuts, Peas & Corn is a healthy, tasty and colorful dish. It is equally great for both breakfast or snack. It is nutritious, tasty and very easy to make.  In this recipe roasted rava or semolina is cooked with sauteed mix of vegetables, peanuts, curry leaves and lentils.

name: Oats and Besan Cheela Recipe (High Protein Spiced Crepes)
main_tag: indian northindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  besan, saunf, dhania
description: The Oats Besan Cheela recipe is a very traditional snack of northern India. The cheela is made from gram flour and spiced up with green chillies. In this recipe I have added additional healthy diabetic friendly ingredients like oats, making the chilla fiber rich, nutritious and gluten free.

name: चाउ चाउ पोरिचा कूटू रेसिपी - Chow Chow Poricha Kootu Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian
description: चाउ चाउ पोरिचा कूटू एक सरल दक्षिण भारतीय डिश है जिसमे चाउ चाउ का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इस रेसिपी को बनाने के लिए चाउ चाउ को मूंग दाल, नारियल, जीरा, दही और कढ़ी पत्ता के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसे आप पराठा, फुल्का या चावल के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: Spicy And Tangy Bread Upma Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  raikadugu, split, capsicum, dhania
description: Bread Upma recipe is simple recipe to make and delicious to eat. At the end of a week, if you have very few ingredients left in your pantry and fridge, Bread Upma is the way to go. You can whip this up in less than 30 minutes and tastes great as it has the spicy flavour from the green chillies and ginger garlic paste and tanginess from the dash of lime that you add in the end.

name: Gulab Sandesh Recipe - Cottage Cheese Flavored with Rose Water
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, optional
description: The Gulab Sandesh Recipe also known as the Shondesh is traditional sweet in every Bengali home. Sandesh is made from fresh homemade chenna, combined with sugar and flavors. In this recipe, the Sandesh is flavored with gulab jal or rose water, giving it a delectable earthly flavor and taste.

name: Vegetable Ragi & Oats Uttapam Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  whole, fenugreekseeds, capsicum, gajjar
description: The Vegetable Ragi & Oats Uttapam Recipe is a twist to the original recipe of a traditional Uttapam. The addition of oats and lots of vegetables makes this Uttapam wholesome making it a great tiffin dish. It is a diabetic friendly recipe as it uses wholesome oats and brown rice instead of white rice.

name: थक्काली रसम रेसिपी - Thakkali Rasam Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu maincourse vegetarian
description: थक्काली रसम रेसिपी एक ट्रेडिशनल रेसिपी जिसे दक्षिण भारत के हर घर में बनाया जाता है. यह टमाटर रसम बनाने में बहुत आसान है और  आप इसे सूप की तरह भी सर्दियों में पी सकते है. इसमें टमाटर के साथ इमली का प्रयोग होता है जो इसमें खट्टापन देता है.

name: Paneer Kalimirch Recipe (Paneer in Black Pepper flavored Gravy)
main_tag: northindian sidedish highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, haldi
description: Paneer Kalimirch Recipe is delicious, creamy paneer dish flavored with black pepper and lots of garlic. Instead of the frying paneer it has been grilled in the pan and then tossed in mild flavored gravy. Serve Paneer Kalimirch with Paratha for the weeknight dinner. Pepper lends a pungent but not harsh touch of spiciness to the dish, making it seem quite different from the usual. This recipe adds great variety to the vegetarian dinner menu for the parties as well.

name: Thengai Poornam Kozhukattai / Ukadiche Modak Recipe With Rice Flour
main_tag: maharashtrian snack vegetarian  elaichi
description: Thengai Poornam Kozhukattai / Ukadiche Modak Recipe is a very festive sweet that is made for Lord Ganesha's Birthday also known as Vinayaka or Ganesh Chaturthi that is observed in the month of August - September.

name: Ande Ka Salan Recipe - Tangy Egg Masala in Peanut Gravy
main_tag: northindian lunch eggetarian  moongphali, tilseeds, raikadugu, jeera, fenugreekseeds, haldi, dhania, dhania
description: Whenever you are in dilemma what to cook for dinner, eggs always come handy! Therefore, we have a delicious Egg Curry Recipe that is especially served with Biryani. Ande Ka Salan Recipe is a tangy, spicy curry prepared using coconut based gravy and hard boiled eggs.

name: Egg Kothu Paratha Recipe
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast eggetarian  raikadugu, hing, haldi, dhania
description: Egg Kothu Paratha is a popular South Indian delicacy made with shredded chapatis or parathas. Muttai Parotta as it is called in Tamil Nadu is a dish based on a the Sri Lankan version, where it originated as Kothu Roti. It is made using paratha , eggs, some meat, and a spicy curry or gravy that are tossed together in a hot cast-iron griddle with sufficient oil.

name: Gawar Phali Masala Sabzi Recipe - Cluster Beans Gravy Sabzi
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  kothavarangaiclusterbeans, caromseeds, hing, haldi, dhania, moongphali, dhania
description: The  Gawar Phali Masala Sabzi is a simple gravy sabzi that is cooked in a light tomato onion gravy along with peanuts. The addition of ginger, garlic and the peanuts makes this simple gawar phali vegetable stand out in taste and flavors. Addition of ajwain also adds to the taste of the gawar phali Sabzi.

name: Bharwa Parwal Sabzi Recipe -Stuffed Pointed Gourd Dry Vegetable
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  besan, hing, moongphali, haldi, dhania, jeera, drymangopowder, driedfenugreekleaves, parval, raikadugu, dhania
description: Parwal also known as potol, parbal, parval or pointed gourd .Bharwa Parwal Sabzi Recipe -Stuffed Pointed Gourd Dry Vegetable is a dry vegetable prepared by stuffing parwal with a dry masala that mainly consists of besan and crushed peanuts and  basic spices. The flavours of this stuffed parwal sabzi is amazing and it makes a tasty side dish with any meal.

name: Sukhi Urad Dal Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  whole, jeera, hing, haldi, dhania, dhania
description: Sukhi Urad Dal Sabzi Recipe is a North Indian Style lentil dish made with split white urad dal. Sukhi in Hindi means 'dry' as this lentil dish is served dry. The soaked Split urad dal is steamed in the pressure cooker to retain its texture.

name: मटर पुलाव रेसिपी - Peas Pulao Recipe
main_tag: indian maincourse vegetarian
description: मटर पुलाव रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट चावल की रेसिपी है जिसमे चावल को मटर और खड़े मसाले के साथ पकाया जाता है. इसमें खड़े मसाले में तेज पत्ता, जीरा, इलाइची, लॉन्ग, स्टार अनीस का प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इसे किसी भी दाल या करी के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: कढ़ाई छोले रेसिपी - Kadai Chole Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  हर,
description: कढ़ाई छोले एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसमे छोले या काबुली चना को उबाल कर प्याज, शिमला मिर्च और रोज के मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है.आप इसे अपने या अपने बच्चो के लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है. यह एक सरल रेसिपी है, इसलिए आपके रोज के खाने के लिए पर्याप्त है.

name: Kesar Peda Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  mawa, elaichi
description: Kesar Peda Recipe is one of the easiest Indian sweets to make and doesn't require too much time or effort. It's a traditional Indian dessert made by combining sweetened khoya with other flavors such as saffron and cardamom and formed into small balls or other shapes. A favorite with kids and adults alike, Indian festivals are usually incomplete without this delicious sweet.

name: Baklava Rolls Recipe - Turkish Sweet Rolls
main_tag: middleeastern dessert vegetarian  badam, salted, dalchini
description: Baklava is a Middle Eastern sweet/dessert made from phyllo sheets and nuts that are soaked in syrup. If you have the readily available phyllo sheets, you can make these Baklava Rolls in about 30 minutes and have an exquisite dessert for the festive season.

name: Ghee Roast Dosa Recipe - Crispy Paper Dosa Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  whole, fenugreekseeds
description: The Ghee Roast Dosa Recipe is an easy and quick paper dosa recipe if you have the dosa batter ready in the refrigerator. The Homemade Idli Dosa Batter Recipe, gives a delicious taste to these Ghee Roast Dosa.

name: Maharashtrian Kulith Shengole Recipe - Spicy Horse Gram Flour Dumplings
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian  raikadugu, jeera
description: Kulith Shengole is a rustic Maharashtrian dish made using Horse gram flour. The recipe is simple and easy to make. Use freshly milled horse gram flour for best results. You could also make this for lunch when you have unexpected guests at home if you have horse gram flour handy, since the recipe gets done under 15 minutes.

name: Ragi Idli Recipe - Learn How To Make A Healthy Ragi Idli
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  whole, fenugreekseeds
description: The Ragi Idli recipe is a simple wholesome dish that you can make with ease. It is made from ragi seeds soaked along with idli rice and ground along with soaked urad dal. The idli dosa batter made from fresh ragi seeds, makes it absolutely delicious and can be used to make both idli's and dosas. This recipe is a great way to include ragi and other millets in your diet.

name: Red Capsicum Chutney Recipe - Red Bell Pepper Chutney
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  capsicum, sambaronions, raikadugu, split
description: Red Capsicum Chutney Recipe is a lip smacking chutney that is packed with flavors from the roasted bell pepper and baby onions. The addition of the tadka with the crunchy urad dal makes this chutney absolutely delectable.  Did you know Red Capsicum is loaded with antioxidants and high in Vitamin C and Vitamin A. Compared to green bell peppers, the red ones have almost 11 times more beta-carotene and 1.5 times more vitamin C.

name: Date and Tamarind Chutney Recipe - Khajur Imli Chutney
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  jeera, kalanamak
description: Khajur Imli Ki Chutney or the Date Tamarind Chutney is a sweet and sour tangy chutney made from dates tamarind and jaggery.It is an essential component in Chaats like Pani Puri, Bhel Puri, Samosa and more. Topping this chutney for chaats is an absolute must to have the best chaat experience.

name: मटर की तेहरी रेसिपी - Matar Ki Tehri Recipe
main_tag: awadhi onepotdish vegetarian
description: मटर की तेहरी रेसिपी एक पारम्परिक रेसिपी है जिसे उत्तर प्रदेश के घरो में बनाया जाता है. इस डिश को बनाने के लिए चावल को खड़े मसाले और हरे मटर के साथ पकाया जाता है. तेहरी पुलाव से थोड़ी अलग होती है. तेहरी थोड़ी गीली और स्टिकी होती है. आप इसमें ताज़ा हरे मटर का प्रयोग करें, अगर ताज़ा मटर नहीं है तो आप फ्रोजेन का भी प्रयोग कर सकते है. इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बनाए या फिर अपने लंच बॉक्स में पैक करें।

name: Mushroom Methi Brown Rice Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  fenugreekleaves, dhania, haldi
description: This is the first time I am using brown rice in my recipe. The texture of brown rice is amazing. Once cooked it didn’t resemble rice at all, it looks more like moong. Brown rice is not a boon for just for diabetic people, but for all rice eaters. Rich in fibre, this amazing rice makes a superfood if you can toss in some nutritious vegetables and greens. That is exactly what I did with brown rice. I made it for my kids lunch box, tossed in some button mushrooms and fresh fenugreek leaves.

name: Jeera Rice Recipe - Cumin And Ghee Flavored Rice
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  jeera
description: The Jeera Rice (Pulao) Recipe is simple rice recipe that you can make in less than 20 minutes. The fresh roasted cumin along with ghee when combined with steamed rice, brings out a fantastic nutty flavor that goes well with a variety of Dals & Kadhi's to make a great weeknight dinner.

name: Dal Fry Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  bengalgramdal, driedfenugreekleaves, haldi, dhania, hing, raikadugu, saunf, jeera
description: Dal Fry is a delicious and lip smacking bowl of health that is a daily dish in most of the Indian homes. This dal fry recipe is made of chana dal or split bengal grams and is usually thicker than the daily dal. The tempering or tadka takes it to another level altogether. You can use other dals like tur dal or masoor dal as well if you like.

name: Aloo Gajar Matar Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  aloo, matar, caromseeds, haldi, dhania, dhania
description: Aloo Gajar Matar Sabzi Recipe is an one pot delight that can be made or your everyday meals. This quick recipe is made in a pressure cooker. It is ideal to make for weeknight dinner and can be packed into yours and yours kids lunch boxes.

name: Whole Masala Gobhi Recipe - Spiced Whole Roasted Cauliflower Masala
main_tag: indian sidedish diabeticfriendly  gobi, aloo, greekyogurt, dhania, dhania
description: Whole Masala Gobi Recipe or Whole Roasted Cauliflower is a sure shot way to impress your dinner guests. Intensely flavourful, and healthy too, this cauliflower dish is a wonderful way to present this humble vegetable. Combined with a burst of spices, onions and potatoes, the Whole Masala Gobi makes for a fantastic dinner option.

name: पापड़ एर डालना रेसिपी - Bengali Papad Curry Recipe
main_tag: bengali sidedish vegetarian
description: पापड़ एर डालना रेसिपी, एक स्वादिष्ट बंगाली रेसिपी है जिसे हर बंगाली घर में रोज के खाने के लिए बनाया जाता है. इसे ज़्यदातर दुर्गा पूजा के समय बनाया जाता है. यह बहुत ही सरल रेसिपी है जो बहुत कम समय में बन जाती है.

name: Lehsun ki Chutney - Spicy Garlic Chutney
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  jeera
description: Garlic Chutney also known as Lehsun Ki Chutney is popularly used in Chaats, like Vada Pav, Chillas etc. Lehsun Ki Chutney recipe is also a staple among the villages of Rajasthan and Gujarat where they have it along with bajra ka rotla. The pungent aroma along with the lemon and red chillies brings out the flavor of this chutney.

name: Mushroom Corn Masala Dosa Recipe Using Ragi Idli Dosa Batter
main_tag: fusion southindianbreakfast vegetarian  whole, fenugreekseeds, capsicum, pudina
description: Mushroom Corn Masala Dosa Recipe Using Ragi Idli Dosa Batter is a fusion recipe, where a crispy South Indian Ragi dosa is stuffed with chatpata pav bhaji Corn & Mushroom masala.

name: Peanut Chutney Podi Recipe
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian  moongphali, jeera, dhania
description: Peanut Chutney Podi recipe is a perfect blend of roasted peanuts, garlic cloves, cumin seeds, coriander seeds, tamarind, curry leaves and chillies. It is a very easy recipe to prepare and can be stored for days without getting spoilt. Given its longevity, it makes for a great travel food without the fear of leakage like with pickles that we normally take along when travelling.

name: Kanchipuram Masala Dosa Recipe With Soya Dosa Batter
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  wholesoyadal, whole, fenugreekseeds, bengalgramdal, gajjar, raikadugu, split, bengalgramdal, aloo, haldi, milagaipowder
description: Kanchipuram Masala Dosa is a breakfast recipe that is stuffed with beetroot, carrot, onion and regular potato masala. This is available in many local restaurants in Kerala and Tamil Nadu. Dosa is a favorite breakfast recipe, try to make variations by adding some vegetables which ends up making it a healthy start for your day. Kanchipuram Masala Dosa is a healthy way to treat your kids with some vegetables along with the dosa.

name: Avocado Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, moongphali, dhania, jeera
description: Avocado Raita Recipe is a simple yogurt based salad made with pureed avocado, roasted peanuts and chillies. The Avocado raita is quick to make and is wholesome and nutritious too. Serve the Avocado raita along with Parathas for breakfast to make a wholesome meal.

name: Kuruku Kaalan Recipe - Raw Bananas in Coconut Curry
main_tag: kerala sidedish vegetarian  haldi, dahiyogurt, haldi, jeera, jeera, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds
description: Kuruku Kaalan Recipe is a delicious dish made from ripe bananas and cooked in a yogurt and coconut curry. It is a delectable traditional dish in Kerala cuisine, that is eaten almost every other day and is also a part of the famous Onam sadya.

name: Oats Mor Kali Recipe - Oats & Buttermilk Breakfast Porridge
main_tag: tamilnadu southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  milagai bhajjivariety, oatmeal, hing, raikadugu, split
description: Oats Mor Kali or Oats Buttermilk Porridge is a traditional South Indian dish that originates from Tamil Nadu, which is generally prepared using buttermilk, with rice flour as the base. Tasty, nutritious and easy to digest, the dish resembles sooji and makes for a very healthy breakfast option. In this recipe, instead of the rice flour, oats has been used as the base which takes the nutrient quotient up a notch. Learn how to make tangy and tasty Oats Mor Kali by following the recipe below.

name: Vendakkai Puli Kuzhambu
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, ladyfingerokra, haldi, dhania
description: The Kerala Bhindi Curry also known as the Vendakkai Puli Kuzhambu is a tangy and spicy curry made from okras also known as lady's fingers. The curry is cooked in a tamarind and tomato curry base and flavored with baby onions, fenugreek seeds, coriander powder and curry leaves.

name: Bengali Style Pomfret Shorshe Recipe - Pomfret In Mustard Gravy
main_tag: bengali lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  onionnigellaseeds, raikadugu, haldi
description: Pomfret Shorshe (Pomfret in mustard gravy) is an authentic Bengali recipe which is made with pomfret fish. This is one of easiest recipe with minimal ingredients. Mustard sauce gravy can be used to cook other fishes like hilsa, rohu, catla, catfish and various other river fishes.

name: Andhra Style Chama Dumpa Pulusu Recipe - Arbi With Sesame Tamarind Sauce Recipe
main_tag: andhra dinner vegetarian  arbi, tilseeds, raikadugu, jeera, haldi, dhania
description: Andhra Style Chama Dumpa Pulusu Recipe (Arbi With Sesame Tamarind Sauce Recipe) is a traditional dish that we have inherited from our ancestors, made using boiled arbi that is simmered in sesame tamarind sauce. It is a perfect to make during weekdays lunch or dinner.

name: Kobbari Charu Recipe - Coconut Milk & Dal Sambar Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  pottukadalai, raikadugu, jeera, haldi, dhania, optional
description: Kobbari chaaru is an authentic sambar/rasam that is made in Telangana region using coconut milk and roasted chana dal. This Coconut Milk & Dal Sambar is silky smooth in texture with subtle sweetness of coconut milk and mildly spicy with ground green chillies, overall making this a perfect lunch combo with hot steamed rice and fryum (Akki Peni sandige) or just with Phulka Recipe (Roti/Chapati) - Puffed Indian Bread.

name: Sadya Parippu Recipe - Kerala Style Lentils
main_tag: southindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal
description: Parippu or Lentil Curry is a very simple dish that is also a part of the Onam sadyaa. Served with piping hot rice, the dish is a delicate and simple balance of flavours that prepares the palate to the explosion of flavours in the dishes that follow thereafter. The parippu can be prepared in a variety of ways using different kinds of lentils. Using Green Gram lentils (Moong Dal) or Split Pigeon Dal, one can prepare a nutritious and beautiful dish that is delectable in its simplicity.

name: Papad er Dalna Recipe - Bengali Papad Curry
main_tag: bengali sidedish vegetarian  masalapapad, aloo, tejpatta, jeera, jeera, haldi
description: Papad er Dalna is a Bengali recipe that is prepared specially during Durga Puja. It provides the "pujo pujo aroma " (the essence of Durga Puja). This recipe is quick and easy for the days you are too lazy to cook up an extravagant meal.

name: Pori Urundai Recipe - Healthy Puffed Rice Balls With Jaggery
main_tag: indian snack vegetarian  elaichi
description: Pori Urundai or Puffed Rice Balls is a traditional sweet preparation made using puffed rice mixed with jaggery. The crunchiness of the rice and the sweetness of it, makes this dish tasty and one that is easy to prepare.

name: Menthya Matvadi Palya Recipe - Madhwa Brahmin Style Methi-Chana Dal Sabzi
main_tag: karnataka sidedish diabeticfriendly  fenugreekleaves, raikadugu, bengalgramdal, dhania, jeera, haldi, hing
description: Matwadi Palya Recipe is essentially a Madhwa Brahmin Style Methi-Chana Dal Sabzi which uses ground masala which is steamed and then mixed with the other sauteed ingredients like fenugreek leaves. This side dish is great for high protein vegetarian diet since methi and dal are rich in proteins. In addition, methi is a source of ample iron.

name: Lasun Batata Poori Recipe - Spiced Coriander Fried Bread Recipe
main_tag: northindian maincourse vegetarian  aloo, dhania, drymangopowder, haldi, jeera
description: Lasun Batata Poori Recipe (Spiced Coriander Fried Bread Recipe) is a deep fried Indian bread flavoured with some indian spice and fresh herb like coriander leaves to bring out the flavour to the dish. These pooris are quite soft as it contains potato in the dough. You can also add any starchy vegetables like colocasia or tapioca to the bread.

name: Kaju Pista Roll Recipe - Cashew Nut Pistachio Fudge
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: The Kaju Pista Roll Recipe is a delectable recipe that is packed with flavors from cashew Nut Pistachios and made into a fudge. The Kaju Pista Roll is most often made during festivals like diwali or on special occasions like weddings or as a gift for someone you love.

name: Mooli Palak Sabji Recipe - Radish Spinach Sabzi
main_tag: northindian lunch diabeticfriendly  radish, palak, dhania, haldi, jeera
description: Mooli Palak Sabji is a simple and easy recipe that is delicious and super healthy too given the health benefits of radish and spinach. Radish and spinach are powerhouses of essential minerals and vitamins like vitamin B6, A, C, K, folate, fiber, potassium et al. This is a diabetic friendly dish as radish and spinach help in maintaining blood sugar levels.

name: Raw Banana Thoran Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian  raikadugu, sambaronions, haldi, dhania
description: Raw Banana Thoran is a common dish in Kerala and is widely served as a side dish. One cannot think of vegetarian food from God's own country and miss mentioning the thoran. This lightly spiced stir-fry is made with many vegetables and makes the taste of the vegetable taste yummy. In this Thoran we are using raw banana which is the much-loved vegetable in Kerala. The vegetable is combined with mild spices and freshly grated coconut.

name: Kerala Style Vendakka Uppadan Recipe
main_tag: kerala dinner vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, haldi, raikadugu, hing, fenugreekseeds
description: Vendakkai Uppadan is a traditional spicy recipe from the state of Kerala. Unlike, other dishes from this region, this one does not use coconut in it. The simplest of the spices are freshly dry roasted, ground and added to the recipe making it very aromatic. It is spicy and tart making it a perfect accompaniment with Rice. Serve Vendakkai Uppadan Recipe (Kerala Style Okra Curry) with Steamed rice, Snake Gourd Thoran Recipe (Turai Thoran) and Paruppu Podi for a weeknight dinner.

name: Iyengar Vendakkai Mor kuzhambu Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch noonionnogarlic  ladyfingerokra, splittoordal, haldi, fenugreekseeds, jeera, dhania, dahiyogurt, raikadugu, hing
description: Iyengar Style Vendakkai Mor kuzhambu  Recipe is a variant to the regular Pooshanikai More Kuzhambu  .This type of preparation is something very commonly seen in many Iyengars (a sect of Tambrahms Community) households. In other words it is also called as a south Indian version of “Bhindi Kadhi”. In the south Indian version of mor kuzhambu, It does not require Garam masala or garlic. The specialty in our cuisine is without these ingredients we can prepare an equally flavorful dish. Vendakkai Mor kuzhambu , is typically crispy okra that is cooked in a thick , spicy yogurt based sauce.

name: Atte Ka Halwa Recipe - Whole Wheat Flour Halwa with Khoya
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  semolinarava, mawa, elaichi, badam
description: The Atte Ka Halwa Recipe is a delicious and traditional Indian sweet that is made from Whole Wheat Flour. This recipe uses sooji and khoya to add to the richness of the halwa. The Atte Ka Halwa is a tricky halwa to make - the most important process is the roasting of the wheat flour on low to medium heat until it turn a good brown color.

name: Mizoram Style Hmarcha Rawt - Roasted Green Chilli Chutney
main_tag: northeastindia appetizer vegetarian
description: Mizoram Style Hmarcha Rawt (Roasted Green Chilli Chutney) is a recipe from North East India. It is a tangy and spicy chilli chutney locals of Mizoram prefer having with main dishes. The recipe is also quite easy to prepare and just take 10 to 15 minutes. Serve with Spicy Chicken Curry Recipe In Naga Style or Thekera Tenga Recipe (veg) and steamed rice.

name: Oriya Special Dalma Recipe - Lentils Cooked With Vegetables & Raw Papaya
main_tag: oriya lunch highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, aloo, gajjar, parangikaipumpkin, bainganeggplant, tejpatta, haldi, jeera, dhania
description: Dalma is a Chickpea Dal Cooked With Vegetables and Raw Papaya, a delicacy from the state of Orissa. It can be made using toor (arhar) dal, and an assortment of vegetables typically raw banana, eggplant, green papaya and pumpkins, simmered in a special spice blend.

name: केला बेसनी सब्ज़ी विधि रेसिपी - Kela Besani Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch noonionnogarlic
description: यह केला बेसनी सब्ज़ी एक बहुत ही आसान सी सब्ज़ी है. यह सब्ज़ी कच्चे केले को मसालेदार बेसन के घोल में डूबा कर तलकर, दही की ग्रेवी में पकाई हुई एक स्वादिष्ट सब्ज़ी है। आप इससे आसानी से बना सकते है और गर्म फुल्का या तवा पराठा के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: मैंगलोर फिश करी रेसिपी - Mangalore Fish Curry Recipe
main_tag: mangalorean lunch nonvegeterian
description: मैंगलोर फिश करी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट डिश है जो दक्षिण भारत के मैंगलोर में बहुत बनाई जाती है. इस करी में नारियल और इमली का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसके साथ इसमें हरी मिर्च का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसे बहुत ही स्वादिष्ट बनाता है.

name: Maharashtrian Kanda Poha Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian snack vegetarian  flattenedrice, optional, jeera, moongphali, dhania
description: Maharashtrian Kanda Poha/Pohe is a very popular Maharashtrian breakfast or tea time snack. It is made from flattened/ beaten rice and tossed in caramelized onions, green chillies and peanuts. If you prefer to eat a light meal first thing in the morning, this super quick dish is just right for you. You can always spice it up or down depending on your taste. Serve Maharashtrian Kanda Poha Recipe with Samosa Recipe and Ginger Cardamom Chai.

name: Cabbage Pachadi Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  gingelly, split, pottukadalai, pattagobimuttaikose, adjust, raikadugu, hing, adjust
description: Cabbage pachadi or tempered chutney recipe is very easy dish prepared with cabbage. It is also healthy and delicious in taste that goes well with South Indian Recipes like Ghee Roast Dosas, idli or Carrot Onion Uttapam. Serve Cabbage Pachadi Recipe as a side dish with South Indian breakfasts.

name: Chow Chow and Carrot Kootu Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  gajjar, haldi, bengalgramdal, jeera, raikadugu, split
description: Chow Chow And Carrot Kootu is a classic kootu recipe which perfectly goes well with rotis as well as steamed rice. The mild sweetness from the carrots, spiciness from the green chillies balances out the whole dish.

name: Spicy Coconut Peanut Stuffed Baby Brinjal Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian  bainganeggplant, raikadugu, moongphali, kopra, jeera, dhania, tilseeds, dhania
description: Spicy Coconut Peanut Stuffed Baby Brinjal takes inspiration from the eastern ghats of India and makes for a delicious side dish. The eggplants are stuffed with a spicy, tangy coconut peanut filling making this dish really flavourful and delicious. This dish tastes like a gravy dish but it is dry, making it tiffin friendly. The recipe uses very less oil, making it a healthy choice for weight watchers and diabetic patients.

name: Brinjal Capsicum Sabji Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  bainganeggplant, longvariety, capsicum, hing, haldi, dhania, dhania
description: Brinjal Capsicum Sabji Recipe is an easy side dish recipe which accentuates the flavors of capsicum with eggplant or brinjal and tomatoes. This sabzi can be had with phulka orchapati for a nutritious lunch at school or work. This Brinjal Capsicum Sabji Recipe comes handy when you need to fix nutrition is less available time at hand.

name: Spicy Matar Masala Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian  matar, jeera, raikadugu, tejpatta, laung, elaichi, haldi, dhania
description: Spicy Matar Masala is a simple and easy dish which can be prepared in a short time. When you are out of vegetables these frozen matar come to your help. The Spicy Matar Masala is cooked in a gravy form where the matar is cooked in an onion and tomato base gravy.

name: Jain Style Corn Palak Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  palak, driedfenugreekleaves, jeera, optional, jeera, hing
description: Jain Style Corn Palak is a delicious combination of corn, spinach, and spices. This dish is made without onion and garlic and serves as a great side dish with phulka or pulav. The freshness of spinach makes this dish even more tasty and flavourful.

name: Potato Stuffed Dal Dhokli Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  aloo, dhania, splittoordal, haldi, moongphali, raikadugu, jeera, hing, dalchini, laung, tejpatta, dhania
description: Potato Stuffed Dal Dhokli Recipe can be translated as Mashed potato dumplings steamed in Lentil Curry. There are a variety of Indian curry recipes for mashed potatoes but this recipe is quite different. Here I have slightly modified dal dhokli recipe which is a traditional Gujarati dish.

name: Authentic Godumai Dosai Recipe - Whole Wheat Flour Crepes
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  dahiyogurt, dhania, gingelly
description: Godumai Dosai is an instant dosa recipe that is commonly prepared in most Tamil homes. As the dosa is prepared with whole wheat flour and requires no overnight fermentation, it is a handy recipe. Whole Wheat Flour is rich in fibre making this a high fibre dosa recipe. It is popular among the Karnataka cuisine as well and is called as the "Ghodi Dosa".

name: Arunachal Pradesh Zan Recipe - Finger Millet Porridge with Vegetables Recipe
main_tag: northeastindia northindianbreakfast glutenfree  fingermilletnagli, gajjar, wholesoyadal, matar, dhania
description: Arunachal pradesh "The land of rising sun" is one of the largest among North eastern states. They prefer to use different methods of cooking.This region is occupied by tribal people and they use fresh herbs,vegetables in their everyday cooking. They don't use oil much or packed spice products and they prefer steaming,boiling and smoked food methods of cooking.

name: Besan Katli Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: uttarpradesh lunch vegetarian  besan, haldi, haldi, dhania, dhania, jeera
description: Besan Katli Ki Sabzi is a recipe that hails from Uttar Pradesh, and is often prepared during monsoon season. Couple of decades ago, during monsoon, fresh vegetables were seldomly available hence "Besan Ke Paneer" was the go to option for home cooks. Nowadays since monsoons doesn't affect the availability of other veggies and seeing how busy people have gotten with their lives, this recipe is scarcely prepared.

name: Beetroot Carrot Halwa Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  gajjar, fullcreammilk, orkhoyamawa, additaccordingly, elaichi, badam
description: Beetroot and Carrot Halwa is a perfect sweet to be served hot or chilled after a perfect Indian meal. Traditionally carrot halwa or beetroot halwa are made separately. Adding Beetroot to carrot halwa not only gave beautiful color to halwa but also made it more delicious.

name: Papaya and Carrot Halwa Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  gajjar, elaichi, badam
description: The Papaya & Carrot Halwa Recipe is a simple, quick and delicious sweet dish that is made  from papaya and carrots giving it a rich flavor and taste. You will be surprised how well the papaya goes into the halwa and gives it a creamy texture.

name: Kerala Style Prawns & Shrimp Biryani  -Chemmeen Biryani Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch nonvegeterian  elaichi, laung, dalchini, dhania, pudina, dhania, pudina, dahiyogurt, dhania, pudina, pudina
description: Kerala Style Prawns & Shrimp Biryani (Chemmeen Biryani Recipe) is a robust flavored seafood biryani made from prawns and shrimps. This is a perfect monsoon and winter season food with wonderful coastal flavors within and aroma spreading from this hot Prawns and Shrimp pilaf.

name: Saunf Wale Aloo Baingan Recipe - Fennel Spiced Potato And Eggplant
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  bainganeggplant, aloo, jeera, haldi, dhania, dhania, saunf
description: Saunf Wale Aloo Baingan Recipe is a tasty dish that is spiced with fennel seeds powder. Potatoes and brinjals are a classic combination and are preferred the most. The saunf has a strong flavor and aroma that is handled very carefully. Not all vegetables go well with the flavour of fennel seeds but this Saunf Wale Aloo Baingan Recipe is an exemption.

name: Vegetable Biryani Recipe With Chatpata Aloo
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian  adjust, capsicum, gajjar, laung, dalchini, tejpatta, haldi, jeera, dhania, drymangopowder, aloo
description: We Indians love biryani’s. Biryani originates originally in Persia and was introduced in India by the Arabs. Biryani is a rice dish with lots of flavours and textures, made with quite a few variants of rice. The key to a good biryani lies in good quality rice, fresh spices and ingredients and style of cooking. Vegetable Biryani Recipe With Chatpata Aloo is a way to spice up your biryani with shallow fried aloo.

name: Matar Ki Tehri Recipe - Fragrant rice cooked with spices and fresh peas
main_tag: awadhi onepotdish vegetarian  laung, dalchini, badielaichi, matar, dhania, tejpatta
description: Matar Ki Tehri Recipe is a traditional dish from Eastern UP, where rice is cooked with whole spices and fresh peas. Tehri is different from pulav as it is moist and a little sticky. There are two types of tehri, one with potato, cauliflower and carrot, and the other one with just peas. With the goodness of fresh peas, the aroma of desi ghee, luscious tomatoes and fresh coriander, this recipe has been handed down from generation to generation in UP.

name: Kaju Katli Recipe (Kaju Barfi)
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  chandikavark, optional, pistachio, optional
description: Kaju Katli or Kaju Barfi is a traditional Indian sweet made with cashew nuts and is most often made for festivals, gifting and weddings. The subtle sweetness of the barfi together with its melt in the mouth quality from the cashew nuts, make it the most desired sweet for any occasion, religious or otherwise. Serve Kaju Katli Recipe (Kaju Barfi) as a party dessert or along with Crispy Masala Peanuts Recipe (Gujarati Sing Bhujia) or Baked Chevdo Recipe (Chivda Mixture -Tea Time Snack) during tea time.

name: Kharbyaali Masale Khara Recipe - North Karnataka Sambar Powder
main_tag: northkarnataka sidedish vegetarian  kopra, dhania, jeera, fenugreekseeds, caromseeds, laung, dalchini, tilseeds, patharphoolblackstoneflower
description: The Kharbyaali Masale Khara is a very traditional North Karnataka Spice Powder that is used in making the Kharbyaali Nuggekai Saaru and even certain vegetable dishes. It is made with a combination of the various spices and smoked dry coconut that brings out the special flavor of the North Karnataka Kharbyaali Masala.

name: Aloo Subz Dum Biryani Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  aloo, gajjar, frenchbeans, laung, dalchini, haldi, dahiyogurt, laung, elaichi, dalchini, dhania
description: Aloo Subz Dum Biryani is a delicious one pot meal that makes a good lunch box recipe or a perfect week-night dinner. You can always include more vegetables other than potatoes in this recipe.

name: Bengali Holud Mishti Pulao Recipe - Saffron Flavored Rice With Nuts
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian  gobindobhog, matar, optional, jeera, haldi, tejpatta, dalchini, elaichi, laung
description: Bengali Holud Mishti Pulao Recipe (Saffron Flavored Rice With Nuts Recipe) is a Bengali flavored rice tossed with toasted nuts like cashew nuts, almonds, pistachio and raisins and flavored with saffron.

name: Bengali Holud Mishti Pulao Recipe - Saffron Flavored Rice With Nuts
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian  gobindobhog, matar, optional, jeera, haldi, tejpatta, dalchini, elaichi, laung
description: Bengali Holud Mishti Pulao Recipe (Saffron Flavored Rice With Nuts Recipe) is a Bengali flavored rice tossed with toasted nuts like cashew nuts, almonds, pistachio and raisins and flavored with saffron.

name: Maharashtrian Karanji Recipe (Gujiya) - A Delicious Diwali Sweet
main_tag: maharashtrian dessert vegetarian  eithergratedorflakes, semolinarava, tilseeds, iusedediblealmondoil, elaichi, semolinarava, maida, orhalfmilkandwater
description: Maharashtrian Karanji also known as Gujiya or Ghugra is a traditional sweet, commonly prepared by Maharashtrians during the festival of Diwali. The Karanji is a must have crunchy delicacy that is filled with oodles of delicious soft goodness of coconut, jaggery, semolina and spices.  Learn how to make Karanji the way it is prepared in most households of Maharashtra, by following the recipe below. Karanji or Gujiyas are typical dishes that are served during Holi.  Holi, the festival of colours in India is also a festival of great food. Holi food traditions involves people going to their neighbours and friends houses and enjoy this spring festival with a lot of snacks being passed around. The most popular savoury snacks during Holi snacks are Gujiyas, Kachoris, Samosas, Dahi Vada etc. Among the sweet snacks are sweet Gujiyas, Kulfis, Thandais and Malpuas.

name: South Indian One Pot Sambar Rice Recipe
main_tag: southindian maincourse vegetarian  bengalgramdal, split, dhania, fenugreekseeds, raikadugu, sonamasurivariety, split, aloo, frenchbeans, lauki, raikadugu, jeera, hing, haldi, dhania
description: Combine simple ingredients into one dish for a complete meal that doesn't require extra work. These quick and easy one dish recipes are simple enough for any meal of the day. Sambar Rice Recipe is a one dish recipe that South Indians love as a comforting soul food for lunch and dinner.

name: Makhane Ki Phirni Recipe - Lotus Seed Milk Pudding
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  lotusseeds, unsalted, badam, elaichi, javitri, raisins almonds cashew pistachio
description: Makhane Ki Phirni is beautiful combination of 2 classic dishes, Makhane Ki Kheer and Rice Phirni. The fusion of both these dishes is a delicious recipe that tastes divine and is perfect for a traditional festival like Navratri and Diwali.

name: Kumbakonam Kadappa Recipe - South Indian Style Lentil and Potato Stew
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  split, aloo, raikadugu, jeera, tejpatta, dalchini, saunf
description: Kumbakonam Kadappa Recipe is a very famous side dish for idlis and dosa from the Kumbakonam/Tanjore region of Tamil Nadu. It is a stew made using moong dal and potatoes with the addition of coconut in it. The simplicity of the dish makes it pretty flavourful and a brilliant side dish for any south indian breakfast recipes.

name: Kanda Kairichi Chutney Recipe - Onion & Raw Mango Chutney
main_tag: maharashtrian sidedish vegetarian  raw, powdered, moongphali, adjusttotaste, raikadugu, jeera, hing
description: Kanda Kairichi Chutney Recipe (Maharashtrian Onions & Raw Mango Chutney) is a quick side dish that can jazz up a meal. Tart unripe mangoes team up with sharp pungent onions to make this tangy,sweet & spicy condiment.

name: Indian Style Kala Chana Salad Recipe
main_tag: northindian appetizer highproteinvegetarian  brownchickpeas, adjustable, dhania
description: Indian Style Black Chickpea Salad is the right salad for the days when you want to eat something healthy and tasty. It is very easy to make and can be eaten at anytime of the day. It also makes a good breakfast for the busy days when you want to eat healthy.

name: Mango Payasam Recipe-Mambazha Payasam - Onam Special
main_tag: tamilnadu dessert vegetarian  ripe, elaichi
description: Mango Payasam also known as the Mambazha Payasam is a very festive recipe that is made during the Onam Festival in Kerala. The payasam recipe is healthy and nutritious made from ripe mangoes, jaggery, ginger, spices and of course the goodness of milk and dry fruits and nuts. Try the delicious Mango Payasam this Onam and you and your family are sure you love it.

name: Gajar Amla Raita Recipe - Carrot Gooseberry Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, gajjar, nellikaigooseberry, raikuria, raikadugu, jeera
description: Raitas are whipped curd/ yogurt with cooked or raw vegetables in them that are served as a side dish for Biryani or Pulao and even parathas. In this recipe of Gajar Nariyal Amla Raita Recipe, grated carrot, grated coconut and cut amla is added to a bowl of whipped curd/yogurt and tempered with mustard seeds and jeera.

name: Mango Kesari Recipe | Mango Sooji Halwa | Mango Sheera
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  semolinarava, ripe, elaichi
description: Mango Kesari or Mango Sheera is a halwa recipe inspired by the king of fruits - mango – that is not only luscious and decadent, but also packs a nutritious punch. Mango Kesari is an Indian sweet pudding prepared using semolina or broken wheat.

name: Spicy Dalia Pulao Recipe - Broken Wheat Pulao
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  daliagodumairava, gajjar, frenchbeans, haldi, jeera, tejpatta, dhania
description: Spicy Dalia Pulao Recipe is a healthy twist to Pulao which we normally make at home. Instead of using Basmati rice or normal rice, we have used Dalia. Dalia or broken wheat is a healthy substitute in a Pulao that is nutritious, high in iron and fiber.

name: Egg Biryani Recipe With Coconut Milk
main_tag: indian lunch eggetarian  tejpatta, elaichi, laung, haldi, jeera, dhania, dhania, pudina
description: The Egg Biryani Recipe is a simple and wholesome biryani that you can make in a jiffy for a weeknight dinner.

name: Hurali Saaru Recipe - Healthy Horse Gram and Coconut Curry
main_tag: tamilnadu dinner highproteinvegetarian  kollukulith, aloo, optional, laung, dalchini, raikadugu, hing
description: The Hurali Saaru Recipe is a delicious lentil curry that is made from horse gram also known as Kollu in Tamil or Kulith in Hindi. In this recipe the horse gram is cooked with aromatic spices ground into a masala with coconut and finally seasoned with ghee and onions making it a perfect curry to go along with rice.

name: मसूर दाल गस्सि रेसिपी - Masoor Dal Gassi Recipe
main_tag: mangalorean dinner highproteinvegetarian
description: मसूर दाल गस्सि रेसिपी एक तीखी, खट्टी रेसिपी है जिसमे मसूर दाल का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसे मैंगलोर के हर घर में बनाया जाता है. इसमें ताज़े मसालो को नारियल के साथ पीसकर डाला जाता है. अपने रोज के खाने के लिए इसे बनाए और हमे भरोसा है की आपके घर वालो को यह जरूर पसंद आएगी।

name: केरला स्टाइल उल्ली थियल रेसिपी - Kerala Style Ulli Theeyal Recipe
main_tag: kerala sidedish vegetarian
description: केरला स्टाइल उल्ली थियल केरला की रेसिपी है जिसमे छोटे प्याज का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इस रेसिपी में छोटे प्याज को पकाकर इमली और नारियल की ग्रेवी में डाला जाता है. यह एक आसान रेसिपी है जिसे आप ओनम या किसी भी दूसरे त्यौहार के लिए बना सकते है.

name: कुरुकु कालन रेसिपी - Kurukku Kaalan Recipe
main_tag: kerala sidedish vegetarian
description: कुरुकु कालन रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट डिश है जिसमे केले को दही और नारियल की करी में पकाया जाता है. यह केरला के हर घर में बनाई जाती है और इस करी को ओनम पर भी बनाया जाता है.

name: केरला स्टाइल एग रोस्ट करी रेसिपी - Kerala Style Egg Roast Curry Recipe
main_tag: kerala sidedish eggetarian
description: केरला स्टाइल एग रोस्ट करी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट एग करी है जिसमे टमाटर और प्याज की ग्रेवी बनाई जाती है. केरला में इसे अप्पम के साथ सुबह के नाश्ते के लिए परोसा जाता है. आप इस करी को तब भी बना सकते है जब आपके घर पर खाने के लिए मेहमान आ रहे हो.

name: Methi Moong Dal Recipe - Healthy Diabetic Friendly Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  fenugreekleaves, split, jeera, haldi
description: The Methi Moong Dal Recipe is a delicious dal that is packed with taste and nutrition from methi and moong dal. It is very simple to make which you can serve along with phulka and achari pickle by the side to make it a complete meal.

name: Spicy Chickpeas Aloo Salad Chaat Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer highproteinvegetarian  whitechickpeas, aloo, dhania, kalanamak
description: Spicy Chickpeas Aloo Salad Chaat Recipe is a delicious and chatpata salad recipe that addresses nutrition as well as delightfully good for taste buds too. The tangy taste that is imparted due to lemon dressing is delectable and appetizing.

name: Satvik Carrot Sprouts Salad Recipe - No Onion No Garlic
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  gajjar, capsicum, moongphali
description: This Satvik Carrot Sprouts Salad Recipe is a No Onion No Garlic salad which is made from freshly grated carrots and sprouts, with a hint of lemon. This recipe can be made with simple and ingredients easily available in your kitchen.

name: Homemade Doodh Peda Recipe - Milk Peda
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  elaichi, salted
description: Doodh Peda is an easy Indian sweet recipe made with condensed milk and milk powder and flavored with cardamom and pistachios. The traditional recipe requires you to condense the milk at home, but this recipe of Doodh Peda makes the process easier by using the ready condensed milk.

name: Andhra Style Vankaya Kothimeera Karam Recipe - Brinjal Cooked With Spicy Coriander Mix Recipe
main_tag: andhra lunch vegetarian  bainganeggplant, raikadugu, split, dhania, jeera
description: Vankaya Kothimeera Karam recipe is a classic Andhra style brinjal cooked in a very aromatic spicy coriander masala.

name: आंध्रा स्टाइल वांकाया कोथिमीरा करम रेसिपी - Andhra Style Vankaya Kothimeera Karam Recipe
main_tag: andhra lunch vegetarian
description: आंध्रा स्टाइल वांकाया कोथिमीरा करम रेसिपी एक आंध्रा स्टाइल बैंगन की सब्ज़ी है जिसमे धनिया मसाला का प्रयोग किया जाता है. वो एक फ़्लवेरफुल सब्ज़ी है जिसे आप रसम चावल या पराठे के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: Thandai Flavoured Rice Kheer Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  badam, elaichi, badam, elaichi, dalchini
description: Rice Kheer is an Indian desert which is made from rice, milk and sugar flavoured with cardamom powder and saffron. You can even use rose water or kewra water in this recipe.

name: Sing Paak Recipe - Spiced Peanut Burfi
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  moongphali
description: Sing Paak or Peanut Burfi is a delectable Gujarati sweet that is quick and easy to put together and has a subtle flavour. ‘Singha’ is the name for peanuts in Gujarat, and the Sing Paak Barfi is a nutritious twist to the normal barfi.

name: Gluten Free Rajgira Burfi Recipe
main_tag: northindian snack vegetarian  amaranthflour, elaichi
description: Diwali is just around the corner! I'm sure most of you have planned family get togethers, festive lunches and dinners. Festivals are such a wonderful time for family to get together and spend some quality time. But this barfi is a healthy one!

name: Dry Fruit Burfi Recipe With Gulkand
main_tag: northindian snack vegetarian  badam, chandikavark
description: The Dry Fruit Burfi Recipe With Gulkand is a super healthy and delicious sweet that you must make either for a quick energy booster or for festivals. This recipe has a slight twist to it with the addition of Gulkand. Gulkand is a flavored jam made from rose petals and when added to sweets like this Dry fruit Burfi, brings out great flavors and taste.

name: Konkani Style Mande/Mandige/Chavde Recipe-Thin fried pancakes stuffed with sweet coconut Recipe
main_tag: konkan dessert vegetarian  puri, maida, tilseeds, elaichi
description: Chavde also known as Mande or Mandige is traditional Maharashtrian and Konkani specially that is made from fried bread made from flour that is stuffed with a delicious blend of grated and roasted coconut, cardamom powder, sugar and sesame seeds. The Chavde is also a popular sweet that is made for Ganesh Chaturthi festival.

name: Tamil Nadu Style Arachuvitta Rasam Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  haldi, jeera, dhania, raikadugu, hing, splittoordal, jeera
description: Arachuvitta Rasam Recipe, is an aromatic and flavourful recipe. It is also known as the Kalyana Rasam, prepared during the weddings with the freshly available ingredients. It is prepared with the freshly ground rasam spice mix, which makes all the difference.

name: Lemon Rasam Recipe - Nimbe Saaru Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  splittoordal, haldi, haldi, dhania, jeera, dhania, raikadugu, jeera, hing
description: The Lemon Rasam Recipe, is a delicious spicy and tangy rasam that is made very simple using dal and tomatoes and flavored with ginger, green chillies and lemon.

name: North Karnataka Style Nuggekai Kharbyaali Recipe-Spiced Drumstick Sambar
main_tag: northkarnataka lunch highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, optional, raikadugu, jeera, hing, dhania
description: North Karnataka Spiced Drumstick Sambar also known as Nuggekai Kharbyaali is a traditional sambar curry made with a special spice powder - bhakri/ jowar/phulkas.

name: Coriander Tadka Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, dhania, jeera, pudina, jeera
description: Coriander Tadka Raita is a refreshing raita made with fresh coriander leaves and smooth yogurt, with a lovely jeera-garlic tadka for added flavour.

name: Homemade Lemon Sevai Recipe - Lemon Idiyappam Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  haldi, raikadugu, split, moongphali, gingelly
description: The Homemade Lemon Sevai Recipe, is a traditional south indian recipe that is made from from freshly ground rice using a traditional sevai maker.

name: ऑरेंज रसम रेसिपी - Orange Rasam Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  ऑर  जक रस
description: ऑरेंज रसम एक स्वादिष्ट रसम है जिसमे रसम बनाकर उसमे ऑरेंज(संतरे) का रस मिलाया जाता है. ऑरेंज को रसम में मिलाने से रसम में खट्टा मीठा स्वाद आता है. इस रेसिपी को बनाए और हमे जरूर बताए की यह आपको कैसी लगी?

name: Maharashtrian Style Kala Chana Cooked In Koli Masala Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch highproteinvegetarian  brownchickpeas, jeera, dhania, jeera, dhania, haldi, dhania, malabartamarind
description: Maharashtra has varied cuisines associated with it, and Koli cuisine is one of them. Koli is the the fishermen community and are the inhabitants of Mumbai. Though seafood forms an integral part of their Cuisine, there are few interesting vegetarian recipes too. The secret lies in the freshly prepared koli masala, which is robust in flavours. Kala Chana Cooked in Koli Masala has a vibrant amalgamation of flavourful spices. It is simple yet quite delectable on the palate.

name: Konkani Style Solkadhi Recipe - Kokum Drink
main_tag: konkan sidedish vegetarian  malabartamarind, dhania, jeera, pudina
description: Solkadhi or a digestive kadhi made of kokum (a plant of the mangosteen family) is very refreshing and tasty drink, a speciality of Konkan region that extends from Goa through Maharashtra.

name: Ulava Charu Recipe - Spicy Andhra Horse Gram Rasam
main_tag: southindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  kollukulith, haldi, raikadugu, split
description: Ulava Charu Recipe is a authentic Andhra recipe where you cook the horse gram in a rasam form.  The Horse gram is cooked by itself in a pressure cooker and then immersed in a flavourful onion, tomato and coconut base not to forget the red chillies that lend the apt amount of heat into this dish.

name: कुम्भ पुलाव रेसिपी - Spiced Kumbh Pulao Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian  हर,
description: कुम्भ पुलाव सरल पुलाव है जिसमे मशरुम का प्रयोग किया जाता है. अगर आपको मशरुम पसंद है तो, इस रेसिपी को जरूर बनाए। इसे बनाने में  कम समय लगता है इसलिए आप इसे अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते हो.

name: केरला स्टाइल कच्चा केला और सुरन कोटु करी रेसिपी - Kerala Style Plantain & Yam Thoran Recipe
main_tag: kerala dinner vegetarian
description: केरला स्टाइल कच्चा केला और सुरन कोटु करी रेसिपी एक केरला स्टाइल डिश है जिसमे येम, प्लान्टेन और नारियल का प्रयोग किया जाता है. नारियल डालने से इस सब्ज़ी में ग्रैनी टेक्सचर आता है. यह रेसिपी को ओणम सध्या पर बनाया जाता है.

name: पुली कुज़ह रेसिपी - Puli Koozh Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian
description: पुली कुज़ह रेसिपी एक पारम्परिक दक्षिण भारतीय रेसिपी है जिसे सुबह के नाश्ते के लिए बनाया जाता है. इस रेसिपी में चावल के आटे को इमली के पानी में पकाया जाता है. इसे अपने किचन में जरूर बनाए और हमे बताए की आपको यह कैसी लगी?

name: गुट्टी वांकाया रेसिपी - Gutti Vankaya Recipe
main_tag: andhra lunch vegetarian  सफ़ द
description: गुट्टी वांकाया रेसिपी, आंध्रा की एक प्रसिद्ध रेसिपी है जिसमे बैंगन को मसाले से भरा जाता है. आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है या फिर अपने मेहमानो के लिए भी परोस सकते है. यह एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जो फ्लेवर और स्वाद से भरपूर है.

name: Carrot Beans Thoran Recipe - Kerala Thoran For Onam Sadya
main_tag: kerala dinner vegetarian  jeera, gajjar, frenchbeans, raikadugu, split, sambaronions, haldi
