description: Carrot And Beans Thoran is a classic recipe from the Kerala Cuisine, which is packed with flavors from coconut and green chillies. The addition of small pearl onions along with curry leaves, makes this thoran really delicious. It can be prepared with various vegetables like cabbage, ladies finger, drumstick, spinach/ palak and many more vegetables.

name: Sindhi Toor Dal Recipe With Aam Papad - Aam Papad Dal Recipe
main_tag: sindhi lunch vegetarian  splittoordal, sundriedmango, haldi, dhania, jeera, fenugreekseeds
description: Dal is quintessential part of the Indian Cuisine and every region and household has its own variation of preparing the same. This Sindhi Toor Dal Recipe is a simple dal cooked everyday in a Sindhi household. Though the process of making a simple dal tadka remains the same, what makes it different from the other arhar or toor dal recipe is the use of the dry mango in this recipe.

name: Bharwa Besan Mirch Sabzi Recipe - Chillies Stuffed With Spiced Gram Flour
main_tag: rajasthani lunch vegetarian  largegreenchilli, nonspicy, besan, jeera, hing, drymangopowder, haldi, dhania, dhania
description: Bharwa Besan Mirch Sabzi Recipe is made by stuffing spiced sautéed besan in the badi hari mirch or bajji chillies.

name: खमंग ककड़ी रेसिपी - Khamang Kakdi Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian sidedish vegetarian
description: खमंग ककड़ी एक स्वादिष्ट और सरल महाराष्ट्रियन सलाद है जिसमे ककड़ी को दही के साथ मिलकर उसमे तड़का दिया जाता है. तड़के के लिए कढ़ी पत्ता, हरी मिर्च और राइ का इस्तेमाल किया जाता है. ककड़ी गर्मियों के मौसम के लिए पर्याप्त है इसलिए आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के साथ बना सकते है.

name: Vazhaithandu Lemon Rasam Recipe - Banana Stem Lemon Rasam
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  dahiyogurt, dhania, jeera, haldi, splittoordal, raikadugu, jeera, hing, dhania
description: The Vazhaithandu Lemon Rasam Recipe also known as the Banana Stem Lemon Rasam Plantain stem  The Vazhaithandu rasam consumes very less time when compared to other dishes. We do not remove the thin string fiber from the banana stem for this recipe.

name: Lehsun Methi Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  fenugreekleaves, dahiyogurt, jeera, kalanamak, kalanamak
description: Methi Raita with Garlic is perfect recipe to serve as side dish with your lunch or dinner. It is easy to make and good for health. It’s a smart way to add green vegetable in your food. It can be served with parathas or theplas for a simple meal.

name: Maharashtrian Tindora Sabzi With Peanuts Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian sidedish diabeticfriendly  dondakayakovakkai, dhania, moongphali, haldi, raikadugu
description: Tindora or Tendli, as Ivy gourds are popularly known, is an iron rich vegetable. It has numerous health benefits including, keeping the nervous systems healthy, increasing the metabolism, and keeping the digestive tract healthy. It is also known to be super food producing natural insulin, making it very favourable for people suffering from high blood sugar.

name: Spicy Poppy Seeds Pulao Recipe - Gasa Gasala Saddi
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  leftoverrice, jeera, haldi, raikadugu, split
description: The Spicy Poppy Seed Pulao or the Gasa Gasala Saddi (Saddi meaning leftover rice) is delicious poppy seed flavoured rice that is a staple in most South Indian kitchens. The poppy seed rice recipe is easy to prepare made with a delicious blend of spices.

name: Kathirikai Poondu Pirattal Recipe - South Indian Style Brinjal Stir Fry With Garlic
main_tag: chettinad lunch vegetarian  haldi, raikadugu, split, hing
description: Kathirikai Poondu Pirattal Recipe is an aromatic brinjal stir fry dish with the dominant flavour of garlic . The homemade roasted sambar powder renders a beautiful flavor to the regular brinjal. This recipe is a specialty of the Chettinad region of Tamil Nadu.

name: Rose Flavoured Shahi Tukda Recipe
main_tag: hyderabadi dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Shahi Tukda is an Indian dessert which is basically a variant of a  bread pudding made of fried bread slices served with rabri. This version of Rose Flavoured Shahi Tukda Recipe includes rose water which gives it a distinctive sweetish flavour and aroma.

name: Moru Kachiyathu Recipe - Kerala Style Seasoned Buttermilk
main_tag: kerala sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, pearlonions, haldi, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds
description: Moru Kachiyathu Recipe is a simple and delicious Kerala style seasoned buttermilk which is prepared every day in a Malayalee household. Moru means buttermilk in Malayalam, and no south indian meal is complete without the last course of rice had with curd or buttermilk.

name: स्मोक्ड ढाबा दाल रेसिपी - Smoked Dhaba Dal Recipe
main_tag: punjabi lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: स्मोक्ड ढाबा दाल रेसिपी एक क्लासिक रेसिपी है जिसमे बहुत सारी डालो का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें डाल को स्मोक करने के लिए कोयले का प्रयोग किया जाता है जिससे इस दाल का स्वाद और भी बढ़ जाता है. यह दाल आपको हर ढाबे पर मिलेगी और इसका स्वाद आपको बार बार वहा ले जायेगा।

name: लहसुन की चटनी रेसिपी - Lahsun ki Chutney Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian
description: लहसुन की चटनी रेसिपी जिसे गार्लिक चटनी भी कहा जाता है एक स्वादिष्ट चटनी है जिसे वड़ा पाव, चाट या किसी और डिश में इस्तेमाल किया जा सकता है. यह चटनी ज़्यदातर गुजरात और राजस्थान में बनाई जाती है. इसमें निम्बू और हरी मिर्च का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इस चटनी को और भी स्वादिष्ट भी बनाता है.

name: चना मेथी दाल रेसिपी - Chana Methi Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: चना मेथी दाल एक स्वादिष्ट दाल है जिसमे चने की दाल को मेथी के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह बहुत ही सेहतमंद रेसिपी है क्यूंकि इसमें प्रोटीन के साथ साथ आयरन भी होता है. आप इस दाल को अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बनाए और इसका आनंद ले. यह बनाने में बहुत आसान है और इसमें बहुत कम सामग्री की आवश्यकता होती है.

name: Palak Pappu Recipe - Andhra Style Palakura Pappu - Dal Palak
main_tag: southindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, haldi, palak, raikadugu, jeera, split
description: Palak pappu also known as Palakura Pappu is a nutrition dense and protein rich dal palak recipe is very famous down south of india.

name: Rajasthani Pyaaz Ki Kadhi Recipe - Onion Kadhi Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani sidedish highproteinvegetarian  dahiyogurt, besan, haldi, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, hing, jeera, dhania
description: Rajasthani Pyaaz Ki Kadhi Recipe is a simple to make warm and comforting dish. It makes use of very few ingredients, making it an idle dish to prepare when you run out of ingredients in your kitchen pantry.

name: राजस्थानी प्याज की कढ़ी रेसिपी - Rajasthani Pyaaz Ki Kadhi Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani sidedish highproteinvegetarian
description: राजस्थानी प्याज की कढ़ी रेसिपी एक सरल रेसिपी है जिसे आप सर्दियों के रात के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. इसमें बहुत कम सामग्री की आवश्यकता होती है और बहुत कम समय में बन भी जाती है. इसमें दो बार तड़का दिया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद और फ्लेवर को और भी बढ़ा देता है.

name: Green Beans Poriyal Recipe With Peanuts & Sesame Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch diabeticfriendly  frenchbeans, raikadugu, jeera, tilseeds, moongphali
description: Green Beans Poriyal With Peanuts & Sesame Recipe is a simple stir fry recipe with stir fried green beans/ haricot beans cooked with a spice mix of sesame seeds and peanuts. Green Beans provide a wealth of nutrients in addition to being a versatile and delicious element in many culinary preparations.

name: आलुची भाजी रेसिपी - Aluchi Bhaji Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: आलुची भाजी रेसिपी एक महाराष्ट्रियन करी है जिसमे अरबी के पत्तो का इस्तेमाल किया जाता है. इसमें प्याज और लहसुन का प्रयोग नहीं किया जाता, इसलिए आप इसे अपने त्यौहार के खाने के लिए भी बना सकते है. आप इसे किसी ख़ास अवसर के लिए पूरी और रायते के साथ भी बना सकते है.

name: Soya Keema Matar Masala Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner highproteinvegetarian  nuggets, matar, dhania, haldi, dhania
description: Soya Keema masala is a delicious vegetarian keema that can be prepared quickly and easily. In this recipe, you just need to soak soya granules in water, pulse it in the mixer and then cook it in masala along with the peas.

name: Ellu Chutney Recipe - Sesame Seeds Chutney Recipe
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian  split, raikadugu
description: Ellu Chutney also known as the Sesame Seeds Chutney Recipe is one of the popular accompaniment recipes from South India. It is usually made using black sesame. Sesame with its nutty taste and flavor gives a unique taste to this til ki chutney. Serve Ellu Chutney (Sesame Seeds Chutney Recipe) as a side dish to your favorite idli / dosa recipe.

name: एल्लु चटनी रेसिपी - Ellu Chutney Recipe
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian
description: एल्लु चटनी रेसिपी एक बहुत ही प्रसिद्ध रेसिपी है जिसे दक्षिण भारत के घरो में बनाया जाता है. इसमें काले तिल का प्रयोग किया जाता है. यह एक आसान रेसिपी है और इसे आप अपने सुबह के नाश्ते के साथ भी परोस सकते है.

name: Gorikayi Palya Recipe - Karnataka Style Gawar Phali Sabzi
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian  kothavarangaiclusterbeans, raikadugu, tilseeds
description: Gorikayi Palya is a dry sabzi recipe prepared with cluster beans or gawar phali. This is an easy recipe with scraped fresh coconut and spices. This makes a great recipe for lunch box as well.

name: Paneer Pyaz Paratha Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, dhania, dhania
description: Paneer Pyaz Paratha Recipe is a favourite of every North Indian household.

name: Khamang Kakdi Recipe - Maharashtrian Cucumber Salad
main_tag: maharashtrian sidedish vegetarian  dhania, moongphali, dahiyogurt, raikadugu, hing
description: Khamang Kakdi is a delicious Maharashtrian style side dish recipe where cucumber and yogurt is mixed and is tempered with curry leaves, green chillies and mustard seeds.

name: Malvani Anda Curry Recipe - Egg Curry With Spicy Malvani Masala
main_tag: malvani sidedish eggetarian  dhania, haldi, jeera, malabartamarind
description: Malvani Anda Curry Recipe is an Egg curry flavoured with added Spicy Malvani Masala. Malvani cuisine is known for its spicy, tart non vegetarian delicacies. Malvani masala is almost a core ingredient that is used in most recipes from that region of Maharashtra.

name: मालवानी अंडा करी रेसिपी - Malvani Anda Curry Recipe
main_tag: malvani sidedish eggetarian
description: मालवानी अंडा करी रेसिपी, बनाने में आसान और स्वाद से भरपूर, यह अंडा करी हर मालवणी घर में बनाई जाती है. इसमें मालवानी मसाले का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इस करी को अलग बनाता है.

name: Dhaba Style Egg Curry Recipe in Electric Pressure Cooker
main_tag: northindian dinner eggetarian  jeera, raikadugu, hing, laung, tejpatta, badielaichi, elaichi, dahiyogurt, haldi, dhania, dhania
description: The taste of Dhaba food is phenomenal and we usually find these dhabas on highways. They cook some amazing dishes in traditional style which enhances the flavour of the dish. Dhaba Style Egg Curry is one such recipe which is spicy, tasty and full of flavours.

name: ढाबा स्टाइल एग करी रेसिपी - Dhaba Style Egg Curry Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner eggetarian
description: ढाबे के खाने की कुछ अलग ही बात होती है. तीखा, मसालेदार और देसी घी में बना हुआ, यह खाना सबको पसंद आता है. इसलिए आज हम यहाँ ढाबा स्टाइल एग करी की रेसिपी लेकर आए है जिसे आप अपने घर पर भी बना सकते है. यह स्वादिष्ट होने के साथ साथ बाहर सरल भी है.

name: Bengali Jhinge Narkol Chenchki Recipe - Stir Fried Ridge Gourd With Coconut
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian  turaipeerkangai, tejpatta, raikadugu, jeera, haldi
description: The Bengali Jhinge Narkol Chenchki Recipe is a traditional Bengali dry vegetable sabzi made from ridge gourd that is tossed in a delicious blend of roasted masalas, mustard paste and coconut. Jhinge (Ridge gourd) is very common among Bengalis. Jhinge is used in fish curries and in dals as well.

name: Spicy Mullangi Thogayal Recipe (Radish Chutney)
main_tag: southindian sidedish diabeticfriendly  radish, split, haldi, hing, gingelly, split, raikadugu
description: Radish is a high fibre root vegetable. Regular intake of radish help one remain younger and healthier. It protects us from seasonal cold and cough that is prevalent in this monsoon season. The Mullangi Thogayal is a spicy chutney that tastes great when mixed with rice and ghee. It can be a great side dish for rotis or phulkas. Radish is grated and is sautéed along with ginger, tamarind and chillies. They are then coarsely ground along with roasted lentils. The pachadi is a quick gluten free and vegan recipe.

name: मुलांगी थोगयल रेसिपी -  Mullangi Thogayal Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish diabeticfriendly  स प ल ट, स प ल ट
description: मूली उन सब्ज़िओ में से एक है जिसमे फाइबर की मात्रा अधिक होती है, इसलिए यह आपकी सेहत के लिए अच्छी भी मानी जाती है. इसलिए यहाँ हमने मूली से चटनी बनाई है जिसे दक्षिण भारत में मुलांगी थोगयल कहा जाता है. यह एक तीखी चटनी है जिसे दक्षिण भारत में चावल और घी के साथ कहाया जाता है.

name: Sobji Diye Bhaja Muger Dal Recipe - Bengali Style Moong Dal with Winter Vegetables
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian  split, haldi, gobi, matar, frenchbeans, parangikaipumpkin, jeera, tejpatta, dalchini, laung, elaichi
description: The Sobji Diye Bhaja Muger Dal is delicately flavored with ghee and cumin to let the aroma of dry roasted yellow mung shine through. In winter vegetables are added to make it more nutritious. Dal or lentil is the second important protein for Bengalis after fish. They need to have a ladleful of any lightly flavored lentil dish for their meal everyday. In a Bengali style of eating, Dal is eaten as a second or third course with some fritter or stir fries.

name: सोबजी दीए भाजा मुगेर दाल रेसिपी - Sobji Diye Bhaja Muger Dal Recipe
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian
description: दाल एक ऐसी डिश है जिसे भारत के हर घर में बनाया जाता है और इसे रोज के खाने में भी मिलाया जाता है क्यूंकि इसमें प्रोटीन की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है. आज हम यहाँ बंगाली स्टाइल दाल बना रहे है जिसे आप किसी भी सब्ज़ी और फुल्के के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: करेला कढ़ी रेसिपी - Karela Kadhi Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani sidedish diabeticfriendly
description: कढ़ी, उत्तर भारतीय डिश है जिसे हर घर में बनाया जाता है. यह गर्मी और सर्दी दोनों में बनाई जाती है. ज्यादातर लोग साधारण कढ़ी बनाते है लेकिन यहाँ हमने इस कढ़ी में करेले का भी प्रयोग किया है. अलग अलग राज्यों में इसे अलग तरह से बनाया जाता है. कढ़ी को बनाने के लिए बेसन और दही को मिलकर इसमें तड़का दिया जाता है.

name: Pudina Lehsun Laccha Paratha Recipe - Mint Garlic Layered Paratha
main_tag: northindian maincourse vegetarian  pudina
description: Pudina Lehsun Laccha Paratha is a wonderful twist to the classic Laccha paratha recipe where the flour is combined along with fresh mint leaves chopped garlic and green chillies adding to the the twist of taste.

name: Kesar Paneer Ki Kheer Recipe - Cottage Cheese Milk Pudding
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, elaichi, badam, chandikavark
description: Kesar Paneer Ki Kheer Recipe is a quick and simple dessert that you can make when you have unexpected guests at home. The taste and flavors and texture of this kheer is similar to that of rasmalai. The only difference between the Rasmalai and the Paneer ki Kheer is that the paneer is added as a crumble into the condensed milk, making this dish, really simple to make.

name: हरियाली अंडे की करी रेसिपी - Hariyali Egg Curry Recipe In Coriander and Mint Gravy
main_tag: indian lunch eggetarian
description: हरियाली अंडे की करी रेसिपी, स्वाद से भरपूर करी है जिसमे ग्रेवी बनाने के लिए धनिये और पुदीना का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसके साथ इसमें रोज के मसालो का प्रयोग किया जाता है. धनिया और पुदीना का प्रयोग इस करी को ताज़ा और फ्लेवर से भरपूर बनाता है. आप इसे अपने रोज के होने के लिए बना सकते है.

name: Jeera Hing Aloo Recipe - No Onion No Garlic Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  jeera, hing, haldi, dhania, drymangopowder, dhania
description: Potato is one of the most popular vegetables that is loved by everyone, all over the world. This humble vegetable tastes delicious in all forms. Fry them, mash them, boil them, add them in curry, it’s all simply delicious. It would be hard to find someone who doesn’t love this vegetable.

name: Sweet Corn And Raw Mango Salad Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  raw, dhania, kalanamak
description: The Sweet Corn And Raw Mango Salad Recipe is a lip smacking combination of grated mangoes that is tossed in sweet corn, green chillies and coriander. The addition of mustard sauce makes this salad absolutely delicious.

name: Bhindi Masala Gravy Recipe - Ladies Finger In Tomato Onion Gravy
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, laung, elaichi, dalchini, javitri, dahiyogurt, driedfenugreekleaves, tejpatta, haldi, dhania
description: Bhindi Masala is a simple gravy recipe in which okra/bhindi is cooked in a tomato onion based gravy. Full of flavour and taste, this masala gravy is specially served with Biryanis. But, you can also serve it for your everyday meal along with Phulka/ Paratha and your choice of raita.

name: Bhindi Masala Gravy Recipe - Ladies Finger In Tomato Onion Gravy
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, laung, elaichi, dalchini, javitri, dahiyogurt, driedfenugreekleaves, tejpatta, haldi, dhania
description: Bhindi Masala is a simple gravy recipe in which okra/bhindi is cooked in a tomato onion based gravy. Full of flavour and taste, this masala gravy is specially served with Biryanis. But, you can also serve it for your everyday meal along with Phulka/ Paratha and your choice of raita.

name: भिंडी मसाला ग्रेवी रेसिपी - Bhindi Masala Gravy Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian
description: भिंडी मसाला एक सरल ग्रेवी रेसिपी है जिसमे भिंडी या ओकरा को टमाटर और प्याज की ग्रेवी में बनाया जाता है. फ्लेवर से भरपूर, इस सब्ज़ी को बिरयानी के साथ परोसा जाता है. लेकिन आप इसे अपने पराठा और फुल्का के साथ भी परोस सकते है.

name: Chichinda Ki Sabzi Recipe -Uttar Pradesh Style Snake Gourd Stir Fry
main_tag: uttarpradesh sidedish vegetarian  pudulangai, preferablylengthwise, besan, haldi, drymangopowder, raikadugu, bengalgramdal
description: Chichinda Ki Sabzi Recipe (Uttar Pradesh Style Snake Gourd Stir Fry) is an easy and quick to make during weeknights and can also be packed for lunch boxes. The snake gourds are cooked in minimal spices and roasted chickpea flour that imparts a nutty flavour.

name: Punjabi Style Boondi Kadhi Recipe
main_tag: punjabi sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, sour, besan, haldi, laung, jeera, fenugreekseeds, hing, laung, jeera, fenugreekseeds, hing
description: Punjabi Style Boondi Kadhi Recipe is a popular kadhi in Rajasthan and Punjab. Methi seeds are rich in iron and lentils are rich in proteins. It is a soothing side dish that is apt to have during hot days.

name: पंजाबी स्टाइल बूंदी कढ़ी रेसिपी - Punjabi Style Boondi Kadhi Recipe
main_tag: punjabi sidedish vegetarian
description: पंजाबी स्टाइल बूंदी कढ़ी रेसिपी एक प्रसिद्ध कढ़ी है जिसे राजस्थान और पंजाब में बनाया जाता है. इसमें मेथी के दाने भी डाले जाते है जो इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ाते है. यह एक ताज़ा डिश है जिसे आप गर्मियों के दिनों में बना सकते है.

name: मटर बेसन और पनीर चीला रेसिपी - Matar Besan And Paneer Cheela Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast vegetarian
description: चीला एक डोसा जैसी रेसिपी है जिसमे बेसन का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसे हर उत्तर भारत के घर में सुबह के नाश्ते के लिए बनाया जाता है. इसे बनाने में बहुत कम समय लगता है और आप इसे अपनी पसंद की चटनी के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: Spiced Kumbh Pulao Recipe - Spicy Mushroom Rice
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian  matar, capsicum, jeera, hing
description: Spiced Kumbh Pulao Recipe is basically marinated rice with mushrooms. If you love mushrooms, you can't resist yourself adding this 'Tandoori' dish in your North-Indian menu. This makes for a great weekday dinner. It is a quick and easy recipe and does not take up too much time to prepare.

name: Kadai Broccoli Masala Recipe - Broccoli Cooked With Indian Spices
main_tag: northindian maincourse vegetarian  capsicum, badielaichi, driedfenugreekleaves, dhania, jeera, saunf
description: A lip smacking dish, the Kadai Broccoli Masala Recipe is a delicious gravy made using freshly ground kadai masala with the goodness of Broccoli. A twist of Broccoli to the North Indian classic, Kadai gravy. This is a simple recipe and gets ready in very less time, therefore you can make it for your everyday lunch.

name: Mixed Vegetable Jalfrezi Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  gajjar, frenchbeans, capsicum, matar, haldi, dhania, driedfenugreekleaves, dhania, jeera
description: Mixed Vegetable Jalfrezi is a popular North Indian side dish that you can make for your everyday meals. It is dry stir fry prepared by sauteing vegetables of your choice with select spices.

name: Kathirikai Podi Curry Recipe (Roasted Brinjal with Spices)
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish vegetarian  bainganeggplant, gingelly, raikadugu, haldi, hing
description: Kathirikai Podi Curry Recipe is a very traditional South Indian style vegetable made from roasted brinjals also known as aubergine or eggplant. The spice powder varies from home to home and most often the sambar powder is used along with a little cinnamon powder. The Brinjal Podi Curry recipe is a quick and easy vegetable for a weeknight dinner.

name: कथीरिकै पौड़ी करी रेसिपी - Kathirikai Podi Curry Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish vegetarian
description: कथीरिकै पौड़ी करी रेसिपी, एक पारम्परिक दक्षिण भारतीय रेसिपी है जिसमे बैंगन का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें सांबर पाउडर और दालचीनी पाउडर का भी इस्तेमाल किया जाता है जो इसे और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है. आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है या फिर अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: केरला वेंडकई थोरन रेसिपी - Kerala Vendakkai Thoran Recipe
main_tag: kerala dinner vegetarian
description: केरला वेंडकई थोरन रेसिपी, एक सरल दक्षिण भारतीय रेसिपी है जिसमे भिंडी को प्याज, हरी मिर्च और नारियल के साथ पकाया जाता है. आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बनाए या फिर अपने लंच बॉक्स में पैक करें।

name: Manipuri Style Karotkhabi Kanghou Recipe - Bitter Gourd & Potato Stir Fry
main_tag: northeastindia lunch vegetarian  bittergourdpavakkai, aloo, jeera, haldi
description: Karotkhabi Kanghou is a Manipuri style vegetable dish prepared with bitter gourd and potato. Like every Northeastern state Manipur also has its own style of cooking. Generally Bitter gourd dishes are always served first in meal. This dish is good when it is serve warm with hot steamed rice.

name: Vazhakkai Varuval Recipe- Raw Banana Roast Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch diabeticfriendly  dhania, haldi, raikadugu, hing
description: Vazhakkai Varuval is a simple South Indian Style dry preparation. Vazhakkai, also known as Plantain or Raw Banana and is used extensively in the South Indian Cuisine. Vazhakkai Varuval can be made in different ways with different masalas according to you taste. We have made a flavourful, tasty Vazhakkai Varuval with everyday spices which are easily available in your pantry.

name: Kerala Style Varutharacha Sambar Recipe - Tangy Coconut Sambar Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, aloo, ashgourdwhitepumpkin, gajjar, ladyfingerokra, haldi, dhania, dhania, split, bengalgramdal, fenugreekseeds, hing, raikadugu, optional
description: Varutharacha Sambar is a delicious Kerala Style Sambar Recipe that is made from roasted coconut homemade sambar powder that adds to the authenticity and flavor of the sambar. The aromas from the ground spices when combined along with tamarind water and cooked lentils, make this sambar very delicious and festive. An Onam sadya is incomplete without the freshly prepared spicy Varutharacha Sambar. It gives the whole meal a definition and lifts the Sadya to a new dimension.

name: Aam Ki Launji Pickle Recipe - Sweet & Spicy Mango Pickle
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  raw, hing, fenugreekseeds, jeera, saunf, haldi, kalanamak
description: The Aam Ki Launji Pickle Recipe is a simple finger licking pickle made from fresh raw mangoes. The addition of methi seeds along with the hing, jaggery and other spices makes this dish stand out with perfection.

name: आम की लौंजी रेसिपी - Aam Ki Launji Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian
description: आम की लौंजी रेसिपी एक स्वाद से भरपूर साइड डिश है जिसमे आम का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें मेथी के दाने के साथ साथ हींग, गुड़ और दूसरे मसालों का प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इसे अपने खाने के साथ भी परोस सकते है या नाश्ते में पराठे के साथ परोस सकते है. आम की लौंजी को बनाकर आप स्टोर भी कर सकते है. इसे ज्यादातर उत्तर भारत के घर में बनाया जाता है.

name: Bengali Luchi Recipe - Bengali Softa Maida Puffed Puri
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian  maida
description: Bengali Luchi Recipe is the first thing that pops up in one's mind when thinking about Bengali food. These fried puffed breads are made from all purpose flour gently deep fried and to be eaten with comforting aloo curries.

name: Malabar Parotta Recipe - Kerala Parotta Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian  maida
description: Malabar Parotta or Kerala Parotta is a layered flatbread made from refined flour (maida). This is a traditional recipe from Kerala. At some places it is also served at weddings, religious festivals and feasts.

name: कीमा भिंडी रेसिपी - Keema Bhindi Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner highproteinnonvegetarian
description: कीमा एक ऐसी रेसिपी है जिसे सब पसंद करते है, जिसे आप रोटी, पराठा और चावल के साथ परोस सकते है. लेकिन यह हमने कीमा के साथ भिंडी को भी मिलाया है, जो इस डिश को क्रंच देता है. यह बनाने में बहुत आसान है और आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है.

name: Traditional Bengali Rasgulla Recipe - Cottage Cheese Balls In Sweetened Syrup
main_tag: bengali dessert vegetarian  dahiyogurt, elaichi, laung
description: Bengali rasgulla recipe is an excellent recipe for this regional classic from the state of West Bengal. Delicate cottage cheese dumplings, soaked in sugar syrup, they’re also called Rosogolla. The process has multiple steps, but yields a super soft rasgulla that is steamed and then soaked in a flavoured sugar syrup.

name: Manipuri Style Alu Kangmet Recipe - Mashed Potato In Dry Red Chillies
main_tag: northeastindia lunch vegetarian  aloo
description: Manipuri Style Alu Kangmet Recipe is simply tossed mashed potatoes in roasted dry red chillies and salt. This dish has only three ingredients and is one of the everyday dishes of manipuris.

name: Manipuri Style Chak Angouba Recipe - Vegetable Pulao Recipe
main_tag: northeastindia lunch vegetarian  gajjar, frenchbeans, jeera, haldi, dhania, optional
description: Rice is a staple food in Manipur. To make Manipuri Style Chak Angouba Recipe - Vegetable Pulao Recipe black rice is preferred  more than the normal white rice. Using black rice changes the flavour profile of Manipuri Style Chak Angouba completely. Fresh homegrown vegetables are added to make this delicious fried rice.

name: Kerala Vendakkai Thoran Recipe - Okra Stir Fry with Coconut
main_tag: kerala dinner vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, sambaronions, raikadugu, split
description: Kerala Vendakkai Thoran is a simple and delicious preparation of Okra or Bhindi flavored with pearl onions, green chilies, and coconut. This style of making vegetable is very typical to South India especially Kerala.

name: Boondi Raita Recipe Spiced With Black Salt
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, kalanamak, jeera
description: Boondi Raita Recipe is a simple and popular yogurt based dish served as an accompaniment to biryani, pulav or tehari.

name: हरा धनिया पराठा रेसिपी - Hara Dhania Paratha Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: हरा धनिया पराठा रेसिपी एक सरल पराठा रेसिपी है जिसमे धनिये का प्रयोग किया जाता है. अगर आप अपनी सब्ज़ी के साथ रोटी नहीं बनाना चाहते, तो आप यह पराठा बना सकते है.

name: अंकुरित हरे मूंग और कच्चे आम का सलाद रेसिपी - Green Moong Sprouts, Raw Mango Salad Recipe
main_tag: southindian appetizer vegetarian
description: अंकुरित हरे मूंग और कच्चे आम का सलाद रेसिपी, एक दक्षिण भारतीय सलाद है जो बनाने में बहुत आसान है और आप इसे अपने खाने के साथ या स्नैक के लिए परोस सकते है. इसमें निम्बू का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है, जो इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ाता है.

name: Maharashtrian Ghavan Recipe - Rice Flour Crepes
main_tag: maharashtrian northindianbreakfast vegetarian
description: Ghavan is a traditional breakfast recipe from Konkan region of Maharashtra. Traditionally, these are made out of brown rice flour, a pinch of salt, jeera and water to form this batter and immediately these are cooked out like dosas. But I have made it with regular rice flour as I didn’t find brown rice flour.

name: Sabudana Thalipeeth Recipe - Tapioca Pearl Spicy Flat Bread
main_tag: maharashtrian northindianbreakfast vegetarian  tapiocapearls, aloo, haldi, moongphali, dhania, jeera
description: The Sabudana Thalipeeth Recipe is a delicious Maharashtrian Gluten Free flatbread that is made from tapioca pearls and spiced with green chilies, potatoes and peanuts. The addition of potatoes to the recipe, makes it soft and acts as a binder for the thalipeeth. Also note that the turmeric powder is not added to the traditional recipe.

name: Manipuri Style Tan Ngang Recipe - Refined Flour/Maida Indian Puri Recipe
main_tag: northeastindia lunch vegetarian  maida, greekyogurt
description: Manipuri Style Tan Ngang Recipe is a Manipuri style Bread which is fried and made with refined maida flour and curd. The ingredients are mixed together to a smooth dough and then fried like a puri.

name: Ellu Kuzhambu Recipe- Sesame Seeds Kuzhambu
main_tag: southindian dinner highproteinvegetarian  sambaronions, aloo, haldi, gingelly, raikadugu, jeera, fenugreekseeds, tilseeds, split, bengalgramdal, jeera
description: Ellu Kuzhambu is a mouthwatering curry made with sesame seeds . It is a South Indian recipe which people usually serve with rice, appam or dosa. The sesame seeds are ground and then mixed with a tangy and sweet gravy made of tomatoes, tamarind and indian masalas. You can also add in extra vegetables to enrich the gravy with extra flavors and nutrients.

name: पत्ता गोभी थोरन रेसिपी - Cabbage Thoran/Poriyal Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian
description: पत्ता गोभी थोरन रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट डिश है जिसे केरला में खाने के साथ बनाया जाता है. यह एक सां रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने लंच बॉक्स में पराठे के साथ भी पैक कर सकते है. इसमें नारियल और रोज के मसलो का प्रयोग होता है जो इसे और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है.

name: Mint And Pomegranate Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  greekyogurt, pomegranateseedpowder, pudina, dhania, jeera
description: Mint and Pomegranate Raita is a delicious combination of mint, coriander and pomegranate pearls with the cool, refreshing quality of yogurt. The freshness of mint and coriander definitely make this raita a summer favorite packed with the curry.

name: Burani Raita Recipe - Garlic Based Yogurt
main_tag: hyderabadi sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, jeera, kalanamak
description: Burani raita is a creamy raita from the Hyderabadi cuisine, which is very easy and quick to prepare and pairs perfectly with spicy biryanis. This raita is not only refreshing but is packed with the flavours too. This raita has hints of garlic and roasted cumin powder.

name: Achari Paneer Recipe -Spicy Pickled Paneer Gravy
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, saunf, haldi, dhania, driedfenugreekleaves
description: Paneer is one of those food items which is loved by almost everyone. You will find many Paneer dishes are on the menu of every North Indian Restaurants and one of them is Achari Paneer. This dish is made with Paneer and it is cooked with pickled Onion and Tomato gravy. It is easy to prepare and tastes delicious.

name: South Indian Style Green Moong Sprouts, Raw Mango Salad Recipe
main_tag: southindian appetizer vegetarian  raw, gajjar, dhania, optional, raikadugu, hing
description: South Indian Style Green Moong Sprouts Raw Mango Salad Recipe is a salad dressed in a South Indian tadka with the juice of lemon. It is easy to make and can be served as a side dish or you can even have it on its own for a light dinner or as a snack.

name: Kakdi Chi Koshimbir Recipe - Maharashtrian Style Cucumber Salad
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch diabeticfriendly  dhania, moongphali, raikadugu
description: Kakdi Chi Koshimbir Recipe is a refreshing cucumber salad which has an unique flavour with the tadka added to it. It has a crunchy texture due to the addition of grated coconut and roasted crushed peanuts. It is made in almost all the Maharashtrian households during Summer.

name: Hesaru Bele Southekayi Kosambari Recipe - Cucumber Kosambari
main_tag: southindian snack highproteinvegetarian  split, dhania, raikadugu, hing
description: Hesaru Bele Southekayi Kosambari Recipe is common to every Kannadiga family's kitchen. Made with fresh cucumber, yellow moong dal and grated coconut this dish has freshness and health written all over it. Lemon Juice is added and give a slight tangy note to the kosambari. A tempering of curry leaves, hing and green chillies lifts this dish up giving it a nice South Indian flavour.

name: Kerala Style Ragi Puttu Recipe - Healthy Diabetic Friendly Recipe
main_tag: kerala southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  fingermilletnagli
description: Kerala Style Ragi Puttu Recipe are piping hot steamed rice cakes with coconut and usually paired with a gorgeous Kerala style egg roast or Kadala Curry.

name: Pavakka Theeyal Recipe - Bitter Gourd In A Roasted Coconut Gravy
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian  bittergourdpavakkai, sambaronions, haldi, adjust, fenugreekseeds, dhania, raikadugu
description: The Pavakka Theeyal Recipe is an authentic dish from Kerala where the bitter gourd is cooked along with roasted coconut, tamarind and condiments. The theeyal can be prepared with a host of vegetables like pearl onions, eggplant, yam, drumstick, snake gourd, long beans, raw cashew, bitter gourd and many others.

name: Gobi Biryani Recipe - Spiced Cauliflower Rice
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  jeera, saunf, elaichi, dalchini, haldi, gobi, jeera, pudina, dhania
description: Gobi Biryani is a delectable and simple recipe of the traditional Biryani. The Biryani is perhaps the most widely consumed rice preparation in the world with maybe a few subtle variations across borders. It is a dish made with rice and a kurma (mixture of meat, seafood, or vegetables cooked with spices and yoghurt in a thick sauce) arranged in layers, mixed together, or sometimes even cooked together.

name: Doodhi Na Muthiya Dhokla Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ snack vegetarian  lauki, besan, semolinarava, dahiyogurt, haldi, raikadugu, tilseeds, hing, dhania
description: Doodhi na muthiya is classic Gujarati breakfast dish made from a combination of flours, bottle gourd and spices. You can also use left over rice to make these Muthia Dhoklas. Traditionally these muthias are pan fried after they are steamed, but in this recipe, I will only be adding the seasoning on the top to keep the health quotient up for this wholesome breakfast recipe.

name: Paneer Matar Pulao Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch highproteinvegetarian  saunf, elaichi, dalchini, laung, tejpatta, pudina, homemadecottagecheese, matar
description: Paneer Matar Pulao Recipe is a quick nutritious rice dish flavoured with spices and paneer .

name: Spicy Tomato Pickle Recipe - South Indian Thakkali Thokku
main_tag: southindian appetizer vegetarian  raikadugu, jeera, fenugreekseeds, hing, gingelly
description: The Tomato Pickle Recipe is cooked in a Tamil Nadu style, simple and easy to make pickle that is delicious. It is also known as Thakkali Thokku in Tamil or Tomato Avakaya in Telugu speaking homes.

name: Cauliflower & Cucumber Raita Recipe (Cauliflower Yogurt Salad)
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  greekyogurt, gobi, jeera, dhania
description: Cauliflower & Cucumber Raita is a refreshing way to serve the cauliflowers and cucumbers. It is very easy to make and serves as a perfect side dish along with our weekday meals.

name: सोया पालक करी रेसिपी - Soya And Spinach Curry Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish highproteinvegetarian  palak, nuggets, pearlmillet, dahiyogurt, optional
description: सोया पालक करी में सोया को पालक की ग्रेवी में पकाया जाता है. पालक पनीर हर घर में बनाया जाता है और सब इसे पसंद भी करते है, इस सब्ज़ी में हमने पनीर की जगह सोया का प्रयोग किया है. सोया में प्रोटीन की मात्रा अधिक होती है इसलिए इसे रोज के खाने के लिए बनाना चाहिए।

name: Avocado Paratha Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  jeera, dhania
description: Avocado Paratha Recipe is a quick to make flat bread, that makes a wholesome and delicious breakfast. The creaminess of the Avocado in the paratha is keeps the paratha soft and yet crispy from the outside. You can serve it for breakfast, a quick weeknight dinner or even pack it into a kids lunch box.

name: Green Moong Dal Khichdi Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner highproteinvegetarian  split, ormoreifyouprefer, haldi, hing, dalchini
description: The Moong dal khichdi is a very traditional Indian comfort food that can be had at any time of the year. The combination of carbohydrates and protein along with spices makes this Khichdi light on the stomach. All you need to do is to serve it with a vegetable like Batata Nu Shaak (Potatoes in Gravy) or even a Kadhi Pakora making your weeknight dinners simple and healthy.

name: Sabudana Kheer Recipe - Tapioca Pearl Milk Pudding
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  tapiocapearls, elaichi, badam
description: Sabudana Kheer also known as the Sago Payasam is a very traditional Indian sweet dish made across most regions of India. Although each region has its variations, this particular recipe is a favorite at my home and is the way I have been savoring it since I was a child.

name: Vegetable Oats Upma Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  oatmeal, rolledoats, gajjar, frenchbeans, matar, haldi, raikadugu, split, dhania, forgarnish
description: The Vegetable Oats Upma Recipe can be a quick and delicious breakfast or a dinner that can be made in a jiffy. Oats made interesting with the addition of vegetables and simple tadka, lending great flavour to the upma.

name: Peppery Mushroom Biryani Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  dhania, laung, dhania, jeera, dalchini, saunf, elaichi, tejpatta, haldi, hing
description: Peppery Mushroom Biryani is simple and quick recipe that is healthy and also rich in flavours. When the biryani is made with a good quality Basmati Rice and along with the right spices the taste is delectable.

name: Onion Rava Dosa Recipe - Instant Crispy Sooji Dosa Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu southindianbreakfast vegetarian  semolinarava, maida, hing, jeera, dhania
description: Onion Rava Dosa Recipe is a delicious instant sooji dosa recipe made with semolina and flavoured with green chillies, cumin and black pepper.

name: Brown Rice Kozhukattai Recipe - Savory Brown Rice Dumplings
main_tag: kerala southindianbreakfast vegetarian  raikadugu, split
description: The Kerala Brown Rice Kozhukattai is a simple and quick recipe, that makes is a healthy and wholesome meal. There are many variations to this recipe, but I love to make it the way I have written it. Whole grains like brown rice are generally higher in fiber, containing certain other nutrients than their "white" counterparts making it healthy, and wholesome.

name: Dangar Pachadi With Grated Carrots Recipe (Urad Dal Raita)
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  split, dahiyogurt, raikadugu, hing, dhania, optional, gajjar
description: Dangar Pachadi or Urad Dal Pachadi is one of the simplest raitas that can be prepared in no time and with very few ingredients. It is popular among Thanjavur Iyers Brahmins and served along with a main course South Indian Meal consisting of Sambar, Rasam, Kootu, Rice and Sweets.

name: Beetroot Halwa Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Beetroot Halwa is a delicious fudge-like pudding that is made from grated beetroot stewed in milk and spiced with cardamom. Beets are highly nutritious and great for cardiovascular health. Its nutrition benefits come particularly from fibre, vitamins, minerals, and unique plant derived antioxidants.

name: Godhuma Dosa Recipe - Instant Whole Wheat Flour Dosa Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  hing
description: Godhuma Dosa Recipe is a nutritious instant dosa made with whole wheat flour, that is very quick to make and healthy to eat.

name: Idli Upma Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast glutenfree  sambaronions, or1largeonion, haldi, raikadugu, split, gingelly, dhania
description: Idli Upma Recipe is one of the easiest breakfast dishes that you can prepare from leftover idlis in your kitchen. You can add vegetables like carrot, tomato, peas or cabbage. A little bit of idli milagai podi mixed with this upma can make it extra delicious!

name: Pisarna Manga Recipe -Instant Raw Mango Pickle
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  raw, fenugreekseeds, kuria, raikadugu, raikuria, haldi, hing, gingelly
description: Pisarna Manga Recipe is an instant raw mango pickle that is easy to make using very few ingredients. It is a must try recipe when mangoes are in season. You can make this Instant pickle with any kind of raw mango.

name: Nellikai Chitranna Recipe - Gooseberry-Amla Rice Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  gingelly, raikadugu, whole, haldi, moongphali, fenugreekpowder, nellikaigooseberry
description: Nellikai Chitranna Recipe is a super easy and delectable dish that is loaded with the goodness of gooseberries also known as amla.  The sourness of the gooseberries along with chillies, peanuts, sesame oil when mixed along with rice, makes it a perfect one dish that can be packed into a lunch box along with buttermilk and papads.

name: Avalakki Bisi Bele Bhat Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  flattenedrice, splittoordal, mixofcarrots beans potato peas broadbeans chow chow, kopra, gingelly, raikadugu, split, hing, moongphali, orcashewnuts
description: Avalakki Bisi Bele Bhat is a super simple recipe of making the classic south indian dish using aval, also known as poha or beaten rice. The Avalakki Bisi Bele Bhat is a wholesome, hearty & delicious recipe that has the goodness of all the vegetables and lentils along with the good carbs combined into one dish.

name: Pudina Rice Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  pudina, raikadugu, split
description: The Pudina Rice Recipe also known as Mint Pulao is a refreshing dish made from mint leaves. The Pudina Rice is among the all-time favorites dishes of my kids and makes its way into the lunch box with ease along with bowl of yogurt. The addition of pudina makes this rice dish nutritious as well.

name: Carrot Badam Kheer Recipe - Carrot Almond Milk Pudding
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  gajjar, badam, optional
description: Carrot Badam Kheer is a delicious milk pudding that can be had either warm or cold. The addition of milk, carrots and dates makes this kheer very nutritious and wholesome too. It is extremely simple to make, and with no added sugars, it is delicious and healthy too. Make it for a festive occasion or even for a nutritious treat post a weekend meal.

name: Bengali Bhog Khichuri Recipe - Bengali Khichdi Using Electric Pressure Cooker
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian  split, jeera, elaichi, dalchini, laung, tejpatta, aloo, gobi, haldi, jeera
description: “Bengali Bhog Khichuri” is a traditional version of Khichdi which basically is a mixture of rice and pulses cooked together. This particular recipe is a popular Bengali cuisine which is often made during pooja or special occasions and offered as Prasadam to Maa Durga. The specialty of this Khichdi is the rice used in it. It’s special rice which is known as “Gobindo bhog” and is jam packed with fragrance.

name: Kumbalakai Majjige Huli Recipe- Ash Gourd Buttermilk Curry
main_tag: coastalkarnataka sidedish vegetarian  ashgourdwhitepumpkin, bengalgramdal, dahiyogurt, raikadugu, jeera, hing
description: Kumbalakai Majjige Huli Recipe is a traditional South Indian recipe, a must for functions and festivals. It is a tangy curry made from buttermilk and coconut. This curry is usually made with water based vegetables like Bengaluru cucumber, white pumpkin, squash or snake guard. Okra is also a great vegetable that goes well in Majjige Huli.

name: Khara Avalakki Recipe (Karnataka Style Poha)
main_tag: karnataka southindianbreakfast vegetarian  flattenedrice, raikadugu, bengalgramdal, split, haldi, hing, dhania, moongphali
description: Khara Avalakki Recipe (Karnataka Style Poha) is very popularly made for breakfast or a evening tiffin in Karnataka. It is a quick snack made from beaten rice that is spiced and flavored with coconut and an aromatic seasoning. Serve the Khara Avalakki along with a Green Coriander and Coconut Chutney Recipe or simply as it is along with a strong filter coffee.

name: Karnataka Style Guliappa Recipe (Gundponglu/Paniyaram/Paddu)
main_tag: karnataka southindianbreakfast vegetarian  sambaronions, dhania, jeera, hing, ifpreviouslynotaddedtothebatter
description: Guliappa also known as Gundponglu or Paniyaram or Paddu is a delicious breakfast dish that is made from the dosa batter. If you are tired of having just dosa's, this is a great dish to bring flavors and textures.

name: पालक तौव्वे रेसिपी - Palak Tovve Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish highproteinvegetarian
description: पालक तौव्वे जिसे पालक दाल भी कहा जाता है, एक स्वादिष्ट और सरल दाल रेसिपी है जिसमे पालक भी डाला जाता है. यह स्वादिष्ट तो है ही साथ में पोषण से भरपूर भी है. आप इसे अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: Sooji Upma Recipe With Coconut
main_tag: karnataka southindianbreakfast vegetarian  semolinarava, matar, raikadugu, bengalgramdal, split, hing, dhania
description: This Sooji Upma Recipe with Coconut makes a delicious a hot and savory breakfast dish. It is traditionally prepared with with rava also known as sooji or semolina and topped with a generous amount of coconut to add to the taste.

name: Onion Rava Dosa Recipe - Spiced Semolina Crepe
main_tag: tamilnadu southindianbreakfast vegetarian  semolinarava, maida, dhania, jeera
description: Onion Rava Dosa is a simple variation to the very famous rava dosa, as name says this recipe has onion inside. There is no grinding or fermentation required to make these tasty rava dosa so it is quick and easy to prepare at any time.

name: Rajasthani Ghevar Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani snack vegetarian  maida, haldi
description: Ghevar is a Rajasthani easy sweet recipes specially made on Festivals in rainy season like the Teej and Raksha Bandhan. The reason why ghevar recipe is made only during the rains is that a degree of moisture is necessary. It is a round plate-shaped sweet which is made with flour, ghee and milk mixture and deep fried in oil. It is also known as Honeycomb dessert and is one of the best dessert recipes.

name: Gulab Jamun Recipe With Khoya
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  mawa, maida, ifneeded, elaichi
description: Gulab Jamun with Khoya is a rich and delicious Indian dessert prepared from unsweetened milk solids. Mawa can be prepared at home by boiling milk till it is reduced to half and you get solids. Or you can also use a store bought one to prepare gulab jamun.

name: Paruppu Payasam Recipe - Stewed Dal Coconut Milk Payasam
main_tag: kerala dessert vegetarian  split, bengalgramdal, elaichi
description: The Paruppu Payasam is a very traditional South Indian payasam/kheer recipe made from moong dal and chana dal, coconut milk,cardamom and dark jaggery. The coconut milk makes the payasam silky and creamy. The flavour combination of the payasam is so good that you cannot stop at just one bowl.

name: Keema Bhindi Masala Recipe - Okra & Minced Meat Curry
main_tag: northindian dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  ladyfingerokra, haldi, dhania, driedfenugreekleaves, dhania
description: Non-vegetarians simply love keema. I do, too. Keema is the minced meat which can be cooked in various ways and served with rice, parathas or poori. The options to cook with Keema are wide. Make a simple curry with keema as it is, or make balls and fry it, or add it to your pasta or lasagne, make kebabs from minced meat, the list goes.

name: Mullangi Poriyal recipe - South Indian Style Radish Stir Fry
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  radish, gingelly, raikadugu
description: Mullangi Poriyal recipe is a simple and quick preparation which is perfect for the weekdays. It not only tastes great when it is hot but also at room temperature, making it a good option for lunch box. Radish is known to be very healthy because of its high water content and fibre. This sabzi gives an option to use the leaves as well.

name: कश्मीरी पनीर ग्रेवी रेसिपी - Kashmiri Paneer Gravy Recipe
main_tag: kashmiri maincourse vegetarian
description: कश्मीरी पनीर ग्रेवी रेसिपी एक प्रसिद्ध रेसिपी है जिसमे पनीर को तल के टमाटर की ग्रेवी में पकाया जाता है. यह एक आसान रेसिपी है जिस कश्मीर के बहुत से घरो में रोज के खाने बनाया जाता है. अगर आप पनीर से कोई नयी ग्रेवी बनाना चाहते है, तो यह ग्रेवी जरूर बनाए।

name: Raw Mango Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  ripe, dahiyogurt, jeera, raikadugu, hing
description: Raw Mango Raita Recipe is an excellent way to make the most of the last of the mangoes as this wonderful season has almost come to a close. This raita is refreshing, cool and tasty, and goes equally well with rotis as well as rice dishes. The Raw Mango Raita makes a great accompaniment along with Mixed Rice Dishes and biryanis as well.

name: Whole Wheat Spinach Paratha Recipe
main_tag: indian northindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  dhania, palak, caromseeds
description: Whole Wheat Spinach Paratha is a healthy paratha which is perfect to serve for your weekday breakfast or dinners. It is simple recipe to make and since palak is usually available throughout the year you can make it anytime. To make the parathas spinach is pureed along with coriander, garlic and chilies and then mixed with whole wheat.

name: भिंडी टमाटर सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Bhindi Tomato Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian
description: भिंडी टमाटर सब्ज़ी एक आसान रेसिपी है जिसमे पंच फोरन मसाले का प्रयोग किया जाता है. पंच फोरन मसाले को बनाने के लिए 5 अलग अलग खड़े मसाले का प्रयोग किया जाता है जिसका उत्तर भारत में प्रयोग किया जाता है. पंच फोरन में रधुनि के बीज, मेथी के दाने, कलोंजी, सौंफ और जीरा का प्रयोग किया जाता है.

name: Pudina Pyaz Kachumber Salad Recipe - Mint & Onion Salad
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  dhania, pudina, jeera, kalanamak
description: Pudina Pyaz Kachumber Salad Recipe is a simple salad made with onion rings and seasoned with cumin powder, black salt and tossed in fresh herbs like coriander and mint leaves. It adds a crunch and freshness to your meals. It can be served with biryanis or Phulka gravy combinations.

name: Lauki Raita Recipe - Grated Bottle Gourd Yogurt Salad
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, lauki, dhania, jeera
description: Lauki Raita is a healthy recipe made from grated bottle gourd. Bottle gourd also known as dhoodi or lauki is very healthy when eaten raw and has a lot of nutritional properties that is good for the immune system.Lauki raita is one accompaniment that you should make during summers to help keep you and your family healthy. Lauki has a good water content and so this vegetable helps in reducing excessive body heat. It is also easily digestible by the body.

name: Whole Wheat Beetroot Paratha Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  haldi, jeera
description: Whole Wheat Beetroot Paratha is a great way to feed your kids beetroot. It is filled with the goodness of beets and fibre from the whole wheat flour. The best way to include veggies in your fussy kids and husbands diet. Not only it is healthy, but it also taste delicious.

name: दही अचारी भिंडी रेसिपी - Dahi Achari Bhindi Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian
description: दही अचारी भिंडी रेसिपी एक सरल रेसिपी है जिसमे भिंडी को प्याज़, दही और अचारी मसाले के साथ पकाया जाता है. इसमें भिंडी को ग्रेवी में डाले से पहले कुकुरा किया जाता है. यह एक बहुत ही स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने हाउस पार्टीज के लिए भी परोस सकते है.

name: Rawalpindi Style Chole Recipe
main_tag: punjabi dinner highproteinvegetarian  whitechickpeas, dhania, pomegranateseedpowder, jeera, jeera, haldi, drymangopowder
description: Rawalpindi Style Chole is a dish made with chickpeas which belongs to the Rawalpindi region in Pakistan. Pind means village and Rawal is a region in Pakistan, hence the name is Rawalpindi Chole. Pindi chole is made with white chick peas or kabuli chana, onion, tomato, ginger garlic paste and lots of spices. To enhance the colour, we should add a black tea bag while pressure cooking the chana. You can also  tea powder or tea leaves in a muslin cloth and add it to pressure cooker if you don’t have a tea bag.

name: वन पॉट बटर चिकन खिचड़ी रेसिपी - One Pot Butter Chicken Khichdi Recipe
main_tag: northindian onepotdish nonvegeterian
description: वन पॉट बटर चिकन खिचड़ी रेसिपी, एक फ्लेवर से भरपूर और स्वादिष्ट खिचड़ी रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. अगर आपको बटर चिकन पसंद है तो यह खिचड़ी आपको जरूर पसंद आएगी। इसे बनाने के लिए चिकन को मेरिनेट किया जाता है और फिर चावल के साथ पकाया जाता है.

name: Schezwan Masala Dosa Recipe Using Classic Idli Dosa Batter
main_tag: fusion snack vegetarian  whole, fenugreekseeds, capsicum, gajjar, pattagobimuttaikose, gingelly
description: 'Dosa' and 'Noodles' are two very popular street food dishes in India. The Schezwan Masala Dosa or Dosa is a famous Mumbai street food combining the Indo Chinese flavours which is loved by one and all. It is especially appealing to the younger generations.

name: North Indian Sooji Halwa Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  semolinarava, elaichi
description: North Indian Sooji Ka Halwa Recipe is a pudding made from semolina, flavored with saffron and other spices topped with nuts.

name: Murungai Keerai Paruppu Usili Recipe - Drumstick Leaves & Toor Dal
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish diabeticfriendly  moringamurungaikeerai, raikadugu, hing, splittoordal, saunf
description: Usili is a traditional and popular recipe from the state of Tamil Nadu, in which dal or paruppu is steamed cooked along with spices. It is mainly cooked with a variety of vegetables namely, french beans, broad beans, leafy greens etc.

name: सुखी उरद दाल रेसिपी - Sukhi Urad Dal Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: सुखी उरद दाल रेसिपी एक उत्तर भारतीय स्टाइल सब्ज़ी है जिसमे उरद दाल को रोज के मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह एक बहुत ही आसान रेसिपी है इसे आप अपने लंच बॉक्स में पराठे के साथ बी पैक कर सकते है. इस रेसिपी में दाल को उबाल कर उसे जीरा, हींग, प्याज, हरी मिर्च और अदरक के साथ पकाया जाता है.

name: Anda Bhurji Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast eggetarian  jeera, dhania
description: Anda bhurji is probably India's answer to the ever famous scrambled eggs. Sauteed onions and tomatoes combined with chillies and other spices make a delightful high protein breakfast. If you are rushed for time in the mornings then this is the recipe to make. You can pack it into your office lunch boxes with a tawa paratha and raita for a complete meal.

name: Mysore Chutney Recipe - Chana Dal Chutney
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian  bengalgramdal
description: Mysore Chutney is a delicious South Indian condiment which goes well with dosas and other south indian delicacies. It is very famous in Karnataka and is prepared in most of the households.

name: Corn And Onion Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, jeera
description: Corn And Onion Raita serves as a perfect side dish along with your meal. It is easy and tastes delicious. You can also serve this at your house parties along with pulao or biryanis.

name: Paal Kesari Recipe - South Indian Style Milk Kesari
main_tag: southindian dessert vegetarian  semolinarava, lightlypowderedusingmortarandpestle, elaichi, optional
description: 'Kesari' is a popular South Indian dessert made of semolina, sugar, ghee and is flavoured with the exquisite spice 'kesar' or saffron. This traditional sweet dish is easy to prepare and is also served as a part of breakfast in South India along with Upma Recipe.

name: Ragi Appam Recipe - A Healthy Twist To The Classic Kerala Appam
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  split, flattenedredrice
description: Ragi Appams are a good way to include healthy rich in calcium ragi into your diet. Ragi appams are delicious as they have the earthy flavours of ragi in them and they go well with any gravy or stew.

name: Beetroot Gajar Mooli Salad Recipe - Radish & Beetroot Salad
main_tag: indian appetizer vegetarian  radish, gajjar, moongphali
description: Indian Radish and Beetroot Salad Recipe is a very simple recipe, made with root vegetables - carrot, radish and beetroot. tossed in simple fresh flavour of lemon juice and green chilies and a little bit of crunch from some roasted peanuts.

name: Kadai Paneer Recipe - Spiced Cottage Cheese With Green Bell Peppers
main_tag: punjabi dinner highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, capsicum, elaichi, haldi, jeera, driedfenugreekleaves, salted
description: Kadai Paneer Recipe is a delicious North Indian dish that is made from fresh homemade paneer and sauteed with Green Bell Peppers and dried fenugreek leaves. Cardamom is crushed and added to this Curry, which gives it a nice taste and flavour.

name: Kumbh Makai Masala Recipe - Baby Corn And Mushroom Tikka Masala
main_tag: northindian sidedish noonionnogarlic  gobi, capsicum, capsicum, haldi, saunf, caromseeds, dhania, adjusttotaste, driedfenugreekleaves
description: Kumbh Makai Masala Recipe is one of my favorite dishes that is made atleast thrice a month in our Kitchen. The combination of fresh baby corn, along with green bell peppers and cauliflower corn, stir-fried and cooked in a tikka masala is absolutely delectable. You can also pack this delicious Sabzi in your Office Lunch Box.

name: Tomato Onion Chutney Recipe - Thakkali Vengayam Chutney
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  sambaronions, hing, optional, haldi, gingelly, gingelly, raikadugu, split
description: Thakkali Vengayam Chutney Recipe also known as the Tomato Onion Chutney is a favorite side dish that is made from fresh tomatoes. The tomatoes are roasted along with  baby onions and green chillies and then ground into a chutney.

name: Grated Cucumber Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, jeera, dhania
description: Grated Cucumber Raita Recipe is a tasty, simple and healthy raita recipe that can be had anytime of the year. It is especially beneficial when you have it with your meals during summers.

name: Chatpata Rajma Salad Recipe - Kidney Beans Salad Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish highproteinvegetarian  largekidneybeans, pudina
description: Chatpata Rajma Salad Recipe is a wonderful salad that can served along with any Indian main course. The rajma are soaked overnight and pressure cooked till it is soft but firm. We have added some onions, tomatoes for the texture and crunch.

name: Cabbage Carrot Onion Pudina Thepla Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  pattagobimuttaikose, gajjar, pudina, jeera
description: Cabbage Carrot Onion Pudina Thepla Recipe is a quick rolled Indian bread which is often made in Gujarati households. We have made this thepla using Preethi Zodiac Mixer grinder. This helps chop the vegetables, knead the dough all in a single jar and hence makes life more easier.

name: North Arcot Special Godumai Rava Puliyodharai Recipe - Broken Wheat/Dalia Puliogare
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  daliagodumairava, moongphali, raikadugu
description: Broken Wheat or Dalia is a popular grain in India and Middle East. High in fibre, Proteins and Vitamin B, it is also a wonderful weight loss option. We know eating dahlia is boring but you can always give it a twist to make it even more delicious. North Arcot Special Godumai Rava Puliyodharai is such recipe which will be loved by everyone in your family. If you have made a batch of Instant Puliyogare Podi, your North Arcot Special Rava Puliyodharai will be ready in a jiffy. Or you can use store bought Puliyogare powder as well.

name: Pineapple Kesari Bhath Recipe - Sweet Semolina Pudding
main_tag: karnataka dessert vegetarian  semolinarava, elaichi, pachakarpooram
description: Pineapple Kesari Bhath Recipe is one of the most common, traditional dishes in Karnataka. The Kesari Bhath is a must during weddings for breakfast and is usually served along with Khara bhath (upma).

name: चेट्टिनाड ड्राई पेप्पर चिकन रेसिपी - Chettinad Dry Pepper Chicken Recipe
main_tag: chettinad appetizer highproteinnonvegetarian
description: चेट्टिनाड ड्राई पेप्पर चिकन रेसिपी, एक सरल और स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है या फिर अपनी हाउस पार्टी के लिए स्टार्टर के लिए परोस सकते है. यह एक बहुत ही प्रसिद्ध दक्षिण भारतीय रेसिपी है जिसे तमिल नाडु के घरो में बनाया सकता है.

name: चकुंदर, गाजर और ककड़ी का सलाद रेसिपी - Beetroot, Carrot & Cucumber Salad with Peanuts Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian
description: चकुंदर, गाजर और ककड़ी का सलाद रेसिपी एक सरल और सेहतमंद सलाद रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के साथ परोस सकते है. यह सलाद मिनरल और विटामिन से भरपूर है. इस में मूंगफली का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इस सलाद में क्रंच देती है.

name: Beetroot, Carrot & Cucumber Salad with Peanuts Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  gajjar, moongphali, dhania
description: Beetroot, Carrot & Cucumber Salad with Peanuts Recipe is an Indian salad that can go really well with any main course.

name: Parsi Style Lagan Sara Istew Recipe - Rich Sweet Assorted Vegetable Curry
main_tag: parsi dinner vegetarian  gajjar, suransenairatalu, matar, haldi
description: Parsi Style Lagan Sara Istew Recipe - Rich Sweet Assorted Vegetable Curry Recipe is a gluten free, rich stew filled with assorted vegetables which make it even more healthy. Unlike other stew prepared in other cuisines, the Lagan Sara Istew is made sweet by adding in jaggery, raisins, and dates.

name: वन पॉट प्रेशर कुकर चिकन करी रेसिपी - One Pot Pressure Cooker Chicken Curry Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch nonvegeterian
description: वन पॉट प्रेशर कुकर चिकन करी रेसिपी एक आसान रेसिपी है जिसे दक्षिण भारतीय स्टाइल में बनाया गया है. यह उन दिनों के लिए पर्याप्त रेसिपी है जब आप कुछ आसान और स्वादिष्ट खाना चाहते है. फ्लेवर से भरपूर, यह करी आपको जरूर पसंद आएगी और आप इसे बार बार बनाएंगे।

name: वन पॉट पंजाबी राजमा मसाला रेसिपी - One Pot Punjabi Rajma Masala Recipe
main_tag: northindian maincourse vegetarian
description: पंजाबी राजमा मसाला एक बहुत ही प्रसिद्ध रेसिपी है जिसे उत्तर भारत के हर घर में बनाया जाता है. राजमा चावल, एक ऐसी डिश है जो की स्ट्रीट फ़ूड के लिए भी प्रसिद्ध है और अक्सर सर्दियों के दिनों में बनाया जाता है. आपको उत्तर भारत के हर रेस्टोरेंट में राजमा मसाला जरूर मिलेगा।

name: Stuffed Gobi Ka Paratha - Spiced Cauliflower Flatbread
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast vegetarian  gobi, dhania, jeera, haldi
description: Stuffed Gobi Ka Paratha Recipe is a simple wholesome flat bread, that is easy to make and nutritious to eat. The addition of flax seeds, along with spices and herbs, makes this paratha a perfect choice for a lunch box or a weekend breakfast along with a spicy mango pickle and yogurt.

name: मूंगफली चटनी पोड़ी रेसिपी - Peanut Chutney Podi Recipe
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian
description: मूंगफली चटनी पोड़ी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट मेल है जिसमे सेकी हुई मूंगफली, लहसुन, जीरा, इमली, कढ़ी पत्ता और हरी मिर्च का प्रयोग किया जाता है. यह बहुत ही आसान रेसिपी है और आप इसे कहीं दिनों तक स्टोर करके भी रख सकते है. आप इसे इडली, डोसा, उपमा या किसी भी अन्य डिश के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: Ella Ada Recipe-Steamed Rice Pancakes With Coconut & Jaggery Filling
main_tag: kerala snack vegetarian  elaichi
description: Ela Ada, is a Traditional Kerala delicacy. It is made of fresh grated coconut and jaggery, which is layered inside a dough made of  the rice flour and steamed in a banana leaf.It is usually prepared on Onam and goes well with any sadhya.

name: Peanut Cucumber Salad Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer vegetarian  moongphali
description: Peanut Cucumber Salad Recipe is a power packed salad as it has fresh ingredients like onions, tomatoes and cucumbers combined with peanuts.

name: Healthy Homemade Ragi Dosa Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  whole, fenugreekseeds
description: The Healthy Homemade Ragi Dosa Recipe is a twist to a regular dosa you would make at home which typically is ground along with rice and dal and then fermented. Here we have Ragi seeds, which is soaked along with the rice and then ground and fermented along with the ground urad dal.

name: अवल उपमा रेसिपी - Aval Upma Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  स प ल ट
description: अवल जिसे पोहा भी कहा जाता है एक प्रसिद्ध नाश्ते की रेसिपी है जिसे हर घर में सुबह के नाश्ते के लिए बनाया जाता है. यह एक आसान रेसिपी है जिसे बनाने में बहुत कम समय लगता है. आप इसे अपने स्नैक के लिए भी बना सकते है. यह हम दक्षिण भारतीय पोहा बांयेंगे जिसे अवल उपमा भी कहा जाता है. इसमें हरी मिर्च और कढ़ी पत्ते का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है.

name: Konkani Style Phanna Doddak Recipe-Tempered Dosa Recipe
main_tag: konkan southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  split, semolinarava, idlirava, raikadugu
description: Phanna Doddak Recipe is a delicious no fermentation Konkani style tempered dosa. Since the dosa batter doesn't need any fermentation, you can even prepare this for a quick kids lunch box, when you run out of ideas or time in the morning. The technique lies in individually preparing the tempering (tadka) for each dosa you prepare.

name: Sindhi Style Chicken Curry Recipe Using Preethi Electric Pressure Cooker
main_tag: sindhi dinner nonvegeterian  badielaichi, tejpatta, dalchini, elaichi, laung, dahiyogurt, haldi, dhania, dhania, dhania
description: Sindhi Style Chicken Curry is a delicious and simple tomato based curry which can be served with rice or tawa parathas. This Sindhi Style chicken curry can be prepared in no time and if you are craving chicken curry on a weekday then this is a go to recipe.

name: Sindhi Koki Recipe-Masala Roti With Onions And Green Chillies
main_tag: sindhi northindianbreakfast vegetarian  jeera, pomegranateseedsdried, dhania
description: Sindhi Koki Recipe is a traditional flaky flatbread made from whole wheat flour, dough blended with onions and spices. Sindhi Koki is served along with curd and pickle on side, usually for breakfast. However it can also be relished along with any vegetable preparation for a meal too.

name: Karnataka Style Kashi Halwa Recipe With Ash Gourd
main_tag: karnataka dessert vegetarian  ashgourdwhitepumpkin, elaichi
description: Karnataka Style Kashi Halwa Recipe With Ash Gourd is an authentic Udupi style recipe. Udupi Recipes are popular around the world and is known for its delectable Sattvic Vegetarian Cuisine.

name: Paneer Masala Dosa Recipe-Paneer Bhurji Dosa
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, capsicum, haldi, jeera, pudina
description: The Paneer Bhurji Dosa Recipe is also known as the Paneer Masala Dosa. It is a delicious and wonderful take on the traditional classic Masala dosa that blends together the softness of cottage cheese with the crunchiness of capsicum.

name: Classic Indian Sliced Salad Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  gajjar
description: Classic Indian Sliced Salad Recipe is a simple side dish or an accompaniment recipe to the main meals. Indian meal plate, especially lunch or dinner is incomplete with simple sliced veggies that are fresh and locally available.

name: चाय मसाला पाउडर रेसिपी - Indian Tea Masala Powder Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: चाय मसाला पाउडर रेसिपी एक खुसबू से भरपूर रेसीपी है जिसका चाय बनाने के लिए प्रयोग किया जाता है. हर घर में दिन की शुरुआत चाय से होती है, और यह मसाला उस चाय को और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है. अगर आप यह मसाला अपनी चाय में डालेंगे तो आपको और कुछ डालने की जरुरत नहीं है.

name: High Protein Soya Idli Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  wholesoyadal, whole, fenugreekseeds, bengalgramdal
description: The high protein Soya Idli Recipe is absolutely simple to make and rich in protein as well. It is made from soaked and ground soya beans, mixed along with soaked and ground idli rice and urad dal. The batter is fermented just like a regular idli & dosa batter and the result is absolutely delicious. When idlis are made from soya batter, it comes out as soft as cotton and delicious too.

name: Tamil Nadu Style Coconut Chutney Recipe - For Idli And Dosa
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  raikadugu, split
description: The Tamil Nadu Coconut Chutney Recipe is made from fresh coconut which is ground along with green chilies and ginger and then tossed along with a dash of Lemon or Yogurt that makes it tangy and opens up your palates. This chutney is very simple to make and a very popular accompaniment for all the breakfast dishes in South India.

name: Ven Pongal Recipe - South Indian Rice And Lentil Pudding
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  split, jeera
description: Ven Pongal Recipe is a very traditional breakfast or tiffin dish in South India. Pongal festival is celebrated as the harvest festival and is spread over four days. Pongal in Tamil means something that is overflowing. The act of boiling over of milk in the clay pot is considered to denote future prosperity for the family.

name: Bihari Chana Dal Puri Recipe
main_tag: bihari northindianbreakfast vegetarian  bengalgramdal, jeera, dhania, haldi, dhania, optional
description: Bihari Chana Dal Puri Recipe is a traditional Bihari recipe. No salt is added to the dish during festivals and is served with kheer after offering dal puri and kheer to Gods.

name: पंजाबी स्टाइल टिंडा सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Punjabi Style Tinda Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: punjabi lunch vegetarian
description: पंजाबी स्टाइल टिंडा सब्ज़ी रेसिपी एक सरल सब्ज़ी है जिसे आप रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. इसमें गरम मसाला का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसे और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है. आप इसे अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी डाल सकते है.

name: Mangalore Fish Curry Recipe
main_tag: mangalorean lunch nonvegeterian  dhania, haldi
description: Mangalore Fish Curry is one of my favourite ways to eat fish. It is fantastic paired with neer dosa, sanas or steamed rice.Mangalore is in the state of Karnataka and has a vast coastline. Mangalore fish curry uses coconut and tamarind along with chillies to make this delicious fish curry. The spices are well balanced with the coconut milk to make this delightful Konkan curry.

name: Beetroot Garlic Lemon Rasam Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  jeera, dhania, dhania, dhania, raikadugu, jeera, hing, dhania, forgarnish
description: Beetroot Garlic Lemon Rasam Recipe is a rejuvenating and soothing variety of rasam, perfect for the winters. Comforting, warm and delicious, this rasam takes the nutrition up a notch by the addition of beetroots. Rich in nutrients like calcium, potassium, iron, folic acid, and antioxidants, beetroot adds a lot of required goodness to the humble rasam.

name: Poppetjes Recipe - Sweet Puffy Wheat Dumpling Recipe
main_tag: parsi snack vegetarian  semolinarava, badam, elaichi, dalchini
description: Poppetjes Recipe -  Sweet Puffy Wheat Dumpling Recipe is a very popular sweet dish prepared in the Parsi Cuisine. There are small shallow fried dumpling made from a blend of  wheat and rava batter which is fermented with toddy. This helps in raising the dumpling. It is then dipped sweet sugary syrup to give a hint of sweetness to the dish.

name: केरला स्टाइल टमाटर फ्राई रेसिपी - Kerala Style Tomato Fry Recipe
main_tag: kerala dinner vegetarian
description: केरला स्टाइल टमाटर फ्राई रेसिपी एक सरल रेसिपी है जो की करेला में बहुत ही प्रसिद्ध है. इसे आप अपने खाने के साथ परोस सकते है या अपने नाश्ते के लिए डोसा या इडली के साथ भी परोस सकते है. आप इसे अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी तवा पराठा के साथ पैक कर सकते है.

name: Chettinad Eral Thokku Recipe - Prawn Masala
main_tag: chettinad lunch nonvegeterian  dhania, haldi, dhania
description: Chettinad Eral Thokku is a must try recipe if you love prawns. To make then Chettinad Eral Thokku prawns are cooked in a tomato base and everyday spices used in the kitchen. The sweet prawns go well with the amount of spices added in the prawns masala but you can reduce the spice level if you like to suit your taste.

name: Paal Kozhukattai Recipe With Bananas - With Vegan Option
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  gingelly, elaichi
description: Paal Kozhukattai is authentic delicacy from the regions of Chettinad known for their plethora of deceptively luscious dishes. In a nutshell, Paal Kozhukattai is sweetened rice dumplings cooked in thick coconut milk and milk. The dish is rich in taste and creamy in texture, with added bananas to serve. Finely grounded rice flour is rolled into tiny dumplings and later cooked with coconut milk. You can use only coconut milk instead of milk for vegan Paal Kozhukattai.

name: Paneer Chilli Dosa Recipe - Spicy Cottage Cheese Dosa
main_tag: fusion indianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, capsicum, pattagobimuttaikose, tomatochillisauce
description: Paneer Chilli Dosa is a healthy fusion breakfast dish. Dosa is loved by all especially kids. The filling for this dosa is full of nutrition from the vegetables and paneer. the Paneer chilli filling is easy to make and has the familiar flavours of Indo chinese.

name: High Protein Soya Dosa Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  wholesoyadal, whole, fenugreekseeds, bengalgramdal
description: The High Protein Soya Dosa Recipe is a perfect high protein dish for a vegetarian diet. Packed with proteins from soya beans and urad dal and fermented to make a soft and fluffy batter. This batter is super versatile, that you can make idlis, dosas and uttapams as well.

name: Moong Dal Dosa Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  split
description: Moong Dal Dosa is a rich and healthy recipe which is a great combination of yellow split moong dal and rice. This recipe serves all the important things which a breakfast requires, healthy, tasty and quick meal that you can put together if you have the batter handy in the refrigerator.

name: Masala Wali Turai Ki Sabzi Recipe - Ridge Gourd Masala Curry
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  turaipeerkangai, raikadugu, jeera, haldi, dhania, dhania
description: Masala Wali Turai Ki Sabzi Recipe - Ridge Gourd Masala Curry is a simple quick to make nutritious recipe. Turai is bland in flavour and because of the soft texture of the turai not many people prefer to make it at home. But this recipe of Masala Wali Turai Ki Sabzi will change your thoughts forever about the humble yet super nutritious turai. In this recipe turai is cooked in a tomato gravy with cumin seeds, ginger, coriander powder and red chilli powder and jaggery resulting in a flavour packed curry.

name: Egg Roast Masala Dosa Recipe - With Moong Dal Dosa Batter
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast eggetarian  split, fenugreekseeds, fenugreekseeds, raikadugu, dhania, haldi
description: Moong Dal Dosa With Egg Roast Stuffing Recipe is a lip smacking dish where the dosa batter is made from fermented moong dal and rice batter. This moong dal dosa batter is high in protein and makes delicious soft idli and crispy dosas as well.

name: Bihari Kale Chane Ki Ghugni Recipe
main_tag: bihari dinner vegetarian  brownchickpeas, jeera, tejpatta, haldi, dhania, jeera, optional, jeera
description: In Bihar, it’s called ghughri. Traditional ghugni is made with dried white peas. Some use minced lamb in it, some don’t. Ghugni can also be made with black chickpeas, dried green peas or even black eyed beans. It’s the most popular evening snack in the eastern part of India. Assam, Bengal, Odisha and Bihar have their own variation of ghugni.

name: Adai Recipe - High Protein Lentil Crepes
main_tag: tamilnadu southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  shortgrainedredrice boiledrice, splittoordal, bengalgramdal, hing
description: Adai is a traditional South Indian breakfast pancake recipe made with the combination of different lentils and rice. Adai is most often served as a tiffin dish for breakfast or dinner. With a little bit of planning, you can make your breakfast wholesome with these delicious high protein crepes.

name: Konkani Style Cabbage Sanna Polo Recipe - Savory Cabbage Dosa
main_tag: konkan southindianbreakfast vegetarian
description: Konkani cuisine has amazing recipes of various types of dosa, which are delicious and at the same time very easy to make. Konkani Style Cabbage Sanna Polo Recipe is one such dosa dish that uses very few ingredients and can be made in a jiffy when you have less time to prepare.

name: Mixed Flour And Spring Onion Cheela Recipe
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast vegetarian  pearlmillet, sorghum, jeera, dhania, haldi, bulb greens
description: Mixed Flour And Spring Onion Cheela Recipe is one of the healthiest breakfast ideas to keeps our tummy light and our body energized. It is an instant crepe which is also called as Cheela in North Indian. Spring onions are added along with the flour to give it more crunch and taste.

name: Bhindi Tomato Sabzi with Panch Phoran Masala
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, dhania, jeera
description: The Bhindi Tomato Sabzi with Panch Phoran Masala is a delicately spiced dry preparation of tender okras cooked with tomatoes and tempered with panch phoran. Panch Phoran basically a five spice blend which is commonly used in North Indian and east indian preparation especially Bengali Cuisine.

name: तमिल नाडु स्टाइल ब्रोकली पोरियल रेसिपी -  Tamil Nadu Style Broccoli Poriyal Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish vegetarian
description: तमिल नाडु स्टाइल ब्रोकली पोरियल रेसिपी, एक सरल और जल्द बनने वाली डिश है जिसमे ब्रोकली को रोज के मसलो के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह एक सेहतमंद डिश है जिसे आप स्नैक के लिए भी खा सकते है. ब्रोकली डायबेटिक लोगो के लिए अच्छी मानी जाती है.

name: Mooli Raita Recipe - Spiced Yogurt Salad with Radish
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  greekyogurt, radish, jeera, dhania, ordill
description: The Radish or Mooli Raita is a high mineral and energy dish. Radish has found its way into many cuisines around the world in terms or salad, coulis, pickles, sambar, stew, chutney or even raita's. The Mooli Raita is a refreshing change to the regular raita's, that you can relish as a yogurt salad as well.  It makes a perfect accompaniment to be served along with Paneer Makhani, naans, parathas, biryanis and pulaos.

name: Ragi Kanji Recipe - Salt Version
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  fingermilletnagli, jeera, caromseeds, hing, dahiyogurt, jeera
description: Ragi Kanji or Nagli Ambil as it is called in Maharashtra is a rustic porridge made from Ragi/Nagli/Finger millets which is usually served for breakfast. The nutritive and therapeutic benefits of Ragi are well known since ancient times.

name: Green Chutney Recipe - Coriander Mint Chutney Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  dhania, pudina, moongphali
description: Dhaniya Pudina Chutney also known as the Green or Hari Chutney. This chutney is made from fresh coriander and mint leaves along with green chillies, ginger and lemon and a dash of sugar that gives this chutney a unique flavor. Each household and region of India have their own way of making the green chutney. This version has no onion and no garlic and tastes fresh and delicious.
