name: Carrot Capsicum Poriyal Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish noonionnogarlic  gajjar, capsicum, raikadugu, jeera, split, hing, gingelly
description: Carrot Capsicum Poriyal Recipe is a tasty simple Poriyal recipe where carrots and capsicum are stir fried with tempering of mustard seeds, cumin seeds, urad dal and curry leaves. Fresh grated coconut is added at the end and lifts this dish up. No onion and no garlic is used in this recipe. This is a recipe which each and every member of your family will enjoy.

name: One Pot Tomato Rice Recipe Using Preethi Electric Pressure Cooker - Thakkali Sadam
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  sambaronions, raikadugu, elaichi, haldi, pudina, gingelly
description: Tomato Rice popularly called as Thakkali Sadam in South India is a very quick to make rice dish that is packed with flavours from tomatoes, cardamom, and the Sambar Powder. Most often tomato rice is made from leftover rice, but in this recipe you will notice we have made it super simple using an electric pressure cooker where the rice gets done in just 20 minutes.

name: Cheesy Masala Omelette Recipe With Roasted Vegetables
main_tag: continental worldbreakfast eggetarian  dhania, capsicum
description: Cheesy Masala Omelette With Roasted Vegetables Recipe is a wholesome omelette loaded with vegetables like baby corn and red bell peppers and then cooked along with cheese which adds to the deliciousness of this dish.

name: भट्ट की दाल रेसिपी - Bhatt Ki Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian
description: भट्ट की दाल रेसिपी एक पहाड़ी रेसिपी जिसे उत्तराखंड के हर घर में बनाया जाता है. यह एक सरल दाल है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. इस दाल में काले बीन्स का प्रयोग किया जाता है और इसे बनाने में सिर्फ 20 मिनट का समय लगता है.

name: गाजर तड़का रायता रेसिपी - Carrot Tadka Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: गाजर तड़का रायता एक सरल और स्वादिष्ट रायता है जिसमे दही में गाजर और मूंगफली का प्रयोग किया जाता है. अंत में इसमें तड़का दिया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ता है. इसे जरूर बनाए और हमे बताए की यह आपको कैसा लगा?

name: मसालेवाली तुरई की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Masalewali Turai Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian
description: मसालेवाली तुरई की सब्ज़ी एक सरल सब्ज़ी है जो आप अपने रोज के खान के लिए बना सकते है. यह उन दिनों के लिए सबसे अच्छी है जब आप कुछ सेहतमंद और स्वादिष्ट बनाना चाहते है.

name: Carrot Tadka Raita Recipe- Crunchy Grated Carrot In Yogurt
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, gajjar, dhania, pudina, kalanamak, jeera, jeera, hing
description: Carrot Tadka Raita is a highly simple recipe, which is a combination of crunchy carrots and yogurt with simple spices. What makes all the difference is the tadka ! The tadka is made of cumin seeds and garlic and adds loads of flavor in the Carrot Tadka Raita.

name: Ragi Wheat Phulka Recipe- Diabetic Friendly Ragi Roti
main_tag: indian maincourse diabeticfriendly  fingermilletnagli
description: Ragi Wheat Phulka Recipe is a  Diabetic Friendly Roti, made by combining ragi flour along with whole wheat flour to make a phulka. Whole wheat phulkas are a staple in almost all Indian households. It is easy to make and is usually served with a curry, dal or sabzi by the side. Whole wheat phulkas are diabetic friendly on their own but adding ragi makes them more healthy as ragi has low glycemic index and helps in regulating blood sugar.

name: थंडू कीरई पोरियल रेसिपी - Thandu Keerai Poriyal Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch diabeticfriendly
description: थंडू कीरई पोरियल रेसिपी, एक भरपूर रेसिपी है जिसमे अमरंथ के पत्तो का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें अमरंथ के पत्तो को भाप के रोज के मसलो के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह एक डायबिटिक फ्रेंडली रेसिपी है.

name: Narikol Pitha Recipe - Sweetened Coconut Fritter
main_tag: assamese dessert vegetarian  maida
description: Narikol Pitha Recipe are Assamese Sweetened Coconut Fried Pitha that is a North Eastern Delicacy. This recipe is prepared on festive occasions. Grated fresh coconut is mixed with sugar and caramelized, and then mixed with flour and milk, and deep fried to prepare this recipe.

name: Yellow Pumpkin Pulao Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, haldi, tejpatta, laung, dalchini, jeera
description: Yellow Pumpkin Pulao is an easy one pot Indian Pilaf cooked with mild spices, pumpkin and coconut. This is a no onion no garlic recipes & thus you can make in festive time too.

name: Meghalaya Style Do O Kalai Recipe - Chicken With Black Lentils
main_tag: northeastindia sidedish highproteinnonvegetarian  preferablywithskin, whole, adjust, 1to2tbsp
description: Do O Kalai Recipe is a simple yet delicious chicken curry from Garo and Khasi mountainous regions of Meghalaya. The cooking here is very healthy using minimal spices and oil. The chicken is usually cooked along with its skin to impart taste to the dish.

name: Mini Chilli Cheese Aloo Kulcha Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  maida, dahiyogurt, aloo, drymangopowder, pudina, greekyogurt
description: Mini Chilli Cheese Aloo Kulcha Recipe is a simple kulcha stuffed with melt in the mouth cheese. This cheese kulcha can be paired along with dals and gravies, and for a change can be served as is as a short eat with your other appetizers.

name: Mavinakayi Gojju Recipe - Mango Curry
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  raw, split, bengalgramdal, jeera, fenugreekseeds, haldi, hing, raikadugu
description: Mavinakayi Gojju Recipe is a lip smacking mango curry that tastes great with steamed rice, roti and dosa. It is tangy, sweet and a spicy curry. Coconut and various roasted spices and dals added in the curry heightens the flavour  and makes it even more delicious.

name: Menthya Jolada Mudde Recipe - Methi & Jowar Balls Recipe
main_tag: northkarnataka maincourse diabeticfriendly  sorghum, fenugreekleaves
description: Menthya Jolada Mudde Recipe - Methi & Jowar Balls Recipe is one of traditional, dish from North Karnataka which may not be known to many. It is a twist to regular ragi mudde recipe that is a common inclusion in Kitchens of Karnataka and Andhra. If you love to include healthy millets to your diet then you should be thinking of using jowar, and give this jolada mudde a try too. It super simple to make and delicious too.

name: Red Chilli Thecha - Maharashtrian Style Red Chilli Chutney Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian sidedish vegetarian  raikadugu, hing
description: Red Chilli Thecha is a popular chutney made in most households in Maharashtra. This spicy Maharashtrian style Red chilli chutney Recipe is a classic example of a simple dish, which uses just a few day-to-day ingredients, but takes your meal to another level.

name: पुडलंगाई पोरियल रेसिपी - Pudalangai Poriyal Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian
description: पुडलंगाई पोरियल रेसिपी एक पारम्परिक रेसिपी है जिसे केरला के बहुत से घरो में बनाया जाता है. इसमें पुडलंगाई को काट कर रोज के मसलो और कसे हुए नारियल के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह एक डायबिटिक फ्रेंडली रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: Delicious One Pot Butter Chicken Khichdi Recipe
main_tag: northindian onepotdish nonvegeterian  salted, tejpatta, jeera, elaichi, laung, dalchini, dahiyogurt, driedfenugreekleaves, jeera, dhania, pudina
description: Giving the classic Butter Chicken recipe a twist, our One Pot Butter Chicken Khichdi Recipe is a must try recipe.

name: Thandu Keerai Poriyal Recipe - Amaranth Leaves Stir Fry
main_tag: southindian lunch diabeticfriendly  raikadugu, jeera, split, hing
description: The Thandu Keerai Poriyal Recipe is a wholesome recipe made from Amaranth leaves, that is steamed and stir fried with a simple seasoning. Amaranth is a very nutritious green leafy vegetable, that is packed with taste when it is eaten in a steamed form. The recipe is simple, uses less oil and perfect for diabetic friendly diet.

name: Masala Lachha Paratha Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  dhania, haldi
description: Masala Lachha Paratha Recipe a classic Indian Layered Flat bread that is most often made with maida (all-purpose flour). This recipe of Lachha Paratha is healthy and is made from whole wheat flour.

name: Sweet Potato And Broccoli Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  jeera, haldi, onionnigellaseeds
description: Sweet Potato & Broccoli Sabzi Recipe is a quick to make healthy stir fry recipe. It is packed with the goodness of Broccoli combined with sweet potatoes. This dish adds a great variety to the daily menu and is a fantastic way to include broccoli in our meal. It is an easy recipe and a perfect one to pack in your Lunch Box as it can be made in jiffy.

name: Shahi Bhindi Recipe in Cashew Nut Gravy - Okras in Cashew Nut Curry
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, haldi, driedfenugreekleaves, elaichi, laung, dalchini, jeera
description: Shahi Bhindi Recipe in Cashew Nut Gravy as name suggests a bhindi cooked in rich and creamy cashew nut gravy that has a royal taste to it. This recipe of Shahi Bhindi gives a good twist to a classic Bhindi Masala recipe.

name: टोफू भुर्जी रेसिपी - Tofu Bhurji Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast vegan  ल ल
description: टोफू भुर्जी रेसिपी एक वेगन रेसिपी है जिसे आप नाश्ते के लिए ब्रेड टोस्ट या अपने खाने के लिए दाल और फुल्के के साथ परोस सकते है. अगर आपको पनीर भुर्जी पसंद है, तो आप यह रेसिपी भी जरूर पसंद आएगी। इसमें टोफू को क्रम्ब्ल करके शिमला मिर्च, प्याज और टमाटर के साथ पकाया जाता है.

name: Amaranth Leaves Khichdi Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  split, haldi, dalchini, jeera
description: The Amaranth Leaves Khichdi Recipe is a wholesome comforting food that is made with the combination of rice lentils, amaranth and spices. Khichdi is a mish mash of rice and lentils and is a perfect comfort food for the soul. It is optional to add spices, but adding the spices brings in the flavors and taste.

name: High-Protein Peanut Chutney Recipe-Indian Style Peanut Chutney Without Coconut
main_tag: indian sidedish highproteinvegetarian  moongphali, split, bengalgramdal, raikadugu, split
description: Peanut Chutney Recipe is a delicious a nutty, toasty and typically Indian chutney that requires minimal effort. Made without coconut, the chutney is healthy and bursting with additional flavours from curry leaves, chillies and two kinds of lentils. It makes a great breakfast side dish or accompaniment.

name: Spongy Quinoa Idli Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  split, fenugreekseeds, gajjar, optional butrecommended
description: Spongy Quinoa Idli Recipe is a twist to the original  South Indian Idli batter. I have added quinoa in addition to the other idli batter ingredients like urad dal, rava, and methi while soaking and then ground and fermented. This results in a spongy texture of idlis which are amazing to eat. I have added grated carrots as well to increase its nutritional content.

name: Bedmi Poori Recipe - Spiced Split Black Lentil Pooris
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast vegetarian  split, hing, dhania, jeera, drymangopowder
description: Bedmi Poori Recipe is a popular North Indian Poori variety made out of a spiced dough of Split Black Lentils or Urad Dal . A classic breakfast dish from the state of Uttar Pradesh, it is usually served along with a spicy potato curry called Dubki Wale Aloo.

name: सूखे छोले रेसिपी - Sukhe Chole Recipe
main_tag: punjabi lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: सूखे छोले एक हाई प्रोटीन रेसिपी है जिसमे प्याज और लहसुन का प्रयोग नहीं किया जाता। इसमें अदरक का पेस्ट और रोज के मसलो का प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है या फिर अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: Tomato Dosa Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  split, fenugreekseeds
description: Tomato Dosa Recipe is yet another South Indian variety of Dosa which is popularly eaten for breakfast in many parts of India. Breakfast being the most important daily meal, it is most important to have a sumptuous breakfast to keep you going for the day and to kick start your metabolism.

name: खट्टे पुदीना आलू रेसिपी - Khatte Pudina Aloo Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: खट्टे पुदीना आलू रेसिपी एक आसान रेसिपी है जिसे प्याज और लहसुन का प्रयोग नहीं किया जाता है. आप इसे अपने व्रत के दिनों केलिए भी बना सकते है. यह एक आसान रेसिपी है, इसलिए आपके लंच बॉक्स के लिए भी पर्याप्त है.

name: कच्चा केला और भिंडी की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Kaccha Kela Aur Bhindi Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish diabeticfriendly
description: कच्चा केला और भिंडी की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी एक आयुर्वेदिक रेसिपी है जिसमे प्याज और लहसुन का प्रयोग नहीं किया जाता। कच्चे केले और भिंडी को अलग अलग रोस्ट करके हल्दी पाउडर, हींग, काली मिर्च पाउडर और नमक के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह एक ड्राई डिश है जिसे आप दही चावल या फुल्के के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: Dill Cucumber Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, pudina, jeera
description: Dill Cucumber Raita Recipe is a super healthy and delicious raita. Cooling cucumber combined with dill leaves and mint leaves seasoned with simple everyday spices makes this raita flavourful and a good accompaniment to any Indian Meal.  It goes well with parathas, pulaos and even biryanis.

name: Oats Pesarattu Recipe - Oatmeal & Green Gram Crepes
main_tag: andhra southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  whole
description: Oats Pesarattu recipe is a delicious and healthy take on the traditional Andhra Pesarattu recipe. Pesarattu is a crepe that is made from lentils and rice. In this recipe Oatmeal is added to make it even healthier. It is a very clever way of including the power packed oats into the dish without compromising on the Pesarattu taste.

name: Grated Carrot Cucumber Tomato Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  gajjar, dahiyogurt, jeera
description: Grated Carrot Cucumber Tomato Raita Recipe is made from yogurt with a mixture of fresh produce such as cucumber, carrot and tomato with a little hint of chopped green chilli. The chopped coriander gives it a garden-fresh aroma. The raita is then finished with a sprinkle of some Indian spices like cumin powder and red chili powder to give it a hit of spice.

name: दाल कबीला रेसिपी - Dal Kabila Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch diabeticfriendly
description: दाल कबीला रेसिपी एक प्रसिद्ध रेसिपी है जिसे मुघल के ज़माने में बनाया जाता था. इसमें उरद दाल का प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इसमें सफ़ेद उरद दाल या काली उरद दाल का प्रयोग कर सकते है. यह एक वन पॉट डिश है जिसमे दाल को मसालेदार बनाने के लिए सुखी लाल मिर्च, प्याज, टमाटर अउ रोज के मसालों का प्रयोग किया जाता है.

name: Aval Upma Recipe - South Indian Style Poha
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  flattenedrice, hing, raikadugu, jeera, split, haldi, moongphali, dhania
description: Aval or Poha is a common breakfast meal across the nation tempered in different styles. Since it is an easy dish to put together and light on the stomach, many choose it to be their go-to breakfast or snack option.

name: Awadhi Style Chickpea Kofta Biryani Recipe
main_tag: awadhi lunch vegetarian  haldi, dahiyogurt, pudina, dhania, brownchickpeas, dhania, laung, tejpatta, dalchini, elaichi, javitri
description: Awadhi Style Chickpea Kofta Biryani Recipe is a flavourful biryani recipe. Soft and crispy koftas are prepared separately and it then soaked in a luscious gravy. The gravy is then carefully layered between the rice and is simmered again for some more time to build in more flavor.

name: Kadale Chutney Recipe - Fried Gram Chutney
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  dhania, pottukadalai, raikadugu, hing, split
description: Kadale Chutney is a chutney which is commonly served in hotels across South India along with idli, dosa, vada and many other dishes. It is a spicy and tangy chutney which makes a great side to any south Indian breakfast.

name: Tomato Onion Tadka Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, optional, jeera, raikadugu
description: Tomato Onion Tadka Raita is one of those recipes which is very easy to make and gets ready in no time. This Raita can be served with your everyday meals, Parathas or any rice dish. It tastes great along with veg and non veg Biryani and also enhances the tastes of your meal at the same time.

name: Vazhaipoo Paruppu Usili Recipe - Banana Flower Paruppu Usili
main_tag: southindian sidedish highproteinvegetarian  vazhaipoo, dahiyogurt, gingelly, haldi, splittoordal, haldi, gingelly, raikadugu, hing, split
description: Vazhaipoo Paruppu Usili Recipe is a traditional South Indian Dish which is a combination of steamed crumbled lentils combined with sautéed vazhaipoo or banana flower. Steamed toor dal idlis are sauteed and cooked further in a pan and later combined with tasty vazhaipoo (banana flower).

name: आलू गाजर मटर सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Aloo Gajar Matar Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: आलू गाजर मटर सब्ज़ी एक सरल और स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. आप इसे अपने लंच बॉक्स के लिए भी पैक कर सकते है. इसमें टमाटर की प्यूरी बनाकर उसे रोज के मसालों के साथ पकाया जाता है.

name: Roasted Pumpkin Rava Dhokla Recipe - Sooji Dhokla
main_tag: gujarati﻿ northindianbreakfast vegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, semolinarava, dahiyogurt, raikadugu, jeera, hing, tilseeds, dhania
description: Roasted Pumpkin Rava Dhokla Recipe, is a healthy twist to the classic rava dhokla, where along with curd, roasted pumpkin puree is added to the dhokla batter.

name: मूली रायता रेसिपी - Mooli Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: मूली रायता एक बहुत ही सेहतमंद और आसान डिश है जिसे आप अपने खाने के साथ परोस सकते है. मूली का अक्सर हम सलाद में प्रयोग करते है, लेकिन यहा मूली का प्रयोग रायता बनाने में करें। आप इसे अपने पराठो के साथ भी परोस सकते है.

name: ब्रोकली रवा इडली रेसिपी - Broccoli Rava Idli Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian
description: ब्रोकली रवा इडली रेसिपी, सरल और सेहतमंद रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने सुबह के नाश्ते के लिए बना सकते है. अगर आप अपनी रोज की इडली से बोर हो गए है, तो आप अपनी इडली को तह नया ट्विस्ट दे सकते है. इसमें ब्रोकली को कस के इडली के बैटर में मिलाया जाता है. आप इसे अपनी पसंद की दक्षिण भारतीय चटनी के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: Raw Mango Cucumber Salad Recipe with Roasted Peanuts
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  raw, moongphali, dhania, pudina, date tamarind
description: Raw Mango & Cucumber Salad Recipe is a wonderful combination of fresh ingredients in a bowl. The tangy raw mango is tossed along with refreshing crunchy cucumber. The salad is then mixed along with toasted peanuts, chopped coriander and mint leaves.

name: Bharwa Pyaz Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  sambaronions, haldi, drymangopowder, dhania, dhania
description: Bharwa Pyaz Ki Sabzi Recipe is a chatpata, crunchy baby onions recipe. Baby onions are stuffed with a fresh masala paste and stir fried along with some ginger and garlic to add a lot more flavour to the dish. Stuffing the onions is the only time consuming process to make this delicious sabzi.

name: Arhar Ki Dal with Lahsun Tadka
main_tag: awadhi lunch highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, haldi, dalchini, dhania, jeera
description: The Arhar Ki Dal with Lahsun Tadka Recipe is a simple, wholesome recipe of toor dal, that is made in a single pot. Cinnamon, ginger, tomatoes and onions are all added and cooked along with the dal in a single pot.  All you need to do once the dal is cooked is to make the garlic tadka and the Arhar Ki Dal will be ready to be served.

name: Broccoli Rava Idli Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  semolinarava, dahiyogurt, hing, raikadugu, split
description: Broccoli Rava Idli Recipe is a super simple yet delicious and healthy recipe which you can make for a quick weekday breakfast. Grated broccoli is stir fried along with classic south Indian tempering and then added to the mixed rawa and curd mixture.

name: Watalappan Recipe - Steamed Egg Pudding With Jaggery
main_tag: srilankan dessert eggetarian  kithuljaggerygoanjaggery, elaichi, dalchini
description: Watalappan Recipe is a traditional pudding served in the weddings, festivals and feasts in Sri Lanka. It is one of the beloved desserts of every Sri Lankans. The main ingredients here are the Kithul jaggery, eggs and the fresh coconut milk.

name: Bhune Pyaz Ka Gosht Recipe - Mutton Curry With Roasted Onion & Spices
main_tag: northindian maincourse nonvegeterian  dahiyogurt, haldi, dalchini, laung, elaichi, jeera, jeera, dhania, dalchini, tejpatta, elaichi, laung
description: Bhune Pyaz Ka Gosht Recipe is a lip smacking mutton curry that will leave you licking your fingers. Onions are sliced and fried until it turns into a deep brown colour, which makes it the star ingredients of this mutton dish.

name: Khichdi With Fresh Spices Recipe
main_tag: indian onepotdish vegetarian  split, tejpatta, elaichi, dalchini, jeera, hing, haldi, dhania
description: To many, the humble khichdi or khichri or Khechudi, evokes a medley of emotions, by the mere mention of the name, one either loves or hates it. Almost every state in India has its own name for Khichdi.

name: Pudina Chutney Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  pudina, dhania, split, haldi, raikadugu, split, hing
description: Pudina Chutney is a flavourful Chutney with heat from the spices and chillies, tang from the tamarind and sweet notes from the jaggery. Pudina is slightly roasted in the pan and then ground along with other toasted ingredients like coconut , coriander seeds, urad dal and chillies.

name: Khaman Dhokla Poha Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast vegetarian  raikadugu, hing, dhania
description: Khaman Dhokla Recipe is a simple, easy and quick Gujarati snack loved by everyone and can be served as a evening snack or for breakfast. Khaman Dhokla Poha is a simple and easy dish that can be made out of leftover Khaman Dhokla.

name: Farali Dhokla - Kuttu Ka Dhokla Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ snack diabeticfriendly  kuttukaatta, littlemillet, dahiyogurt, dhania, dhania
description: Farali Dhokla - Kuttu Ka Dhokla Recipe is made of Buckwheat Flour or Sama Flour. Dhokla is an Indian dish popular in the state of Gujarat and it resembles a cake. It is steamed in a pressure cooker or a steamer. Kuttu Ka Dhokla is made from a blend of sama flour and buckwheat flour which is soaked in some yogurt and water. Indian spices are added to add more flavour to the dish.

name: Hurali Kalu Chutney Recipe - Horse Gram Chutney Recipe
main_tag: karnataka southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  kollukulith, sambaronions, caromseeds, dhania, split, raikadugu, hing
description: Hurali Kalu Chutney Recipe - Horse Gram Chutney Recipe is a spicy chutney made from the horse gram, which is. The lentil is rich in iron content and is very important for pregnant women. It is also packed with plant based protein. Horse gram also possess the ability to reduce blood sugar content in the blood and help to reduce the insulin resistance in type 2 diabetics. Include Horse gram in your diet by having it as Hurali Kalu Chutney.

name: South Indian Kosambari Recipe With Raw Mango, Cucumber, Carrot & Beetroot
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  bengalgramdal, gajjar, raw, homemadecottagecheese, raikadugu, split, hing
description: South Indian Kosambari Recipe With Raw Mango, Cucumber, Carrot & Beetroot is a fresh and delicious South Indian Mixed Vegetable Salad. Kosambari Salad is a must have for any major festival in South India, especially Diwali or BaliPadyami.

name: Ragi Murungai Keerai Adai Recipe-Finger Millet Flour & Drumstick Leaves Savory Flatbread
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  fingermilletnagli, moringamurungaikeerai, jeera
description: Adai is a nutritious dish from Chettinad cuisine. It is mostly made from a combination of of dal, rice, millet and veggies.

name: Tofu Methi Paratha Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  pearlmillet, sorghum, jeera, fenugreekleaves
description: The Tofu Methi Paratha Recipe makes a perfect high protein breakfast for a busy weekday morning. The tofu crumbles are tossed along with chopped methi leaves, onions and green chillies along with cumin powder, lending to a very simple flavour and robust taste.

name: Spicy Tomato Uttapam With Garlic Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  splittoordal, whole, fenugreekseeds
description: Uttapam is a very popular breakfast dish in South India. Spicy Tomato Uttapam With Garlic is a spicy and tart twist to the normal uthappam. The basic uthappam recipe shared here will fetch you fluffy spongy uthappam with brown crispy layer on the outside.

name: केरला स्टाइल अप्पम रेसिपी - Kerala Style Appam Recipe
main_tag: kerala maincourse vegetarian
description: अप्पम केरला की एक प्रसिद्ध डिश है जिसे हर घर में बनाया जाता है. अप्पम को नारियल के दूध या स्टू के साथ परोसा जाता है, लेकिन आप इसे अपनी पसंद की किसी भी दक्षिण भारतीय करी के साथ परोस सकते है. इसके बिच का भाग मोटा होता है और कोने का भाग पतला होता है.

name: Sindhi Tidali Dal Recipe
main_tag: sindhi maincourse highproteinvegetarian  bengalgramdal, split, split, haldi, dhania, jeera, hing
description: Sindhi Tidali Dal Recipe is a comforting sindhi dish best served with phulkas or even dodas.

name: Murungakkai Vendhaya Keerai Sambar Recipe-Drumstick & Fenugreek Greens Sambar
main_tag: southindian lunch diabeticfriendly  splittoordal, sambaronions, haldi, fenugreekleaves, gingelly, raikadugu, hing
description: Murungakkai Vendhaya Keerai Sambar Recipe-Drumstick and Fenugreek Greens Sambar, has a healthy mix of greens and vegetable to make it a complete meal. Drumstick and fenugreek greens are both known to purify the blood and lowering the cholesterol making this sambar a diabetic friendly recipe.

name: Kerala Style Appam Recipe - Fermented Rice Pancakes With Coconut
main_tag: kerala maincourse vegetarian  like xa0ponni xa0rawrice
description: Appam is a Kerala dish made with fermented rice batter and served along with sweetened coconut milk or stew. It is prepared in an appa kal  or appa chetti which is a bowl shaped. So when you make appam the center is a little thick and the edges are thin.

name: Chaal Kopi Recipe - Bengali Style Cauliflower Stir Fry
main_tag: bengali sidedish vegetarian  gobi, jeera, tejpatta, elaichi, laung, dalchini, haldi, jeera, dhania, matar
description: Chaal Kopi is stir fried cauliflower florets cooked with basmati or gobindobhog rice along with tomatoes and masalas like cumin powder, coriander powder and garam masalas which makes this dish highly flavourful and absolutely finger licking good. This Bengali delicacy though not very popular dish but it's common in some households.

name: Kerala Style Kanji Payar Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian  whole, jeera, haldi
description: Kanji Payar Recipe is comfort food of Kerala. It is healthy, tasty and simple. Kanji is rice gruel and it is had hot with green gram (moong) thoran and papad. It is easily digestible hence it is recommended food during sickness or when you have a stomach upset. Green gram is a super food for weight loss and is loaded with vitamins. The papad can be deep fried or roasted on low flame. This recipe calls for no oil at all.

name: Manga Rasam Recipe - Raw Mango Rasam Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  raw, splittoordal, raikadugu, jeera, hing, jeera, haldi, dhania, dhania
description: Mango Rasam Recipe is a tangy, sweet and spicy recipe that is made from mangoes. It is a twist to the traditional rasam recipe.

name: चिकन शोले कबाब रेसिपी - Chicken Sholay Kebab Recipe
main_tag: southindian appetizer nonvegeterian  ऑलपर पसआट,
description: चिकन शोले कबाब एक स्वादिष्ट और लाजवाब रेसिपी है जिसे बोनलेस चिकन से बनाया जाता है. यह दक्षिण भारत में बहुत प्रसिद्ध है और आपको हर नॉन वेज रेस्टोरेंट में मिलेगा। इसमें चिकन को बेसन और चावल के आटे में मिला कर तला जाता है.

name: कश्मीरी दही बैंगन रेसिपी - Kashmiri Dahi Baingan Recipe
main_tag: kashmiri maincourse vegetarian
description: कश्मीरी दही बैंगन रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसमे बैंगन को काटकर एक सरल दही की ग्रेवी में पकाया जाता है. इसमें सरसों के तेल का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इस सब्ज़ी को और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है.

name: Dal Vangi Recipe - Spicy Lentils with Roasted Eggplant
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, bainganeggplant, jeera, kopra, malabartamarind, hing, raikadugu, haldi, dhania
description: Dal Vangi Recipe is delicious combination of fresh Brinjals and Lentils, seasoned with fresh spices making it a very comforting Maharashtrian dish. Simple pantry ingredients and fresh seasonal Brinjals is all that takes to make this Dal Vangi Recipe. Special Maharashtrian Goda Masala is added to lift the flavours in this dish.

name: Spinach And Coriander Dosa Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  rawrice, whole, fenugreekseeds, palak, dhania
description: Dosa is one of the most popular breakfast in South India. They are usually served with coconut chutney and sambar is now a quintessential breakfast at every Indian home. In South India, dosai/dosa gets a new distinctive flavor from different regions. Even the potato filling differs from place to place.

name: One Pot Punjabi Rajma Masala Recipe In Preethi Electric Pressure Cooker
main_tag: northindian maincourse vegetarian  largekidneybeans, haldi, jeera, elaichi, dalchini, salted, dhania
description: The Punjabi Rajma Masala is a very famous recipe from the North India. Rajma Masala is an absolute comfort food in a Punjabi home. It is usually served with basmati rice or a hot phulka. Rajma Chawal will be available in all restaurants when you travel North of India.

name: Rajasthani Kadhi Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani lunch vegetarian  raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, hing, besan, dahiyogurt, haldi
description: Rajasthani Kadhi is a very popular dish in the households of the state. It is usually made with a side dish to serve it along with phulka or rice. It is spicy and is specially made during the winter season. This kadhi has some delicious flavours which comes from the spicy masalas used in the dish.

name: Bengali Bhindi Doi Posto Recipe
main_tag: bengali sidedish vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, haldi, dhania, pottukadalai, dahiyogurt, tejpatta
description: 'Posto' is the poppy seeds gravy that is popular in the Bengali Cuisine. Bengali Bhindi Doi Posto is a recipe made using poppy seeds and curd. A quick and easy recipe that is also flavourful.

name: How To Make Homemade Idiyappam Recipe - Rice Sevai Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian
description: Homemade Idiyappam also known as Sevai, is a traditional South Indian recipe that is made from freshly ground rice using a traditional Sevai Maker.

name: मटर मसाला रेसिपी - Matar Masala Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: मटर मसाला रेसिपी, एक आसान रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. इसमें ताज़ा मटर का प्रयोग करें, लेकिन अगर आपके पास ताज़ा मटर नहीं है तो आप इसमें फ्रोजन मटर का भी प्रयोग कर सकते है. आप इस सब्ज़ी को अपने लंच बॉक्स के लिए भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: Matar Masala Recipe - Peas In Onion Tomato Gravy
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  matar, jeera, haldi, dhania, driedfenugreekleaves, badammilk
description: Matar Masala Recipe is a must try recipe when fresh peas are in season. Though I make a lot of dishes with peas as it is available throughout the year in dried form, I love fresh peas more than anything else and when fresh peas are available in plenty in the market, one is that I make the most is this Matar Masala Recipe. There is definitely a difference in look and taste when you use fresh green peas in place of dried ones.

name: Apple And Raisin Chutney Recipe
main_tag: continental sidedish vegetarian  dalchini
description: Apple and Raisin Chutney Recipe is a British style savory spread made with apples and raisin and a hint of cinnamon that provides the much required warmth. Apple and cinnamon is a match made in heaven and this chutney, sweetened with the addition of raisins is perfect food gift to share with your friends. Enjoy Apple and Raisin Chutney for breakfast along with stuffed parathas or another Indian bread of your choice, or spread it on toast. It makes a great option for your  kiddie snack box as well.

name: Tomato Quinoa Recipe  - With A South Indian Twist
main_tag: southindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  raikadugu, sambaronions, elaichi, haldi, dhania
description: South Indian Style Tomato Quinoa Recipe is a healthy take on using quinoa to make a simple tomato rice. The quinoa is cooked along with sautéed onions, tomatoes and garlic. The addition of sambar powder with quinoa brings in a wonderful flavour to the dish. The masalas are simple and is used in our everyday kitchen.

name: Ghee Masala Dosa Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  aloo, dhania, haldi, raikadugu, split, bengalgramdal
description: Masala Dosas are delicious breakfast dish that is filled with a spiced potato filling. Children love this ghee roast masala dosa and it makes a healthy and filling meal for them too.

name: Bengali Lau Die Tetor Dal Recipe - Yellow Moong Dal With Bitter Gourd & Bottle Gourd
main_tag: bengali maincourse diabeticfriendly  split, bittergourdpavakkai, lauki, haldi, jeera, dhania
description: Bengali Lau Die Tetor Dal Recipe is a traditional Bengali Dal usually made during the summer season. This Dal recipe is a great way to include bottle gourd and bitter gourd in your diet. Lau Die Tetor Dal is a very healthy and light dal made without onion and garlic, but is flavored with green chilies, ginger and mustard oil.

name: Saffron Pilaf Recipe - Kesar Flavoured Rice
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian  salted
description: Saffron Pilaf Recipe is a flavourful rice that is cooked along with strands of kesar. Saffron not only adds to the flavour of the rice, but also adds a great colour. It is extremely easy to prepare and delectable to eat.

name: Mushroom Curry Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian  capsicum, haldi, pudina
description: Mushroom Curry is yet another tasty dish that we can add to weekday lunch/dinner menu. Earthy Mushrooms and capsicum are cooked in an onion-tomato gravy and simple spices like red chilli powder and garam masala makes it a delicious accompaniment for hot rotis/phulkas.

name: Green Moong Dal And Vegetable Idli Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  split, split, fenugreekseeds, gajjar, capsicum, dhania
description: Green Moong and Vegetable idlis are a perfect way to have healthy breakfast to kick start our day. Since these idlis are made with moong instead of rice, they are ideal for diabetic people. Green moong are high in protein and are packed with vitamins and minerals. I have also added grated carrot and dill leaves to this recipe which are high in vitamin A and vitamin C.

name: Sweet and Spicy Raw Mango Chutney Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  raw, haldi, jeera
description: The Sweet and Spicy Raw Mango Chutney is a favourite accompaniment to most Indian meals. Each region of India has a specific way of making it. But I like it just the way my mother always makes it. Super delicious.

name: Yellow Pumpkin Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, parangikaipumpkin, sambaronions, dhania, raikadugu, hing
description: Yellow Pumpkin Dal recipe is a tasty thick pumpkin based lentil curry, that makes for a soothing and comforting meal especially on weekdays. The addition of garlic and other spices and the quick way it can be put together, makes it a lovely dish that goes well with steaming hot rice topped with ghee,

name: Milagai Podi Uthappam Recipe - Spicy Chilli Powder Pancake Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu southindianbreakfast vegetarian  whole, bengalgramdal, tilseeds, hing, gingelly
description: Milagai Podi is a popular spicy condiment from Tamil Nadu which is served along with idli, dosa or upma. Milagai Podi Uthappam is a spicy twist to the uthappam. The milagai podi is made with red chillies and urad dal where they are roasted and ground to a powder.

name: आलू पोहा रेसिपी- Aloo Poha Recipe
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast vegetarian
description: आलू पोहा जिसे बटाटा पोहा भी कहा जाता है एक सरल रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने सुबह के नाश्ते के लिए बना सकते है. यह एक खट्टी तीखी रेसिपी है जिसमे निम्बू और हरी मिर्च का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें उबले हुए आलू डाले जाते है जो इसमें टेक्सचर और क्रंच देता है.

name: धुगारे बैंगन रेसिपी - Dhungare Baingan Recipe
main_tag: lucknowi sidedish vegetarian
description: धुगारे बैंगन रेसिपी में बैंगन को पकाने के लिए कोयले का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसे बनाने के लिए कोयले पर घी डालकर कढ़ाई को ढक दिया जाता है जिससे सब्ज़ी में तंदूर का फ्लेवर आता है. इस सब्ज़ी को बनाने के लिए दही, प्याज, हरी मिर्च, जीरा पाउडर, लाल मिर्च पाउडर और गरम मसाला पाउडर का प्रयोग किया जाता है.

name: Gajar Shalgam Ka Paani Wala Achar Recipe - Carrot And Turnip Pickle
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  gajjar, raikadugu, saunf, jeera, fenugreekseeds
description: Gajar Shalgam Ka Paani Wala Achar is an authentic pickle recipe made in a jiffy with fresh winter produce like Turnip and Carrots that brings out some amazing flavours to enhance your winter meals. This instant pickle needs to be well marinated for 2-3 days  before it can be served. After which it holds good in the fridge for a good week or two.

name: Vazhaithandu Pachadi Recipe - Banana Stem Raita
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  withouterthickskinremoved, dahiyogurt, raikadugu, split
description: The Vazhaithandu Pachadi - Banana Stem Raita is a healthy recipe with the Banana Stem added raw to the yogurt and seasoned with mustard seeds. Banana Stem is known as Vazhaithandu in Tamil and is a super nutritious root to have. The Vazhaithandu is rich is fiber and nutrients and when combined with yogurt is great for stomach ailments.

name: Kathal Masaledar Sabzi Recipe - Jackfruit Masala Sabzi
main_tag: northindian maincourse diabeticfriendly  kathal, aloo, hing, tejpatta, dahiyogurt, dalchini, badielaichi, dhania, jeera, dhania
description: Kathal Masala Sabzi Recipe is a delicious and spicy gravy prepared with kathal/ raw jackfruit along with potatoes cooked in a spicy tomato and onion gravy.

name: Carrot Methi Jowar Thepla Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ northindianbreakfast vegetarian  gajjar, fenugreekleaves, jeera, haldi, jeera, sorghum
description: Carrot Methi Jowar Thepla Recipe, a delicious soft spiced Indian bread. Thepla are famous from North India and typically from Gujarat. You can add any vegetable or green leaves to make a nutritious filled thepla. This is a best way to add in ingredients into your everyday diet and keep your body fit. In this recipe we have combined carrot and methi which are two unique ingredients that have their own benefits that are rich in vitamins and minerals.

name: Kala Chana Salad Recipe With Carrots, Cucumber & Tomatoes
main_tag: indian sidedish highproteinvegetarian  brownchickpeas, gajjar, dhania, adjustaccordingtoyourtaste
description: Kala Chana Salad With Grated Carrot, Cucumber & Tomatoes Recipe is a refreshing Indian salad that can be added to your diet.

name: Ragi & Oats Rava Idli Recipe-Finger Millet and Oats Idli
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  fingermilletnagli, semolinarava, oatmeal, dahiyogurt, or1teaspoonbakingpowder, raikadugu, dhania
description: Ragi & Oats Rava Idli Recipe is a healthy preparation of the traditional Rava Idli typically made with just plain semolina. Here oats are added along with green chillies, ginger and curry leaves to make tasty idlis.

name: गाजर शिमला मिर्च पोरियल रेसिपी - Carrot Capsicum Poriyal Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish noonionnogarlic  हर,
description: गाजर शिमला मिर्च पोरियल रेसिपी एक सरल पोरियल रेसिपी है जिसमे गाजर और शिमला मिर्च को छोटा छोटा काटकर राइ, जीरा, उरद दाल और कढ़ी पत्ते के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह एक दक्षिण भारतीय डिश है जिसे हर घर में सांबर, रसम और कहवाल के साथ बनाया जाता है.

name: कसी हुई ककड़ी का रायता रेसिपी - Grated Cucumber Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: कसी हुई ककड़ी का रायता रेसिपी एक सरल और सेहत्मद रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने खाने के साथ बना सकते है. आप इसे गर्मियों के दिनों में स्नैक की तरह भी खा सकते है.

name: धनिये वाला तड़का रायता रेसिपी - Sweet & Spicy Coriander Tadka Raita (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: धनिये वाला तड़का रायता बनाने में बहुत आसान है और इसे पराठे, बिरयानी और पुलाव के साथ परोसा जाता है. इसे बनाने में 15 मिनट लगते है और यह आपके खाने को और भी स्वादिष्ठ बना देता है. तड़का लगाने से इस रायते का स्वाद और भी बढ़ जाता है.

name: Matar Mushroom Curry Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian  cannedorstore boughtfreshmushrooms, matar, jeera, haldi, dhania, driedfenugreekleaves, dhania
description: Indian cuisine has a huge list of delicious curries, Matar Mushroom curry is also one of those recipes which are so tempting and delicious when it cooked in the gravy of onion, tomatoes and garlic. This Matar mushroom dry curry recipe is a special treat for any busy weekday with phulkas or tawa paratha or with other specialties like a dry sabzi like Makai Wali Bhindi and a dessert like Mini Key Lime Pie on a weekend too.

name: Raw Mango Coconut Chutney Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  raw, raikadugu, raw
description: Raw Mango & Coconut Chutney is a perfect blend of raw mangoes which is rich in Vitamin C and protein along with coconut and green chilies for a kick.

name: Soft Masala Dosa With Red Chutney Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  redgarlicchutney, aloo, haldi, dhania
description: Dosa is a staple dish in South Indian states. It is a fermented crepe made from rice batter and black lentils. It is a common breakfast dish and street food, and high in carbohydrates, and contains no sugar or saturated fats. This version of Dosa is soft from both the sides and filled with potato filling and red garlic chutney.

name: मसाला डोसा रेसिपी लाल चटनी के साथ - Masala Dosa With Red Chutney Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian
description: डोसा एक प्रसिद्ध रेसिपी है जिसे दक्षिण भारत के हर घर में सुबह के नाश्ते के लिए बनाया जाता है. इसका बैटर बनाने के लिए इसमें चावल और दाल का प्रयोग किया जाता है. यहाँ हमने मसाला डोसा रेसिपी लाल चटनी के साथ बनाया है जिसमे डोसे में आलू का मसाला और लाल लहसुन की चटनी का प्रयोग किया जाता है.

name: Microwave Oats Milk Halwa Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  oatmeal, elaichi
description: Microwave Oats Milk Halwa Recipe is a combination of Homemade oats milk, sugar, cardamom, ghee and nuts halwa microwaved for about 5 minutes. It is a quick microwave based halwa which can be prepared in 5 minutes if the oats milk is readily available and is an apt surprise for unexpected guests. Sugar can be completely replaced with stevia if you wish to do so. It is best to use a microwave safe glass container for this recipe or any recipe that calls for a microwave procedure.

name: Mixed Vegetable Sambar Recipe - Tangy Lentil Curry With Vegetables
main_tag: southindian maincourse vegetarian  splittoordal, sambaronions, radish, capsicum, gajjar, gingelly, raikadugu, hing, dhania
description: Mixed Vegetable Sambar recipe is a simple and quick method of making sambar in a single pot. The most important ingredient of making the sambar is the homemade sambar powder and every home and every kitchen in south india has a unique recipe of making the sambar powder. Below you will see the video recipe of how to make sambar using a variety of mixed vegetables.

name: Moong Dal Idli With Thengai Milagai Podi Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  split, fenugreekseeds, kopra, bengalgramdal, split, hing, tilseeds, raikadugu, split
description: Moong Dal Idli With Thengai Milagai Podi Recipe is a quick,easy, healthy and tasty breakfast or an evening snack option. Soft spongy idlis made of moong dal and rice are tossed in a spicy, tangy and crunchy thengai milagai podi made up of dry coconut, red chillies, tamarind and channa and urad dal.

name: Mughlai Bhindi Recipe - Spicy Okra Curry
main_tag: mughlai lunch vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, haldi, dhania, jeera, saunf, badam
description: Mughlai cuisine dates back to the era of Mughal rule in India. It usually refers to the recipes that were a part of the royal kitchen. The distinct aroma and taste from various spices, dry fruits and nuts used in cooking give the feeling of a royalty. Mughlai Bhindi is the vegetarian version of the rich and diverse Mughlai cuisine.

name: Mango Falooda Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  ripe, sabja, mangoflavoured, ripe
description: Mango Falooda recipe is a royal dish of North India. The falooda is a pudding that is made of different layers with various flavors and textures and is absolutely delectable to the palate. The Mango Falooda recipe is one of the dishes that is a perfect dessert for the summertime parties.

name: Chicken Keema Dosa Recipe - Madurai Kari Dosa Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu southindianbreakfast nonvegeterian  jeera, haldi, dhania, jeera, dhania
description: The Chicken Keema Dosa is a spicy meat masala dosa that is a speciality of Tamil Nadu. It is also known as Madurai Kari Dosa.

name: Tomato Poha With Peas Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast vegetarian  flattenedrice, matar, saunf, raikadugu, hing, haldi, dhania, dhania
description: Poha or flattened rice are the most preferred quick breakfast option on rushed mornings. Having poha regularly can help prevent iron deficiency as every 100g raw rice flakes contains 20 mg of iron. Flattened rice are also light and easy to digest making it a perfect food for weight loss.

name: Kopparai Thengai Milagai Podi Recipe - Dry Coconut Chutney Podi
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  kopra, bengalgramdal, split, hing, tilseeds
description: Kopparai Thengai Milagai Podi Recipe is simple and healthy recipe made of dry coconut, chana dal, urad dal, sesame seeds, tamarind, red chillies and hing. all these ingredients when ground together gives a flavour of nuttiness,spiciness and tanginess to the chutney which makes its so mouthwatering and addictive.

name: Moong Dal Idli Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  split, fenugreekseeds
description: Moong Dal Idli Recipe is super simple to make. Most people try making idlis at home but sometimes it fails.The result is hard idilis which do not fluff up. This could be because the batter does not ferment properly or the proportions of the ingredients are wrong.

name: Quick Cauliflower Sabzi Recipe - Phool Gobi Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch diabeticfriendly  gobi, jeera, haldi, dhania
description: Quick Cauliflower Sabzi or the Phool Gobi Sabzi is a delicious vegetable that can be made with simple ingredients. Adding just a few spices like garam masala, along with the onion, ginger and tomatoes into the cauliflower sabzi brings out the best flavors from it.

name: One Pot Vegetable Biryani Recipe In Preethi Electric Pressure Cooker
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  frenchbeans, gajjar, aloo, laung, dalchini, elaichi, tejpatta, haldi, dhania, pudina
description: The One Pot Vegetable Biryani Recipe is a simple and easy recipe to cook and can be done in less than 30 minutes. This biryani recipe is made in Preethi Electric Pressure Cooker, which is one of my favorite appliances currently in the kitchen.

name: Green Coriander Coconut Chutney Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  dhania, raikadugu, split
description: Green Coriander Coconut Chutney Recipe is a refreshing and simple to make chutney. The addition of coriander leaves along with fresh coconut, green chillies and lemon juice makes this chutney super delicious.

name: Sindhi Sai Bhaji Recipe - Wholesome Sindhi Dal With Vegetables
main_tag: sindhi onepotdish diabeticfriendly  palak, fenugreekleaves, bengalgramdal, split, gajjar, lauki, frenchbeans, haldi, dhania
description: A traditional Sindhi recipe - the Sindhi Sai Bhaji Recipe, is a healthy yet delicious one pot dish, that is popular in almost all Sindhi households. A wholesome dish that's packed with lentils, greens and a pot load of other seasonal vegetables.

name: Dhaba Style Spicy Ghee Rice Recipe Made From Whole Spices
main_tag: indian maincourse vegetarian  jeera, elaichi, laung, dalchini, tejpatta
description: The Dhaba Style Spicy Ghee Rice Recipe  is packed with flavors and aromas from the fresh spices. Adding a tadka of the whole spices like cumin seeds, star anise, cardamom, cloves and cinnamon to the rice, gives a earthy flavour to the rice.

name: Ukadpendi Recipe - Maharashtrian Style Spiced Rice Flour Porridge
main_tag: maharashtrian northindianbreakfast vegetarian  jeera, raikadugu, hing, moongphali
description: Ukadpendi is a rustic Maharashtrian style spiced Rice flour porridge, usually served for breakfast. Ukad in Marathi means ‘to boil’ .Ukadpendi is made by boiling rice flour in a mixture of water and buttermilk. The buttermilk adds a nice tang to the spiced porridge. You can also use Wheat,Jowar,Ragi flour instead of Rice flour.Traditionally groundnuts and a drizzle of groundnut oil is used as garnish. You can otherwise garnish it with coriander leaves.

name: Kesar Pista Phirni Recipe
main_tag: mughlai dessert vegetarian  elaichi, badam
description: The Kesar Pista Phirni is a traditional dessert made during festivals like Ramadan. Basmati rice is ground into a coarse paste and then cooked in milk along with cardamom and saffron which adds to the delicious flavour and taste.

name: Thotakura Majjiga Pulusu Recipe - Amaranth Leaves in Buttermilk Stew
main_tag: andhra lunch vegetarian  haldi, dahiyogurt, dhania, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, jeera, hing
description: Thotakura Majjiga Pulusu Recipe - Amaranth Leaves in Buttermilk Stew is a wonderful recipe made from amaranth leaves that are cooked in a coconut and curd based curry. Make this bowl of comforting stew filled with nutrients during winters. Amaranth leaves is a powerhouse of Iron, minerals and vitamins. It is considered as one of the super food and is Ayurvedic friendly as well.

name: South Indian Style Vazhaithandu Poriyal Recipe - Banana Stem Curry with No Onion and No Garlic
main_tag: southindian lunch diabeticfriendly  raikadugu, split, haldi
description: South Indian Style Vazhaithandu Poriyal Recipe - Banana Stem Curry without Onion and Garlic is a simple and quick recipe made with fibrous banana stem tossed in simple spice powders and seasonings. Poriyal is generally from Tamil Nadu. Anything that is dry and is eaten as a side dish is called Poriyal. Usually most household in Tamil Nadu add grated coconut in most of their dry dish in order to give in an extra crunch and richness to the whole dish. This recipe is made with no onion and no garlic for people who do not prefer to eat onion and garlic in their day to day diet.

name: Cabbage Bhurji Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast eggetarian  pattagobimuttaikose, jeera, dhania, haldi, pudina
description: Cabbage Bhurji Recipe is a twist to the traditional Bhurji in which onions are substituted by Cabbage. It will provide the same crunch but a different taste to the dish. It is the best way of adding cabbage to a dish which people love to eat. The dish is quite healthy and becomes very filling.

name: Palak Makki Ki Roti Recipe - Spicy Spinach Cornmeal Flatbread Recipe)
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast vegan  yellowcornmealflour, palak, jeera
description: Palak Makki Ki Roti Recipe - Spicy Spinach Cornmeal Flatbread Recipe is one healthy Indian Flat bread made with maize flour and palak.

name: Traditional Shahi Tukda Recipe - Hyderabadi Double Ka Meetha
main_tag: mughlai dessert vegetarian  elaichi, elaichi, badam
description: Shahi Tukda Recipe is a delicious and yet simple sweet dish made with ghee roasted bread that is topped with a creamy kesar Rabri and nuts. The addition of spices like saffron and cardamom along with rose water, pistachios and almonds in the Rabri brings in delectable flavours and taste to the Shahi Tukda.

name: Pudina Quinoa Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  dalchini, laung, elaichi, pudina
description: Pudina Quinoa Recipe is a simple recipe where cooked quinoa is tossed with whole spices and mint leaves to make a delicious Indian style quinoa dish. Made similar to an Pudina Pulao Recipe, here rice is replaced with healthy high fiber quinoa.

name: Thandu Keerai Sambar Recipe - Amaranth Greens Sambar Recipe
main_tag: southindian dinner diabeticfriendly  sambaronions, haldi, splittoordal, gingelly, hing, raikadugu
description: Thandu Keerai Sambar is a very traditional South Indian lentil curry made from spinach or amaranth leaves or any other green leaf of radish or beet. The sambar is cooked in a tangy tamarind base flavoured with homemade sambar powder. Thandu Keerai sambar is a favourite at home with my children and a variation from the regular dals.

name: सुखी सुरन मसाला सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Sukhi Suran Masala Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian
description: सुखी सुरन मसाला सब्ज़ी एक सरल और स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसमे सुरन को प्याज और मसालों के साथ पकाया जाता है. आप इसे अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है. इस सब्ज़ी में फाइबर और विटामिन बी की मात्रा भी अधिक होती है.

name: अंकुरित कोल्लु सांबर रेसिपी - Sprouted Kollu Sambar Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch diabeticfriendly
description: अंकुरित कोल्लु सांबर रेसिपी एक सरल दक्षिण भारतीय रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. कोल्लु को कुलीथ भी कहा जाता है और इसमें प्रोटीन की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है. आप इसमें अपनी पसंद की सब्ज़िओ का प्रयोग कर सकते है जो इस सांबर को और भी पोषण देता है.

name: बैंगन मेथी का भरता रेसिपी अनार के साथ - Baingan Methi Ka Bharta Recipe
main_tag: punjabi lunch vegetarian
description: बैंगन मेथी का भरता रेसिपी अनार के साथ, एक टैस्ट है पुनजबी बैंगन का भरता रेसिपी में, जिसमे सके हुए बैंगन को मसाले के साथ पकाया जाता है. इसमें मेथी को पकाकर बैंगन के भरते में मिलाया जाता है जो इस डिश को और भी स्वाद और पोषण देता है. आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है या फिर अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: Vepilakatti - Lime Leaves Pickle Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  adjust, hing
description: Veppilakatti | Lime Leaves Pickle Recipe is a traditionally made healthy dish during Onam in Palakkad region. Lime leaves, curry leaves, roasted dry chili, tamarind and hing are combined and blended as a coarse paste. They are then made as small balls for consumption. It tastes good when sprinkled over curd rice. Since we do not get this leaves in most of the places I altered to use Kaffir Lime leaves and it tasted the same way like bitter orange leaves. I have also tried earlier with lemon leaves and it turned out to be good. Lime Leaves Pickle Recipe does not contain oil and can be preserved for 2 or 3 weeks in refrigerator.

name: Semiya Payasam Recipe - Vermicelli Kheer Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  vermicelli, elaichi
description: Semiya Payasam is a simple, yet delicious festive pudding made of vermicelli , milk, dry fruits and flavored with cardamom and/or saffron. Usually a staple on occasions like Tamizh/Tamil new year and Onam where a feast is cooked, and this payasam is served as dessert.

name: लाल मास बिरयानी रेसिपी - Laal Maas Biryani Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani maincourse nonvegeterian
description: आप सबने लाल मॉस का नाम तो सुना ही होगा। यह डिश राजस्थान में बहुत प्रसिद्ध है और आपको राजस्थान के हर होटल में यह डिश जरूर मिलेगी। इसमें सुखी लाल मिर्च को भिगो के उसका पेस्ट बनाया जाता है, जिससे इस करी में लाल रंग और तीखापन आता है. आज हम यहाँ लाल मॉस बिरयानी बना रहे है, जिसको बनाने के लिए हम लाल मॉस का प्रयोग करेंगे।

name: कॉर्न और मटर की करी रेसिपी - Corn And Peas Curry Recipe
main_tag: indian maincourse vegetarian
description: कॉर्न और मटर की करी रेसिपी एक सरल रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. इस ग्रेवी में खड़े मसालो को रोस्ट करके पिसा जाता है. इसमें अदरक, प्याज और लहसुन का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जोइसे और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है.

name: पुदीना किनुआ रेसिपी - Pudina Quinoa Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: पुदीना किनुआ रेसिपी एक सरल रेसिपी है जिसमे रोज के मसालों और पुदीना का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें हमने राइस की जगह किनुआ का प्रयोग किया गया है जो इस डिश को और भी सेहतमंद बनाता है.

name: Green Moong Dal Pulao With Vegetables Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  jeera, elaichi, dalchini, haldi, whole
description: The Green Moong Dal Biryani With Vegetables, is a combination that is wholesome and yet packed with spices, flavours, and taste. I came up with this Biryani Recipe when I was packing the kids lunch boxes and then I realised that I wanted to include more protein in their diet.

name: Paruppu Thogayal Recipe -Toor & Bengal Gram Chutney
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  splittoordal, pottukadalai, hing
description: Paruppu Thuvaiyal a speciality of Andhra Pradesh. It is a coarse chutney made using lentils. In this chutney, a paste is formed using Toor dal and Bengal Gram and is tempered with the south Indian tempering.

name: Creamy Phirni Recipe - North Indian Rice Pudding
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  elaichi, badam
description: Phirni is creamy milk based sweet dish popular in North Indian cuisine and even in Pakistani cuisine. The method of preparation of phirni is quite easy and its presentation makes the dish quite palatable. Phirni recipe can be prepared with various common and exotic ingredients.

name: Paneer Carrot Stuffed Paratha Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegan  homemadecottagecheese, gajjar, jeera, pudina
description: Paneer Carrot Stuffed Paratha is a simple and nutritious Indian flat bread that is made from grated carrots and whole wheat flour. The paratha is delicately flavoured with roasted cumin powder and lots of chopped mint leaves. There are many additions that you can make to pep up the taste, by adding onions or even chopped cabbage or grated cheese for kids. I most often pack this paratha for kids lunch box along with a sweet lime pickle and some yogurt.

name: पूरी रेसिपी - Puri Recipe
main_tag: indian maincourse vegetarian
description: पूरी रेसिपी एक भारतीय ब्रेड है जिसे हर घर में बनाया जाता है. इस डिश को आप हर भारतीय ग्रेवी या सुखी सब्ज़ी के साथ परोस। इसे गेहूं के आटे से बनाया जाता है. इसमें हम कलोंजी के बीज, सौंफ या अजवाइन का प्रयोग करते है जो इसे और भी फ्लेवर से भरपूर बनाता है.

name: बैंगलोर रेस्टोरेंट स्टाइल सांबर रेसिपी - Bangalore Restaurant Style Sambar Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian
description: बैंगलोर रेस्टोरेंट स्टाइल सांबर एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसे आप इडली या वडा के साथ परोस सकते है. यह सांबर पतला होता है और इसे गूढ़ से मीठा किया गया है. आप इसमें आप पसंद की सब्ज़िओ का प्रयोग कर सकता है.

name: Prawns Biryani Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner nonvegeterian  caromseeds, saunf, elaichi, laung, dalchini, tejpatta, dalchini, laung, elaichi, haldi, dahiyogurt, pudina
description: No one can deny their love for Biryani. Biryanis are versatile and can be prepared with either chicken, meat, prawns, fish or even with vegetables.Biryani weather veg or non veg is  must in a royal feast. The type and preparation for Biryani vary from region to region. The ingredients used also varies according to the culture and people. Biryanis can be prepared spicy in Hyderabadi style or can be made sweet like Kashmiri ones.

name: Indori Poha Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast vegetarian  flattenedrice, raikadugu, jeera, saunf, moongphali, haldi, dhania
description: Indori Poha is a delicious and light breakfast recipe which is very popular in Indore. Poha is generally made in every household as a breakfast dish but the Indori Poha has a twist in it. It is a great way to make your regular poha in a different way. An addition of fennel seeds makes this Poha even more delicious! Pomegranate kernels added to the poha adds freshness and nutrition.

name: Pudina & Dhaniya Raita Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, dhania, pudina, raikadugu, jeera, hing
description: Pudina & Dhania Raita Recipe is so refreshing to be had along with Indian Main courses. The two most widely used Indian herbs are the coriander and mint leaves, these two have two distinct flavor and beneficial for the body in many ways. Coriander leaves are rich in Vitamin C, potassium, dietary fibers and they are really good for diabetic patients. Pudina on the other hand is a very good herb for aiding with digestive problems.

name: Kinnathappam Recipe
main_tag: kerala dessert vegetarian  jeera, elaichi
description: Kinnathappam or steamed plate cake is a traditional Kerala dessert prepared by Muslims during Ramadan. This plate cake is soft, wiggly and tasty. You can also make it for usual days to enjoy it after your meal. It gets ready in no time, therefore you can also make it when you invite guests at home for lunch or dinner.

name: पुदीना मूंग दाल रेसिपी - Mint Moong Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: पुदीना के बहुत सारे फायदे होते है. यह आपको गर्मी से राहत देता है और आपको डाईजेशन में भी मादा करता है. यहाँ हमनेपुदीना का प्रयोग दाल में किया है, जो इस दाल को फ्लेवर से भरपूर और स्वादिष्ट बनाता है.

name: Thalicha Thayir Sadam Recipe - Spicy Seasoned Curd Rice
main_tag: chettinad lunch vegetarian  dahiyogurt, pomegranateseedpowder, raikadugu, split
description: Thalicha Thayir Sadam Recipe also known Seasoned Curd Rice is a staple food of South India. Every family will have their secret ingredient, but overall it's an all time favorite and a meal finisher. If there is not curd rice, then the meal does not get complete for a South Indian family. You could choose to have your curd rice a multiple ways. You can also pair it up with Bisi Bele Bath.

name: Mangalorean Style Masala Pundi Recipe - Steamed rice dumpling in Onion Gravy
main_tag: mangalorean southindianbreakfast vegetarian  raikadugu, hing, dhania, dhania, fenugreekseeds, jeera, split
description: Mangalorean style Masala Pundi Recipe - Steamed rice dumpling in Onion Gravy is a simple hearty breakfast dish that has coconut rice dumpling immersed in a flavorful onion coconut gravy.

name: Semiya Kesari Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  vermicelli, elaichi
description: Semiya Kesari Recipe is a sweet pudding made without milk. The pudding is made with roasted vermicelli cooked until it is soft and sweetened with sugar. It is then topped with roasted cashew nuts and raisins. It is a variation to the semiya payasam.

name: Kaccha Kela Aur Bhindi Ki Sabzi Recipe - Raw Banana & Ladies Finger Stir Fry
main_tag: northindian sidedish diabeticfriendly  ladyfingerokra, haldi, hing, drymangopowder, dhania
description: Kaccha Kela Aur Bhindi Ki Sabzi Recipe is an ayurvedic friendly recipe without onion and garlic. The raw banana and ladies finger are separately roasted well till it crisp up and then tossed with basic spices like turmeric powder, hing, pepper powder and salt.

name: Lehsun Amla Chutney Recipe - Garlic Gooseberry Chutney
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish vegetarian  nellikaigooseberry, sambaronions, pudina, dhania, raikadugu, split, bengalgramdal
description: Lehsun Amla Chutney Recipe is a delicious and tangy chutney recipe that is prepared with garlic, pearl onions, gooseberries or amla, coriander leaves and mint leaves. This chutney is a powerhouse of superfood ingredients.

name: Saunf Wali Hari Gobi Sabzi Recipe - Cauliflower Spiced with Fennel and Green Chutney
main_tag: northindian sidedish noonionnogarlic  gobi, saunf, tejpatta, coriander mint, dahiyogurt, haldi, dhania
description: The Saunf Wali Hari Gobi Sabzi Recipe is a quick and easy to make dish when you have a set of basic ingredients to make your sabzi. Green chutney made with coriander and mint leaves is added to this cauliflower sabzi which adds amazing flavour .

name: Passion Fruit- Shrikhand Shots Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  dahiyogurt, pulpneeded, elaichi, pulpneeded
description: Passion Fruit- Shrikhand Shots Recipe is a yummy and delectable combination of traditional shrikhand with passion fruit pulp, presented in shot glasses and topped with chocolate chips.

name: Kerala Thenga Chammanthi Recipe- Coconut Onion Chutney
main_tag: kerala sidedish vegetarian
description: Chammanthi is very common in Kerala households and this Kerala Thenga Chammanthi Recipe is a traditional variant.Each and every household in Kerala have their own version of the chammanthi. Some do not add ginger or curry leaves to the chamanthi. Some skip out on the onions. This recipe has all the great flavours of chamanthi. It is super flavourful with the addition of ginger, shallots, curry leaves and tamarind to fresh grated coconut.

name: मुघलाई भिंडी रेसिपी - Mughlai Bhindi Recipe
main_tag: mughlai lunch vegetarian
description: मुघलाई खाना मुघल जमाने से प्रसिद्ध हुआ है. यह खाना शाही रसोई में बनाया जाता था और इसमें कई तरह के ड्राई फ्रूट्स और मेवों का प्रयोग किया जाता था. आप भी इसे किसी ख़ास अवसर पर अपने खाने के लिए बना सकते है. अगर आप अपनी रोज की भिंडी की सब्ज़ी नहीं बनाना चाहते, तो आप यह रेसिपी जरूर बनाए।

name: भिंडी मसाला रेसिपी - Bhindi Masala Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian
description: भिंडी मसाला एक सरल और जल्द बनने वाली रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. इसमें प्याज और टमाटर के साथ रोज के मसालों का प्रयोग किया जाता है.

name: पालक पनीर रेसिपी - Palak Paneer Recipe
main_tag: punjabi dinner highproteinvegetarian
description: पालक पनीर रेसिपी एक सरल और पोषण से भरपूर रेसिपी है जिसे हर घर में बनाया जाता है. यह आपको हर दक्षिण भारतीय रेस्टोरेंट में भी मिल जाती है. इसमें पालक से आयरन और पनीर से प्रोटीन मिलता है. आप इस सब्ज़ी को अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: Pudina Idli Recipe - Mint Flavoured Idli
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  coriander mint
description: Pudina Idli Recipe is a lovely flavour idli recipe. Idli batter is flavoured with the popular green chutney made with coriander and mint leaves. The chutney lends great fresh flavours to the idli.

name: Dry Fruit Halwa Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  badam
description: The Dry Fruit Halwa is a delicious quick sweet made from figs, dates, pistachios, almonds, cashew nuts and walnuts. There is no added sugar in this recipe and hence makes it more healthy. The recipe to make the dry fruit barfi is quick and easy and makes it a perfect sweet for Diwali or even as a healthy snack for kids. These are also high energy and nutritious squares that can be enjoyed by each and everyone in the family.

name: Lachedar Kakdi Pyaz Kachumber Recipe - Onion Cucumber Salad
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  jeera
description: Lachedar Kakdi Pyaz Kachumber Recipe is a super fresh Indian salad. Thin strips of onions and cucumbers are dressed in fresh lemon juice and some spices like cumin powder, chaat masala, red chilli powder and salt.

name: Corn And Peas Curry Recipe
main_tag: indian maincourse vegetarian  jeera, dhania, raikadugu, haldi, matar
description: Corn and Peas Curry Recipe is a unique recipe of a corn on the cob curry.

name: Beans Mezhukkupuratti Recipe - Kerala Style Stir Fried Beans
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian  frenchbeans, raikadugu, haldi
description: The Beans Mezhukkupuratti Recipe is a delicious dish where the beans are tempered with mustard seeds and curry leaves, cooked with onion slices and finished with turmeric powder, pepper powder which adds a beautiful mild flavours to the beans.

name: Beetroot Carrot Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  gajjar, dahiyogurt, jeera, pudina
description: Beetroot Carrot Raita Recipe is healthy, delicious and beautiful in colour. It can be served with roti, biryani or dal and rice. It is very healthy and is a best recipe to make something new with beetroot and carrot.

name: Stuffed Yellow Moong Dal And Onion Paratha Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast vegetarian  split, capsicum, jeera, haldi
description: Stuffed Yellow Moong Dal And Onion Paratha Recipe is a delicious paratha stuffed with yellow moong dal and crunchy onions and capsicum seasoned with simple dry spices. It can be packed for lunch in the tiffin box, or served for breakfast, lunch or even dinner.

name: Masala Karela Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish diabeticfriendly  bittergourdpavakkai, besan, haldi, jeera, dhania, drymangopowder
description: Tangy Masala Karela Recipe combines karela with everyday indian spices and amchur powder. This easy-to-prepare healthy Karela recipe combines flavours to make it taste good without adding jaggery to reduce the acridity of the bitter gourd. It is a great diabetic friendly recipe and this dry sabzi pairs well with Tawa Paratha, roti, naan or any paratha of your choice.

name: Masala Jowar Bhakri Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian indianbreakfast glutenfree  sorghum, dhania, tilseeds, caromseeds
description: Masala Jowar Bhakri Recipe is made from Jowar, a millet variety that is gluten free. Jowar Bhakri is a traditional breakfast that is popular in Maharashtra and parts of Karnataka. It is popularly called farmer's breakfast. The Bhakri dough is shaped using hand which requires little skill and practice. Instead of shaping the bhakri directly on the tava, you can grease a banana leaf or parchment paper and shape them. Invert the dough side on to the hot tawa and slowly remove the banana leaf/parchment paper.

name: Gujarati Palak Dhokla Recipe - Steamed Spinach Lentil Cakes
main_tag: gujarati﻿ northindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  besan, palak, greekyogurt, optional, raikadugu, tilseeds, hing
description: The Gujarati Palak Dhokla is a delicious steamed lentil cake recipe made with spinach puree is an all time Gujarati favorite snack. You can make this recipe using fresh lentils like bengal gram dal or even a mixture of dals or you could alternatively make it really quick using gram flour that tastes just as delicious.

name: गुजराती पालक ढोकला रेसिपी - Gujarati Palak Dhokla Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ northindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  सफ़ द
description: ढोकला एक बहुत ही प्रसिद्ध रेसिपी है जिसे गुजरात के हर घर में बनाया जाता है. इसे या तो खाने के साथ साइड डिश के लिए परोसा जाता है या नाश्ते में परोसा जाता है. गुजरात के हर फरसान दूकान पर आपको ढोकला जरूर मिलेगा। यहाँ हम गुजराती पालक ढोकला रेसिपी बनाएंगे जिसे बेसन से बनाया गया है और इसमें पालक की प्यूरी भी मिलाई गई है, जिससे ढोकले में स्वाद और पोषण बढ़ता है.

name: कच्चे आम और नारियल की चटनी रेसिपी - Raw Mango Coconut Chutney Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian
description: कच्चे आम और नारियल की चटनी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट चटनी है जिसमे विटामिन सी की मात्रा अधिक होती है. इसमें नारियल और कच्चे आम के साथ हरी मिर्च का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है, जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है. अंत में इसमें तड़का दिया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है.

name: Aloo Methi Masala Recipe - Potato & Fenugreek Leaves Gravy
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  aloo, fenugreekleaves, laung, tejpatta, haldi, toaddtoboilingveggies, dhania, hing, jeera, dhania
description: Aloo Methi Masala Recipe is a delicious gravy preparation with boiled Potatoes and Methi/ Fenugreek leaves. This yummy gravy goes well with Poori and roti. Kids would love this recipe since they like aloo based recipes. Hence, you can camouflage healthy Methi along with boiled aloo in this Aloo Methi Masala and feed your family healthy.

name: परुप्पु थोगयल रेसिपी - Paruppu Thogayal Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian
description: परुप्पु थोगयल रेसिपी एक चटनी रेसिपी है जिसे आंध्र प्रदेश में बनाया जाता है. इस चटनी में तुअर दाल और चना दाल का प्रयोग किया जाता है और अंत में इसमें तड़का दिया जाता है. आप इस चटनी को अपने खाने या सुबह के नाश्ते के साथ परोस सकते है. यह चटनी डोसा, इडली, उत्तपम सबके साथ अच्छी लगती है.

name: Kerala Style Whole Wheat Parotta Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian
description: Kerala Style Whole Wheat Parotta Recipe is an easy way to consume a parotta without feeling guilty about increasing the calorie. Parotta is one of the famous bread in Kerala which is eaten mainly with Kadale Curry or Egg Curry. It is basically a bread which is flaky and has many layer within. This is the result of rolling it thinly and then then folding it several times and then stretching it so that it forms a long thread like dough. It is then folded into a ball and rolled thin.

name: Leftover Dal Paratha Recipe
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, dahiyogurt, dhania
description: Leftover Dal Paratha is a perfect recipe when you want to use your leftover dal. We often throw the dal which is left from last night as we don’t know how to use it again. Well, don’t throw it from now. make delicious parathas out of it and serve it with any raita of your choice. A little creativity will turn the leftover dal into something really delicious!

name: Bharma Baingan Ki Sabzi Recipe - Spicy Stuffed Brinjals
main_tag: rajasthani lunch vegetarian  bainganeggplant, jeera, drymangopowder, pudina
description: Bharma Baingan Ki Sabzi Recipe is a perfect combination of spicy masala and brinjals. If you are bored of your regular brinjal sabji, give this recipe a try, you will love it. It is spicy and is perfect to serve as a side dish with your Indian meal.

name: कढ़ाई पनीर रेसिपी - Kadhai Paneer Recipe
main_tag: punjabi dinner highproteinvegetarian  हर,
description: कढ़ाई पनीर रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट सब्ज़ी है जिसे उत्तर भारत में बनाया जाता है. यह सब्ज़ी आपको हर रेस्टोरेंट में भी मिलेगी। आप इसमें घर पर बना हुआ पनीर का इस्तेमाल कर सकते है या फिर स्टोर से भी खरीद सकते है. इसमें प्याज और शिमला मीर्च का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इस सब्ज़ी को एक क्रंच देता है.

name: आमला मेथी सुखी सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Amla Methi Sukhi Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish diabeticfriendly
description: आमला मेथी की सुखी सब्ज़ी एक सरल और स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जो की खट्टी और तीखी होती है. आमला को उबाल के उसे मेथी, टमाटर और प्याज के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह एक सरल रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है. यह सब्ज़ी डायबिटिक लोगो के लिए भी अच्छी मानी जाती है.

name: Homemade Thengai Sevai Recipe - Coconut Idiyappam Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  raikadugu, split, moongphali, gingelly
description: The Homemade Thengai Sevai Recipe, is a traditional south indian recipe that is made from from freshly ground rice using a traditional sevai maker.

name: Karnataka Style Gorai Kai Kara Recipe - Cluster Beans Chutney
main_tag: karnataka southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  kothavarangaiclusterbeans, moongphali, dhania, jeera, raikadugu, split, hing
description: Karnataka Style Gorai Kai Kara Recipe (Cluster Beans Chutney Recipe) is a creamy and spicy chutney made from cluster beans.

name: पनीर और हरे मटर का पराठा रेसिपी - Paneer and Green Peas Paratha Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian
description: पनीर और हरे मटर का पराठा रेसिपी एक हाई प्रोटीन रेसिपी है जिसमे पनीर और मटर का तीखा मिश्रण बनाया जाता है और उसे पराठे के अंदर भरा जाता है. पनीर में प्रोटीन की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है इसलिए आप इसे अपने नाश्ते के लिए या खाने के लिए बना सकते है. आप इसे घर पर बनाया हुआ पनीर भी इस्तेमाल कर सकते है, उसे इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ जाता है.

name: Chettinad Vegetable Pulao Recipe
main_tag: chettinad dinner vegetarian  sambaronions, tejpatta, haldi, gajjar, frenchbeans, aloo, laung, dalchini, saunf, dhania, matar, pudina
description: Chettinad Vegetable Pulao is a classic South Indian way of making rice. The spices are a unique blend of saunf (fennel seeds), black pepper corns with the addition of baby onions, ginger and garlic which add to the taste.

name: Kacche Aam Aur Lehsun Ki Dal Recipe -Curried Lentils With Mango & Garlic
main_tag: indian sidedish highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, raw, haldi, jeera, hing, dhania
description: The Kacche Aam Aur Lehsun Ki Dal Recipe is wholesome delicious dal that is packed with flavors of roasted garlic and grated raw mangoes. You must try this Mango Dal during summers when mangoes are in full season. Lots of recipes are made using raw mangoes and they not only taste great but are good for you.

name: Sundakkai / Manathakkali Kai Vathal Kuzhambu Recipe - A Spicy Tamarind Curry
main_tag: tamilnadu maincourse vegetarian  sambaronions, optional, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, gingelly
description: Manathakkali Kai Vathal Kuzhambu Recipe is a very traditional South Indian dish, made from freshly squeezed tamarind and flavoured with some traditional delicacies like vathal, small onions, appalam. The ingredients could be new to many of the non South Indians and if you are adventurous enough to try an authentic south indian brahmin home cooked recipe, go ahead and give this tasty tangy spicy dish a try.

name: गाजर शिमला मिर्च दाल रेसिपी - Carrot And Capsicum Mix Dal Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  हर,
description: गाजर शिमला मिर्च दाल रेसिपी एक सरल दाल रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. इसमें हमने मूंग दाल का प्रयोग किया है और उसमे सब्ज़िओ का भी प्रयोग किया गया है. टमाटर भी डाला जाता है जो इस दाल में खट्टापन में देता है.

name: Pineapple Rasam Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish vegetarian  splittoordal, haldi, jeera, dhania, optional, dhania, raikadugu, jeera, hing
description: The Pineapple Rasam Recipe is a twist to the traditional and a staple dish of the south Indians. The sourness from the pineapple and the subtle sweetness brings great flavors to the traditional rasam. I make this rasam as often as I make the tomato garlic rasam, as rasam's are an all time favorite dish in every household.

name: Chicken Cheese Stuffed Kulcha Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish nonvegeterian  jeera, haldi, dhania, maida, dahiyogurt, salted, salted, onionnigellaseeds, salted, dhania
description: Chicken Cheese Stuffed Kulcha Recipe is a delicious kulcha recipe that is a must try. Chicken keema is cooked along with dry spice powders and then combined with cheese and stuffed in a kulcha dough.

name: Karuveppilai Podi Idli Recipe-Spicy Lentil & Curry Leaves Powder Tossed Idli
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  gingelly, raikadugu, split, bengalgramdal, hing, jeera, split
description: Karuveppilai Podi is an essential condiment in every Tamil Brahmin household. Idli tossed in spicy and flavorsome Karuveppilai Podi tastes simply divine. Prepare mini idlis for the breakfast and save few to be tossed in the spice powder for the evening tea-time snack. The Karuveppilai Podi Idli can be packed in the school snack box as well.

name: Red Chilli Coconut Chutney Recipe - South Indian Chutney
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  sambaronions, pottukadalai, raikadugu, jeera, split
description: Red Chilli Coconut Chutney Recipe is a delectable spicy accompaniment  to many South Indian breakfast options such as idlis, vada, uttapams or dosai. It also pairs well with South Indian snacks and tiffin items.

name: Mini Dal Samosa Curry/Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  elaichi, dalchini, laung, javitri, tejpatta, badielaichi, driedfenugreekleaves, haldi, dhania
description: Mini Dal Samosa Curry/Sabzi is a unique and easy to prepare vegetarian recipe that can be a great alternative to Paneer or Vegetable Curries which you can cook on special occasion or for your Indian dinner parties.

name: Awadhi Style Karela Ka Dulma Recipe - Stuffed Bitter Gourd In Yogurt Gravy
main_tag: awadhi sidedish diabeticfriendly  bittergourdpavakkai, dahiyogurt, dhania, haldi, drymangopowder, onionnigellaseeds, caromseeds, badam
description: Awadhi Style Karela Ka Dulma Recipe -Stuffed Bitter Gourd Simmered In Yogurt Gravy Recipe is a classic dish made by Awadh.
