Karela or Bitter Gourd is a popular summer vegetable though it is bitter the bawarchis (cooks) prepare it so well that  it becomes a delicacy. Also, the vegetables are recommended for people who are diabetic, so it can be added into their diet.

name: Roasted Peanut & Fried Gram Chikki Recipe
main_tag: indian snack highproteinvegetarian  moongphali, pottukadalai
description: The Roasted Peanut & Fried Gram Chikki Recipe is a wholesome snack that is made from the goodness of peanuts and fried gram dal making it a high protein snack. The chikki is made brittle using jaggery and is extremely simple to make.

name: बैंगन सरसों का साग रेसिपी - Baingan Sarson Ka Saag Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch diabeticfriendly
description: बैंगन सरसों का साग रेसिपी एक उत्तर भारतीय रेसिपी है जिसमे छोटे बैंगन का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें सरसों के तेल के साथ हल्दी पाउडर, लाल मिर्च पाउडर, धनिया पाउडर, गरम मसाला पाउडर और अमचूर पाउडर का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें सरसों को भी मिलाया जाता है जो इसे और भी सेहतमंद बनाता है.

name: Ghee Tooria Per Eda Recipe - Parsi Style Ridge Gourd With Fried Eggs
main_tag: parsi indianbreakfast eggetarian  turaipeerkangai, jeera, jeera
description: Ridge gourd is a very delicate vegetable and you can make variety of dishes using this humble vegetable. Ridge gourd itself tastes bland and we always spike it up with some bold spices. Ridge gourd stir fry with a combination of spices is one simple dish and it tastes amazing. But to make it even more healthier, nutritious and protein rich, we can add egg to the stir fry and made a delicious side dish for rotis or rice.

name: Italian Oats Bread Upma Recipe
main_tag: indian northindianbreakfast vegetarian  oatmeal, italian, gajjar, dhania
description: The Italian Oats Bread Upma Recipe is a dish that you can look forward to whenever you have excess bread lying around the refrigerator. The addition of onions, green chilies, and fresh herbs like coriander leaves along with toasted buttered bread and the Italian oats makes it a quick and easy tea-time snack.

name: Manathakkali Keerai Molagootal Recipe - Kootu Green And Lentil Curry In Coconut
main_tag: southindian sidedish highproteinvegetarian  oranyothergreenslikespinach beetleaves amaranth, splittoordal, split, jeera, raikadugu, split
description: Manathakkali Keerai Molagootal (Kootu) recipe is a traditional south Indian recipe made with greens like spinach, beetroot leaves, amaranth leaves or a special greens known as Manathakkali Keerai. The Kootu is a dish in south India, that is made with the combination of lentils and coconut, mixed with green vegetables.

name: मटन घी रोस्ट रेसिपी - Mutton Ghee Roast Recipe
main_tag: mangalorean appetizer nonvegeterian
description: मटन घी रोस्ट एक मसालेदार रेसिपी है जिसे दक्षिण भारत में बनाया जाता है. इसमें मसलो के साथ साथ गुड़ और इमली का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है. सारे मसालो को सेक कर लहसुन और घी में पकाया जाता है. मटन को मैरीनेट कर के रखा जाता है जो इसमें और भी फ्लेवर लाता है.

name: Spinach Rice Recipe - Palak Pulao
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  palak, jeera, haldi, orsesameoil
description: The Spinach Rice Recipe, is a simple, healthy preparation of cooked rice, with spinach and spices. I most often like to use sambar powder and cardamom powder as the main ingredients to make the spinach rice, but you can use a combination of spices and experiment to suit your taste.

name: Foxtail Millet Paruppu Adai With Keerai Recipe - Foxtail Millet and Lentil Crepes with Spinach
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  splittoordal, split, bengalgramdal, saunf
description: Millet are a versatile grains, which can replace the rice in a number of recipes. Many people find it difficult to consume millets on its own and here is a clever way to sneak the millet into our diets. Foxtail Millet Paruppu Adai With Keerai Recipe is a simple, nutritious and a filling recipe.

name: Sundaikkai Godumai Rava Upma Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  sundaikkai, daliagodumairava, haldi, orgreenchillies, hing, raikadugu, jeera, bengalgramdal, moongphali, fenugreekseeds, dhania
description: Sundaikkai Godumai Rava Upma Recipe is a simple broken wheat upma which is made with Sundaikkai.

name: फॉक्सटेल मिलेट कीरइ परुप्पु अडाई रेसिपी - Foxtail Millet Paruppu Adai With Keerai Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian
description: मिलेट एक ऐसी सामग्री है जिसका आप बहुत सारी रेसिपीज में प्रयोग कर सकते है. यह सेहत के लिए अच्छा होता है इसलिए आपको इसे अपने रोज के खाने में मिलाना चाइये। यहाँ हमने फॉक्सटेल मिलेट कीरइ परुप्पु अडाई रेसिपी बनाई है जिसे आप अपने सुबह के नाश्ते के लिए बना सकते है.

name: Spiced Watermelon Curry Recipe With Carrots & Peppers
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian  withoutskin, gajjar, capsicum, caromseeds, haldi, jeera, dhania
description: The Spiced Watermelon Curry Recipe is one of those dishes that you must try when watermelons are in season. This watermelon curry is subtly spiced with ajwain and chillies, along with the addition of roasted vegetables, that bring out refreshing flavors and taste.

name: पालक पुलाव रेसिपी - Palak Pulao Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: पालक पुलाव रेसिपी एक सरल और सेहतमंद रेसिपी है जिसमे पके हुए चावल को पालक और रोज के मसालों के साथ पकाया जाता है. इसमें सांबर पाउडर और इलाइची पाउडर का भी इस्तेमाल किया जाता है जो इसमें और भी स्वाद देता है. आप इसे अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है. इसे बनाने के लिए आप बचे हुए चावल का भी प्रयोग कर सकते है।

name: Maharashtrian Tandulachi Ukad Recipe - Rice Flour And Buttermilk Porridge
main_tag: maharashtrian northindianbreakfast vegetarian  raikadugu, hing
description: Maharashtrian Tandulachi Ukad Recipe  which is a simple Rice Flour And Buttermilk Porridge, is a breakfast porridge that everyone would love to try. It is healthy and at the same time so comforting to be had with a cup of hot tea.

name: Spiced Prune Chutney Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  dalchini, caromseeds
description: Spiced Prune Chutney Recipe is a sweet and spicy mixture that is made with preserved prunes. It is good way to use it as an accompaniment for various ingredient such as a spread for a sandwich, or can be added to a wrap along with some vegetables, it can also be had with an Indian breakfast dish like dosa or Stuffed Paratha.

name: Palak Paratha Recipe-Spiced Spinach Flatbread
main_tag: indian northindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  palak, saunf, haldi, jeera, optional
description: The Palak Paratha Recipe is one of those recipes that is simple, nutritious and super tasty. I learnt this recipe from my mother in law. I have had so many different versions of the paratha, over the many years, but her recipe stood out. The secret ingredient is Saunf (fennel seeds) that adds to the additional flavor and taste and not to miss out the green chillies.

name: Kerala Style Chakkakuru Mezhukkupuratti Recipe-Jackfruit Seed Poriyal
main_tag: kerala sidedish vegetarian  kathal, sambaronions
description: Kerala Style Chakkakuru Mezhukkupuratti Recipe is simply a Jackfruit Seed Stir Fry

name: Lemongrass Coconut Rice Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  gajjar, matar
description: Lemongrass Coconut Rice Recipe makes for a quick one pot meal. This no onion/garlic recipe is very simple to prepare. The rice is cooked with coconut milk, lemongrass and vegetables. The subtle flavors of lemongrass and coconut are very soothing to the palate, and vegetables can be added as per your preference.

name: Chatpata Kabuli Chana Salad - Chickpea Salad Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer highproteinvegetarian  whitechickpeas, dhania
description: Chatpata Kabuli Chana Salad is an easy and quick recipe and can be made with ingredients which are easily available in our kitchen.

name: Chatpata Kabuli Chana Salad - Chickpea Salad Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer highproteinvegetarian  whitechickpeas, dhania
description: Chatpata Kabuli Chana Salad is an easy and quick recipe and can be made with ingredients which are easily available in our kitchen.

name: Instant Masala Oats Kuzhi Paniyaram Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  oatmeal, dahiyogurt, jeera, raikadugu, dhania
description: The Instant Masala Oats Kuzhi Paniyaram Recipe, is a twist to the traditional kuzhi paniyaram which is made using leftover idli or dosa batter. Oats kuzhi paniyaram is an instant and easy to cook dish. There is no soaking, no fermentation involved. If you are in a hurry to whip up a quick and healthy breakfast you can make this quick oats kuzhi paniyaram recipe.

name: Bharva Baingan Masala Recipe - Stuffed Brinjal Masala
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  bainganeggplant, moongphali, tilseeds, haldi, hing, drymangopowder, besan, jeera, haldi, dhania, dhania
description: Bharva Baingan Masala Recipe, a super simple and delicious recipe of roasted eggplants that are filled with peanuts, sesame spice mixture and cooked in a tangy tomato puree.

name: Parwal Ki Mithai Recipe -Pointed Gourd Sweet
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  parval, mawa, badam, elaichi
description: Parwal Ki Mithai is commonly made in North India during festivals and marriages. It can be easily made at home and tastes delicious at the same time.

name: Ada Pradhaman Recipe - Kerala Style Rice Ada Pudding With Jaggery & Coconut Milk
main_tag: kerala dessert vegetarian  1stextract, 2nd 3rdextract, elaichi
description: Ada Pradhaman Recipe is a Kerala Style Rice Ada Pudding With Jaggery & Coconut Milk which is typically served as a dessert in the festival of Onam in Kerala. Ada is the ribbon-shaped dry rice flakes which are soaked in hot water and later slow cooked in jaggery and coconut milk.

name: Punjabi Chana Masala Recipe-North Indian Chole Masala
main_tag: punjabi maincourse highproteinvegetarian  whitechickpeas, jeera, tejpatta, haldi, drymangopowder, dhania, pomegranateseedpowder, kalanamak, dhania
description: The Punjabi Chana Masala recipe is a famous North Indian dish that is served along with Bhaturas or Puris. The Chola or Chickpeas are simmered in spiced ginger and tomato gravy. The combination of black salt, garam masala, and dry mango powder enhance the taste of the Chola masala.

name: Egg Dosa Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast eggetarian  split, bengalgramdal, fenugreekseeds, oatmeal, dhania
description: Egg Dosa is a delicious protein rich wholesome meal which is an ideal dish especially for breakfast. Egg Dosa is nothing but a regular rice and lentil crepe topped and cooked with seasoned eggs in an omelette form or bulls eye form. This dosa can either be served with a chutney of your choice but if you are seasoning eggs with a good amount of spiciness, it can be eaten as it is.

name: Puli Inji Recipe - Tamarind and Ginger Chutney
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  haldi, fenugreekseeds, hing, gingelly, raikadugu
description: Puli Inji is a delicious tangy spicy gingery accompaniment made from fresh ginger, jaggery and green chillies. It is very simple and quick to make and can be stored in the refrigerator for about a week or two. If you taste this once you will salivate for more every time you hear puli inji. Delicious and pleasing to the palate will all flavours of sweet, sour, bitter and tangy it is a perfect accompaniment to any meal.

name: Mango Kheer Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  puree, vermicelli, elaichi, badam
description: Mango Kheer is a quick and easy to make dessert. This Mango Kheer is prepared with mango pulp, full fat milk, and sweetened vermicelli. Mango Kheer is liked by adults and kids alike. This Mango Kheer garnished with almond flakes, saffron, and raisins. needs to be served chilled.

name: Jowar and Vegetable Porridge Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  frenchbeans, gajjar, dhania, raikadugu
description: Jowar and Vegetable Porridge Recipe is a delicious and healthy breakfast recipe having the goodness of Jowar. Jowar or sorghum is a healthy millet variety, which contains the highest amount of soluble fiber and iron, making it pretty beneficial for women's health.

name: Boiled Peanut Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, jeera, moongphali, pudina, dhania
description: Boiled Peanut Raita Recipe is a refreshing raita made using boiled peanuts. The raita is flavoured with cumin powder and black pepper powder.

name: होल वीट लच्छा पराठा रेसिपी - Whole Wheat Lachha Paratha Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner diabeticfriendly
description: होल वीट लच्छा पराठा रेसिपी एक क्लासिक रेसिपी है जिसम ज्यादातर मैदा का प्रयोग किया जाता है लेकिन यहाँ हमने गेहूं के आटे का प्रयोग किया है. यह एक क्रिस्पी पराठा है जिसमे लेयर्स होती है और आप इसे किसी भी ग्रेवी के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: Masala Chai Kulfi Recipe With Bourbon Chocolate Syrup
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  elaichi, dalchini, laung, salted, badampowder, 70,
description: Masala Chai Kulfi Recipe is a delicious kulfi recipe made out of ever loved masala chai (spiced tea). The masala chai gets a summer makeover with the delicious kulfi. Masala chai is always enjoyed during a cold morning or on a rainy day; this kulfi recipe is a twist to the masala chai can be enjoyed on a sunny day or for the festival of Holi.

name: चनार पतुरी रेसिपी - Chanar Paturi Recipe
main_tag: bengali lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: चनार पतुरी रेसिपी, एक पारम्परिक बंगाली रेसिपी है जिसमे पनीर को मस्टर्ड, नारियल और हरी मिर्च के साथ पकाया जाता है. पनीर को बंगाली में चनार कहा जाता है. यह डिश बंगाल में बहुत प्रसिद्ध है और रोज के खाने के लिए बनाई जाती है. आप इसे अपने घर की पार्टीज के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: Mutton Ghee Roast Recipe
main_tag: mangalorean appetizer nonvegeterian  dahiyogurt, haldi, laung, fenugreekseeds, dhania, jeera
description: Mutton Ghee Roast Recipe is a masaledar preparation of mutton tossed in a fiery blend of spices with the added goodness of jaggery and tangy tamarind that balance out the flavours.

name: Buckwheat Corn Dhokla Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ northindianbreakfast glutenfree  kuttukaatta, dahiyogurt, littlemillet, tilseeds, jeera, raikadugu, dhania
description: Buckwheat Corn Dhokla is a healthy version of dhokla prepared using buckwheat, sweet corn and curd. Buckwheat is high in soluble fiber and it’s a natural gluten free whole grain. Buckwheat provides a high level of protein.

name: Dhaba Style Green Moong Dal Tadka Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  whole, haldi, dhania, jeera
description: The Green Moong Dal Tadka Recipe is delicious and easy to make, and is very nutritious too.

name: अंडे शोले कबाब रेसिपी - Egg Sholay Kebab Recipe
main_tag: southindian appetizer eggetarian  ऑलपर पसआट,
description: अंडे शोले कबाब रेसिपी एक प्रसिद्ध रेसिपी है जिसे दक्षिण भारत में बनाया जाता है. इसमें अंडे को उबाल के उसे बेसन के घोल में मिलाया जाता है. अंत में इसमें कढ़ी पत्ता को तल के डाला जाता है जो इसे क्रंच भी देता है. आप इसे अपनी पार्टीज के स्टार्टर के लिए भी परोस सकते है.

name: मशरुम घी रोस्ट रेसिपी - Mushroom Ghee Roast Recipe
main_tag: fusion appetizer vegetarian
description: मशरुम घी रोस्ट रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसमे मशरुम को तीखे मसाले के साथ पकाया जाता है. इसमें घी का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसे और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है. यह डिश मेंगलोर के हर घर में बनाई जाती है.

name: Veg Makhanwala Recipe - North Indian Mixed Vegetables Gravy
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  salted, gajjar, capsicum, frenchbeans, gobi, salted, laung, elaichi, dalchini, dhania, haldi, jeera, salted
description: Veg Makhanwala Recipe is a popular North Indian mixed vegetable gravy that can be served for your everyday meals or even for your Party meals. This recipe has a balanced blend of spices and a creamy texture from cashew nuts and fresh cream that is added to the gravy.

name: Palak Ragi & Oats Wheat Thepla Recipe - Healthy Diabetic Roti
main_tag: gujarati﻿ lunch vegetarian  fingermilletnagli, flaxmeal, dahiyogurt, haldi, optionalifgivingforchildren, hing, palak
description: The Palak Ragi Oats Wheat Thepla Recipe is a healthy preparation of the Gujarati Theplas. The addition of ragi and palak into the thepla makes it packed with nutrition and taste and adds a nutty flavor to the thepla.

name: Moong Sprouts Salad with Grated Carrots & Coriander Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish highproteinvegetarian  gajjar, dhania
description: Moong Sprouts Salad with Grated Carrots and Coriander Recipe is a refreshing with just a squeeze of lemon juice, salt and green chillies. Its  juicy and crunchy and a healthy snack for children too. You can pack this salad for your office to have as a mid morning snack.

name: Ragi Pachchai Maa Puli Upma Recipe - Ragi Flour Upma Recipe
main_tag: southindian indianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  fingermilletnagli, dahiyogurt, raikadugu, split, hing
description: Pachchai Maa Puli Upma is an heirloom recipe of Tamilnadu and generally prepared in tamilian homes. This upma is traditionally made of raw rice flour, sour curd, curd chili/mor milagai along with seasoning of mustard, chana dal, urad dal, asafoetida, green chillies, ginger and curry leaves.

name: Peerkangai Pal Kuzhambu Recipe-Ridge Gourd in Milk Curry
main_tag: chettinad sidedish diabeticfriendly  turaipeerkangai, laung, haldi, jeera, dhania
description: Peerkangai Pal Kuzhambu is delicious preparation of the Ridge Gourd  or Turai simmered with mild spices in a milk gravy. Ridge Gourd is a water-based vegetable is claimed by Indians to be very good for people with stomach ailments and a good light vegetable to eat during pregnancy etc.

name: Murungakkai Mor Kuzhambu Recipe-Drumstick Buttermilk Curry
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  dahiyogurt, haldi, dhania, jeera, raikadugu
description: Murungakkai Mor Kuzhambu Recipe-Drumstick Buttermilk Curry is an easy way to make a curry by using curd as a base. The drumstick are dunked into the spicy and light buttermilk gravy and can be made quickly on a busy day.

name: Khatte Pudina Aloo Recipe - Tangy Mint Potatoes
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  aloo, pudina, dhania, drymangopowder, haldi, jeera
description: No Onion No Garlic Khatte Pudina Aloo Recipe are a crowd pleaser and perfect for house parties and even for fasting. Serve it as a part of main course as a side dish or as a starter. It is very easy to make and thus perfect to pack in your Lunch Box too.

name: Sukhe Chole Recipe - Dry Masala Chickpeas
main_tag: punjabi lunch highproteinvegetarian  whitechickpeas, jeera, jeera, drymangopowder, haldi, dhania
description: This Sukhe Chole is a simple high protein recipe without onion and garlic. It has some taste of ginger paste and some dry spices which we use in our everyday cooking. You can enjoy this Sukhe Chole with Puri or with Paratha. It is healthy and very easy to make. A High protein dish that gets ready in no time.

name: Tamil Nadu Style Broccoli Poriyal Recipe - Broccoli Stir Fry Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish vegetarian  oronebroccolihead, raikadugu, jeera, haldi
description: Tamil Nadu Style Broccoli Poriyal Recipe (Broccoli Stir Fry Recipe) is a quick side dish made by tossing exotic vegetable like broccoli in a simple Indian spice to create a quick and healthy dish. The broccoli is blanched first and then stir-fried so that the flavour and the crunch remain intact.

name: Parsi Style Baingan Capsicum Ka Salan Recipe
main_tag: parsi lunch vegetarian  bainganeggplant, capsicum, haldi, dhania
description: Parsi Style Baingan Capsicum Ka Salan Recipe is a comfort food made by the people who got influenced by Parsi cuisine. The stir fried vegetable recipe uses locally available vegetable and it is tossed with the authentic dhansak masala which helps to give a delicate flavor to the dish.

name: Senai Kizhangu Varuval Recipe - Spicy Chettinad Style Yam Stir Fry
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  suransenairatalu, haldi, dhania
description: Senai Kizhangu Varuval Recipe (Spicy Chettinad Style Yam Stir Fry Recipe) is a tasty and quick recipe to made by using yam. The yam is thinly sliced and shallow fried till it's nice crisp along with some spice and it is then tossed with crispy curry leaves. It is the best way to consume this vegetable as it tasty as well as crunchy and at the same time healthy as it is not deep fried.

name: Nawabi Tawa Paratha Recipe
main_tag: lucknowi lunch vegetarian  maida, semolinarava, elaichi
description: Ulta Tawa Paratha is quite famous in the streets of Lucknow. A dish made during the days of the Nawabs and served with kebabs and sheeks. Since olden days you find inverted dome shaped griddles all over Lucknow which are used to make different kinds of breads like rumali roti and ulta tawa ka paratha.

name: Dhungare Baingan Recipe
main_tag: lucknowi sidedish vegetarian  bainganeggplant, dahiyogurt, jeera, dhania
description: Dhungare means smoking food using coal. This techniques add a unique smoked tandoori flavour to the dish. Ghee is dropped on hot coal to release smoke from the coal.

name: Kerala Style Tomato Fry Recipe
main_tag: kerala dinner vegetarian  bigpieces, raikadugu, haldi, dhania
description: Kerala Tomato Fry Recipe is famous in Kerala and it is easy to cook and delicious in taste. It goes well with Rice, Dosa and even Phulkas. It is easy recipe and requires very few ingredients to prepare this. You can also pack it in your Lunch Box along with Tawa Paratha or Neer Dosa.

name: Broccoli And Aloo Poriyal Recipe - South Indian Broccoli And Potato Stir Fry
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  aloo, raikadugu, haldi
description: The Broccoli and Potato Poriyal Recipe is a simple, yet wholesome recipe made by stir frying the broccoli and potato separately and tossed it with the basic set of condiments. Stir frying the vegetables, brings our the fresh taste and in addition retains the nutrients present in both of these super foods.

name: Vendakkai Thoran Recipe - Kerala Style Bhindi Stir Fry
main_tag: kerala lunch diabeticfriendly  ladyfingerokra, sambaronions, raikadugu, haldi
description: Vendakkai Thoran Recipe is a simple and yet delicious recipe made from Bhindi/ Okra also known as Vendakkai in the south of India. The Vendakkai is tossed in a simple onion, green chili and coconut and served as a side dish along with a main meal.

name: Kothavarangai Poriyal Recipe - South Indian Style Cluster Beans Sabzi
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  kothavarangaiclusterbeans, raikadugu, hing
description: Cluster Beans are known as Kothavarangai in Tamil. Cluster beans have many healthy benefits. It has very high amount of folic acid and vitamin K, making it a super food during pregnancy. Kothavarangai Poriyal Recipe is mildly spiced dish, cooked with a simple tempering and grated coconut.

name: White Pumpkin Mor Kuzhambu Recipe - Kerala Style White Pumpkin Curry
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian  dahiyogurt, ashgourdwhitepumpkin, haldi, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds
description: This recipe of Kerala Style White Pumpkin Mor Kuzhambu is a classic Kerala dish that is a sure dish that is prepared at least one day a week. The simplicity of the dish and the number of ingredients with which it can be made is one of the reasons it is prepared so often.

name: Methi Malai Matar Recipe - Fenugreek Peas Curry With Cream
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian  fenugreekleaves, matar, dhania, elaichi, driedfenugreekleaves, elaichi, laung, jeera, dalchini, javitri, badielaichi
description: Methi Matar Malai Recipe is a North Indian dish which is usually served in restaurants and road side dhabas.

name: Vegan Malai Gobhi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  gobi, laung, tejpatta, elaichi, driedfenugreekleaves
description: Gobhi or cauliflower are everyone's favourites. Vegan Malai Gobhi Recipe, is an easy to make curry which gets done in no time. It is creamy and mildly spiced making it a great accompaniment with parathas or pulao's. The cashew paste renders a rich and delectable flavour to the curry.

name: Mughlai Dum Arbi Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  arbi, elaichi, laung, dhania, haldi, dahiyogurt
description: Mughlai Dum Arbi Recipe, one of the delicious recipe from Mughlai cuisine which is known for its rich and flavor packed dishes.

name: वेज मक्खनवाला रेसिपी - Veg Makhanwala Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  हर,
description: वेज मक्खनवाला रेसिपी एक प्रसिद्ध उत्तर भारतीय रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए या किसी ख़ास अवसर पर भी बना सकते है. इसमें काजू और ताज़ा क्रीम का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें काजू और क्रीम का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसे और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है.

name: Khatti Meethi Mooli Ki Sabzi Recipe-Sweet and Tangy Radish Dry Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  radish, caromseeds, saunf, dhania, drymangopowder
description: Khatti Meethi Mooli Ki Sabzi Recipe -Sweet and Tangy Radish Dry Recipe is must try radish curry made with sautéed onions tossed in jaggery and amchur. The radish tastes really delicious in this recipe and gives out a wonderful taste and flavor. You can serve it dry or make it little wet and gravy as well and serve.

name: पनीर बटर मसाला बिरयानी रेसिपी - Layered Paneer Butter Masala Biryani Recipe
main_tag: northindian maincourse vegetarian
description: पनीर बटर मसाला बिरयानी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट बिरयानी है जिसमे घी चावल और पनीर बटर मसाला को मिला कर बिरयानी बनाई जाती है. आप इसे अपनी हाउस पार्टीज या वीकेंड के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. यह एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जो आपके घर में सबको जरूर पसंद आएगी।

name: Cauliflower And Peas Bhurji Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish noonionnogarlic  gobi, matar, haldi, raikadugu
description: Cauliflower And Peas Bhurji Recipe is a super quick no onion no garlic recipe and usually served with ghee smeared Phulkas or pack them with Tawa Paratha rolls for kids. Cauliflower And Peas Bhurji is a perfect winter recipe which is also easy and quick to make on busy weekdays.

name: Varagu Arisi Pongal Recipe -Kodo Millet Pongal
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  varaguarisi, split, haldi, gingelly, jeera, hing
description: 'Varagu Arisi' or Kodo Millet is a nutritional grain with high amounts of fiber and antioxidants. It is fast becoming a substitute for wheat as it is also gluten free. The Varagu Arisi Pongal is wholesome with the right balance of lentils and grains and the healthy tempering of cumin seeds, ginger and peppercorns also adds to the taste and flavour to the dish. It is a meal by itself and is most ideal 'fasting food' during Navratras. Adding a teaspoon of ghee in the tempering gives the pongal it's authentic touch, but you can skip using ghee if you are vegan.

name: Kadai Baby Corn Paneer Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, haldi, elaichi, driedfenugreekleaves
description: Kadai Baby Corn Paneer Recipe is quick, delicious and healthy stir fry with less ingredient that are usually available in your kitchen. This just needs Baby Corn and Paneer and it will result in a tasty and crunchy stir fry. Baby Corn and paneer is a great combination which can be made as stir fry or can be even made into curry.

name: Lahsuni Dal Tadka -Moong Dal with Pumpkin
main_tag: northindian dinner highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, split, whole, dalchini, tejpatta, parangikaipumpkin, haldi, jeera
description: The Lahsuni Dal Tadka is a quick, simple and wholesome dal flavored with garlic and spices. The addition of Pumpkin to the dal makes it filling and wholesome making it a perfect One Pot Dish for the busy weeknight dinners.

name: Andhra Style Palakaru Vepadu Recipe - Spinach Stir Fry Recipe
main_tag: andhra lunch vegetarian  dhania, jeera, jeera
description: Andhra Style Palakaru Vepadu Recipe is a simple tossed spinach leaves which is tossed with simple Indian Spices like red chilli powder and coriander powder. Vepadu in Andhra is nothing but anything that is stir fried. Spinach leaves are rich in Iron Content and is very essential to be a part of our diet.

name: No Onion No Garlic Oriya Style Moong Dalma Recipe
main_tag: oriya lunch vegetarian  split, haldi, tejpatta, jeera, jeera, raikadugu, saunf, onionnigellaseeds, fenugreekseeds
description: Moong Dalma is one of the dalma recipes which is the soul food of every Odissi household. Moong dalma is a simple delicious dal stew with or without vegetables and is a high protein recipe.

name: Chow Chow Milagu Kootu Recipe-Chayote Squash Cooked in Peppery Lentil Curry
main_tag: southindian dinner vegetarian  chayotesquash, raikadugu, split, hing, haldi, jeera, split
description: Chow Chow Milagu Kootu Recipe is a mildly spiced kootu recipe, usually had along with rasam and steamed rice in southern india. Kootu is a curry made using vegetables and lentils, cooked with minimal or no spiced. It also makes for a light and flavourful accompaniment for the phulkas. The freshly roasted and ground peppery cumin masala adds a great flavour to the kootu.

name: Jharkhand Dal Peethi Recipe
main_tag: bihari lunch vegetarian  split, whole, bengalgramdal, haldi, jeera, hing
description: Dal Peethi is an authentic complete meal from Jharkhand Bihar region. It is basically flowery shaped wheat dumpling simmered in a lentil based soup. Though its very simple to make but tastes awesome when served hot.

name: Gujarati Kobi Marcha No Sambharo Recipe - Cabbage & Bell Pepper Stir Fry
main_tag: gujarati﻿ sidedish vegetarian  pattagobimuttaikose, capsicum, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, haldi
description: Gujarati Kobi Marcha No Sambharo Recipe is a Cabbage & Bell Pepper Stir Fry recipe.

name: Raw Mango Thokku Recipe - Tamil Nadu Style Raw Manga Thokku
main_tag: southindian appetizer vegetarian  raw, fenugreekseeds, gingelly, raikadugu, haldi, hing, adjust
description: Tamil Nadu Style Raw Mango Thokku comes from traditional Tamil Iyer kitchen which is quick and easy to make recipe and versatile to be included in the South Indian Thali. Raw mango needs to be grated to make it the traditional way; here I have peeled and used the cubed raw mangoes for this version of Raw Mango Thokku.

name: Chatpata Baby Potato Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  dhania, jeera, saunf, dhania
description: Easy to make and delicious to eat, Chatpata Baby Potato Recipe can be served as a starter or with paratha. You can pack it in your kids lunch box too. It is easy to make and gets prepared in very less time. You can also stuff this sabzi in a paratha and make a roll for your and your kids Lunch Box.

name: Kala Desi Chana Recipe -Brown Chickpea Curry
main_tag: northindian dinner highproteinvegetarian  brownchickpeas, jeera, haldi, dhania, dhania, dhania
description: Kala Desi Chana is a delicious, spicy and flavorful curry of Whole Bengal Gram without using onion or garlic. The chickpea with dark brown skin is smaller in size when compared to the white skinned chickpea. The two vary a lot in taste and texture. The Whole Bengal Gram tend to be drier and maintain their firmness even after they have been cooked very well. A recipe made from the Kala Chana tastes good both in its dry and gravy form. Serve Kala Desi Chana with aam ras for a festive meal.

name: प्याज कुल्चा रेसिपी - Whole Wheat Onion Stuffed Kulcha Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian
description: प्याज कुल्चा रेसिपी, एक पंजाबी रेसिपी है जिसे अक्सर छोले के साथ परोसा जाता है. इसमें प्याज का मसाला भरा जाता है जिसमे स्वाद के लिए पुदीना का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है. यह दिल्ली और पंजाब में स्ट्रीट फ़ूड के लिए भी बहुत प्रसिद्ध है. अक्सर कुलचा को मैदे से बनाया जाता है लेकिन आज यहाँ हमने गेहूं के आटे का प्रयोग किया है।

name: कच्चा आम ककड़ी गाजर सलाद रेसिपी - Raw Mango Carrot Cucumber Salad Recipe With Peanuts
main_tag: indian appetizer vegan
description: कच्चा आम ककड़ी गाजर सलाद रेसिपी एक सरल रेसिपी है जो की नुट्रिशन से भरपूर है. इसमें काली मिर्च, जीरा और चाट मसाले का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसमें और भी स्वाद बढ़ाता है. यह बनाने में बहुत आसान है और कम समय में बन भी जाता है.

name: Pakistani Style Tinde Ki Tarkari Recipe - Apple Gourds Cooked With Tomatoes
main_tag: pakistani sidedish vegetarian  applegourd, jeera, dhania
description: Pakistani Style Tinde Ki Tarkari Recipe is an Apple Gourd's curry recipe cooked with tomatoes. Since the apple gourds have abundant moisture in them, this is a summer perfect vegetable to include often in summer time dinners.

name: Mangalorean Style Vaingana Mashinga Sange Sukhe/Sukka Recipe - Brinjal & Cashew Nut Stir Fry
main_tag: mangalorean lunch vegetarian  bainganeggplant, raikadugu, haldi, split, bengalgramdal, dhania
description: Mangalorean Style Vaingana Mashinga Sange Sukhe/Sukka Recipe is a delicious stir fry made from small brinjal and cashew nuts with Konkan flavors.

name: Cherupayar Thoran Recipe - Kerala Style Green Gram Sabzi
main_tag: southindian sidedish highproteinvegetarian  whole, haldi, jeera, raikadugu, split, dhania
description: Cherupayar Thoran Recipe is one of the comforting side dish from Kerala made using green gram. Typically, rice porridge (Ganji), Cherupayar thoran, pickle and ghee make one lip smacking meal. Its healthy, tasty and very easy to make. You can even eat it as a snack also during your tea time break.

name: Udupi Style Bendekayi Palya Recipe - Ladies Finger With Coconut
main_tag: udupi sidedish vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, raikadugu, split
description: Palya is a simple stir-fry recipe which is popular in the northern part of Karnataka. Palya can be prepared with any kind of vegetable; the vegetable is stir fried with coconut and red chili paste, one such recipe is Udupi Style Bendekayi Palya Recipe (Ladies Finger Dry With Coconut).

name: कच्चे आम वाली दाल फ्राई रेसिपी - Raw Mango Dal Fry Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish highproteinvegetarian
description: कच्चे आम वाली दाल फ्राई रेसिपी, स्वादिष्ट और खट्टी रेसिपी है जिसमे हमने साधारण दाल फ्राई को एक ट्विस्ट दिया है. इसमें कच्चे आम को कस कर डाला जाता है जिससे इसका स्वाद और बढ़ता है. इसमें अरहर दाल का प्रयोग किया गया है.

name: दूध वाली गुजराती कढ़ी रेसिपी - Gujarati Kadhi With Milk And Mint Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ dinner vegetarian
description: कढ़ी उन रेसिपीज में से एक है जो की गुजरात के हर घर में बनाई जाती है. बनाने में सरल और गर्मियों के दिनों के लिए पर्याप्त इसे खिचड़ी या पुलाव के साथ परोसा जाता है. इसे कही त्योहारों पर भी बनाया जाता है. ज्यादातर कढ़ी में दही का प्रयोग किया जाता है, लेकिन यहाँ हम दूध का प्रयोग कर रहे है.

name: Bhindi & Capsicum Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, capsicum, jeera, haldi, dhania
description: Bhindi & Capsicum Sabzi Recipe is a simple stir fry of ladies finger and capsicum in freshly grated coconut and Indian spices. We have kept it satvik by not adding onion and garlic in the recipe. It also refers to ayurvedic cooking where they give importance to food that are wholesome and pure.

name: Mushroom Tikka Masala Dry Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  capsicum, dahiyogurt, hungyogurt, besan, haldi, haldi, driedfenugreekleaves
description: Mushroom Tikka Masala Dry Recipe, a perfectly roasted chunks of marinated mushrooms, bell pepper and onions in a fragrant and spicy yogurt based gravy. Skillful to make and a crowd pleaser for sure. The gravy has a twist in the usual tikka masala gravy that we make.

name: Sabsige Soppu Palya Recipe - Udupi Style Dill Leaves Stir Fry
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian  raikadugu, bengalgramdal
description: Sabsige Soppu Palya Recipe is a simple udupi style dill leaves stir fry with grated coconut. Make sure that you don't overcook the greens, else they leave a very strong after-taste on the taste buds.

name: Hariyali Dum Aloo Recipe - Potatoes In Spinach Mint Curry
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  regularpotatoesalsowork, haldi, pudina, dalchini
description: Hariyali Dum Aloo Recipe is a creamy and delicious recipe that is cooked in a spinach and mint gravy. It is a fine Punjabi recipe is enjoyed all over India and abroad just because of its simplicity in making.

name: Sweet Corn And Capsicum Gravy Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  capsicum, dahiyogurt
description: Corn and Capsicum are one nice pair to make a pure vegetarian dish. The simplicity of yogurt cashew based gravy makes for a delicious combination. Kids will love the natural sweetness of the two vegetables and it makes for quite a colourful plate. It is healthy, nutritious and digestive friendly recipe for your whole family to feel light and good for the entire day.

name: Paneer Peshawari Recipe - Cottage Cheese In Rich Gravy
main_tag: punjabi lunch vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, jeera, tejpatta, haldi, jeera, dhania, driedfenugreekleaves, salted
description: Paneer Peshawari is one of those recipes which we often see on restaurant menus. Paneer Peshawari is a delicious North Indian preparation of soft cubes of Cottage Cheese/Paneer cooked in a rich gravy of onion, tomatoes, cashew and cream, spiced with the spices available in our Indian masala dabba and finished with crushed Kasuri Methi. It is simple and quick to make, it makes for a perfect weeknight dinner.

name: Methi Makhana Mutter Korma Recipe - Methi, Green Pea & Lotus Seeds Curry
main_tag: northindian lunch diabeticfriendly  fenugreekleaves, matar, jeera, jeera, haldi, dhania, tejpatta
description: Here’s a delightful and rich recipe especially for the vegetarians - Methi Makhana Mutter Korma. This recipe is similar to North Indian Paneer Mutter Masala but a much healthier yet rich version of the same with Makhana (Lotus Seeds) & Methi (Fenugreek). The glycemic index of lotus seeds is significantly lower than most carb rich ingredients.

name: Matar Chi Usal Recipe - Green Peas In A Onion Tomato Gravy
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian  matar, aloo, raikadugu, hing, haldi, dhania
description: Matar Chi Usal as said in Marathi language, means Green Peas Vegetable Curry. Green Peas, one of my most favourite vegetables, were previously available only during the winters. I remember my mom making all the different varieties of green peas dishes during that period. Matar usal, Maatar patal bhaji, Matar pattice, etc.

name: Upma Kozhukattai Recipe - Delicious Broken Rice Steamed Dumplings
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  raikadugu, split, hing, gingelly
description: The Upma Kozhukattai Recipe is a traditional tiffin dish made by most south indian families, is usually made for breakfast, evening tiffin or even served for dinner. It is made from broken rice and can be combined along with lentils like yellow moong dal to add to the protein. The addition of coconut and green chillies makes this dish extra delicious and nutty.

name: ठंडाई कुल्फी रेसिपी - Thandai Kulfi Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian
description: ठंडाई कुल्फी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जो की केसर पिस्ता कुल्फी जैसे बनाई जाती है. आप यह ठंडाई कुल्फी होली के लिए भी बना सकते है. इसे अपने खाने के बाद मीठे के लिए भी परोस सकते है. यह गर्मियों के लिए एक पर्याप्त रेसिपी है.

name: मक्की की पूरी रेसिपी - Makki Ki Puri Recipe
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast vegetarian
description: मक्की की पूरी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट और सरल रेसिपी है जिसे आप किसी भी सब्ज़ी के साथ परोस सकते है. इसे ज्यादातर सर्दियों के दिनों में बनाया जाता है. आप इस अपने ब्रंच के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: Laal Maas Biryani Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani maincourse nonvegeterian  dahiyogurt, jeera, dhania, jeera, badielaichi, elaichi, dalchini, laung, tejpatta, dhania, tejpatta, badielaichi, elaichi, dalchini, laung, dhania, haldi, dhania, pudina
description: Laal Maas Biryani Recipe is a flavourful mutton biryani, made by combining the traditional Rajasthani laal maas along with basmati rice.

name: Oreo Paneer Modak Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, salted, elaichi
description: Vinayaka Chaturthi is a much-celebrated festival in the southern and western parts of India. It’s a ten days celebration especially in the states of Maharashtra, Karnataka and Tamil Nadu. Beautifully painted and decorated idols of Lord Vinayaka is installed at homes and public place in pandals. During the puja times in the morning and evening Modak or Modakam, the beloved sweet of Lord Ganesha is offered to him and Oreo Paneer Modak Recipe is a delicious variety of Modak you can try.

name: Paneer Bhutuwa Recipe -Nepalese Paneer Curry
main_tag: nepalese lunch highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, dahiyogurt, haldi
description: This a vegetarian version of famous Nepalese dish "Lamb Bhutuwa" which is often sold at roadside eateries. You can substitute lamb with paneer and it tastes equally delicious. You can make this delicious curry for your everyday food and serve it with rice, paratha or phulka. As it includes paneer, it is high in protein and thus helps you to fulfill daily intake of your day.

name: Vagharelo Bhaat Recipe - Gujarati Masala Rice
main_tag: gujarati﻿ dinner vegetarian  dahiyogurt, besan, jeera, raikadugu, hing, haldi, dhania, asmallbunch
description: Vagharela Bhaat most often made from leftover rice and cooked in spicy buttermilk is one of the most delicious comfort foods to savor on a cold winter night. Rustic and calming aromas get released when the rice gets cooked in buttermilk that is flavored with asafoetida, red chillies and ginger. Each family from Gujarat has a special way of making the Vagharelo Bhaat Recipe and I attribute this recipe to the way my mother in law and her past generations have been making it.

name: Spicy Paneer Pulao With Vegetables
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  jeera, elaichi, haldi, pudina, frenchbeans, gajjar, homemadecottagecheese
description: The Spicy Paneer Pulao With Vegetables Recipe, is a simple, nutritious and delicious rice recipe that is quick to make and is packed with spices. The addition of roasted vegetables, paneer, black pepper and spices, gives the additional punch and flavour to the Paneer Pulao.

name: Moong Dal Karara Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani lunch vegetarian  split, dhania, hing, jeera, dalchini, badielaichi, dahiyogurt, dhania, dhania
description: Moong Dal Karara Recipe is a yummy curd based gravy similar to kadi pakoda. Here moong dal pakoras are fried in a paniyaram pan till they are crunchy and golden on the outside and then simmered in a curd based gravy. Addition of ginger and chillies in the pakoras give them a yummy flavour. Everyday spices are added to the gravy to make this dish delicious.

name: Beetroot Rice Recipe - Beetroot Pulao
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  jeera, raikadugu, elaichi, haldi, dhania
description: The Beetroot Rice Recipe is a super simple, quick to cook and delicious recipe that can go into your lunch box or the kids. Beetroot is one for those few vegetables which give the rice a nutty flavour and subtle sweetness.

name: Maharashtrian Style Patichya Kandyachi Zunka Recipe -Spring Onions and Besan Sabzi
main_tag: maharashtrian sidedish vegetarian  bulb greens, besan, adjust, haldi, raikadugu, hing
description: Maharashtrian cuisine surprises us with many recipes that are prepared using the day to day kitchen ingredients, when we run out of fresh produce in the pantry. Maharashtrian Style Patichya Kandyachi Zunka Recipe -Spring Onions and Besan Sabzi is one of those, which is prepared using spring onions and chickpea flour (besan). Patichya Kanda means spring onions in Marathi. Patichya Kandyachi Zunka Recipe is a flavourful dish prepared using very less ingredients. Zunka is a traditional dry Maharashtrian recipe preparation made using chickpea flour. If you have spring onions and besan in hand, it can be made in a jiffy when you run out of vegetables.

name: Rajasthani Methi Mangodi Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani lunch vegetarian  fenugreekleaves, jeera, haldi, dahiyogurt
description: Mangodi are a dried lentil dumplings widely used in the Rajasthani cuisine. Moong dal is soaked and then ground into paste with salt and chilli and then dried in the sun in small round shapes. You can easily find dried mangodi available in the market.

name: Punjabi Style Tinda Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: punjabi lunch vegetarian  applegourd, dhania, jeera, orasrequired, jeera, haldi, hing
description: Punjabi Style Tinda Sabzi is a flavourful sabzi, perfect for a quick weekday lunch. The humble tinda when flavoured with garam masala and other spices is sure to win over the most ardent Tinda skeptics. Quick and easy Tinda sabzi along with Chapati makes for a delicious lunch box meal.

name: आलू मटर सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Aloo Matar Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: punjabi sidedish vegetarian
description: आलू मटर सब्ज़ी रेसिपी एक पारम्परिक पंजाबी रेसिपी है जिसमे आलू और हरे मटर को टमाटर की ग्रेवी में पकाया जाता है. यह एक फ्लेवरफूल रेसिपी है जिसमे रोज के मसालो का प्रयोग किया जाता है. यह एक बहुत ही आसान रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है.

name: Bharwa Baingan Aur Pyaaz Ki Sabzi Recipe - Roz Ka Khana With Figaro Olive Oil
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  bainganeggplant, dhania, hing, haldi, drymangopowder
description: Bharwa Baingan Aur Pyaaz Ki Sabzi is a perfect combination of spicy masala and brinjals that is made sweet and spicy along with onions and jaggery. The Bharwa Baingan is cooked in Figaro Pure Olive Oil, making it lighter and healthier and low in fats.

name: Bengali Mooli Aloo Ki Sabzi  Recipe
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian  radish, aloo, haldi, raikadugu, jeera, onionnigellaseeds
description: There are many ways one can make radish sabzi or curry. Today's recipe is Bengali style Radish and potato curry with a mustard base. The pungent mustard blends so well giving a unique taste to the curry.

name: Masala Methi Bhindi Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, fenugreekleaves, jeera, hing, haldi, dhania, drymangopowder
description: Bhindi and methi are one of the most common vegetable at home and If you  want to try different version of methi and bhindi then you can try Masala Methi Bhindi Sabzi Recipe. This is easy to make and perfect way to add some green vegetable in your lunch or dinner menu. This is also a nice idea to stuff in protein into kids lunch box. You can even roll up phulkas to make rolls.

name: Bengali Potol Bhaja Recipe-Bengali Style Parwal Sabzi
main_tag: bengali sidedish vegetarian  parval, haldi
description: Potol or Parwal is one of the not so popular vegetables among many.popular in Bengal parwal is available through out the year. This humble vegetable is extremely delicious, and the texture of this dish is amazing. This dry Parwal Sabzi Bengali style makes a delicious side dish for your everyday meals recipes.

name: Mughlai Style Aloo Matar Gobi Gravy Recipe
main_tag: mughlai lunch vegetarian  gobi, matar, aloo, dahiyogurt, salted, jeera, dhania, dalchini, laung, elaichi, saunf
description: Mughlai Style Aloo Matar Gobi Curry/Sabzi Recipe is a rich onion based gravy that will keep you wanting to eat more than just one serving. This curry is prepared with day to day vegetables such as Potato/Aloo, Matar/Peas and Gobi/Cauliflower but the gravy it is cooked in gives it that extra flavour to these humble vegetables.

name: Paneer In Coconut Gravy Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, salted, dhania, jeera
description: Paneer is widely used in North Indian recipes but we decided to give it a South Indian twist with the addition of coconut. In this recipe of Paneer In Coconut Gravy Recipe, paneer is marinated in a coconut and onion masala and then cooked in classic tomato onion gravy, then finally garnished with crushed kasuri methi.

name: Keri Na Gotla Nu Shaak Recipe - Gujarati Style Ripe Mango Curry
main_tag: gujarati﻿ lunch vegetarian  ripe, besan, jeera, dhania, raikadugu, split, haldi, hing
description: Keri Na Gotla Nu Shaak Recipe is a Ripe Mango curry made with it's fresh pulp and it also uses the seed of the mango as well. The Gotla Nu Shaak recipe is absolutely easy with no fuss yet heavenly delicious so do try this sweet, spicy, tangy dish and treat your taste buds in this mango season.

name: No Onion No Garlic Lobia Masala Recipe In Electric Pressure Cooker
main_tag: gujarati﻿ dinner noonionnogarlic  lobia, jeera, haldi, dhania, besan
description: The No Onion No Garlic Lobia Masala Recipe is a delicious no onion no garlic curry which is perfect for your Fasting days. The gravy is made with gram flour/besan, tamarind paste and jaggery along with spices and there is no chopping required. You can make this curry in less than 15 minutes in a pressure cooker.

name: Paneer Stuffed Bhindi In Ajwain Tomato Gravy Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, homemadecottagecheese, dhania, caromseeds, dhania, haldi, driedfenugreekleaves
description: Paneer Stuffed Bhindi In Ajwain Tomato Gravy Recipe is a tasty and simple North Indian gravy recipe. Made with spiced crumbled paneer stuffed into bhindis which are cooked separately and then dunked in a tomato ajwain gravy.

name: कोथामली थोवयल रेसिपी - Kothamalli Thovayal Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian
description: थोवयल एक दक्षिण भाटिया रेसिपी है जिसे सूखा चटनी भी कहा जाता है. इसे खाने के साथ परोसा जाता है. यह हम कोथामली थोवयल रेसिपी बना रहे है जिसमे हमने ताज़े हरे धनिये का प्रयोग किया है.

name: Methi Dana Sabzi Recipe - Healthy Fenugreek Seeds Stir Fry
main_tag: rajasthani sidedish vegetarian  fenugreekseeds, hing, dhania, jeera, drymangopowder, haldi, dhania
description: Methi Dana Sabzi Recipe is a traditional Rajasthani dish where soaked methi seeds are cooked in everyday spices. There is a touch of sweetness in this sabzi with the addition of dates, raisins and jaggery and a bit of tanginess from the addition of amchur.

name: छिलके वाली मूंग दाल रेसिपी - Chilke Wali Mung Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner highproteinvegetarian
description: छिलके वाली मूंग दाल रेसिपी एक फ्लेवर से भरपूर दाल है जिसमे प्याज और टमाटर का प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इसे किसी भी रोटी, पराठा या चावल के साथ परोस सकते है. यह आपके रोज के खाने के लिए पर्याप्त रेसिपी है.

name: Baby Corn Carrot Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  gajjar, saunf, dhania, drymangopowder, haldi, dhania
description: Baby Corn Carrot Sabzi Recipe is a quick sabzi that can be made with ingredients that are commonly available in the kitchen. The recipe does not contain onions and garlic making it very much ayurvedic friendly.

name: Shimla Mirch Ki Launji Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  capsicum, onionnigellaseeds, saunf, haldi, dhania, drymangopowder
description: This is a super tempting launji of capsicum cubes, and very easy and quick to make. It is flavoured with nigella seeds, fennel seeds, green chillies and common spice powders, which can be served immediately and also stored for a few days. Addition of jaggery makes this launji so delicious and healthy, you can even use sugar if you like.

name: महाराष्ट्रियन कढ़ी रेसिपी - Maharashtrian Kadhi Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian
description: महाराष्ट्रियन कढ़ी रेसिपी एक क्रीमी दही की करी है जिसमे दही को बेसन के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह कढ़ी गर्मियों के दिनों में लिए पर्याप्त है क्यूंकि यह गर्मी से राहत देती है. अलग अलग राज्य में कढ़ी बनाई जाती है, लेकिन महाराष्ट्रियन कढ़ी हलकी सी मीठी होती है.

name: Mooli And Wadi Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: punjabi lunch vegetarian  radish, wadi, raikadugu, jeera, haldi, dhania
description: Mooli Wadi Ki Sabzi is an authentic Punjabi recipe that is common in most households. The pungent radish blends so well giving a unique taste to the curry.

name: Suran Jo Kheemo Recipe-Sindhi Style Grated Yam Sabzi
main_tag: sindhi lunch vegetarian  suransenairatalu, jeera, grated, haldi, jeera
description: Suran Jo Kheemo is an authentic Sindhi dish where in yam is grated and sauteed with other spices to get almost mashed(kheema) type sabzi. Though it sounds simple it is tasty. With just few simple spices, this suran jo kheemo tastes awesome with phulka.

name: Punjabi Mixed Vegetable Kadai Recipe
main_tag: punjabi dinner highproteinvegetarian  aloo, gajjar, frenchbeans, gobi, matar, capsicum, 1diced xa0 1chopped, tejpatta, jeera, driedfenugreekleaves, haldi, salted, onion tomatopaste, dhania, dalchini, laung, elaichi
description: Punjabi Mixed Vegetable Kadai is a popular restaurant style side dish that goes well with Phulka, Paratha, Naan or any Indian Bread. It is usually served in kadai.

name: Paneer Bhurji Gravy Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner highproteinvegetarian  jeera, raikadugu, hing, tejpatta, laung, badielaichi, elaichi, homemadecottagecheese, dhania, haldi, dhania
description: Paneer Bhurji Gravy is one of those recipes which can be cooked during house parties or you have sudden guest at your home for lunch or dinner. The use of spices brings a flavour in the gravy and it tastes great along with Tandoori Roti or Phulkas.

name: Broccoli Pakora Masala Recipe - Broccoli In Spicy Yogurt Gravy
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  besan, haldi, dahiyogurt, besan, raikadugu, jeera, hing, haldi, dhania
description: Broccoli Pakora Masala which is a quick, yummy and healthy side dish that can be prepared in no time for a busy weekday lunch or dinner.

name: Dahi Wale Makhane Recipe - Lotus Seeds In Curd Gravy
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  haldi, dhania, elaichi, laung, dahiyogurt, besan, lotusseeds, jeera
description: Dahi Wale Makhane is a simple and tasty dahi based gravy, with added flavour from the whole spices. Here the lotus seeds are stir fried in a tangy masala and added to the yogurt gravy.

name: Til Moongphali Aur Kundru Sabzi Recipe - Sesame, Peanuts And Ivy Gourd Stir Fry
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  dondakayakovakkai, raikadugu, moongphali, tilseeds, dhania, haldi
description: Til Moongphali Aur Kundru Sabzi Recipe is a Sesame, Peanuts & Ivy Gourd Stir Fry. This is a simple stir fry recipe that is easy and quick to make too. This sabzi can go well with a complete vegetarian meal of a gravy and phulkas with salad or raita, or steamed rice and sambar. This is also a nice option for lunch box.

name: पनीर बिरयानी रेसिपी - Paneer Biryani Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: बिरयानी एक ऐसी डिश है जिसको बच्चे से लेकर बड़े तक सब पसंद करते है. यह एक वन पॉट मील है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. आप इसमें अलग अलग सब्ज़िओ का प्रयोग कर सकते है, लेकिन यहाँ आज हमने पनीर का प्रयोग किया है. पनीर में प्रोटीन की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है इसलिए आपको इसे अपने रोज के खाने में मिलाना चाइये।

name: Maharashtrian Style Farasbi Chi Bhaji Recipe - Beans Cooked With Peanuts
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian  frenchbeans, moongphali, haldi, raikadugu, hing
description: Maharashtrian Style Farasbi Chi Bhaji Recipe, a simple recipe made from French Beans that is made in every Maharashtrian household. Very nutritious and simple to make, you can pack it in your everyday Lunch Box too.

name: Thotakura Vepudu Recipe - Andhra Style Amaranth Greens Stir Fry
main_tag: andhra lunch vegetarian  haldi, tilseeds, raikadugu, jeera, split
description: Amaranth Greens are known as thotakura in Telugu. Amaranth are known as one of the superfoods having rich content of proteins, anti-oxidants and dietary fibre. The fresh greens when included regularly in our diets, will keep the insulin levels under control.

name: Stuffed Bhindi Recipe With Peanuts
main_tag: southindian maincourse vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, moongphali, tilseeds, dhania, haldi, drymangopowder, besan
description: The Stuffed Bhindi Recipe With Peanuts, is a simple and yet quick recipe that you can make at home. The addition of tomatoes in the recipe, makes it perfect to have it along with phulkas or tawa parathas or even pack into your lunch boxes.

name: Maharashtrian Style Dudhi Kajuchi Sonari Amti Recipe - Bottle Gourd And Cashew Nut Sabzi
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian  lauki, dalchini, hing, haldi, besan, dhania, dalchini, laung, dhania, raikadugu
description: Maharashtrian Style Dudhi Kajuchi Sonari Amti Recipe (Bottle Gourd and Cashew Nut) is a rich curry made with a combination of soft cooked bottle gourd and crunchy cashew nut in a creamy and rich coconut and gram flour curry.

name: Chow Chow Pasi Paruppu Poriyal Recipe - Chayote Squash And Moong Stir Fry
main_tag: southkarnataka sidedish vegetarian  chayotesquash, split, raikadugu, hing
description: Chow Chow Pasi Paruppu Poriyal Recipe is a simple to cook stir fry with chayote squash and moong dal. The delicate flavours of the chayote squash amalgamates very well with the crunchy moong dal and freshly grated coconut.

name: पंजाबी मेथी कढ़ी रेसिपी - Punjabi Methi Kadhi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian
description: पारम्परिक पंजाबी कढ़ी एक स्वाद से भरपूर कढ़ी है जिसे उत्तर भारत के हर घर में बनाया जाता है. यहाँ हमने उसी कढ़ी में मेथी का प्रयोग किया है जो इसका पोषण और स्वाद बढ़ाती है. इस कढ़ी को अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बनाने और इसका आनंद ले.

name: गुजराती खट्टा मग रेसिपी - Gujarati Khatta Mag Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ sidedish noonionnogarlic
description: खट्टा मग और मूंग रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसमे मूंग को दही के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह एक गुजराती रेसिपी है जिसे हर घर में बनाया जाता है. इसमें हींग और अदरक डाला जाता है, जो इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ाता है. यह बनाने में बहुत आसान है और सेहतमंद भी है. इसे खासतर गर्मियों के दिनों में बनाया जाता है.

name: Oats, Peas & Tofu Stuffed Paratha Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  capsicum, matar, oatmeal, haldi, drymangopowder, dhania
description: Oats, Peas & Tofu Stuffed Paratha Recipe is an innovative version adding a twist to your stuffed paratha. It is very important to incorporate as much as good nutrition into your paratha as it becomes easy to relish it as well as it goes into your everyday diet.

name: Gujarati Khatta Mag - Green Moong in Buttermilk Curry
main_tag: gujarati﻿ sidedish noonionnogarlic  whole, dahiyogurt, besan, haldi, hing, raikadugu, jeera, dhania
description: Khatta Mung / Moong Recipe is a delicious preparation of green moong beans what is cooked and simmered in a spicy yogurt curry. This Khatta Moong recipe is my mother-in-law’s signature dish that the first time she made it I fell in love with it. Green Moong when combined in butter milk along with the simple and delicate flavours of asafoetida and ginger makes this dish a perfect comfort food. I have this deep belief that by applying less complicated cooking techniques and using simple and few ingredients one can bring out the true flavors of a dish.

name: Methi Mushroom Masala Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  dahiyogurt, tejpatta, haldi, onionnigellaseeds, driedfenugreekleaves
description: This recipe is mouthwatering for all the mushroom lovers. Here, methi leaves are added to bring out a unique flavor which we always search to make a common dish taste extraordinary. Serve freshly made methi mushroom masala, as it is easy to prepare with parathas for weekday lunch or for dinner. Try this recipe and we are sure your family will love it! You can also make this recipe for lunch or dinner when you are expecting guests at home.

name: Dahi Wale Paneer Recipe - Paneer In A Curd Gravy
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, capsicum, jeera, dhania, dahiyogurt, salted, paste, dhania, haldi, haldi
description: Dahi Wale Paneer is a delectable gravy where Paneer is cooked along with a rich curd gravy. It is easy to make and is a perfect recipe when you are craving for a restaurant style Paneer curry.

name: Kashmiri Paneer Gravy Recipe
main_tag: kashmiri maincourse vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, hing, jeera, saunf, haldi, tejpatta, badielaichi, elaichi, dalchini
description: Kashmiri Paneer Gravy recipe is a popular Paneer preparation made with pieces of fried paneer (cottage cheese) simmered in a tomato sauce flavoured with spices and fennel seeds powder. It makes a quick and easy weeknight dinner. It's a simple gravy to prepare at home with minimal ingredients.

name: लौकी रायता रेसिपी - Lauki Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: लौकी रायता रेसिपी, सेहतमंद और बनाने में आसान, आप इस रायते को अपने खाने के साथ परोस सकते है. इस रायते को दूधी या लौकी को घिस के रायते में मिलाया जाता है और फिर रोज के मसालो से फ्लेवर किया जाता है.

name: बीटरूट पराठा रेसिपी - Whole Wheat Beetroot Paratha Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  चक  दर
description: बीटरूट पराठा रेसिपी एक बहुत ही अच्छा तरीका है अपने बच्चो को बीटरूट खिलने का. यह फाइबर से भरपूर है और बनाने में भी बहुत आसान है. सेहतमन्द होने के साथ साथ, यह बहुत स्वादिष्ट भी होता है.

name: Kancha Peper Kofta Curry Recipe-Bengali Green Papaya Kofta Sabzi
main_tag: bengali sidedish vegetarian  dhania, jeera, besan, haldi, dhania, tejpatta, dahiyogurt, driedfenugreekleaves
description: Kancha Peper Kofta Curry Recipe is a Bengali Green Papaya Kofta Sabzi. Most of us love ripe and bright orange papaya as a fruit but the raw green papaya is also as much edible and lovable as the fruit is. Raw papaya can be used as a vegetable in our daily diet, but this needs cooking to be consumable, unlike fresh ripe papayas. Green papaya has higher amounts of papain and potassium. It is a great idea to include raw papayas for indigestion problem.

name: Banarasi Gobhi Ki Sabzi Recipe -Cauliflower Cooked With Nigella
main_tag: uttarpradesh sidedish vegetarian  gobi, onionnigellaseeds, jeera, fenugreekseeds, saunf, haldi, dhania, jeera
description: Banarasi Gobhi Ki Sabzi Recipe is a delighted cauliflower dry curry flavoured with the nigella seeds which is also known as kalonji. Kalaunji is a dried onion seeds, which when cooked with adds a rustic taste to the dish. This Banarasi Gobhi Ki Sabzi Recipe is cooked in mustard oil which adds a nice smoky flavour. The mildly spiced ground masala paste, and the kalonji adds a nice flavour and crunch to the dish.

name: Paneer Do Pyaza Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, jeera, elaichi, haldi, dhania, driedfenugreekleaves
description: Do Pyaza in Persian means two onions and this curry is usually prepared with double the quantity of onions. Onions are added at two stages during cooking and hence the name is Paneer Do Pyaza. Paneer Do Pyaza is a semi gravy recipe prepared with soft paneer and plenty of onions in a creamy base.

name: Mangai Inji Pickle Recipe- Instant Mango Ginger Pickle
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  mangainji, gingelly, raikadugu, haldi, hing
description: Mango Ginger is a unique spice which resembles the ginger but imparts fresh mango flavor. IT is actually related to turmeric. It is very healthy and used for curing cough, diarrhea, fever etc. Today’s recipe is about a simple pickle called ‘Mangai Inji’. Mango Ginger is combined with chili powder, turmeric and salt. The taste is further enhanced after we temper with sesame oil and mustard.

name: Mango Ladoo Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  puree, elaichi
description: Mango Ladoo Recipe tastes so good and they are completely different from the regular ladoos. It can be made instantly with just three ingredients. If you have any sudden guests in home and you have homemade mango puree, you can prepare this for them during mango season.

name: No Onion No Garlic Kadamba Sambar Sadam - Kovil Sadam Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  splittoordal, vatana, whitechickpeas, lobia, haldi, aloo, ashgourdwhitepumpkin, frenchbeans, chayotesquash, bainganeggplant, bengalgramdal, split, dhania, fenugreekseeds, raikadugu, hing, turkeyberries, gingelly
description: No Onion No Garlic Kadamba Sambar Sadam/ Kovil Sadam Recipe is a delicious sambar sadam recipe. Kadamba means mixed and in this recipe there is a mix of different vegetables like beans, chow chow, potatoes, brinjal, ash gourd and different legumes like toor dal, chole, black eyed beans and dried peas. Fresh ground sambar powder lifts the taste of this comforting Sambar sadam.

name: Oats Uttapam topped with Paneer Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu southindianbreakfast vegetarian  semolinarava, flattenedrice, split, whole, splittoordal, bengalgramdal, fenugreekseeds, oatmeal, dahiyogurt, homemadecottagecheese, gajjar, capsicum, dhania
description: Oats Uttapam topped with Paneer Recipe  is made with the instant dosa mix powder so the dish is super simple and quick to make. Uttapam are very famous in South India especially in Tamil Nadu, they from their staple breakfast in the morning. They are nothing but thick pancakes made with dosa batter and topped up with different savory toppings. In this recipe we have topped it with some cottage cheese or  paneer and some vegetables to add to the crunch and nutrition.

name: Suran Ki Sabzi Recipe - Jimikand Masala Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian maincourse vegetarian  suransenairatalu, matar, haldi, dahiyogurt, dalchini, laung, badielaichi, dhania
description: Suran Ki Sabzi is a delicious and rich gravy with suran/yam cooked in whole spices. The addition of dahi along with garam masala and other fresh spices, makes this Suran Ki Sabzi absolutely delicious.

name: Achari Gobi Shimla Mirch Ki Sabzi Recipe - Capsicum And Cauliflower Sabzi
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  gobi, capsicum, dhania, jeera, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds
description: Achari Gobi Shimla Mirch Ki Sabzi is a delicious combination of Cauliflower and Capsicum which is spiced with the achaar masala giving it a distinct taste and flavour.

name: कोल्हापुरी पालक अंडे की करी रेसिपी - Kolhapuri Palak Egg Curry Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch eggetarian
description: कोल्हापुरी पालक अंडे की करी रेसिपी फ्लेवर से भरपूर है. इसमें स्वाद के लिए जीरा, लॉन्ग, तेज पत्ता, पालक, प्याज और नारियल का प्रयोग किया जाता है. गरम मसाला पाउडर भी डाला जाता है जो इस करी को और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है. पालक डालने से इसमें नुट्रिशन बढ़ता है क्यूंकि पालक में आयरन की मात्रा अधिक होती है.

name: मुत्तई कुंजहम्बू रेसिपी - South Indian Egg Curry Recipe
main_tag: southindian dinner eggetarian  ग र न शक ल ए
description: मुत्तई कुंजहम्बू रेसिपी एक दक्षिण भारत स्टाइल एग करी है जिसे आप चावल, पराठा और फुल्का के साथ परोस सकते है. यह एक सरल ग्रेवी है जिसमे नारियल, इमली और पइसे हुए मसालो का प्रयोग किया जाता है.

name: Shabnam Curry Recipe - Mughlai Style Mushroom And Peas Gravy
main_tag: mughlai maincourse vegetarian  matar, jeera, dhania
description: Shabnam Curry is a creamy dish from the Mughlai Cuisine.

name: Spinach Corn Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner highproteinvegetarian  jeera, adjustable, haldi, dhania
description: Spinach Corn Sabzi is an easy recipe and healthy option for those who like eating healthy. It is the best way to add green vegetable in your meal. In this recipe, steamed corn is added in the spinach curry which is spiced with Indian masalas like ginger garlic paste, green chillies, onions, haldi, red chilli powder, coriander powder. It is also a great recipe to serve in your house parties along with Parathas or Pulao.

name: Suran Kebab Masala Recipe - Yam In Tomato Onion Gravy
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  suransenairatalu, haldi, dhania, jeera, dahiyogurt
description: A masaledar dish, this Suran Kebab Masala Recipe is an unique dish where, suran/yam is cooked like a kebab and added to a spicy tomato-onion gravy. Crispy cubes of suran coated in kebab masala, and added to this simple gravy.

name: Chana Dal And Methi Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  bengalgramdal, fenugreekseeds, jeera, raikadugu, hing, haldi, drymangopowder, dhania
description: Chana Dal and Methi Sabzi is an easy recipe which is cooked with the day to day masalas. In this recipe, Chana dal and methi are cooked with regular masalas which enhance the flavour of this dish even more. This recipe takes less time to cook, so you can even make this for your lunch box during busy weekday mornings. This sabzi is filled with nutrition and can be served as a side dish with your regular meals.

name: Adraki Rajma Masala Recipe - Rajma Masala Recipe
main_tag: bihari lunch highproteinvegetarian  largekidneybeans, haldi, dhania, tejpatta, dhania
description: Adraki Rajma Masala Recipe is a delectable peppery gravy prepared using red kidney beans or rajma. In this recipe, the Rajma Masala is prepared by cooking the boiled rajma beans with the dry ginger and pepper based gravy, which adds a rustic flavour to the dish.

name: Hariyali Gobi Recipe - Palak Cauliflower Curry Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch diabeticfriendly  gobi, haldi, jeera, dalchini, jeera, haldi, salted
description: You must try the Hariyali Gobi that if a simple and yet delicious gravy where the spiced palak curry is tossed in with pan roasted cauliflower. This dish is packed with nutrition and can be served as a main course for a quick weeknight dinner.

name: Malvani Kala Chana Masala Recipe - Spicy Kala Chana Curry
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian  dhania, saunf, jeera, laung, dalchini, elaichi, badielaichi, brownchickpeas, raikadugu, jeera, dhania
description: The Malvani Chana Masala is a delicious kala chana curry made by roasting the fresh spices and cooked in spicy tamarind gravy.

name: Ajwaini Kache Kele Ki Sabzi Recipe -Plantains Cooked With Caraway Seeds
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  jeera, caromseeds, dhania, haldi, drymangopowder, dhania
description: Ajwaini Kache Kele Ki Sabzi Recipe is a delicious dish prepared using raw banana's or plantains spiced with the caraway seeds. Amchur powder adds a slight tanginess to the dish. The addition of caraway seeds to the plantains, aids in better digestion. The plantains are cooked in simple spices adding flavour and delicious taste. This sabzi is cooked without onion and garlic, therefore you can also make it during your fasting days.

name: घी रोस्ट डोसा रेसिपी - Homemade Crisp Ghee Roast Dosa (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  प रय गअन स र
description: घी रोस्ट डोसा एक सरल रेसिपी है जो बहुत जल्दी बन जाती है अगर डोसे का मिश्रण तैयार हो. दाल और चावल से बना यह डोसा सेहतमंद है और बच्चो के बिच में भी पसंद किआ जाता है. आप इसे अपने नाश्ते के लिए या रात के खाने के लिए बना सकते है.

name: पालक धनिया डोसा रेसिपी - Spinach And Coriander Dosa Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian
description: डोसा एक प्रसिद्ध नाश्ते की डिश है जिसे दक्षिण भारत के हर घर में बनाया जाता है. इसे अक्सर नारियल की चटनी और सांबर के साथ परोसा जाता है. यहाँ हम उस डोसे को एक ट्विस्ट देंगे। इस डोसे में हमने धनिये और पालक की प्यूरी मिले है जिससे यह डोसा और भी स्वादिष्ट और सेहतमंद बनता है.

name: कॉर्न और ड्रमस्टिक सलाद रेसिपी - Corn And Drumstick Leaves Salad Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: कॉर्न और ड्रमस्टिक सलाद रेसिपी एक सरल रेसिपी है जिसमे कॉर्न और ड्रमस्टिक को मिला के उसमे ड्रेसिंग डाली जाती है. आप इसे अपने खाने के साथ परोस सकते है या फिर स्नैक की तरह खा सकते है.

name: Egg Sholay Kebab Recipe
main_tag: southindian appetizer eggetarian  besan, maida, dhania, jeera
description: Egg Sholay Kebab Recipe is a popular appetizer in South India. Eggs are hard boiled and coated with a thick batter of flour and various spice powder and then deep fried.  Finished off with a generous topping of crispy curry leaves, that add not only great flavor but also a crunch to the bite of the eggs along with these curry leaves.

name: टमाटर और कढ़ी पत्ते की चटनी रेसिपी - Tomato Curry Leaf Chutney Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian
description: टमाटर और कढ़ी पत्ते की चटनी रेसिपी एक साइड डिश है जिसे आप अपने खाने के साथ परोस सकते है. इसमें प्याज और लहसुन का प्रयोग नहीं किया जाता। इसमें टमाटर और हरी मिर्च को पीस कर रोज के मसालों के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह बनाने में बहुत आसान है और आप इसे कम समय में तैयार भी कर सकते है.

name: ड्राई फ्रूट हलवा रेसिपी - Dry Fruit Halwa Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian
description: ड्राई फ्रूट हलवा रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसमे खजूर, अंजीर, पिस्ता, काजू और अखरोट का प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इस हलवा से बर्फी भी बना सकते है. यह बहुत सेहतमंद है और बच्चे भी इसे पसंद करते है. आप चाहे तो इसम अपने पसंद के ड्राई फ्रूट्स का प्रयोग कर सकते है.

name: कुलीथ तिल चटनी रेसिपी - Horsegram Sesame Chutney Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  सफ़ द
description: कुलीथ तिल चटनी रेसिपी एक सरल और सेहतमंद चटनी है जिसे आप इडली और डोसा के साथ परोस सकते है. यह चटनी आप अपने खाने के साथ भी परोस सकते है. कुलीथ की दाल में प्रोटीन की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है, इसलिए आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने में भी मिला सकते है.

name: Karnataka Style Bendekayi Gojju - Kayirasa Recipe
main_tag: northkarnataka lunch vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, split, bengalgramdal, raikadugu
description: Karnataka Style Bendekayi Gojju/Kayirasa Recipe is the Karnataka style Okra curry in a tamarind coconut gravy which is one of the popular gravy recipes made with Okra/lady’s finger.

name: Maharastrian Batatyachi Bhaji Recipe-Quick and Simple Aloo Sabzi
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian  aloo, haldi, dhania, raikadugu, jeera, hing
description: The Maharastrian Batatyachi Bhaji is a simple and quick recipe that you can make with potatoes. It has the least amount of spices and uses very less oil in cooking making it very healthy to eat. Curry leaves, ginger and green chillies add a subtle flavour to this amazing potato fry recipe. Batatyachi Bhaji is usually served as bhog for lord Ganesha. In case you are making it for bhog then skip the onions in the recipe.

name: Carrot Beans Sukhi Sabzi Recipe With Simple Masala
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian  gajjar, frenchbeans, haldi, dhania, drymangopowder
description: Carrot Beans Sukhi Sabzi is a quick and easy healthy sabzi that is made with simple masalas at home. Keeping the masalas simple, brings out the real taste of the vegetables. The addition of jaggery and amchur to the recipe also adds to the perfect flavor  to serve along with phulkas or even combine it with rice.

name: Turai Pyaz Hari Mirch Ki Sabzi Recipe-Ridge Gourd Stir Fry With Green Chili And Onions
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  turaipeerkangai, largegreenchilli, caromseeds, haldi, dhania, drymangopowder, dhania
description: The Turai Pyaz Hari Mirch Ki Sabzi Recipe is a simple and yet delicious recipe that is made from ridge gourd and cooked along with badi hari mirch (long chillies used for bajji and pakora) and cooked in spices. Ridge gourd is low in fat and calories, making it a good choice for including in a well-balanced diet for weight loss.

name: Mizoram Inspired Veg Sawhchiar Recipe-Rice Pilaf With Kashmiri Red Chillies, Bay Leaf and Paneer
main_tag: northeastindia maincourse vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, elaichi, tejpatta, palak
description: Mizoram Veg Sawhchiar Recipe is the rice pilaf recipe which is made with only vegetarian ingredients, which is a twist to the traditional Mizoram recipe of Sawhchiar which uses majorly non vegetarian ingredients like chicken or pork. In this recipe, I have kept the traditional ingredients like lettuce, spinach, black pepper and cardamom but have also added paneer & bay leaf for added flavour and vigour to the dish.

name: Beetroot Moong Phali Sabzi Recipe-Beetroot Stir Fry with Roasted Peanuts
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  sambaronions, haldi, dhania, drymangopowder, moongphali
description: The Beetroot Moong Phali Sabzi Recipe is a wholesome simple sabzi, that is flavored with peanuts, coriander powder and amchur. The addition of peanuts brings in a delicious crunch to the recipe.

name: Methi Paneer Bhurji Recipe in Creamy Gravy
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  haldi, jeera, haldi, capsicum, fenugreekleaves, driedfenugreekleaves, homemadecottagecheese, dhania
description: The Methi Paneer Bhurji Recipe is a delicious recipe of North Indian that is made with a combination of spices in a rich creamy tomato gravy. The addition of fresh fenugreek leaves in the creamy tomato gravy, blends perfectly well with the paneer.

name: Methi Chaman Recipe -Paneer In Dark Leafy Greens Based Gravy
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  fenugreekleaves, palak, homemadecottagecheese, jeera, haldi, dhania
description: Methi Chaman Recipe (Paneer In Dark Leafy Greens Based Gravy) is one of the popular side dish recipe with paneer in a creamy fenugreek & spinach gravy.

name: Matar Paneer Kulcha Recipe -Cottage Cheese And Peas Stuffed Leavened Flat Bread
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian  maida, dahiyogurt, homemadecottagecheese, matar, pudina, dhania, jeera, saunf, caromseeds
description: Matar Paneer Kulcha is a delicious leavened flat bread stuffed with a spicy mixture of peas and paneer. The sweetness of the peas and the soft paneer are enhanced by the subtle and aromatic spices, which make it a perfect accompaniment for a range of North Indian curry dishes.

name: Scrambled Eggs With Ridge Gourd Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast eggetarian  turaipeerkangai, dhania, haldi, dhania
description: Scrambled Eggs With Ridge Gourd Sabzi is a clever way of incorporating the ridge gourd into your diet. Ridge gourd is not preferred by many in spite of having many health benefits. Ridge Gourd has higher amounts of fiber and low in calories aiding in weight loss. It also helps in reducing the hyper acidity due to its cooling effects.

name: Aloo Matar Paneer Curry Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, aloo, matar, jeera, dhania, haldi, driedfenugreekleaves
description: Aloo Matar Paneer Curry Recipe is aloo matar curry made more tasty and fancy with the addition of paneer and mild spices. In order to increase the protein intake into your everyday diet we have added softly cut paneer cubes that goes very well with the combination.

name: Baby Corn Butter Masala Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  jeera, salted, driedfenugreekleaves
description: Baby Corn Butter Masala Recipe is a classic all-time favorite dish of the North Indian Cuisine. In this recipe the baby corn, the crispy baby corn is simmered in creamy tomato based gravy.

name: Vaangi Shimla Mirchi Bhaji Recipe - Brinjal Capsicum Gravy
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian  bainganeggplant, aloo, capsicum, haldi, dhania, raikadugu, hing
description: Vaangi Shimla Mirchi Bhaji Recipe is the Marathi name for Brinjals Capsicum Mix Vegetable.

name: Spinach Mushroom Chickpea Curry Recipe
main_tag: indian maincourse highproteinvegetarian  palak, whitechickpeas, haldi, jeera, dhania, pudina
description: Spinach Mushroom Chickpea Curry Recipe is a delicious and wholesome curry made from Kabuli chana simmer along with spinach and mushrooms. It makes a wholesome and high protein dish that you can serve along with rice or even along with Malabar Parotta.

name: Nawabi Paneer Curry Recipe
main_tag: hyderabadi maincourse vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, jeera, dalchini, laung, elaichi, jeera, matar, capsicum, dhania, haldi
description: Nawabi Paneer Curry Recipe is a lip smacking Hyderabadi dish, with a rich base of coconut and cashew nut gravy with lightly pan roasted paneer triangles. The addition of green peas and red bell pepper in the dish adds a lovely crunch along with the soft paneer, all of which is dunked in a smooth creamy gravy.

name: Achari Paneer Masala Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, capsicum, hing, dhania, saunf, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, onionnigellaseeds, jeera
description: Achari Paneer Masala is a delicious gravy which you can make for your everyday meals or for your house parties.

name: Bhatt Ki Dal Recipe - Traditional Kumaoni Black Bean Dal
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  jeera, haldi, dhania
description: Bhatt Ki Dal Recipe is a favourite among the Kumaon part of the country. Pahari Cuisine is famous among the  people who live in Uttarakhand or Kumaon region. It is mainly a hilly region where people eat simple and healthy food. It completely suits the difficult environment that they live under the Himalayan ranges.
