name: Mushroom Baby Corn Kaalimirri Recipe - Pepper Cashew Gravy
main_tag: indian maincourse vegetarian  laung, dalchini, jeera, elaichi
description: Mushroom Babycorn Kaalimirri Recipe is a lip smacking North Indian gravy dish which uses mushrooms and baby corn as the star ingredients.

name: शाही अंडे की करी रेसिपी - Shahi Egg Curry Recipe In Tomato & Cashew Gravy
main_tag: northindian dinner eggetarian
description: शाही अंडे की करी एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने वीकेंड के खाने के लिए बना सकते है या फिर अपनी हाउस पार्टीज के लिए भी परोस सकते है.

name: कच्चा आम और हरे प्याज की चटनी रेसिपी - Raw Mango And Spring Onion Chutney Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: कच्चा आम और हरे प्याज की चटनी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसमे क्रंच की जरुरत होती है. यह एक स्वादिष्ट चटनी है जिसे आप अपने नाश्ते के लिए परोस सकते है. आप इसे अपनी खिचड़ी या तहरी के साथ भी परोस सकते है.

name: आमला थोगयल रेसिपी - Amla Thogayal Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian
description: आमला थोगयल एक स्वादिष्ट चटनी है जिसे दक्षिण भारत के घरो में बनाया जाता है. यह एक सरल और सात्विक रेसिपी है जिसमे बहुत नुट्रिशन होता है. आप इसे बनाकर फ्रिज में 2 हफ्ते के लिए रख भी सकते है. इसे अपने नाश्ते या खाने के साथ परोसे.

name: Manipuri Style Sana Thongpa Recipe-Paneer and Green Beans in Milk Gravy Recipe
main_tag: northeastindia lunch vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, frenchbeans, jeera, haldi, dhania
description: Manipuri Style Sana Thongpa Recipe (Paneer and Green Beans in Milk Gravy Recipe), this dish hails from Manipur which is one of the seven states of the north eastern part of India. Manipur is located near the eastern part India that shares the border with Burma. They mainly consume ingredients that are fresh and grown in their households. The actual dish consists of paneer and green peas which is simmered in milk with the basic spice available. But instead of peas we have substituted with green beans, you can include any vegetable of your choice.

name: Achari Kaddu Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, fenugreekseeds, raikadugu, saunf, jeera, onionnigellaseeds, hing, drymangopowder, haldi, dhania
description: Achari Kaddu Ki Sabzi Recipe is a dry sabzi made with pickle masala that has the slight flavor of tanginess and strong flavor of spices. Pumpkin is a vegetable that is filled with lots of nutrients, as it has good amount of water content present in the vegetable. It is good for reducing cholesterol as well. The sabzi can be made any busy day to pack it for your lunch or just simply have it for dinner.

name: Odisha Style Aloo Bharta Recipe -Aloo Mash Sabzi
main_tag: oriya sidedish vegetarian  aloo, raikadugu
description: Odisha Style Aloo Bharta Recipe (Aloo Mash Sabzi) is a simple mashed potato stir fry with basic masala that is present in the kitchen. The subzi has tempered mustard seeds and dry red chilies that is then stir fried with soft mashed potato. The usage of mustard oil in cooking gives in a different flavor to the dish. The specialty of the Odia cuisine is that they use less oil and less spices to make the dish but turns out to be very flavorful.

name: Methi Shakarkand Aloo Sabzi Recipe - Sweet Potato & Fenugreek Leaves Sabzi
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  fenugreekleaves, jeera, dhania, haldi
description: Sweet Potato & Fenugreek Leaves Sabzi Recipe is a healthy side dish that you can try for a healthy diet. The sweet potato are first stir fried till it has a crispy texture outside and soft inside. It is then mixed along with freshly chopped fenugreek leaves. It is then sprinkled with Indian spice powders like coriander powder, red chilli powder and pepper powder.

name: Mango Kalakand Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  ripe, homemadecottagecheese, elaichi
description: Kalakand is a Rajasthani recipe and this Mango Kalakand recipe comes with added yumminess of ripe mangoes. This is an easy and quick recipe version of kalakand. This mango kalakand recipe is made with mangoes and solidified condensed milk, cottage cheese and flavored with cardamom and garnished with dry coconut strands. This Indian sweet recipe with mangoes can be had for a dessert after a sumptuous lunch or dinner.

name: Manda Pitha Recipe-Orissa Style Steamed Rice Flour Dumplings
main_tag: oriya dessert vegetarian  elaichi, homemadecottagecheese
description: This Rice Flour Manda Pitha recipe is an ancient recipe. This is a traditional recipe from Orissa that dates back to several hundred years. Unique to Odisha, Pitha is a recipe that just keeps getting better and better as it offers immense possibilities with many combinations. Pitha is basically steamed rice flour/rava dumplings stuffed with a sweet filling made from grated coconut, sugar or jaggery, freshly made paneer. Serve these Manda Pitha to start a festive lunch or during tea time.

name: Rajasthani Gatte Ki Sabzi Recipe With Onion & Garlic
main_tag: rajasthani lunch vegetarian  gramflourdumplings, besan, caromseeds, dahiyogurt, yogurtcurry, besan, dahiyogurt, hing, haldi, tejpatta, laung, dalchini, dhania, raikadugu
description: The Rajasthani Gatte Ki Sabzi Recipe is a traditional dahi based curry that is simmered along with a spiced gram flour dumplings called gatte. The addition of ginger, garlic and onions into the Gatte Ki Sabzi makes this curry absolutely delicious.

name: Karela Aur Baingan Ki Sabzi Recipe - Bitter Gourd Brinjal Sabzi
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  bittergourdpavakkai, bainganeggplant, raikadugu, jeera, fenugreekseeds, haldi, drymangopowder
description: Karela Aur Baingan Ki Sabzi is a simple North Indian side dish recipe that you can serve along with your meal. It requires only minimal ingredients and can be prepared in minutes. It is healthy and tasty side dish that is easy to make and can also be packed in your lunch box.

name: Jodhpuri Aloo Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani lunch vegetarian  tilseeds, jeera, saunf, hing, haldi, drymangopowder, dhania
description: Baby potatoes are everybody's favourite. This Jodhpuri Aloo Recipe is tangy, spicy, par boiled baby potatoes that are tossed in a sesame, fennel, chilli flakes masala with a dash of raw mango powder which is added right at the end to bring out the right kind of tanginess.

name: Carrot & Capsicum Sabzi Recipe - No Onion No Garlic
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  gajjar, capsicum, onionnigellaseeds, raikadugu, hing, dhania, drymangopowder
description: Carrot & Capsicum Sabzi Recipe is a delicious mix of crunchy Delhi carrots and capsicum that is tossed with masalas . This dish won’t take much of your time and easy to carry it for your lunch box along with phulka, dal or even just some jeera rice and raita.

name: Turia Muthia Nu Shaak Recipe - Gujarati Style Turai Sabzi
main_tag: gujarati﻿ maincourse vegetarian  fenugreekleaves, besan, haldi, turaipeerkangai, raikadugu, jeera, hing, haldi
description: Turia Muthia nu Shaak is an authentic Gujarati recipe that is made from ridge gourd also known as turia or turai and cooked in fenugreek leaf dumplings called muthia. These muthias or the gram dumplings also help the gravy to thicken while the ridge gourd adds nutritional value and fiber to this dish. You can also substitute the turia with mixed vegetables or just simple french beans as well.

name: Chicken Curry With Sweet Potatoes Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner nonvegeterian  dhania, dahiyogurt, haldi, laung, dalchini, jeera, dhania
description: Chicken Curry with Sweet Potatoes is a delicious North Indian Chicken recipe, which is spicy and delicious at the same time.

name: Kashmiri Style Veth Chaman Recipe-Paneer in Yogurt & Tomato Curry
main_tag: kashmiri lunch noonionnogarlic  homemadecottagecheese, hing, dalchini, elaichi, tejpatta, caromseeds, saunf, dahiyogurt, dhania
description: Kashmiri Veth Chaman is a typical Kashmiri recipe where the paneer is cooked in yogurt, fennel and tomato curry and whole spice like bay leaf, cardamom pod, cinnamon stick adds in flavour to this dish.. Kashmiri pandit cuisine is elaborate and gives out the ethnic identity of the pandits. The food is usually prepared in lots of yogurt, oil or ghee, and spices. The recipe uses no onions and garlic. It is very delicious and an easy recipe.

name: Parwal Masala Recipe - No Onion No Garlic Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  dhania, jeera, tejpatta
description: Parwal is a native vegetable of the Indian subcontinent and can be cooked in many ways. No Onion No Garlic Parwal Masala Recipe is a gravy recipe where parwal is first pan fried and then cooked in a tomato, ginger, watermelon seed gravy along with regular Indian spices.

name: Goan Style Chicken Vindaloo With Vegetables
main_tag: goan dinner nonvegeterian  gajjar, raikadugu, laung, elaichi, dalchini, jeera
description: Chicken Vindaloo is a delicious curry from the Goan cuisine that has a perfect blend of spices and is made more nutritious with the addition of vegetables and oats.

name: Sarson Chole Ka Saag Recipe - Kabuli Chana In Mustard Leaves Gravy
main_tag: northindian maincourse highproteinvegetarian  whitechickpeas, yellowcornmealflour, palak, jeera, dhania, haldi, salted
description: Sarson Chole Ka Saag Recipe is a highly nutritious sabzi made with the goodness of winter greens.

name: Paneer Matar Keema Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  matar, aloo, homemadecottagecheese, jeera, raikadugu, hing, dhania, haldi, dhania
description: Paneer Matar Keema Recipe is one of those recipes which can be cooked during house parties or you have guest at your home for lunch or dinner. It is a gravy side dish made with green peas, tomato, paneer and potato cooked with spices.

name: Grilled Chicken With Vegetables Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  capsicum, capsicum, dried
description: Grilled chicken is a perfect recipe for the days when you don’t want to spend much time in cooking and yet want to eat something tasty and super healthy. It is a perfect dish to eat after your heavy workouts.

name: Palak Matar Recipe - Spinach And Green Peas Curry
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  palak, matar, dhania, jeera
description: Palak Matar Recipe is a very flavourful yet simple to prepare. The simple spices used in it renders a beautiful flavour and aroma to the dish. Spinach is a super food loaded with nutrients and along with the sweet and delicious green peas makes it even more nutritious.

name: Sukha Kala Chana Masala Recipe - Ashtami Prasad
main_tag: northindian maincourse highproteinvegetarian  brownchickpeas, jeera, drymangopowder, jeera
description: Sukha Kala Chana Masala Recipe is a delicious and super healthy dish that is synonymous with the navratri ashtami prasad.

name: शकरकंदी और मेथी का पराठा रेसिपी - Sweet Potato & Methi Stuffed Paratha Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly
description: शकरकंदी और मेथी का पराठा रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट पराठा है जिसमे मेथी और शकरकंदी का मिश्रण भरा जाता है. यह सेहत से भरपूर है और आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए भी बना सकते है. भरने के मिश्रण में सरसों का तेल भी डाला जाता है जो इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ाता है. शकरकंदी डायबिटिक लोगो के लिए अच्छा माना जाता है और मेथी में आयरन और विटामिन C की मात्रा अधिक होती है.

name: Maharashtrian Style Kelfulachi Bhaji Recipe - Banana Flower Stir Fry Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian sidedish vegetarian  vazhaipoo, matar, raikadugu, jeera, hing, laung, malabartamarind
description: Maharashtrian Style Kelfulachi Bhaji Recipe (Banana Floweret Stir Fry Recipe) is a delicious stir fry made from the banana florets which is called “Kelfulachi” in a Marathi. The stir fry is made with a homemade Malvani Masala Spice mix that has the authentic aroma and flavours from the west coast of the region.

name: Bhindi Huli Recipe - South Indian Style Tangy Okra
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, haldi, raikadugu
description: Bhindi Huli Recipe (South Indian Style Tangy Okra) is a quick side dish of bhindi/okra flavored with red chilli powder, sambar powder, tamarind and onions; a healthy side dish with any meal. You can also pack this easy and tasty sabzi for your's and your kid's lunch box.

name: आंध्रा स्टाइल मूंगफली चटनी रेसिपी - Andhra Style Peanut Chutney Recipe
main_tag: andhra sidedish highproteinvegetarian
description: आंध्रा प्रदेश अपने चटनी और पौड़ी के लिए बहुत प्रसिद्ध है. इसलिए आज हम यहाँ आंध्रा स्टाइल मूंगफली चटनी रेसिपी बनाएंगे जिसमे प्रोटीन की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है. यह एक सेहतमंद चटनी है जिसे आप ऍबे दक्षिण भारतीता नाश्ते के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: Makki Ki Roti Recipe - A Classic North Indian Corn Roti
main_tag: northindian lunch glutenfree  yellowcornmealflour, caromseeds, salted, dhania
description: Makki ki Roti recipe is a classic Punjabi corn meal flat bread that is can be made plain or flavored with ajwain or even green chillies and ginger.

name: ढाबा स्टाइल उरद दाल रेसिपी - Dhaba Style Urad Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: ढाबा स्टाइल उरद दाल रेसिपी जिसे माश की दाल भी कहा जाता है अक्सर उत्तर भारत के ढाबो पर बनाई जाती है. इसे हांडी में बनाया जाता है जिससे इसमें एक अलग स्वाद आता है. इस दाल को अंत में तले हुए प्याज और अदरक से गार्निश किया जाता है जो इसमें फ्लेवर बढ़ाता है.

name: Pudina Sooji & Oats Dhokla Recipe - Steamed Semolina Cake With Oats & Mint Leaves
main_tag: gujarati﻿ northindianbreakfast vegetarian  semolinarava, pudina, dahiyogurt, hing, raikadugu, tilseeds
description: Pudina Sooji & Oats Dhokla Recipe is a the classic dhokla made by combining semolina with oats and mint leaves.

name: चाउ चाउ कोथमली चटनी रेसिपी - Chow Chow Kothamalli Chutney Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish diabeticfriendly
description: चाउ चाउ कोथमली चटनी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट चटनी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के साथ परोस सकते है. इसमें नारियल और धनिये का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसे और स्वादिष्ट बनाता है. आप इसे अपने नाश्ते के साथ भी परोस सकते है

name: Vellarikka Kosumalli Recipe- South Indian Style Cucumber Salad
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  gajjar, dhania, jeera, bengalgramdal, split
description: Vellarikka Kosumalli Recipe is a simple salad made with chunky cucumbers and grated carrots, with hint of spice from chopped green chillies and tanginess from lemons and extra flavour from tadka.

name: Kashmiri Style Tamatar Chaman Recipe -Paneer Cooked With Tomatoes
main_tag: kashmiri lunch highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, jeera, caromseeds, haldi
description: Tamatar Chaman is a delicious Kashmiri style paneer cooked in a tangy tomato gravy. It is a popular dish from the Kashmiri Muslim cuisine, where the use of the onion or garlic is negligible. Here, paneer blocks are fried in mustard oil and then dunked in a tomato gravy flavoured with fennel seeds and dry ginger. Both the fennel and dry ginger adds a distinctive flavour to the dish. It is prepared using very few ingredients, however the dish is delicious to be had with steamed rice.

name: Kashmiri Style Paneer in Spiced Milk Curry Recipe-Roz Ka Khana In Figaro Olive Oil
main_tag: kashmiri lunch vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, jeera, haldi, tejpatta, laung, elaichi, saunf, fenugreekseeds
description: The Kashmiri Paneer Recipe is a flavorful curry prepared by cooking fresh paneer cubes in milk flavored with cardamom and other spices. In this recipe we are cooking it along with pure olive oil making it light and healthy.

name: Drumstick Leaves Sabzi With Crushed Peanuts Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  moringamurungaikeerai, jeera, raikadugu, moongphali
description: Sabzi is our everyday essential side dish for each and every meal, sometimes difficult to decide on which ingredient to choose from. Here is one South-Indian stir fry sabzi recipe with drumstick leaves. These greens are extensively used for cooking nowadays as healthy alternatives. Loaded with nutrients, good in taste and cooks in few minutes. The use of fresh coconut and roasted peanuts adds to that extra crunch in each bite.

name: Kurkure Karela Sabzi Recipe - Crispy Karela Bhujiya
main_tag: northindian lunch diabeticfriendly  bittergourdpavakkai, saunf, haldi, dhania, drymangopowder
description: The Kurkure Karela Sabzi Recipe is a delicious diabetic friendly dry sabzi which is crispy and crunchy and has a chatpata taste from the amchur. In this recipe, Karela or Bitter Gourd is washed thoroughly and coated with salt and left to marinate and then tossed in masalas to give its flavor. In this recipe, we are using all parts of the Karela, including the skin that contains most of the nutrients.

name: Kali Mirch Aloo Bhindi Sabzi - Aloo Bhindi Pepper Fry Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  aloo, ladyfingerokra, haldi, jeera, jeera
description: The Kali Mirch Aloo Bhindi Sabzi Recipe is a delicious and simple recipe, where the potatoes and bhindi are tossed in freshly ground black pepper and jeera powder. The addition of black pepper and jeera, powder adds a very refreshing taste to the palate.

name: मंगानेम रेसिपी - Goan Style Chana Dal Payasam Recipe
main_tag: goan dessert vegetarian
description: मंगानेम रेसिपी एक तरह की खीर है जिसे गोवा में त्यौहार या किसी ख़ास अवसर पर बनण्य जाता है. यह मंदिरो में प्रसाद के लिए भी बाटा जाता है. इसमें चना दाल, साबूदाना के साथ गुड़, काजू और घी का प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के बाद मीठे के लिए भी बना सकते है, क्यूंकि यह स्वादिष्ट होने के साथ साथ बनाने में भी बहुत आसान है.

name: Daal Pithi Recipe
main_tag: bihari lunch vegetarian  whole, jeera, dhania, haldi, jeera, dhania
description: Daal Pithi is a super healthy recipe made of wheat dumplings boiled in red lentil soup. We hardly need 1 teaspoon of oil while tempering. Because of its soup like consistency, it is even loved by the toddlers. This recipe is perfect to eat for the expecting mother's who find it difficult to eat during their first semesters. As it has both wheat and red lentils, it forms a complete meal. This is a recipe which my mother used to cook and everyone in the family loved it.

name: Awadhi Khaas Nihari Recipe
main_tag: awadhi dinner nonvegeterian  iusedshanks, dahiyogurt, dhania, elaichi, dalchini, badielaichi, tejpatta, haldi, dhania, elaichi, fordum
description: Khaas Nihari is a slow cooked stew Recipe made with either beef or lamb cooked with its bone marrow, originated from Mughal or Awadhi cuisine. Authentically, Nihari is cooked in a vessel that is buried underground while it cooks overnight, which helps the recipe with very tender morsels of meat, infused with the flavourful bone marrow. Awadhi Khaas Nihari can be made with shanks and feet of beef or lamb. Typically garnished with coriander and ginger julienne to taste, Awadhi Khaas Nihari is served with Roomali roti or butter garlic naan and rice.

name: Kashmiri Style Shab Deg Recipe-Mutton Kofta and Turnip Curry
main_tag: kashmiri lunch nonvegeterian  badam, besan, badam, dhania, dahiyogurt, dhania, caromseeds, laung, elaichi, vessel
description: Shab Deg is a traditional Kashmiri Kofta Curry dish cooked with Turnips in a heavy bottomed deg/handi/vessel on charcoal fire. This recipe is a forgotten meat recipe from Kashmir which lost its authenticity with time. Traditionally Shab Deg was cooked with a slow cooking method where a large deg was kept on fire with all ingredients on it and was left to cook overnight. Typically served with rice, naan or sheermal, this dish is rich in every manner and not advisable for the faint hearts.

name: Alu Bukhara Murgh Recipe - Chicken With Indian Plums
main_tag: pakistani lunch nonvegeterian  indianplums, dahiyogurt, haldi, dhania, tejpatta, caromseeds, laung, elaichi, badielaichi, dalchini
description: Alu Bukhara Murgh is a delicacy that comes from the Nizam province. The dish is also majorly cooked in various parts of Awadh and also loved in Pakistan. Usually the delicacy is prepared with goat meat. But now with the passage of time, Indian plums got a whole new look when cooked with chicken.

name: Chicken Vindaloo Recipe
main_tag: goan lunch nonvegeterian  raikadugu, laung, elaichi, dalchini, jeera
description: Vindaloo is traditionally a Portuguese dish which made it's way to India and Goa in particular along with the invasion. Traditionally made with pork, over years the dish got infused with local Indian flavours as well as a chicken version started getting popular as a lot of people prefer chicken over pork in Indian context.

name: साओजी अंडे की करी रेसिपी - Saoji Egg Curry Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch eggetarian
description: साओजी या सावजी एक प्रसिद्ध भोजन का प्रकार है जिसे महाराष्ट्र के नागपुर इलाके में बनाया जाता है. इसमें ज्यादातर भोजन मांसाहारी होता है. यह भोजन बनाने में बहुत आसान तो है ही, साथ में बहुत स्वादिष्ट भी है. आज हम यहाँ साओजी अंडे की करी बनाएंगे, जो आपको जरूर पसंद आएगी।

name: Mixed Vegetable Sagu Recipe - Karnataka Style Vegetable Kurma Recipe
main_tag: karnataka southindianbreakfast vegetarian  gajjar, aloo, frenchbeans, ganthgobikadam, matar, haldi, raikadugu, split, dhania, jeera, pottukadalai, dalchini, laung, elaichi, dhania, pudina
description: Karnataka Style Mixed Vegetable Sagu Recipe is an authentic kurma recipe from the Karnataka Cuisine. Many homes and even hotels in Bangalore prepare this kind of Kurma which is eaten along with dosa, idli, puri and even steamed rice.

name: Matki Chi Usal Recipe - Spicy Moth Sprouted Salad
main_tag: maharashtrian snack vegetarian  matki, kollukulith, caromseeds, raikadugu, hing
description: Matki Chi Usal Recipe (Spicy Moth Sprouted Salad Recipe) is one staple food in most of the Maharashtrian households as it is very easy to make and very nutritious as well.

name: Pumpkin Thoran Recipe - South Indian Pumpkin Sabzi
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, sambaronions, raikadugu, haldi, jeera
description: Pumpkin Thoran is a very simple vegetable preparation of yellow pumpkin that is flavored with coconut , curry leaves adding to the delicious taste of this dish. This sabzi can be prepared for busy weeknight dinners. Made with only basic ingredients and cooks in under 15 minutes.

name: Bharli Vangi Recipe - Maharashtrian Style Stuffed Brinjals
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian  bainganeggplant, jeera, raikadugu, dhania, optional, moongphali, haldi
description: Bharli Vangi or Stuffed Brinjals is one of the Maharashtrian vegetarian delicacies where we stuff Brinjals (eggplants) with spicy stuffing and slow cook them. This can be prepared dry or with extra gravy and served with roti or chapati.

name: Menthia Keerai Paruppu Usili Recipe - Steamed Lentil Crumbled With Fenugreek Leaves
main_tag: southindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  fenugreekleaves, splittoordal, haldi, gingelly, raikadugu, hing
description: Menthia Keerai Paruppu Usili Recipe is a traditional South Indian dish which is a combination of steamed crumbled lentils combined with finely chopped steamed beans or sautéed fenugreek leaves or carrots or capsicum or vazhaipoo (banana flower).

name: किनुआ वांगी भात रेसिपी - Quinoa Vangi Bath Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: वांगी भात एक दक्षिण भारतीय डिश है जिसमे चावल को बैंगन के साथ पकाया जाता है. इसमें वांगी भात पाउडर का इस्तेमाल किया जाता है जो इस डिश का स्वाद और भी बढ़ा देता है. इसे आप अपने पसंद के रायते या नारियल की चटनी के साथ खा सकते है. यह दक्षिण भारत में सुबह के नाश्ते के लिए बनाया जाता है.

name: Baingan Sarson Ka Saag Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch diabeticfriendly  bainganeggplant, jeera, dhania, drymangopowder
description: Baingan Sarson Ka Saag Recipe where small purple brinjal is cut into 4 and then first stir fried in mustard oil and then sauteed with Spice powders like turmeric powder, chilli powder, coriander powder, garam masala powder and amchur powder. The mustard leaves are then cooked separately and then tossed along with the roasted baingan making the Baingan Sarson Ka Saag dish absolutely wholesome and delicious.

name: Mixed Vegetable Kurma Recipe - Vegetables in Spicy Coconut Curry
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  saunf, dalchini, laung, elaichi, pudina, sambaronions, or1largeonion, tejpatta, haldi, frenchbeans, gajjar, gobi, aloo
description: Mixed Vegetable Kurma Recipe is a simple, yet delicious recipe that is made with a combination of spices like saunf, cinnamon, cardamom and ground along with poppy seeds and coconut.

name: Chow Chow Verkadalai Masala Curry Recipe - Chayote Peanut Poriyal Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  chayotesquash, moongphali, drymangopowder, haldi, raikadugu, tejpatta, dhania
description: The Chow Chow Verkadalai Masala Curry Recipe is a simple easy one pot cook recipe that is flavored with sambar powder and curry leaves. It is made without onion and garlic, making it satvik and light on the stomach. The addition of peanuts, makes this dish very healthy and nutritious as well.

name: Sprouted Kollu Sambar Recipe - Horse Gram Sambar With Vegetables
main_tag: southindian lunch diabeticfriendly  kollukulith, gajjar, lauki, sambaronions, haldi, raikadugu, hing
description: Sprouted Kollu Sambar Recipe is simple and completely satisfying to eat. Vegetables like carrots and bottle gourd are cooked with tangy tamarind water and sambar powder and later mixed with cooked Sprouted Kollu or horse gram dal to make this delicious sambar.

name: Aloo Beetroot and Baby Corn Mixed Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian maincourse vegetarian  aloo, gajjar, frenchbeans, big, raikadugu, dhania
description: The delicious Aloo Beetroot and Baby Corn Mixed Sabzi Recipe is a North Indian Vegetarian sabzi which is a vegetable lovers paradise. Loaded with fresh vegetables, tempered with mustard seeds and cooked in mustard oil. This North Indian dry sabzi can be served with dal and  phulkas or used as a filling in wraps. Ensure the vegetables are cooked just enough and are still crunchy.

name: पंजाबी स्टाइल एग करी रेसिपी - Punjabi Style Egg Curry Recipe
main_tag: punjabi lunch eggetarian
description: पंजाबी स्टाइल एग करी रेसिपी एक स्वाद से भरपूर रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने वीकेंड पर बना सकते है. यह डिश आपको ज्यादातर उत्तर भारत के ढाबो पर मिलेगी। यह बनाने में बहुत आसान है और आप इसे अपनी हाउस पार्टीज के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: Amla Methi Sukhi Sabzi Recipe - Healthy Diabetic Sabzi
main_tag: northindian sidedish diabeticfriendly  nellikaigooseberry, jeera, saunf, caromseeds, hing, haldi, fenugreekleaves, dhania, jeera, dhania
description: Amla Methi Sukhi Sabzi Recipe is a lip smacking dish with spicy and tangy flavours. The tangy amla is boiled and tossed along with some methi leaves in a chunky onion - tomato base, and our Indian masalas.

name: Sindhi Style Besan Tikki Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: sindhi maincourse vegetarian  besan, pomegranateseedpowder, dhania, haldi, jeera, haldi, dhania, driedfenugreekleaves, dhania
description: Sindhi Style Besan Tikki Ki Sabzi is very popular Sindhi dish. This recipe is made with a spicy tomato and onion gravy which is so delicious and easy to make. When you don't have vegetables in your pantry, chickpea flour or besan makes for a great alternative. Sindhi Style Besan Tikki Ki Sabzi tastes great with both rice and rotis.

name: Bengali Style Sheem Poshto Recipe - Flat Beans In Poppy Seeds
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian  aloo, raikadugu, haldi, onionnigellaseeds
description: Bengali Style Sheem Poshto Recipe (Flat Beans in Poppy Seeds) is a recipe made with flat beans in other words called as Hyacinth Beans which is a very popular vegetable across India. This is one of the most famous way of making the Bengali curry with poppy seeds known as the Poshto Bata.

name: मसूर मूंगफली की दाल रेसिपी - Masoor Moong Phali Ki Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  स प ल ट
description: मसूर मूंगफली की दाल रेसिपी, स्वादिष्ट और रिच, यह दाल मूंगफली और मसूर दाल से बनाई जाती है. इसमें रोज के मसलो का प्रयोग किया जाता है और अंत में इसमें तड़का देकर हरे धनिये से गार्निश किया जाता है. मसूर दाल और मूंगफली, दोनों में ही प्रोटीन की मात्रा अधिक होती है इसलिए आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है.

name: Matki Dal Sabzi Recipe - Sprouted Moth Bean Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: indian maincourse highproteinvegetarian  matki, dhania, raikadugu, haldi
description: The Sprouted Matki Dal Sabzi Recipe is a wholesome and high protein dal recipe that is packed with flavors from lemon, green chillies and ginger. The addition of lemon and coconut, brings out the delicious flavors in this dish.

name: Jodhpuri style Gulab Jamun Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian maincourse vegetarian  mawa, homemadecottagecheese, maida, jeera, haldi, jeera, dhania
description: A unique recipe, Jodhpuri style Gulab Jamun Ki Sabzi Recipe is a delicious North Indian Jodhpuri style curry made with khoya and paneer, in the form gulab jamun-which is not sweet.

name: पंजाबी साबुत मूंग की दाल रेसिपी - Punjabi Sabut Moong Ki Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: पंजाबी साबुत मूंग की दाल रेसिपी एक बहुत ही सरल दाल है जिसे हर पंजाबी घर में बनाया जाता है. यह दाल आपकी सेहत के लिए भी अच्छी मानी जाती है क्यूंकि इसमें प्रोटीन की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है. इसमें प्याज, अदरक, टमाटर का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इस दाल को और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है.

name: बिहारी सुरन चटनी रेसिपी - Bihari Suran Chutney Recipe
main_tag: bihari sidedish diabeticfriendly
description: सुरन और जिमीकंद एक ऐसी सब्ज़ी है जिसमे प्रोटीन, मिनरल और एंटीऑक्सीडेंट की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है. यह डायबिटिक लोगो के लिए भी अच्छा माना जाता है. आप इस चटनी को अपने खाने के साथ या फिर अपने नाश्ते में परोस सकते है.

name: Bharli Bhendi Recipe - Maharashtrian Style Stuffed Bhindi
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, haldi, raikadugu, hing
description: Bharli Bhendi is a widely popular Maharashtrian dish. Bharli Bhendi as called in Marathi language, means stuffed Lady Fingers/Okra.

name: Himachal Style Khatta Jimikand Recipe - Spicy Tangy Yam
main_tag: himachal sidedish vegetarian  suransenairatalu, jeera, onionnigellaseeds, fenugreekseeds, raikadugu, haldi, drymangopowder
description: Himachal Style Khatta Jimikand Recipe (Spicy Tangy Yam) is more typically found in Pahari region, where there is a good produce of yam found in the hilly region. The cuisine hails from the snow Cap Mountains of himachal where cooking exotic food is very minimal.

name: Ragi Masala Roti Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch diabeticfriendly  fingermilletnagli, gajjar, dhania, jeera
description: Ragi Masala Roti Recipe is a diabetic friendly recipe made using ragi flour and carrots, dill leaves, coriander leaves, onions and green chilies. Mostly popular in  South India these ragi rotis can be had for breakfast lunch or dinner with a simple chutney or gravy.

name: Instant Kalakand Recipe -Indian Festive Sweet Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, elaichi, optional
description: Kalakand is a delicious milk fudge cake that is popularly made in India during the festive season. Kalakand is a popular Indian sweet made out of solidified, sweetened milk and cottage cheese. It is a rich sweet made from concentrated milk called Khoya and homemade Paneer called Chena. This is a quick and instant recipe of Kalakand that you can make for the festivities or any other special occasion in the family.

name: Indian Festive Sweet Rice And Jamun Bhog Recipe
main_tag: bengali dessert vegetarian  elaichi, tejpatta, homemadecottagecheese, maida, elaichi
description: Light up this Diwali Dinner table not only with colorful diyas and rangoli but also celebrate more with your homemade traditional festive sweets. Sweet Rice and Jamun Bhog recipe is my version of Sita Bhog, a Bengali sweet which we usually buy from sweet shops in Kolkata.

name: Aloo Patta Gobi Sabzi Recipe - Potato Cabbage Sabzi
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  aloo, pattagobimuttaikose, haldi, dhania, dalchini, laung, tejpatta, saunf, jeera, dhania
description: Aloo Patta Gobi Sabzi Recipe is a simple stir fry recipe where cabbage and potatoes are cooked along with some everyday masala. This is an easy recipe therefore you can even pack it in your lunch box.

name: Cabbage Capsicum Sabzi Recipe - Simla Mirch Patta Gobi Sabzi
main_tag: northindian maincourse noonionnogarlic  pattagobimuttaikose, capsicum, raikadugu, jeera, hing, haldi, dhania
description: Cabbage  Capsicum Sabzi is a satvik sabzi make without the use of onion and garlic. Cabbage and Capsicum are cooked with minimal spices, as in this case with just a pinch of red chilli powder and coriander powder.

name: मिक्स्ड मिलेट और दाल अड़ाई रेसिपी - Mixed Millet And Lentils Adai Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian
description: सुबह का नाश्ता बहुत ही महत्वपूर्ण होता है और इसका सेहतमंद होना बहुत जरुरी है क्यूंकि यह आपको पुरे दिन के लिए ताकत देता है. मिक्स्ड मिलेट और दाल अड़ाई रेसिपी एक सेहतमंद रेसिपी है जिसे बहुत समय से दक्षिण भारत में बनाया जा रहा है. इसको बनाने के लिए आपको मिलेट और दाल को रात भर पानी में सोखना पड़ता है और सुबह इसे बनाया जाता है.

name: Hariyali Paneer Tikka Masala Gravy Recipe -No Onion No Garlic Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, saunf, dhania, pudina, dalchini, elaichi, tejpatta, salted
description: Hariyali Paneer Tikka Masala Gravy is a rich and flavourful vegetarian sabzi made with Cottage Cheese traditionally called as paneer. Hariyali in Indian language means the colour "Green" which comes from the gravy made with a combination of coriander leaves, mint leaves, green chillies and ginger.

name: Kerala Pumpkin Black Eyed Beans Erissery Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, lobia, haldi, jeera, raikadugu, sambaronions
description: Kerala Pumpkin Black Eyed Beans Erissery Recipe is a quick pumpkin dish made healthier by adding black eyed beans. Flavors of Kerala like curry leaves, coconut, cumin are all present in the dish. A tadka of sliced sambar onions browned in coconut oil lifts the dish up.

name: Chakka Erissery Recipe - Kerala Style Coconut Laced Jackfruit Sabzi
main_tag: kerala sidedish vegetarian  kathal, haldi, jeera, raikadugu
description: Chakka Erissery Recipe is a delicious Kerala Style Coconut Laced Jackfruit Sabzi, that is served at the Traditional Kerala Sadhya, which is a grand feast made and served on a banana leaf during special occasions.

name: Jowar Jo Dodo Recipe - Sindhi Sorghum Roti
main_tag: sindhi maincourse vegetarian  sorghum, fenugreekleaves, dhania
description: Jowar Jo Dodo Recipe is a authentic Sindhi recipe of a gluten free flatbread with sorghum as the star ingredients. 'Juvar' is the Sindhi term for the word Jowar/Sorghum.

name: पंजाबी भिंडी कढ़ी रेसिपी - Punjabi Bhindi Kadhi Recipe
main_tag: punjabi dinner vegetarian
description: पंजाबी भिंडी कढ़ी रेसिपी में दही की करी बनाई जाती है और उसमे भिंडी का प्रयोग किया जाता है. हर उत्तर भारतीय घर में कढ़ी बनाई जाती है, लेकिन यहाँ हमने उसको भिंडी डालकर ट्विस्ट दिया है. अगर आप कुछ अलग बनाना चाहते है, तो इस कढ़ी को जरूर अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बनाने।

name: Sarson Saag Pulao Recipe-Spinach Mustard Greens Pulao
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  tejpatta, laung, dalchini, caromseeds, elaichi, palak, fenugreekleaves, dhania, pudina
description: Sarson Saag Pulao Recipe is a simple one pot dish. Made with all the mixed greens, this dish is highly nutritious and tasty. The addition of spinach leaves, bathua leaves and mustard leaves along with aromatic spices brings immense taste and nutrition to this pulao.

name: पाण्डु मिरापाकया पचड़ी रेसिपी - Andhra Red Chilli Chutney Recipe
main_tag: andhra sidedish vegetarian
description: पाण्डु मिरापाकया पचड़ी रेसिपी एक आंध्रा रेसिपी है जिसमे लाल मिर्च की चटनी बनाई जाती है. इस चटनी को बनाने के लिए बहुत कम सामग्री की आवश्यकता होती है. आप इस चटनी को अपने खाने के साथ या इडली, डोसा, उत्तपम, पनियारम के साथ भी परोस सकते है.

name: Mooli Bhurji Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian  radish, radishgreens, raikadugu, caromseeds, hing, haldi, drymangopowder
description: Mooli Bhurji is a popular Punjabi style/North indian style stir fry that's usually made using radish with fresh green leaves available in winter.

name: Konkani Style Kadgi Chakko Recipe - Raw Jackfruit With Coconut
main_tag: konkan sidedish vegetarian  kathal, dhania, split
description: Kadgi Chakko Recipe is a raw Jackfruit stir fry that originates in konkan region of Karnataka. Cook the raw jack fruit and temper it with coarsely ground spice masala and this dish is ready.

name: Chettinad Style Urulai Roast Recipe - Baby Potato Roast
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  jeera, raikadugu, dhania, dalchini, elaichi, laung
description: Chettinad Style Urulai Roast Recipe which is a spicy baby potato roast recipe is the classic version of the Chettinad style cooking. The masalas that are added into this roast are roasted and ground freshly and added which makes it the special dry gravy.

name: Punjabi Mooli Ki Bhurji Recipe
main_tag: punjabi sidedish vegetarian  radish, radishgreens, withstem, caromseeds, hing, haldi
description: Mooli Ki Bhurji Recipe is the authentic Punjabi dish which is prepared with radish and its leaves. Tender pieces of radish are cooked along with its leaves and spices to prepare this simple yet delicious recipe.

name: बैंगन मेथी का भरता रेसिपी - Baingan Methi Ka Bharta Recipe
main_tag: punjabi lunch vegetarian
description: बैंगन मेथी का भरता रेसिपी एक सरल रेसिपी है जिसमे बैंगन को रोस्ट करके उसे मेथी और रोज के मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है. इसमें मेथी डालने से इसमें रंग आता है और यह और भी सेहतमंद बन जाती है क्यूंकि मेथी में आयरन की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है. आप इस सब्ज़ी को अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: Paasi Paruppu Beans Poriyal Recipe - Moong Dal & French Beans Stir Fry
main_tag: southindian sidedish diabeticfriendly  frenchbeans, split, raikadugu, hing
description: Poriyal is essentially a part of the Tamil Nadu meals. It is a stir fry prepared using various vegetables with or without coconut in it. Paasi Paruppu Beans Poriyal Recipe (Moong Dal & French Beans Stir Fry) is a simple yet delectable poriyal recipe.

name: Khatti Meethi Tinda Masala Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  applegourd, caromseeds, haldi, drymangopowder, driedfenugreekleaves
description: Khatti Meethi Tinda Masala Recipe is a wonderful recipe made from the apple gourd which is a part of the “Gourd” family. In Indian local language it is called as “Tinda”, other terms are Indian baby pumpkin, Indian squash. The dish is prepared in one pot and therefore it is also easy to make it for a lunch box meal or for a quick dinner.

name: Muttaikose Pattani Poriyal Recipe - Tamil Nadu Style Cabbage And Peas Stir Fry
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish vegetarian  pattagobimuttaikose, matar, raikadugu, split, hing
description: Tamil Nadu Style Muttaikose Pattani Poriyal Recipe (Cabbage and Peas Stir fry Recipe) is a simple recipe made with cabbage and green peas. The recipe has mild flavor of the cabbages and is not seasoned too much with Indian spices. All we have added is the whole spice like mustard and dry red chilli. For the extra crunch we have added urad dal.

name: चावल बनाने की विधि रेसिपी - Steamed Rice Recipe
main_tag: indian maincourse vegetarian
description: चावल बनाने की विधि बहुत ही आसान होती है. आप इसे प्रेशर कुकर में बना सकते है या फिर सॉसपैन में. हर घर में अलग अलग चावल का प्रयोग किया जाता है और हर का स्वाद और बनावट थोड़ा अलग होता है. चावल जितना पुराना होता है, उसे पकने में उतना ही ज्यादा समय लगता है.

name: Pumpkin Erissery Recipe - Kerala Pumpkin Coconut Curry
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, raikadugu, split, haldi, jeera
description: Pumpkin Erissery Recipe is a traditional recipe of Kerala which is a must have in the Onam Sadya and other festive feasts. Easy to make and healthy, this dish typically is made with pumpkin and coconut. Sometimes other vegetables are also used to make erissery, but the most popular version is made with yellow pumpkin.

name: कल्याना वीतु सेनाई करी रेसिपी - Kalyana Veetu Senai Curry Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish vegetarian
description: कल्याना वीतु सेनाई करी रेसिपी एक सरल रेसिपी है जिसमे रतालू/सुरन को काट कर उसे रोज के मसालों के साथ पकाया जाता है. इस सब्ज़ी को खासतर त्यौहार या शादियों पर बनाया जाता है और खाने के साथ परोसा जाता है. इसे ज्यादातर तमिल नाडु के घरो में बनाया जाता है.

name: Sukhi Suran Masala Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  suransenairatalu, jeera, haldi, dhania, jeera
description: Sukhi Suran Masala Sabzi Recipe is a delicious flavourful recipe made with suran/yam stir fried along with onions and spices. This simple to make recipe is a good way to include yam in your diet.

name: Lau Er Khosha Bhaja Recipe - Bottle Gourd Peel Stir Fry
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian  lauki, aloo, onionnigellaseeds, haldi
description: Lau Er Khosha Bhaja Recipe is a delicious side dish which is made from lauki peels and tossed in spices. Bottle Gourd is a very popular indian vegetable and is usually eaten in summers.

name: Bhoplya Cha Bharit Recipe – Maharashtrian Pumpkin Sabzi
main_tag: maharashtrian maincourse vegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, jeera, raikadugu, hing, haldi
description: The Bhoplya Cha Bharit Recipe is simple stir fried sabzi made using chunks of yellow pumpkin, that is tossed with tempered mustard seeds, cumin and Curry leaves. Cooked pumpkin is just tossed with some mustard seeds, cumin seeds and curry leaves and flavoured with simple Indian masala like red chilli powder and Garam masala powder that brings out the flavour of the pumpkin really well.

name: Turai Baingan Ki Sabzi Recipe - Eggplant Ridge Gourd Sabzi
main_tag: parsi lunch vegetarian  bainganeggplant, turaipeerkangai, haldi, drymangopowder
description: Turai Baingan Ki Sabzi Recipe is a wonderful blend of two different vegetable that is cooked along with ground masala that has a right flavour of Dhansak in it. The ground paste is made first and is then added into the onions and tomatoes that are sautéed. The vegetables are then slowly cooked in the ground spice mixture until it becomes soft.

name: Kumaon Style Thechwani Recipe-Mooli Aloo Sabzi
main_tag: uttarakhand-northkumaon maincourse vegetarian  aloo, radish, jeera, fenugreekseeds, elaichi, haldi, jeera, dhania
description: North Kumaon Thechwani Recipe is a famous dish from Pahari cuisine that is particularly from a region called North kumaon in Uttarakhand. The sabzi is made by pounding radish and potatoes and mixed along with sautéed onions and tomatoes. They add simple homemade Indian spice powders to lift up the flavour.

name: Kumaoni Style Palak & Methi Ka Kapa Recipe
main_tag: uttarakhand-northkumaon lunch vegetarian  fenugreekleaves, jeera, hing, haldi
description: Kumaoni Style Palak & Methi Ka Kapa Recipe is a simple stir fry of Spinach and Methi leaves. The green leaves are sautéed and then cooked along with mild spices like dry red chillies and cumin seeds that is thickened slightly with rice flour. The recipe is most popular in Uttarakhand. The cuisine is popularly known as the Pahari Cuisine.

name: Kashmiri Saag Recipe - Kashmiri Style Spinach / Palak
main_tag: kashmiri sidedish vegetarian  palak, badielaichi, jeera, hing
description: Kashmiri Saag Recipe is a iron rich dish, where spinach is the star ingredient. It is stir fried along with garlic and simple spices to give out a lovely flavour.

name: Doi Shorshe Chingri - Prawn Mustard Curry Recipe
main_tag: bengali lunch nonvegeterian  haldi, dahiyogurt
description: Doi Shorshe Chingri - Bengali Prawn Mustard Curry Recipe is a popular Bengali Recipe where fresh prawns are marinated in turmeric and chilli powder and then cooked in a mustard, poppy seed gravy. A few simple ingredients go into this dish but it makes the gravy extremely flavourful.

name: Saragva Nu Lot Valu Shaak - Gujarati Besan Drumstick Sabzi
main_tag: gujarati﻿ lunch vegetarian  besan, dahiyogurt, hing, haldi, raikadugu, jeera, tilseeds
description: Saragva Nu Lot Valu Shaak is a delicious Gujarati preparation of steamed drumsticks that are dipped in a savoury gram flour curry. Drumsticks have always found their places in most regional cuisines of India. Each Gujarati family has their own variation to make dishes that include the drumstick and this one, in particular, is an all-time favourite of our family. The secret to cooking delicious Saragva (Shing) Nu Lot Valu Shaak is fresh drumsticks that are tender when bought and remain succulent even after cooking.

name: Patiala Aloo Recipe
main_tag: northindian maincourse noonionnogarlic  aloo, jeera, hing, fenugreekseeds, jeera, tejpatta, dhania, drymangopowder, haldi, driedfenugreekleaves, dhania
description: Patiala Aloo Recipe is a spicy aloo sabzi made Punjabi style. Potato cubes are pan fried and tossed in simple dry spice powders found in our Indian masala dabba.

name: मदुराई टमाटर की चटनी रेसिपी - Madurai Spicy Tomato Chutney Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish vegetarian
description: मदुराई टमाटर की चटनी रेसिपी एक खट्टी मीठी चटनी रेसिपी है जिसे तमिल नाडु के मदुराई में बनाया जाता है. इसे ज्यादातर डोसा, इडली या पनियारम के साथ खाया जाता है. इस चटनी में टमाटर के साथ लाल मिर्च, प्याज, लहसुन, इमली के साथ पकाया जाता है.

name: Sukhe Methi Chole Recipe
main_tag: indian maincourse vegetarian  whitechickpeas, fenugreekleaves, jeera, tejpatta, haldi, jeera, dhania
description: Sukhe Methi Chole Recipe is a lip smacking yet healthy dish, where kabuli chana is cooked along with a base of onion-tomato and the added goodness of methi leaves. Soft boiled chole, masaledar methi masala, makes this chatpata dish that can be served for breakfast or even lunch.

name: Sweet & Spicy Raw Papaya Moongphali Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani sidedish vegetarian  raikadugu, saunf, haldi, drymangopowder, moongphali
description: Sweet & Spicy Raw Papaya Moongphali Ki Sabzi Recipe is a mouthwatering side dish prepared like north Indian style. The raw papaya is cooked with a good amount of Indian spice that has both sweet and spicy taste to it. Finally it is tossed with some pound peanuts to give the extra crunch to dish.

name: Banana Stem Thoran Recipe - Ayurvedic No Onion No Garlic Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch noonionnogarlic  raikadugu, split
description: The Banana Stem Thoran Recipe is a wholesome dish made from banana stem that is tossed in a ground mixture of coconut green chillies and curry leaves. Banana stem is very high in potassium and vitamin B6, which together benefit the muscles and the body's production of hemoglobin and insulin.

name: Suran Ja Tuk Recipe - Sindhi Deep Fried Yam/Jimikand
main_tag: sindhi sidedish vegetarian  suransenairatalu, jeera, drymangopowder
description: Suran Ja Tuk Recipe is a traditional Sindhi dish. This simple yam fry involves boiling the yam cubes, and deep frying them. Finishing off the Suran Ja Tuk Recipe with a sprinkle of cumin powder, red chilli powder and amchur which instantly lifts up the dish.

name: Kerala Style Murungai Keerai Thoran Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian  moringamurungaikeerai, sambaronions, raikadugu, jeera, haldi
description: Kerala Style Murungai Keerai Thoran Recipe is quick stir fry of the drumstick leaves tossed with ground masala coconut. The fresh coconut and with other spices like cumin seeds, red chilli powder and turmeric are ground first and then it is added to a kadai with hot oil.

name: Kerala Style Kappa Ulathiyathu Recipe - Tapioca Stir Fry Recipe
main_tag: kerala appetizer vegetarian  raikadugu, haldi
description: Kerala Style Kappa Ularthiyathu Recipe (Tapioca Stir Fry Recipe) is a quick stir fry that has the authentic flavor from Kerala cuisine. The tapioca is an essential part of kerala cuisine like how coconut is extensively is used.

name: Fried Barnyard Millet Recipe -Fried Samvat Rice
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian  jeera, aloo, dhania, homemadecottagecheese
description: The nine day fast festival of Navratri is celebrated in the honor of Goddess Durga. Navratri fasting period is approaching soon and Samvat rice is one of the type of grain, which is allowed during that fasting period.

name: आलू पोस्टो रेसिपी - Aloo Posto Recipe
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian
description: आलू पोस्टो रेसिपी एक पारम्परिक बंगाली रेसिपी है जिसे हर बंगाली घर में रोज के खाने के लिए बनाया जाता है. इसमें खुस खुस का पेस्ट बनाकर आलू के साथ मिलाया जाता है. यह एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी तवा पराठा के साथ पैक कर सकते है.

name: मशरुम थोरन रेसिपी - Mushroom Thoran Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian
description: थोरन एक आसान सब्ज़ी है जिसे केरला के हर घर में बनाया जाता है. इसमें नारियल का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ाता है. आप थोरन में किसी भी सब्ज़ी का प्रयोग कर सकते है लेकिन यहाँ हमने आज मशरुम का प्रयोग किया है. आप इस सब्ज़ी को अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: Paan Matka Kulfi Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Paan Matka Kulfi Recipe is riot of flavours in your mouth. The milk is reduced to half its quantity, flavoured with hints of saffron and cardamom and then the star ingredient - meetha paan is added to the reduced milk.

name: Mambhazam Pulissery Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian  ripe, haldi, dahiyogurt, jeera, raikadugu, split, fenugreekpowder
description: Mambazha Pulissery Recipe is a traditional Kerala cuisine and is prepared by cooking vegetables in a curd and yogurt. It has subtle flavors of spiciness and tanginess.

name: Cabbage Chana Dal Sabzi - Gobi Chana Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish diabeticfriendly  pattagobimuttaikose, bengalgramdal, jeera, raikadugu, hing, haldi, jeera
description: Cabbage Chana Dal Sabzi is a crunchy cabbage/ patta gobi sabzi, made by combining it with bengal gram or chana dal as it is popularly known.

name: Assamese Saaru Maas Diya Adar Jhol Recipe - Fish In Ginger Gravy
main_tag: assamese dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  haldi, tejpatta, optional
description: Saaru Maas Diya Adar Jhol Recipe is Fish In Ginger Gravy which is an Assamese specialty, is a lightly spiced recipe traditionally. Since this dish is made with small fishes, the recipe is great and tastes light and creamy with bits of tender fish you can have in every bite.

name: Macha Mahura Recipe - Odia Style Fish Curry With Vegetables
main_tag: oriya dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, arbi, suransenairatalu, brownchickpeas, wadi, dhania, saunf, laung, jeera, dalchini, haldi
description: Mahura is a traditional mouth watering odia dish, that can be either made with no onion and garlic called Niramish Mahura or with fish known as Amish Mahura. What makes this recipe unique is that here the fish is steamed first then de-boned and then fried in oil before being added to the curry.

name: Neymeen Vatti Pattichathu Recipe - Seer Fish In Spicy Masala
main_tag: kerala lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  haldi
description: Neymeen Vatti Pattichathu Recipe (Seer Fish with Spicy Masala), fish dishes in Kerala have always been a delicacy for most of the food lovers. As Kerala lies on the coastal borders of India, it has various types of dishes using a wide variety of fish like seer fish, pomfret, pear spot etc.

name: मसूर दाल और राजमा मसाला रेसिपी - Masoor Dal Aur Rajma Masala Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner highproteinvegetarian
description: दाल एक ऐसी डिश है जिसे हर भारतीय घर में बनाया जाता है. सिर्फ भारत में ही नहीं, भारत के बहार भी इन दालों को अलग अलग तरीके से बनाया जाता है. आज हम यहाँ मसूर दाल बनाएंगे जिसमे हमने राजमा का भी प्रयोग किया है और इन दोनों में प्रोटीन की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है.

name: कोल्लु थोगयल रेसिपी - Kollu Thogayal Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian
description: कोल्लु थोगयल रेसिपी, एक स्वादिष्ट चटनी रेसिपी है जिसमे दाल को सेक कर नारियल के साथ पिसा जाता है. इसमें कोल्लु दाल का प्रयोग किया जाता है जिसमे बहुत अधिक होती है. आप इस चटनी को अपने खाने या नाश्ते के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: बीटरूट और टमाटर चटनी रेसिपी - Tangy Raw Beetroot & Tomato Chutney Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: बीटरूट और टमाटर चटनी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. बीटरूट जिसे चकुंदर भी कहा जाता है, उनमे विटामिन c की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है., इसलिए आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने में मिला सकते है.

name: Prawns Kuzhambu Recipe - Tangy Prawns In Tamarind And Coconut Gravy
main_tag: southindian lunch nonvegeterian  haldi, raikadugu, elaichi
description: Prawns Kuzhambu Recipe is a  lip smacking prawn gravy made South Indian style. The flavour emanates once the tamarind paste is added to it and you can taste the tangy masala with each bite of prawn.

name: Bihari Style Kadhi Bari Recipe
main_tag: bihari lunch vegetarian  besan, dhania, haldi, jeera, caromseeds, dahiyogurt, besan, haldi, dhania, tejpatta, jeera
description: Bihari Style Kadhi Bari Recipe is popular dish from the state of Bihar. Kadhi is a yogurt based stew made with mixing yogurt and gram flour and tempered with few aromatic spices. Bari's are the pakoras or fritters added into this Kadhi while boiling.

name: Bajra Na Rotla Recipe - A Traditional Gujarati Pearl Millet Bread
main_tag: gujarati﻿ northindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  pearlmillet
description: Bajra Na Rotla also known as Bajra Roti is a plain and simple flat bread made from pearl millet flour. Bajra Na Rotla and Ringna No Olo is an all time winter favorite food, especially when the rotla comes straight out of the stove to the plate. The millet flour is rich in proteins, and is also a source of iron, calcium and other minerals like potassium, magnesium and zinc.

name: Gongura Pappu Recipe - Gongura/ Sorrel Leaves Dal
main_tag: andhra lunch vegetarian  splittoordal, haldi, gongura, sambaronions, gingelly
description: Gongura Pappu is an lip smacking dal made from the gongura leaves which brings in a natural tangy taste to the dal. Gongura Leaves are also known as Sorrel Leaves in English, pulicha keerai in Tamil, Pundi Palle/Pundi Soppu in Kannada and ambaadi In Marathi.

name: Besan Aur Dahi Wali Kacche Kele Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  besan, hing, jeera, haldi, dhania, greekyogurt, dhania
description: Besan Aur Dahi Wali Kacche Kele Ki Sabzi Recipe is a must try dish that you should make for your kids who would love to relish this dish made from raw banana which is fried in a spicy gram flour. Then it is tossed over a flavored yogurt base curry. It is sautéed till the yogurt gravy dries off and then becomes a dry dish.

name: Mooli And Moong Dal Sabji Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  radish, radishgreens, handful, split, optional, raikadugu, jeera, haldi, hing, optional
description: Mooli (Radish) and Moong Dal Sabji is a simple stir fry and makes a perfect side dish along with rotis or rice. Instead of discarding radish greens use them (fresh) along with the root to enhance the taste as well as health benefits. It is equally delicious when cold and hence also makes for a good lunch box meal with roti.

name: Chettinadu Kozhi Kuzhambu Recipe - Chettinadu Chicken Curry
main_tag: chettinad dinner nonvegeterian  saunf, haldi, dhania, dhania
description: Today’s recipe is Chettinadu kozhi kozhumbhu. This deliciously spicy chicken curry is packed with flavours and is sure to tickle your taste buds. You will love it. The quantity of spices mentioned can be adjusted to suit your spice levels. I love spicy curry, so I have mentioned the quantities as per my taste buds.

name: काला चना सलाद रेसिपी - Kala Chana Salad Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish highproteinvegetarian
description: काला चना सलाद रेसिपी एक ताज़ा और स्वाद से भरपूर सलाद है जिसमे काले चने के साथ साथ गाजर, ककड़ी और टमाटर का प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के साथ बना सकते है. काला चना में प्रोटीन की मात्रा भी बहुत अधिक होती है, इसलिए यह आपकी सेहत के लिए अच्छा माना जाता है.

name: मिलेट जोवार पनियारम रेसिपी - Millet Jowar Paniyaram Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly
description: मिलेट जोवार पनियारम रेसिपी एक सेहतमंद रेसिपी है जिसे आप आपने नाश्ते के लिए बना सकते है. यह बनाने में आसान है और आप इसे अपनी पसंद की चटनी के साथ परोस सकते है. यह डायबेटिक लोगो के लिए भी अच्छा माना जाता है.

name: Multigrain Methi Thepla Recipe With Ragi & Whole Wheat
main_tag: gujarati﻿ indianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  fingermilletnagli, flaxmeal, dahiyogurt, haldi, optional, hing, fenugreekleaves
description: The Ragi & Whole Wheat Thepla Recipe is a wholesome diabetic friendly recipe that is made with a combination of ragi flour and added spices to make it flavorful and tasty.

name: मकई वाली भिंडी रेसिपी - Makai Wali Bhindi Recipe
main_tag: punjabi lunch vegetarian
description: लेडी फिंगर या ओकरा उन सब्ज़िओ में से एक है जिसका रोज के खाने के लिए प्रयोग होता है. यह आसानी से मिल जाती है और आप इस सब्ज़ी से अलग अलग प्रकार की सब्जिआ बना सकते है. आज हम यहाँ मकई वाली भिंडी बनाएंगे जिसे आप अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकती है.

name: Goan Batata Recheado Recipe With Carrots & Beans
main_tag: goan sidedish vegetarian  gajjar, frenchbeans, laung, dalchini, elaichi, jeera, haldi
description: Batata Recheado Recipe With Carrots & Beans is a tasty side dish recipe where potatoes, carrots and beans are first pressure cooked and then tossed in a homemade Recheado masala. Recheado masala is so versatile and is used to make seafood and meats, but we have made a vegetarian side dish which goes really well with steamed rice and dal or any other gravy.

name: Dry Jamun Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  mawa, homemadecottagecheese, maida, elaichi
description: Dry Jamun is a delicious recipe that you can make for the upcoming festivals. Gulab Jamuns are a regular at many households, but this Dry Jamun is a perfect pick me up to serve your guests. The jamuns prepared here are little different from the regular ones, and made with the khoya and paneer. It is fried, then dipped in thick sugar syrup and later coated with desiccated coconut mix. It is dry, however has a perfect soft melt in the mouth texture.

name: Andhra Style Bangaladumpa Vepudu Recipe - Potato Fry Recipe
main_tag: andhra lunch vegetarian  aloo, raikadugu, split, jeera, haldi, dhania, jeera
description: Bangaladumpa Vepudu Recipe (Potato Fry Recipe) is a perfect side dish that has soft and fluffy potatoes stir fried along with some caramelized onions and crunchy urad dal with the right amount of Indian spice.  The most important ingredient that adds up flavor to this dish is the crushed garlic which make it right for your meal.

name: Coorg Style Bollari Barthad Recipe - Mangalore Cucumber Stir Fry
main_tag: coorg sidedish vegetarian  dhania, jeera, raikadugu, split, jeera
description: Bollari Barthad Recipe is a simple stir fry using Mangalore Cucumber made commonly in Kodava and Coorg household. Mangalore cucumber are green-yellowish cucumbers with or without stripes. These Mangalore cucumber is a vegetable widely used in Karnataka, especially in Coastal Karnataka recipes. Here is a Coorg Style Bollari Barthad which is a stir fry made with Mangalore Cucumber.

name: Dhokla Sandwich With Capsicum And Paneer Recipe
main_tag: northindian snack vegetarian  flattenedrice, dahiyogurt, semolinarava, besan, jeera, jeera, raikadugu, hing, capsicum, capsicum, homemadecottagecheese, coriander mint
description: Dhokla Sandwich With Capsicum And Paneer Recipe is a twist to the usual dhokla that we have for our breakfast. Dhoklas are one of the famous breakfast dishes in Gujarat that are steamed and eaten with a pudina Chutney on the side.

name: Bhut Jolokia Murgh Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish nonvegeterian  bhutjolokia, haldi, jeera, dhania, dhania
description: Bhut Jolokia Murgh or Ghost pepper chicken curry is a spicy side dish recipe made with chicken and seasoned with the hottest chillies found yet- the ghost peppers. Though it is a simple preparation of the recipe, watch out while adding the bhut jolokia since this chilli grown in East India is the spiciest of all chillies.

name: Spicy Chicken Curry Recipe In Naga Style
main_tag: nagaland sidedish highproteinnonvegetarian
description: Spicy Chicken Curry Recipe In Naga Style is a hot and spicy non vegetarian delicacy that is made in Nagaland. While rice is an inseparable part of the native meal, chicken curry is one of the rarities that is made from the home grow chickens.

name: Assamese Sesame Kaffir Lime Chicken Curry
main_tag: assamese sidedish nonvegeterian  tilseeds, 6tablespoonspasteneeded, haldi, jeera, adjustquantity
description: Assamese Sesame Kaffir Lime Chicken Curry is a North Eastern way of cooking chicken in simple spices, with addition of sesame seeds. The addition of Kaffir lime leaves gives it a wonderful fragrance. Kaffir lime leaves are highly aromatic and are a great addition to spicy soups and curries.

name: Andhra Style Green Chilli Chicken Recipe
main_tag: andhra dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  boneless, dahiyogurt, haldi, dhania
description: Andhra Style Green Chilli chicken is a dry chicken recipe that is spiced mainly with green chilies and it also appears green in colour.  It can be served as a dry snack or a side dish with your fried rice. Green Chilli chicken is a hot and spicy recipe which can be an addition to your south Indian spread also.

name: Garlic Red Chicken Gravy Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  salted, dahiyogurt, haldi, jeera, optional
description: Garlic Red Chicken gravy is the easiest chicken recipe to prepare, which can be done within few minutes. Though it requires only two main ingredients to prepare, it tastes so tasty and yummy. Just try it out.

name: Posto Chicken Recipe - Bengali Chicken In Poppy Seed Paste
main_tag: bengali dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  tejpatta, laung, elaichi, dalchini, saunf, haldi
description: Posto Chicken Recipe is a traditional Bengali non veg recipe where Chicken is marinated and then cooked in a subtle poppy seed paste to make a thick and creamy curry.

name: Andhra Chicken Liver Fry Recipe
main_tag: andhra sidedish nonvegeterian  dhania, haldi
description: Andhra Chicken Liver Fry Recipe is a delicious and easy chicken fry recipe made in Andhra style. Here the chicken liver is sauteed along with caramelized onions, ginger and garlic and spices like pepper and red chili powder.

name: Mixed Vegetables Ajethna Recipe - Mangalorean Style Mixed Vegetables Sabzi
main_tag: mangalorean sidedish vegetarian  frenchbeans, gajjar, aloo, haldi, raikadugu, split, hing, raikadugu
description: Ajethna is a Mangalorean style dry vegetable curry made using coconut and mild spices. It is a traditional recipe which forms a part of the everyday meal in a Mangalorean household. We have a Mixed vegetable version of the dry curry, called Mixed Vegetables Ajethna Recipe (Mangalorean Style Mixed Vegetables Sabzi), which is simple and easy to make.

name: Dum Murgh Kali Mirch Recipe - Chicken In Rich White Gravy
main_tag: indian sidedish highproteinnonvegetarian  dahiyogurt, adjust, adjust, jeera, dhania
description: Dum Murgh Kali Mirch Recipe is rich creamy dish owing to the  addition of cashews, cream, and onions along with flavours from fresh ground spices.

name: Tambdi Bhaji Recipe - Goan Style Red Amaranth Stir Fry
main_tag: goan lunch vegetarian  jeera
description: Tambdi Bhaji is a red amaranth, which is used widely in the Goan vegetarian cuisine. This is a simple stir fry flavoured with garlic. It is quick to make and is quite nutritious.

name: Goan Gawar Bhaji Recipe
main_tag: goan lunch vegetarian  kothavarangaiclusterbeans, raikadugu, jeera, hing, haldi, dhania
description: Goan Gawar Bhaji is a simple dry recipe which is made using cluster beans and day to day masalas. You can also add potatoes to this recipe if you want to give an extra flavour to the recipe. It is very easy to make and is perfect to make during busy mornings to pack in your and your kid's lunchbox.

name: मूली भुर्जी रेसिपी - Mooli Bhurji Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian
description: मूली भुर्जी एक पंजाबी रेसिपी है जिसे सर्दियों के दिनों में अक्सर बनाया जाता है. यह बनाने में आसान है इसलिए आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है.

name: हरियाली मटर रेसिपी - Hariyali Matar Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish highproteinvegetarian
description: हरियाली मटर रेसिपी एक दक्षिण भारतीय रेसिपी है जिसमे ताज़े हरे मटर और पनीर का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इस सब्ज़ी का मसाला बनाने के लिए हरे धनिये का प्रयोग करते है जो इसे और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है. यह एक आसान रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने लंच बॉक्स के लिए भी बना सकते है. ज्यादातर इसे सर्दियों के दिनों में गरम गरम दाल और फुल्के के साथ परोसा जाता है.

name: Sindhi Kheerni Recipe - Sindhi Seviyan Kheer
main_tag: sindhi dessert vegetarian  elaichi, seviyan, badam
description: Sindhi Kheerni Recipe is a traditional Sindhi recipe of a kheer. Served for breakfast along with puris or just as a dessert after a complete meal.

name: झूरे झूरे आलू भाजा रेसिपी - Jhure Jhure Aloo Bhaja Recipe
main_tag: bengali snack vegetarian
description: भाजा एक बंगाली साइड डिश है जिसे बनाने के लिए अलग अलग सब्ज़ी का प्रयोग किया जाता है. भाजा को अक्सर तला जाता है और खाने के साथ परोसा जाता है. तलने के बाद इसपर मसाला डाला जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है. यहाँ हम झूरे झूरे आलू भाजा बनाएंगे जिसमे आलू का प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इसमें सकी हुई मूंगफली का भी इस्तेमाल कर सकते है जो इसको एक क्रंच देता है.

name: मैसुर चटनी रेसिपी - Mysore Chutney Recipe
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian
description: मैसुर चटनी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट दक्षिण भारतीय चटनी है जिसे इडली, डोसा या उत्तपम के साथ परोसा जा सकते है. यह कर्नाटक के हर घर में बनाई जाती है और इसको बनाने के लिए चना दाल का प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इसे अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी अपनी पसंद की इडली के साथ पैक कर सकते है.

name: अदरक की चटनी रेसिपी - Ginger Chutney Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegan  सफ़ द
description: अदरक एक ऐसी खाने का पदार्थ है जिसे सब्ज़ी बनाने के लिए प्रयोग किया जाता है. ज़्यादातर इसे चाय बनाने के लिए भी प्रयोग किया जाता है. यह आपको डायजेशन में भी मदद करता है. आज हम अदरक की चटनी बनाएंगे जिसे आप अपने खाने के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: Keeme Ja Bhalla Recipe - Sindhi Mutton Keema Balls In Gravy
main_tag: sindhi maincourse nonvegeterian  pudina, dhania, besan, jeera, dhania
description: Keeme Ja Bhalla Recipe is essentially a mutton keema ball gravy dish made Sindhi style. Here the term 'bhalla' means a dumpling, and in Sindhi keema ja bhalla means 'keema dumplings'

name: Safed Murgh Handi Recipe - Chicken In White Gravy
main_tag: indian sidedish highproteinnonvegetarian  adjust, dahiyogurt, jeera, elaichi, tejpatta, dalchini, jeera
description: Safed Murgh Handi Recipe brings back my childhood memories and is a recipe that has a tale of rich cooking heritage of India. Chicken when cooked with traditional spices, yogurt, coconut milk and nuts along with kadhi masala, gives it a unique texture and flavour. Make this chicken gravy recipe and and top it with slivered nuts of your choice.

name: Murg Anardana Recipe - Pomegranate Chicken In Yogurt Gravy
main_tag: northindian sidedish nonvegeterian  weneed3tablespoonsofpaste, dahiyogurt, jeera
description: Murg Anardana Recipe is a lip smacking chicken curry prepared in a gravy of added pomegranate juice to tomato puree, yogurt, onions and spices.

name: Kerala Chicken Puttu Recipe
main_tag: kerala southindianbreakfast nonvegeterian  dhania
description: Puttu is unique to Kerala. It is one of the staple dish prepared for breakfast in many households on day to day basis. Being steamed and prepared without oil puts the ‘puttu’ in the list of healthy, non-fat dishes. There are many variations to this dish; one of them is chicken Puttu. A true delightful breakfast for all non veg lovers.

name: Kaju Karela Recipe - Bitter Gourd And Cashew Nuts Stir Fry
main_tag: gujarati﻿ sidedish diabeticfriendly  bittergourdpavakkai, aloo, raikadugu, hing, dhania, jeera, drymangopowder, tilseeds
description: Kaju Karela Recipe, as the same suggests, is a sabzi or dry vegetable prepared from Bitter Gourd (Karela) and Cashews (Kaju). Kaju Karela Recipe (Bitter Gourd And Cashew Nuts Stir Fry) is a very popular recipe from Gujarati cuisine and is a favourite item on the menu list for marriage functions and is also amongst the many delicacies served in Gujarati Themed Restaurants for Thali menu.

name: Kakka Orotti Recipe - Steamed Mini Rice Balls in Chicken Gravy
main_tag: malabar sidedish highproteinnonvegetarian  oranylonggrainshouldwork, saunf, sameasyouusedforthedough, saunf, elaichi, laung, dalchini, dhania, haldi, asrequired
description: Kakka Orotti is a Malabar dish known by many other names like Aanapathal, pidi, aanaorotti, kunjipathal, undio, pinde, etc. The difference in name is largely depending on the region of origin in the southern state of India - mostly Kerala and coastal Karnataka.

name: चाउ चाउ करी रेसिपी - Chow Chow Curry Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian
description: चाउ चाउ करी एक सरल और पोषण से भरपूर रेसिपी है जिसमे चाउ चाउ  को भाप करके राइ, उरद दाल और कढ़ी पत्ते के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह एक सरल रेसिपी है इसलिए आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. इस सब्ज़ी को आप अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: Chicken In A Foil Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer nonvegeterian  dahiyogurt, jeera, jeera
description: Foil chicken or Chicken in a foil is a fusion recipe which can be prepared in advance and can be served in parties, potluck.

name: Stuffed Chicken Recipe With Mixed Vegetables
main_tag: indian sidedish highproteinnonvegetarian  whole, dahiyogurt, aloo, gajjar, matar, dhania
description: Stuffed Chicken Recipe With Mixed Vegetables is a whole tandoori chicken stuffed with vegetables and baked in a creamy tomato gravy.

name: Dahi Wali Singhare Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish noonionnogarlic  waterchestnut, jeera, raikadugu, dahiyogurt, besan, haldi, dhania, drymangopowder, dhania
description: Dahi Wali Singhare Ki Sabzi Recipe is an ayurvedic recipe that is made from water chestnut or in other words called as singhara. These are mainly used during the fasting season as it contains good amount of nutrients that help you during those season.

name: Chicken Keema Biryani Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  dalchini, badielaichi, elaichi, laung, jeera, dhania, pudina
description: Keema is a South Asian meat dish that literally means minced meat in Turkish. Keema can be made with any meat but usually Keema is associated with mutton mince. Vegetarians Keemas usually involve peas or cauliflower. Most Keemas are minced meats that are mixed with aromatic spices that are either eaten by itself or added to rice or stuffed in breads.

name: Anar Pabda Recipe - Bengali Fish Curry In Pomegranate Juice & Coconut Milk
main_tag: bengali lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  raikadugu, haldi, dhania, onionnigellaseeds, raikadugu
description: Anar Pabda is a Bengali-Coastal recipe which is made with Pabda fish. Pabda fish is marinated in mixture of anar (pomegranate) juice, later spiced with mustard paste and boiled in coconut milk to make the Anar Pabda recipe. Marinating in pomegranate juice, turmeric powder and salt gives a unique flavor to this dish.

name: Meen Vevichathu Recipe - Kottayam Style Fish Curry
main_tag: kerala lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  haldi, dhania, dalchini, laung, malabartamarind, sambaronions
description: Meen Vevichathu is the most sought after dish at every home in Kerala.

name: Tallyanche Suke Recipe - Sardine Dry
main_tag: goan lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  haldi, malabartamarind, kopra
description: Tallyanche Suke is an authentic Goan recipe which is simple, delicious and fresh to eat. Sardines is one of the healthiest fish and can be consumed by almost everybody. It is also called as Talle in Goa.

name: Mizoram Style Arsa Beipenek Recipe  - Spicy Chicken Stew
main_tag: northeastindia lunch nonvegeterian  haldi, dhania
description: Mizoram Style Arsa Beipenek Recipe is a traditional recipe from the tribal region of Mizoram. The chicken is cooked in its own stock and then thickened with wheat flour mixture. The specialty of this dish in Mizoram is that they use “Bakor” also known as spirited weed in dish which is specialty in those hilly terrain which has certain n medicinal values to cure illness.

name: आलू विंडालू रेसिपी - Potato Vindaloo Recipe
main_tag: goan lunch vegetarian
description: आलू विंडालू एक गोअन रेसिपी है जिसमे आलू को गोअन मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह करी ज़्यादातर तीखी होती है और इसे आप चावल, डोसा या पराठे के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: चटपटी मकई मसाला रेसिपी - Chatpatti Makai Masala Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: चटपटी मकई मसाला रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट डिश है जिसमे कॉर्न के साथ मूंगफली का भी इस्तेमाल किया जाता है. यह एक आसान रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपनी रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है.

name: Chicken In Tomato Onion Gravy Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish highproteinnonvegetarian  dahiyogurt, dhania
description: Chicken In Tomato Onion Gravy Recipe is a delicious and mouth watering gravy that you can make on special occasions and feasts. Ground onions and green chillies add a nice flavour to the gravy and the pureed tomatoes and chicken masala give a bright red colour. This juicy chicken curry is delicious to taste and really quick to make, even for weeknight dinners.

name: Dry Sweet Potato Thoran Recipe
main_tag: kerala sidedish vegetarian  haldi, hing, raikadugu, split
description: Sweet Potato is healthy when compared to the usual potatoes. Dry Sweet Potato Thoran is a very basic South Indian Style Curry. It can be eaten on its own as a snack or can be served as a side dish along with your meal.

name: Goan Tendli Bhaji Recipe
main_tag: goan lunch vegetarian  dondakayakovakkai, raikadugu, jeera, dhania, haldi
description: Today’s post 'Tendli Bhaji Recipe' is one comforting dish made from steamed Ivy gourd that is very popular in Goa. This mildly spiced Ivy Gourd curry tastes perfect with roti/hot rice accompanied with some Dal. Do try this easy healthy dish and we are sure you will like it.

name: Chow Chow And Beans Poriyal Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  frenchbeans, jeera, raikadugu, split, bengalgramdal, haldi
description: Chow Chow and Beans Poriyal Recipe is made from a white squash called chow chow. It is combined with Green beans and dals like urad dal and chana dal for the extra crunch. The softly sautéed onions and curry leaves will help to enhance the flavor of the curry.

name: South Indian Style Murungakkai Poriyal Recipe - Drumstick Stir Fry
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  raikadugu, haldi
description: Murungakkai Poriyal Recipe is a simple recipe from South India made by stir frying the drumsticks. Chopped drumsticks are sautéed in basic spices and then laced with fresh grated coconut. Usually, the poriyal is used as a side dish recipe with a curry, roti, sambar or avial and steamed rice.

name: गोबी और सोया कीमा रेसिपी - Gobi and Soya Keema Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian
description: कीमा एक दक्षिण एशिया की डिश है जिसमे ज्यादातर मटन का प्रयोग किया जाता है। इसमें कीमा को टमाटर, प्याज या अन्य मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है. लेकि यहाँ हम एक वेजीटेरियन कीमा बना रहे है जिसमे हमने सोया और कीमा का प्रयोग किया है. आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है और अपने लंच बॉक्स के लिए भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: स्ट्रॉबेरी चटनी रेसिपी - Strawberry Chutney Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: मीठी और तीखी, स्ट्रॉबेरी चटनी एक स्वाद से भरपूर चटनी है जिसमे स्ट्रॉबेरी को गुड़, निम्बू का रस, अदरक, हरी मिर्च और जीरे के साथ पकाया जाता है. आप इस चटनी को अपने खाने के साथ परोस सकते है या फिर इसका इस्तेमाल चाट बनाने के लिए भी कर सकते है.

name: Cabbage Foogath Recipe - Goan Style Cabbage Stir Fry
main_tag: goan sidedish vegetarian  pattagobimuttaikose, raikadugu, hing
description: Cabbage Foogath Recipe is a delicious Goan style cabbage stir fry prepared using minimal ingredients. The finely shredded cabbage is tossed with mild tempering and finished with freshly grated coconut.

name: Maharashtrian Bakar Bhaji Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian sidedish vegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, tilseeds, fenugreekseeds, raikadugu, hing, haldi, dhania
description: Bakar Bhaji Recipe is a mild spicy, tangy curry made from chunks of pumpkin with the skin on. It goes well with chapati or curd rice. Bakar bhaji is made in Vidarbha (eastern region of Maharashtra) during festivals. So, if you are looking to make something new with Pumpkin, then do give this a try.

name: शाही दाल रेसिपी - Shahi Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: शाही दाल रेसिपी, एक क्रीमी और रिच दाल है जिसमे उरद दाल का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें बादाम भी डाली जाती है जो इस दाल को एक अलग क्रंच देता है. इसमें टमाटर, प्याज, जीरा और लाल मिर्च का भी इस्तेमाल किया जाता है. आप इस दाल को अपनी हाउस पार्टीज के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: पालक कढ़ी रेसिपी - Palak Kadhi Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani lunch vegetarian
description: पालक कढ़ी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट डिश है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. अगर आप अपनी कढ़ी में कोई ट्विस्ट चाहते है, तो यह पालक कढ़ी जरूर बनाने। कढ़ी में पालक की प्यूरी मिला कर उसे अंत में तड़का दिया जाता है.

name: Khatti Meethi Ragi Masala Roti Recipe With Carrots
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  fingermilletnagli, gajjar, dhania
description: Khatti Meethi Ragi Masala Roti Recipe With Carrots has a unique delicious wholesome taste from the ragi flour, whole wheat flour, tamarind paste, jaggery, green chillies, chopped onions and red chili powder. These Ragi rotis are simple to make and go great with any chutneys, dals or curries.

name: Stir Fried Carrot And Green Beans Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  frenchbeans, gajjar, laung, jeera, dhania
description: Stir Fried Carrot and Green Beans Recipe is a simple stir fry with everyday available masala which we use at our kitchen. This recipe is useful in case of an emergency where one needs to make something quick to carry it in your lunch box or just to eat it with your main dish.

name: Chettinad Mushroom And Green Peas Stir Fry Recipe
main_tag: chettinad lunch diabeticfriendly  matar, saunf, fenugreekseeds, dhania, dalchini, elaichi
description: Chettinad Mushroom and Green Peas Stir Fry Recipe is an easy recipe where mushroom and onions are cooked along with some homemade Chettinad masala. Green Peas is added for the extra crunch and flavor. This recipe can be made in a jiffy and it is the best when you are looking for something to be made in a less time limit.

name: Carrot And Broccoli Poriyal Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  gajjar, raikadugu, jeera, haldi, dhania
description: Carrot and Broccoli Poriyal Recipe is a simple recipe that is stir fried with basic Indian flavors and finally tossed with fresh coconut. The vegetables in the recipe not just show the wonderful colors out but it also has the essential benefits needed for the body.

name: Kerala Style Karamani Thoran Recipe - Yard Beans Stir Fry With Coconut
main_tag: kerala sidedish vegetarian  yardlongbeanskaramanibarbati, raikadugu, jeera, haldi
description: Kerala Style Karamani Thoran Recipe (Yard Beans Stir Fry with Coconut) has all the flavors of Kerala cuisine right from fresh coconut to the use of coconut oil. A side dish that has ground coconut, green chilli, curry leaves and it is tossed over karamani.

name: धनिआ वाले आलू रेसिपी - Dhania Wale Aloo Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  सफ़ द
description: नवरात्री एक बड़ा त्यौहार है जिसे भारत के कई हिस्सों में मनाया जाता है जहा पर दुर्गा माता को 9 दिन के लिए पूजा जाता है. इन दिनों पे खाने में लहसुन और प्याज का उपयोग नहीं किया जाता। धनिआ वाले आलू रेसिपी, एक ऐसी ही सरल रेसिपी है जिसमे प्याज और लहसुन का प्रयोग नहीं किया गया है.

name: गवारफली की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Gavarphali Ki Sabji Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani lunch vegetarian
