description: गवारफली की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी, एक सरल साइड डिश रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने खाने के साथ परोस सकते है. इसमें गवारफली को रोज के मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है. आप इसे कढ़ाई या प्रेशर कुकर में बना सकते है. यह सब्ज़ी आप अपने या अपने बच्चो के लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: Methi Sprouts Salad Recipe - Healthy & Tasty Diabetic Snack
main_tag: indian appetizer diabeticfriendly  fenugreekseeds, moongphali, dhania
description: Methi Sprouts Salad Recipe is a nutritious salad with sprouted fenugreek seeds being used as the star ingredient.

name: Andhra Dondakaya Chutney Recipe - Tindora Chutney
main_tag: andhra sidedish vegetarian  dondakayakovakkai, jeera, bengalgramdal, split, moongphali, dhania, raikadugu
description: Andhra is known for its chutneys and pickles and this tindora chutney recipe has all the flavours of a Andhra Dondakaya Chutney Recipe, spiciness from the chillies, tanginess from the tamarind and great flavour from the tindora and peanuts and spices like red chillies, coriander, fenugreek and cumin.

name: Konaseema Kodi Kura Recipe - Andhra Style Chicken Curry
main_tag: andhra dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  moongphali, jeera, dhania, dhania, chopped
description: Konaseema Kodi Kura is a quite a popular recipe from Andhra and every house has got their own version. It is quite easy to make and does not take too much time to make it.

name: Kachi Tikya Recipe  - Chicken In Tomato Gravy With Potatoes
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  dhania, jeera, jeera, aloo
description: Kachi Tikya is our family favorite recipe. In this recipe, chicken is marinated with spices and cooked along with potatoes and tomatoes in mild gravy form.

name: Masala Cornflakes Chicken Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer highproteinnonvegetarian  1formarination xa02teaspoonredchillipowder2teaspooncorianderpowder dhania, haldi, dhania
description: Masala Cornflakes Chicken Recipe is a cripsy cruncy chicken appetizer, that can be made in a jiffy.

name: Kerala Style Chicken Stew Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  dalchini, gajjar, frenchbeans, aloo, haldi
description: Kerala Style Chicken Stew Recipe is a rich curry made with coconut milk. The curry has got a strong flavors of cinnamon, cardamom and peppercorns that are used as a whole in this dish. Then the addition of vegetables along chicken gives it a different texture as well. The curry is thickened by the addition of cashew paste and then pressure cooked with the rich coconut milk.

name: Chicken In White Gravy Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  dahiyogurt, salted, elaichi, dalchini, dhania, dhania
description: Chicken In White Gravy is a super simple chicken gravy that you can make for your week night dinners. Chicken cooked in a simple ginger- garlic, onion base, thinned down with some yogurt, that not only makes the gravy, but is the souring agent in this scrumptious chicken dish.

name: Handi Biryani Recipe With Chicken
main_tag: assamese maincourse nonvegeterian  orjasminericeastraditionallyused, dahiyogurt, haldi, laung, elaichi, badielaichi, dalchini, javitri, tejpatta
description: Handi Biryani Recipe With Chicken is a chicken variant of cooking Biryani amongst the Muslim community in North India .

name: Chocolate Modak Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, kopra, optional, badam
description: Chocolate Modak Recipe is delicious and festive twist to Ganesh Chaturthi favourite. Also called kozhukattai, modaks are a staple for this festival, along with Sundal, served as the favourites of Lord Ganesh.

name: Chilli Paneer & Oats Dosa Recipe
main_tag: fusion snack vegetarian  semolinarava, homemadecottagecheese, capsicum, oatmeal
description: Chilli Paneer & Oats Dosa Recipe is a Chinese twist given to the regular dosa. It makes a perfect teatime snack when you are craving something chat patta. The best part is, it is healthy and made from instant dosa batter that you can make in a jiffy.

name: Chettinad Mint Potato Biryani Recipe
main_tag: chettinad dinner highproteinvegetarian  aloo, homemadecottagecheese, dahiyogurt, dhania, dalchini, laung, elaichi, tejpatta, pudina, asrequired, saunf
description: Mint Biryani is extra flavorful, aromatic biryani recipe prepared by adding potatoes and paneer cubes. Mint leaves are normally added to biryani but this recipe calls for lots of mint leaves making it minty and spicy biryani.

name: Chenna Poda Recipe
main_tag: oriya dessert vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, semolinarava, elaichi
description: Chenna Poda is a cheese dessert from the state of Odisha in the Eastern India which means Roasted Cheese in Odia. It is made of well-kneaded homemade fresh cheese chenna, sugar, cashew nuts and raisins and is baked for several hours until it turns brown. Chenna Poda is the only well known Indian dessert whose flavour is predominantly derived from the caramelization of sugar. It is a soft and pillowy dessert loaded with the goodness of chenna, which is a rich source of protein too.

name: लहसुन आमला चटनी रेसिपी - Lehsun Amla Chutney Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish vegetarian
description: लहसुन आमला चटनी रेसिपी एक स्वाद से भरपूर और खट्टी रेसिपी है जिसमे लहसुन, छोटे प्याज, आमला, हरा धनिया और पुदीने के पत्ते का प्रयोग किया जाता है. आमला में विटामिन सी की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है. यह चटनी की डायजेशन के लिए भी अच्छी होती है.

name: Kerala Chicken Roast Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  haldi, dhania
description: Kerala Chicken Roast Recipe is a no fuss recipe that is loaded with flavours. Chicken is marinated in spices and cooked in a onion tomato gravy. The fiery red colour and the delicious gravy of the chicken curry is sure to impress you as well.

name: Kabuli Chana Kofta Biryani Recipe - Chickpea Kofta Biryani

description: Kabuli Chana Kofta Biryani Recipe is a perfect recipe to make on a weekend or for a party. In this biryani first kabuli chana koftas are made in a paniyaram pan and then added to a rich creamy tomato gravy and then this is layered with cooked rice and cooked on dum to give you a delightful biryani what creates a party in your mouth.

name: White Vegetable Kurma Recipe With Coconut & Cashew
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  gajjar, aloo, gobi, saunf, dalchini, laung, elaichi, jeera
description: White Veg Kurma is a restaurant style vegetable kurma that goes well with chapati, idiyappam, appam or parotta.

name: Green Moong Dal Kootu with Raw Banana Peel Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  whole, haldi, pottukadalai, dalchini, dhania, raikadugu, hing
description: Green Moong Dal Kootu with Raw Banana Peel Recipe is a very nutritious recipe that you must try at home.

name: Chanar Payesh Recipe
main_tag: bengali dessert vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, elaichi, badam
description: When it comes to sweets, Nothing can beat the taste of Bengali sweets. It doesn't matter that a person is a Bengali or from a different region, Bengali sweets are everyone’s favourite.

name: Val Papdi Bhaji Recipe - Goan Style Flat Beans Dry Sabzi
main_tag: goan sidedish vegetarian  raikadugu, jeera, haldi
description: Flat Beans are known as Val Papdi in the Maharashtra - Goa region, and is quite popular in this region. Val Papdi is the most looked down vegetable, however is packed with whole lot of nutrients. It takes care of our daily calcium, iron and magnesium even if we include a small quantity in our diets regularly.

name: Kongunadu Style Kalan kuzhambu Recipe - Mushroom Curry
main_tag: kongunadu sidedish vegetarian  raikadugu, dhania, dalchini, laung, jeera, saunf
description: Kongunadu Style Kalan kuzhambu Recipe is famous from the Coimbatore region of Tamil Nadu. Kongunadu is a part of Tamil Nadu Cuisine that is majorly covers the western part of the state.

name: Kathirikai Paruppu Kootu Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish vegetarian  bainganeggplant, splittoordal, raikadugu, haldi, dhania, split, bengalgramdal
description: Kathirikai Paruppu Kootu Recipe is a delicious combination of lentil and vegetables.

name: Poondu Milagu Kuzhambu Recipe - Tamilnadu Style Garlic and Black Pepper Curry
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  haldi, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, gingelly, sambaronions, jeera, gingelly
description: Poondu Milagu Kuzhambu is a traditional tamarind based curry prepared using garlic cloves and black pepper corns from the state of Tamil Nadu.

name: Murungai Keerai Poriyal With Moong Dal Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  moringamurungaikeerai, split, hing, raikadugu, jeera
description: Murungai Keerai or Drumstick leaves or Moringa leaves are a nutritional powerhouse of vitamins and minerals. They are also rich in iron, calcium, potassium and protein and aids our body in a number of ways - eliminates free radicals, improves bone health and cardiovascular health.

name: Baby Potato Theeyal Recipe - Kerala Style Potatoes In Shallots And Roasted Coconut
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian  sambaronions, dhania, haldi, sambaronions, jeera
description: Baby Potato Theeyal Recipe (Kerala Style Potatoes In Shallots And Roasted Coconut Recipe) is a recipe that has got inspired by the authentic Chettinad style "theeyal" curry. The recipe is made with baby potatoes which are pressure cooked and simmered in with the Chettinad flavored, spicy and rich curry.

name: Chanar Dalna Recipe -Bengali Style Paneer & Potato Gravy
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, aloo, tejpatta, haldi, jeera
description: Chanar Dalna, a Bengali dish is made of Chana also known as Paneer or Cottage cheese along with potatoes and cooked in Bengali spices. This curry can be served with rice or roti and is quite simple to make if you have the chana ready in the refrigerator. You can make cottage cheese in advance and stock it up in the freezer for later use.

name: Lauki Ka Salan Recipe - Bottle Gourd Salan Recipe
main_tag: andhra lunch vegetarian  lauki, jeera, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, haldi, dhania, dhania, moongphali, tilseeds
description: Lauki Ka Salan Recipe is a slight twist to the popular Andhra Mirchi Ka Salan Recipe with the addition of bottle gourd. The dish contains green chili, peanuts, sesame seeds, desiccated coconut, ginger and garlic and thick tamarind juice along with other spices.

name: तीखी गोअन मशरुम रेसिपी - Spicy Goan Style Mushrooms Recipe
main_tag: goan lunch vegetarian
description: तीखी गोअन मशरुम रेसिपी एक सरल रेसिपी है जिसमे मशरुम को लहसुन और रोज के मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह एक सरल डिश है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए या लंच बॉक्स में पैक करने के लिए बना सकते है.

name: चाउ चाउ थोरन रेसिपी - Chow Chow Thoran Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian
description: चाउ चाउ थोरन रेसिपी केरला की एक प्रसिद्ध रेसिपी है जिसमे चाउ चाउ को नारियल, हरी मिर्च और कुछ रोज के मसलो के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह स्वादिष्ट तो होता ही है, साथ में बहुत सेहतमंद भी होता है. आप थोरन बनाने के लिए किसी भी सब्ज़ी का प्रयोग कर सकते है.

name: Vendakkai Varuval Recipe - Tamil Nadu Style Okra Stir Fry
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, besan, haldi, dhania, drymangopowder
description: Vendakkai Varuval Recipe is a Tamil Nadu style favorite side dish. It is usually a poriyal that is made using onions and tomatoes but in this recipe we have created a twist by mixing the masala into the ladies finger and then shallow frying them to give it a bit crunchy and crispy texture.

name: तड़के वाली मसूर दाल रेसिपी - Tadkewali Masoor Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: तड़के वाली मसूर दाल रेसिपी एक सरल रेसिपी है जिसमे बहुत हिम कम और रोज के प्रयोग के सामग्री की आवश्यकता होती है. मसूर दाल को घंटो के लिए भिगोया जाता है और फिर उसे अदरक, लहसुन, प्याज और मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है. अंत में तड़का दिया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है.

name: Kerala Style Fish Curry Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  ihaveusedsardinecleanedandcut, raikadugu, dhania, fenugreekpowder
description: Kerala Style Fish Curry Recipe is very widely consumed in Kerala. It is a simple curry which requires very less and day to day ingredients. The best thing about this recipe is it can be used for any type of fish ranging from Sardine, Mackerel, Pomfret, Tuna, King Fish, Seer Fish, etc. This curry goes best with Mashed Tapioca (Kappa) and Rice or with roti.

name: थेंगइ थोगयल रेसिपी - Thengai Thogayal Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian
description: थेंगइ थोगयल रेसिपी जिसे खट्टी तीखी नारियल की चटनी भी कहा जाता है एक आसान चटनी रेसिपी है जिसे आप इडली और डोसा के साथ परोसे सकते है. इसमें उरद दाल, सुखी लाल मिर्च और कढ़ी पत्ते का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें इमली का पेस्ट भी डाला जाता है जो इस चटनी को खट्टा स्वाद देती है.

name: Mulangi Thoran Recipe - Radish Stir Fry With Coconut
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian  radish, raikadugu, jeera, haldi
description: Mulangi Thoran Recipe (Radish Stir Fry with Coconut) is a Kerala style side dish that has ground coconut, green chilli, curry leaves and ginger. It is then stir fried along with thinly cut radish. The richness of the coconut added into dish gives a wonderful flavor as well as lifts up the whole dish. The spices are not much as it is all ground with coconut and all you need to add is just salt.

name: Cabbage And Carrot Poriyal Recipe - No Onion And Garlic
main_tag: southindian sidedish noonionnogarlic  gajjar, pattagobimuttaikose, haldi, raikadugu, jeera, split, bengalgramdal, hing
description: Cabbage and Carrot Poriyal Recipe is an ayurvedic recipe that is served as a side dish for your main courses. Poriyal are from South India, mainly from Tamil nadu, it is a simple stir fry of vegetables with mustard seeds, chana dal, curry leaves and hing.

name: कच्चे आम और लहसुन की दाल रेसिपी - Kacche Aam Aur Lehsun Ki Dal Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish highproteinvegetarian
description: कच्चे आम और लहसुन की दाल रेसिपी एक पोषण से भरपूर दाल है जिसमे लहुसन को सेक कर प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें कच्चे आम को कस कर भी डाला जाता है जिससे इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ जाता है. अंत में इसमें तड़का दिया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है.

name: नारियल धनिये की चटनी रेसिपी - Desiccated Coconut Coriander Chutney Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian
description: कोई भी स्नैक बिना चटनी के अधूरा सा होता है, अगर आपके स्नैक के साथ कोई स्वादिष्ट चटनी हो तो वो उसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ाता है. हम हरी चटनी हमेशा बनाते है लेकिन इस बार इसमें थोड़ा ट्विस्ट देने के लिए हमने नारियल का भी प्रयोग किया है. आप इसे अपने दक्षिण भारतीय नाश्ते के साथ भी परोस सकते है.

name: Rajasthani Hari Mirch Ka Maas Recipe
main_tag: northindian maincourse nonvegeterian  haldi, dahiyogurt, dhania
description: Rajasthani Hari Mirch Ka Maas Recipe is a traditional Rajasthani mutton curry made flavourful with the most simplest of ingredients. Mutton is marinated in a roasted green chilli paste that lends a lovely flavour to the mutton gravy.

name: Puli Manga Kuzhambu Recipe - South Indian Spicy Mango Curry
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  raw, about1largerawmango, haldi, dhania, hing, gingelly, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds
description: Puli Manga kuzhambu recipe is a delicious tangy spicy dish made from raw mangoes that is simmered in a tamarind extract curry. The addition of fenugreek seeds, jaggery and hing, makes this kuzhambu recipe stand out in taste. The flavors from the fenugreek seeds and coriander seeds that are roasted and powdered brings out the authentic taste of this delicious curry.

name: Pazhutha Manga Pachadi Recipe - Kerala Style Ripe Mango Curry
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian  ripe, reservetheseeds, haldi, addaccordingtotaste, raikadugu
description: Pazhutha Manga Pachadi is a ripe mango curry that is quick and easy to make and is a great weeknight meal. It is sweet and spicy at the same time, with the pungent flavour of mustard.

name: Chettinad Thakkali Vengaya Kuzhambu Recipe
main_tag: chettinad lunch vegetarian  sambaronions, gingelly, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds
description: The Chettinad Thakkali Vengaya Kuzhambu Recipe is a tandy curry that is made from simmering baby onions also known as the sambar onion or Chinna Vengayam in tamil. Chettinad cuisine is one of the most popular cuisines of Southern India, that is packed with a few essential ingredients and that is the baby onion and the black peppercorns.

name: Vellarikka Manga Curry Recipe - Cucumber Mango Pulissery
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian  raw, haldi, jeera, raikadugu, split
description: Vellarikka Manga Curry Recipe is a delicious Kerala style coconut based curry made using cucumber and raw mango.

name: Andhra Style Urlugadda Munagakaya Charu Recipe - Potato And Drumstick Gravy
main_tag: andhra sidedish vegetarian  aloo, haldi, dhania, fenugreekseeds, raikadugu, dhania
description: Andhra Style Urlugadda Munagakaya Charu Recipe-Potato And Drumstick Gravy, is a quick easy to make spicy recipe using potatoes and drumsticks. The vegetables are cooked in a onion and tomatoes gravy, making for an amazing accompaniment with steamed rice or with Pulka's. The drumsticks add a wonderful flavour to the gravy.

name: Andhra Style Mukkala Pulusu Recipe-Sweet Tangy Vegetable Stew
main_tag: andhra lunch vegetarian  aloo, lauki, sambaronions, haldi, dhania, fenugreekseeds, bengalgramdal, split, jeera, raikadugu, split, hing
description: Andhra Style Mukkala Pulusu Recipe-Sweet Tangy Vegetable Stew is a delicious one pot vegetable curry with right amount of spice and tanginess. The curry can have a different choice of your vegetable but we have used drumstick, bottle gourd and potato. The base for the dish is obtained by grinding a handful of whole spice and adding it along with the vegetable to make a comforting stew.

name: सौंफ आलू रेसिपी - Saunf Aloo Recipe
main_tag: punjabi lunch vegetarian
description: सौंफ आलू रेसिपी एक पंजाबी ग्रेवी रेसिपी है जिसमे आलू को क्रीमी सॉस और सौंफ के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह उन लोगो के लिए पर्याप्त है जो प्याज और लहुसन का प्रयोग नहीं करते। यह बनाने में आसान है और बहुत कम समय में इसे बना सकते है.

name: Flaxseed Podi-Flaxseed Chutney Powder
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  bengalgramdal, split
description: Flax seeds are also known as Alsi in Hindi , Agase beeja in Kannada, Aviselu in Telugu,  jawas in  Maharashtra and Gujarat, ali virai in Tamil. Many people do not like the taste of Flax seeds but in this Recipe flax seeds are mixed with chana dal and urad dal to enhance its nutty flavor.

name: महाराष्ट्रियन हरी मिर्च का थेचा रेसिपी - Maharashtrian Green Chilli Thecha Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian sidedish vegetarian
description: महाराष्ट्रियन हरी मिर्च का थेचा रेसिपी एक साइड डिश है जिसे आप थालीपीठ के साथ परोस सकते है. हरी मिर्च और लहसुन का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसे और भी अच्छा स्वाद देता है. आप इसे बाजरा रोटी या जोवार रोटी के साथ भी परोस सकते है. इसे अपने खाने के साथ परोसे और इसका आनंद ले.

name: Chicken Kofta Curry Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch nonvegeterian  haldi, dhania, haldi, dhania, dhania, haldi
description: The Chicken Kofta Curry is a flavour packed chicken curry simmered in a tomato makhani gravy and simmer along with chicken kofta balls. This is the recipe that everyone would die to try out. There are many different versions to make the kofta curry but we have made it by using simple spice and fresh herbs in this one pot curry. The sautéing of the spice mixture along with onions and tomato is what makes this curry special and give in the extra taste to the curry.

name: Chicken Biryani With Coconut Milk with Basmati Rice
main_tag: northindian lunch nonvegeterian  dahiyogurt, haldi, dhania, tejpatta, elaichi, dalchini, pudina
description: This Chicken Biryani is made with the twist to the classic recipe. The addition of coconut milk, whole spices and tomato puree and making it in a pressure cooker makes this flavourful rice in less than 30 minutes. Coconut milk adds to the richness and multitude of flavours to a dish, it gives a very coastal touch and brings out the spice beautifully.

name: हरे चने की चटनी रेसिपी - Green Chana Chutney Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani sidedish vegetarian
description: हरा चना राजस्थान के हर घर में खाया जाता है और इससे कही प्रकार की डिश भी बना जाती है. उसमे से एक डिश है हरे चने की चटनी। आप इसे अपने खाने के साथ परोस सकते है. अगर आपको ताज़े चने न मिले तो आप फ्रोजन चने से भी यह बना सकते है.

name: Sweet Potato And Carrot Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  gajjar, saunf, haldi, dhania
description: Sweet Potato and Carrot Sabzi Recipe is a quick side dish that is made from in a one pot pressure cooker. All you have to do is to saute the onions and tomatoes with some Indian Spices. Then, we add the root vegetables and is cooked in a pressure cooker till done.

name: Raw Papaya Thoran Recipe
main_tag: kerala sidedish vegetarian  raikadugu, split, hing
description: Raw Papaya Thoran Recipe is a quick and easy to make side dish for your main courses. The raw papaya is pressure cooked first and then tossed over basic ingredients with no onion and no garlic. We have also given an Ayurvedic friendly option to the recipe. You can omit dry red chilli and add just fresh green chilli to the dish.

name: Mushroom Do Pyaza Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  haldi, dhania, jeera
description: Mushroom Do Pyaza Recipe is a wonderful recipe that is a variant to Bhindi Do Pyaza and Paneer Do Pyaza. It is just a semi dry dish that is cooked with lots of onions and paired with wonderful mushroom. The masalas added into the dish are very simple and easily available at our day to day kitchen.

name: मसूर दाल मखनी रेसिपी - Masoor Dal Makhani Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: मसूर दाल मखनी एक स्वादिष्ट, क्रीमी और सेहतमंद रेसिपी है जिसमे प्रोटीन की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है. आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. इस दाल को आप अपनी हाउस पार्टीज या किसी ख़ास मौके पर भी बना सकते है. यह सेहतमंद तो है ही, साथ में बहुत स्वादिष्ट भी है.

name: टमाटर लहसुन की चटनी रेसिपी - Tomato Garlic Chutney Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: टमाटर लहसुन की चटनी रेसिपी एक खट्टी मीठी चटनी है जिसमे टमाटर के साथ साथ लहसुन का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इस चटनी को अपने खाने के साथ परोस सकते है या अपने रोल और सैंडविच में भी लगा सकते है. इसमें तेल का प्रयोग नहीं होता है और आप इसे 1 वीक के लिए फ्रिज में स्टोर कर सकते है.

name: दाल वांगी रेसिपी - Dal Vangi Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: दाल वांगी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट दाल है जिसमे दाल के साथ साथ बैंगन का भी प्रयोग किया गया है. यह एक आसान डिश है जिसे हर महाराष्ट्रियन घर में बनाया जाता है. इसमें रोज के मसालो का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसे और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है.

name: कुलीथ दाल रेसिपी - Horsegram Dal Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: कुलीथ दाल एक आसान और सरल दाल है जो हर भारतीय घर में बनाई जाती है. यह दाल वजन कम करने के लिए पर्याप्त है और पेट के लिए भी अच्छी मानी जाती है. प्रोटीन से भरपूर यह दाल डायबिटिक लोगो के लिए भी अच्छी है. सेहतमंद होने के साथ साथ, यह खाने में भी बहुत स्वादिष्ट होती है.

name: सिंधि साई भाजी रेसिपी - Sindhi Sai Bhaji Recipe
main_tag: sindhi onepotdish diabeticfriendly
description: सिंधि साई भाजी रेसिपी, एक पारम्परिक रेसिपी है जिसे हर सिंधी घर में बनाया जाता है. यह एक सेहतमंद रेसिपी है क्यूंकि इसमें दाल के साथ हरी सब्ज़िओ और दूसरी सब्ज़िओ का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इसमें अपनी पसंद की सब्ज़िओ का प्रयोग कर सकते है. घी और लहसुन का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसे और भी अच्छा फ्लेवर देता है.

name: गोभी मूंग दाल रेसिपी - Cauliflower Moong Dal Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish highproteinvegetarian
description: गोभी मूंग दाल रेसिपी एक आरामदायक रेसिपी है जो बनाने में बहुत आसान है और इसमें रोज के सामग्री की आवश्यकता होती है. इसमें हरा धनिया, हल्दी पाउडर और जीरा पाउडर का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसको और भी ताज़ा स्वाद देता है. इसमें हमने गोभी का प्रयोग किया है, लेकिन अगर आप चाहे तो अपनी पसंद की सब्ज़ी का भी प्रयोग कर सकते है.

name: अमृतसरी सूखी दाल रेसिपी - Amritsari Sookhi Dal Recipe
main_tag: punjabi dinner vegetarian  स प ल ट
description: प्रोटीन से भरपूर, अमृतसरी सूखी दाल रेसिपी एक ऐसी दाल है जिसमे उरद दाल और काली दाल का प्रयोग किया जाता है. उरद दाल में आयरन, कैल्शियम, मैग्नीशियम, फोलिक एसिड की मात्रा भी अधिक होती है. यह दाल हर पंजाबी घर में बनाई जाती है और इसमें हरी मिर्च का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है. यह एक सुखी दाल है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने में बना सकते है.

name: पुदीना मूंग दाल रेसिपी - Pudina Moong Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: पुदीना एक ऐसी सामग्री है जो पेट के लिए अच्छा माना है. इसलिए हमने इस मूंग दाल को ट्विस्ट देने के लिए इसमें पुदीने का प्रयोग किया है. यह एक बहुत स्वादिष्ट दाल है जिसे आप रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है.

name: Spicy Chettinad Fish Fry Recipe
main_tag: chettinad lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  raikadugu, jeera, dhania, saunf, haldi
description: Spicy Chettinad Fish Fry Recipe is a delicious and spicy preparation of fish made in the Chettinad region of South India. Chettinad cuisine is known for spicy food which is made using freshly ground masalas.

name: Hara Pyaz Paratha Recipe - Spring Onion Paratha Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  pearlmillet, sorghum, bulb greens, haldi, jeera
description: Spring Onion Parathas is a nice way to give a new twist to your regular parathas. We usually make Palak Parathas, Aloo Parathas & Methi Parathas quite regularly at home, but this paratha is surely a winner. It is a perfect dish to pack in your and kids lunch boxes.

name: Kothavarangai Paruppu Usili Recipe - Gawar Phali Dal Sabzi
main_tag: southindian sidedish highproteinvegetarian  kothavarangaiclusterbeans, haldi, splittoordal, haldi, gingelly, raikadugu, split, hing
description: Kothavarangai Paruppu Usili is a traditional South Indian dish which is a combination of steamed crumbled lentils combined with finely chopped Kothavarangai/Gawar Phali or Cluster beans. This is a dish prepared during festivals or family functions like weddings along with the entire South Indian meal.

name: दाल बुखारा रेसिपी - Dal Bukhara Recipe
main_tag: punjabi dinner vegetarian
description: दाल बुखारा एक पंजाबी स्टाइल दाल है जिसमे काली उरद दाल का प्रयोग किया जाता है. यह बहुत क्रीमी होती है और मुँह में पिघल जाती है. आप इसे रोटी या चावल किसी के साथ भी परोस सकते है. यह दाल आप अपने हाउस पार्टीज के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: रतालू की चटनी रेसिपी - Ratalu Ki Chutney Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: रतालू की चटनी एक आसान चटनी है जिसे आप अपने  फिर डोसा इडली के साथ परोस सकते है. यह एक अच्छा तरीका है रतालू को अपने खाने में मिलाने का.

name: Doi Bhetki Recipe - Bengali Style Yogurt Fish Curry
main_tag: bengali dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  asianseabass, dahiyogurt, haldi, jeera, dhania, tejpatta, laung, elaichi
description: One of the simplest, mildly spiced Bengali fish curry is Doi Bhetki. It’s mild in flavours and yogurt adds the perfect sourness to the curry. Bengal curry is a perfect blend of sweet and spices. A little sugar, green chilies and yogurt makes this curry a perfectly balanced curry.

name: Kumro Patai Ilish Paturi Recipe - Hilsa Fish In Pumpkin Leaves
main_tag: bengali dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  raikadugu, haldi
description: Kumro Patai Ilish Paturi (Marinated Hilsa In Pumpkin Leaves) is a recipe of West Bengal, India. Bengali food culture never been completed without fish. Ilish/ Hilsa is a most favorable fish for Bengali's and the recipe is from my Grandma, she used to make it so tasty even today.

name: Kashmiri Style Gaad T Tamatar Recipe - Fish Curry
main_tag: kashmiri dinner nonvegeterian  haldi, badielaichi, laung, hing
description: Gaad which means Fish in Kashmir and Gaad T Tamatar is a fish recipe that is made with a tomato curry. The consistency of this delicious fish curry is usually thick but can be given variations as per one's choice. Kashmiri Cuisine has a wide use of Mustard oil, Ginger Powder and Fennel powder along with Asafoetida that makes an amazingly flavourful curry that stands out from any other Fish curry.

name: काला चना आमटी रेसिपी - Kala Chana Amti Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: काला चना आमटी रेसिपी, एक फ्लेवर से भरपूर डिश है जिसे कोस्टल जगहों पर बनाया जाता है  और यह महाराष्ट्र के मालवान में बहुत प्रसिद्ध भी है. इसमें नारियल का प्रयोग किया जाता है और वो इस डिश की एक महत्वपूर्ण सामग्री है, जो इस डिश को और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है. यह प्रोटीन से भरपूर है, इसलिए आपको इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बनाना चाहिए।

name: Badam Halwa Recipe
main_tag: awadhi dessert vegetarian  badam, badam
description: Badam Halwa is a quintessential Indian sweet that is made during festivals, special occasions like a wedding or a new home. In this halwa, badam is soaked and ground into a coarse semolina style mixture. It is roasted in ghee and then cooked in a saffron milk to give it that rich taste.

name: Aval Kesari Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  flattenedrice, elaichi
description: Kesari or Sheera, it is the easiest yet tastiest sweet commonly prepared at all households across India. Kesari doesn’t call for an auspicious occasion. It is prepared when one craves for sweet when guests arrived suddenly or as a sweet for a grand feast.

name: Apple Jalebi Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  adjust, maida, elaichi, dahiyogurt, maida, dalchini
description: This fruit flavoured Apple Jalebi Recipe will melt your heart when it is savoured with plain vanilla ice-cream. Deep fried and then dipped in sugar syrup to make it juicy and succulent.

name: फालगुनी दाल रेसिपी - Phalguni Dal Recipe
main_tag: bengali lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: सर्दिया आ गई है और इस समय हरे मटर बाजार में बहुत मिलते है. इसलिए यह वक़्त पर्याप्त है यह दाल बनाने का. फालगुनी दाल एक ऐसी दाल है जिसे आपको एक बार जरूर बनानी चाहिए। यह एक बंगाली दाल है जिसमे मसूर दाल और हरे मटर का प्रयोग किया जाता है. प्रोटीन की मात्रा में अधिक, यह एक वेगन और ग्लूटन फ्री दाल है.

name: Bengali Style Mixed Vegetable Sweet Pilaf Recipe
main_tag: bengali maincourse vegetarian  carrot cauliflower peas, homemadecottagecheese, tejpatta, elaichi, dalchini, laung
description: Bengali Style Mixed Vegetable Sweet Pilaf Recipe is a very simple Bengali Style Vegetable Pulao that we prepare very often at our place. Normally I prefer to cook this pulao or pilaf during winter as fresh peas and carrot are available in abundance during winter. You can add beans too if you wish .

name: Bengali Sita Bhog Recipe
main_tag: bengali dessert vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, elaichi, jamoons, maida, dahiyogurt, elaichi
description: The Bengali Sita Bhog is a delectable rice dish that is sweet and packed with flavors along with mini jamoons in the rice. Bengali Cuisine, like its delectable variants of food, boasts of a rich sweet tradition. The Bengali Sita Bhog sweet is a lesser known of the sweets which has remain hidden from the national limelight but are a rage within its territorial boundaries.

name: Baked Vermicelli Malpua Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  vermicelli, homemadecottagecheese, saunf, elaichi
description: Malpuas are always associated with festivities but you think twice before indulging in one, as these are deep fried and soaked in sugar making them an indulgent dessert.

name: Arbi Gosht Masala Recipe - Mutton Arbi Curry In Electric Pressure Cooker
main_tag: northindian dinner nonvegeterian  arbi, dalchini, laung, badielaichi, dhania, haldi, dhania
description: Arbi/colocasia is one of the oldest vegetables of the Indian Subcontinent and is used in many Indian Recipes where it is cooked along with different kinds of meats.

name: Murungakkai Puli Kuzhambu Recipe -Spicy Drumstick Curry
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, hing, haldi, dhania
description: The Murungakkai Puli Kuzhambu Recipe is a traditional South Indian recipe that is essentially a tamarind curry that is cooked with spices like sambar powder and combined with vegetables like drumsticks and baby onions (shallots). Different regions of South India make a Kuzhambu with a set of spices that a family uses and many also add coconut milk to make the Kuzhambu richer.

name: Sorakkai Puli Kuzhambu Recipe - Tangy Bottle Gourd Curry
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  lauki, gingelly, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds
description: Sorakkai Puli Kuzhambu Recipe is a South Indian preparation of the bottle gourd, made tangy with tamarind and homemade spices like sambar powder. Bottle Gourd is a very succulent vegetable, that absorbs the spices that are added to it, giving the curry base a very juicy texture.

name: Mambazha Pulissery Recipe - Mango Mor Kuzhambu Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian  ripe, jeera, haldi, dahiyogurt, raikadugu
description: The Mambazha Pulissery Recipe is a lip smacking mango curry which is made from ripe mangoes, ground along with a coconut masala and cooked in a yogurt gravy. With coconut and yogurt base, this dish is very similar to Majjige Huli of Karnataka or Mor Kuzhambu of Tamilnadu.

name: Konkani Style Sol Kadhi Recipe - Kokum Flavored Coconut Curry
main_tag: konkan lunch vegetarian  malabartamarind, dhania, jeera, raikadugu, hing
description: Konkani Style Sol Kadhi Recipe is an authentic delicacy in Goa. As many of the local people relish this as a refreshing drink. It can also be served as a curry with your everyday meals. Kokum is the essential ingredient used in this dish, which is an Indian Fruit. The fruit is dried in the sun till it loses it moisture and then used in many of their local dishes. This is what yields the slight pinkish color because of its dark purple tinge.

name: Mirchi And Aloo Curry Recipe - Long Green Chilli And Potato Curry
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  largegreenchilli, aloo, tejpatta, elaichi, dalchini, jeera, dhania, haldi, laung
description: Mirchi and Aloo Curry Recipe (Long Green Chilli and Potato Curry Recipe) is an innovative recipe to use the green chilli in a curry based dish. The green chilli will be soaked and stewed with the onion and tomato curry which is paired nicely with potato.  The flavors are well balanced and can be had with any Indian Flat breads.

name: Masaura And Potato Tarkari Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  aloo, jeera, haldi, jeera
description: Masaura are dehydrated balls of black-lentil paste and minced vegetables. The black-lentil paste is made into a shape of balls and then put on the sun to sun-dry them. The dried balls are then reserved in an airtight container for future use, usually for making tarkari. This a delicious recipe which you can make for your everyday meal.

name: Soya Keema Aloo Paratha Recipe
main_tag: northindian indianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  pearlmillet, sorghum, nuggets, aloo, drymangopowder, pudina
description: The Soya Keema Aloo Paratha Recipe is a delicious recipe of a paratha that is packed with protein and taste. The use of soy nuggets when combined along with onion, chilies and spices and stuffed in a whole wheat flour dough brings out delicious flavors and taste.

name: सूखे छोले रेसिपी - Dry Chole Recipe
main_tag: punjabi lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: सूखे छोले एक सरल रेसिपी है जिसमे प्याज और लहसुन का प्रयोग नहीं किया जाता। इसमें अदरक के पेस्ट और सूखे मसलो का प्रयोग किया जाता है. यह एक सेहतमंद रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. इसमें प्रोटीन की मात्रा भी अधिक होती है.

name: Chatpatti Makai Masala Recipe - Spicy Steamed Corn Masala
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  moongphali, jeera, hing, haldi, dhania
description: Chatpatti Makai Masala Recipe or Corn on the cob in tasty peanut curry is a dish that blends together the nutty flavour of peanuts with the crunchiness of the corn.

name: Kerala Style Jack Fruit Seeds Stir Fry Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian  kathal, haldi, dhania, jeera, raikadugu
description: Jack Fruit Seeds Stir Fry is a delicious dish made using the seeds of the ripe jackfruit. These seeds are steamed, then chopped, seasoned and stir fried along with coconut. It is a very typically delicacy from Kerala. It is also made on the occasion of Onam or other South Indian festivals.

name: Baked Jaggery Rasgulla Recipe
main_tag: oriya dessert vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, demerarasugar
description: Baked Jaggery Rasgulla is an easy yet delightful dessert which is very popular in Orissa.  When you cut the baked rasgulla, the cheese yields easily to reveal a soft and spongy rasgulla, fragrant from the special touch of palm jaggery, served cold with caramelized brown sugar, more saffron and pistachios on top.

name: Awadhi Style Zarda Pulao Recipe
main_tag: awadhi lunch vegetarian  elaichi, laung, dalchini, tejpatta, badam, kopra, homemadecottagecheese, rind
description: Awadhi Style Zarda Pulao Recipe is a wholesome pulao filled with dry fruits and sweetened basmati rice. The rice is also tossed with rose water to provide a rich flavor to the dish. Therefore, this recipe will stand out when prepared during the festive season since it is rich in flavour.

name: Andhra Cheese & Vegetables Pesarattu Recipe
main_tag: fusion southindianbreakfast vegetarian  whole, oatmeal, fenugreekseeds, dhania, capsicum, capsicum, capsicum, homemadecottagecheese, adjusttotaste, dhania, dried
description: Andhra Cheese Vegetables Pesarattu Recipe is a fusion recipe where a pesarattu is made with cheese and veggies topping. This pesarattu is prepared with moong beans. Pesarattu is made without urad dal that is usually a must in South Indian dosa batter. Pesarattu is one of the popular breakfasts of Andhra and is served with Allam Pachadi | Ginger Chutney Recipe.

name: नवरंग दाल रेसिपी - Navrang Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  स प ल ट, स प ल ट
description: नवरंग दाल रेसिपी एक मिक्स्ड दाल है जिसमे 9 अलग अलग दालो का प्रयोग किया जाता है. यह दाल मखनी की तरह क्रीमी होती है जबकि इसमें क्रीम का प्रयोग नहीं किया जाता। यह एक सेहतमंद डिश है क्यूंकि इसमें प्रोटीन की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है. यह एक आसान दाल है इसलिए आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: माँ की दाल रेसिपी - Maa Ki Dal Recipe
main_tag: punjabi dinner highproteinvegetarian
description: माँ की दाल एक पंजाबी रेसिपी है जिसमे काली उरद दाल को रोज के मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है. इसमें राजमा भी डाला जाता है जिससे इस दाल का स्वाद और भी बढ़ जाता है. यह हर पंजाबी घर में रोज के खाने के लिए बनाई जाती है. इस दाल को कई घंटो के लिए पकाया जाता है जिससे इसका स्वाद बढ़ता रहता है.

name: लोबिया मसाला रेसिपी - Lobia Masala Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner highproteinvegetarian
description: लोबिअा मसाला जिसे छोरा नु शाक भी कहा जाता है एक सरल डिश है जिसे आप आपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. यह प्रोटीन से भरपूर होता है और आप इसे अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक का सकते है.

name: Chow Chow Curry Recipe - Chayote Squash Stir Fry
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  chowchow, raikadugu, split, hing, haldi
description: Chow Chow Curry Recipe is a simple and wholesome stir fry of the Chayote Squash Vegetable. In this recipe, the chow chow is steamed and seasoned with a delicate blend of mustard seeds, halved urad dal and curry leaves. These basic ingredients bring out the flavors and textures of the squash, making them nutritious and delicious.

name: Karwar Style Lasani Kadhi Recipe - Kokum And Coconut Milk Curry
main_tag: coastalkarnataka lunch vegetarian  malabartamarind, jeera, dhania, chopped, raikadugu, jeera
description: Karwar Style Lasani Kadhi (Kokum & Coconut Milk Curry) is made using kokum and fresh coconut and is almost similar to Sol Kadhi. It can be relished it as such like a drink at the end of the meal or had as a side dish with the meal mixed with rice. Enjoy it fresh!

name: पुलि इंजी रेसिपी - Tamarind Ginger Chutney
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian
description: पुलि इंजी रेसिपी एक स्वाद से भरपूर चटनी है जिसमे अदरक, गुड़ और हरी मिर्च का प्रयोग किया जाता है. यह एक सरल रेसिपी है और आप इसे बनाकर फ्रिज में 1 या 2 हफ्ते के लिए रख भी सकते है.

name: तड़के वाली अरहर दाल रेसिपी - Tadka Arhar Dal Recipe
main_tag: awadhi lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: तड़के वाली अरहर की दाल एक सरल और पौष्टिक रेसिपी है जिसे एक पॉट में बना सकते है. इसमें दाल के पकने के बाद लहसुन का तड़का लगाया जाता है जो इसे एक अलग स्वाद देता है. यह बनाने में बहुत आसान है इसलिए आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: Raw Jackfruit Poriyal Recipe - South Indian Raw Jackfruit Stir Fry
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  kathal, raikadugu, hing, split, bengalgramdal, haldi
description: The Raw Jackfruit Poriyal Recipe is made with delicious combination of curry leaves and coconut giving it a simple South Indian flavour.

name: Spicy Soya Bhurji Recipe - North Indian Soya Matar Bhurji
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  wholesoyadal, soyachunks, matar, dhania, haldi, dhania
description: The Spicy Soya Bhurji Recipe is an easy protein rich side dish that you can make along with roti or parathas.

name: Bendakaya Noo Podi Kura Recipe - Ladies Finger With Sesame Spice Powder
main_tag: andhra sidedish vegetarian  ladyfingerokra, bengalgramdal, split, tilseeds
description: Spicy and nutty, Bendakaya Noo Podi Kura Recipe is an aromatic bhindi dry sabzi that is simple to make yet great in flavour. Sauteed bhindi cooked with sesame powder; this homely no fuss recipe is simple and quick to make with everyday ingredients.

name: Telangana Style Barada Palya Recipe - Chana Dal Dry Sabzi
main_tag: andhra sidedish highproteinvegetarian  bengalgramdal, dhania, haldi, raikadugu, jeera
description: Barada Palya Recipe - Chana Dal Dry Sabzi is a delicious Telangana style dry curry made with chana dal and barada literally means Crumble. This is one of those curries made especially by the Telanganites and is more limited to the Vysya community.

name: Rajasthani Gunde Ka Achaar Recipe (Bird Lime Pickle)
main_tag: rajasthani appetizer vegetarian  birdlime, hing, methikuria, raikuria, saunf, haldi
description: Rajasthani Gunde Ka Achaar is the pickle made with bird lime. It is very popularly made in Rajasthani households and is served as a side dish/accompaniment along with their meals. Gunde Ka Achaar recipe also can be the savior when you do not have time to prepare sabzi for lunch box with rotis.

name: Bathua Aloo Paratha Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast vegetarian  aloo, drymangopowder
description: The Bathua Aloo Paratha Recipe is a wholesome and delicious recipes where boiled aloo and chopped bathua are combined along with garlic onions, green chillies and spices to make a lip smacking filling for the paratha. These parathas are cooked in ghee making them crisp and perfect for a special weekend breakfast.

name: Kovakka Thoran (Poriyal) Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  dondakayakovakkai, jeera, raikadugu, haldi
description: The Kovakka Thoran (Poriyal) Recipe is an inspiration of the Kerala dish. You can also add onions to this dish and lots more green chillies. This recipe is without the onions and you can server it either ways.

name: Goruchikkudu Kaya With Peanut Podi Recipe - Cluster Beans With Peanut
main_tag: andhra lunch vegetarian  kothavarangaiclusterbeans, moongphali
description: Goruchikkudu Kaya which is the name for cluster beans in Telugu is a healthy and nutritious legume. It is known as Gavar in hindi, Kothavarangai in Tamil. It is a popular vegetable and goes well with both rice and roti.

name: Palakottai Kuzhambu Recipe-Kongunad Style Jackfruit Seeds Curry
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish vegetarian  kathal, raikadugu, jeera, haldi, hing, dhania, dhania
description: Palakottai Kuzhambu Recipe is Kongunad Style Jackfruit Seeds Curry. There are many variations in making this palakottai Kuzhambu,I have prepared palakottai in a coconut based puli Kuzhambu.

name: Attirachi Kuzhambu Recipe - Spicy Mutton Gravy
main_tag: southindian lunch nonvegeterian  tejpatta, dhania, dalchini, elaichi, saunf, javitri, raikadugu
description: Attirachi Kuzhambu is a normal mutton gravy cooked with some traditional spicy ingredients. Cooking mutton with grounded spices gives the aroma and taste for this origin dish. So please don't skip anyone. Whenever we prefer cooking mutton, this is the most wanted dish. This gravy takes only around 30 minutes to cook when all the ingredients are ready.

name: Karwar Style Varan Kadhi Recipe - Toor Dal in Coconut Milk Curry
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian  splittoordal, haldi, hing, malabartamarind
description: Karwar Style Varan Kadhi Recipe (Toor Dal in Coconut Milk Curry) is a humble recipe made simple with everyday used ingredients in the kitchen. Usually, Kadhi’s from North India is combined with besan flour to give it the right consistency but in this Kadhi we have used coconut to thicken.

name: Tamil Nadu Style Paneer Kurma Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch highproteinvegetarian  tejpatta, saunf, dalchini, laung, elaichi, sambaronions, or1largeonion, haldi, dhania
description: Tamil Nadu Style Paneer Kurma Recipe is a dish that you must try out as it is simple and delicious to make. Kurma are generally prepared in many parts of Tamil Nadu which is usually had along with paratha for lunch.

name: Aava Pettina Majjiga Pulusu Recipe - Andhra Style Mor Kuzhambu
main_tag: andhra lunch vegetarian  dahiyogurt, gajjar, lauki, haldi, hing, bengalgramdal, tilseeds, raikadugu, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, hing
description: Aava Pettina Majjiga Pulusu Recipe is a traditional Andhra Brahmin recipe usually served with muddapappu (plain cooked toor dal) and rice. In this recipe of Pulusu, paste of mustard seeds, sesame seeds and chana dal is added to a Yogurt mixture and brought to a boil and tempered with mustard seeds. It is also popularly called as Mor Kuzhambu in Tamil Nadu.

name: Karnataka Style Avarekalu Sagu Recipe-Hyacinth Beans/ Mochai Kurma
main_tag: karnataka lunch vegetarian  aloo, raikadugu, dhania, pottukadalai, dhania, dalchini, elaichi, laung
description: Avarekalu or Avare Bele are the Hyacinth Beans. These beans are seasonal and found in abundance during the winter months in South India. It is widely used in the Karnataka Cuisine.

name: Chow Chow Thakkali Kootu Recipe - Chayote Squash In Dal Coconut Curry
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  chayotesquash, split, jeera, haldi, raikadugu, hing, jeera
description: Chow Chow Thakkali Kootu Recipe is traditional Tamil Nadu Style lentils cooked with chayote squash, tomatoes along with moong dal, with a coconut based masala.

name: Kondai Kadalai Puli Kuzhambu Recipe -Tangy South Indian Kala Chana Curry
main_tag: southindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  brownchickpeas, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, gingelly
description: Kondai Kadalai Puli Kuzhambu Recipe is a Black Chickpea Curry which is cooked in tamarind gravy. It is different from kerala kadala curry and North Indian chole. Its flavour and taste is unique. It pairs well with hot steaming rice, paratha and it also goes well with idli/dosa.

name: Pavakka Theeyal Recipe - Spicy & Tangy Karela In Tamarind Gravy
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  bittergourdpavakkai, haldi, dhania, fenugreekseeds, raikadugu
description: Pavakka Theeyal Recipe is a Kerala Style Bitter Gourd curry which you can make for your everyday food. This is a delicious way to make a Bitter Gourd curry which is sweet, spicy and tangy. It is easy to make and takes everyday ingredients to prepare it.

name: Tirunelveli Sodhi Kuzhambu Recipe - Mixed Vegetable Stew
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  split, aloo, frenchbeans, gajjar, matar, gobi, sambaronions, raikadugu, jeera, hing, dhania
description: Sodhi Kuzhambu or better known as "Mappillai Sodhi" in Tirunelveli area of Tamilnadu. Mappillai means bridegroom in tamil and this coconut milk based curry is prepared by bride's family to treat their son in law on the first visit to bride's place after marriage. The curry is so mild with full of wonderful flavor, goes well with rice, idli dosa, idiyappam typically with almost all South Indian breakfast items.

name: Orange Peel Kuzhambu Recipe - Orange Peel Tamarind Based Curry
main_tag: southindian maincourse vegetarian  haldi, hing, gingelly, raikadugu
description: Orange Peel Kuzhambu is a spicy, tangy gravy made with tamarind juice and orange peels. Most of us just throw away the orange peel after eating the orange. But the orange peel tastes amazing and h s a host of health benefits.

name: Kathiri Urulai Masala Kuzhambu Recipe - Brinjal And Potato Masala Gravy
main_tag: southindian maincourse vegetarian  bainganeggplant, aloo, haldi, saunf, raikadugu, dalchini
description: Kathiri Urulai Masala Kuzhambu is a simple gravy where Brinjal and Potatoes are cooked in an onion tomato tamarind gravy along with ground coconut and spices like fennel and khus khus, which gives a nice flavour and taste.

name: Kara Boondi Kurma Recipe - Boondi In Coconut Milk
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  dhania, haldi, tejpatta, raikadugu, laung, dalchini, dhania
description: Kara Boondi Kurma is a simple and easy to make recipe, where you just need Boondi, coconut milk and the everyday masalas. This curry is popular in Gudiyatham, a place in Tamil Nadu. You can serve this curry with phulka, paratha or even a crisp ghee dosa.

name: Munthiri Masala Kurma Recipe - Kaju Masala Kurma Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  haldi
description: Munthiri Masala Kurma Recipe is a rich South Indian gravy where cashews are cooked in ground tomato paste with perfect blend of indian spices. This delicious gravy dish goes perfectly with roti and rice. You can make this dish for your everyday meals or along with other dishes for your house parties.

name: Kodava Kootu Curry Recipe - Coorg Style Mixed Vegetable Stew
main_tag: coorg lunch vegetarian  gajjar, frenchbeans, bainganeggplant, splittoordal, raikadugu, jeera, dhania, split, bengalgramdal, haldi, raikadugu, hing
description: Kodava Kootu Curry Recipe - Mixed Vegetable Stew is similar to the vegetable stew that we often make in South India except for the difference in flavour. This recipe is taken from the kodava community which is a part of the coorg district in Karnataka.

name: Chicken Dimsums Recipe - Steamed Chicken Dumplings
main_tag: asian appetizer highproteinvegetarian  bulb greens, maida
description: We all love Dimsums! The delicious appetizers filled with yummy stuffings surely steals the show on the dinner table. They are easy to make and requires few ingredients. The spiced Chicken stuffing makes it even more delicious.

name: Kashmiri Mutton Yakhni Recipe
main_tag: kashmiri maincourse nonvegeterian  elaichi, dalchini, tejpatta, laung, saunf, dahiyogurt, haldi
description: Kashmiri Mutton Yakhni Recipe, is a kashmiri curry made with tender mutton on the bone, that is cooked along with whole spices that are simmered in creamy yogurt gravy.  Whole spices like cardamom, cinnamon and bay lend great taste and aroma to this mutton yakhni.

name: Potato Onion Cheela Recipe
main_tag: indian northindianbreakfast vegetarian  aloo, besan, jeera
description: If you are bored with your daily breakfast schedule then this recipe is perfect for you. It is easy to make this recipe and they taste delicious. Potato Onion Cheela is made with potato and onion with gram flour and is flavoured with the everyday masalas.

name: Chicken Mapas Recipe - Chicken in Coconut Milk Curry
main_tag: southindian lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  haldi, dhania
description: Chicken Mapas Recipe or Kozhi Mapas is a thick and creamy Kerala style chicken curry, is made with coconut milk.  This chicken curry has a perfect balance of spice and richness due to the coconut based creamy curry.

name: Smoked Tandoori Chicken Recipe - Classic North Indian Chicken Recipe
main_tag: northindian appetizer highproteinnonvegetarian  greekyogurt, dhania, kalanamak
description: Tandoori Chicken Recipe is essentially a popular chicken dish where it uses the chicken thigh, marinated in robust Indian spices and thick yogurt and finally grilled either in a tandoor or made convenient at home by grilling it on stove top gives an amazingly rustic aroma and flavour when we apply a simple technique and smoke the dish to get the authentic charcoal effect.

name: दाल बंजारा रेसिपी - Dal Banjara Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  स प ल ट
description: दाल बंजारा जिसे लंगर वाली दाल भी कहा जाता है एक सरल दाल है जिसे कम समय में बनाया जा सकता है. इसमें काली दाल और चना दाल का प्रयोग किया जाता है जिसमे तेज पत्ता और दालचीनी का भी इस्तेमाल किया जाता है. इस दाल में प्याज और लहसुन का प्रयोग किया जाता है लेकिन यहाँ हमने इस दाल में उसका प्रयोग नहीं किया है, इसलिए आप इसे सात्विक खाने में भी बना सकते है.

name: Vazhaipoo Podimas Recipe  - Banana Flower Poriyal/ Sabzi
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  vazhaipoo, dahiyogurt, raikadugu, split, sambaronions, haldi, gingelly
description: The Vazhaipoo Podimas Recipe is a wholesome and delicious stir fry made from banana flower tossed along with coconut, green chillies and a crunchy tadka with curry leaves.

name: Aloo Ka Halwa Recipe
main_tag: karnataka dessert vegetarian  aloo, iusedcashew raisins almonds
description: Grated Potato Halwa or Aloo Ka Halwa is the easiest halwa we have made. There are many ways of preparing this and this is one simple method. This is so delicious with lots of dry fruits and apt for any festive season. You can also make it for special occasions or for your weekend dessert after your meal.

name: पुदीना दही चटनी रेसिपी - Pudina Dahi Chutney Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian
description: पुदीना दही चटनी एक स्वादिष्ट चटनी है जिसमे दही के साथ पुदीना, हरा धनिया को मिलकर पिसा जाता है. आप इस चटनी को अपने स्नैक्स, खासतर तंदूरी डिशेस के साथ परोस सकते है. यह बनाने में बहुत आसान है और इसको बनाने के लिए बहुत कम सामग्री का प्रयोग होता है.

name: Carrot Poriyal Recipe - Steamed Carrot Stir Fry
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  gajjar, raikadugu, split, hing, haldi
description: Carrot Poriyal Recipe is a simple, quick stir fry that is packed with the nutrition and taste. This vegetable is a very traditional way of how South Indian's prepare the carrot vegetable to be served as a side dish. A dry vegetable among the South Indian Brahmin community is called a curry. It is steamed carrots seasoned with some mustard, asafoetida and curry leaves.

name: Konkani Tendli Sukke Recipe - Ivy Gourd/Tindora Stir Fry
main_tag: konkan sidedish vegetarian  dondakayakovakkai, raikadugu, dhania, split
description: Konkani Tendli Sukke Recipe is a Tindora Stir Fry made Konkani style. Flavoured with a freshly ground masala of coconut and red chillies with the addition of jaggery to add some sweetness and tamarind to add a hint of tart to the dish.

name: Soya Chunk And Green Peas Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  wholesoyadal, matar, tejpatta, jeera, haldi, dhania
description: Soya Chunk & Green Peas Subzi Recipe is a nice combination to make a dry subzi recipe. The tomatoes are ground along with green chilies, cumin seeds and ginger to a fine smooth puree and is cooked till the tomatoes are cooked well, it is then tossed with soy chunks and green peas and flavored with spicy garam masala and coriander powder.

name: Murunga Keerai Urula Poriyal Recipe - Moringa Aloo Sabzi
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  aloo, moringamurungaikeerai, haldi, raikadugu
description: Murunga Keerai Urula Poriyal is a simple easy and wholesome dish made from boiled potatoes and sautéed drumstick leaves, delicately spiced sambar powder and a mustard tadka. You can also pack this sabzi in your Lunch Box, as it is easy to make and gets ready in no time.

name: उरद की सुखी दाल रेसिपी - Urad Ki Sukhi Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: उरद की सुखी दाल रेसिपी एक पंजाबी रेसिपी है जिसमे उरद दाल और रोज के मसालो का प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इसे अपने लंच बॉक्स में पराठो के साथ भी परोस सकते है या फिर इसे अपने खाने के साथ में साइड डिश के तरह बनाने। यह बहुत आसान रेसिपी है और बहुत कम समय में बन भी जाती है.

name: Boondi Ki Kheer Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  elaichi, badam
description: Boondi Ki Kheer Recipe is a lip smacking Indian sweet dish, where pearls of fried besan, popular as boondi are dipped in sugar syrup and kept ready.

name: Chow Chow Thoran (Poriyal) Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian  jeera, raikadugu, haldi
description: The Chow Chow Thoran (Poriyal) recipe is an inspiration of the Kerala dish where vegetables are prepared along with coconut, green chillies and a few spices. Its simple, healthy and a great way to incorporate vegetables in your diet that are is simply delicious.

name: Carrot And Beans Poriyal Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  frenchbeans, gajjar, raikadugu, split, hing, haldi, optional
description: Carrot and Beans Poriyal is a classic South Indian preparation of the mixed stir fried vegetables. Steamed carrots and beans are seasoned with mustard seeds, urad dal and curry leaves. To add more flavor to the Poriyal, it can be garnished with grated coconut.

name: Achari Aloo Gobi Recipe - Spicy Indian Cauliflower Stir Fry
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  gobi, aloo, drymangopowder, haldi, dhania, onionnigellaseeds, saunf, raikadugu, jeera, fenugreekseeds
description: The Achari Aloo Gobi Recipe is a quick and easy recipe of cauliflower that is made from spices that are used to make a pickle. Achaar or pickle is part of every Indian households staple diet.

name: Pepper Mushroom Stir Fry Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  capsicum, haldi, dhania
description: Pepper Mushroom Stir Fry Recipe is a super quick and simple recipe, thats healthy and can be combined with a paratha or a bread to complete a weeknight dinner. I have used button mushrooms in this recipe as i felt they work best in absorbing flavors and also retaining its shape. You can experiment with a lot of other ingredients by adding red bell peppers, or green capsicum or even carrot wedges.

name: Goan Style Salada De Cavalas Salgadas Recipe - Salted Mackerel Salad
main_tag: goan sidedish highproteinnonvegetarian  dhania
description: Goan Style Salada De Cavalas Salgadas Recipe is a quick and simple salad to make with mackerel fish. The mackerel fish is roasted well till it is nicely roaasted and then shredded by taking out the bone. Then it is tossed freshly cut onions, tomatoes, coriander leaves and vinegar to keep it citrusy and tangy.

name: मूंगफली की चटनी रेसिपी - Peanut Chutney Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish highproteinvegetarian
description: मूंगफली की चटनी रेसिपी एक स्वाद और प्रोटीन से भरपूर चटनी है जिसमे बहुत कम सामग्री का प्रयोग किया जाता है और इसे बनाने में भी बहुत कम समय लगता है. इसमें नारियल का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है. कढ़ी पत्ता और हरी मिर्च से इसका स्वाद और भी भी बढ़ जाता है. आप इस चटनी को 2 दिन तक फ्रिज में रख सकते है.

name: सिंधी तहरी रेसिपी - Sindhi Tahiri Recipe
main_tag: sindhi maincourse vegetarian
description: एक पारम्परिक रेसिपी, सिंधी तहरी रेसिपी की रेसिपी अवधी खाने से आती है. इस मीठे चावल में ड्राई फ्रूट्स का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ाता है.आप इसे त्यौहार या किसी भी ख़ास दिन बना सकते है.

name: Chocolate Kaju Katli Recipe - Chocolate Kaju Barfi
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian
description: Chocolate Kaju Katli Recipe is another perfectly indulgent and delightful sweet that comes right in time for the onset of festivals that are around the corner. If you have feared making Kaju Katlis or Barfis at home because of the tedious process, this recipe will inspire you to give it a go.

name: Mishti Doi Recipe - Traditional Bengali Sweet Yogurt
main_tag: bengali dessert vegetarian  dahiyogurt
description: Mishti Doi Recipe is a traditional Bengali dessert of delicately sweetened curd. Mild, light and extremely addictive this makes a great dessert option when entertaining guests over an Indian meal. The sweetness is lent from lightly caramelised sugar and traditionally the curd is set in earthen pots.

name: Besan Halwa Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  besan, elaichi, badam
description: Besan Halwa Recipe is enriched with the goodness of gram flour which is roasted along with ghee and cooked in a cardamom flavoured sugar syrup which brings out the melt in the mouth texture and taste.

name: Mohan Bhog Recipe - Bengali Style Sooji Ka Halwa
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  semolinarava, tejpatta, elaichi
description: Mohan Bhog is a common Indian Dessert, made mostly in every part of India and is also very special to Bengali Cuisine. It is made during the special occasions in the family or festivals. The Mohan Bhog is very similar to the Kesari Bhath, Sooji Ka Halwa or Sheera Recipes.

name: Kimami Sewai Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  vermicelli, finebanarsisewai, mawa, elaichi, lotusseeds, badam, kopra
description: Kimami Sewai Recipe is an Awadh Style festive dish recipe that is served as a dessert. This recipe is made in Northern parts of India during Eid and other festivals. Thin sevai is slowly roasted on low heat and then cooked along with sugar and mawa.

name: राजस्थानी दाल रेसिपी - Rajasthani Dal Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: राजस्थानी दाल रेसिपी एक सरल दाल है जो की प्रोटीन से भरपूर है. इसमें मूंग दाल, चना दाल का प्रयोग किया जाता है जिसमे लहसुन का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें घी, हरी मिर्च का भी प्रयोग होता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है.

name: Bread Halwa Recipe
main_tag: mughlai dessert vegetarian  elaichi, chandikavark
description: Bread Halwa also called as Double Ka Meetha is a delicious dessert recipe that originated during the Mughals and Nizam Era. This recipe is commonly served in Hyderabad and is often seen served during festivals and special occasions.

name: Rose Gulkand Phirni Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  fullfat, 1can, optional, elaichi, badam
description: Phirni is a wonderful, fantastically rich, creamy, silky smooth pudding that is a popular festive dish. Rose Gulkand Phirni Recipe is a creamy dessert made with ground rice combined with milk, sugar and some saffron strands for flavouring.

name: Shorshe Maach Recipe - Bengali Style Mustard Fish Curry
main_tag: bengali dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  raikadugu, dhania, haldi, haldi, haldi, dhania
description: Shorshe Maach Recipe (Bengali Mustard Fish Curry) is a famous fish curry made with mustard paste. The fish is lightly pan fried on the tawa and it is soaked in the mustard sauce. This will help the fish to absorb the curry and gives a unique flavor to the dish.

name: Ilish Er Tel Jhol Recipe - Bengali Hilsa Fish Curry
main_tag: bengali dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  adjustable, haldi, onionnigellaseeds
description: Ilish Er Tel Jhol is a runny Hilsa gravy scented with kalonji and turmeric powder. This gravy is spiked with green chillies and finished with a generous drizzle of mustard oil.

name: नारियल मूंगफली की चटनी रेसिपी - Coconut Peanut Chutney Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish noonionnogarlic
description: नारियल मूंगफली की चटनी रेसिपी एक साइड डिश है जिसमे नारियल को हरी मिर्च, सकी हुई मूंगफली के साथ पिसा जाता है. आप इस चटनी को इडली, डोसा या उत्तपम के साथ परोस सकते है. इसमें रोज के मसलो का भी प्रयोग कर सकते है जो इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ाता है.

name: Chanar Paturi Recipe-A Bengali Paneer Dish With Mustard
main_tag: bengali lunch highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, raikadugu, adjustaccordingtotaste, haldi
description: Chanar Paturi is an authentic Bengali recipe of paneer that is flavored with mustard, coconut and green chillies and steamed in pumpkin leaves. Paneer is called as Chanar in Bengali language. This recipe is a vegetarian adoption of popular Bengali fish recipe paturi, one of the royal dishes of Bengali cuisine. Pumpkin leaves wrapped parcels of mustard-coated paneer is steamed to make the delicious dish.The basic idea is to cook the paneer in a wilted pumpkin-leaf envelope.

name: गोंगुरा चिकन करी रेसिपी - Gongura Chicken Curry Recipe
main_tag: andhra lunch nonvegeterian
description: गोंगुरा चिकन करी रेसिपी प्रसिद्ध करी है जिसको ज्यादातर आंध्रा प्रदेश के घरो में बनाया जाता है. इसमें चिकन को गोंगुरा और रोज के मसलो के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह एक सरल चिकन करी है इसलिए आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. इसमें मेथी, धनिये के बीज और सुखी लाल मिर्च का प्रयोग होता है जो इसको और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है.

name: Avarekalu Payasa Recipe - Broad Beans Payasa
main_tag: karnataka dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Avarekalu Payasa is a traditional Karnataka sweet prepared with field beans. The payasa is delightful with the flavors of Avarekalu, coconut, jaggery and poppy seeds. It is delicious, healthy and can be prepared for any festival.

name: Easy Gajar Halwa Recipe With Khoya Made In A Pressure Cooker
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  gajjar, preferablyred, mawa, elaichi, almondscashewnutspistachios
description: A traditional mithai from North India, this delicious Gajar Ka Halwa is made with fresh crunchy red carrots or Delhi carrots mostly found in the winter season.

name: बूंदी की खीर रेसिपी - Boondi Ki Kheer Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian
description: बूंदी की खीर रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट और सरल भारतीय मीठी डिश है जिसमे बूंदी का प्रयोग किया जाता है. बूंदी को बेसन से बनाया जाता है और फिर उसे शक्कर के घोल में डाला जाता है. आप इसे त्यौहार या किसी भी ख़ास दिनों के लिए बना सकते है.

name: भरवा प्याज की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Bharwa Pyaz Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian
description: भरवा प्याज की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी एक चटपटा रेसिपी है जिसमे छोटे प्याज के अंदर मसाला भरा जाता है. आप इसे अपने खाने के साथ साइड डिश जैसे परोस सकते है. आप इस सब्ज़ी को अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी परोस सकते है.

name: Bharwa Lauki Recipe In No Onion No Garlic Makhani Gravy
main_tag: northindian maincourse noonionnogarlic  lauki, homemadecottagecheese, besan, gravy1ginger2tablespoonscashewnuts2cardamom elaichi, laung, adjust, haldi, dhania, driedfenugreekleaves
description: Lauki Dum Banarasi or the Bharwa Lauki is a delicious preparation of the Vegetarian Royal Recipe inspired by Cuisines of Nawab. The Stuffed Bottle Gourd is simmered in a nut rich no onion no garlic gravy and smoked to give the authentic taste to the Nawabi Cuisine.

name: Bhaji Miligai And Baby Potato Fry Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer vegetarian  bajjivariety lightgreenones, haldi, besan
description: Bhaji Miligai And Baby Potato Fry Recipe is made by shallow frying al dente cooked baby potatoes and bhajji miligai (bhajji chillies) along with garlic, curry leaves, and turmeric powder.

name: कुर्ग स्टाइल मशरुम करी रेसिपी - Coorg Style Mushroom Curry Recipe
main_tag: coorg lunch vegetarian  dhania, haldi, jeera
description: कुर्ग स्टाइल मशरुम करी रेसिपी एक पारम्परिक रेसिपी है जिसे कूर्ग के कोडावा डिस्ट्रिक्ट में बनाया जाता है. इस करी को कोड़ावा कुम्मु करी भी कहा जाता है. इसकी करी बनाने के लिए नारियल, जीरा और लहसुन का प्रयोग किया जाता है. मशरुम में प्रोटीन की मात्रा अद्धिक होती है इसलिए यह आपकी सेहत के लिए भी अच्छा माना जाता है.

name: हरे प्याज की पूरी रेसिपी - Hare Pyaaz Ki Puri Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian
description: हरे प्याज की पूरी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जो आपकी रोज की पूरी का एक नया ट्विस्ट है. इस पूरी के आटे में गेहूं के आटे के साथ जीरा, अजवाइन और बारीक कटा हुआ हरा का प्रयोग किया जाता है. हरे प्याज इस पूरी को क्रंच देता है जो इस पूरी को और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है.

name: Jain Style Paneer Makhani Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish noonionnogarlic  homemadecottagecheese, matar, capsicum, driedfenugreekleaves, dhania
description: The Jain Style Paneer Makhani Recipe is a rich creamy gravy dish that uses no onion, ginger or garlic and is quick to prepare. The addition of cream and a few spices bring out the delicious flavors of this no Jain Style Paneer Makhani making it a perfect weeknight dinner that can be prepared in less than 30 minutes.

name: Paneer Bhurji Recipe With Capsicum - Spicy Cottage Cheese Crumble
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, capsicum, jeera, haldi, dhania, salted
description: The Paneer Capsicum Bhurji Recipe is a delicious and wonderful take on the traditional Egg Bhurji that blends together the softness of cottage cheese with the crunchiness of capsicum.

name: Paneer Methi Paratha Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, jeera, fenugreekleaves
description: Paneer Methi Paratha Recipe is made from whole wheat flour dough stuffed with finely chopped methi leaves and freshly made paneer, spiced up with green chillies and cumin powder. The Paneer Paratha can make a meal in itself and served with a pickle and some yogurt or raita. The paratha makes a great lunch box as well, as it does not brittle and remains soft when heated in a microwave oven.

name: सूखे मेथी छोले रेसिपी - Sukhe Methi Chole Recipe
main_tag: indian maincourse vegetarian
description: सूखे मेथी छोले रेसिपी एक सरल और स्वादिष्ट डिश है जिसमे काबुली चने को उबालकर मेथी मसाला के साथ पकाया जाता है. आप इसे पूरी के साथ नाश्ते में भी परोस सकते है. यह एक पोषण से भरपूर रेसिपी है क्यूंकि इसमें छोले है जो प्रोटीन से भरपूर है और मेथी है जो आयरन से भरपूर है.

name: बेसन मेथी पराठा रेसिपी - Besan Methi Paratha Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast vegetarian
description: बेसन मेथी पराठा रेसिपी, सरल और स्वादिष्ट पराठा है जहा पराठे में मेथी और बेसन का मसाला भरा जाता है. आप इस पराठे को सुबह के नाश्ते के लिए भी परोस सकते है. मेथी होने के कारण यह पराठा आयरन से भरपूर होता है, इसलिए इसे रोज के खाने में आप बना सकते है. यह एक अच्छा तरीका है आपके बच्चो को मेथी खिलने का.

name: Bengali Style Hilsa Fish In Poppy Seeds & Yogurt Curry Recipe
main_tag: bengali sidedish highproteinnonvegetarian  onionnigellaseeds, haldi, dahiyogurt, adjusttotaste
description: Hilsa Fish In Poppy Seeds & Yogurt Curry Recipe is a Bengali delicacy that is made with the hilsa fish available in monsoons. Hilsa is one of the favourite fishes of the region, that is locally grown near the Ganga river and its tributaries.

name: Seer Fish Fry Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish highproteinnonvegetarian  haldi, dhania
description: Seer Fish Fry Recipe is a simple and delicious dish of fish fry that is often made in Bengali households. The fish slices are shallow fried to make it healthy and flavoured it with tomato ketchup for an extra taste. You can make this recipe as a side dish along with your meal.

name: Mawa Gujiya With Badam and Pista Recipe
main_tag: northindian snack vegetarian  maida, semolinarava, warmmilk, mawa, badam, badam
description: Gujiyas are delicious treats that are prepared during festive seasons of Holi or Diwali. They are usually semi circle shaped and are stuffed with different kinds of sweet and savoury fillings such as - coconut, moong dal etc.

name: Ripe Jackfruit Malpua With Rabdi Recipe - Kathal Malpua
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  maida, kathal, homemadecottagecheese, elaichi, saunf, ilikeaddingalittlelesssugar pleaseadjustaccordingtoyourtaste, elaichi, badam
description: Jackfruit Malpua with Rabdi Recipe is a delicious take on the classic Indian dessert. You can flavour the Malpua with any fruit that you like. But here we have added our seasonal fruit which is the ripened Jackfruit.

name: Shakarkandi Malpua Recipe - Mishti Aloo Malpua Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  maida, semolinarava, saunf, elaichi
description: Shakarkandi Malpua is a delicious Indian dessert that is made with sweet potatoes which is flavored with saunf and elaichi.

name: Oats Apple Phirni Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  oatmeal, elaichi
description: Oats Apple Phirni is an easy to make and is a tasty dessert that is very low in calories. This requires minimal ingredients and can be made in minutes. This phirni is healthy and can also be served to kids for their evening snacks.

name: बादाम नु गोष्ट रेसिपी - Badam Nu Gosht Recipe
main_tag: parsi maincourse nonvegeterian
description: बादाम नु गोष्ट रेसिपी एक मटन रेसिपी है जिसमे मटन को खड़े मसाले और बादाम के पेस्ट के साथ पकाया जाता है. बादाम का पेस्ट इसे एक अलग स्वाद और फ्लेवर देता है जो बहुत ही रिच होता है. आप इसे अपने हाउस पार्टीज या किसी भी ख़ास अवसर पर बना सकते है.

name: करूवेपिल्लई पचड़ी रेसिपी - Karuvepillai Pachadi Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian
description: करूवेपिल्लई पचड़ी रेसिपी को कढ़ी पत्ता रायता भी कहा जाता है जिसमे दही के साथ कढ़ी पत्ता, अदरक और हरी मिर्च भी डाला जाता है. यह बनाने में बहुत  आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: Palak Paneer Stuffed Paratha Recipe
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast vegetarian  palak, pudina, besan, jeera, homemadecottagecheese, dhania, jeera
description: Paneer Stuffed Palak Paratha Recipe is a healthy recipe of using spinach and paneer that is packed with vitamins and proteins and many other nutrients. The addition of spinach and paneer makes the parathas get packed with flavors and taste making it a great recipe for breakfast or even a quick weeknight dinner and kids lunch box recipe.

name: Shahi Tukda Gajar Halwa Shots With Rabri Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  elaichi, gajjar, preferablyred, mawa, elaichi, badam
description: A twist to the traditional Indian Desserts, the  Shahi Tukda Gajar Halwa Shots With Rabri Recipe is a fusion between Gajar Halwa and Shahi Tukda.

name: Scrambled Egg Bread Upma Recipe With Potatoes
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast eggetarian  oroneloaf, aloo, raikadugu, dhania
description: Scrambled Egg Bread Upma Recipe With Potatoes, is a delicious blend of potatoes and eggs combined with leftover bread. The eggs along with the potatoes add nutrition to this dish, making it wholesome and delicious. Next time when you have some leftover bread, you must give this recipe a try.

name: Aloo Simla Mirch Ki Sabzi Recipe - Aloo & Capsicum Sabzi
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  aloo, capsicum, dhania, haldi, dhania
description: Aloo Capsicum Sabzi Recipe is a simple sabzi to make and is a delicious vegetable that is cooked along with the basic ingredients that will be available in your pantry any time. The addition of onion, ginger and roasted capsicum, makes the sabzi quick to make and delicious to eat.

name: Aloo Palak Sabzi Recipe - Sautéed Potatoes With Spinach
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian  aloo, palak, haldi, dalchini, jeera
description: Aloo Palak Sabzi Recipe is a simple and easy dish made from boiled potatoes and sautéed spinach, delicately spiced cinnamon. Potatoes high in starch and carbohydrates and spinach rich in iron and minerals, cooked with low fat ingredients makes it a perfect lunch box meal for kids and adults.

name: Gujarati Dal Dhokli Recipe-Sweet & Spicy Tangy Dal Curry with Whole Wheat Strips
main_tag: gujarati﻿ dinner highproteinvegetarian  pigeonpea, raikadugu, jeera, dalchini, tejpatta, malabartamarind, haldi, hing, moongphali, dhania, thepladough, haldi, hing
description: The Gujarati Dal Dhokli is one of the most delicious Gujarati one dish meals that I was introduced to when I got married. Strips of spice whole wheat dough known as thepla dough are dropped into boiling hot lentils to get the soup like consistency along with pasta-like texture and crunchiness of the peanuts. It tastes delicious when served in a wide mouth soup bowl, drizzled with teaspoon of ghee and sprinkled with finely chopped onions.

name: Gajar Shimla Mirch Sambharo Recipe - Instant Gujarati Carrot Capsicum Pickle
main_tag: gujarati﻿ sidedish vegetarian  gajjar, capsicum, methikuria, raikuria, haldi, hing
description: Gajar Shimla Mirch Sambharo is an instant vegetable pickle that is easy to make using very few ingredients. This instant carrot and capsicum is made with a traditional Sambharo Masala and goes well with dals, parathas, rice and just about anything that needs an accompaniment.

name: चकुंदर सलाद रेसिपी - Simple Steamed Indian Beet Salad Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer vegetarian
description: चकुंदर सलाद रेसिपी एक सरल और सेहतमंद रेसिपी है जिसमे चकुंदर/बीटरूट को उबाल कर इसका प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसके ऊपर नमक, काली मिर्च और जीरा पाउडर भी डाला जाता है जो इसे और अच्छा फ्लेवर देता है.

name: Basundi / Rabri Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ dessert vegetarian  ilikeaddingalittlelesssugarpleaseadjustaccordingtoyourtaste, elaichi, badam
description: Basundi also known as Rabri in some parts of India is a creamy rich dessert, is prepared especially during the festivities of Kali Chaudas and just about every small function or a party.

name: Hare Pyaaz Ki Puri Recipe - Spring Onion Puri
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian  jeera, caromseeds, dhania
description: Hare Pyaaz Ki Puri Recipe is essentially a twist to a classic puri. The puri dough is made by combining the wheat flour along with cumin seeds, ajwain and finely chopped spring onion greens.

name: Lapsi Recipe  - Sweetened Gujarati Broken Wheat
main_tag: gujarati﻿ dessert vegetarian  daliagodumairava, elaichi
description: Lapsi Recipe is a Gujarati sweet dish made from broken wheat has an age-old significance of being auspicious. It is made on special occasions like buying a home, new job, new baby or any other memorable occasion with prayers of good luck for the new beginning. Broken wheat is rich in fiber and jaggery is rich in vitamins and minerals making Lapsi a very nutritive sweet. The traditional recipe that is made is plain and simple without any nuts and spices. However adding fruits like grapes, dried raisins and nuts to this recipe makes it richer and tastier.

name: Aloo Beans Sabzi Recipe - Potato & Beans Stir Fry
main_tag: gujarati﻿ lunch vegetarian  aloo, frenchbeans, raikadugu, jeera, dhania, haldi, hing
description: The Aloo Beans Sabzi Recipe is a simple Gujarati vegetable that is traditionally known as the Fansi Batata Nu Shaak. The recipe is a Semi Jain Style version of the dish, where I have used potatoes, but not used onion and garlic. The addition of coriander powder, along with asafoetida and red chillies, brings out the flavors and taste of this simple and yet wholesome sabzi. This sabzi makes a great lunch box meal.

name: Lehsuni Moong Dal Tadka Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  split, haldi, dhania, jeera, hing
description: Moong Dal Tadka is a very simple and healthy dal recipe that requires a handful of ingredients but is packed with flavour. It makes a great lunch or dinner and is one of my favourite comfort foods. I guarantee you will love this recipe! Enjoy as a soup or with steamed rice and/or chapati with a little pickle on the side.

name: Shahi Paneer Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, jeera, jeera, elaichi, haldi, dhania
description: Shahi Paneer Recipe is a delicious North Indian preparation of succulent pieces of Cottage Cheese or Paneer that cooked in rich gravy of tomatoes and cream. It is simple and quick to make and is ready within 30 minutes, making it a perfect weeknight dinner.

name: Cabbage and Carrot Sambharo Recipe - Gujarati Vegetable Stir Fry
main_tag: gujarati﻿ lunch vegetarian  gajjar, pattagobimuttaikose, capsicum, haldi, raikadugu, hing
description: Cabbage Cabbage and Carrot Sambharo Recipe is a traditional warm salad of sorts typically prepared in Gujarat. The unique thing about this salad is the vegetables are lightly stir fried but not cooked soft. They remain mildly crunchy, and are usually had along with papdi, dhokla, fafda and other popular Gujarati snacks. Sometimes it is also made with just carrots, or with the addition of raw papaya or capsicum.

name: Corn Halwa Recipe - Makki Ka Halwa
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Corn Halwa is a quick, delicious, melt in mouth sweet prepared with sweet corn. It is milk based halwa that has unique taste of sweet corn.

name: Kesar Pista Falooda Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  sabja
description: Kesar Pista Falooda is a delicious Indian Dessert Drink prepared by condensing milk along with saffron and pistachios.
