Sabja seeds added to the falooda adds a very nice crunch while the falooda sev is nice and soft. Falooda tastes best when served chilled topped with ice cream, tutti frutti and cherries.

name: Fada Ni Khichdi Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ lunch vegetarian  daliagodumairava, split, haldi, gajjar, frenchbeans, laung, elaichi, dalchini, jeera, hing
description: Fada Ni Khichdi is a delicious one pot meal which can be made for a weekday dinner. Made with Broken wheat instead of rice, this is a perfect treat for diabetics and  weight watchers too.

name: वाघरेला चावल रेसिपी - Vagharela Chawal Recipe
main_tag: parsi maincourse vegetarian
description: वाघरेला चावल रेसिपी का मतलब होता है चावल जिसमे तड़का डाला जाता है. पारसी में तड़का को वघार कहते है. इस में प्याज को पतला और सीधा काट के भूरा रंग का बनाया जाता है. इसमें गरम मसालो जैसे की दालचीनी, इलाइची और लॉन्ग का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो चावल को एक अलग एरोमा देता है.

name: पुदीना इडली रेसिपी - Pudina Idli Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian
description: पुदीना इडली एक नया ट्विस्ट है जो आप अपनी साधारण इडली में डाल सकते है. इस इडली को बनाने के लिए इडली बेटर में हरी चटनी को मिलाया जाता है जो इसे एक ताज़ा और स्वादिष्ट फ्लेवर देता है.

name: अचारी मसाला रेसिपी - Achari Masala Recipe For Fresh Pickles
main_tag: gujarati﻿ sidedish vegetarian
description: अचारी मसाला रेसिपी एक पारम्परिक रेसिपी है जिसका प्रयोग गुजरात में ताज़ा अचार बनाने के लिए किया जाता है. इस मसाले को सम्भारो मसाला भी कहा जाता है. यह एक सरल मसाला है जिसको बनाने के लिए सिर्फ 6 सामग्री की जरुरत पड़ती है.

name: Chemba Arisi Thengai Paal Payasam Recipe- Red Rice Payasam
main_tag: kerala dessert vegetarian  elaichi, kopra
description: Chemba Arisi Thengai Paal Payasam Recipe is a creamy and delicious payasam recipe with traditional  South Indian flavors of rice, jaggery and coconut milk. This Thengai Paal Payasam recipe is made with Chemba rice which is also called as Red Rice or Matta Rice.

name: Gajar Ka Halwa Recipe - Indian Carrot Pudding
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  gajjar, forbestresults tryandavoidusingthecoreasmuchaspossible, clarifiedbutter, elaichi, badam
description: Gajar Ka Halwa is a Quick & Easy Indian Carrot Pudding, a traditional North Indian sweet dish which can be enjoyed either hot or cold. Made with simple ingredients, especially the red variety of carrots popular in North India, this Carrot Pudding is typically enjoyed during winters.

name: गोअन चिकन विंडालू रेसिपी - Goan Chicken Vindaloo Recipe
main_tag: goan dinner nonvegeterian
description: गोअन चिकन विंडालू रेसिपी, एक गोअन डिश है जिसमे जिसमे पोर्तुगीस और ब्रिटिश झलक आती है. यह एक स्वादिष्ट चिकन करी है जिसे आप आपने हाउस पार्टीज के लिए बना सकते है. आप इसमें चिकन की बजाए प्रॉन्स, फिश, बीफ या मटन का भी प्रयोग कर सकते है. इसमें लाल मिर्च के साथ सिरके का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसको और भी स्वाद देता है.

name: क्रीमी चिकन करी रेसिपी - Easy Creamy Chicken Curry Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch nonvegeterian
description: क्रीमी चिकन करी रेसिपी एक सरल करी है जिसमे क्रीम, काली मिर्च और सुखी मेथी का प्रयोग किया जाता है. यह एक वन पॉट रेसिपी है जो बहुत कम समय में बन जाती है. क्यूंकि यह बनाने में सरल है आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: पटियाला आलू रेसिपी - Patiala Aloo Recipe
main_tag: northindian maincourse noonionnogarlic
description: पटियाला आलू रेसिपी एक तीखी आलू की सब्ज़ी है जिसे पंजाबी घरो में बनाया जाता है. इसमें आलू को पैन फ्राई करके सूखे मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है. इसमें टमाटर की प्यूरी का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसको और भी स्वाद देता है.

name: Kashmiri Kulith Ki Dal Recipe - Horse Gram Dal Recipe
main_tag: kashmiri maincourse diabeticfriendly  kollukulith, haldi, jeera, hing, dhania
description: Kashmiri Kulith Ki Dal Recipe is a super nutritious dal with simple spices, that can be made in a jiffy.

name: Makai Dhokla Recipe - Savoury Steamed Corn Cake
main_tag: gujarati﻿ snack highproteinvegetarian  dahiyogurt, hing, haldi, dhania, tadka, raikadugu, jeera, hing
description: Makai Dhokla or Corn Dhokla is a light and healthy snack, made using fresh corn kernels and corn dalia. The corn dalia enhances the taste as well as the texture of the dhokla. This instant Dhokla does not need any advance preparation and can be made using simple, easily available ingredients. You can substitute the corn dalia with regular wheat Dalia or semolina in case you do not find corn dalia. Makai Dhokla is a perfect snack box recipe.

name: Semolina Gujiya Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ dessert vegetarian  maida, semolinarava, elaichi, badam
description: Semolina Gujiya is a sweet dish which is made with All purpose flour with the filling of semolina, coconut and dry fruits. It is a very popular sweet dish and is mainly served during the special occasions like Holi, Diwali and special family occasions.

name: Dal Dhokli Recipe With Sprouted Moong Dal
main_tag: gujarati﻿ lunch vegetarian  besan, haldi, dhania, dhania, haldi, dalchini, malabartamarind, moongphali, dhania, jeera, raikadugu, hing
description: The Dal Dhokli Recipe With Sprouted Moong Dal is a twist to the traditional Dal Dhokli recipe and makes a wholesome one dish weekend lunch for the summers. The light sweet and spicy sprouted moong dal is simmered in whole wheat pastas, also known as the dhokli is simply delicious. The addition of green moong sprouts adds a great addition of richness and protein to the dal making it a perfect wholesome dish.

name: Gujarati Khaman Dhokla Recipe - Savory Steamed Lentil Cakes
main_tag: gujarati﻿ snack vegetarian  bengalgramdal, dahiyogurt, haldi, raikadugu, tilseeds, dhania
description: The Gujarati Khaman Dhokla is a very popular farsan from the Gujarati cuisine.  It is traditionally made using the bengal gram dal, which is soaked and the ground to make the dhokla batter.

name: कश्मीरी मटन यखनी रेसिपी - Kashmiri Mutton Yakhni Recipe
main_tag: kashmiri maincourse nonvegeterian
description: कश्मीरी मटन यखनी रेसिपी एक स्वाद से भरपूर कश्मीरी करी है जिसमे मटन को दही की ग्रेवी में कुछ रोज के मसलो के साथ पकाया जाता है.  इसमें इलाइची, दालचीनी और तेज पत्ता का प्रयोग होता है जो इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ाता है. आप इसे अपनी हाउस पार्टीज के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: पनीर टिक्का पुलाव रेसिपी - Paneer Tikka Pulao Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian
description: पनीर टिक्का पुलाव रेसिपी एक सरल वन पॉट मील है चावल को पनीर और मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है. अगर आपके पास पहले का पनीर टिक्का पड़ा है तोह आप वो भी इस रेसिपी को बनाने के लिए प्रयोग कर सकते है. इसे अपने लंच बॉक्स में पैक करें और अपने पसंद के रायते के साथ इसका ननद उठाए।

name: पुदीना धनिया पुलाव रेसिपी - Mint Coriander Spice Pulao Recipe
main_tag: indian maincourse vegetarian
description: पुदीना धनिया पुलाव रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट और आसान पुलाव है जिसमे तेज पत्ता, दालचीनी और स्टार अनीस का प्रयोग फ्लेवर देने के लिए किया जाता है. पसीना और धनिया का प्रयोग इस पुलाव में किया जाता है जो इस पुलाव को और भी ताज़ा बनाता है.

name: गुजराती लसनिया बटाटा रेसिपी - Gujarati Lasaniya Batata Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ sidedish vegetarian
description: गुजराती लसनिया बटाटा रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट करी है जिसमे लहुसन का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इस करी को और भी फ्लेवर देता है. यह डिश गुजरात के घरो में अक्सर बनाई जाती है. आप इसे सुखी और ग्रेवी वाली, दोनों तरीके से बना सकते है. आप इसे अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: Sweet Potato Kheer Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  elaichi, semolinarava
description: Sweet Potato Kheer Recipe is a must try sweet delicacy made with sweet potato and semolina. The sweet is simmered in coconut milk and flavored with saffron strands. The kheer is luscious to be had after nice meal on a Sunday evening. Adding sweet potato is also another way to eat something healthy and not worry about extra calories.

name: Chicken Sweet Potato & Dill Curry Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch nonvegeterian  tejpatta, dhania, jeera, dalchini
description: Chicken and Sweet Potato Dill Curry Recipe, it is a rare combination of the chicken with sweet potato. But the dill leaves works really well with chicken. The masala is done by sautéing the onions along with all the whole spice and grinding it along with fresh dill leaves. The curry is then cooked along with the chicken and sweet potato in a pressure cooker till the flavor develops.

name: पालक चना दाल रेसिपी - Palak Chana Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: पालक चना दाल रेसिपी एक सरल रेसिपी है जो की पालक के पोषण से भरपूर है. दाल एक सेहतमंद रेसिपी है और इसमें पालक डालने से इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ जाता है. पालक आयरन से भरपूर है इसलिए आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने में शामिल करें।

name: पहाड़ी स्टाइल फनु रेसिपी - Pahari Style Phanu Recipe
main_tag: uttarakhand-northkumaon lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: पहाड़ी स्टाइल फनु रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसमे दो दालो का प्रयोग किया जाता है.  यह एक सरल दाल है जिसमे सरसों के तेल, जीरा और हरी मिर्च का तड़का दिया जाता है.  कुलीथ दाल का प्रयोग किया जाता है लेकिन आप इसमें अरहर दाल, मूंग दाल और उरद दाल का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें प्रोटीन की मात्रा अधिक होती है इसलिए आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बनाए।

name: Prawn Ghee Pepper Masala Recipe With Garlic
main_tag: southindian appetizer nonvegeterian  jeera, saunf
description: Prawn Ghee Pepper Masala Recipe With Garlic, will literally leave you drooling.

name: ब्रोकली मलाई कोफ्ता रेसिपी - Broccoli Malai Kofta Recipe
main_tag: lucknowi sidedish noonionnogarlic
description: ब्रोकली मलाई कोफ्ता रेसिपी एक पोषण से भरपूर ग्रेवी रेसिपी है जिसमे कोफ्ते को बनाने के लिए पनीर और ब्रोकली का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें कोफ्ता बनाने के लिए पनियारम पैन का प्रयोग किया गया है क्यूंकि उसमे कम तेल का प्रयोग होता है. इसमें प्याज और लहसुन का प्रयोग भी नहीं किया जाता।

name: हैदराबादी बगारे टमाटर रेसिपी - Hyderabadi Bagare Tamatar Recipe
main_tag: hyderabadi lunch vegetarian  सफ़ द
description: हैदराबादी बगारे टमाटर रेसिपी एक डेलिकेट रेसिपी है जिसमे टमाटर की करी बनाई जाती है. यह बहुत प्रसिद्ध है और हैदराबाद के शादीयो में बनाया जाता है. आप इसे अपनी हाउस पार्टीज के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: Amritsari Fish Fry Recipe
main_tag: punjabi sidedish highproteinnonvegetarian  haldi, drymangopowder, caromseeds, driedfenugreekleaves, besan
description: Amritsar Fish Fry Recipe is a wonderful dry fish made with a spicy masala that is coated over the fish and shallow fried till it is roasted well. It is a popular street food that many people would love to try it out at their place.

name: Paneer Pasanda Recipe -Cottage Cheese in Spicy Yogurt Curry
main_tag: awadhi lunch highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, dahiyogurt, besan, driedfenugreekleaves, elaichi
description: Paneer Pasanda Recipe is delectable dish made from cottage cheese (paneer) and flavored with spices like cardamom and cooked in a spicy yogurt cashew nut curry. This recipe of paneer is different from the regular tomato based paneer dishes, it is light, creamy and flavorful. Try this recipe of paneer pasanda and you will begin to make it over and over again. Serve Paneer Pasanda Recipe with hot Roti or Chapati.

name: Assamese Fish Fried Rice Recipe
main_tag: assamese dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  kopra, dhania, haldi, jeera, matar, gajjar, tejpatta
description: Assamese Fish Fried Rice is a typical rice preparation made in Assam and it no where resembles the Chinese fried rice recipe. This fried rice has Indian flavours and is absolutely delicious.

name: Aloo Bilahi Maas Recipe - Assamese Fish Curry With Potatoes And Tomatoes
main_tag: assamese dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  haldi, tejpatta, jeera, aloo, haldi, jeera, dhania
description: Assam Fish Curry or Aloo Bilahi Maas is a fish curry simmered in a potato and tomato curry. It is tangy and mild and definitely a delightful side dish for steamed rice. There are many varieties of fish curries in Assam itself and Aloo Bilahi Maas is the easiest of them all. It hardly takes 25 minutes to prepare this delicious curry.

name: बिहारी स्टाइल आलू का चोखा रेसिपी - Bihari Style Aloo Ka Chokha Recipe
main_tag: bihari lunch vegetarian
description: बिहारी स्टाइल आलू का चोखा रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट कॉम्बिनेशन है जिसमे आलू के साथ हरी मिर्च, प्याज और हरे धनिये का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इस चोखे को बिहार में लिट्टी के साथ परोसा जाता है. आप इसका प्रयोग पाव के साथ भी कर सकते है.

name: बदनेकाई गोज्जु रेसिपी - Badanekaayi Gojju Recipe
main_tag: southkarnataka lunch vegetarian
description: बदनेकाई गोज्जु रेसिपी दक्षिण भारतीय बैंगन की करी है जो की स्वादिष्ट तो है ही, साथ में बनाने में आसान है. यह एक क्रीमी तीखी करी है जिसे आप रोटी और चावल के साथ परोस सकते है. अगर आप अपनी रोज की बैंगन की सब्ज़ी से बोर हो गए है, तो आप यह भी बना सकते है.

name: Bengali Sukto Recipe - Mixed Vegetable Curry
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian  bittergourdpavakkai, bainganeggplant, parangikaipumpkin, turaipeerkangai, wadi, raikadugu, haldi, jeera, fenugreekseeds, tejpatta
description: Sukto is a vegetable medley prepared in Bengali household. It consists an array of vegetables. Bitter gourd is the main ingredient of this dish and the other vegetables in this recipe are pumpkin, plantain, sweet potato, ridge gourd, drumsticks, eggplant and raw papaya.

name: आलू भिंडी मसाला ग्रेवी रेसिपी - Aloo Bhindi Masala Gravy Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian
description: आलू भिंडी मसाला ग्रेवी रेसिपी एक रोज की सब्ज़ी है जिसमे भिंडी और आलू को टमाटर और प्याज की ग्रेवी में पकाया जाता है. इसे बनाने में बहुत कम समय लगता है इसलिए आप इस सब्ज़ी को अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है.

name: मूंगफली का रायता रेसिपी - Boiled Peanut Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: मूंगफली का रायता रेसिपी एक ताज़्ज़ा रायता है जिसमे उबली हुई मूंगफली का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें जीरा पाउडर और काली मिर्च पाउडर का इस्तेमाल किया जाता है जो इस रायते को अच्छा स्वाद देता है. अंत में इसमें आप हरा धनिया और पुदीने के पत्तो का भी इस्तेमाल भी कर सकते है.

name: Instant Oats Rava Idli Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  oatmeal, semolinarava, dahiyogurt, gajjar, dhania, raikadugu, hing, bengalgramdal
description: The Instant Oats Rava Idli Recipe is a perfect blend of oats and grains that you can make for a weekday breakfast.

name: Amritsari Ajwaini Paneer Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, laung, caromseeds, haldi, dhania, dhania
description: Amritsari Ajwaini Paneer recipe is a delicious recipe from North India that has a rich gravy flavoured with delicate spices and ajwain. Food around Northern India, especially areas around Uttar Pradesh, Punjab and Haryana is rich and heavy. They also have a lavish use of Ajowan or Ajwain in their dishes like kebabs, tikkas, including many of their gravies that add a special flavor to their cuisine.Inspired by their cuisine, I combined ajwain along with cashewnuts, and a few spices to create a delectable gravy for this Amritsari inspired dish with

name: Tawa Crispy Pomfret Fry Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish highproteinnonvegetarian  haldi, greekyogurt, dhania, salted
description: Tawa Fry Crispy Pomfret Recipe is tender inside & crispy outside served with a spicy chutney. It is a perfect starter or a side dish for your main course. It is easy to make and is healthy too. Just marinate it with the masala and fry it on the taw and you have your delicious fish ready.

name: Creamy Indian Butter Fish Recipe - Creamy Pabda Fish
main_tag: bengali sidedish highproteinnonvegetarian  haldi, dhania
description: Creamy Indian Butter Fish is a popular choice in West Bengal and must be one of the best known of Bengali Cuisine. The english name for the Pabda fish is Indian Butter Fish. A delicious and spicy recipe ideal for mid week family meals or weekend lunches.

name: Fenugreek Spiced Sardine Fish Curry Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish highproteinnonvegetarian  fenugreekseeds, adjusttotaste, dhania, haldi, jeera
description: Fenugreek Spiced Sardine Fish Curry Recipe is an age old recipe that has been passed on to people from generations. In earlier times, this curry was cooked in an earthen pot and that tradition is still going on.

name: मोरिंगा मसूर दाल रेसिपी - Moringa Masoor Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: मोरिंगा मसूर दाल रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट दाल रेसिपी है जिसमे दाल के साथ मोरिंगा की पत्तियों का इस्तेमाल किया जाता है. यह डायबिटिक फ्रेंडली दाल है और पोषण से भरपूर है. यह बनाने में आसान है इसलिए आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: तुवर नी दाल रेसिपी - Parsi Toovar Dal Recipe
main_tag: parsi maincourse highproteinvegetarian
description: तुवर नी दाल रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट दाल है जिसे पारसी घरो में अक्सर बनाया जाता है. इस डिश में तुवर दाल के साथ मसाले, अदरक, लहसुन, प्याज और टमाटर का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इस दाल को एक अलग फ्लेवर देता है. यह एक आसान दाल है इसलिए आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है.

name: Aar Macher Jhol Recipe - Bengali Fish Curry
main_tag: bengali lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  fish, rohuorkatla, tejpatta, jeera, dhania, haldi, dhania
description: Aar Macher Jhol is a Bengali Fish curry prepared with Aar/Rohu/Katla fish. The gravy is such an uncomplicated gravy which can be prepared in a jiffy with the items available in the pantry and tastes best with Steamed white rice.

name: One Pot Spicy Vegetable Pulao Recipe with Coconut Milk
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian  oranyotherrice, haldi, frenchbeans, gobi, gajjar, laung, elaichi, dalchini, tejpatta
description: One Pot Spicy Vegetable Pulao Recipe with Coconut Milk is an easy to cook dish that is cooked along with coconut milk and spices, adding to the rich and wholesome taste of the pulao.

name: Spinach Paneer Kofta Curry Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, palak, besan, jeera, elaichi, driedfenugreekleaves
description: Spinach Paneer Koftas are extremely delicious easy to make dish at home. The pan fried spinach with stuffed paneer brings out the individual taste of each of the ingredients and makes it healthy too. The makhani gravy has a slight touch of sweetness from honey, which enhances the taste of the makhani gravy.

name: Spiced Rajma Pulao Recipe - Spiced Kidney Bean Rice
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian  largekidneybeans, laung, tejpatta, dalchini, elaichi
description: Spiced Rajma Pulao Recipe is a delectable recipe of rice simmered in spices and red kidney beans. Combining the red kidney beans along with rice and spices makes this pulao wholesome and nutritious.

name: Bengali Chirer Pulao Recipe - Bengali Style Vegetable Poha
main_tag: bengali northindianbreakfast vegetarian  flattenedrice, gajjar, frenchbeans, gobi, matar, moongphali, onionnigellaseeds, haldi, dhania
description: Bengali Chirer Pulao Recipe is a twist to the poha variations that you find in other states of India. In Bengal, Poha is a staple breakfast dish and has a mild sweetness taste to it. The addition of raisins and vegetables to the Bengali Chirer Pulao makes this dish packed with nutrients and a healthy menu choice for the school lunch box as well.

name: Karnataka Style Mixed Vegetable Pulao Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  tejpatta, homemadecottagecheese, croutons, gajjar, frenchbeans, matar, aloo, gobi, sambaronions, dhania, jeera, saunf, dhania, dalchini, laung, elaichi
description: Karnataka Style Mixed Vegetable Pulao Recipe is an aromatic and spicy Pulao packed with flavours from spices like coriander, cardamom and more, which is made the Karnataka Style with the addition of coconut.

name: Kashmiri Style Yakhni Pulao With Chicken Recipe
main_tag: kashmiri lunch nonvegeterian  badielaichi, laung, dalchini, tejpatta, javitri, dhania, jeera, dahiyogurt, dhania, elaichi, saunf
description: Kashmiri Style Yakhni Pulao With Chicken Recipe is a lip-smacking, Kashmiri style chicken pulao made with long grain basmati rice that is cooked in a flavourful chicken stock-called Yakhni that is infused with spices. The stock/broth is made using 'Bouquet Garni' or a Spice Potli.

name: Coconut Rice Pulao With Coconut Cream Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  tejpatta, elaichi, jeera, gajjar, matar
description: Coconut Rice Pulao With Coconut Cream is my version of Coconut Rice recipe of South Indian Cuisine. In this recipe, the coconut cream is diluted to get the coconut milk and then the soaked basmati rice along with vegetables like carrots, peas, is cooked in coconut milk.

name: Cabbage Paneer Paratha Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, jeera, pattagobimuttaikose, dhania
description: Cabbage Paneer Paratha Recipe is made from whole wheat flour dough stuffed with finely chopped cabbage and freshly made paneer, spiced up with green chillies, coriander leaves and cumin powder, makes this paneer paratha healthy and delicious. The Paneer Paratha can make a meal in itself and served with a pickle and some yogurt or raita. The paratha makes a great lunch box as well, as it does not brittle and remains soft when heated in a microwave oven.

name: Sukhi Aloo Sabzi Recipe (Spiced Potato Stir Fry)
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  aloo, raikadugu, jeera, haldi, dhania, drymangopowder, optionalortotaste, dhania
description: Sukhi Aloo Sabzi recipe are hot and spicy potatoes flavoured with coriander and spices that makes a great travel food. Gujarati’s are very famous for travelling long distances with a lot of cooked food along with boxes of dry snacks to munch along.

name: Simple Steamed Indian Beet Salad Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer vegetarian  jeera
description: Simple Simple Steamed Indian Beet Salad Recipe is a delicious boiled beetroot salad. Deep red beet is boiled, sliced and sprinkled generously with some salt, pepper and cumin powder.

name: नवाबी पनीर करी रेसिपी - Nawabi Paneer Curry Recipe
main_tag: hyderabadi maincourse vegetarian  ल ल
description: नवाबी पनीर करी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसे हैदराबाद में बनाया जाता है. इसमें ग्रेवी नारियल और काजू से बनाई जाती है जो इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ाता है. इसमें हरे मटर और लाल शिमला मिर्च को प्रयोग करें जो इसे और भी क्रंच देता है. आप इस सब्ज़ी को अपनी हाउस पार्टीज के लिए बना सकते है या जब आपके घर मेहमान खाने पर आने वाले हो.

name: Eggplant In Coconut Milk Gravy Recipe -Baingan Masala Sabzi
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  bainganeggplant, moongphali, tilseeds, haldi, hing, besan, jeera, haldi, dhania, dalchini, optional, dhania
description: Peanut and sesame seeds stuffed Brinjals/Eggplant in a Coconut Milk Gravy  tastes absolutely delicious. Eggplant is a vegetable that absorbs flavors of all kinds from delicate to spicy and tangy. You can choose to use tiny eggplant and fill it with peanut sesame mixture. If you don't find small eggplants readily you can use large eggplant and use the filling mixture in the coconut milk gravy.

name: Urulai Kizhangu Kathirikai Poriyal Recipe - South Indian Style Potato & Eggplant Curry
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  aloo, bainganeggplant, raikadugu, hing, haldi
description: Urulai Kizhangu Kathirikai Poriyal or Sukhi Aloo Baingan Sabzi Recipe is a dry version of its gravy recipe. The sabzi is made across various parts of India and has the addition of a wide range of spices as well. This recipe uses the minimum amount of spices and condiments and brings out the flavours and textures of the vegetable.

name: Aloo Aur Mooli Ke Patton Ki Sabzi Recipe - Radish Greens And Potato Stir Fry
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  radishgreens, aloo, jeera, haldi
description: Aloo Aur Mooli Ke Patton Ki Sabzi is a simple, nutritious vegetable that is made from stir fried radish greens and potatoes. This Sabzi is stir fried in mustard oil and flavored with garlic and dry red chilies. It is an easy recipe and thus can be made for your Lunch Box.

name: अचारी पनीर मसाला रेसिपी - Achari Paneer Masala Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  हर,
description: अचारी पनीर मसाला रेसिपी एक स्वाद से भरपूर ग्रेवी है जिसे आप अपने हाउस पार्टीज के लिए बना सकते है. इसमें अचारी मसाले के प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसे और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है. यह बनाने में आसान है और इसमें पनीर की वजह से प्रोटीन की मात्रा भी अधिक होती है.

name: Haldi Ki Sabzi Recipe (Fresh Turmeric Root Vegetable)
main_tag: rajasthani sidedish vegetarian  besan, dahiyogurt, dhania, dhania, raikadugu
description: Haldi Ki Sabzi Recipe is an authentic Rajasthani winter dish. In this recipe, fresh Haldi (turmeric) is grated and simmered with spices and yogurt gravy. The addition of black pepper along with the garam masala powder and curry leaves gives it a nice flavour. Serve Haldi Ki Sabzi Recipe (Fresh Turmeric Root Vegetable) with tawa tandoori roti for a lovely meal.

name: कशमीरी केसर पुलाव रेसिपी - Kashmiri Kesar Pulao Recipe
main_tag: kashmiri maincourse vegetarian
description: कशमीरी केसर पुलाव रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसमे चावल को केसर, सौंफ, लॉन्ग और दालचीनी के साथ पकाया जाता है. आप इस डिश को अपनी पसंद की ग्रेवी के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: Aloo Gobi Sabzi Recipe - Spicy Potato Cauliflower Sabzi
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  aloo, gobi, jeera, haldi, dhania
description: The Aloo Gobi Sabzi Recipe is a simple and quick recipe that can be made in one pot with the least amount of cooking time. The delicious flavors from the cauliflower, when combined with garam masala powder along the fresh tomatoes brings out a rich texture and flavour of the aloo gobi sabzi.

name: Kashmiri Style Modur Pulao Recipe - Kashmiri Sweet Pulao
main_tag: kashmiri lunch vegetarian  tejpatta, laung, dalchini, elaichi, badam
description: Modur Pulao is a Kashmiri Sweet Pulao prepared using dry fruits and nuts. It is a delicious aromatic rice prepared using a surplus amount of ghee. It is a flavorful concoction of spices and nuts.

name: Lauki Tamatar Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ dinner diabeticfriendly  lauki, about4cupsofdicedbottlegourd, jeera, haldi, dhania
description: Lauki Tamatar Ki Sabzi recipe is really delicious and a healthy preparation of bottle gourd that tastes great with phulkas. The Lauki Tamatar Ki Sabzi is simple to make and is made with the most basic ingredients, adding to the flavours and taste.

name: Saoji Methi Pulao Recipe - Maharashtrian Style Fenugreek Leaves Pulao
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  matar, fenugreekleaves, jeera, tejpatta, dalchini, badielaichi, elaichi, jeera, saunf
description: Saoji Methi Pulao Recipe is the Fenugreek Leaves Pulao cooked In Maharashtrian Spices prepared freshly called saoji masala. Saoji masala is a regional spicy masala from Vidarbha of Maharashtra, which is used in a variety of non-vegetarian recipes as well.

name: Vegetarian Kabuli Pulao Recipe - Rice Layered With Chickpea Curry
main_tag: indian maincourse highproteinvegetarian  whitechickpeas, pudina, tejpatta, dalchini, laung, elaichi, badielaichi, dhania, dalchini, jeera
description: Kabuli Pulao is a traditional dish from the Kabul region of Afghanistan. It is usually cooked with meat. However, here we have replaced the meat with the healthy chickpeas for a vegetarian twist, with Vegetarian Kabuli Pulao Recipe.

name: South Indian Style Fish Curry Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch nonvegeterian  haldi, dhania, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, dhania, jeera
description: South Indian Style Fish Curry is one of the best to be served on Rice for dinner or lunch. Any kind of fish can be used for this curry. The curry leaves tempering given for this curry gives it unique flavor which makes you drool.

name: Crispy Pan Fried Pomfret Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish highproteinnonvegetarian  semolinarava, dhania, saunf, laung, haldi
description: When you are health conscious and looking for a non deep fried side dish, Crispy Pan Fried Pomfret is one of the best choice. In this recipe, pomfret pieces are marinated with some spices and shallow fried using very little oil. This makes a perfect dinner when served with some salad for your healthy evenings. You can also serve it as a side dish along with your meal.

name: Andhra Style Chepa Vepudu Recipe - Andhra Fish Fry Recipe
main_tag: andhra sidedish highproteinnonvegetarian  raikadugu, haldi, tilseeds, split, bengalgramdal, jeera, kopra
description: Andhra Style Chepa Vepudu Recipe (Andhra Fish Fry Recipe) is a must try recipe. Andhra cuisine is known for its spicy and strong Indian flavors in most of their dish. Seafood being consumed in most of the coastal parts of Andhra they have a wide range of Seafood dishes which has a good amount of spice and flavor.

name: Gujarati Biraj Recipe - Saffron Flavored Sweet Lentil Rice With Dry Fruits & Coconut
main_tag: gujarati﻿ dinner vegetarian  bengalgramdal, elaichi, badam
description: Gujarati Biraj Recipe is essentially rice cooked along with fresh coconut, bengal gram and dry fruits is truly a taste enhancer and makes a perfect dessert.

main_tag: gujarati﻿ northindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  besan, gajjar, jeera, dhania, raikadugu, tilseeds
description: Sprouted Moong dhokla are full of energy and they are with No Onion and No Garlic and addition of Carrot makes these Dhokla more healthy tasty.

name: मालवानी फिश करी रेसिपी - Malvani Fish Curry Recipe

main_tag: indian appetizer highproteinnonvegetarian  preferred, haldi, dhania, dhania, laung, badielaichi, dalchini

main_tag: assamese sidedish highproteinnonvegetarian  malabartamarind, fenugreekseeds, haldi, suransenairatalu

main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian  gobindobhog, matar, optional, jeera, haldi, tejpatta, dalchini, elaichi, laung
description: Bengali Holud Mishti Pulao Recipe (Saffron Flavored Rice With Nuts Recipe) is a Bengali flavored rice tossed with toasted nuts like cashew nuts, almonds, pistachio and raisins and flavored with saffron.

main_tag: gujarati﻿ sidedish vegetarian  हर,

name: Mixed Vegetable Idli Upma Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  sambaronions, or1largeonion, capsicum, gajjar, frenchbeans, haldi, raikadugu, split, gingelly, pudina
description: Mixed Vegetable Idli Upma Recipe is a simple and yet wholesome breakfast recipe that is packed with vegetables like carrot, beans and capsicum adding to the crunch of the soft spongy idli. The addition of pudina leaves into the idli upma makes this absolutely delicious and perfect for breakfast or even a tea time snack. The Mixed Vegetable Idli Upma can also be served for parties, where your guests can use a pick and savour them.

name: कश्मीरी साग रेसिपी - Kashmiri Saag Recipe
main_tag: kashmiri sidedish vegetarian
description: कश्मीरी साग रेसिपी एक आयरन से भरपूर डिश है जिसमे पालक का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें लहसुन और सरल मसालो  किया जाता है जो इस साग का स्वाद और भी बढ़ाता है. यह एक सरल सब्ज़ी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है

name: South Indian Grilled Fish With Spicy Fusion Sauce Recipe
main_tag: southindian dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  dahiyogurt, raikadugu, raikadugu, bengalgramdal, kalanamak
description: South Indians loves to eat fish and as far as we all know they are fond of eating very spicy dishes especially the people of Kerala and Tamil Nadu. My fusion recipe will support their tasty palettes and balance the smoky grilled, saucy, coconut, sour flaky fish when served with curd rice.

name: Mughlai Fish Curry Recipe
main_tag: mughlai lunch highproteinvegetarian  haldi, dahiyogurt, dhania, jeera, haldi, badam
description: Mughlai Fish Curry Recipe is a rich and yet spicy flavored curry that is cooked along with Mackerel fish to create a wonderful side dish that can go along with pulao, hot steamed rice or just plain with phulka. The gravy has a different twist to the usual coconut based curry.

name: Achari Masala Recipe For Fresh Pickles - Sambharo Masala
main_tag: gujarati﻿ sidedish vegetarian  methikuria, raikuria, haldi, hing
description: This Achari Masala Recipe is a simple and yet very traditional recipe in every Gujarati home that is used for making fresh pickles that they call as Sambharo. The masala is super simple to make and has just 6 ingredients that will make your achari taste lip smacking good.

name: Dubuk Vade Recipe - Khandeshi Gram Flour Dumpling Curry
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian  dhania, jeera, haldi, besan, haldi
description: Khandeshi Dubuk Vade Recipe - Gram Flour Dumpling Curry a delicacy prepared in the Khandeshi cuisine which is originated from Nashik in Maharashtra. The dish is quite spicy, coconut and onions form the main base for this curry. "Kala Masala" is what gives the flavour to every dish from this region. You can use it in this curry to bring out the authentic flavour, but if you feel it is to tedious to prepare the masala from the scratch you can even add the store bought masala or substitute it with your everyday used Garam Masala.

name: Rajasthani Kande Ki Sabzi Recipe - Onion Sabzi
main_tag: rajasthani sidedish vegetarian  jeera, dahiyogurt, dhania, haldi, bulb greens, bulb greens
description: Rajasthani Kande Ki Sabzi is a side dish that is made in a spicy yogurt curry. This dish is very easy to make with minimum ingredients and can be prepared in a short amount of time. Also the advantage is this side dish can be prepared anytime as onions are available throughout the year. You can make it for lunch or dinner.

name: Parsi Rotli Recipe - Parsi Style Rotis
main_tag: parsi maincourse vegetarian
description: Parsi Rotli Recipe are soft rotis that are made Parsi style. The dough here is made with milk and slow cooked on the tawa, making sure the rotli is well cooked, yet develops no brown spots.

name: Tuvar Ni Dal Recipe - Parsi Toovar Dal
main_tag: parsi maincourse highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, haldi, dhania, jeera, dhania, dalchini, laung, jeera
description: Tuvar Ni Dal Recipe is essentially a Parsi dish where toor dal is cooked with a masala that includes freshly ground spices, ginger and garlic, added to an onion-tomato base and then pressure cooked.

name: Tindora Sambharo Recipe - Instant Tendli Pickle
main_tag: gujarati﻿ sidedish vegetarian  dondakayakovakkai, methikuria, raikuria, haldi, hing
description: Tindora Sambharo Recipe is an instant tendli/ dondakaya pickle that is easy to make using very few ingredients. This instant tindora pickle is made with a traditional Sambharo Masala and goes well with dals, parathas, rice and just about anything that needs an accompaniment.

name: Gopalkala Recipe - Janmashtami Special)
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  flattenedrice, dahiyogurt, dhania, raikadugu, jeera
description: The Gopalkala Recipe is a popular offering to Lord Krishna on Janmashtami. Gopalkala is a savory dish made of beaten rice, cucumbers, green chilies, coconut and the tempering is done using ghee. The Gopalkala Recipe is just like curd rice, the only difference is beaten rice is used. Gopalkala not just a scrumptious dish but is also very nutritive, this can be prepared in 5 minutes

name: Lemon Pepper Fish Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer highproteinnonvegetarian  raikadugu, saunf, haldi
description: Lemon Pepper Fish Recipe is a quick stir fry of the basa fish with subtle flavors of lemon and pound pepper. The curry leaves and green chilies will also add an extra flavor and crunch to the dish along with softly cooked basa fish. The basa fish is the best that can be used for the stir fry but you are also free to add seer fish or tuna instead of basa fish.

name: Maachli Jaisamandi Recipe - Rajasthani Style Fish In Creamy Gravy
main_tag: rajasthani lunch nonvegeterian  besan, haldi, jeera, dhania, pudina, dahiyogurt, haldi, jeera
description: Rajasthan cuisine is a royal cuisine, mostly comprising of the lost recipes of the traditional Royal Maharaja families. Their passion for food is still being preserved in the historical food journals, and passed onto the family cooks and chefs for us to enjoy the taste of grandeur.

name: Pabda Macher Kalo Jeera Diye Recipe - Bengali Pabda Fish Curry
main_tag: bengali lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  aloo, haldi, onionnigellaseeds, jeera, dhania, dhania
description: Pabda Macher Kalo Jeera Diye is a famous fish curry recipe from Bengal. Pabda fish is variety of catfish which is called butter catfish. Pabda fish is tasty and flavourful as well as healthy too. The flesh of pabda is very soft and it has smooth skin.

name: Konkani Style Pomfret Fry Recipe - South Indian Fish Fry Recipe
main_tag: konkan appetizer highproteinnonvegetarian  haldi, jeera, elaichi, malabartamarind
description: Konkani Style Pomfret Fry Recipe is a tasty appetizer that you can create for your Seafood Indian meal. Konkani cuisine shares a similar cooking style from the three of their neighbouring states which are Goa, Maharashtra and Karnataka. Seafood are extensively consumed in this region.

name: अमरुद का रायता रेसिपी - Amrood Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: अमरुद का रायता रेसिपी एक बहुत अच्छा तरीका है अमरुद को इस्तेमाल करने का. इस रायते में अमरुद को दही के साथ मिलाया जाता है और उसमे राइ, सुखी लाल मिर्च और कढ़ी पत्ते का तड़का दिया जाता है. आप इस रायते को अपने रोज के खाने के साथ परोस सकते है. अमरुद में विटामिन C की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है, इसलिए यह आपकी सेहत के लिए भी अच्छा माना जाता है.

name: Sweet Potato Flatbread Recipe - Sweet Potato Chapati
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast vegetarian  caromseeds, jeera
description: Sweet Potato is very tasty and healthy veggie. It is loaded with high fibre and best for all ages. Kids will love this Sweet Potato Flatbread Recipe - Sweet Potato Chapati too. This roti can be served with any paneer based dish or a raita for your everyday meals.

name: Spinach And Sweet Potato Kofta In Green Curry Recipe

description: Spinach and Sweet Potato Kofta in Green Curry Recipe is a western version of koftas cooked in a luscious green curry made with a blend of coriander and mint leaves. The curry has a bursting of flavours when seasoned well with some dried oregano and cinnamon powder.

name: प्याज का रायता रेसिपी - Onion Raita Recipe

name: महाराष्ट्रियन वरन फाल रेसिपी - Maharastrian Varan Phal Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian
description: महाराष्ट्रियन वरन फाल रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ठ रेसिपी है जो राजस्थानी ढोकली की तरह होती है. इसमें गेहूं के डम्पलिंग बनाकर दाल के मिश्रण में पकाया जाता है. इसमें महाराष्ट्रियन मसाले का प्रयोग किया जाता है. यह एक वन डिश रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने रात के खाने के लिए बना सकते है.

name: Sweet Potato, Broccoli And Tofu Curry Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  jeera, haldi
description: Sweet Potato, Broccoli and Tofu Curry Recipe is a delicious creamy curry made with tomatoes and onions. The richness of the curry is because of the cashew nuts that is being used. The curry masala is made separate and then ground to a smooth paste and tossed in with the fresh vegetables.

name: Himachali Style Pahari Aloo Palda Recipe - Potatoes In Yogurt Gravy
main_tag: himachal lunch vegetarian  aloo, jeera, hing, badielaichi, laung, dalchini, haldi, dhania, elaichi, dahiyogurt
description: Himachali Style Pahari Aloo Palda Recipe (Potatoes in Yogurt Gravy) is similar to a kadhi that is prepared in the snow capped mountains of himachal. The food prepared by them is very basic and very subtle flavors are added into their dish. The cuisine that they practice is popularly known as the Pahari cuisine.

name: पुदीना मविनाकाई चटनी रेसिपी - Pudina Mavinakayi Chutney Recipe
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian
description: पुदीना मविनाकाई चटनी रेसिपी एक दक्षिण भारतीय चटनी है जिसमे आम और पुदीने का इस्तेमाल किया जाता है. इसमें धनिए का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है.

name: Barnyard Millet Jaggery Payasam Recipe
main_tag: southindian dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Barnyard Millet Jaggery Payasam Recipe, is a delicious healthy dessert that you can treat yourself after a satisfying meal. The payasam is made with milk and simmered along with jaggery, crushed cardamom and some cooked millet. The ingredients used are very simple and quick to make as well.

name: Muttai Kuzhambu Recipe - South Indian Egg Curry
main_tag: southindian dinner eggetarian  dhania, haldi, dhania, chopped, raikadugu, jeera
description: Egg Kulambu/Muttai Kulambu is a south Indian gravy side dish for rice, dosa and chapati. Muttai Kulambu is super delicious and especially goes well for rice. It is simple gravy without adding coconut, tamarind or an grounded spices.

name: Kuvar Pak Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ dessert vegetarian  whitejellywithinaloeveraleaves
description: Kuvar Pak Recipe is an Aloe Vera sweet recipe that is famous in Manavadar of Gujarat. Kuvar pak includes a much researched and beneficial main ingredient - Aloe vera. The sweet is made from aloe vera extract/ aloe vera milk. Try this mild sweet which also has a delectable aloe vera tinge of flavour to it, as a festive sweet or as a dessert after a Gujarati lunch. You will love the taste for sure!

name: Gujarati Style Adadiya Pak Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ indianbreakfast vegetarian  whole, mawa, naturalgum, iusedalmonds raisins cashews pistachios, optional, elaichi, laung, ganthoda
description: Adadiya is famous winter special gujarati sweet. Traditionally Gujarati Style Adadiya Pak Recipe contains ingredients which helps to keep body warm in cold winter.

name: Uparghi Laadu Recipe - Whole Wheat Flour & Banana Squares
main_tag: gujarati﻿ dessert vegetarian  powderedsugar, adjust
description: Uparghi Laadu Recipe is a recipe of a ladoo, however not spherical in shape. This is a traditional recipe from Gujarat and is made during winters, especially at the time of Uttarayan festival. It is called ladoo but it is square shaped.

name: Chicken Malai Kebab Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer highproteinnonvegetarian  greekyogurt, jeera
description: Chicken Malai kebab is a yummylicious kebab , that make a perfect starter,great to be served for family get together, potluck with friends or weekend parties.

name: इलानीर रसम रेसिपी - Elaneer Rasam Recipe
main_tag: southkarnataka lunch vegetarian
description: इलानीर रसम रेसिपी एक ताज़ा रसम रेसिपी है जिसमे नारियल के पानी का प्रयोग किया जाता है. नारियल के पानी के साथ इसमें नारियल के क्रीम का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें इमली और टमाटर का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है.

name: मोतिया चिलमन पुलाव रेसिपी - Motiya Chilman Pulao Recipe
main_tag: awadhi lunch vegetarian
description: मोतिया चिलमन पुलाव एक सरल चावल की डिश है जिसे प्रेशर कुकर में बनाया जाता है. यह डिश अवधी खाने में बनाई जाती है. इसमें मोतिया पनीर के बॉल्स को कहा जाता है जिसे पुलाव में डाला जाता है.

name: Hyderabadi Biryani With Basmati Rice (Mutton & Chicken)
main_tag: hyderabadi lunch nonvegeterian  haldi, dalchini, laung, elaichi, caromseeds, pudina, dahiyogurt, biryani, tejpatta, elaichi, laung, dalchini, caromseeds, dhania
description: Hyderabadi Biryani is one of the most authentic and traditional dishes from the hyderabadi cuisine. This biryani recipe is an adaptation and tastes just as delicious as the one that you get in a traditional home. The succulent pieces of mutton are marinated in a perfect blend of aromatic spices and herbs which not only add to the taste, but also the flavors and texture.

name: Maharashtrian Green Moong Bhat Recipe - Sprouted Green Moong Pulao
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian  jeera, dalchini, laung, elaichi, hing, haldi, dhania, dhania
description: Maharashtrian Green Moong Bhat Recipe (Sprouted Green Moong Pulao Recipe) a quickly tossed rice with sprouted green mung makes it the perfect lunch meal.

name: Baby Potatoes Pulao Recipe - Aloo Pulao Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  dahiyogurt, dhania, pudina, dhania, tejpatta, laung, elaichi, dalchini
description: Baby Potatoes Pulao Recipe is a delicious simple pulao recipe made with baby potatoes. It is quick to make and makes for a wonderful lunch box recipe. The baby potatoes are lightly fried in oil before adding it to the pulao, giving it a nice colour and crispy texture.

name: Gujarati Adadiya Ladwa Recipe - Urad Dal Halwa with Nuts & Spices
main_tag: gujarati﻿ dessert vegetarian  mawa, naturalgum, badam, elaichi, dalchini, laung, ganthoda, badam
description: Adadiya Ladwa is a Gujarati delicacy. An urad dal halwa topped with nuts and tinged with Indian spices.

name: Gujarati Kadhi With Milk And Mint Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ dinner vegetarian  dahiyogurt, besan, clottedcream, fenugreekseeds, jeera, laung, dalchini, pudina, hing
description: Kadhi is very popular when it comes to Gujarati cuisine. Considered to be light and refreshing, it is a permanent fixture on the menu during festive meals, special occasions and celebrations. If I had to describe this Kadhi in one sentence it would be 'Gujarati Kadhi, malai maarke’. It is rich in flavour and offers a different experience altogether.

name: Rasawala Dhokla Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ northindianbreakfast vegetarian  besan, dahiyogurt, raikadugu, jeera, hing, haldi, dhania, raikadugu, jeera, hing, haldi, dhania
description: Dhokla Rasawala is a simple dish made with some leftover dhokla that has lost all its moisture, this rasawala dhokla is an ideal way to serve it. Simmer the dhokla pieces in rasa just before serving and see the left over dhoklas magically transform to a new avatar and create a left over magic, “Dhokla Rasawala ”. Even the fresh dhoklas for that matter in this form taste equally good.

name: Kodava Ellu Pajji Recipe - Sesame & Tamarind Chutney
main_tag: coorg southindianbreakfast vegetarian  tilseeds, sambaronions, raikadugu
description: Kodava Ellu Pajji Recipe - Sesame & Tamarind Chutney is a quick breakfast side dish that can be made in just 10 minutes. The chutney has got the nuttiness from the toasted sesame seeds and is quite tangy and spicy as well. In this recipe we have used the small onions which are also called shallots that gives in the depth of flavour into the dish.

name: Kodava Thalia Puttu Recipe - Steamed Rice Coconut Cake
main_tag: coorg southindianbreakfast vegetarian  split, fenugreekseeds
description: Kodava Thalia Puttu Recipe - Steamed Rice & Coconut Cakes is an authentic recipe from Coorg. The batter is made using soaked rice, fenugreek seeds, urad dal and fermented overnight with some coconut milk and sugar.

name: Kothu Kari Kuzhambu Recipe - Mutton Keema Curry
main_tag: tamilnadu maincourse nonvegeterian  tejpatta, laung, dalchini, elaichi, patharphoolblackstoneflower, haldi, dhania, dhania, pudina
description: Kothu Kari Kuzhambu Recipe is a robust mutton keema curry made Tamil Nadu style, with whole spices like bay leaf and star anise which give out bold flavours.

name: Chettinad Vegetable Pulav Recipe -
main_tag: chettinad dinner vegetarian  sambaronions, tejpatta, laung, elaichi, haldi, dhania, gajjar, frenchbeans, aloo, dhania, matar, matar, pudina
description: Chettinad Vegetable Pulao is a classic South Indian way of making rice. The spices are a unique blend of saunf (fennel seeds), black peppercorns with the addition of baby onions, ginger and garlic which add to the taste.

name: प्रून चटनी रेसिपी - Spiced Prune Chutney Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: प्रून चटनी एक तीखी मीठी चटनी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के साथ परोस सकते है. आप इस चटनी को सैंडविच, रोल के नादर भी लगा सकते है.

name: मोटा दाना जयपुर स्वीट रेसिपी - Mota Dana Jaipur Sweet (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: rajasthani dessert vegetarian
description: मोटा दाना को रसभरी भी कहा जाता है। यह राजस्थान जयपुर की मशहूर स्वीट डीस है। मोटा दाना उरददाल के वडे है जिसे चाशनी मे डुबोकर मिठा बनाया गया है।

name: Pahadi Chicken Curry Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch nonvegeterian  dahiyogurt, haldi, elaichi, badielaichi, dhania, dhania, dalchini, laung, saunf
description: Pahadi Chicken Curry Recipe is a recipe that has been taken from Pahari Cuisine which is famous in the North eastern part of India.

name: दूधौरी झारखंड रेसिपी - Dudhauri Jharkhand (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: bihari dessert vegetarian  फ लफ टम ल क, ऑलपर पसआट, प रय गअन स र
description: दूधौरी झारखंड/ बिहार की लोकप्रिय पारंपरिक मिठाई है। दूधौरी खास खुशी के मौके पर और त्यौहारो पर जैसे की होली,तीज त्यौहार के अवसर पर बनाई जाती है। यह मिठाई चावल और दूध से बनती है।

name: Thakkali Rasam Recipe - South Indian Tomato Rasam
main_tag: tamilnadu maincourse vegetarian  splittoordal, haldi, jeera, dhania, raikadugu, jeera, hing, dhania
description: The Thakali Rasam Recipe is a traditional and a staple dish of the South India. This Tomato Rasam recipe is simple to make and makes a perfect dish to have along with rice or even as a soup for the winter nights.

name: Thengai Poornam Kozhukattai & Uppu Kozhukattai Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu dessert vegetarian  elaichi, whole, hing, gingelly, raikadugu, gingelly
description: Thengai Poornam and Ulutham Poornam Kozhukattai also known as Ukadiche Modak is a very festive sweet that is made for Lord Ganesha's Birthday also known as Vinayaka or Ganesh Chaturthi that is observed in the month of August - September. The festival lasts for 10 days and is celebrated very popularly across most regions of India. On this day, Kozhukattai, that are steamed rice dumplings filled with coconut and jaggery (a sweet variant) and lentils (for a savory variant) are a staple offering made to Lord Ganesha, and enjoyed by all.

name: The Paruppu Podi Recipe - South Indian Spiced Dal Chutney Powder
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  splittoordal, bengalgramdal, jeera, hing
description: The Paruppu Podi Recipe is a blend of roasted spices and lentils that is full of fresh flavors and aroma. Podis are very traditional to the south Indian cuisine and a homemade podi is always more delicious than store bought podi, as they are preservative free, less spicy with no adulterants added.

name: Akki Peni Sandige Recipe - Rice idiyappam Fryums
main_tag: southkarnataka snack vegetarian  sago, hing
description: Akki Peni Sandige (Rice idiyappam Fryums) are easy to prepare deep fried fryums which are sharply crunchy and is an essential side for many South-Indian festivals.

name: Sakkarai Pongal Recipe (Sweetened Rice And Jaggery Pudding Recipe)
main_tag: tamilnadu southindianbreakfast vegetarian  split, elaichi
description: Sakkarai Pongal Recipe is a traditional South Indian pudding made of rice sweetened with jaggery. It has a porridge-like consistency, mildly flavored with cardamom. Sakkarai Pongal is most often made along with Ven Pongal for the festival of Pongal, celebrated to mark the beginning of the harvest season in India. Pongal in Tamil means something that is “overflowing” and the festival is celebrated in honor of abundance and prosperity, over four days. The ritual of boiling over of milk in a clay pot is usually done to ensure prosperity for the family.

name: Chiroti Recipe - Delicious Crispy Layered Sweet Puri
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  maida, elaichi, maida, badam, asrequired, asrequired, asrequired
description: Crispy Layered Sweet Puri is a delicious sweet puri that is flaky and crispy puri dipped in sugary syrup. These puris can be a great treat for your friends and family for any festive occasions; especially for Diwali get-togethers. These puris might look a bit tricky, but they are pretty simple once you start making them. If you follow the exact steps, them these can be a cakewalk.

name: गोअन काजू करी रेसिपी - Goan Kaju Curry Recipe
main_tag: goan lunch vegetarian  हर,
description: गोअन काजू करी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट डिश है जिसे कोंकण राज्य में बनाया जाता है. गोअन काजू करी में सब्ज़ज़ अच्छे काजू का प्रयोग किया जाता है और ज्यादातर शादी और पार्टीज में परोसा जाता है. इसमें प्याज लहसुन के साथ नारियल का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसे और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है.

name: अवरेकालू उसली रेसिपी - Avarekaalu Usli Recipe
main_tag: southindian dinner vegetarian
description: अवरेकालू या ब्रॉड बीन्स कर्नाटक की एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसे सर्दियों के दिनों में बनाया जाता है. यह बीन नरम और अरोमा से भरपूर होता है. इस उसली को बनाने में रोज के मसालो का प्रयोग किया जाता है.

name: वेपमपू करा कोलंब रेसिपी - Vepampoo Kara Kuzhambu Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian
description: वेपमपू नीम के फूलो को कहा जाता है जिसे बहुत लाभ होते है. इसके आप बहुत सारी रेसिपीज बना सकते है लेकिन यहाँ हम इसका कोलंब बना रहे है. इस डिश में बिलकुल भी खारापन नै होता है. इसमें इमली का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसे और भी स्वादिष्ट बनता है.

name: Green Chutney Rava Dhokla Recipe - Sooji Dhokla
main_tag: gujarati﻿ northindianbreakfast vegetarian  coriander mint, semolinarava, dahiyogurt, dhania, raikadugu, jeera, hing, tilseeds
description: Green Chutney Rava Dhokla Recipe, is one where the authentic rava dhokla is combined with a freshly ground green chutney made with mint leaves and coriander leaves.  The dhokla batter is made with both curd and green chutney, which helps bring in the moisture to the batter and a lip smacking taste.

name: Healthy Pumpkin Carrot Idli Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, gajjar
description: Healthy Pumpkin Carrot Idli Recipe, is a delicious and super nutritious idli, where the idli batter is enriched with freshly made pumpkin puree and grated carrots.

name: Badam Nu Gosht Recipe - Parsi Style Mutton In Almond Gravy
main_tag: parsi maincourse nonvegeterian  tejpatta, badam, dalchini, laung
description: Badam Nu Gosht Recipe is mutton cooked along with whole spices and then dunked in a creamy rich almond based gravy put together along with onions & tomatoes, ginger & garlic, and some spices to add flavour.  The nuttiness and creaminess from the badam lends a great taste to the dish.

name: Calcutta Style Chicken Biryani Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch nonvegeterian  aloo, dahiyogurt, haldi, badielaichi, tejpatta, elaichi, dalchini, laung
description: This Calcutta Style Chicken Biryani is quite distinct in flavor from the rest and stands out with the use of potato in the biryani. I have personally come to love meat and potato together and the Calcutta Style Chicken Biryani appeals to me on that level.

name: Gujarati Badshahi Pulao Recipe - A Rich Preparation Of Rice, Vegetables, Nuts And Spices
main_tag: gujarati﻿ lunch vegetarian  gajjar, frenchbeans, gobi, matar, haldi, elaichi, laung, dalchini, tejpatta, badam, pudina
description: Baadshah in Hindi means king and as the name suggests it was prepared for the kings who ruled Gujarat. Nuts and spices like cashew nuts, almonds and saffron formed an integral part of the royal cuisine and when cooked along with a fine quality of basmati rice, it enhances the flavors of this delectable Badshahi Pulao.

name: Kathiyawadi Adad Dal Recipe- Spicy Urad Dal
main_tag: gujarati﻿ sidedish highproteinvegetarian  split, adjusttotaste, haldi, dhania, raikadugu, jeera, hing, agenerouspinch
description: Kathiyawadi adad dal Recipe is a typical Gujarati style dal recipe made with urad dal. Its very easy to make and tasty as well. Made with split black gram, it is very creamy and tastes delicious when had with rice/roti. The urad dal is pressure cooked, mashed and added to a sauteed tomatoes with ginger garlic paste and an aromatic tadka. Though made with basic spices, this toor dal is flavourful owing to the mushy tomatoes and a zing of lemon juice.

name: Kathiawadi Dhokli Nu Shaak Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ lunch vegetarian  besan, haldi, caromseeds, jeera, raikadugu, hing, dhania
description: When it comes to Kathiawadi region, spicy and delicious food is all we can think. Dhokli Nu Shaak is one of those recipes which is spicy and has a lot of flavour in it. In this recipe, gram flour cakes are cooked with spicy buttermilk gravy. The tanginess from the buttermilk adds an extra flavour to the recipes and is loved by everyone in the family.

name: Dudhi Dhokli Nu Shaak Recipe - Bottle Gourd And Steamed Dumplings Curry
main_tag: gujarati﻿ lunch vegetarian  lauki, besan, haldi, caromseeds, dhania, jeera, raikadugu, hing, besan, dhania, chopped
description: Dudhi Dhokli Nu Shaak is a spicy gram flour based curry from Kathiyawadi region. Addition of bottle gourd makes this dish different from dhokli nu shaak and adds that extra flavour to it.

name: Kathiyawadi Shaak Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ dinner vegetarian  greenaubergine, moongphali, dahiyogurt, dhania, jeera, haldi, dhania
description: Kathiyawadi Shaak Recipe is a spicy and nutty aubergines cooked in a groundnut based gravy. We have used the green aubergines, however you can use any available. The gravy is made using a lot of garlic, groundnut, red chilli powder which is a speciality of the Kathiyawad Cuisine. The addition of curd adds a slight tartness and balances the spiciness of the dish. Since the shaak is pretty spicy, it is paired with a bland or mildly spiced gujarati kadhi.

name: Gujarati Style Lapsi Recipe - Millet Sweet Pudding
main_tag: gujarati﻿ dessert vegetarian  split, elaichi
description: Gujarati Style Lapsi Recipe is a mixture of millet and yellow moong dal that is pressure cooked along with with jaggery to create a dish that is similar to the authentic style Gujarati Lapsi.

name: Aromatic Vegetable Pulao Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  gajjar, matar, capsicum, aloo, elaichi, laung, dalchini, dhania, pudina
description: Aromatic Vegetable Pulao is a mild and aromatic dish which is low on spices and high on taste with an added crunch and flavour of veggies. A one pot dish that can be prepared in just 20 minutes from start to end. This recipe is ideal for lunch box ,a lazy weekend meal or can even cater to the party menu.

name: Bengali Egg Curry Recipe
main_tag: bengali lunch eggetarian  aloo, haldi, jeera, tejpatta, elaichi, jeera, dhania, dhania
description: Bengali Egg Curry is a delicious preparation of eggs and potato which are cooked in a gravy made up of onion, tomato and ginger garlic paste. This dish can be served for parties or packed in lunch box along with rice and salad.

name: Mustard Egg Curry Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner eggetarian  raikadugu, haldi
description: Mustard Egg Curry is a combination of South Indian and Bengali spices. Though this is a mix of two different kind of flavours, it still works well in this curry. It is creamy and the flavour of Panch Phoran and Coconut milk comes through very well.

name: पनीर कोफ्ता करी रेसिपी - Paneer Kofta Curry Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  ऑलपर पसआट,
description: पनीर कोफ्ता करी एक स्वादिष्ट करी रेसिपी है जिसमे पनीर के कोफ्ते बनाकर उसे तीखी करी में मिलाया जाता है. यह एक सेहतमंद रेसिपी है क्यूंकि इसमें कोफ्तो को डीप फ्राई नहीं किया गया, कोफ्तो को पनियारम पैन में बनाया गया है. आप इस सब्ज़ी को अपने मेहमानो के लिए भी बना सकते है जब वो आपके घर खाने पर आ रहे हो.

name: Vagharela Chawal Recipe - Parsi Style Brown Rice
main_tag: parsi maincourse vegetarian  elaichi, laung, dalchini
description: Vagharela Chawal Recipe is rice with tadka. In Parsi Vaghar means tadka. Onions are sliced and caramelised till it attains a lovely golden brown colour. Rice is cooked along with these onions and whole spices like cinnamon, cardamom and cloves that lend a great aroma to the rice.

name: शाही भिंडी रेसिपी - Shahi Bhindi Recipe In Cashew Nut Gravy Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian
description: शाही भिंडी रेसिपी एक रिच और क्रीमी ग्रेवी है जिसमे भिंडी को काजू की करी में पकाया जाता है. अगर आप कुछ अच्छा और स्वादिष्ट खाना चाहते है तो यह रेसिपी जरूर तरय करें।

name: चेट्टिनाड वेंगया कोसु रेसिपी - Chettinad Vengaya Kosu Recipe
main_tag: chettinad lunch vegetarian
description: चेट्टिनाड वेंगया कोसु एक फ़्लवेरफुल रेसिपी है जो चेट्टिनाड खाने का हिस्सा है. यह एक सरल ग्रेवी रेसिपी है जिसमे टमाटर और प्याज का प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इसमें आलू का भी प्रयोग कर सकते है.

name: कथीरिकै रसा वांगी रेसिपी - Kathirikai Rasa Vangi Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian
description: कथीरिकै रसा वांगी रेसिपी एक पारम्परिक रेसिपी है जिसे तमिल नाडु के ब्राह्मण परिवार में बनाई जाती है. इसमें खड़े मसाले को ताज़ा पीस कर डाला जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है. आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए या फिर अपने दक्षिण भारतीय भोजन के लिए बनाए।

name: Kashmiri Methi T Golemach Recipe-Minced Chicken Balls With Fenugreek Leaves
main_tag: kashmiri lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  pudina, fenugreekleaves, forchickenballs, tejpatta, dalchini, fenugreekleaves
description: Kashmiri Methi T Golemach is a Kashmiri recipe where minced chicken balls are cooked with fenugreek leaves which is served as a side dish with rice and curry. Fenugreek or Methi flavoured chicken balls are soft, full of flavours and is quite a common side dish option in everyday Kashmiri meals. You can also make this dish for your house parties or your special weekend meals.

name: Kashmiri Style Kokur Yakhni Recipe-Chicken Cooked In Yogurt
main_tag: kashmiri lunch nonvegeterian  dahiyogurt, dalchini, badielaichi, laung, hing, tejpatta, jeera, pudina
description: Kokur Yakhni is a popular Kashmiri Non Veg dish made with Chicken (kokur) is slow cooked in yogurt and typically flavored with Kashmiri spices and lot of dry mint as a garnish. The aroma of Kokur Yakhni is simply amazing and truly exotic, the aroma speaks a lot for the dish even while it is cooking. The curry is all made with yogurt and is enjoyed with rice a lot. Kokur Yakhni has a very important place in Kashmiri Wazwan and is made to serve special guests on every special occasion. Tender chicken pieces dunked in a yogurt curry with a rich flavor of fennel and dry mint is something one can never forget once tasted.

name: Chettinad Kozhi Rasam Recipe - Chettinad Chicken Rasam
main_tag: chettinad lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  haldi, jeera, saunf, dhania
description: Kozhi Rasam is a popular Chettinad soup recipe made in temples like Kali Kovil during Poosai Poduthal when they sacrifice kozhi (chicken) and served as a prasadam. Other than this religious aspect, this Rasam is also served to patients suffering from cold and flu as it's too spicy and is an excellent home remedy for common cold.

name: Sri Lankan Egg Curry Recipe
main_tag: srilankan lunch eggetarian  dhania, saunf, haldi, dhania, jeera, laung, elaichi, dalchini
description: Sri Lankan Egg Curry Recipe belongs to authentic Sri Lankan cuisine which is a result of colonial influence on trade and culture. Sri Lankan curry powder is used to build the essential aroma and flavour to this Egg Curry Recipe. This amazingly aromatic curry powder is also used in nonveg preparations as well.

name: Sri Lankan Style Fried Egg Curry Recipe
main_tag: srilankan lunch eggetarian  dalchini, laung, elaichi, saunf, dhania
description: Sri Lankan Style Fried Egg Curry Recipe is a comforting spicy egg curry recipe that you must try at home. The flavors are quite different when compared to other egg curries in south. As the cuisine is known for its spiciness in most of their dishes, the curry also has a good amount of spice added to it and is also cooked in rich coconut milk.

name: Egg Curry Masala Recipe With Sunny Side Up Eggs
main_tag: indian dinner eggetarian  haldi, dhania, dhania, forgarnish
description: Egg Curry is one of those dishes which is loved by everyone. Spicy, tasty and full of flavour, Egg Curry Masala Recipe With Sunny Side Up Eggs is one of those simple recipes which you can make in no time and it also requires very less day to day ingredients.

name: सुंडकई मेथी सांबर रेसिपी - Sundakkai And Methi Leaves Sambar Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch diabeticfriendly
description: सुंडकई मेथी सांबर रेसिपी में बहुत पोषण होता है और उन लोगो के लिए पर्याप्त है जिन्हे डायबिटीस या किडनी सम्बंदित बीमारी है. इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बनाए क्यूंकि यह नुट्रिशन से भरपूर है. इसमें सांबर पाउडर, धनिया पाउडर और अन्य पाउडर का भी इस्तेमाल किया जाता है जो इसे और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है.

name: पुडलंगाई मिलागु कूट रेसिपी - Pudalangai Milagu Kootu Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish diabeticfriendly
description: पुडलंगाई मिलागु कूट रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसमे चिचिंदे को दाल और नारियल के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह सेहतमंद और पोषण से भरपूर है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. यह एक ब्राह्मिन रेसिपी है जिसे तमिल नाडु के हर घर में बनाई जाती है.

name: Badshahi Chicken Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish nonvegeterian  dahiyogurt, haldi, jeera, optional, laung, elaichi, dalchini, elaichi, javitri, badielaichi
description: Badshahi Chicken Recipe is a simple chicken recipe with a rich gravy, which is mildly spiced.

name: अासामीस बिलाहिर तोक रेसिपी - Assamese Bilahir Tok Recipe
main_tag: assamese sidedish vegetarian
description: अासामीस में बिलाही का मतलब टमाटर और टोक का मतलब खट्टा होता है. यह एक सरल चटनी है जिसे हर आसाम के घर में बनाया जाता है. इसमें फौरन मसाले का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसे तीखा स्वाद देता है. यह डिश बनाने में बहुत आसान है और इसे बनाने में  सिर्फ 15 मिनट लगते है.

name: Punjabi Style Egg Curry Recipe
main_tag: punjabi lunch eggetarian  laung, tejpatta, badielaichi, elaichi, haldi, dhania, dhania
description: Punjabi Style Egg Curry is a delicious and perfect recipe to make on lazy weekdays. It requires few ingredients and gets ready in less time. This dish is very popular in North India and is usually served on the road side dhabas with rice or chapatis.

name: Kolhapuri Palak Egg Curry Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch eggetarian  jeera, tejpatta, laung, haldi, badam
description: Kolhapuri Palak Egg Curry Recipe is packed with flavors. The gravy is filled with aromas from spices like cumin seeds, cloves, bay leaves, palak, onions and coconut are sautéed well with garam masala powder and then ground to form a luscious gravy.

name: Saoji Egg Curry Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch eggetarian  haldi, dhania, kopra, jeera, saunf, caromseeds, dhania, dalchini, elaichi, laung, marathimoggu, javitri
description: Saoji or Savji is a popular cuisine from the Nagpur region of Maharashtra. The cuisine is known for being spicy, fiery and predominantly non vegetarian. The ingredients used are fairly simple however, the combination makes it very spicy.

name: Quick And Simple Egg Curry Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish eggetarian  haldi, dhania, dhania
description: The Egg Curry Recipe is a quick and simple recipe that can be made in less than 30 minutes if you have all the ingredients ready. This egg curry is a delicious spicy preparation of the eggs in a onion garlic ginger and tomato based gravy.

name: Muttai Dosa Recipe - Tamil Nadu Style Egg Dosa Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu southindianbreakfast eggetarian  haldi, dhania
description: Muttai Dosa Recipe is a delicious street food snack in Southern India. When you make it at home, you get to make it healthy with less oil and homemade dosa batter. There are multiple ways you can make this dosa, using either scrambled eggs or an omelette. Either ways, this egg dosa roll recipe is simple and quick to make and very delicious. It also makes a great lunch box for kids.

name: चेट्टिनाड वेजिटेबल पुलाव रेसिपी - Chettinad Vegetable Pulao Recipe
main_tag: chettinad dinner vegetarian
description: चेट्टिनाड वेजिटेबल पुलाव रेसिपी एक दक्षिण भारतीय पुलाव है जिसमे चावल के साथ सौंफ, काली मिर्च, प्याज, अदरक और लहसुन का प्रयोग किया जाता है. यह बनाने में बहुत आसान है इसलिए आप इसे रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है.

name: Karnataka Style Avarekalu Kosambari Recipe
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian  gajjar, split, dhania, hing, raikadugu
description: Karnataka Style Avarekalu Kosambari Recipe is a fresh and healthy salad made with avarekalu beans, sweet corn and tossed with freshly grated coconut, green chilies, onions, soaked moong dal and coriander leaves.

name: Sagu Masala Dosa Recipe
main_tag: karnataka southindianbreakfast vegetarian  split, flattenedrice, bengalgramdal, splittoordal, fenugreekseeds, gajjar, frenchbeans, parangikaipumpkin, withskin, bengalgramdal, optional, dhania, jeera, dhania, dalchini, haldi, raikadugu, hing, pottukadalai
description: Masala Dosa is one of those South Indian dishes that doesn't need any introduction. Bangalore is famous for one such kind where the spicy potato masala is replaced with a vegetable sagu and they call it Sagu Masala Dosa.

name: केरला स्टाइल अंडा काजू करी रेसिपी - Kerala Style Egg Cashew Curry Recipe
main_tag: kerala dinner eggetarian
description: केरला स्टाइल अंडा काजू करी रेसिपी एक केरला कोस्टल रेसिपी है जिसमे उबले हुए अंडो को काजू की करी में डाला जाता है. आप इस सब्ज़ी को अपने घर आये हुए मेहमानो के लिए बना सकते है या फिर अपने हाउस पार्टीज के मैं कोर्स के लिए बना सकते है.

name: माँगा ओगरे रेसिपी - Manga Ogre Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: माँगा ओगरे रेसिपी रेसिपी मैंगो चावल है जिसे आप गर्मियों के दिनों में बना सकते है. इसमें नारिया और हरी मिर्च का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसे और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है. यह एक आसान रेसिपी जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: दही ओट्स रेसिपी  - Curd Rice Style Overnight Oats Recipe
main_tag: indian worldbreakfast vegetarian
description: दही ओट्स एक दक्षिण भारतीय कम्फर्ट फ़ूड है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. यह उसी तरह बनाया जाता है जैसे की हम दही चावल बनाते है. यह बनाने में बहुत आसान है और आप इसे दिन के किसी भी समय खा सकते है.

name: Shahi Vegetable Pulao Recipe
main_tag: mughlai lunch vegetarian  jeera, dalchini, elaichi, pudina, gajjar, gobi
description: The Shahi Vegetable Pulao recipe is a royal dish that has a perfect blend of spices that you can make for a special dinner and weekend lunch and when you have a party at home. The addition of spices and dry fruits, along with saffron and Kohinoor Authentic Basmati Rice heightens the flavour of the dish.

name: Motiya Chilman Pulao Recipe - Vegetable Rice Topped With Paneer Balls
main_tag: awadhi lunch vegetarian  matar, gobi, elaichi, laung, greekyogurt, dhania, homemadecottagecheese, aloo
description: Motiya Chilman Pulao Recipe (Vegetable Rice Topped With Paneer Balls Recipe) is rice preparation made in a pressure cooker and topped up with soft and crispy paneer balls. The dish is originally from Awadhi Cuisine.

name: Mumbai Style Tawa Pulao Recipe With Moong Sprouts
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian  oranyrice, capsicum, aloo, matar, dhania
description: Mumbai Style Tawa Pulao Recipe with Moong Sprouts is a fun recipe that is super quick to make. It is a famous street food dish of Mumbai, where the rice is tossed in plenty of vegetables similar to the Pav Bhaji and spiced up with Pav Bhaji Masala and Chaat Masala.

name: Meethe Chawal Recipe - Zarda Pulao
main_tag: awadhi maincourse vegetarian  elaichi, dalchini, badam, haldi
description: Meethe Chawal Recipe is a sweet preparation of rice often served as dessert. There is a warmth of whole spice combined with rice flavors of saffron and cardamom.

name: Iyengar Style Vendhaya Keerai Pulao Recipe - Menthe Soppina Bath/ Methi Rice
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  fenugreekleaves, optional, optional, optional, masala, split, jeera, raikadugu
description: Iyengar Style Vendhaya Keerai Pulao Recipe is a tasty, healthy and a very easy dish to prepare. Since it has an option of no onion no garlic, it can be made during festivals. In Spite of being mildly spiced this dish looks so vibrant and the flavor of methi shines through. Ghee, pepper and perfectly roasted spices are the key to this dish.

name: Awadhi Style Taheri Recipe - Vegetable Rice Pulao Recipe
main_tag: awadhi lunch vegetarian  aloo, gajjar, matar, gobi, frenchbeans, dahiyogurt, pudina, dhania, dhania, haldi, tejpatta, badielaichi, elaichi, laung, dalchini
description: Awadhi Style Taheri Recipe (Vegetable Rice Pulao Recipe) is a traditional mixed rice with assorted vegetables that are locally available. The slight variation in this rice preparation is by adding curd to the gravy in order to give it a more authentic Awadhi touch to the whole dish.

name: Bhopali Style Gosht Ka Pulao Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch nonvegeterian  dahiyogurt, sourcurd, tejpatta, badielaichi, elaichi, dalchini, pudina, dhania, dhania
description: In India, we have so many cities that speaks for them self. Old cities have so much cultural heritage in store for us to explore. One such typical cultural heritage lies within the narrow lanes of the old city. They say that if you want to know the real facts about the city go to the inside places, the places that is now the oldest part of the city.

name: Bhagar Recipe - Maharashtrian Style Spicy Barnyard Millet Pulao
main_tag: maharashtrian northindianbreakfast vegetarian  ortotaste, jeera, aloo, malabartamarind, moongphali, dhania
description: Bhagar or Variche Tandul (Sama ke Chawal or Barnyard Millet) is typically made during religious fasts in Maharashtra. This spicy dish is a great gluten free meal option on any day, since it is made with Bhagar or sama rice/same akki/sawa which is a millet.

name: Karnataka Style Set Dosa Recipe
main_tag: karnataka southindianbreakfast vegetarian  whole, fenugreekseeds, flattenedrice
description: Dosas are an integral part of the South Indian cuisine and almost every region in south, has their own unique twist to making the dosas. The Karnataka Style Set Dosa is a thick dosa that comes in a set of three when you visit any Darshinis or Sagars in and around the state of Karnataka.

name: Khara Bhath Recipe-South Indian Rava Bhath
main_tag: karnataka southindianbreakfast vegetarian  semolinarava, capsicum, beans carrot tomato brinjal, dhania, asrequired, asrequired, raikadugu, split, bengalgramdal, optional, haldi
description: Khara Bhath Recipe or Rava Bhath is a South Indian specialty that makes a filling breakfast and is quick to prepare. Khara Bhath is a popular breakfast and also a tea-time food in Bangalore-Mysore region of Karnataka. This dish is sure to make a sumptuous indulgence.

name: वेरुसेनेगा सांबर रेसिपी - Verusenaga Sambar Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: वेरुसेनेगा सांबर रेसिपी, सरल और स्वादिष्ट सांबर है जिसमे ताज़ी मूंगफली का प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इसे एक बार अपने किचन में बनाए और हमे विश्वास है की आप यह सांबर बार बार बनाएँगे। इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ाने के लिए इसमें ताज़ा पिसा हुआ सांबर पाउडर डाले।

name: अदरक शिमला मिर्च चावल रेसिपी - Crunchy Ginger Capsicum Rice Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  capsicum, capsicum, capsicum, salted, tilseeds
description: अदरक शिमला मिर्च चावल रेसिपी एक फ्लेवर और रंग से भरपूर रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है या पाने बच्चो के लंच बॉक्स में डाल सकते है. यह डिश आप अपनी हाउस पार्टीज के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: Raw Mango Carrot Cucumber Salad Recipe With Peanuts
main_tag: indian appetizer vegan  raw, gajjar, moongphali, dhania, pudina, jeera
description: Raw Mango Carrot Cucumber Salad Recipe With Peanuts is a simple refreshing salad packed with nutrients. Seasoned with simple spices like black pepper, cumin and chaat masala, this salad can be put together in a jiffy.

name: दाल मखनी रेसिपी - Dal Makhani Without Onion And Garlic (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: दाल मखनी उत्तर भारत की एक प्रसिद्ध डिश है जिसे पंजाब के हर घर में बनाया जाता है. दाल मखनी में राजमा, दाल, मक्खन और क्रीम का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इस दाल में प्याज और लहुसन का प्रयोग नहीं किया गया है.

name: आंध्रा स्टाइल पप्पू चारु रेसिपी - Andhra Style Pappu Charu Recipe
main_tag: andhra lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: आंध्रा स्टाइल पप्पू चारु रेसिपी, एक स्वाद से भरपूर और तीखा दाल का सूप है जिसे आंध्र प्रदेश में बनाया जाता है. यह डिश हर आंध्रा थाली का हिस्सा होती है. यह पोषण से भरपूर है इसलिए आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है.

name: लहसुनि दाल तड़का रेसिपी - Lahsuni Dal Tadka Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner highproteinvegetarian
description: लहसुनि दाल तड़का एक सरल रोज की दाल है जिसमे लहसुन का तड़का दिया जाता है. इसमें कद्दू भी डाला जाता है जो इस डाक को और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है. यह बनाने में बहुत आसान है इसलिए आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है.

name: मूलांगी तौव्वे रेसिपी - Moolangi Tovve Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian
description: मूलांगी तौव्वे रेसिपी एक सरल दाल रेसिपी है जिसमे दाल के साथ मूली का प्रयोग किया जाता है. तौव्वे एक कनडा शब्द है जिसका मतलब सरल होता है. यह बनाने में बहुत आसान है इसलिए आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. यह दाल बारिश के दिनों के लिए पर्याप्त है. परोसते समय इसमें घी और निम्बू का रस भी डाले।

name: Mixed Beans Vegetable Pulao Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian  largekidneybeans, aloo, gajjar, frenchbeans, laung, elaichi, dalchini, haldi, dhania
description: Mixed Bean Vegetable Pulao recipe is made with the combination of kidney beans, double beans and mixed vegetables. You can even pack this a protein rich wonderful one pot meal Mixed Bean Veg Pulao in lunch box.

name: Egg Pulao Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch eggetarian  dahiyogurt, pudina, dhania, jeera, elaichi, tejpatta, dalchini, haldi
description: Egg Pulao is a delicious spicy preparation of seared eggs cooked with rice and aromatic spices. Egg pulao can be served with raita or even any spicy curry of your choice. This recipe is an ultimate meal to be enjoyed with family on weekends.

name: खजूर इमली की चटनी रेसिपी - Khajur Imli Chutney Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: खजूर इमली की चटनी रेसिपी एक खट्टी मीठी चटनी है जिसमे खजूर और इमली के साथ गुड़ का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इस चटनी का अपनी चाट रेसिपीज में प्रयोग कर सकते है. यह चटनी आपके चाट को और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाती है.

name: कच्चे आम की लौंजी रेसिपी - Kacche Aam Ki Launji Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani sidedish vegetarian
description: कच्चे आम की लौंजी एक प्रसिद्ध डिश है जिसे राजस्थान के हर घर में बनाया जाता है. इसमें कलोंजी, सौंफ, मेथी के दाने का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसे और भी फ्लेवर देता है.

name: Mangalorean Neer Dosa Recipe-Savory Rice & Coconut Crepe
main_tag: mangalorean southindianbreakfast vegetarian  sonamasurioranylocalrice
description: The Mangalorean Neer Dosa Recipe, is a simple, quick recipe to make. This dosa unlike other dosa batter, the neer dosa is made purely from rice and combined along with coconut. The coconut not only gives the batter a good taste, but also gives it a soft texture. If you have never made Rava Dosa or Neer Dosa before, then this dosa will take a little practice to get the desired consistency of the batter and the texture.

name: Thatte Idli Recipe
main_tag: karnataka southindianbreakfast vegetarian  split, flattenedrice, tapiocapearls
description: Thatte Idli is one of the Karnataka's famous breakfast dish. It is a regular dish in every household in Karnataka and is very easy and quick to make. It is also named as Plate idli. This recipe is made with Urad dal, Poha and Sabudana.

name: दाल तड़का रेसिपी - Dal Tadka Recipe Flavoured With Lemon And Coriander
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: दाल तड़का रेसिपी एक सरल रेसिपी है जिसमे निम्बू और धनिये का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है. यह एक सरल रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने हाउस पार्टीज और रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. फ्लेवर और स्वाद से भरपूर, आपको यह दाल जरूर पसंद आएगी।

name: Karuvepillai Pachadi Recipe - Curry Leaf Raita
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, jeera, raikadugu, split
description: Karuvepillai Pachadi Recipe is essentially a Curry Leaf Raita which has creamy yogurt flavoured with a freshly ground masala of curry leaves, ginger and green chillies, topped with a tadka of crispy fried curry leaves that adds to the flavour and texture of this raita.

name: कोथामली थोगयल रेसिपी - Kothamalli Thogayal Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian
description: कोथामली थोगयल में हरे धनिये का प्रयोग किया जाता है जिसका ज्यादातर गार्निश के लिए प्रयोग किया जाता है. इस चटनी को अपने किचन में बनाए और हमे बताए की यह आपको कैसी लगी. यह बनाने में तो आसान है है खाने में भी बहुत स्वादिस्ट है. आप इसे बनाकर फ्रिज में 2 दिन के लिए स्टोरे कर सकते है.

name: मालाबार स्टाइल डेट्स धनिया चटनी रेसिपी - Malabar Style Dates Coriander Chutney Recipe
main_tag: malabar sidedish vegetarian
description: मालाबार स्टाइल डेट्स धनिया चटनी रेसिपी, खट्टी मीठी चटनी है. इसमें खट्टापन इमली से आता है और मीठापन खजूर से. इसमें थोड़ा सा तीखा स्वाद भी आता है क्यूंकि इसमें सुखी लाल मिर्च का प्रयोग किया जाता है. यह चटनी बनाने में बहुत आसान है और इसमें कम सामग्री का प्रयोग किया जाता है.

name: सेब और किशमिश की चटनी रेसिपी - Apple And Raisin Chutney Recipe
