main_tag: continental sidedish vegetarian
description: सेब और किशमिश की चटनी रेसिपी एक ब्रिटिश स्टाइल स्प्रेड है जिसमे दालचीनी पाउडर का भी इस्तेमाल किया जाता है. आप इसे अपने सुबह के नाश्ते के लिए ब्रेड या पराठे के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: पितोर की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Pitor Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani lunch vegetarian
description: पितोर की सब्ज़ी एक राजस्थानी सब्ज़ी है जिसमे चने के डम्पलिंग बना के दही की ग्रेवी में डाले जाते है. यह बनाने में आसान है लेकिन पितोर बनाने में समय लगता है. आप इसे चावल या फुल्के के साथ खा सकते है. यह हर राजस्थानी घर में बनाई जाती है, तो अब इसे अपने किचन में बनाए और इसका आनंद ले.

name: Coriander Semiya Recipe - Vermicelli Pulao
main_tag: southindian dinner vegetarian  thin, dhania, dependinguponhowspicyyouwant, gajjar, matar, laung, tejpatta, elaichi
description: Coriander Semiya is a spicy, coriander flavored rice vermicelli pulao, fragrant with aromatic spices and tinged with the sweetness of coconut (for the south Indian flavor) and crunch of vegetables; ideal for a quick lunch or a main dish for any party.

name: Pyaz Ka Paratha Recipe - Spicy Stuffed Onion Paratha
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast vegetarian  caromseeds, jeera, drymangopowder, pudina
description: The Pyaz Ka Paratha Recipe is a comfort meal for days when you have nothing more than a few onions in your pantry. It makes a wholesome breakfast or even dinner when paired with chutney or pickle.

name: टोमेटो राइस विथ बेसिल रेसिपी - Tomato Rice With Basil Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: टोमेटो राइस विथ बेसिल रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट फ्यूज़न रेसिपी है जिसमे चावल को टमाटर और बेसिल के साथ पकाया जाता है. रिच और स्वाद से भरपूर, आप इस रेसिपी को हाउस पार्टीज या वीकेंड डिनर के लिए बना सकते है.

name: गाजर निम्बू चावल रेसिपी - Carrot Lemon Rice Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian
description: गाजर निम्बू चावल रेसिपी एक सेहतमंद रेसिपी जो बनाने में बहुत आसान है और इसे बनाने में बहुत कम सामग्री का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें गाजर का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इस डिश को क्रंच देता है और सेहतमंद बनाता है. आप इस रेसिपी को जरूर बनाए और हमे बताए की आपको यह कैसी लगी?

name: तीखा राजमा पुलाव रेसिपी - Spiced Rajma Pulao Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian
description: तीखा राजमा पुलाव रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसमे चावल को राजमा और रोज के मसलो के साथ पकाया जाता है. नुट्रिशन से भरपूर, इसमें राजमा का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो आपको प्रोटीन देता है. यह बहुत ही स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है इसलिए आप इसे अपनी हाउस पार्टीज के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: Foxtail Millet Lemon Rice Recipe-Elumichai Thenai
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  raikadugu, split, moongphali, gajjar, haldi, gingelly, dhania
description: Foxtail Millet Lemon Rice Recipe also known as Elumichai Sadam in Tamil is a healthy version of the rice dish that is made from thinai, also known as foxtail millets. The Lemon millet recipe is packed with flavors from lemon, green chillies and curry leaves. The millet adds to the nutrition and fiber to the diet and making it a perfect lunch box for kids.

name: Rajasthani Makki Ka Chatpata Dhokla Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani snack diabeticfriendly  dhania, yellowcornmealflour
description: Rajasthani Makki Ka Chatpata Dhokla are very popular made in Rajasthani households specially during winters. They are made both In Marwar and Mewar, but are served with different dals and Kadhis specific to regions. In Mewar, it is served with Dal, while in Marwar Rajasthani Makki Ka Chatpata Dhokla Recipe is served with Kadhi. As they are steamed, it is also good for health.

name: आलू बोंदा रेसिपी - Potato Bonda Recipe Flavoured With Sambar Powder in Hindi
main_tag: southindian snack vegetarian  घ ल, भरन,
description: आलू बोंदा एक दक्षिण भारतीय स्नैक है जिसे हर घर में बनाया जाता है. इसमें गरम मसाला और सांबर पाउडर का प्रयोग किया गया है जो इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ाता है. यह स्नैक आपको हर चाय की हर दूकान पर बनाया जाता है.

name: Chana Pulao Recipe - Spicy Chickpea Pulao
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  whitechickpeas, capsicum, dahiyogurt, haldi, driedfenugreekleaves, pomegranateseedpowder, pudina, dhania, elaichi, javitri, tejpatta, laung, dalchini, caromseeds, badielaichi
description: Chana Pulao is an easy one pot meal that is your solution to veggie nights and for days when you want to serve something more than the same old vegetable biriyani. Studded with protein-rich chickpeas, fragrant from the garam masala, this basmati rice pulao/pilaf is easy and quick. Served with any raita of your choice, this is one delicious pot of rice.

name: Moong Sprouts Pulao Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  jeera, laung, elaichi, dalchini, tejpatta, dhania
description: Cooking healthy is as important as cooking easy sometimes. There are many ways to use sprouts in dishes and this recipe uses sprouts in a one pot dish for one of those quick weekday tiffin boxes or quick dinners.

name: Sprouted Moong And Methi Pulao Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  fenugreekleaves, tejpatta, raikadugu, jeera, haldi, hing
description: Sprouted Moong And Methi Pulao Recipe are both packed with beneficial nutrients. This Sprouted Moong and Methi Pulao, with the goodness of both these wholesome ingredients, makes for a healthy and appetising one-pot meal.

name: Muri Masala Recipe Kolkata Style Used in Jhal Muri
main_tag: bengali snack vegetarian  jeera, dhania, kalanamak, drymangopowder, tejpatta
description: Kolkata Muri Masala or Moodi Masala is a special spice mix that is used in making Jhaal Muri, an delicious crunchy street food snack, flavored with mustard oil. The street vendors never tell you the actual recipe, they will just sell you the powder, but over the years, I tasted the powder each time and finally dissected the recipe and got it 99% close to the original one.

name: Cucumber Neer Dosa Recipe-Rice Pancake
main_tag: mangalorean southindianbreakfast vegetarian
description: Cucumber Neer Dosa Recipe is a twist to the traditional Neer Dosa which is made in the households of Mangalore. Traditionally it is just the rice which is soaked and made into the batter along with coconut milk, but in this recipe we have used cucumber to give a fresh and unique flavor.

name: Baingan Tamatar Sabzi - Brinjal/ Eggplant Masala Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  bainganeggplant, haldi, dhania, dhania
description: The Baingan Masala Recipe is a dish that is packed with flavors from rich vibrant tomatoes, a hint of garlic, garam masala and not to miss the coriander powder and leaves that give it that rich gravy consistency and taste.

name: Traditional Gujarati Mohanthal Recipe - Gram Flour Fudge with Nuts and Saffron
main_tag: gujarati﻿ dessert vegetarian  besan, elaichi, badam
description: Gujarati Mohanthal Recipe is a very traditional festive sweet made from sweetened gram flour and cooked slowly into a dense fudge flavored with saffron and nuts. Mohanthal is one of the signature desserts prepared by my mother in law and the entire family swoons over the perfect texture and taste that only she can achieve. Friends and family would tell her “We follow your recipe to the T and can’t get it to make like you do”. Some say it’s the hand and I say it’s the love with which she makes it.

name: Milagu Jeera Curry Leaf Sadam Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  raikadugu, split, moongphali, jeera, gingelly
description: Milagu Jeera Sadam Recipe is an spicy south indian rice made with black pepper, cumin and curry leaves that are ground together and then combined along with cooked rice.

name: Oil Free Gujarati Undhiyu Recipe - No Onion No Garlic
main_tag: gujarati﻿ sidedish noonionnogarlic  besan, fenugreekleaves, haldi, hing, dhania, haldi, dhania, optional, dondakayakovakkai, matar, pattagobimuttaikose, bainganeggplant, dhania
description: Undhiyu is a Gujarati mixed vegetable dish that is a regional specialty of Surat, India. The name of this dish comes from the Gujarati words "matlu" meaning earthen pot and "undhu" meaning upside down since they have been traditionally cooked upside down underground in earthen pots fired from above. The dish is made with seasonal vegetables during the winter season.

name: Mor Milagai Recipe - South Indian Sun Dried Chillies
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt
description: Mor Milagai Recipe is a delicious crisp chilli which is marinated in yogurt and sun-dried. Later these sun dried chillies are fried in oil and then served along with a bowl of curd rice. It is one of the most popular condiments of the South Indian Cuisine.

name: Goan Chicken Vindaloo Recipe
main_tag: goan dinner nonvegeterian  dhania, raikadugu, jeera, dhania, fenugreekseeds, laung, dalchini, haldi
description: There are lots of fables surrounding the Goan Chicken Vindaloo. This curry has emerged from melting pot of Portuguese, Goan and British influences. In fact, the name "Vindaloo" is actually a garbled version of the Portuguese dish called carne de vinha d'alhos which translates to "meat in garlic wine marinade".

name: Raw Mango Murabba Recipe - Cinnamon Spiced Mango Jam
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  ripe, dalchini
description: The Raw Mango Murabba Recipe made from raw mangoes is flavored with cinnamon adding to the taste and flavor. The addition of cinnamon makes this dish absolutely delicious.

name: Kachumber Salad Recipe With Cucumber, Onion & Tomatoes
main_tag: indian sidedish diabeticfriendly  gajjar, asrequired, jeera, roast, dhania, pudina
description: Kachumber salad is a refreshing and simple summer salad which is packed with the goodness of small tiny pieces of raw cucumber, onions and tomatoes. This refreshing salad also includes carrots, pomegranate seeds and some fresh herbs.

name: Sweet And Sour Lemon Pickle Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  thinskinnedvariety, adjust
description: Sweet And Sour Lemon Pickle Recipe is a simple pickle that is oh so flavourful, made with minimal ingredients.

name: Andhra Style Paruppu Podi Recipe - Dal Podi
main_tag: andhra sidedish vegetarian  bengalgramdal, split, splittoordal, split, kollukulith, hing, gingelly
description: Andhra Style Paruppu Podi is rich in protein and is super spicy. It is one of those south Indian dishes which can be prepared and stored in a container for about 2 to 3 months.

name: Pudina Dahi Chutney Recipe- Mint Yoghurt Dip
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, dhania, pudina
description: Pudina Dahi Chutney Recipe is a delicious chutney that you can use it as a dip for various Indian appetizer. The addition of mint, along with coriander leaves, when combined with dahi, gives a very creamy texture to the chutney.

name: Rajasthani Gunde Ki Sabzi Recipe (Bird Lime Stir Fry)
main_tag: rajasthani sidedish vegetarian  birdlime, fenugreekseeds, jeera, hing, saunf, raikadugu, haldi, drymangopowder, dhania
description: Rajasthani Gunde Ki Sabzi is very popularly made in almost all the households of the state. It is very easy to make and tastes delicious when served as a side six with your meal. It is best to make in those days when you are out of vegetables in your fridge.

name: Rabodi Simla Mirch Ki Sabzi (Rajasthani Curry with Corn Papad)
main_tag: rajasthani lunch vegetarian  driedcornpapad, capsicum, haldi, dhania
description: The Rabodi Simla Mirch Ki Sabzi is a delicious preparation of corn papad that is simmered in a spicy tomato curry with green capsicum. The addition of garlic and green capsicum to the recipes brings out great flavors into this traditional Rajasthani curry with a twist.

name: Dum Murgh Aatishi Recipe - Spicy Smoked Chicken Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner nonvegeterian  pomegranateseedpowder, jeera, saunf
description: Dum Murgh Aatishi Recipe is a North Indian Style Chicken recipe which has its own unique flavours. On this occasion of Eid this Recipe is sure to please your family and guests. With its versatility, it can be served with steamed rice or parathas and assorted naans too. In this dish, chicken is marinated with spices and cooked to perfection and lastly you give it a dum of coal for its smoky flavour.

name: Gujarati Style Osaman Dal Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ lunch highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, haldi, raikadugu, jeera, laung, dalchini, elaichi
description: Gujarati Style Osaman Dal Recipe is a thin liquid toor dal recipe which has minimal spices added to it. The dal is cooked in the pressure cooker with enough water and once the dal becomes mushy. The leftover water is retained and then mixed along to a thin consistency and tempered with various whole spice like cinnamon stick, cardamom pods and curry leaves with ghee and served hot.

name: Sweet and Spicy Tomato Chutney Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ sidedish vegetarian  raikadugu, jeera, hing, haldi
description: Sweet and Spicy Tomato Chutney is a delicious tomato sauce flavored with ginger and green chillies. This sweet and sour chutney tomato chutney recipe is made with slightly sour tomatoes that brings a natural sourness. The addition of green chillies and ginger makes it delectable.

name: Mixed Millet And Lentils Adai Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  pearlmillet, jeeraga, split, whole, bengalgramdal, whole, splittoordal, whole, hing, jeera, dhania
description: When breakfast is the important meal of the day, then it should be healthy and filling. Having a nutrients and protein rich breakfast makes a delicious way to jump-start your metabolism. The ancient millet are forgotten and neglected for decades are coming back into many people’s lives as people are realising the health benefits of these ancient grains. Millet have very high nutritional value, unsaturated fats, protein, minerals, fiber. Adding a mix of different types of millet and lentils into your breakfast through this Mixed Millet and Lentils Adai would mean, you are having the most nutritional and healthy breakfast. And the added bonus, this recipe needs very little time to prepare as the batter does not need any fermentation. Soak the millet and lentils over night, grind them in the morning and make adai immediately. It’s that simple!

name: Italian Cheese And Basil Uttappam Recipe
main_tag: fusion southindianbreakfast vegetarian  whole, fenugreekseeds
description: Italian Cheese And Basil Uttapam Recipe is a wonderful fusion recipe of Indian Uttapam blended with Italian flavors of basil and parmesan cheese. This fusion uttapam is a great breakfast idea. Uttapam are fluffy savory pancakes made with rice and Urad Dal flour and topped with various toppings like, potato, onion, tomato, coconut etc. The Italian Cheese And Basil Uttapam Recipe is best served with coconut chutney and hot Thakkali Vengayam Sambar. This fusion dish, Italian Cheese And Basil Uttapam Recipe gives you a riot of flavors and makes you urge for more.

name: Nimbu Chunda Recipe (Lemon Chutney) - No Cook And Oil Free
main_tag: northindian appetizer vegetarian  adjust, adjust, adjust
description: Easy to make, versatile and addictive, is how I would describe this Nimbu Chunda Recipe (Lemon Chutney). Four ingredients are all it takes to make this no-cook and oil free chutney. Nimbu Chunda pairs beautifully with almost everything – stuffed Indian breads (Paratha), savory crepes (besan or dal cheela), baked potatoes, grilled fish, lamb chops, lamb seekh kebabs, roasted chicken, slow roasts, cheese and bread.

name: Gujarati Vagharela Mag Recipe - Moong Sprouts Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ sidedish highproteinvegetarian  jeera, haldi, dhania
description: Green Moong Dal Subzi is a quick and simple dish that you can make for a quick weeknight dinner along with kadhi. Vagharela in Gujarati means tempered with seasonings like mustard, cumin, ginger and the like.

name: Kondakadalai Puli Vengaya Kuzhambu Recipe (South Indian Style Spicy And Tangy Kala Chana)
main_tag: chettinad lunch highproteinvegetarian  brownchickpeas, sambaronions, haldi, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, gingelly
description: The Kondakadalai Puli Vengaya Kuzhambu Recipe is a delicious spicy and tangy recipe from south india, where black chana also known as kala chana is cooked and simmered in a tamarind tomato curry that is spiced with sambar powder as a core ingredient. Kuzhambu are classic dishes from south india, that are most often served along with steamed rice, dosa, idli or even parotha.

name: Shepuchi Bhaji Recipe (Stir Fried Maharashtrian Suva/Dill Greens)
main_tag: maharashtrian dinner vegetarian  optional, split, raikadugu, jeera, haldi
description: Shepuchi Bhaji Recipe (Stir Fried Maharashtrian Suva/Dill Greens) is a simple, quick stir-fry that uses fresh dill leaves. These light feathery leaves called Shepu in Marathi are loaded with nutrients and extremely healthy. The recipe uses just a handful of ingredients, maximising on the distinct flavour of the dill leaves, and only enhancing or complementing it. The addition of soaked moong dal adds a slight crunch and bite to the stir fry. Serve Shepuchi Bhaji along with Bhakri/Phulka and Bharli Vangi or add it to a meal of Varan Bhaat for a comforting weekday meal.

name: Cheese Garlic Naan Recipe
main_tag: northindian maincourse vegetarian  maida, dahiyogurt, dhania, salted, salted
description: Cheese Garlic Naan Recipe is a delicious naan recipe stuffed with gooey cheese and flavoured with garlic. The crispy flaky naan is cooked on a tawa and then on direct flame, to give it the lovely crispy texture. The garlic when comes in contact with the direct flame, gives the naan lovely roasted garlic flavour.  Slathered with butter and served hot with a dal or a delicious sabzi.

name: Palak Mushroom Makhani Recipe - Creamy Spinach & Mushroom
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  palak, jeera, dalchini, jeera, haldi
description: The Palak Mushroom Makhani Recipe is a creamy and healthy preparation of spinach that is simmered along with spices and roasted mushrooms.

name: Healthy Carrot Methi & Mooli Thepla Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ lunch vegetarian  haldi, optional, jeera, hing, gajjar, radish, fenugreekleaves
description: Thepla Recipe is one of the many comfort foods to Gujarati’s. If you are on a long distance train or even on a trekking trip and you spot a Gujarati, you will definitely find them with Thepla.

name: Bardoli Ki Khichdi Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ maincourse highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, aloo, matar, raw, haldi, jeera, hing, dhania
description: Bardoli Ki Khichdi is a delicious khichdi recipe made with rice and tur dal, along with mild spices and raw mango. The raw mango adds a sight tanginess to the khichdi, giving it a right kind of balance against the spices that are added.

name: Stuffed Capsicum Makhani Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  jeera, capsicum, aloo, homemadecottagecheese, dhania, elaichi, dalchini, tejpatta, haldi
description: Stuffed Capsicum Makhani Recipe is a delicious comforting Indian curry that you can prepare at your home for a weekend meal. The gravy is a luscious creamy tomato base flavoured with some Indian whole spice which is served along with a stuffed capsicum with crumbled paneer and potato.

name: Tangy Lemon Pickle Recipe With Kalonji & Rock Salt
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  onionnigellaseeds, haldi, raikadugu, hing
description: Handmade pickles are always the demanding pickles and reasons are very simple - we can trust the ingredients, we can trust the hygiene quality and moreover we all in love with that taste. Being expert in making almost all pickles, my grandmother always the best in making Tangy Lemon Pickle Recipe With Kalonji & Rock Salt. This Tangy Lemon Pickle Recipe is very easy recipe as ingredients are very easily available like spices rock salt, turmeric, chilli, mustard etc. You can also prepare the same recipe with lime.

name: आंध्रा स्टाइल बीटरूट वेपुडु रेसिपी - Andhra Style Beetroot Vepudu Recipe
main_tag: andhra lunch vegetarian  ब टर ट
description: आंध्रा स्टाइल बीटरूट वेपुडु रेसिपी एक सरल और सेहतमंद रेसिपी है जो की पोषण से भरपूर है. आप इस सब्ज़ी को अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है या फिर अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: पम्पकिन एरीसेरी रेसिपी - Pumpkin Erissery Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian  पम पक न
description: पम्पकिन एरीसेरी रेसिपी केरला की पारम्परिक रेसिपी है जिसे ओणम सदया पर या दूसरे त्योहारों के लिए बनाया जाता है. बनाने में आसान और खाने में स्वादिष्ट इस सब्ज़ी में पम्पकिन और नारियल का प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इसे बनाने के लिए किसी और सब्ज़ी का भी प्रयोग कर सकते है.

name: Pumpkin Dal with Garlic Tadka Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner diabeticfriendly  splittoordal, split, whole, dalchini, tejpatta, parangikaipumpkin, haldi, jeera
description: The Pumpkin Dal Tadka is a delicious recipe that is made with a combination of dals, green chilies and spices. The addition of a garlic tadka along with ghee adds to the final touch and makes it a perfect dish for a quick and easy dinner  when served along with rice, papad and achaar.

name: Manoharam Murukku Recipe-South Indian Diwali Special Paruppu Thengai)
main_tag: tamilnadu snack vegetarian  salted, moreifrequired, forapproximately2cupsofmurruku
description: Manoharam Murukku is a South Indian Diwali sweet also known as Paruppu Thengai. Most frequently prepared in the Southern parts of India for festivals, especially Diwali, as well as during weddings, this is easy to prepare and store. The recipe is fairly simply - a quick route to a satisfying and wonderful traditional recipe, so try it for yourself!

name: Awadhi Style Sheermal Recipe - Sweet Flat Bread
main_tag: awadhi lunch vegetarian  maida, elaichi
description: Awadhi Style Sheermal Recipe is an Indian famous flatbread which is flavoured with saffron. It is very soft and fluffy flat bread, it can be eaten along with different kind’s curries. It is considered as one of the rare delicacies from Hyderabad and Lucknow.

name: Awadhi Moong Dal Ki Goli Recipe - Lentil Dumplings In Tomato Gravy
main_tag: awadhi maincourse highproteinvegetarian  whole, haldi, dhania, forgarnish, pomegranateseedpowder, dhania
description: Awadhi Moong Dal Ki Goli Recipe is spicy curried green lentil balls that comes from Awadhi Cuisine. Green Lentils soaked and ground with spices are shaped into lemon sized dumplings, later curried in a spicy tomato gravy. Moong Dal Ki Goli is a quintessential dish that is quite popular in parts of Uttar Pradesh like Kanpur, Lucknow etc.

name: Averekaalu Rava Laddu Recipe - Field Beans Semolina Ladoo
main_tag: karnataka dessert vegetarian  semolinarava, elaichi
description: Averekaalu Rava Laddu Recipe (Field Beans Semolina Balls Recipe) is a creative way of using the field beans in a sweet. Usually the field beans or the avarekaalu is used only in savory curries or in savory puddings like avarekaalu upma but very few knew that these beans give a good taste once it is used to make this sweet. The laddu is crunchy and soft and is made especially during the Avarekaalu season.

name: केरल की कटहल सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Kerala Style Jack Fruit Seeds Stir Fry (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian
description: केरल की कटहल सब्ज़ी एक बहुत ही स्वादिष्ट सब्ज़ी है जिसे पके हुए कटहल के साथ पकाया जाता है. इसे स्टीम करके नारियल और मसाला के साथ पकाया जाता है. इस सब्ज़ी को आप किसी भी दाल और चावल के साथ दिन के खाने के लिए परोस सकते है.

name: Ragi Malpua With Rabri Recipe (Indian Pancakes With Creamy Pudding)
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  fingermilletnagli, saunf, elaichi
description: Ragi Malpua With Rabri is a traditional Indian sweet where the pancakes are spiced with saffron and cardamom and deep fried in oil. This is a recipe that is prepared without condensed milk, and a twist to the original is the addition of Ragi flour and Whole wheat flour making it healthy. I am also making the recipe healthier by pan frying the Ragi Malpua and eat this delectable sweet guilt free.

name: Stuffed Mango Pickle Recipe - Gujarati Dabla Keri Nu Athanu
main_tag: gujarati﻿ sidedish vegetarian  raw, smallseedvariety, fenugreekseeds, iused150grams, hing, iusedpickleasafoetida
description: Gujarati Dabla Keri Nu Athanu is the Whole Stuffed Mango Pickle Recipe which is made using raw mango variety with small stones inside. This recipe is picked from one of mom’s traditional Gujarati recipes. She is a pickle connoisseur in our family. This variation of raw mango pickle will surely leave you licking your fingers when accompanied with hot khichdi or just anything that needs pickle as an accompaniment.

name: चम्मंथी चटनी रेसिपी - Chammanthi Chutney Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: चम्मंथी चटनी रेसिपी केरला की एक पारम्परिक डिश है जिसमे प्याज और नारियल का प्रयोग किया जाता है. नारियल इस चटनी को और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है. आप इस चटनी को डोसा या इडली किसी के साथ भी परोस सकते है.

name: Instant Ragi Rava Dhokla - Wholesome & Delicious Ragi Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ snack highproteinvegetarian  fingermilletnagli, semolinarava, dahiyogurt, raikadugu, tilseeds, dhania
description: The Instant Ragi Rava Dhokla Recipe is a healthy preparation of the traditional sooji dhokla that is made with just semolina. In this Ragi Dhokla recipe I have combined the ragi flour, also known as the finger millet flour along with semolina (rava).  Dhokla get its flavors and delicious textures from the sesame and mustard seasoning and this recipe does just that.

name: Quick and Easy Bread Upma Recipe
main_tag: indian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  haldi, raikadugu, salted, dhania
description: The Bread Upma Recipe is a dish that we look forward to whenever we have extra bread in the refrigerator. This recipe is a great way to use any kind of excess bread. The addition of onions, green chillies, sambar powder and fresh herbs like coriander leaves along with toasted buttered bread is super delicious.

name: Vegetable Jowar Upma Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  gajjar, optional, matar, moongphali, haldi, dhania
description: The Vegetable Jowar Upma Recipe is made from sorghum pearls that are stir-fried along with seasonal vegetables, and flavored with garlic, peppers and vegetable stock. Jowar is one of the five top cereal crops in the world rich in protein, iron, and fibre. Jowar also has great antioxidants properties and is also gluten-free, hence making this Jowar Vegetable Upma a great choice for gluten free diets.

name: Broken Barley Upma Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  seeds, brokenbarley, gajjar, frenchbeans, matar, moongphali, raikadugu, split, dhania
description: Broken Barley Upma is a healthy upma recipe that is made with broken barley and vegetables. Barley is quick to cook millet and tastes delicious when combined with vegetables, asafoetida.

name: Egg Idiyappam Recipe - Rice Vermicelli Upma with Scrambled Eggs
main_tag: kerala southindianbreakfast eggetarian  thin, gajjar, dhania, haldi, raikadugu, split
description: The Egg Idiyappam Recipe is a wholesome breakfast made with rice string hoppers, scrambled eggs and spices. The rice noodles are easy to cook and digest as well making it a balanced meal for breakfast or even a tea time snack.

name: Bengali Style Chori Recipe-Mixed Vegetable Sabzi
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian  turaipeerkangai, parangikaipumpkin, bainganeggplant, aloo, parval, radish, haldi, hing
description: Unique char flavoured mix vegetable dish from West Bengal that is delicious, aromatic and introduces you to the flavours of Bengal cuisine which called as ChorChori which is also known and pronounced as CharChari.

name: Goan Style Maskachi Bhaji Recipe-Moringa Leaves Stir Fry With Jackfruit Seeds
main_tag: goan sidedish vegetarian  moringamurungaikeerai, kathal, haldi
description: Maskachi Bhaji Recipe is a simple, delicious and super nutritious Goan stir-fry of moringa leaves and jackfruit seeds.

name: Vegetable Semiya Upma Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  vermicelli, raikadugu, split, hing, dalchini, elaichi, haldi, gajjar, frenchbeans, dhania, dhania
description: The Vegetable Semiya Upma recipe is a simple to make breakfast dish that is made from roasted Vermicelli.  Added goodness of vegetables to this upma that is finish off with a splash of lemon juice and a generous drizzle of ghee gives it a delicious mouth feel.

name: Drumstick Leaves Fried Rice Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegan  gajjar, capsicum, moringamurungaikeerai
description: Drumstick Leaves Fried Rice is one of the best way to sneak this iron rich greens. Actually the drumstick leaves gives a wonderful flavour to this simple fried rice. I also used carrot and capsicum to give some colour to this rice. If you want to add more vegetables and less greens just make your rice as though. My version goes for more drumstick leaves and less vegetables.

name: Murungai Keerai Thogayal Recipe - Moringa/Drumstick Leaves Chutney
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  moringamurungaikeerai, gingelly, hing, split, sambaronions
description: The Murungai Keerai Thogayal is must try lip smacking spicy drumstick leaves chutney that is made tangy and spicy to be served along with a hot crispy dosa or along with steamed rice and ghee.

name: Puffed Rice Upma Recipe - Murmura Upma
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  raikadugu, jeera, moongphali, matar, haldi, dhania
description: The Puffed Rice Upma makes a quick and easy breakfast for those busy weekday morning. Puffed rice is a type of grain made from rice, commonly used as a breakfast cereal or snack foods, and served as a popular street food in India in the form of Bhel Puri.

name: Corn And Drumstick Leaves Salad Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  moringamurungaikeerai, jeera, raikadugu, haldi
description: Corn And Drumstick Leaves Salad Recipe is an unusual combination put together to make a salad. Here corn kernels and drumstick leaves are sauteed together with a sweet and spicy dressing, making it  delicious and of course a super healthy addition to your meal.

name: Murungai Keerai Rasam Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  splittoordal, moringamurungaikeerai, hing, jeera, raikadugu, jeera
description: Murungai Keerai or Drumstick leaves or Moringa leaves are a nutritional powerhouse of vitamins and minerals. They are also rich in iron, calcium, potassium and protein and aids our body in a number of ways - eliminates free radicals, improves bone health and cardiovascular health.

name: Murungai Keerai Thogayal Recipe-Drumstick Leaves Thogayal
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish vegetarian  moringamurungaikeerai, bengalgramdal, split, raikadugu, jeera
description: Murungai keerai thogayal is a healthy south Indian chutney or a side dish recipe. It is loaded with goodness of drumstick leaves, cashew nuts and tempered with chana dal and urad dal. This thick thogayal can be served with rice and appalam. The diluted thin version of this can also be served as chutney for idli or dosa.

name: Quinoa Vegetable Upma Recipe
main_tag: fusion indianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  raikadugu, jeera, split, bengalgramdal, gajjar, matar, frenchbeans, dhania, dhania
description: Quinoa Vegetable Khichdi Recipe is a hearty preparation of quinoa, vegetables and spices, cooked together in a single pot.

name: Ragi Semiya Upma Recipe - Ragi Millet Vermicelli Breakfast
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  thin, gajjar, matar, hing, raikadugu, split
description: Ragi Vermicelli/Semiya Recipe is a super healthy breakfast option, especially for those who enjoy hot, savoury breakfasts to start the day. Ragi as you know, is a super food, and in my home we try and incorporate it in our food in as many ways as possible.

name: Broken Wheat Upma Recipe - Healthy Dalia Upma for Breakfast
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  daliagodumairava, gajjar, frenchbeans, gobi, raikadugu, jeera, hing, haldi, dhania
description: Broken Wheat Upma also known as Godhuma Rava Upma in Tamil Or Dalia Upma in Hindi is a wholesome dish that is packed with nutrition form the broken wheat. The addition of ginger and the vegetables gives the dalia upma fresh taste that is simple and yet delicious.

name: Broken Wheat and Mixed Millet Upma Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  daliagodumairava, seeds, seeds, jeera, matar, gajjar, dhania
description: Broken Wheat and Mixed Millet Upma is a one pot meal in it's very own way. It's filling and keeps you energetic throughout the day. Broken wheat and millet are combined together in this upma to make a healthy, nutritious breakfast. Loaded with the goodness of veggies.

name: Nagli Rava Upma Recipe - Healthy Ragi Rava Upma Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  gajjar, frenchbeans, gobi, raikadugu, jeera, hing, moongphali, adjustable, pudina
description: This Nagli Rava Upma is a healthier alternative to the usual wheat semolina. Nagli Rava (Semolina) is available now in many grocery/health stores and takes very little time to cook. The nutritive benefits of Ragi/Nagli are well known since ancient times.

name: Paneer Raw Mango Curry Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, raw, sambaronions, haldi, dhania, raikadugu
description: Paneer Raw Mango Curry is a delicious sweet and spicy light paneer curry flavored with tangy raw mango. This curry perfectly blends with any lunch menu and compliments well with other side dishes. When raw mango in season this is a great recipe to try.

name: Barnyard Millet Bisi Bele Bath Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  sambaronions, capsicum, gajjar, matar, frenchbeans, aloo, splittoordal, haldi, raikadugu, jeera, dhania
description: The Barnyard Millet Bisi Bele Bath Recipe also known as the spicy mixed vegetable sambar rice is a traditional south indian dish made from cooked rice and lentils. But in this recipe, I have used barnyard millet to add to the fibre and nutrition of the dish.

name: Arachuvitta Sambar Recipe - Sambar With Fresh Ground Spices
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  splittoordal, sambaronions, radish, gajjar, haldi, dhania, bengalgramdal, split, fenugreekseeds, gingelly, raikadugu, hing, dhania
description: Arachuvitta Sambar Recipe is a traditional South Indian Sambar that is made from freshly roasted spices and coconut which adds a special touch to this authentic sambar recipe. The sambar tastes best with seasonal vegetables like Radish, Pumpkin, Drumstick and small baby onions are a must in this sambar to give its fresh flavors and taste.

name: मैंगलोर नुरगे गाशी रेसिपी - Mangalore Nurge Gashie Recipe
main_tag: mangalorean lunch vegetarian
description: मैंगलोर नुरगे गाशी एक तीखी ड्रमस्टिक करी है जो की कोस्टल फ्लेवर से भरपूर है. इसमें इमली के साथ साथ नारियल और दूसरे मसलो का प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इस ड्रमस्टिक ग्रेवी को पराठे या चावल के साथ परोस सकते है. यह खाने में तो स्वादिष्ट है ही, बनाने में भी बहुत आसान है. इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बनाए और इस स्वादिष्ट करी का आनंद ले.

name: मेंथे तम्ब्ली रेसिपी - Menthe Tambli Recipe
main_tag: karnataka dinner diabeticfriendly
description: यह रही आपके लिए एक स्वादिष्ट डिश, मेंथे तम्ब्ली जिसे कर्नाटक के घरो में बनाया जाता है. इसमें दही का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसे और भी सेहतमंद और स्वादिष्ट बनाता है. इसे बनाने में बहुत कम समय लगता है इसलिए आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए भी बना सकते है. यह डिश डायबेटिक फ्रेंडली भी है.

name: Ceylon Egg Parotta Recipe
main_tag: srilankan snack eggetarian  maida, dahiyogurt, haldi
description: Ceylon Egg Parotta Recipe is also one of the very famous street dishes originating from Sri Lanka. The dish is famous in many parts of India as well, especially Tamil Nadu. The only difference is that in Sri Lanka the Parotta is also stuffed with mutton kheema or even seafood along with egg and other vegetables.

name: Veechu Parotta Or Ceylon Parotta Recipe
main_tag: srilankan sidedish vegetarian  maida, dahiyogurt
description: Veechu Parotta Recipe is a very famous bread in Sri Lanka. The bread/parotta is mainly made from maida or all purpose flour but in this recipe we have used a combination of maid and whole wheat flour to make it healthier. It is kneaded to a very soft and sticky dough which is then rolled and pressed using your hand to form a thin dough that is then folded to create many air pockets.

name: Odia Style Chuin Aloo Besara Recipe-Potato & Drumsticks Fry In Mustard Paste
main_tag: oriya lunch vegetarian  aloo, raikadugu, jeera, haldi
description: If you have drumsticks at home, then the Chuin Aloo Besara - potato and drumsticks fry in a mustard paste is an easy and quick side dish with dal-rice combo.This dish goes very well with steamed rice. The pungent taste from the mustad sauce blends very with the potatoes and drumstick.

name: Tangy & Spicy Chunky Pineapple Chutney Recipe
main_tag: srilankan sidedish vegetarian  elaichi, dalchini, haldi
description: Tangy & Spicy Chunky Pineapple Chutney Recipe is a delicious chutney with minimal cooking and absolutely no grinding.

name: Maharashtrian Style Gajarachi Koshimbir Recipe -Carrot Salad
main_tag: maharashtrian sidedish vegetarian  gajjar, dhania, raikadugu, hing
description: Maharashtrian Style Gajarachi Koshimbir Recipe is essentially a Carrot Salad made marathi style. An interesting recipe made from carrot that is tossed in freshly grated coconut and tempered with mustard seeds. The carrot salad is one of the most common side dishes served along with the meals.

name: Tamil Nadu Style Karamani Murungakkai Kuzhambu Recipe-Black eyed Beans & Drumstick Curry
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  lobia, sambaronions, dalchini, laung, elaichi, dhania, saunf
description: Tamil Nadu Style Karamani Murungakkai Kuzhambu Recipe-Black eyed Beans and Drumstick Curry is recipe made without coconut as the base. The onions and fennel seeds are roasted well till it becomes golden brown and then ground into a smooth creamy paste which is then simmered with black eyed beans and drumstick.The black eyed beans is a rich source of vitamin A and dietary fibers.

name: Andhra Style Mukkala Pulusu Recipe-Mixed Vegetable Sambar
main_tag: andhra lunch vegetarian  gajjar, frenchbeans, parangikaipumpkin, lauki, haldi, extractthejuicein1cupwater, dhania, chopped, raikadugu, jeera, fenugreekleaves, hing
description: Mukkala Pulusu is a classic dish from Andhra Pradesh. It is a part of day to day meal, a good change from the regular sambar. It is made with mixed vegetables (Bottle gourd, pumpkin, drumsticks and other seasonal vegetables), tamarind pulp, jaggery and spices.

name: Karela Thepla Recipe - Bitter Gourd Indian Flat Bread
main_tag: indian lunch diabeticfriendly  besan, bittergourdpavakkai, caromseeds, jeera, haldi, salted
description: A quintessential Indian flat bread that belongs to Gujarati cuisine is made with wheat flour, gram flour and is flavoured with various additional ingredients like Fenugreek, Spinach, Beetroot, Bitter gourd etc. Theplas made with grated bitter gourd is ideal breakfast option for weight watchers and also is a diabetic friendly dish.

name: Malabar Style Dates Pickle Recipe
main_tag: malabar sidedish vegetarian  haldi, raikadugu, hing
description: Malabar Style Dates Pickle Recipe is a popular pickle recipe from the Malabar region of Kerala. Dates, are usually associated with desserts or eaten raw. But, here we have prepared a delightful pickle out of it. It is an instant pickle recipe, which gets cooked in 10 minutes. It is sweet, spicy and tangy bursting with flavours all at the same time. It pairs very well with the traditionally cooked Thalassery Biryani.

name: Carrot Lemon Rice Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  gajjar, raikadugu, split, haldi
description: Carrot Lemon Rice Recipe is a food with healthy ingredients and hence a key to good mood. Lemon Rice is a south Indian one pot meal which serves as a great anytime food. Carrot Lemon Rice Recipe is its healthier variant with carrots in it. Addition of carrots add the crunch and juice to the pilaf to redefine the yumminess.

name: Bharwa Karela Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian  bittergourdpavakkai, haldi, jeera, dhania
description: Bharwa Karela is a Punjabi side dish which is stuffed with spices and is cooked until it becomes soft. Stuffed with tangy achar and dry masalas, this makes a great accompaniment to Dal, Rice and Roti. The delicious spices takes away the bitterness from the bitter gourds and make it a mouth watering spicy dish.

name: Andhra Style Kakarakaya Vepudu Recipe - Bitter Gourd Stir Fry
main_tag: andhra sidedish diabeticfriendly  bittergourdpavakkai, dahiyogurt, haldi, raikadugu, jeera, drymangopowder, dhania
description: Andhra Style Kakarakaya Vepudu Recipe is a delicious preparation of the Bitter Gourd also known as Karela or Pavakkai. The addition of onion and garlic along with the south indian flavors of curry leaves, makes vegetables delectable. Serve the Andhra Style Kakarakaya Vepudu along with Steamed Rice topped with ghee and a Tomato Rasam to along with it.

name: Healthy Bharwa Karela Recipe - Stuffed Bitter Gourd
main_tag: indian sidedish diabeticfriendly  bittergourdpavakkai, maximum3tablespoons, drymangopowder, redorwhite, raw, tobelightlydryroastedandground, moongphali, dhania
description: Healthy Bharwa Karela is an Indian Masala Stuffed Bitter Gourd which is a combination of taste with health since it uses lesser oil than the conventional Bharwa Karela which is usually deep fried. This recipe is shallow fried with yummy stuffing inside. With no added jaggery, I must mention it is healthy for diet conscious and diabetic folks too.

name: Ambade Kaarle Lonche Recipe - Hog Plums & Bitter Gourd Pickle
main_tag: coastalkarnataka sidedish vegetarian  amtekai, bittergourdpavakkai, haldi, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, hing
description: Ambade Kaarle Lonche Recipe is a South Indian Style hog plums and bitter gourds pickle. This is a recipe from the Karnataka's Karwari GSB (Goud Saraswat Brahmin) cuisine. Karwari recipes use a lot of jaggery in their cooking like the Udupi cuisine. It is a very simple but extremely flavourful dish.

name: Karathe Nonche Recipe - Bitter Gourd Pickle
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  dhania, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, hing, bittergourdpavakkai, raikadugu
description: Karathe Nonche Recipe is a spicy, tangy, mildly sweet and pleasantly bitter Indian pickle made with bitter gourds and some aromatic Indian spices with some tamarind for the sour element.

name: Shukto Recipe - Bengali Mixed Vegetable in Mustard and Poppy Seed Gravy
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian  bittergourdpavakkai, gajjar, aloo, turaipeerkangai, raikadugu, haldi, tejpatta
description: The Shukto Recipe is delightful recipe of mixed vegetables that is cooked in a mustard and poppy seed masala, panch phoran and milk. This dish has a very strong taste of mustard and can be an acquired taste. One of the core vegetables that are added to this is the bitter gourd, along with raw banana, potatoes, carrot and drumstick. You can of course add your own choice of vegetables, and experiment with this dish.

name: Pavakka Pachadi Recipe - Bitter Gourd Pachadi
main_tag: kerala sidedish vegetarian  bittergourdpavakkai, dahiyogurt, haldi, raikadugu, raikadugu
description: Pavakka Pachadi which is also called as Bitter Gourd Pachadi is a very easy comforting side dish from Kerala cuisine. It's made with bitter gourd, coconut and curd as main ingredients. It tastes great with rice. The initial prep, sauteing and curd helps in reducing the bitterness to a great extent, making the pachadi really tasty.

name: Goan Style Frango Vera Recipe - Chicken Vera
main_tag: goan appetizer highproteinnonvegetarian  haldi, laung, dalchini
description: Goan Style Frango Vera Recipe is a dry roasted chicken with Recheado masala.

name: Chicken Jalfrezi Recipe - Chicken And Bell Peppers In Tomato Gravy
main_tag: northindian onepotdish highproteinnonvegetarian  capsicum, capsicum, gajjar, haldi, dhania, dhania, salted
description: Chicken Jalfrezi Recipe is a simple and quick to cook recipe where the Chicken pieces and vegetables are stir fried and tossed along with tomatoes and spices.

name: डिमर मलाई करी रेसिपी - Dimer Malai Curry Recipe
main_tag: bengali lunch eggetarian
description: डिमर मलाई करी एक बहुत ही प्रसिद्ध अंडे की करी है जिसे बंगाल में बनाया जाता है. इसमें नारियल के दूध का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इस करी को और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है. इस स्वाद से भरपूर करी को आप अपने घर की पार्टीज के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: कश्मीरी स्टाइल नदरू रेसिपी - Kashmiri Style Nadru Yakhni Recipe
main_tag: kashmiri lunch vegetarian  ल टसस ट म
description: कश्मीरी स्टाइल नदरू रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसे कश्मीर के हर घर में बनाया जाता है. इसमें लोटस स्टेम का प्रयोग किया जाता है जिसे हिंदी में कमल ककड़ी और कश्मीरी में नंदरु कहा जाता है. इस स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी को बनाए और हमे जरूर बताए की यह आपको कैसी लगी?

name: Tomato Upma Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  semolinarava, raikadugu, hing, haldi, dhania
description: Tomato Upma Recipe is a delicious upma made using tangy tomatoes, with some heat from the green chillies.  It is easy to make and is a very perfect breakfast option for the busy days.

name: Left Over Vadai Upma Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  hing, raikadugu, bengalgramdal, dhania
description: Vadai Upma is a delicious recipe made with leftover Medu Vadai. The Vadai is crumbled and cooked along with onions, green chillies, ginger similar to a regular upma. Adding the vadai adds great taste to the upma, with few crispy-crunchy and soft bites of the vadai.

name: Gujarati Gor Keri Recipe - Sweet And Spicy Raw Mango Pickle
main_tag: gujarati﻿ sidedish vegetarian  raw, haldi, dhania, raikadugu, raikakuria, fenugreekseeds, methikakuria, hing, gingelly
description: Gor Keri is a sweet mango pickle where raw mangoes are chopped and combined with sugar, jaggery and spices and then sundried. It goes well along with Theplas, Bhakris, Mathris, Khakras or just plain Roti.

name: Gujarati Wadi Pulao Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ lunch vegetarian  wadi, bengalgramdal, split, raikadugu, haldi, hing
description: The sun dried lentil dumplings are called Wadi in Gujarat. In size and shape they are quite dainty compared to their Punjabi counterparts the Mangodi. The widely used Wadi in Gujarat are the ones made of Chana Dal (white eyed bean dal) followed by green mung dal and yellow mung dal, supplementing the need of proteins in the predominantly vegetarian Gujarati cuisine.

name: Kesar Shrikhand Recipe - Greek Yogurt Pudding With Saffron
main_tag: gujarati﻿ dessert vegetarian  greekyogurt, uselowfatpreferably, elaichi
description: Shrikhand Recipe is a popular Indian Sweet Yogurt Pudding with Nuts and Spices that is made during festivals, weddings or engagements. When we lived overseas and came home to visit my in-laws in India, Shrikhand and Puri was one of the first meals we ate, making this a treat to look forward to when we came back home.

name: Raw Mango Dhokla Recipe Topped With Sweet Mango Chutney
main_tag: gujarati﻿ snack highproteinvegetarian  raw, raikadugu, jeera, saunf, onionnigellaseeds, fenugreekseeds, raikadugu, adjust, besan, haldi, raw
description: The Raw Mango Dhokla Recipe is packed with flavors from grated raw mango along with the green chillies and ginger. Once the dhokla is steamed, a delicious sweet and spicy raw mango chutney is added on the top to give it that extra punch in taste.

name: Bohri Khichda Recipe - Mutton Khichda Recipe
main_tag: gujarati﻿ maincourse nonvegeterian  daliagodumairava, bengalgramdal, split, splittoordal, split, jeera, pudina
description: Bohri Khichda Recipe is a deliciously smooth non vegetarian khichdi, made by combining, rice wheat and a variety of dals along with mutton.

name: Bitter Gourd Peel Puri Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  besan, bittergourdpavakkai, caromseeds, haldi, dhania
description: Bitter Gourd Peel Puri Recipe, is an innovative trial on a very famous Indian bread that is fried in deep oil. The bitter gourd peel is often thrown away and is not used in most of the dishes because of the strong bitterness from the vegetable. But very little it is known about its nutritional benefits to the skin.

name: कच्चे आम और ककड़ी का सलाद रेसिपी - Raw Mango Cucumber Salad Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: कच्चे आम और ककड़ी का सलाद रेसिपी एक बेहतरीन रेसिपी है जिसमे ताज़ी सब्ज़िओ का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें कच्चे आम के साथ ककड़ी का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसको और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है. स्वाद के लिए इसमें मूंगफली, हरा धनिया और पुदीने के भी प्रयोग किया जाता है. इस रेसिपी को बनाए और हमे जरूर बताए की यह आपको कैसी लगी!

name: Kerala Style Puttu Upma Recipe With Scrambled Eggs
main_tag: kerala snack eggetarian  jeera, raikadugu, haldi, split
description: Puttu Upma Recipe With Scrambled Eggs is a great way to use up leftover Rice Puttu. Puttu is a traditional breakfast dish popular in Kerala. The eggs add to the nutritional value to make it a wholesome breakfast.

name: Begun Bhaja Recipe (Bengali Style Spiced And Fried Aubergine Slices)
main_tag: bengali dinner vegetarian  bainganeggplant, haldi, drymangopowder
description: Begun Bhaja is a traditional Bengali style dish of delicately spiced slices of aubergine that are then fried to a crisp and usually served with a simple, homely meal. It is crunchy and spicy, making it a delicious party appetizers or side-dish for your party menu as well. This is one of the easiest and delectable appetizers recipe, which requires no time and very little effort. In keeping with Bengali culinary tradition, the slices of aubergine are usually fried in mustard oil which gives it a pungent hit of flavour, but you can use refined oil if that is what you are used to. This Begun bhaja makes an awesome side dish with for lunch on lazy weekends or a dinner to end a busy day.

name: Karnataka Style Avarekai Upma Recipe
main_tag: karnataka southindianbreakfast vegetarian  semolinarava, kopra, jeera, raikadugu, split, bengalgramdal, haldi
description: Karnataka Style Avarekai Upma Recipe is a popular breakfast dish in Karnataka. The main ingredient added to this recipe is the avarekalu beans to make it crunchy and taste to the whole dish. These beans are seasonal only during the month of December and January. The breakfast is very healthy for both kids and adults.

name: Puli Upma Recipe - Tamarind & Rice Rava Upma
main_tag: southindian snack glutenfree  hing, raikadugu
description: Puli Upma Recipe is a traditional South Indian Snack time recipe that can also be had for breakfast as well, like most other upma recipes.

name: Quick & Easy Idli Upma Recipe With Figaro Olive Oil
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast glutenfree  sambaronions, or1largeonion, haldi, raikadugu, split, dhania
description: Quick & Easy Idli Upma Recipe With Figaro Olive Oil is a great way to use up extra idlis. The idlis are crumbled and tossed in a delicious tadka and served as breakfast or even as an evening snack.

name: Togarikalu Akki Recipe - Karnataka Style Rice Rava Upma with Fresh Pigeon Peas
main_tag: karnataka southindianbreakfast vegetarian  pigeonpea, raikadugu, split, bengalgramdal, hing, splittoordal, jeera
description: Togarikalu Akki Recipe is a very popular recipe from the state of Karnataka. The upma is made with fresh toor dal and rice rava along with simple spices.

name: Rayalseema Style Borugula Upma Recipe
main_tag: andhra southindianbreakfast vegetarian  moongphali, haldi, dhania, pottukadalai, raikadugu, split, jeera
description: Rayalseema Style Borugula Upma Recipe is a simple breakfast dish that is popular in the region of rayalaseema which is a part of Andhra Pradesh.

name: Karela Masala Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian  bittergourdpavakkai, haldi, drymangopowder, dhania
description: The Karela Masala Sabzi is a delicious simple to cook recipe made from bitter gourd, that is one of the most nutritious vegetables.

name: Andhra Style Coconut Flavored Rice Upma Recipe
main_tag: andhra southindianbreakfast vegetarian  split, bengalgramdal, moongphali
description: Coconut Flavored Rice Upma Recipe is a tangy and spicy coconut flavored upma. This is one of the most Andhra style favorite recipe to all members of my family and friends. It tastes heavenly on a monsoon evening, when served with some raw onions, chutney and curd. The extra flavour of coconut oil along with fresh coconut adds more taste to the dish. Children love the roasted flavour of upma.

name: Foxtail Millet Vermicelli Upma Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  raikadugu, jeera, moongphali, haldi
description: Foxtail Millet Vermicelli Upma Recipe, is one such dish when you are  in a hurry to run to work and you would want to whip up something quick and healthy for your breakfast, then this would be the perfect recipe. This will also crave your morning hunger and also keep it healthy as well, as it is made from foxtail millet.

name: Uggani Recipe - Puffed Rice Upma
main_tag: southindian indianbreakfast vegetarian  pottukadalai, dhania, haldi, raikadugu, split, split, moongphali
description: Uggani is a variety in Upma made from Puffed rice. One can find it very common in North Karnataka and parts of Andhra Pradesh.  Easy to make and yummy to taste, enjoy them as a breakfast or snack or light dinner.

name: तीखी खट्टी पाइनएप्पल चटनी रेसिपी - Tangy & Spicy Chunky Pineapple Chutney Recipe
main_tag: srilankan sidedish vegetarian
description: तीखी खट्टी पाइनएप्पल चटनी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट चटनी है जिसे बनाने में बहुत कम समय लगता है. इसमें पाइनएप्पल को काट कर कढ़ी पत्ता, दालचीनी, इलाईची, रेड चिल्ली फलैक्स और पैपरिका पाउडर के साथ पकाया जाता है जो इस चटनी को तीखा स्वाद देती है.

name: तुरई बैंगन की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Turai Baingan Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: parsi lunch vegetarian
description: तुरई बैंगन की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट सब्ज़ी है जिसमे तुरई और बैंगन को रोज के मसलो के साथ पकाया जाता है. इसमें धंसक मसाला का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इस सब्ज़ी को और भी फ्लेवर देता है. इस सब्ज़ी को और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाने के लिए टमाटर और प्याज का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है.

name: Spicy Quinoa Upma Recipe
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  jeera, haldi, matar, dhania
description: Spicy Quinoa Upma Recipe is a delicious spicy dish which you can make for breakfast or a light dinner. This healthy recipe will cover your daily intake of fiber, protein, and satisfy your ‘something spicy and yummy’ craving. You can make this recipe in just 30 minutes and a delicious breakfast is served.

name: Hesarukaalu Upittu Recipe - Moong Dal Upma
main_tag: karnataka snack diabeticfriendly  split, adjust, hing, dhania, matar, raikadugu, split, bengalgramdal, haldi
description: Hesarukaalu Upittu Recipe is a Moong Dal Upma  which is a unique upma recipe made from soaked split moong dal.

name: Guilt-free Amaranth, Dates and Almond Ladoo Recipe
main_tag: indian snack highproteinvegetarian  rajgira, elaichi, badam, badam
description: Guilt-free Amaranth, Dates and Almond Ladoo Recipe is nothing like the traditional recipe. First, it has only 3 main ingredients: amaranth, dates and almonds. Second, it is soft and sticky thanks to the dates, which also naturally sweeten it, removing the need to add sugar completely.

name: Whole Wheat Sonth Ke Ladoo Recipe
main_tag: northindian snack vegetarian  sonth, naturalgum, kopra
description: Sweets can be indulgent and healthy at the same time. That is the best part of some Indian sweets and Whole Wheat Sonth Ke Ladoo falls under that category. Made from dry ginger powder (sonth), whole wheat vivatta, mastic gum(gond), desi ghee(clarified butter), jaggery, nuts and dried coconut, these ladoos are packed with flavours and nutrients.

name: Vegetable Rice Upma Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast glutenfree  gajjar, frenchbeans, matar, raikadugu, split, bengalgramdal, dhania
description: Vegetable Rice Upma is a quick healthy and light breakfast option. Upma is such a versatile dish that we can make upma from almost everything, rava, wheat, oats, ragi, millets, rice and even quinoa. Adding vegetables not only makes the dish tasty but healthy too. When one gets bored of the regular rava upma, rice upma makes an interesting addition to your breakfast menu.

name: Atukula Ladoo Recipe - Sweetened Poha Energy Balls
main_tag: indian snack vegetarian  flattenedrice
description: Atukula Laddu are the Sweetened Poha Energy Balls which is a healthy option for the Mithai lovers, made using poha (Flattened rice), ghee and jaggery. Atukula Laddu is an easy-to-make laddoo and is sure to delight your taste buds.

name: Narkel Naru Ladoo Recipe With Grated Coconut
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  optional aspertaste, elaichi
description: Narkel Naru - Ladoo Recipe With Grated Coconut is a Bengali festive recipe which is usually prepared during Durga pooja and in countryside of India during special occasions like festivals. Traditionally prepared with reduced milk, here I have used sweetened condensed milk instead of taking hours to reduce milk manually.

name: Pumpkin Coconut Ladoo Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, elaichi
description: Pumpkin Coconut Ladoo Recipe is a power packed sweet energy balls made using yellow pumpkin and desiccated coconut. Yellow pumpkin has higher amounts of antioxidants and vitamins to keep the heart healthy. It is a great source of fibre, making it beneficial for weight watchers.

name: Maharashtrian Policha Ladoo Recipe  - Left Over Roti Ladoo
main_tag: maharashtrian dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Maharashtrian Policha Ladoo  which is a delicious Ladoo made from Leftover Rotis. It is a must try recipe when you have some left over rotis at your kitchen. It is the best way to make something delicious out of old and left overs.

name: Badam Pottukadalai Ladoo Recipe - Almond Chana Dal Ladoo
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  pottukadalai, elaichi, badampowder
description: Badam Pottukadalai Ladoo Recipe is a super healthy, high protein recipe for sweetened balls that can be packed for the kids snack boxes or even had as a quick bite on the go when they are having a sugar craving or feeling low on energy.

name: Sweet Pretzels Recipe - Bhonge Ladoo
main_tag: maharashtrian snack vegetarian  tilseeds
description: Sweet Pretzels Recipe which is also called as Bhonge Ladoo, is a very unique and traditional sweet from Buldhana District in Maharashtra. This recipe is almost forgotten in the native villages too. It is the traditional and antique recipe that has been done in pretzel shapes.

name: Coconut Ladoo Stuffed With Pistachios Recipe
main_tag: indian snack vegetarian
description: Coconut Ladoo Stuffed With Pistachios is a quick and easy recipe for preparing coconut ladoos which are a universal favourite during the festive season. The basic recipe for coconut ladoos used here is so simple that it can be prepared in very less time with few ingredients.

name: Red Poha And Flax Seeds Ladoo Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  flattenedredrice, demerarasugar, elaichi
description: Red Poha And Flax Seeds Ladoo is a highly healthy and nutritious ladoo that you can make and store in an air tight container. Red Poha is very good for diabetics and packed with Vitamin A, C and folic acid. Flax seeds has lots of health benefits and very good for hair and skin.

name: नवाबी कोफ्ता करी रेसिपी - Nawabi Kofta Curry Recipe
main_tag: kashmiri dinner vegetarian  ग र न शक ल ए
description: नवाबी कोफ्ता करी रेसिपी एक रिच और सेहतमंद रेसिपी है जिसमे आलू को टमाटर की ग्रेवी में पकाया जाता है. इसमें ड्राई फ्रूट्स का भी प्रयोग होता है जो इसके स्वाद को बढ़ाता है. इस सब्ज़ी को आप अपने घर की पार्टीज में परोसे। हमे विश्वास है की आपके मेहमानो को यह सब्ज़ी जरूर पसंद आएगी।

name: Kashmiri Style Nadru Ke Kabab Recipe-Lotus Stem in Spicy Gravy
main_tag: kashmiri lunch vegetarian  aloo, dhania, caromseeds, sattukaatta, saunf, capsicum
description: Nadru Ke Kabab is a curry based kebab made from lotus stems and served in a spicy gravy base. Lotus stems are called nadru in Kashmiri language. Lotus stems are rich in iron, copper, magnesium and other vital enzymes required for a better functioning of our body.

name: Kashmiri Style Rajma Recipe
main_tag: kashmiri lunch vegetarian  largekidneybeans, dahiyogurt, tejpatta, hing, jeera, dhania, dhania, badielaichi, elaichi, laung, dalchini
description: Kashmiri Rajma is a spicy and delicious curry based recipe that can be served for lunch as well as dinner. It is a perfect recipe to cook, if you are planning a house party at your home or inviting some guests for dinner.

name: Kashmiri Rogan Josh Recipe - Mutton in Red Curry
main_tag: kashmiri dinner nonvegeterian  dahiyogurt, badielaichi, elaichi, laung, dalchini, tejpatta, hing, alkanet, infuseitinheatedoil, saunf, dalchini, elaichi
description: Kashmiri Rogan Josh is a delicious flavourful Lamb curry that comes from Persian origin. It is the signature dish of Kashmir, where the name is derived from Persian words in which Rogan meals oil and Josh mean Intense heat. Kashmiri Rogan Josh is an integral part of the lavish spread Waawan. No celebrations are complete without this signature dish, typically made with lamb but now days even mutton is used to make this authentic and aromatic Rogan Josh. Among few exotic ingredients used in the recipe, Alkanet root, better known as Ratan Jot is the most important one. It is traditionally used to add colour to Indian food.

name: Kashmiri Phool Rogan Josh Recipe - Cauliflower in Red Curry
main_tag: kashmiri dinner vegetarian  gobi, greekyogurt, saunf, elaichi, badielaichi, laung, dalchini, laung, elaichi, badielaichi, dalchini, saunf, hing, alkanet
description: Kashmiri Phool Rogan Josh Recipe is a vegetarian twist to the Rogan Josh Recipe which is a signature dish of Kashmir, having its roots in Persia. In Persian language, Rogan means clarified butter and Josh means intensity, which translates to a dish cooked in oil at high intensity of heat. The luscious curry was brought to Kashmir by Mughals who often visited Kashmir for its cool climate. The dish has flawless red color due to the use of Kashmiri chillies. In addition, saffron/ rattan jot is also added to the curry for the crimson red color.

name: Kashmiri Style Tchat Goji Recipe (Turnip & Dry Red Chillies)
main_tag: kashmiri lunch vegetarian  hing
description: Tchat Goji is a Kashmiri delicacy prepared using turnips. Turnips are usually an underrated vegetable but this is an uncomplicated delicious recipe. Turnips are cooked with spices and finally mashed with the ladle. It can be prepared in a few minutes and tastes delicious with roti or rice.

name: Kashmiri Style Dum Monji Recipe-Knol Khol in Yogurt
main_tag: kashmiri lunch vegetarian  ganthgobikadam, haldi, hing, laung, badielaichi, jeera, dahiyogurt
description: Dum Monji is a spicy flavorful veg curry that comes from Kashmiri Cuisine. Monji here means knol khol also commonly known as ganth gobhi or kadam which is cut into cubes and cooked with it's greens along with some yogurt. The recipe though quick, requires skillful hands to play with Kashmiri spices which particularly are fennel powder, asafoetida, sonth or ginger powder etc. Kashmiri food is rich in texture and aroma as there is a wide usage of mustard oil which itself provides a beautiful aroma and Kashmiri red chili powder also known as deghi mirch gives a rich color. Kashmiri Dum Monji is typically served with rice.

name: Kashmiri Style Al Rogan Josh Recipe- Pumpkin In Red Curry
main_tag: kashmiri lunch vegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, dahiyogurt, elaichi, badielaichi, laung, dalchini, tejpatta, hing, alkanet
description: Al Rogan Josh is a delicious flavourful pumpkin curry that comes from Kashmir origin. It is the veg version of the signature dish of Kashmir, where the name is derived from Persian words in which Rogan means oil and Josh mean Intense heat. Kashmiri Al Rogan Josh is an integral part of the lavish spread in Kashmiri Pandit homes.

name: Til Ke Ladoo Recipe - Sesame Ladoo Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  tilseeds, elaichi
description: Til Ke Ladoo is a variety in ladoo that is enjoyed by many. It is a favorite in Maharashtra and is served during Sankranthi festival which falls in the winter. Til is a healthy option in winter and warms your body by giving energy.

name: Churma Ladoo Recipe With Badam & Flaxseed - High Protein Snack
main_tag: rajasthani dessert highproteinvegetarian  semolinarava, badam, kopra
description: Churma Ladoo Recipe is a healthy Rajasthani sweet that is often made at home. It has all essential ingredients that make the laddoo healthy and tasty.

name: Badam And Besan Ladoo Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  besan, semolinarava, badam, elaichi
description: Ladoo is a very popular Indian dessert that is made with puré ghee on special occasions.The mention of ladoo can be found in ancient Indian scriptures like Rigveda. This Badam & Besan Ladoo recipe is one such recipe that has goodness of almonds also along with protein rich besan flour.

name: Madras Lamb Curry Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch nonvegeterian  dhania, raikadugu, jeera, saunf, laung, dalchini, raikadugu, dahiyogurt, haldi
description: Madras Lamb Curry Recipe is a luscious rich curry that you will fall in love with the blend of spices that is used to make the gravy. The spices used are typically used in south India region like the dried red chillies, poppy seeds, jeera, cumin seeds, cloves, cinnamon, mustard seeds and coriander seeds. The lamb curry is cooked in mustard oil which imparts a strong and pungent flavour to the Lamb chops. The curry has a light hint of tanginess from the use of tamarind paste which is well balanced with the spices used to create a comforting dish.

name: Tulsi And Betel Leaves Rasam Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  holybasil, paan, caromseeds, jeera, hing, haldi, dhania, raikadugu
description: Tulsi And Betel Leaves Rasam Recipe is a lovely rasam recipe, different from the usual. Tulsi, Betel leaves, Pepper, Carom seeds & Jeera are combined and cooked with rasam powder. The rasam is good for cold and cough and can be consumed as a soup also. The rasam generates body heat hence it must be consumed only during cold/rainy or winter time. The rasam is also spicy as the taste of betel leaves, tulsi, carom seeds & pepper are naturally spicy. This is ideal for post natal diet also.

name: Tomato Jeera & Paruppu Rasam Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  jeera, splittoordal, jeera, hing, dhania
description: Tomato Jeera & Paruppu Rasam Recipe is a South Indian soup prepared with tamarind juice or tomato along with other spices. It is typically flavored with cumin and also tempered with cumin seeds. The color of the rasam depends on the ingredients used. If you use tamarind, the color will be brown whereas tomatoes give a nice deep red color to the rasam.

name: Kashmiri Style Shami Mutsch Recipe - Minced Lamb Cutlets In Yogurt Gravy
main_tag: kashmiri sidedish nonvegeterian  tejpatta, haldi, dahiyogurt, dhania, badielaichi
description: Kashmiri Shami Mutsch Recipe is the Minced Lamb Cutlets In Yogurt. Fennel seeds and ginger powder is used as main flavouring agents for the Mutsch. Kashmiri cuisine also uses mustard oil commonly in many recipes. In this recipe, mustard oil is used while marinating the lamb and also while cooking the kebabs but you can use ghee instead, as well. Mince the meat either in a mixer or ammikallu/grinding stone. Shaping the minced meat is very important in this recipe and can be mastered with skill. Once the gravy is prepared, the kebab's or Mutsch is directly gets cooked in the gravy for about an hour.

name: Kashmiri Style Mutton Gogji Syun Recipe - Mutton & Turnip
main_tag: kashmiri lunch nonvegeterian  saunf, hing, haldi
description: Kashmiri Mutton Gogji Syun Recipe is a traditional recipe that is a favorite dish among the people living there. The dish is so comforting and is made from mutton pieces that is cooked along with turnips. The dish is perfect to be had during the winter season with steaming hot rice and hot kulchas. The dish is unique and a wonderful culinary marriage between the mutton pieces and Turnips. As turnips soak up the gravy from the mutton it will develop more flavor as well. The meat will also be cooked tender and soak up enough flavor to create a wonderful dish.

name: Kashmiri Style Gushtaba Recipe - Mutton Kofta in Curd
main_tag: kashmiri lunch nonvegeterian  elaichi, dahiyogurt, tejpatta, dalchini, laung, saunf, jeera, haldi
description: Kashmiri Style Gushtaba Recipe is a traditional recipe that has authentic flavors of rich Kashmir cuisine. The cuisine uses spices like fennel seeds, ginger powder, dry red chillies and curd in most of their gravies and even rice preparation. Gushtaba is a curry made with pound mutton pieces that is mixed along with cardamom pods and ginger. The curry is then made from curd and milk flavored with fennel seeds, cloves, bay leaf and cardamom and cinnamon stick.

name: Kaju Badam Ladoo Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  badam, elaichi
description: Kaju Badam Ladoo is a rich and indulgent preparation of sweet cashew nuts and almond balls perfect for the season of festivity coming up. Using a collection of nuts that are great brain food, they’re also a high-energy snack. It can be made ahead for any Indian festival, and will make a perfect snack to serve to guests or to hand out when visiting relatives.

name: Churma Ladoo Recipe - Atta/Whole Wheat Ladoo
main_tag: rajasthani snack vegetarian  elaichi
description: Churma Ladoo is one of the most wholesome and delicious ladoos you could make at home, and what better way than to make it for festival of Ganesh Chaturthi. A very traditional ladva or ladoo, this Rajasthani speciality is made for Lord Ganesha on this festive day.

name: Flax Seed Ladoo Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  pottukadalai, elaichi, flaxmeal, freshlyground, badampowder
description: Flax Seed Ladoo Recipe is a super healthy, high protein recipe of sweetened energy balls that can be packed for your kids snack boxes or even had as a quick bite on the go when they are having a sugar craving or feeling low on energy.

name: Besan Ladoo Recipe - Chana Dal Ladoo
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  bengalgramdal, elaichi
description: Besan Ladoo Recipe is made with gram flour. It is an all time favorite festival sweet and can also be made from freshly roasted channa dal. The typical aroma and consistency of the besan is achieved by gently roasting it in fresh homemade ghee which gives it the ladoo a special flavor and richness.

name: Moong Dal Ladoo Recipe
main_tag: southindian dessert vegetarian  split, elaichi, badam
description: Moong Dal Ladoo is such a simple make ahead dessert that needs just three ingredients to make in less than 10 minutes. Moong Dal Ladoo is a nice creation to energize your day.

name: Pineapple Ladoo Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Festivals are round the corner. Are you guys looking for a quick and delicious dessert Open-mouthed smile!! Here is an easy and flavorful pineapple ladoo is ready under 10 minutes. I made this quick ladoo with pineapple puree, milk powder and desiccated coconut.

name: Oats, Dates And Dry Fruits Ladoo Recipe
main_tag: indian snack vegetarian  oatmeal, badam, optional, elaichi
description: Oats, Dates And Dry Fruits Ladoo Recipe is easy Ladoo recipe made with goodness of dry fruits, oats and dates. Prepare this delicious ladoo recipe and stuff in the much needed nutrients from the dry fruits. This is a great option for kids who love more desserts than main course.

name: Panjiri Ladoo Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  jeera, caromseeds, dhania, saunf
description: Panjiri Ladoo Recipe is a traditional ladoo recipe that is made during the Janmashtami for prashad. This is prepared with dry ginger, black peppercorns, sugar and more. This makes it spiced up but yet sweet and has a great taste to have these during the festival.

name: Wheat Ladoo With Jaggery Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Jaggery is the best substitute for sugar, especially if you are on diet and craving for something sweet. Wheat Ladoo using Jaggery is one such recipe, where sugar is substituted with jaggery syrup. These ladoos are very easy to make and you can make them for festivals or any other special ocassion.

name: Amrood Raita Recipe - Guava Raita
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, raikadugu, split, hing
description: Guava Raita Recipe is a wonderful way to add ripened guava into your curd to create a delicious raita. The ripened guava goes really well with the creamy curd and tempered spices like mustard seeds, dry red chillies and curry leaves is poured on top and served. This raita pairs it up for a good hot stuffed parathas as your morning breakfast or it can also be had along with a spicy rice.

name: Dal Tadka Recipe Flavored with Lemon and Coriander
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  split, salted, jeera, haldi, tejpatta, dhania
description: Dal Tadka Recipe is a simple to cook recipe that is packed with flavors from lemon and coriander. This recipe of dal tadka is one of my oldest recipes and was almost lost in my recipe pile. It so happened that my brother often makes this recipe and I would have to dig into my pile to find the one I sent him, as he would always want it the way I had first shared it with him. So this of dal tadka recipe is just for keepsake and old times, on how simple cooking can get with just a few spices - just like how mom would make it.

name: गाजर दही चावल रेसिपी - Curd Rice With Carrots Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: दक्षिण भारत के हर घर में दही चावल बनाया जाता है. गर्मियों के दिनों में दही चावल एक प्रयाप्त डिश है लेकिन यहाँ हमने दही चावल का ट्विस्ट दिया है गाजर जोड़कर। यह एक आसान रेसिपी है जिसे बनाने में बहुत काम सामग्री और समय का प्रयोग होता है. यह डिश आपके पेट के लिए भी अच्छी मानी जाती है.

name: हैदराबादी बिरयानी रेसिपी - Hyderabadi Biryani Recipe
main_tag: hyderabadi lunch nonvegeterian
description: हैदराबादी बिरयानी रेसिपी पारम्परिक रेसिपी है जो हैदराबाद में बहुत प्रसिद्ध है. आप इसमें चिकन या मटन दोनों का प्रयोग कर सकते है. इस बिरयानी को सप्ताहंत के खाने के लिए बनाए या अपने हाउस पार्टीज के लिए बनाए। स्वाद और फ्लेवर से भरपूर, यह रेसिपी बनाने में आसान है और आप इसे अपने पसंद के सालन या रायते के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: नदरू के कबाब रेसिपी - Nadru Ke Kabab Recipe
main_tag: kashmiri lunch vegetarian  हर,
description: नदरू के कबाब रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट कबाब रेसिपी है जिसमे लोटस स्टेम या कमल ककड़ी का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसको कश्मीरी में नदरू कहा जाता है. यह खाने में तो स्वादिष्ट होता ही है, सेहत के लिए भी बहुत अच्छा माना जाता है.

name: माविनाकई चटनी रेसिपी - Mavinakayi Chutney Recipe
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian
description: माविनाकई चटनी रेसिपी दक्षिण कनारा की प्रसिद्ध चटनी है जिसमे कच्चे आम का प्रयोग किया जाता है. यह बनाने में बहुत आसान है और इस सीजन के लिए पर्याप्त भी. आप इसे अपने खाने के साथ परोस सकते है या फिर नाश्ते में डोसे या इडली के साथ.

name: वाटरमेलन और पम्पकिन सीड्स पौड़ी रेसिपी - Watermelon And Pumpkin Seeds Podi Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish highproteinvegetarian  व टरम लनस ड स, पम पक नस ड स
description: वाटरमेलन और पम्पकिन सीड्स पौड़ी रेसिपी बहुत ही सेहतमंद पौड़ी है जो की बहुत ही ताज़ा स्वाद देती है. क्यूंकि यह सेहतमंद है, आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने में मिला सकते है. इस पौड़ी को बनाए और हमे विश्वास है की आपको यह जरूर पसंद आएगी।

name: Dhania Wale Aloo Recipe - Coriander Potato Dry
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  jeera, tilseeds, dhania
description: Navratri is one of the holiest festivals celebrated in India where the goddess Durga is worshiped in its various forms for nine days. Many people from the northern part of India fast on these nine days, and follow a restricted diet with few chosen ingredients without the use of onion and garlic in it.

name: Chotti Aloor Dum Recipe - Baby Potatoes In Tomato Gravy
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  jeera, dhania, haldi, laung, elaichi, dalchini
description: Chotti Aloor Dum is a spicy gravy prepared with small baby potatoes and usually served with luchis or puris. Potatoes are universal favourite and any dish prepared with them is a sure hit. Baby potatoes are boiled and cooked with spices in a tomato base. Prepare this delicious dish once and you will prepare it often for its flavour and taste.

name: Lauki Burfi With Paneer Recipe - Bottle Gourd Fudge With Cottage Cheese
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  lauki, elaichi, badam, homemadecottagecheese
description: Lauki Burfi With Paneer Recipe is an Indian sweet recipe which has the goodness of nutritious bottle gourd and homemade cottage cheese/ paneer (Chenna). Bottle gourd has 90% water in it. Bottle gourd is recommended by Ayurveda for better digestion.

name: No Onion No Garlic Lauki Paneer Kofta Curry Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner highproteinvegetarian  lauki, homemadecottagecheese, haldi, amaranthflour, tejpatta, dalchini, elaichi, haldi, dhania, dahiyogurt, dhania
description: No Onion No Garlic Lauki Paneer Kofta Curry Recipe is a flavoured tomato based curry. The koftas are made by combining Lauki/bottle gourd and paneer with Indian spice and just pan fried to give a healthy touch to the dish. The koftas are then soaked onto the curry.

name: कर्नाटका स्टाइल हुग्गी रेसिपी - Karnataka Style Huggi Recipe
main_tag: karnataka lunch vegetarian
description: कर्नाटका स्टाइल हुग्गी रेसिपी एक पारम्परिक रेसिपी है जिसे कर्नाटक में बनाया जाता है. श्रीक्रिष्ण का त्यौहारजिसे उडुपी में बनाया जाता है, तब यह डिश प्रसाद के रूप में बाटी जाती है. इसमें इमली का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इस डिश को हल्का सा खट्टा स्वाद देता है.

name: हैदराबाद स्टाइल कुस्का रेसिपी - Hyderabad Style Kuska Recipe
main_tag: hyderabadi lunch vegetarian
description: हैदराबाद स्टाइल कुस्का रेसिपी एक सरल चावल की रेसिपी है जिसे बिरयानी बनाने के लिए प्रयोग किया जाता है. इस रेसिपी को बिरयानी राइस के नाम से भी जाना जाता है. इसमें प्याज और मसाले डाले जाते है जिससे इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ जाता है.

name: वेजीटेरियन काबुली पुलाव रेसिपी - Vegetarian Kabuli Pulao Recipe
main_tag: indian maincourse highproteinvegetarian
description: वेजीटेरियन काबुली पुलाव रेसिपी अफगानिस्तान के काबुल क्षेत्र से है. इसमें हमने मीट की जगह काबुली चने का प्रयोग किया है जिसमे प्रोटीन की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है. इसमें दालचीनी और गरम मसाले का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इस पुलाव को और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है.

name: Doodhibhoplyacha Bharit Recipe - Maharashtrian Style Lauki Bharta
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian  lauki, dahiyogurt, raikadugu, jeera, hing, dhania, ormintleaves
description: Doodhibhoplyacha Bharit Recipe is a healthy side dish made by mashing cooked Bottle gourd. This recipe is a typical Maharashtrian version of Bharta and is quiet different than the North Indian Lauki Bharta.

name: Lauki Ki Kheer Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  lauki, elaichi, badam
description: Dudhi or Lauki, also known as Bottle Gourd is an extremely healthy vegetable loaded with vitamins and minerals, such as, calcium, magnesium, phosphorus, Vitamin A, C etc. Though being such a healthy and tasty vegetable, kids run away at the sight of lauki. So this Lauki Ki Kheer is an easy and effective way of making your child eat lauki and benefit from all its nutrition.

name: Lauki Paratha Recipe - Bottle Gourd Flatbread
main_tag: northindian indianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  lauki, caromseeds
description: Lauki Paratha is an interesting way to cook lauki or bottle gourd. Lauki is usually not preferred by many, but this recipe will change the way its looked.
