It is mildly spiced with indian spices making it further more delicious. These parathas are prepared using whole wheat flour, however you can even replace it with kuttu ka atta or buckwheat flour to make dough during the Navratri fasts.

name: Lauki Thepla Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast vegetarian  besan, lauki, dhania, haldi, greekyogurt
description: Lauki Thepla or Doodhi Thepla is a healthy and delicious flat bread which can be packed in kids' tiffin boxes or had for breakfast or dinner. These can also be made and carried while travelling. I have added gram flour in this recipe, you may not add it and add only wheat flour. Remember not to add water as bottle gourd contains lots of water itself.

name: Sukhi Dahi Wali Lauki Recipe - Yogurt Based Bottle Gourd Sabzi
main_tag: northindian lunch diabeticfriendly  lauki, jeera, raikadugu, dahiyogurt, haldi, dhania
description: Sukhi Dahi Wali Lauki is a spicy combination of lauki/bottle gourd and yogurt. Make this delicious Sukhi Dahi Wali Lauki recipe during weekdays along with dal fry recipe and roti/phulka for a light lunch.

name: Karnataka Style Sabbasige Rasam Recipe - Dill leave & Toor Dal Rasam
main_tag: karnataka lunch vegetarian  splittoordal, dalchini, dhania, raikadugu
description: Karnataka Style Sabbasige Rasam Recipe  is essentially Dill leave & Toor Dal Rasam which is a close variation to the Karnataka Style bassaru that is made in most of the households. It is a great idea to use dill leaves in a rasam. As dill leaves are not just flavorful herb it is also rich in Iron content which will be great to include in your diet.

name: Konkani Style Kalwanche Tonak Recipe - Oyster Curry
main_tag: konkan dinner nonvegeterian  usesmallonesbutincaseyougetbigones cutthemintohalves, usedrycoconutifyoudon thaveaccesstofresh, dhania, laung, saunf, haldi
description: Oysters are super rich in zinc, which is required for strengthening the immune system of your body. Other minerals and vitamins like calcium, iron and magnesium are also present in this shellfish. In konkani, we call oysters as kalwa and they just taste amazing in any recipe. Kalwanche Tonak is a very simple and is prepared using coconut for gravy with added spices and is my mom's specialty.

name: Lauki Aloo Sabzi Recipe - Bottle Gourd Potato Vegetable Curry
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  aloo, lauki, haldi, dhania, onionnigellaseeds
description: Lauki Aloo Sabzi Recipe is a simple easy to cook one pot dish that you can make in a pressure cooker. The combination of potatoes along with the bottle gourd, makes it a filling and complete dish. This subzi is delicately spiced and can be served for lunch or even a quick weeknight dinner.

name: Lauki Bharta Recipe - Spiced & Mashed Bottled Gourd Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner diabeticfriendly  lauki, jeera, haldi, dhania
description: Lauki Bharta is a nice twist to the usually not so liked bottle gourd. Lauki (Bottle gourd) has good amount of water content in it and is healthy vegetable which should be consumed regularly.

name: Roasted Bell Pepper Rasam Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  splittoordal, saunf, capsicum, raikadugu, hing
description: Roasted Bell Pepper Rasam Recipe is a twist to the normal traditional flavours of rasam made with a blend of tamarind extract, dal and tomatoes and of course bell peppers.

name: हुनासे गोज्जु रेसिपी - Hunase Gojju Recipe
main_tag: karnataka lunch vegetarian
description: हुनासे गोज्जु रेसिपी, इमली की करी है जिसे दक्षिण भारत में बनाया जाता है. इसमें मिर्च का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इससे खट्टे के साथ तीखे का स्वाद देती है. इस ग्रेवी को आप रोटी या चावल किसी के साथ भी खा सकते है.

name: Pudina Rasam Recipe - Mint Leaves Rasam
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  pudina, sambaronions, jeera, raikadugu, haldi, hing
description: Pudina rasam or Mint leaves rasam is a South Indian style rasam that goes well with rice and appalam. This rasam is healthy, refreshing, aromatic and has strong flavors of mint leaves. Pudina rasam soothes sore throat and relieves cold.

name: हरे प्याज और आलू की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Spring Onion Potato Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: हरे प्याज और आलू की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट और सेहतमंद रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. रोज के खाने के साथ आप इसे अपने या अपने बच्चो के लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है. इस सब्ज़ी में हरे प्याज और आलू को रोज के मसलो के साथ पकाया जाता है.

name: Elaneer Rasam Recipe - Tender Coconut Rasam
main_tag: southkarnataka lunch vegetarian  hing, haldi, dhania, raikadugu, jeera, pudina
description: Elaneer Rasam Recipe is a refreshing rasam recipe made using tender coconut water as well as the tender coconut cream

name: Konkani Style Doddak Recipe-Lentil Pancakes
main_tag: konkan southindianbreakfast vegetarian  split, semolinarava
description: Doddak Recipe is a Konkani delicacy. It is very similar to a rava uttapam, however doesn't require any fermentation. If you are in a hurry to prepare something different yet yummy for breakfast try this Doddak Recipe. It is a little spicy with the addition of ginger and green chillies.

name: Wheat Grass Rasam Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  haldi, raikadugu, jeera, dhania, hing
description: Wheat Grass Rasam Recipe is made by combining the juice of wheat grass along with tamarind and cooked with tomatoes, rasam powder and finally tempered with spices gives this healthy wheatgrass rasam.

name: Konkani Style Patholi/Kadabu Recipe-Sweet Dumpling Recipe
main_tag: konkan dessert vegetarian  flattenedrice, elaichi
description: Konkani Style Patholi/Kadubu Recipe-Sweet Dumpling is such a heavenly dish prepared with Rice, coconut and jaggery. The dumplings are favorite among the people in the South Canara region. It is generally prepared by using Turmeric leaves, then the outside rice layer is smeared over the leaves and the stuffing of jaggery and coconut is placed inside and folded. The entire leaf is sealed and steamed.

name: काबुली चना वेगन करीड राइस रेसिपी - Vegan Curried Rice With Chickpeas Recipe
main_tag: asian lunch vegetarian
description: काबुली चना वेगन करीड राइस रेसिपी वन पॉट मील रेसिपी है जिसे बहुत कम समय में बनाया जा सकता है. यह रेसिपी बनाने में बहुत सरल है और आप इसे अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है. इसमें काबुली चने का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इस डिश को और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है.

name: Kandathippili Rasam Recipe - Long Pepper Rasam
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  dhania, hing, raikadugu, jeera
description: Kandathippili Rasam is a great way of using this medical healing Long pepper into our diet. The flavour is little stronger than the normal black pepper, hence use it in moderation.

name: धनिया इमली मिलेट राइस रेसिपी - Coriander Tamarind Millet Rice Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: इमली राइस को अक्सर दक्षिण भारतीय घरो में बनाया जाता है. इधर हमने धनिया इमली मिलेट राइस रेसिपी को थोड़ा ट्विस्ट दिया है और इसमें मिलेट और धनिये का भी प्रयोग किया है. यह डायबिटिक लोगो के लिए भी अच्छा माना जाता है. आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए या फिर लंच बॉक्स के लिए बना सकते है.

name: Kongunadu Kathirikai Rasam Recipe - Spicy & Tangy Eggplant Rasam
main_tag: southindian dinner vegetarian  bainganeggplant, haldi, dhania, splittoordal, jeera, adjustaccordingtotheheatofthechilli, dhania, raikadugu, hing
description: The Kongunadu Kathirikai Rasam is made from 'pinju kathirikkai' or baby brinjals which is flavoured with coriander seeds and fresh coriander leaves. Farm fresh brinjals bring out the maximum taste into this rasam.

name: Veppam Poo Rasam Recipe (Neem flower Rasam)
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  hing, raikadugu
description: Veppam Poo Rasam (Neem flower Rasam) is a delicious bitter rasam which is mainly prepared for Tamil New Year. This Tamilian recipe has innumerable medicinal properties and is filled with antifungal and antibacterial properties. The main significance of making this dish in Tamil is to start a new year with body cleansing. This rasam is not similar to normal South Indian rasams as it is slightly bitter in taste because of its ingredients.

name: Restaurant Style Chicken 65 Recipe
main_tag: southindian appetizer nonvegeterian  haldi, besan, dahiyogurt
description: Restaurant Style Chicken 65 Recipe is a favourite in most of the restaurants. It is a dish that is originating from Chennai from a restaurant called “Buhari Hotel Restaurant”. It is said that the name Chicken 65 comes from the order number of the dish that was present in the menu card.

name: आंध्रा स्टाइल करिवेपकु पचड़ी रेसिपी - Andhra Style Karivepaku Pachadi Recipe
main_tag: andhra southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly
description: आंध्रा स्टाइल करिवेपकु पचड़ी रेसिपी एक दक्षिण भारतीय चटनी है जिसमे कढ़ी पत्ते का इस्तेमाल किया जाता है. कढ़ी पत्ते को अक्सर तड़के के लिए प्रयोग किया जाता है लेकिन यहाँ हम इससे चटनी बनाएंगे। यह खाने में तो स्वादिष्ट है ही, सेहत के लिए भी अच्छा मन जाता है.

name: माँगा गोज्जू रेसिपी - Manga Gojju Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian
description: माँगा गोज्जू रेसिपी एक तीखी, मीठी और खट्टी आम की चटनी है जिसे आप गर्मियों में अपने खाने के साथ परोस सकते है. यह दक्षिण भारत के हर घर में बनाई जाती है क्यूंकि गर्मियों में कच्चे आम बहुत मिलते है.

name: पछा मांगा पचड़ी रेसिपी - Tamil Nadu Raw Mango Pachadi Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish vegetarian
description: पछा मांगा पचड़ी रेसिपी एक खट्टी मीठी रेसिपी है जिसमे कच्चे आम के साथ गुड़ और सांबर मसाला का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इस रेसिपी को तमिल न्यू इयर पर भी बनाया जाता है.

name: मखाना की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Makhana Ki Sabzi (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian
description: मखाना की सब्ज़ी को बनाने के लिए फूल मखाने का प्रयोग किआ जाता है. फूल मखाने के बहुत से व्यंजन बनाए जाते है जिसमे दोनों तीखे और मिठे व्यंजन होते है. यह सब्ज़ी थोड़ी क्रीमी है और आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है. मखाने को व्रत के दिनों में भी बहुत घर में बनाया जाता है.

name: Black Cherry Glazed Thandai Burfi Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  lauki, mawa, badam, elaichi, optional
description: Black Cherry Glazed Thandai Burfi is the usual burfi with a twist of thandai masala. To give it a different look, it is glazed with cherry spread to serve on the special occasions. This Burfi is made with bottle guard therefore, it is healthy and delicious at the same time.

name: Chocolate Flavoured 7 Cup Burfi Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  besan, youcanuse2cupsifyoulikeitverysweet, elaichi, optional
description: As the name suggests Chocolate Flavoured 7 Cup Burfi is made using 7 cups of ingredients. This traditional sweet is simple to make but is quite laborious and requires a lot of patience and arm strength. The recipe for this burfi may vary from household to household, with everyone adapting to their taste and availability of ingredients.

name: No Bake Rice Mawa Cake Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  flattenedrice, mawa, elaichi
description: The No Bake Rice Mawa Cake (Burfi) Recipe is a very healthy and quick making dessert for your family and friends. This is a no bake cake that is made from khoya and flattened rice and set in the refrigerator to get its shape. The addition of saffron brings in the rich color and taste to this delicious rice mawa cake recipe.

name: Stuffed Half Moon Shaped Kaju Burfi Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese
description: The Stuffed Half Moon Shaped Kaju Burfi, is a delicious and wholesome recipe, that is made from cashew nuts. It's easy to prepare and can be made for special occasions like Raksha Bandhan or even Diwali.

name: Peanut Kesar Burfi Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  moongphali, optional, salted, elaichi
description: Peanut Kesar (Saffron) Burfi is a very delicious Indian sweet. You can make it on any special occasion like holi, diwali, raksha bandhan or anytime when you like. It is very easy to prepare and takes very less time to prepare. For this yummy dessert you need peanuts, saffron, sugar, milk, clarified butter, milk powder (optional) and some nuts only.

name: Milk Powder Chena Burfi Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Milk Powder or Khoya Chhena Burfi is a very delicious Indian sweet. You can make it on any special occasion like Holi, Diwali, Raksha Bandhan or anytime whenever you are in mood to eat something sweet.

name: Moong Dal Halwa Burfi Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  split, elaichi, badam
description: Moong Dal Halwa Burfi is a sweet dish prepared as an offering to God during all the festivities in South India. Make this simple yet delicious dessert a part of your upcoming festivities and have everyone drool over them.

name: Khurchan Mawa Burfi Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  leftoverfromhomemadeghee, besan, mawa, elaichi, chandikavark
description: Khurchan means the scrapped leftover. Khurchan Mawa Burfi Recipe is made with this ghee residual which is left behind after extracting ghee from butter.

name: Besan Burfi Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  besan, mawa, orhalfgheeandhalfoil, elaichi
description: Besan Barfi or besan chikki is a regular dessert recipe that is done in my native. Dussehra is a festival that is celebrated for the triumph of good over the evil Asuras.

name: Apple Burfi Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Apple Burfi Recipe is a lip smacking dessert that hides the goodness of grated apples within. Some kids detest apples and this is just one way of making them like apples. Make this apple burfi this festive season to keep the kids and their friends entertained when they visit your home.

name: Walnut Burfi Recipe - Akhrot Barfi
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Walnut Burfi Recipe without milk is a yummy sweet recipe with walnuts as main ingredient. Walnuts are cooked along with sugar, ghee and cardamom until they are fudgy. You can make this recipe during festivals or when you have someone coming home.

name: Sooji Manpasand Burfi Recipe - Semolina Coconut Fudge
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  semolinarava, elaichi, badam, optional
description: Sooji Manpasand Burfi Recipe is an easy to prepare semolina coconut fudge with clarified butter (ghee) and freshly ground cardamom with saffron. This is a festive recipe but you can make when you are expecting guests at home, or when for potluck parties.

name: Coconut Jaggery Burfi Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Coconut Jaggery Burfi is a festival sweet prepared with only three ingredients. Thengai burfi is my favorite but I like jaggery coconut burfi more than the burfi with sugar. This is easy to make and it requires very few ingredients.

name: Haryanvi Saag Gosht Recipe
main_tag: haryana dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  raikadugu, jeera, haldi, dhania, jeera
description: Haryanvi Saag Gosht Recipe is very delicious recipe wherein chicken is cooked with spinach and lots of spices on low heat. Chicken gets so tender that it just melts in your mouth and decadent flavour of whole spices will make you lick the plate. It is an awesome way to consume spinach if you are not found of it.

name: Achari Gosht Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch nonvegeterian  dahiyogurt, dhania, haldi, raikadugu, onionnigellaseeds, saunf, jeera, fenugreekseeds
description: Achari Gosht Recipe is a must try recipe that has great flavors from fennel seeds, cumin seeds, onion seeds, mustard seeds and and dry red chillies. A gravy dish that has the right flavors of spiciness and strong flavors of Achari Masala. Usually Achari masala refers to the pickle masala that has the slight flavor of tanginess and strong flavor of spice. The flavors are developed more because of the roasting of the spice and then grounding them and adding it into the sautéed mutton gravy.

name: Peshawari Karahi Gosht Recipe
main_tag: pakistani sidedish nonvegeterian  haldi, dahiyogurt, dhania
description: Peshawari Karahi Gosht Recipe is a dish that is prepared during almost all the main festival in Pakistan. The recipe is simple to make as it uses less ingredients. The pulpy tomatoes gives a rich and tangy flavor to the mutton when it is cooked in the pressure cooker.

name: Nihari Gosht Recipe
main_tag: awadhi lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  haldi, tejpatta, dahiyogurt, dalchini, tejpatta, badielaichi
description: Nihari is a slow cooked meat originated in the late 18th century royal kitchens of Awadh or Lucknow in Uttar Pradesh. The meat is cooked the whole night and served after sunrise for breakfast . Here to make the version healthy ,we used just few spoon oil to cook the mutton, but in real authentic recipe much more ghee and oil is used which is seen to float on top of gravy. Feel free to use lamb shanks and drops of kewra water at last. The taste here is not compromised because what matters is the aromatic spices and the natural fat and juice of fresh meat that is so satisfying to bring out the flavour. One delicious gosht recipe of Awadhi Cuisine for you to cook for your loved ones.

name: Pakki Mutton Biryani Recipe
main_tag: indian onepotdish nonvegeterian  jeera, dhania, dahiyogurt
description: In North India, Biryani is traditionally associated with the Mughlai cuisine of Delhi and in South India, it is traditionally associated with the Hyderabadi cuisine. There are two ways to make Biryani, Kaccha(Raw) and Pakki(cooked). In Kacchi Biryani, the meat is marinated and cooked along with half cooked rice, while in Pakki Biryani, meat is first cooked along with spices and then the rice is cooked separately. Then they are combined into layers and steamed for some time. In this recipe we will be preparing Pakki Mutton Biryani.

name: Mutton Do Pyaza Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner nonvegeterian  haldi, dahiyogurt, jeera, dhania, dhania
description: Mutton Do Pyaza Recipe is made of goat meat and spiced with lots of onions. The Onions are added at two stages during cooking, hence the name Do Pyaza (two onions). Do Pyaza is normally prepared using meat like, beef, lamb, chicken, goat etc. Recipe variation can also be made by using vegetables instead of meat. In my recipe, I have used Goat meat, which is slow cooked in a saucepan. Remember while preparing any Goat recipe, the meat should be fresh and tender. If you refrigerate raw meat for a long time, it becomes more difficult to cook since doesn’t soften too easily. The more onions you put in, taste of Do Pyaza improves finer.

name: Pista Burfi Recipe - Indian Spiced Pistachio Fudge
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: The Pista Burfi Recipe is a delicious Indian Spiced Pistachio Fudge, that is packed with the goodness of pistachios and fresh coconut. The addition of cardamom powder makes this mithai truly delicious.

name: Hunase Saaru Recipe - Mysore Style Spicy Tamarind Rasam
main_tag: karnataka dinner vegetarian  youcanalsotrythisrecipeforpreparingtamarindwater, jeera, raikadugu, hing
description: Hunase Saaru Recipe or Spicy Tamarind Saaru or Rasam is a quick comforting hot South Indian broth popularly made in Mysore and across South India.  It is tangy, sweet, spicy and best had piping hot. Perfect for a bout of the sniffles or a sore throat, its warmth can be comforting and healing during the winter.

name: Mutton Matar Keema Recipe -Minced Mutton With Green Peas
main_tag: northindian lunch nonvegeterian  dahiyogurt, aloo, matar, haldi, dhania, dhania, tejpatta, laung, dalchini, elaichi, badielaichi, caromseeds
description: Mutton Matar Keema is a quintessential dish in every Muslim home especially during Ramadan. Minced Mutton slowly cooked with whole spices and lots of fresh green peas is a perfect side dish to your meal and certainly a show stopper in every Ramadan get together parties. I love to add potatoes in my keema matar, but one can always avoid it if you don't like it. Mutton Matar Keema can be cooked dry or as a gravy as well.

name: Dhaba Mutton Recipe-Spicy Mutton Gravy
main_tag: northindian dinner nonvegeterian  dahiyogurt, jeera, dhania, laung, adjustaccordingtoyourtaste, dhania, tejpatta, elaichi, haldi
description: Dhaba Mutton is very popular in North India and as we go by the it is usually served by the roadside dhabas. It is very spicy and is cooked in yogurt. You should definitely try this mutton at home, as you will cook it again and again.

name: Tamatar Gosht Recipe-Mutton In Tomato Curry
main_tag: northindian dinner nonvegeterian  dhania, haldi, dhania, tejpatta, dalchini, laung, elaichi, badielaichi, caromseeds, javitri
description: The month of Ramadan and Eid comes with various mouth watering preparations where one can indulge into delicious mutton and chicken dishes. Tamatar Gosht is one such easy mutton curry that can be made in a jiffy and is a mouth watering option especially if you have sudden guests at home. Slight tangy curry that comes with tomatoes is teamed up with mutton pieces and is a cooker recipe. Hardly takes an hour to cook and goes best when served with plain steamed rice.

name: Coconut Burfi Recipe - Kopra Pak/ Fresh Coconut Fudge
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Coconut Burfi is a classic and traditional recipe of an Indian sweet that is prepared during festivals and special occasions. Coconut and festivities go hand in hand because the sweets  made from them are auspicious and are used as offerings at sacred rituals performed during festivals.

name: Himachali Mutton Rara Recipe
main_tag: himachal dinner nonvegeterian  jeera, haldi, dhania, javitri, laung, dalchini, tejpatta, elaichi, dhania, jeera
description: Himachali Rara Mutton is a traditional Himachali dish which is usually prepared during special occasions. It is spicy and usually eaten with rice in Himachal areas. Prepare this spicy mutton during your house parties and impress your friends and family.

name: Andhra Style Mutton Curry Recipe
main_tag: andhra dinner nonvegeterian  haldi, kopra, dhania, driedfenugreekleaves, dhania
description: I wanted to share one of my mother’s favourite curry which makes her remember her own state. This is one of the yummiest curry from the state and is best served along with rice.

name: Mutton Rezala Recipe
main_tag: bengali dinner nonvegeterian  dahiyogurt, tejpatta, dalchini, laung, elaichi, javitri
description: Mutton Rezala is a popular Bengali side dish made with bony mutton pieces marinade in yogurt and curried with cashew and poppy seed paste with Indian spices. An amazingly flavorful and aromatic mutton dish, best enjoyed with paratha or naan.

name: Attukal Mochai Kuzhambu Recipe-Mutton Leg & Field Beans Gravy
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish nonvegeterian  broadbeans, bainganeggplant, pottukadalai, dhania, haldi, saunf, dalchini, laung, tejpatta, dhania, raikadugu, jeera, hing
description: Attukal Mochai Kuzhambu Recipe-Mutton Leg-Field Beans Gravy is a non vegetarian delicacy that is made with a combination of slow cooked leg meat & field beans in a gravy. This is a special dish prepared after the day of Sankranti or harvest festival since field beans are in season.

name: Lugai Gosht Recipe - Mutton In Spicy Tomato Onion Gravy
main_tag: northindian dinner nonvegeterian  elaichi, dalchini, jeera, jeera
description: Lugai Gosht is our family recipe which we usually make on Eid, other festivals or on special occasions. This recipe is easy and requires few day to day ingredients to get prepared. You can even make this recipe for your house parties or potluck parties. In this recipe meat is cooked with equal amount of onions and tomatoes along with fresh spices.

name: Udupi Style Thondekayi And Badnekayi Sambar Recipe - Ivy Gourd & Brinjal Sambar
main_tag: udupi lunch vegetarian  dondakayakovakkai, bainganeggplant, gajjar, splittoordal, haldi, raikadugu, split
description: Udupi Style Sambar with Thondekayi & Badnekayi Recipe (Sambar with Ivy Gourd & Brinjal) is a comforting dal made having the authentic flavor of Udupi Sambar pudi. Most of the people from udupi make their own masala for their Dals and playa. This makes it very special and helps to build the flavor of their own cuisine.

name: Hariyali Mutton Curry Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner nonvegeterian  dhania, pudina, laung, dalchini, elaichi
description: Hariyali or green curry is a curry loaded with fresh herbs like coriander leaves and some mint leaves. A perfect blend of coriander leaves, mint leaves, green chilies and all the spices makes this curry packed with flavours and texture.

name: Kovakkai Podi Curry Recipe - Tamil Nadu Style Ivy Gourd Stir Fry
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch diabeticfriendly  dondakayakovakkai, raikadugu, split, hing, dhania, split, bengalgramdal, hing
description: Kovakkai is a Tamil word for Ivy Gourd or little gherkins (coccinia). These are very healthy and diabetic friendly. Kovakkai Podi Curry Recipe is a unique South Indian style stir fry which uses mildly spiced lentil mix which adds spice and tastes yummy. This lentil mix can also be used with other vegetables like, brinjal, okra and beans.

name: Dudhi Dal Gosht Recipe-Mutton With Bottle Gourd & Lentils
main_tag: indian dinner nonvegeterian  lauki, bengalgramdal, whole, splittoordal, drymangopowder, dalchini, tejpatta, elaichi, jeera, pudina, jeera, dhania, haldi, dhania
description: Dudhi Dal Gosht, this recipe my mom used to make usually on Fridays most of the time. In this recipe daal and gosht are cooked with various spices and bottle gourd. It has its own peculiar taste and texture. Dudhi Dal Gosht can be also served in house parties and be made for potluck parties too.

name: Instant Tindora And Carrot Pickle Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  gajjar, dondakayakovakkai, firm, haldi, gingelly, gingellyoil, hing, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, dhania, adjust
description: Instant Tindora & Carrot Pickle Recipe is a quick recipe for a pickle and tastes awesome with lunch or dinner. You can even have these tindora & carrot pickles with parathas for breakfast. Even bland food taste well when paired up with these spicy pickles.

name: Tindora Ka Salan Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  dondakayakovakkai, fenugreekseeds, jeera, raikadugu, jeera, dhania, haldi, pudina, dhania, moongphali, tilseeds
description: Salan is an accompaniment which is usually had with the Biryani's. There are several types of salan, the most common being Mirchi Ka Salan. Here, we have used tindora or Ivy Gourds to make the salan. Ivy gourds have many nutritional benefits. It is highly beneficial for the diabetic patients as it contains the natural insulin to lower the sugar level in the body. The freshly made salan masala adds a nutty taste to the dish.

name: Shahi Tindora Recipe - Tindora In Cashew Nut Gravy
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  dondakayakovakkai, haldi, driedfenugreekleaves, elaichi, laung, dalchini, caromseeds
description: Shahi Tindora Recipe (Tindora in Cashew Nut Curry), is a delight to try this recipe. As the name suggests, tindora cooked in rich and creamy cashew nut gravy has a royal taste to it. If you are bored of your regular Tindora Sabzi, then you can give this recipe a try as it goes really well with Indian Breads.

name: पर्शियन एग्गप्लांट स्टू रेसिपी - Persian Eggplant Stew Recipe
main_tag: parsi dinner vegetarian
description: पर्शियन एग्गप्लांट स्टू रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट सस्टू रेसिपी है जिसे पारसी घरो में बनाया जाता है. इसमें बैंगन को टमाटर और रोज के मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है. इसमें आप मीट का भी प्रयोग कर सकते है लेकिन हमने यहाँ पर हमने इस रेसिपी को शाकाहारी बनाया है.

name: Kerala Style Mutton Stew Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch nonvegeterian  aloo, dalchini, laung, dhania, dhania
description: Mutton Stew Kerala Style is a simple mutton gravy recipe which is very easy to cook and requires a few daily ingredients to prepare. The use of coconut, onion and tomato brings out a different flavour altogether in the gravy. This dish can be served with rice or it tastes great with Lachha Parathas also.

name: Kaleji Ka Faal Recipe-Mutton Liver Pepper Fry
main_tag: hyderabadi sidedish nonvegeterian  dhania
description: Kaleji Ka Faal Recipe is a spicy and delicious mutton liver gravy made using ground onions and tomatoes and seasoned with pepper powder. This is a perfect gravy recipe you can turn to on a cold day. You can serve Kaleji Ka Faal Recipe | Mutton Liver Pepper Fry as a side dish along with Indian breads like Spicy Aloo Naan Recipe and Chicken Corn Fritters Recipe.

name: Keema Kaleji Recipe- Mutton Liver Mince
main_tag: northindian dinner nonvegeterian  haldi, dhania, dahiyogurt, pudina, dhania, chopped, tejpatta, laung, badielaichi, elaichi, dalchini, javitri
description: Keema Kaleji is mutton mince cooked with liver chunks that makes an amazing side dish with chapatis and rice. Kheema happens to be the most loved mutton delicacy in my house and we also have it in Sehri during Ramadan. It’s tasty, easy to cook and delicious of course. The recipe here comes from my family, my grandma use to cook Keema kaleji this way, whereas I personally cook a dry version with khada masala. Keema and Kaleji is a brilliant combination and tastes like heaven when combined together.

name: Mutton Dak Bungalow Curry Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner nonvegeterian  dahiyogurt, haldi, aloo, optional, fenugreekleaves, tejpatta, dalchini, elaichi, badielaichi, javitri, jeera, dhania
description: Mutton Dak Bungalow (or Bangla) cuisine, sadly, is a near-forgotten culinary treasure that survives among a few remaining khansama families and Anglo Indian households. Dak bungalows were rest houses where the travelers used to take rest while on a journey, or used as a night stop during a trip. At that time the caretaker had their own Poultry, Goat at Dak Bungalows for easy milk and meat supplies. This kind of curries are always be the only Dinner/Lunch item. So it is always cooked along with Potato, Egg and freshly ground spices, as that time Store Bought spices were not being used in cooking.

name: Shredded Mutton With Caramelized Onions Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner nonvegeterian  haldi
description: There are few recipes that sweeps us off, Shredded Mutton With Caramelized Onions is one such dish. This is a slow cooked recipe, we will not get the desired taste and flavour if it is cooked in a hurry, so give the dish its own time. Make this dish at home and we are sure everyone will love it.

name: Jeera Aloo Sabzi - Roasted Potatoes With Cumin Seeds
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  aloo, youcanalsousesweetpotatoes, haldi, jeera, jeera
description: Jeera Aloo Sabzi recipe is one of the simplest of the sukhi/dry sabzi that you can make in your kitchen for a quick weeknight dinner along with Dal Chawal. The jeera aloo sabzi is a delicately spiced vegetables made from potatoes roasted along with cumin and turmeric and spiced with either green chillies and or red chillies.

name: Vermicelli & Oats Kheer Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  oatmeal, vermicelli, elaichi
description: Vermicelli & Oats Kheer is the best way to add more sweetness to the occasion of Valentine’s day in a healthier way. Give a unique healthy twist to regular kheer by adding oats and vermicelli. This is also a healthy kheer you can serve for festivals and specia occasions.

name: Karnataka Style Bassaru Recipe - Dill flavored Coconut Rasam
main_tag: karnataka lunch vegetarian  splittoordal, raikadugu
description: Karnataka Style Bassaru Recipe (Dill flavored Coconut Rasam Recipe) is a recipe that is a very dear to all the Kannadigas. It is most often prepared in many of the South Indian households. The dal and the greens are cooked separately and the water is drained out is used to make the rasam, the drained water is then mixed with some ground coconut masala and simmered. The dal and the dill mixture is then had separately along with mudde or steamed rice.

name: Karnataka Style Obbattu Saaru Recipe - Sweet & Spicy Rasam Recipe
main_tag: karnataka lunch vegetarian  bengalgramdal, elaichi, fenugreekseeds, dhania, caromseeds, kopra, dhania, raikadugu, hing
description: Karnataka Style Obbattu Saaru Recipe is popularly known as Holige Saaru in Karnataka.

name: Kandathipli And Arisi Thipli Rasam Recipe
main_tag: southindian dinner vegetarian  medicinalherb, medicinalherb, bengalgramdal, jeera, caromseeds, hing, haldi, dhania, raikadugu, jeera
description: Kandathipli and Arisi Thipli Rasam is a recipe . Kandathipli and Arisi Thipli  are medicinal herbs which is good for your body.

name: Andhra Style Ingavu Chaaru Recipe - Asafoetida Flavored Tamarind Rasam
main_tag: andhra lunch vegetarian  splittoordal, hing, raikadugu, jeera, fenugreekseeds, hing
description: Andhra Style Ingavu Chaaru Recipe (Asafetida flavored Tamarind Rasam) is a traditional recipe from Andhra that has asafoetida as the main ingredient to create tangy flavored dal based rasam. Asafoetida is usually added as tempering ingredient over a chutney, rasam or sambar in most of the South Indian dishes. It helps in providing a good aroma to your dish as well helps in digestion.

name: Makhana Moongphali Kadhi With Samvat Rice Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  dahiyogurt, waterchestnut, lotusseeds, moongphali, dalchini, jeera, raikadugu, moongphali, lotusseeds, dhania, jeera, dalchini, elaichi, laung, dhania, moongphali, aloo, moongphali, usedduringfasting
description: Makhana Moongphali Kadhi with Samvat Rice is a fasting dish which you can cook during Navratri festival or during your fasting days. All the ingredients used in this recipe are used specially for the fasting food. It is healthy and tasty at the same time.

name: Karnataka Style Majjige Huli Recipe - Tasty Buttermilk Rasam
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian  adjusttotastebasedonpungency, dhania, raikadugu, jeera
description: Karnataka Style Majjige Huli Recipe is a Tasty Buttermilk Rasam that you can make in a jiffy. A fresh masala with whole spices is ground along with some coconut and mixed into the yogurt, finally finished off with a South Indian tadka.

name: कोसामली रेसिपी - Chettinad Style Brinjal And Potato Mash Recipe
main_tag: chettinad lunch vegetarian
description: कोसामली रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसे तमिल नाडु के चेट्टिनाड क्षेत्र में बनाया जाता है. इसे चावल या ईडीयप्पम के साथ परोसा जाता है. यह  हल्का होता है क्यूंकि इसमें बहुत कम मसलो का प्रयोग किया जाता है.

name: वेगन छोले और ब्रोकली करी रेसिपी - Vegan Chickpeas And Broccoli Curry Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegan
description: अगर आप वेगन है तो आप वेगन छोले और ब्रोकली करी रेसिपी बना सकते है. यह खाने में स्वादिष्ट है और बहुत सेहतमंद भी है. आप इस रेसिपी को अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है या फिर अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: Watermelon Rasam Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  splittoordal, haldi, hing, jeera, raikadugu, dhania
description: Watermelon Rasam Recipe is a completely offbeat recipe of a arasam made with watermelon. The rasam is mildly sweet, tangy and spicy. It is easy to make and can be enjoyed along with your South Indian meals. It is delightful to drink and also requires less ingredients to make it.

name: Mysore Rasam Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  splittoordal, dhania, raikadugu, hing, bengalgramdal, dhania, jeera
description: Rasam is a great digestive to be included in our meal. It has self healing ingredients, cumin and pepper which are great to keep flu at bay. Mysore Rasam is a speciality of Karnataka. It is prepared by making a freshly roasted rasam powder which has aromatic cumin, pepper and whole lot of coconut in it. The cooked dal is then simmered with this freshly ground rasam powder, along with tamarind and jaggery which balances the flavours.

name: बीन्स और मटकी भाजी रेसिपी - Beans And Matki Bhaji Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian
description: बीन्स और मटकी भाजी रेसिपी एक सरल महाराष्ट्रियन रेसिपी है जिसमे हरे बीन्स और मोथ बीन्स का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इसमें प्याज और लहसुन का प्रयोग नहीं होता इसलिए आप इसे त्यौहार के दिनों के लिए भी बना सकते है. इसमें कोकम का प्रयोग किया जाता है लेकिन आप इसमें इमली का भी प्रयोग कर सकते है.

name: Methi Pakoda Kadhi Recipe - Punjabi Kadhi Pakora
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  fenugreekleaves, besan, haldi, caromseeds, hing, dahiyogurt, besan, haldi, dhania, jeera, dalchini, dhania
description: The Methi Pakoda Kadhi Recipe is a lip smacking Kadhi recipe where the traditional punjabi kadhi is simmered along with Methi pakoras. The kadhi is then given a ghee tadka to add to the delicious taste.

name: Dahi Suran Ki Kadhi Recipe - Yam Cooked In Yogurt Curry
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian  suransenairatalu, dahiyogurt, besan, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, haldi, dhania, dalchini, tejpatta
description: Dahi Suran Ki Kadhi Recipe consists of soft cooked yam cubes immersed into a yogurt based thick kadhi and then tempered with some strong flavourful spices. The Kadhi is simple but filling for a healthy lunch meal. Yam is pressure cooked first so that it becomes an easy process while making the recipe.

name: Palak Onion Kadhi Pakora Recipe
main_tag: punjabi lunch vegetarian  besan, haldi, besan, greekyogurt, haldi, dhania, hing, jeera, dhania
description: Palak Onion Kadhi Pakora Recipe is a spiced up yogurt based curry cooked along with spinach and crispy onion pakoras. It is considered as a classic dish from North India and Punjab where the yogurt is simmered along with chillies, ginger and coriander and delicious spinach pan fried dumplings (pakora). At home, we serve the Kadhi Pakora most often along with hot steamed rice or Tawa Paratha.

name: पोटलाकया पेरुगु पचड़ी रेसिपी - Potlakaya Perugu Pachadi Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish diabeticfriendly  स न कग र ड़
description: पोटलाकया पेरुगु पचड़ी एक सरल रेसिपी है जिसे आप बहुत काम समय में बना सकते है. इस रेसिपी में दही का भी प्रयोग होता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है.

name: मोसडेंग सरमा रेसिपी - Tripura Style Tomato Chutney Recipe
main_tag: northeastindia sidedish vegetarian
description: मोसडेंग सरमा त्रिपुरा की एक प्रसिद्ध रेसिपी है. इस टमाटर की चटनी को अक्सर पोर्क डिश और चावल के साथ परोसा जाता है. यह रेसिपी बनाने में बहुत आसान है और इसे बनाने में भी बहुत कम समय लगता है. अधिक स्वाद के लिए आप इस चटनी में शक्कर भी डाल सकते है.

name: केगरी पिरात्तल रेसिपी - Chettinad Style Mixed Vegetable Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian
description: स्टिर फ्राई सब्ज़िओ को तमिल में केगरी पिरात्तल कहा जाता है. इसमें चेट्टिनाड मसालो का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इस रेसिपी को और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है. आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए या लंच बॉक्स के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: Chirer Dudh Puli Recipe - Bengali Style Beaten Rice Dumpling Kheer
main_tag: bengali dessert vegetarian  flattenedrice, maida, semolinarava
description: Makar Sankranti is a major harvest festival celebrated throughout India. In West Bengal, (a state of India) Sankranti, also known as Poush Sankranti is named after a Bengali month. It falls on every year 14 January, with some exceptions when the festival is celebrated on 15 January.

name: Biryani Chammanthi Recipe (Green Chutney Recipe)
main_tag: kerala sidedish vegetarian  dhania, pudina, jeera
description: Biriyani Chammanthi Recipe (Green Chutney Recipe) is one of the main accompaniment for Thalassery Biriyani. The Biryani is famous in a small town in Kerala which is prepared in a different style when compared to the Hyderabadi style. The green chutney pairs it up really well as it is quite aromatic and filled with herbs and freshly ground coconut. Therefore this will help in balancing the richness of the Biriyani taste.

name: तोतापुरी आम की चटनी रेसिपी - Sweet & Spicy Totapuri Mango Chutney Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: तोतापुरी आम की चटनी रेसिपी बनाने में बहुत आसान है और इसे बनाने में बहुत कम समय लगता है. इसमें कश्मीरी लाल मिर्च का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इस चटनी को लाल रंग देता है. आम के सीजन में इस स्वादिष्ट चटनी को बनाए और इसका आनंद ले.

name: Sukha Mutton Vindaloo Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner nonvegeterian  haldi, laung, jeera, dalchini, demerarasugar
description: Mutton Vindaloo is a traditional and tasty Goan recipe made with lamb meat in vinegar and spices. For "Sukha Mutton Vindaloo" recipe, spices are soaked in vinegar and then ground and the mutton pieces are marinated in this ground spice paste and lemon juice. The tangy taste of vinegar and  meat pieces coated with  spices makes this mutton  recipe very special.

name: Daal Gosht Recipe-Mutton Curry With Lentils
main_tag: northindian dinner nonvegeterian  bengalgramdal, splittoordal, haldi, jeera, dhania, jeera
description: Daal Gosht is a delicious, comfort dish prepared out of lamb or mutton that is cooked in a soup of a variety of lentils and spices. The slow cooked meat should ideally fall off the bone for the perfect Daal Gosht. It is a perfect recipe to prepare during a weekday and enjoy with your friends and family. Dal and spices gives a twist to your usual mutton curry and tastes delicious.

name: Malabar Mutton Biryani Recipe
main_tag: malabar maincourse nonvegeterian  dhania, pudina, dahiyogurt, jeera, tejpatta, elaichi, moretoserve, dhania, dalchini, laung, saunf, elaichi
description: Malabar Mutton Biryani Recipe is a non vegetarian delicacy from the Malabar region of Kerala is very popular, especially amongst Biryani lovers. This uses a freshly homemade biryani masala paste with cinnamon, cardamom, green chillies, fennel and peppercorns.The mutton is separately prepared with this masala paste and mushy cooked tomatoes till cooked to tender.

name: Nepalese Mutton Curry Recipe
main_tag: nepalese dinner nonvegeterian  laung, elaichi, dalchini, tejpatta, fenugreekseeds, haldi
description: Nepalese Mutton Curry also known as Khasi Ko Masu is a common household recipe from Nepal often served with beaten rice. It is a fiery traditional curry from our lovely neighboring country. It is typically cooked in a pressure cooker on low heat which brings out all the flavour from spices.

name: हुराली कालू चटनी रेसिपी - Hurali Kalu Chutney Recipe
main_tag: karnataka southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly
description: हुराली कालू चटनी तीखी और स्वादिष्ट चटनी है जिसमे कुलीथ दाल का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इस दाल में प्रोटीन की मात्रा अधिक होती है और आपके लिए अच्छी भी मानी जाती है. यह दाल गर्भवती महिलाओ के लिए भी अच्छी मानी जाती है.

name: खजूर इमली की चटनी रेसिपी - Khajoor Imli Ki Chutney Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian
description: चटनी एक ऐसी डिश है जिसे हर घर में खाने के साथ परोसा जाता है. खजूर इमली की चटनी एक ऐसी ही प्रसिद्ध चटनी है जिसे आप अपने चाट या पकोड़ो के साथ परोस सकते है. इसमें पंच फौरन मसालो का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसे और भी स्वादिष्ट बनता है.

name: Nungu Payasam Recipe - Ice Apple/ Tender Palm Fruit Payasam
main_tag: southindian dessert vegetarian  badam, elaichi
description: Nungu or Palm Fruit  also known as Ice Apple is available in plenty in summer. Consuming Nungu gives an excellent coolant effect and therefore you can try this delicious Nungu Payasam Recipe for your dessert. You can also make this on festivals or any other special occasion.

name: Mutton Kothu Kari Cabbage Masala - Mutton Cabbage Keema
main_tag: southindian lunch nonvegeterian  pattagobimuttaikose, dhania, haldi, saunf, raikadugu
description: Mutton Kothu Kari Cabbage Masala which is also called as Kothukari Muttaikose Kootu is a delicious combination of cabbage and mutton cooked along with everyday masalas. Usually, Muttaikose Kootu is done using dal, but in this recipe we have combined cabbage with Mutton Keema and combined it along with spices to make a delicious dish.

name: Bangaladumpa Thalimpu Recipe - Potato Stir Fry
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  aloo, raikadugu, pottukadalai, hing
description: Bangaladumpa Thalimpu Recipe (potato stir fry) is a famous side dish of rayalseema .Bangaladumpa refers to potato and thalimpu refers to tempering in Telugu .The rayalseema cuisine is extremely spicy and can leave you in almost tears if you are not a spice lover. The freshly ground spice mix gives that kick to the humble potato. It serves as an excellent side dish for the meal.

name: Himachali Pahadi Mutton Recipe
main_tag: himachal lunch nonvegeterian  tejpatta, badielaichi, elaichi, laung, laung, dahiyogurt, haldi, dhania
description: Himachali Pahadi Mutton Recipe is mutton cooked in a spicy yogurt curry. The recipe uses ghee to caramelize the onions and tomatoes. The use of whole spice like the cardamom, cinnamon, cloves and bay leaf helps to enhance the flavor into the mutton pieces.

name: Mutton Chaap Recipe - Slow Cooked Lamb Chops
main_tag: mughlai maincourse highproteinnonvegetarian  badielaichi, elaichi, dalchini, laung, haldi, jeera, dahiyogurt
description: Arguably the most influenced cuisine for Indian culinary techniques and methods for cooking meat goes to the Mughals and are still winning the hearts of millions of foodies all over the world and definitely will not retire in future. The recipe uses goat ribs which is the most tastiest part of the goat and ideal for any special masala preparation. Marination and slow cooking of the meat is adopted especially for such recipes. Lamb chops will also work well with this recipe, though the mutton meat will take a bit longer to get fully cooked, but the end result will be delicious. The use of aromatic Indian spices like cardamom, cinnamon, saffron, is a perfect match to cook with Mutton chaap.

name: Lauki Kheer Recipe - Bottle Gourd Pudding
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  lauki, addmoreifrequired, elaichi, badam
description: Lauki Kheer Recipe is a delicious and creamy sweet pudding that is made from grated bottle gourd making super healthy with all the nutrition from milk and bottle gourd. The Lauki Kheer gets its delicious flavors and textures from saffron, cardamom, almonds and cashew nuts.

name: Karnataka Style Utthatthi Payasa Recipe - Dry Dates Kheer
main_tag: coastalkarnataka dessert vegetarian  elaichi, badam
description: Karnataka Style Utthatthi Payasa Recipe is the Dry Dates Kheer made with handy ingredients like jaggery, nuts, and dry dates. This recipe can be prepared in the vegan style with thick coconut milk instead of milk. This payasa is also suited for diabetic people for a spoonful of indulgence as it doesn’t call for heaps of sugar. Prepare this Uttatthi Payasa and you will be lost in the delectable sweetness of dates.

name: Kerala Style Chakka Varattiyathu Ari Payasam Recipe - Jackfruit Brown Rice Kheer
main_tag: kerala dessert vegetarian  kathal, elaichi
description: Kerala Style Chakka varattiyathu Ari Payasam Recipe is a quintessential part of Kerala cuisine. It is prepared by using ripe jackfruit and then simmered in jaggery and milk.

name: Kavuni Arisi Payasam Recipe - Black Rice Kheer
main_tag: chettinad dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Kavuni Arisi Payasam or Black Rice Kheer is a traditional and authentic festival sweet of Chettinad region. It is completely healthy and extremely delicious payasam that all your guests will love. Kavuni Arisi or Black Rice is predominantly used in Chettinad cuisine as it is grown in plenty in the region.

name: Mango Sago Kheer Recipe - Sabudana Kheer With Mangoes
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  elaichi, ripe, badam, optional
description: Mango Sago Kheer, a delectable sabudana Kheer where we have added mango to add some extra flavour and taste. As the mango is in season, you can make this kheer and enjoy with your weekend meals.

name: Aam Ki Kheer Recipe - Mango Coconut Payasam Recipe
main_tag: kerala dessert vegetarian  ripe, elaichi, grated, badam
description: The Aam Ki Kheer Recipe also can be called as the Mango Coconut Payasam is a rich and delicious kheer recipe that is packed with flavors from the alphonso mangoes.

name: Doodhi Sabudana Kheer Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  lauki, tapiocapearls, mawa, elaichi, badam
description: Doodhi Sabudana Kheer Recipe is a dessert recipe used for Iftar parties during Ramadan. This a delicious and a coolant dish which is made from lauki and sabudana pearls. Dudhi Sabudana Kheer Recipe can be made all through the year and served as a festive dessert.

name: Ganne Ke Ras Ki Kheer Recipe - Sugarcane Kheer Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  badam
description: Ganne Ke Ras Ki Kheer Recipe or Sugarcane Kheer Recipe is a wonderful way to use sugarcane as a dessert. As winter is the season for sugarcane and many harvesting festivals coming up on the line, we have come up with a delicious and healthy dessert that uses broken wheat and the natural sugar from the Sugarcane to make the dessert.

name: Andey Ki Kheer Recipe - Egg White Kheer
main_tag: indian dessert eggetarian  almonds pista cashews raisins, elaichi
description: Andey Ki Kheer (Egg White Kheer) Recipe is a simple and traditional egg white pudding (kheer) which tastes almost like the famous Indian dessert 'Rabri'. The Egg White Kheer is indeed a royal dessert and is made on special occasions at my home.

name: बँगलाडूम्पा थालिम्पू रेसिपी - Bangaladumpa Thalimpu Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian
description: बँगलाडूम्पा थालिम्पू रायलसीमा की एक प्रसिद्ध रेसिपी है. यह बहुत तीखा होता है और इसमें ताज़े पिसे हुए मसाले का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इस सब्ज़ी को आप अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है या अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: छेना उप्पेरि रेसिपी - Eggplant Foot Yam Stir Fry Recipe
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian
description: छेना उप्पेरि रेसिपी केरला की पारम्परिक रेसिपी है जिसमे रोज के मसालो और प्याज से फ्लेवर दिया जाता है. आप इसे बनाने के लिए अपनी पसंद की सब्ज़िओ का भी प्रयोग कर सकते है. इसे रोज के खाने के लिए बनाए और हमे बताए की यह आपको कैसी लगी?

name: तोगरिकायी उसली रेसिपी - Togarikaayi Usli Recipe
main_tag: northkarnataka lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: तोगरिकायी उसली रेसिपी कर्नाटक की डिश है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के साथ बना सकते है, उसली का मतलब कन्नड़ में स्टिर फ्राइड दाल होता है. इस रेसिपी में हमने तोगरिकायी (हरे पिगन बीन्स) का प्रयोग किया है. आप इसे अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: Rajgira Ki Kheer Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert noonionnogarlic  rajgira, badam, elaichi
description: Rajgira Ki Kheer Recipe is a very delicious sweet pudding recipe which can be done during the fasting festive period. You can make this kheer recipe during this festive season for your family and guests who visit.

name: North Indian Pheni Recipe - Seviyan Kheer
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  badampowder
description: Pheni or the seviyan is typically found in the market and served on karwa chauth. It pre-fried in ghee and is sold at the halwai shops in cute round pieces. You put them in boiling milk and enjoy it after a while as a light kheer. Pheni is a perfect delicious and easy to make dessert.

name: Paal Payasam Recipe - Rice Kheer/Pudding
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  iusedlowfat butfullcreammilkgivesarichtextureandtaste
description: Paal Payasam or Rice Kheer is one of those traditional, classic festive recipes made during celebrations across India. In South India, it is usually made for the occasion of Pongal, the celebration of harvest and bounty.

name: Sheer Khurma Recipe - Seviyan or Vermicelli Kheer Pudding
main_tag: hyderabadi dessert vegetarian  vermicelli, elaichi
description: Sheer Khurma Recipe is a delicious dessert dish traditionally made during the festival of Eid. Sheer means milk and Khurma means dates in Persian and that is essentially what the kheer is composed of.

name: Chocolate Peda Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  elaichi, salted, torubitinhandsbeforeshapingpeda
description: Chocolate Peda is an Indian fudge sweet that is prepared during festivals and celebrations. The traditional pedas involves an elaborate cooking process. However, this recipe is an instant one using milk powder and condensed milk. These instant ones are equally rich, flavorful with a melt in mouth texture and can be prepared within 25 minutes.

name: Filter Coffee Choco Peda Recipe - Microwave Method
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  badam
description: Filter Coffee Choco Peda is a quick and easy microwave recipe with the aroma and flavor of coffee dominating the taste and making it all the more delicious with the addition of chocolate.

name: Dharwad Peda Recipe
main_tag: northkarnataka dessert vegetarian
description: Dharwad Peda Recipe is a unique delicacy from North Karnataka. The name “Dharwad” has been derived from a place called Dharwad which has a history of this sweet since 150 Years. The sweet was discovered by a Thakur Family from Uttar Pradesh. Traditionally the sweet is prepared from buffalo’s milk that was bred in Dharwad. The recipe was started by a particular family who belonged to Gavali community and then got famous from then on.

name: Aam Peda Recipe - Delicious Mango Peda Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  puree, moreforgreasingpalmsandplate, elaichi, badam
description: The Aam Peda Recipe is a lip smacking peda recipe that is packed with flavors from the fresh mango puree, condensed milk and milk powder. This recipe of the Mango peda is super simple to make and makes a great dessert for parties when you want something quick.

name: Saffron Paneer Peda Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, elaichi
description: This Saffron Paneer Peda is a simple, delicious and melt in mouth dessert with grainy texture. It is prepared with minimal ingredients and has an authentic Indian flavour that is rich as it is made with paneer and ghee.

name: मैंगो राइस रेसिपी - Mango Rice Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  सफ़ द
description: गर्मियों के दिन आ गए है और साथ में आम का सीजन भी. मैंगो राइस एक ऐसी आम की डिश है जिसे आप अपने दिन के खाने के लिए बना सकते है या फिर बच्चो के लंच बॉक्स के लिए भी पैक कर सकते है. इसमें नरियल का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है.

name: Nariyal Ki Kheer Recipe - Coconut Pudding
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  elaichi, badam, optional
description: Nariyal Ki Kheer Recipe is a Coconut Pudding which does not use any rice, like many of the kheer recipes do. You can prepare this kheer recipe for any of the festivals for which you usually prepare kheer.

name: Phool Makhana Kheer Recipe - Sweetened With Jaggery
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  badam, elaichi
description: Kheer is a quintessential Indian dessert for any special occasion, be it during the festivals or any special day. Every region and house hold has its own version. One of the popular kheer varieties, is this Phool Makhana Kheer in the Northern part of India.

name: Iranian Berry Pulao Recipe With Caramelized Onion & Cranberry
main_tag: parsi lunch vegetarian  tejpatta, dalchini, elaichi, laung
description: Iranian Berry Pulao Recipe, is a classic Parsi rice preparation, made using using ghee and cooked along with caramelized onions & cranberries that makes this pulao absolutely exotic. Apart from this, the whole spices used in the dish, lend this berry pulao a lovely aroma.

name: Mixed Millet Phulka Recipe - Ragi Jowar Bajra Wheat Phulka
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  fingermilletnagli, pearlmillet, sorghum
description: Mixed Millet Phulka Recipe is a wholesome phulka made from ragi jowar bajra and whole wheat. The addition of whole wheat flour, makes the phulka easy to roll and puff on the flame or stove top.

name: Lahori Aloo Recipe
main_tag: pakistani lunch vegetarian  dhania, tejpatta, dhania, jeera, laung, saunf, dalchini, kopra
description: Lahori Aloo is a rich yet spicy curry which gets tanginess from tomatoes and creaminess from the dry coconut, poppy seeds and milk. This curry made with baby potatoes is perfect with poori, parathas or even rice. This luscious gravy can be a perfect part of your detailed brunch or an indulgent breakfast.

name: Masala Roasted Aloo Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  jeera, hing, drymangopowder, dhania, saunf, jeera
description: Masala Roasted Aloo Recipe is a simple potato recipe which is full of flavors and spices from the freshly ground spice mix. It goes very well with any Indian bread but usually served with Paratha or Puri.

name: Choto Aloor Dum Recipe - Bengali Style Baby Potato Stir Fry
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian  haldi, dhania, jeera, dhania
description: Choto Aloor Dum Recipe is a Bengali cuisine dish where the baby potatoes are lightly roasted and cooked in thick masala. This is a simple stir fry but is so delicious and addictive. It can be served as a separate starter dish.

name: बीटरूट और फिग चटनी रेसिपी - Beetroot and Fig Chutney Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  ब टर ट
description: बीटरूट और फिग चटनी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट कॉम्बिनेशन है जिसे आप डोसा या पराठा के साथ परोस सकते है. इसमें अजवाइन और नटमेग पाउडर का इस्तेमाल किया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है.

name: हिमाचली कच्चे आम की चटनी रेसिपी - Himachali Dry Raw Mango Chutney Recipe
main_tag: himachal sidedish vegetarian
description: हिमाचली कच्चे आम की चटनी एक स्वादिष्ट चटनी है जिसमे कच्चे आम, पुदीने, हरी मिर्च और धनिये का प्रयोग किया जाता है. अभी आम का मौसम है और यह चटनी बनाने का पर्याप्त मौसम है.

name: मुरुंगई कीरई थोगयल रेसिपी - Murungai Keerai Thogayal Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian
description: मुरुंगई कीरई थोगयल एक स्वादिष्ट चटनी है जिसमे ड्रमस्टिक के पत्तो का प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इस चटनी को घी डोसा या घी चावल के साथ परोसे। ड्रमस्टिक के पत्ते आयरन रिच होते है इसलिए आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने में शामिल कर सकते है.

name: कर्नाटक स्टाइल रंजका रेसिपी - Karnataka Style Ranjaka Recipe
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian
description: कर्नाटक स्टाइल रंजका रेसिपी एक तीखी लाल मिर्च चटनी है जिसमे राइ और कढ़ी पत्ते का तड़का दिया जाता है. इस चटनी को उत्तर कर्णाटक में बनाया जाता है.

name: Pirandai Oorugai Recipe - Pirandai Pickle Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  gingelly, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, hing
description: Pirandai or Adamant Creeper is a medicinal plant that helps in gastric disorders and has numerous health benefits. Pirandai Oorugai is a great recipe to make because of its health benefits and can be served along with the meals as a side dish.

name: कचुम्बर सलाद रेसिपी - Kachumber Salad Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish diabeticfriendly
description: कचुम्बर सलाद एक ताज़ा और सरल समर सलाद है जिसमे ककड़ी, प्याज और टमाटर का प्रयोग किया गया है. अब इसमें गाजर, अनार और ताज़े हर्ब्स का भी प्रयोग कर सकते है. इसे अपने खाने के साथ परोसे और इसके ताज़े स्वाद का आनन्द ले.

name: पुदीना प्याज़ कचुम्बर सलाद रेसिपी - Pudina Pyaz Kachumber Salad Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: पुदीना प्याज़ कचुम्बर सलाद एक सरल सलाद रेसिपी है जिसमे प्याज के रिंग्स में जीरा पाउडर, काला नमक, पुदीना और धनिया मिलाया जाता है. यह सलाद आप अपने रोज के खाने के साथ या बिरयानी के साथ परोस सकते है. यह बनाने में बहुत आसान है और बहुत कम सामग्री में बन जाता है.

name: Chole Semiya Pulao Recipe - Chickpea Vermicelli Pulao
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast vegetarian  vermicelli, capsicum, gajjar, whitechickpeas, jeera, haldi, dhania, jeera, drymangopowder, dhania
description: Chole Semiya Pulao recipe is a delicious combination of Vermicelli along with high protein chickpeas. We always make Chole Biryani or Chole Pulao but have you ever tried making this Chole Semiya?

name: Punjabi Methi Kadhi Recipe - Fenugreek Leaf Yogurt Curry
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  dahiyogurt, besan, haldi, dhania, fenugreekleaves, jeera, raikadugu
description: The Traditional Punjabi Kadhi Recipe, is a yogurt based tangy and spicy curry that is a staple dish in North India. You can make this kadhi plain or add fresh methi leaves or spinach leaves, to add to the flavor and nutrition of the Punjabi Methi Kadhi.

name: शहद वाला पनीर रेसिपी - Quick Honeyed Paneer Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish highproteinvegetarian
description: शहद वाला पनीर एक स्वादिष्ट करी है जिसमे पनीर को टमाटर की ग्रेवी में पकाया जाता है. इसमें शहद का इस्तेमाल किया जाता है जो इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ाता है. टमाटर की प्यूरी बनाते वक़्त आप इसमें गाजर भी डाल सकते है जो की इस ग्रेवी को और भी सेहतमंद बनाता है.

name: हल्दी की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Haldi Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani sidedish vegetarian
description: हल्दी की सब्ज़ी एक राजस्थानी डिश है जिसे सर्दियों के दिनों में बनाया जाता है. इस रेसिपी में हल्दी को कस कर दही और रोज के मसलो के साथ पकाया जाता है. इसमें काली मिर्च, गरम मसाला और कड़ी पत्ता का भी प्रयोग किया गया है जो इसे एक अलग स्वाद देता है.

name: आलू चना इन पुदीना धनिया ग्रेवी रेसिपी - Aloo Chana In Mint Coriander Gravy Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  हर,
description: आलू चना इन पुदीना धनिया ग्रेवी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट ग्रेवी रेसिपी है जिसमे आलू और काबुली चने को धनिया और पुदीना ग्रेवी के साथ पकाया जाता है. पुदीना और धनिया इसमें एक ताज़ा स्वाद लाता है. यह बनाने में आसान है और आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है.

name: शाही पनीर रेसिपी - Shahi Paneer Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: शाही पनीर एक स्वादिष्ट उत्तर भारत की रेसिपी है जिसमे पनीर को टमाटर और क्रीम की ग्रेवी में पकाया जाता है.  यह बनाने में आसान है और आप इसे अपनी हाउस पार्टीज के लिए भी बना सकते है. अपने मेहमानो के लिए इसे बनाए और हमे विश्वास है की उन्हें यह जरूर पसंद आएगी।

name: थोउठे कोडल रेसिपी - Thouthe Kodel Recipe
main_tag: mangalorean sidedish vegetarian
description: थोउठे कोडल मंगलोरीयन रेसिपी है जिसमे एक स्पेशल ककड़ी का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो कर्नाटक में मिलती है. इसमें ब्यादगी लाल मिर्च का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इस करी को लाल रंग देती है. लाल मिर्च के अलावा इसमें मेथी के दाने, धनिया और जीरा का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसके फ्लेवर को और भी बढ़ाता है.

name: मूंगफली, मटर और कॉर्न रवा उपमा रेसिपी - Rava Upma Recipe With Peanuts, Peas & Corn
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  हर,
description: मूंगफली, मटर और कॉर्न रवा उपमा रेसिपी सेहतमंद, रंगो से भरपूर और स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है. यह एक दक्षिण भारतीय रेसिपी है जिसे नाश्ते में परोसा जाता है. इसमें मूंगफली, मटर और कॉर्न का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है.

name: Chicken Tariwala Recipe - Punjabi Murgh Tariwala Recipe
main_tag: punjabi maincourse highproteinnonvegetarian  dahiyogurt, haldi, tejpatta, laung, dalchini, badielaichi, jeera, dhania
description: A lip smacking traditional Punjabi dish, Chicken Tariwala Recipe is a popular dish in almost all Punjabi households. This authentic dish is comfort food made with the most simple ingredients available in your kitchen.

name: Matki Khichdi Recipe - Palak Pudina Moth Bean Khichdi Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian  matki, pudina, jeera, hing
description: Khichdi is a comfort meal, which everyone resorts to when you are sick or in no mood to cook an elaborate meal. Hariyali Matki Khichdi is a fairly easy to make with minimal ingredients, yet healthy and nutritious.

name: Palak Chana Dal Recipe - Healthy Spinach Gram Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  bengalgramdal, palak, haldi, hing, jeera, haldi, jeera
description: Filled with the goodness of Spinach, this Palak Dal is perfect for your weekdays.

name: Dhaba Style Tomato Chutney Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  dhania
description: Dhaba Style Tomato Chutney Recipe is a delicious and easy to make tomato relish or chutney. The tomatoes, garlic cloves and green chilies are charred on the stove top, and then gently pounded using a pestle and mortar.

name: Karwar Style Kelya Sasav Recipe-Ripened Banana Relish
main_tag: karnataka snack vegetarian
description: Karwar Style Kelya Sasav Recipe-Ripened Banana Relish is a quick recipe made from slit bananas and tossed with coarsely ground coconut with dry red chilies. The coconut gives it a rich texture to the whole dish and it is one of the favorite dish that is savored among the people in Karwar.

name: Carrot Rice Recipe - Spiced Carrot Pulao
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian  gajjar, raikadugu, elaichi, dhania
description: The Carrot Rice or Spiced Carrot Pulao is another variation of the mixed rice dishes that are served in the South Indian Cuisine. The carrot rice recipe is made from fresh sauteed carrots and spiced with cardamom powder and sambar powder.

name: Karwar style Tousali Recipe-Cucumber Steamed Cake
main_tag: karnataka southindianbreakfast vegetarian  semolinarava
description: Karwar style Tousali Recipe-Cucumber Steamed cake is a delicious cake made from grated cucumber which is then steamed. The cucumber adds a wonderful taste and gives freshness to the whole dish.

name: Karwar Style Kalingana Polo Recipe - Watermelon Rind Dosa
main_tag: karnataka southindianbreakfast vegetarian  flattenedrice
description: Karwar Style Kalingana Polo Recipe - Watermelon Rind Dosa is a traditional dosa recipe from the Karwar region. Watermelon rinds are usually discarded, however this unique dosa is prepared using the rinds. It is said that the maximum amount of nutrients are actually stored in the watermelon rind. The watermelon rind dosa's are easy to prepare with minimal ingredients. The watermelon rind and coconut added to the batter renders a subtle sweetness to the dosa's. Unlike the other dosa variants, this one is prepared by pouring a ladle full on the hot griddle and not spread it. It is then left to cook with a lid on to let the dosa cook in its own steam. It is soft and porous.

name: Karwar Style Madgane Recipe With Oats & Rajgira
main_tag: karnataka dessert vegetarian  bengalgramdal, oatmeal, adjust, amaranthflour, elaichi
description: Karwar Style Madgane Recipe With Oats & Rajgira is a healthy twist to the age old traditional recipe from the land of Karwar, in Karnataka. There are also addition of oats, rajgira flour and dates in this recipe to make it healthier. This recipe uses jaggery as a sweetener.

name: Karwar Style Anasa Patal Bhaji Recipe-Pineapple cooked with coconut
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian  haldi, hing, malabartamarind, adjustaccordingtotaste, dhania
description: Karwar Style Anasa Patal Bhaji Recipe (Pineapple cooked with coconut) is a savory dish made with fruit as a core ingredient. Karwar cuisine has flavors that are mainly towards the sweet side. So, therefore, they incorporate more of fruits in their main course as well as a side dish. The dish will consist of flavors that will make us exciting to try more.

name: Karwar Style Phodni Phov Recipe- Red Rice Poha With Cashew Nuts
main_tag: karnataka southindianbreakfast vegetarian  flattenedredrice, raikadugu, split, bengalgramdal, hing
description: Karwar Style Phodni Phov Recipe ( Red Rice Poha With Cashew Nuts) is a simple and healthy dish made with poha or beaten rice. Phodni means simple temper or garnish. The use of cashew nuts in the dish add a delectable crunch. Also, we have used the red poha variety to make it more healthier by increasing the fibre content.

name: Puri Recipe - Learn to Make Soft Puffed Puris At Home
main_tag: indian maincourse vegetarian  onionnigellaseeds
description: Puri is a traditional Indian bread savored in most regions of India. It is soft deep fried bread that is made from whole wheat flour.

name: Jaisalmer Kala Chana Kadhi Recipe - Rajasthani Chickpea Curry
main_tag: rajasthani lunch highproteinvegetarian  brownchickpeas, dahiyogurt, besan, haldi, dhania, jeera
description: Jaisalmer Kala Chana Kadhi Recipe, is a recipe that has been originated from a city called “Jaisalmer” in Rajasthan. The kadhi is generally a yogurt based curry cooked along with besan, red chilli powder, coriander powder, garam masala and turmeric.

name: Rajasthani Gatte Ka Pulao Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani lunch vegetarian  gramflourdumplings, besan, caromseeds, dahiyogurt, haldi, tejpatta, laung, dalchini, dhania
description: The Rajasthani Gatte Ka Pulao Recipe is a traditional rice dish from Rajasthan where cooked rice is tossed with boiled Gatte and masalas giving it a very rustic taste to the palate. This Tawa pulao is very simple to make and makes a very unique dish to serve at dinner parties.

name: Punjabi Kadhi Pakora Recipe
main_tag: punjabi dinner vegetarian  besan, haldi, besan, greekyogurt, haldi, dhania, hing, jeera, dalchini, dhania
description: Punjabi Kadhi Pakora Recipe is spiced up yogurt based curry cooked along with spiced gram flour dumplings. It is a classic dish from North India and Punjab where the yogurt is simmered along with chillies, ginger and coriander and delicious pan fried dumplings (pakora).

name: गवार फली मसाला सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Gawar Phali Masala Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian
description: गवार फली मसाला सब्ज़ी एक ग्रेवी सब्ज़ी है जिसमे फली को टमाटर प्याज की ग्रेवी में पकाया जाता है और इसमें मूंगफली का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है. अदरक और लहुसन भी डाला जाता है जिससे इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ जाता है।

name: ओड़िया दालमा रेसिपी - Oriya Special Dalma Recipe
main_tag: oriya lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: दालमा में दाल को सब्ज़िओ और कच्चे पपीते के साथ पकाया जाता है जिसे उड़ीसा के घरो में बनाया जाता है. इसमें तुअर दाल का प्रयोग किया जाता है जिसमे आप अपनी पसंद की सब्ज़िओ का भी प्रयोग कर सकते है. इसमें पंच फौरन का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जिससे इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ जाता है.

name: One Pot Methi Mushroom Brown Rice Pulao Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  fenugreekleaves, jeera, tejpatta, dalchini, laung
description: Methi Mushroom Brown Rice Pulav is a simple and healthy one pot meal that is prepared with brown rice. It is a delicious combination of Rice, Methi and Mushroom with some everyday masalas that can be made for your Lunch Box too.

name: नेलिकई रसम रेसिपी - Amla Rasam Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian
description: रसम दक्षिण भारतीय सूप है जो की विटामिन और एंटी ऑक्सीडेंट से भरपूर है. आप नेलिकई रसम को सूप की तरह पी सकते है या फिर अपने खाने के साथ परोस सकते है. आमला बहुत काम लोग खाना पसंद करते है इसलिए इसका रसम बनाए और अपने परिवार को परोसे।

name: लोबिया सांबर रेसिपी - Black Eyed Beans Sambar`Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: लोबिया सांबर जिसे थट्टा पयारू सांबर भी कहा जाता है दक्षिण भारतीय करी है जिसमे लोबिया को दाल के साथ पकाया जाता है. लोबिया सेहत के लिए भी बहुत अच्छा होता है क्यूंकि इसमें प्रोटीन की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है.

name: उत्तर कनारा खट्टी मीठी आम की चटनी रेसिपी - North Kanara Sweet And Sour Raw Mango Chutney Recipe
main_tag: coastalkarnataka sidedish vegetarian
description: उत्तर कनारा खट्टी मीठी आम की चटनी एक स्वादिष्ट और फ्लेवर से भरपूर चटनी है जिसे उत्तर कनारा के गौड़ सारस्वत ब्राह्मण के घरो में बनाया जाता है. इसमें नारियल, गूढ़ और सुखी लाल मिर्च का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है. आप इस चटनी को बना कर 2 से 3 दिन के लिए फ्रिज में भी स्टोर कर सकते है.

name: Sindhi Pulao Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  jeera, tejpatta, dalchini
description: Sindhi Pulao or Sindhi Pilaf with Caramelised Onions Recipe is a delectable one dish meal that gets its flavors from the caramelized onions, green chillies, cumin seeds and cinnamon.

name: Quick Pulao With Onions And Tomatoes Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  jeera, haldi, dhania
description: Quick Pulao With Onions And Tomatoes is very easy to make and is best to cook when you have leftover rice. This is a quick recipe to cook when you have unexpected guests at home. It can be made with freshly cooked rice also.

name: Quick Beetroot Pulao Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  jeera, dhania, dhania
description: Quick Beetroot Pulao Recipe is a beautiful coloured beet stir fried rice which is packed with nutrients. Beets are the new gorgeous looking super food associated with regularising blood sugar and pressure level, at the same time giving you a healthy skin.

name: Matta Rice Peas Pulao Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  matar, elaichi, dalchini, tejpatta, jeera
description: Matta Rice Peas Pulao Recipe is an all-time rice preparation made with a combination of peas and rice. This rice preparation can go well with any kind of gravy by the side. We have used matta rice in other words called as the red rice which is most popularly used in the states of Kerala.

name: Thalassery Chicken Biriyani Recipe
main_tag: kerala onepotdish nonvegeterian  tejpatta, elaichi, laung, dalchini, haldi, dhania, pudina
description: Thalassery Chicken Biriyani Recipe is a part of Kerala cuisine which is known for its biryani. Thalassery cuisine has it influence from the Arab and mughlai cooking that especially famous in the Muslim community. The Biryani is authentically made from Kaima/Jeerakasala rice which is a rice grain that is cultivated mainly in wayanad in Kerala.

name: Amritsari Murgh Makhani Recipe- Chicken Makhani Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner nonvegeterian  haldi, dhania, dhania, jeera, dalchini, laung, tejpatta, elaichi, badielaichi, haldi, dahiyogurt
description: Amritsar Murgh Makhani Recipe is a wonderful recipe that can be made for your Sunday Lunch. The gravy is made with ground onion masala that is roasted well in the kadai and then balanced with some tangy tomato puree. This will give the gravy a rich and delicious texture. Then the chicken pieces are cooked in this gravy till all the flavor is developed.

name: Spicy Lemon Chicken Kebab Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer nonvegeterian  capsicum
description: Spicy Lemon Chicken Kebab Recipe is a wonderful party appetizer that has marinated chicken pieces, bell peppers and onions that are skewered and grilled. A flavourful marination of dried herbs, red chili flakes and freshly squeezed lemon juice making it a great tasting dish.  The more you allow the chicken marinate the more it soaks in the flavours  making it juicy and tender.

name: उकड़ रेसिपी - Maharashtrian Rice Flour Porridge Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian dinner vegetarian
description: उकड़ एक महाराष्ट्रियन रेसिपी है जिसमे चावल के आटे और दही का प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इसे शाम या सुबह के नाश्ते के लिए भी परोस सकते है. पारम्परिक इसे तेल के साथ खाया जाता है लेकिन इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ जाता है अगर आप इसमें घी का प्रयोग करें।

name: Ellu Sadam Recipe - South Indian Style Til Pulao Recipe
main_tag: hyderabadi lunch vegetarian  tilseeds, moongphali, raikadugu, split
description: The Ellu Sadam Recipe is a delicious and nutty pulao from South India. It is one of the simple and quick to make pulao recipes that you can make in jiffy.

name: Maharashtrian Kadhi Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian  greekyogurt, besan, raikadugu, jeera, dhania, hing
description: Maharashtrian Kadhi Recipe is a creamy yogurt curry simmered with besan mixture. This khadi is a coolant for a hot scorching summer. The only difference in this kadhi is that it is little sweet when compared to others.

name: Ratalu Ki Chutney Recipe - Yam Chutney Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  suransenairatalu, dhania, jeera, raikadugu, hing, bengalgramdal
description: Ratalu Ki Chutney is an easy chutney recipe which you can serve it along with your meal or Dosa/Idli. Usually, we use Yam to make sabzi but this is a great way to include yam in your diet.

name: Moong Dal Khichdi Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian  whole, split, aloo, gajjar, frenchbeans, haldi, dalchini, tejpatta, jeera, hing
description: Moong Dal Khichdi is a mish mash of rice, lentils and vegetables most often served along with Kadhi. When it is raining, one of the things that my family craves for is Khichdi Kadhi and Batata Nu Shaak, along with papad, which adds to the crunchiness of this dish.

name: Pumpkin Raita Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, dahiyogurt, jeera, dhania
description: The Pumpkin Raita, is a wholesome yogurt dish in itself. Raita is a dish that is traditional savored as an accompaniment along with Indian Main Course dishes or even Parathas. This raita is made by simple sauteeing the pumpkin along with a few basic herbs and salt to making it in to a delicious raita. You can add in some cooked beans like kidney beans or lima beans and make into one wholesome packed lunch for work.

name: अंकुरित मूंग दाल रेसिपी - Sprouted Moong Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: अंकुरित मूंग दाल एक प्रसिद्ध दाल रेसिपी है जो सेहतमंद और तीखी होती है. इस दाल को अलग अलग राज्य में अलग अलग तरीके से बनाया जाता है. इसमें तीखे मसालो का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है.

name: Kale Chane Ki Kadhi Recipe - Black Chickpea Kadhi
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian  brownchickpeas, dahiyogurt, besan, besan, haldi, jeera, raikadugu, hing
description: Kale Chane Ki Kadhi is a creamy spiced yogurt curry with black chickpea. Kadhi is a quintessential dish that belongs to various parts of India and is mostly loved in Punjab, Gujarat, Rajasthan and Maharashtra. Kale Chane Ki Kadhi comes from North India and is typically eaten with plain steamed rice with a dollop of ghee.

name: Makai Ka Cheela Recipe - Delicious Corn Cheela Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast vegetarian  besan, dhania
description: Make this delicious and instant Makai Ka Cheela Recipe that is packed with flavors from green chillies, onions and coriander leaves. Serve this delicious Cheela with dhaniya pudina chutney and a cup of filter coffee for breakfast or evening for an afterschool snack.

name: तुलसी और पान के पत्तो का रसम रेसिपी - Tulsi And Betel Leaves Rasam Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  holybasil, paan, caromseeds, jeera, hing, haldi, dhania, raikadugu
description: तुलसी और पान के पत्तो का रसम एक स्वादिष्ट दक्षिण भारतीय डिश है जिसमे तुलसी, पान के पत्ते, काली मिर्च, अजवाइन और जीरा का प्रयोग किया गया है. यह रसम सर्दिओ के दिनों के लिए अच्छा है और आप इसे सूप की तरह भी पि सकते है. इसमें लहसुन का प्रयोग किया गया है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है.

name: तीखी और मीठी आमला चटनी रेसिपी - Amla Chutney Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian
description: तीखी और मीठी आमला चटनी एक स्वादिष्ट चटनी है जिसे आप घर पर बना सकते है. इसमें अमला को पका कर उसका पेस्ट बनाया जाता है और फिर मसाला से इस चटनी को फ्लेवर दिया जाता है. अमला में विटामिन C की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है इसलिए यह आपके सेहत के लिए भी अच्छा माना जाता है.

name: Sweet & Spicy Amla Chutney Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  nellikaigooseberry, jeera, raikadugu, hing
description: Sweet & Spicy Amla Chutney Recipe is a wonderful chutney that you must try at home. It consist of alma in other words called as gooseberries, which is cooked till soft and ground to paste and then cooked in masala till it has got infused with all the flavors. Amla is a powerhouse of Vitamin C and is great for hair and skin. It is also rich in antioxidants and fiber, thus it is also diabetic friendly dish. Therefore adding amla into your everyday diet will help you in a lot of ways.

name: राजस्थानी कचरी की चटनी रेसिपी - Rajasthani Kachri Ki Chutney Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani sidedish vegetarian
description: चटनी भारतीय खाने का एक महत्वपूर्ण हिस्सा है. इसे खाने के साथ या नाश्ते में परोसा जाता है. इन चटनी में से एक है कचरी की चटनी, जिसे राजस्थान के हर घर में बनाया जाता है. इस्सके स्वाद तीखा होता है और इसे अक्सर खाने के साथ परोसा जाता है.

name: Tadkewali Masoor Dal Khichdi Recipe With Garlic & Onions
main_tag: northindian maincourse vegetarian  whole, tejpatta, haldi, jeera, dhania
description: Comfort food at it's best, this Lehsun-Pyaaz Tadkewali Masoor Dal Khichdi Recipe is a light meal of whole masoor dal cooked along with rice until it is mushy and topped with a luscious tempering of onions and garlic fried in ghee with simple spices. A quick fix meal that can be put together with basic ingredients at home.

name: Sprouted Matki Cheela Recipe With Palak -Moth Beans Cheela
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  matki, split, saunf, palak, haldi
description: Sprouted Moth Cheela Recipe With Palak, is an Indian crepe recipe that is jam packed with nutritious ingredients. Made with green leafy spinach and fibrous moth sprouts, with a hint of ginger and fennel.

name: Hare Chane Ki Burfi Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani dessert vegetarian  mawa, elaichi
