description: Burfi made of green chickpeas is a special sweet dish that can be made for special occasions like party and festivals. Green chickpeas or choliya is smaller in size compared to the white chickpeas, and they taste delicious. Green chickpeas can be used in making curries, parathas, halwas, burfis and a lot more.

name: Badam Burfi Recipe - Almond Burfi
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  badam
description: Badam Burfi is a very rich and delicious dessert with the goodness of almonds and milk. It will be loved and cherished by everyone in your family. It is a perfect recipe to begin your Holi celebrations and bring joy into your lives. You can also make it on Diwali or such festivals.

name: Akhrot Burfi Recipe - Walnut Burfi
main_tag: indian snack vegetarian  akhrot, elaichi
description: Akhrot Burfi or Walnut Burfi with condensed milk is a simple sweet recipe which is usually made during special occasions. It is soft and slightly chewy with a nutty taste from walnuts.

name: Kala Chana Amti Recipe - Maharashtrian Black Chickpea Curry
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch highproteinvegetarian  brownchickpeas, jeera, elaichi, raikadugu, hing, dhania, laung, dalchini, dhania, saunf, jeera, kopra
description: A dish from the coastal cuisine, Kala Chana Amti Recipe is a very popular dish from the Malvan region of the Maharashtra. Coconut is an important ingredient and the recipe cannot be made without it. A very nutritious dish and a must item to be included in our diet.

name: Sprouted Moong and Methi Cheela Recipe - A Healthy Breakfast
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  split, saunf, fenugreekleaves, haldi
description: This Sprouted Moong and Methi Cheela Recipe, is a wholesome Indian crepe recipe that is both healthy as well as tasty.

name: पुदीना खरा पोंगल रेसिपी - Pudina Khara Pongal Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian
description: पुदीना खरा पोंगल स्वादिष्ट पोंगल रेसिपी है जिसमे चावल और दाल के साथ पुदीने का इस्तेमाल किया जाता है. पुदीना के इस्तेमाल से इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ जाता है और यह डिश को एक अलग फ्लेवर देता है. आप इसे अपने रोज के नाश्ते के लिए बना सकते है.

name: फूलकोपीर पतुरी रेसिपी - Fulkopir Paturi Recipe
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian
description: फूलकोपीर पतुरी एक स्वादिष्ट शाकाहारी रेसिपी है जिसमे गोभी को मस्टर्ड से मेरिनेट करके केले के पत्ते में पकाया जाता है. इसमें कम से कम तेल का प्रयोग किया जाता है.

name: दोंडकई पुली करी रेसिपी - Dondakkai Puli Curry Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  स प ल ट
description: दोंडकई पुली करी रेसिपी एक पारम्परिक रेसिपी है जिसे दक्षिण भारत के हर घर में बनाया जाता है. यह बनाने में आसान है इसलिए आप इसे अपने या अपने बच्चो के लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है. यह सेहत के लिए अच्छी है और इसे बनाने में बहुत कम समय लगता है.

name: कथीरिकै पुंडु पिरात्तल रेसिपी - Kathirikai Poondu Pirattal Recipe
main_tag: chettinad lunch vegetarian
description: कथीरिकै पुंडु पिरात्तल रेसिपी एक दक्षिण भारतीय सब्ज़ी है जिसमे बैंगन को लहसुन और रोज के मसलो के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह डिश तमिल नाडु के चेटिनाड क्षेत्र में बनाया जाता है.

name: आलू पोस्तो  रेसिपी - Potatoes In Poppy Seed Paste (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian
description: आलू पोस्तो एक बंगाली डिश है और हर त्यौहार पर बनाई जाती है. इस सब्ज़ी में आलू को खुस खुस के पेस्ट में पकाया जाता है. यह डिश अधिकतर चवा या फिर बंगाली लुच्छी के साथ परोसी जाती है.

name: Butter Garlic Prawns Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian sidedish nonvegeterian  salted, dhania, chopped
description: Mumbaiya Garlic Butter Prawns melt in the mouth and they are super easy to cook using a handful of ingredients. This dish gets ready in just under 20 minutes. They are perfect to serve as a starter or serve them as a side sig along with your meal.

name: Ennai Mangai Oorugai Recipe
main_tag: andhra sidedish vegetarian  driedmango, raikadugu, hing, gingelly
description: Ennai Maangai Oorugai is a tangy and spicy pickle that comes in very handy when mango is not in season. This pickle can be made in a very short time, and can be consumed immediately.

name: Vadu Mangai Pickle Recipe - Tender Small Raw Mango Pickle
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  raw, babymangoes, raikadugu
description: Vadu Mangai Pickle is a spicy and flavorful South Indian style tender raw mango pickle. Vadu Mangai or the raw mango is a unripe variety of the mango little sweet but pungent, often used for pickling. Vadu Mangai Pickle is an everyday staple condiment in Tamil Brahmin household usually savoured with curd rice.

name: Andhra Avakaya Recipe - Spicy Raw Mango Pickle Recipe
main_tag: andhra sidedish vegetarian  raw, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, adjust
description: The Andhra Avakaya Recipe is a delicious mango pickle from andhra that is made spicy and tasty with the addition of mustard seeds, methi seeds, garlic, red chillies and sesame oil.

name: Kanda Keri Nu Kachumber Recipe- Instant Mango Pickle
main_tag: indian appetizer vegetarian  raw, jeera
description: Kanda Keri Nu Kachumber is a classic raw mango and onion relish made the Gujarati way-sweet and sour. It also happens to be one the most favoured summer condiment. Kachumber in Gujarati means salsa or relish. In most regions of Gujarat, a simple green salad is also termed as Kachumber.

name: Avakkai Pickle Recipe - Avakkai Mango Uruguai Recipe
main_tag: andhra appetizer vegetarian  raw, raikadugu, fenugreekleaves, haldi
description: Spicy and Tangy avakkai pickle is also called an Andhra Special Mango Pickle Recipe. This avakkai pickle is spicy, tangy, tempting and an absolute finger-licking side dish recipe with most forms of rice.

name: Instant Gor Kairi Lonche Recipe - Sweet Raw Mango Pickle
main_tag: maharashtrian sidedish vegetarian  raw, about34 1cup, adjustaccordingtothetartnessofmangoes, raikadugu, tadka, raikadugu, jeera, hing, haldi
description: The Instant Gor Kairi Lonche Recipe is an instant Mango pickle which gets made in just under 10 minutes. The addition of jaggery along with powdered mustard seeds and hing brings out the delectable flavors of this Gor Kairi Lonche Recipe.

name: Malnad Special Appe Midi Uppinakayi Recipe - Tender Mango Pickle
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian  appemidi, adjusttotaste, adjusttotaste, raikadugu, haldi, hing
description: Malnad Special Appe Midi Uppinakayi Recipe (Tender Mango Pickle) is made of Appe Midi is pulpy, immature oblong mango found mainly in malnad regions or Western Ghats and coastal regions of Karnataka, India. These are produced in bulk quantities and marketed in different regions of Malnad. They are sweet, sour and pungent in flavor. There are many varieties of Appe Midi.

name: Karnataka Style Jackfruit Moong Dal Payasa Recipe
main_tag: coastalkarnataka dessert vegetarian  kathal, split, elaichi, iusedalmondsandcashews, badam
description: Jackfruit Moong Dal Payasa Recipe is a flavorful treat for jackfruit lovers from the state of Karnataka. This payasam is a speciality from coastal region of Karnataka. There are many ways of preparing this payasa. In this recipe, I have used ripe jackfruit pieces, yellow moong dal, jaggery with little soaked rice to get nice thick texture to payasa.

name: Appe Payasa Recipe - Poori Payasam
main_tag: southindian dessert vegetarian  semolinarava, elaichi
description: Appe Payasa  is an authentic recipe from the regions of Karnataka and is prepared using small bite sized appe, made of maida or rava. Appe is a poori made like a crispy biscuits prepared commonly with chiroti rava or fine sooji. One can take the liberty of preparing the biscuits with maida too.

name: Aval Payasam Recipe - Sweet Flattened Rice Payasam
main_tag: tamilnadu dessert vegetarian  flattenedrice, elaichi, dalchini, optional
description: Aval Payasam is a traditional kheer or pudding made of flattened rice especially on the occasion of Gokulashtami or Janmashtami Krishna Jayanthi. Poha or flattened rice is the main ingredient and it comes together in no time at all, making it a good option for dessert in instances when you have unexpected guests

name: Manganem Recipe - Goan Style Chana Dal Payasam
main_tag: goan dessert vegetarian  bengalgramdal, tapiocapearls
description: Manganem is a traditional kheer recipe that is made in Goa during religious functions and festivals. The Bengal Gram sweet kheer is also served in Goan temples as an offering (prasad). It simple and quick to make and is a whole some sweet that is made from chana dal, sabudana and with taste from jaggery, cashew nuts and ghee.

name: Vegan Date & Fig Payasam Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegan  elaichi
description: The Vegan Date & Fig Payasam is made with soy milk and no added sugar, making it a healthier option over traditional kheer.

name: Ada Pradhaman Recipe With Homemade Ada- Kerala Special Payasam Recipe
main_tag: southindian dessert vegetarian  extractedfrom1coconut, elaichi
description: Ada Pradhaman Recipe With Homemade Ada  is a special payasam made on festivals days with rice, jaggery and coconut during special occasions in Kerala. Instead of rice Ada/ rice flakes, I have made this dish using rice flour. Though the 'Ada' made from rice flour is available ready-made in shops, it can be easily made at home from scratch.

name: Kuzhal Payasam Recipe- Wheat Noodles Payasam
main_tag: southindian dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Kuzhal Payasam is a traditional recipe prepared during any festival especially for Vinayagar Chathurthi. A payasam made with homemade wheat noodles. There are many variations in preparing hand made noodles with wheat flour, rice flour or maida. This recipe uses wheat flour and the payasam is cooked in jaggery syrup. This is not only delightful but also healthy.

name: Semiya Payasam With Coconut Milk Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu dessert vegetarian  vermicelli, elaichi
description: Semiya Payasam with Coconut Milk Recipe is a must try recipe for all the vegan lovers who would not want to miss on eating semiya payasam. This type of sweet pudding is very famous in the southern region of India, as this is the basic dessert found to be present in most of the traditional Indian festivals.

name: Parangikai Payasam Recipe - Pumpkin Payasam
main_tag: tamilnadu dessert vegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, badam, elaichi
description: Parangikai Payasam is the easiest and the most healthiest payasam one can think of. Pumpkin is used very commonly in a variety of dishes in a South Indian cuisine. The main reason for me to use pumpkin was that it adds an extra nutritional value to the dish.

name: Karnataka Style Gasagase Payasa Recipe- Poppy seed Payasam
main_tag: karnataka dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Karnataka Style Gasagase Payasa Recipe is a Poppy seed Payasam which is an all-time favourite sweet for kannadigas. Most of their festivals always ends with this creamy cup filled with poppy seed payasam. The poppy seeds are ground along with rice and simmered in milk till it thickens and garnished with hot toasted cashew nuts and raisins with ghee.

name: Little Millet Payasam Recipe- Kutki/Sama Payasam
main_tag: southindian dessert vegetarian  adjust, elaichi
description: Little Millet Payasam Recipe is a millet filled payasam to satisfy your sweet cravings. It is easy to prepare and delicious too. Made of little millet, also known as Kutki or Saamai  and jaggery, it is nutritious too.

name: ढाबा स्टाइल अंडे की करी रेसिपी - Dhaba Style Egg Curry
main_tag: northindian dinner eggetarian
description: ढाबे के खाने का स्वाद कुछ अलग ही होता है और यह ढाबे हमे अक्सर हाईवे पर मिलते है. ढाबे के खाने में लोकल मसालो का प्रयोग किआ जाता है जो इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ाता है. इस ढाबा स्टाइल अंडे की करी को घर पर एक बार बनाए और आप यह करी बार बार बनाएँगे।

name: गाजर नारियल पचड़ी रेसिपी - Carrot Pachadi With Coconut Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish vegetarian
description: रायता को तमिल में पचड़ी कहा जाता है. गाजर नारियल पचड़ी रेसिपी एक आसान रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के साथ परोस सकते है. इस रेसिपी में नारियल और गाजर को दही के साथ मिलाया जाता है और अंत में सुखी लाल मिर्च और कढ़ी पत्ते का तड़का दिया जाता है.

name: चिकन बिरयानी रेसिपी - Chicken Biryani With Coconut Milk Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch nonvegeterian
description: चिकन बिरयानी स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसे आप सप्ताह अंत के खाने के लिए बना सकते है। इसमें नारियल के दूध, सूखे मसाले और टमाटर प्यूरी का भी इस्तेमाल किया जाता है जिससे इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ जाता है. यह बनाने में आसान है और 30 मिनट में तैयार हो जाती है.

name: कोवक्कै पौड़ी करी रेसिपी - Kovakkai Podi Curry Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch diabeticfriendly
description: कोवक्कै पौड़ी करी रेसिपी सरल रेसिपी है जिसे दक्षिण भारत में बनाया जाता है और इसमें टिन्डोरे का इस्तेमाल किया जाता है. तमिल में टिन्डोरे को कोवक्कै कहा जाता है. इसमें पौड़ी का इस्तेमाल किया जाता है जो इस सब्ज़ी को और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाती है. आप इस सब्ज़ी को बनाने के लिए दूसरी सब्ज़िओ का भी इस्तेमाल कर सकते है.

name: सोरेकै मजिगे हुली रेसिपी - Sorekai Majjige Huli Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch diabeticfriendly
description: सोरेकै मजिगे हुली एक पारम्परिक रेसिपी है जिसे कर्नाटक के मेसूर शहर में बनाई जाती है. इसमें लौकी को छास और नारियल के पेस्ट के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह बाकी दक्षिण भारतीय करी से अलग होती है, इसलिए इसे जरूर बनाए और हमे बताए की आपको यह कैसी लगी.

name: मारवाड़ी गट्टे की कढ़ी रेसिपी - Marwadi Gatte Ki Kadhi Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani lunch vegetarian
description: मारवाड़ी गट्टे की कढ़ी रेसिपी एक राजस्थानी डिश है जिसमे बेसन के गट्टे बना कर कढ़ी में डाले जाते है. आप इन गट्टो को पालक या मेथी से फ्लेवर भी कर सकते है, यह कढ़ी स्वादिष्ठ होती है और आप इसे अपने रोटी या चावल के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: Dhaba Style Tawa Pulao Recipe - Masala Brown Rice Tawa Pulao
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  jeera, gajjar, matar, dhania
description: Dhaba Style Tawa Pulao Recipe is a delicious Pulao Recipe which made from brown rice and tossed in a pav bhaji masala and vegetables making it spicy and tasty.

name: दही सुरन की कढ़ी रेसिपी - Dahi Suran Ki Kadhi Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian
description: दही सुरन की कढ़ी में सुरन को कढ़ी में पकाया जाता है और फिर इसमें तड़का दिया जाता है. यह कढ़ी बनाने में बहुत आसान है और खाने में बहुत स्वादिष्ट। आप इस कढ़ी को अपने रोज के खाने के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: Coorgi Style Chicken Curry Recipe
main_tag: coorg lunch nonvegeterian  haldi, jeera, dhania, dalchini, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds
description: Coorgi style chicken curry is one of the specialty and the use of kachampuli makes this authentic and delicious. Coorgi style chicken curry is best served with steamed rice for a hearty lunch.

name: Thalapakattu Chicken Biryani Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu maincourse nonvegeterian  jeera, saunf, elaichi, laung, dalchini, javitri, patharphoolblackstoneflower, jeeraga, dhania, haldi, dhania, pudina
description: Thalapakattu Chicken Biryani Recipe is a very famous style of biryani from Dindigul region in the state of Tamil Nadu. This biryani is from a chain of restaurant with the same name. It is called "Thalappakatti", which literally means the turban, the person who was founder wore a turban and that's how the biryani gets its name. The biryani is highly flavorful and it is different because of the spice mix that is used to make this biryani.

name: Kerala Style Chicken Chatti Pathiri Recipe
main_tag: kerala snack nonvegeterian  haldi, maida
description: Kerala Style Chicken Chatti Pathiri Recipe is a must try recipe at your kitchen. Pathiri is a type of Kerala pancakes that is layered with shredded chicken and then pan fried all together. This recipe is famous in North Malabar. It can be made savory and sweet as well. For sweet filling it is usually a mixture of grated coconut and sugar. The dish resembles a lasagna as it is layered with thin sheets of pancakes and chicken stuffing.

name: Malabar Style Erachi Pathiri Recipe - Flat Bread Stuffed With Shredded Chicken
main_tag: malabar appetizer nonvegeterian  laung, dhania, haldi, maida
description: Malabar Style Erachi Pathiri Recipe is a must try recipe that you will love to eat them as your snack or as a side dish for your lunch. The chicken which is called as “erachi” in kerala is sautéed well with spices and onions. This chicken filling is then stuffed in between two whole wheat flat bread and shallow fried till it becomes crispy.

name: Malabar Style Kozhi Pidi Recipe - Rice Dumplings In Chicken Stew
main_tag: malabar lunch nonvegeterian  haldi, dhania
description: Malabar Style Kozhi Pidi Recipe is a Kerala delicacy that consists of soft rice dumplings cooked in a roasted coconut chicken curry. It is makes a perfect one dish meal as it contains rice as well as chicken in one dish that will fill you up without any accompaniments.

name: Erode Pallipalayam Chicken Fry Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish highproteinnonvegetarian  sambaronions, haldi, dhania
description: Erode Pallipalayam Chicken Fry Recipe is a quick Tamilnadu Style Chicken side dish. It contains very few ingredients and yet turns out to be very delicious. The key essence to this dish is the use of pearl onions which is widely used in Tamil Nadu Cuisine. It is popularly called as “Chinna Vengayam”. The onions are ground along with garlic and then sautéed well with basic Indian spices. The boneless chicken pieces are then cooked in this aromatic masala.

name: Asian Chicken Noodle Soup Recipe
main_tag: asian appetizer highproteinnonvegetarian  gajjar, capsicum, laung, gajjar
description: Asian Chicken Noodle Soup Recipe is a comforting soup recipe that you must try when one is craving for a nice hot bowl packed with Asian flavors. This soup has everything in just one bowl. We will be showing you how to make your own chicken stock from the scratch that give enough flavor to your soup. To the soup we then add a flavors of Teriyaki and load it with enough vegetables and Noodles to keep it delicious and healthy.

name: नागालैंड स्टाइल पम्पकिन ओमबाल रेसिपी - Nagaland Style Pumpkin Oambal Recipe
main_tag: nagaland sidedish vegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, raikadugu
description: नागालैंड स्टाइल पम्पकिन ओमबाल एक पारम्परिक चटनी है जिसे नागालैंड में बनाया जाता है. इसमें कद्दू का प्रयोग किया जाता है और खट्टा मीठा स्वाद होता है.

name: बिरयानी चम्मंथी रेसिपी - Biryani Chammanthi Recipe
main_tag: kerala sidedish vegetarian
description: बिरयानी चम्मंथी रेसिपी एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसे थालासेरी बिरयानी के साथ परोसा जाता है. यह बिरयानी केरला में बनाई जाती है जो बाकी बिरयानी से अलग होती है. यह बनाने में आसान है और आप इसे अपने खाने के साथ भी बना सकते है.

name: उत्तराखंड मूली थेचुआ रेसिपी - Uttarakhand Mooli Thechua Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian
description: उत्तराखंड मूली थेचुआ रेसिपी मूली का सलाद है जिसे उत्तराखंड के हर घर में बनाया जाता है. यह एक सरल डिश है जिसे बनाने में बहुत कम समय लगता है. आप इसे अपने खाने के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: कांदा कैरीचि चटनी रेसिपी - Kanda Kairichi Chutney Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian sidedish vegetarian
description: कांदा कैरीचि चटनी एक स्वादिष्ट साइड डिश रेसिपी है जिसमे प्याज और कच्चे आम का प्रयोग किया जाता है. कच्चे आम से इस चटनी में खट्टा स्वाद आता है जो इसे और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है. यह हर महाराष्ट्रियन घर में बनाई जाती है और खाने के साथ परोसी जाती है. आप इसे फ्रिज में 3 से 4 दिनों के लिए रख सकते है.

name: Jowar & Tomato Cheela Recipe - Sorghum Cheela With Tomatoes
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  sorghum, yellowcornmealflour, dhania
description: Jowar & Tomato Cheela is a healthy cheela recipe made with a combination of jowar flour, maize flour and whole wheat flour, along with tomatoes and simple spices.

name: Zarda Pulav Recipe (Rice Flavoured With Nuts And Saffron)
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  tejpatta, badielaichi, veganscanusecoconutoil, laung, elaichi, dalchini, elaichi, badam, forgarnishing, kopra
description: Zarda Pulav is a rice dessert that is not kheer but exquisite nevertheless. An easy to make fragrant sweet and nutty pilaf that is a must have on special occasions or to simply to enjoy during monsoons or winters.

name: Chicken Korma Recipe - Mughlai Style Chicken Curry
main_tag: mughlai dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  elaichi, dahiyogurt, caromseeds, dhania
description: Korma is an Indian style Mughlai gravy with marinated chicken or vegetables. A dish dates back to the 16th century prepared in the Mughal kitchen and said to have been served to Shah Jahan and his guests at the Taj Mahal inauguration, as mentioned in the history.

name: कोब्बारी चारु रेसिपी - Kobbari Chaaru Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: कोब्बारी चारु रेसिपी एक पारम्परिक सांबर/रसम रेसिपी है जिसे तेलंगना क्षेत्र में बनाया जाता है. इसमें चना दाल के साथ नारियल के दूध का इस्तेमाल किया जाता है जो इसे और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है. तीखापन लाने के लिए इस सांबर में हरी मिर्च का प्रयोग किया जाता है.

name: मालवानी कुरकुरी भिंडी रेसिपी - Malvani Kurkuri Bhindi Recipe
main_tag: malvani dinner vegetarian
description: मालवानी कुरकुरी भिंडी रेसिपी एक सरल रेसिपी है जिसमे भिंडी को मालवानी मसाले के साथ पकाया जाता है. मालवानी मसाला स्वाद में ज्यादा फ्लैवरफुल होता है इसलिए इस सब्ज़ी का स्वाद बाकी भिंडी की सब्ज़िओ से एकदम अलग होता है. इस सब्ज़ी को बनाने के लिए रोस्टेड मूंगफली का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसको और भी स्वाद देता है.

name: सेनाइ किजहांगु वरुवल रेसिपी - Senai Kizhangu Varuval Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian
description: सेनाइ किजहांगु वरुवल जिसे चेटिनाड स्टाइल सुरन की सब्ज़ी भी कहाँ जाता है एक सरल और स्वादिष्ट सब्ज़ी है. इस रेसिपी में, सुरन को पतला काट कर कढ़ी पत्ते और मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है. सुरन में विटामिन C की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है इसलिए यह आपके सेहत के लिए भी अच्छा माना जाता है.

name: Carrot, Radish & Peanut Salad with Lemon Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  gajjar, radish, moongphali, jeera, dhania
description: Carrot, Radish & Peanut Salad with Lemon Recipe is a refreshing quick salad that can be prepared to have it along with your main course.

name: Khajur And Pakora Raita Recipe - Dates Pakora Raita
main_tag: sindhi sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, jeera, besan, maida
description: A sweet and spicy yogurt preparation, the Khajur And Pakora Raita Recipe is a raita with a twist. Loaded with dates, soft pakoras and a few simple masalas, this raita is mostly made in Sindhi and North Indian households. Eat is as it is or serve with parathas or as part of a meal.

name: Mangalorean Chicken Ghee Roast Recipe
main_tag: mangalorean lunch nonvegeterian  dahiyogurt, haldi, laung, fenugreekseeds, dhania, jeera
description: This Mangalorean Chicken Ghee Roast Recipe, will leave you drooling while reading the recipe. Dry roasted spices ground into a aromatic masala, coated on the chicken pieces which is then cooked in ghee for a rich and classy flavour. hicken ghee roast is loved by most of the people in India as it is rich and has quite vibrant flavors from the homemade ground masala that is being used to cook the chicken.

name: Tamil Nadu Style Chicken Salna Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch nonvegeterian  haldi, saunf, dalchini, laung
description: Tamil Nadu Style Chicken Salna Recipe is an all-time favorite chicken curry that is usually had with flaky parotta by the side. The curry is slowly cooked with ground spice masala and then cooked along with chicken pieces. The longer you let the curry cook with chicken the more flavor it will develop. The curry will eventually develop a bright red color which is very tasty and delicious to have it for your Sunday lunch.

name: Sweet & Spicy Ripe Mango Curry Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  ripe, jeera, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, saunf, hing, haldi, dhania
description: The Sweet & Spicy Ripe Mango Curry Recipe is a lip smacking curry that is made with a perfect blend of spices that is cooked along with ripe mangoes, making it absolutely delectable.

name: Kongunadu Chicken Curry Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch nonvegeterian  haldi, laung, dalchini, saunf, saunf, jeera, dhania
description: Kongunadu Chicken Curry Recipe is an authentic recipe from Tamil Nadu. In this delicious recipe we have made a base of whole spices and onions cooked with marinated chicken. The addition of coconut and poppy seeds add body to the curry.

name: Nepalese Chicken Sekuwa Recipe
main_tag: nepalese appetizer nonvegeterian  timur, haldi, dahiyogurt, dhania
description: Nepalese Chicken Sekuwa Recipe is a popular street food from Nepal. Traditionally it is cooked on an open charcoal grill, besides we have used an oven here to make it much more convenient for home cooking.

name: Murgh Musallam Recipe - Masala Roasted Chicken
main_tag: northindian appetizer nonvegeterian  haldi, dahiyogurt, dhania, jeera, elaichi, laung, badielaichi, elaichi, javitri
description: Murgh Musallam Recipe is a traditional dish of Mughlai cuisine/Awadhi cuisine. It is typically made from a whole chicken, which is roasted with homemade ground masala. The flavors are mainly from a blend of whole spices.

name: Mango Phirni Recipe - Mango Rice Pudding Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  ripe, badam, elaichi
description: Phirni is a popular North-Indian sweet dish that is creamy made with ground rice combined with milk, cream, sugar and some saffron strands for flavoring.

name: Amrakhand Recipe - Mango Shrikhand Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian dessert vegetarian  ripe, greekyogurt, ripe, normalsugarpowdered, elaichi
description: Amrakhand recipe is a delicious Mango Shrikhand recipe that is made from the best of the mangoes available in the summer season.

name: Kesar Mango Phirni Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  badam, elaichi, puree
description: The Kesar Mango Phirni Recipe is a refreshing phirni made from fresh mangoes when they are in season. It makes a great summer party dessert after a delicious indian meal.

name: Ripe Mango Pachadi Recipe - Ripe Mambazha Curry Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  ripe, raikadugu, jeera, hing, haldi
description: The Mambazha Pachadi Recipe is a delicious combination of sweetness from mango and spiciness from chillies. This pachadi goes well with dosa, chapathi and even rice. It tastes delicious when you get the small chunks of mango in mouth.

name: Mamidikaya Perugu Pachadi Recipe -Raw Mango Yogurt Pachadi
main_tag: andhra sidedish vegetarian  raw, dahiyogurt, sambaronions, haldi, raikadugu, split, hing
description: Andhra Style Mamidikaya Perugu Pachadi Recipe (Raw Mango Yogurt Chutney) is a creamy yogurt based chutney with sautéed raw mango pieces. The chutney has the right balance of sweet, sour and spice levels that is mellowed with the creamy yogurt. The pachadi is very famous among the people in Andhra Pradesh and is always accompanied with most of their meals.

name: Raw Mango And Spring Onion Chutney Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  raw, jeera
description: Raw Mango And Spring Onion Chutney Recipe is one such fusion dip that provides fresh tangy flavors along with a crunch. It is a perfect dip to have with your regular dosas, idlis or chillas. The dip carries amazing nutritional benefits and can be relished as a side even with khichdi and tahris.

name: भरवा बेसन मिर्च रेसिपी - Bharwa Besan Mirch Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani lunch vegetarian  ब जन क लल,
description: भरवा बेसन मिर्च सब्ज़ी एक स्वादिष्ट साइड डिश है जिसमे मिर्ची को बेसन के मसाले के साथ भरा जाता है. यह एक आसान रेसिपी है जिसे राजस्थान के घरो में दाल और फुल्के के साथ या दाल बाटी चूरमे के साथ बनाया जाता है. आप बेसन के बजाए आलू का मसाला भी मिर्च में भर सकते है.

name: Himachali Dry Raw Mango Chutney Recipe
main_tag: himachal sidedish vegetarian  sundriedmango, pudina, dhania, preferably2cups
description: A Delicious chutney, Himachali Dry Raw Mango Chutney Recipe is a lovely combination of dry raw mango along with pudina and coriander leaves and a heat from the green chillies.

name: Kacche Aam Ki Launji Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani sidedish vegetarian  raw, hing, raikadugu, saunf, dhania, fenugreekseeds, onionnigellaseeds, haldi
description: Kacche Aam ki Launji is the most famous traditional recipe from the state of Rajasthan. It is a delicious combination of sweet and tangy flavours. Addition of kalonji, fennel seeds and fenugreek seeds are important in this recipe as it gives a twist to the usual launji.

name: Pepe Chingri Recipe - Green Papaya Prawn Curry Recipe
main_tag: bengali lunch nonvegeterian  tejpatta, haldi, jeera, dhania
description: Pepe Chingri is a very popular Bengali Prawn curry made with green papaya and comes from the coastal region of West Bengal. Green papaya or Raw papaya cooked in a simple yet delectable curry is teemed up with prawns or chingri to make an amazing dish that is enjoyed with hot steamed rice. The consistency of the curry here is little thin and a bit spicy as well. The process is quick and hardly requires a handful of ingredients that is easily available at our kitchen pantry.

name: Bengali Aam Chingri Recipe - Prawn Mango Curry In Mustard Sauce
main_tag: bengali sidedish nonvegeterian  raikadugu, raw, adjust, haldi
description: Bengali Aam Chingri Recipe (Prawn Mango Curry Recipe) is a delicious and tangy side dish made with sauteed prawns and raw mango which are fleshed up in a creamy sauce made of mustard and coconut with spices.

name: Sweet & Spicy Totapuri Mango Chutney Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  raw, jeera
description: Sweet & Spicy Totapuri Mango Chutney Recipe that can be made under  10 minutes that stays for a yearlong if prepared and stored correctly.Totapuri is abundantly available in market during the start of the mango season. This Sweet & Spicy Totapuri Mango Chutney is a sugar-free accompaniment recipe which owes its hot color due to Kashmiri red chilli powder.

name: Instant Bengali Aam Doi Recipe  - No Cook Sweet Mango Yogurt
main_tag: bengali dessert vegetarian  ripe, dahiyogurt
description: Instant Bengali Aam Doi Recipe is Sweet Mango Yogurt dish that needs no Cooking or Baking at all. All you need is to prepare your Homemade Sweet Yogurt or store bought Yogurt and get some fresh Mango. The rest will be done in a flash. Then refrigerate and relax to absorb the beauty of this summer special dessert to the core.

name: Khatta-Meetha Aam Ka Murabba Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani sidedish vegetarian  raw, elaichi
description: Khatta-Meetha Aam Ka Murabba is a fruit preserve that is made with raw totapuri mangoes.

name: Mamidikaya Pesara Pappu Pachadi Recipe - Raw Mango & Dal Chutney
main_tag: andhra sidedish vegetarian  raw, split, jeera, raikadugu, hing
description: Mamidikaya Pesara Pappu Pachadi Recipe (Raw Mango and Moong Dal Chutney) is a specialty in Andhra cuisine. Pachadi in Andhra cuisine are mainly chutney that is ground with a dal or any vegetable.

name: Uddina Hittu Recipe (Udnittu) | Urad Dal Flour In Spiced Buttermilk
main_tag: udupi sidedish diabeticfriendly  raikadugu, driedgreenchillies, hing
description: Uddina Hittu Recipe (Udnittu) | Urad Dal Flour Cooked In Spiced Buttermilk. The key requirement to make this dish tasty is sour buttermilk, ginger and a strong tempering of hing in coconut oil and sun dried curd chillies. Serve Uddina Hittu Recipe (Udnittu) | Urad Dal Flour In Spiced Buttermilk on a steaming hot rice and mor milagai accompaniment.

name: Pudina Mavinakayi Chutney Recipe - Mint Mango Chutney
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian  raw, dhania, pudina, split, raikadugu
description: Karnataka Style Pudina Mavinakayi Chutney Recipe (Mint Mango Chutney), is a delicious fresh raw mango chutney.

name: Mavinakayi Chutney Recipe - South Canara Raw Mango Chutney
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian  raw, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, jeera, hing
description: South Canara Style Mavinakayi Hindi Recipe (Raw Mango Spicy Chutney) as we call locally in South Canara, Karnataka is a seasonal delight. Mango season is incomplete without this spicy and tangy chutney. It can be served with idli, dosa, roti or hot rice and coconut oil. It is a very simple to prepare recipe and yummy to taste.

name: Mamidikaya Nuvvula Pachadi Recipe - Raw Mango Til Chutney Recipe
main_tag: andhra sidedish vegetarian  raw, tilseeds, adjusttotaste, jeera, raikadugu, adjusttotaste, hing
description: Andhra Style Mamidikaya Nuvvula Pachadi (Mango Sesame Chutney Recipe) is a classic chutney from Andhra cuisine made with fresh raw mango and roasted sesame seeds. This is a very old traditional dish which is a devoured by people of all ages because of its distinct taste. One of the main ingredients in this recipe is the "sesame seeds" or "til" which give the dish a nutty flavor.

name: चाउ चाउ सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Chow Chow Poriyal
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian
description: चाउ चाउ सब्ज़ी एक सरल और स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसमे चाउ चाउ को रोज के मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है. इस सब्ज़ी में चाउ चाउ को भाप कर उसमे राइ, उरद दाल और कढ़ी पत्ते का तड़का दिया जाता है.

name: Chatpata Kabuli Chana Salad - Chickpea Salad Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer highproteinvegetarian  whitechickpeas, dhania
description: Chatpata Kabuli Chana Salad is an easy and quick recipe and can be made with ingredients which are easily available in our kitchen.

name: Chatpata Kabuli Chana Salad - Chickpea Salad Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer highproteinvegetarian  whitechickpeas, dhania
description: Chatpata Kabuli Chana Salad is an easy and quick recipe and can be made with ingredients which are easily available in our kitchen.

name: Matki Kala Chana Salad Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer vegetarian  matki, brownchickpeas, jeera, haldi, dhania
description: Matki Kala Chana Salad Recipe is a light and healthy recipe which you can have at anytime of the day. Moth Sprouts and Kala Chana tossed in a chatpata dressing.  It's not time consuming and makes a great tea time snack, breakfast or a light dinner.

name: तीखे पत्ता गोभी चावल रेसिपी - Spicy Cabbage Rice Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: तीखे पत्ता गोभी चावल बनाने में आसान है और खाने में स्वादिष्ट। आप इस रेसिपी में बचे हुए चावल का भी प्रयोग कर सकते है. इस स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी को बनाए और अपने लंच बॉक्स के लिए पैक करें। आप इसे अपने रात के खाने के लिए भी अपने पसंद के रायते के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: लौकी पील चटनी रेसिपी - Bottle Gourd Peel Chutney Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian
description: लौकी पील चटनी एक स्वादिष्ट चटनी है जिसमे लौकी, हरी मिर्च, टमाटर और सूखे मसालो का प्रयोग किया गया है. यह बनाने में आसान है और आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: हुरूली कालु चटनी पौड़ी रेसिपी - Horse Gram Chutney Podi Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian
description: हॉर्स ग्राम जिसे की हिंदी में कुलीथ कहा जाता है बहुत ही सेहत मंद होती है क्यूंकि इसमें प्रोटीन की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है. इसे कन्नड़ में हुरूली कालु के नाम से जाना जाता है. आप इस चटनी पौड़ी को बनाकर 1 महीने के लिए फ्रिज में रख सकते है.

name: Chicken Pasanda Recipe
main_tag: mughlai lunch nonvegeterian  dhania, jeera, dalchini, elaichi, tejpatta, dahiyogurt, haldi
description: Chicken Pasanda Recipe was a favorite dish in the courts of the Mughal emperors . It was popular meat dish among the courtyards, thus the name “Pasanda” which is translated from “Pasande” meaning favorite.

name: धनिया पुदीना चटनी रेसिपी - Green Chutney Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian
description: धनिया पुदीना चटनी जिसे हरी चटनी भी कहा जाता है हरे धनिये और पुदीने से बनाई जाती है. इसमें निम्बू और शक्कर भी डाली जाती है जिसे इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ जाता है. आप इस चटनी को सैंडविच, वड़ा पाव या रोल में भी लगा सकते है.

name: Karuveppilai Chicken Fry Recipe- Curry Leaf Flavoured Chicken
main_tag: tamilnadu appetizer highproteinnonvegetarian  dhania, haldi, dhania, dalchini, elaichi, saunf
description: Karuveppilai Chicken Fry Recipe is a delicious protein packed starter that you can make for your family and friends as a special meal. The chicken is cooked  along with roasted curry leaf masala that includes other spices as well.

name: Jowar Garlic Naan Recipe- Healthy Sorghum Naan
main_tag: northindian maincourse diabeticfriendly  sorghum, fenugreekleaves, dahiyogurt
description: This Jowar Garlic Naan Recipe, is a healthy version of the class naan. It is delicious and easy to make and absolutely has that melt in the mouth flavour and texture. Made with whole wheat flour, jowar/sorghum flour and flavoured with garlic and cooked in ghee. This recipe is a must try and can also be included in your everyday meals.

name: Achari Lachha Paratha Recipe-Spicy Indian Style Flaky Bread
main_tag: northindian maincourse vegetarian
description: The Achari Lachha Paratha is a twist to the classic lachha paratha. The flaky and crispy layers of the paratha is slathered with achaar masala or spicy oil taken from the Punjabi style mango pickle. Since there's always some masala and oil at the bottom of the mango pickle jar, using it in these parathas is a great idea . It makes it so delicious & spicy, a great innovation to serve at your parties.

name: 7 Cups Burfi Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  besan, elaichi
description: 7 cups as the name indicates is a burfi made with 7 cups of ingredients. It is a simple burfi recipe that can be whipped up in less time. All ingredients used for this burfi are one that are easily available in all Indian Kitchens - Besan, grated coconut, sugar, ghee and milk. 7 Cups burfi is usually made as one of the sweets during Diwali along with other sweet and savoury items.

name: Hare Tamatar Ki Sabzi Recipe - Raw Tomato Curry
main_tag: indian lunch vegan  jeera, raikadugu, hing, haldi, dhania, jeera, driedfenugreekleaves
description: Hare Tamatar Ki Sabzi is a spicy tangy, delicious side dish that comes from North Indian cuisines. The recipe has passed on through various regions with different variations done, hence it doesn't belong to any particular regional cuisine.

name: Mooli Jowar Ki Roti Recipe - Mullangi Kambu Chapathi
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  radish, sorghum
description: Mooli Jowar Ki Roti is a healthy and wholesome breakfast roti that fills your stomach to keep you going for a long time. Kambu Roti/Chapathi as it is known in South India, is a diabetic friendly recipe as Jowar is a complex carbohydrate ingredient.

name: Madurai Spicy Tomato Chutney Recipe- Thakkali Vengayam Chutney
main_tag: tamilnadu sidedish vegetarian  raikadugu, split
description: Spicy Madurai Tomato Chutney is a tangy-sweet-spicy chutney from the district of Madurai in Tamil Nadu. This dish is found to served at road side eateries and carts in Madurai and some parts of Tamil Nadu.

name: Green Moong Sprout Salad Recipe With Vegetables- No Onion No Garlic
main_tag: indian sidedish highproteinvegetarian  gajjar, capsicum, dhania
description: The Green Moong Sprout Salad Recipe With Vegetables is a quick and healthy salad that is fat free with no oils and vinegar.

name: Cucumber Pineapple Raw Mango Salad Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  raw, coriander mint, pudina
description: Cucumber Pineapple Raw Mango Salad Recipe is a sweet and tangy Indian Salad Recipe that gets its refreshing flavour from its coriander and mint dressing. It can be served as part of a meal or as a snack in itself.

name: Cucumber Tomato Corn Peanut Salad With Lemon Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  moongphali, dhania
description: Cucumber Tomato Corn Peanut Salad With Lemon Recipe is a quickly tossed Salad that you can make in your kitchen with absolutely no cooking. As this salad has all freshly chopped vegetables the nutrients also will remain intact.

name: Dal Banjara Recipe - Langar Wali Dal
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  split, bengalgramdal, tejpatta, dalchini, haldi, dhania, jeera
description: The Dal Banjara recipe also popularly known as the Langar Wali dal is a simple dal to make in a single pot.

name: Maharashtrian Style Surnachi Koshimbir Recipe-Yam Salad
main_tag: maharashtrian sidedish vegetarian  suransenairatalu, dhania, raikadugu, hing
description: Maharashtrian Style Surnachi Koshimbir Recipe  is a wonderful way to use yam to make a fresh salad.

name: One Pot Pressure Cooker Chicken Curry Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch nonvegeterian  haldi, dhania
description: Á rustic yet authentic South Indian inspired One Pot Pressure Cooker Chicken Curry Recipe, can be a quick fix to your weeknight dinners. Deriving its flavours from aromatic spices and tantalising your taste buds, this recipe spells comfort food at its best.

name: Rajma and Corn Salad Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish highproteinvegetarian  pudina, jeera
description: Rajma and Corn Salad Recipe is a healthy salad  packed with protein and a healthy option for a light snack. It's crunchy, sour, spicy & a tiny hint of sweetness from the corn. It surely won't disappoint you! This can be served as a snack as well and fills up a good portion of our daily protein requirement.

name: Coorg Mange Pajji Recipe (Coorgi Style Ripe Mango Raita)
main_tag: coorg lunch vegetarian  ripe, dahiyogurt, raikadugu
description: Coorg Mange Pajji Recipe is a delicious raita recipe made using the ripened mangoes. Traditionally, it is made using the wild mango variety which are available in abundance during the summer season in the Coorg region. However, you can use any variety of mangoes of your choice.

name: Methi Moong Dal Palak Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  split, fenugreekleaves, hing, jeera, dhania, haldi
description: Methi Moong Dal Palak Recipe a delicious lentil curry made with whole moong dal lentil and fresh fenugreek leaves. This recipe is a healthy menu choice for the intake of everyday protein and is also packed with vitamins and minerals.

name: Horsegram Dal Recipe - Kulith/Kollu Dal
main_tag: indian lunch highproteinvegetarian  kollukulith, haldi, raikadugu, jeera, hing, dhania, dhania
description: Horsegram Dal is an easy recipe to cook and it has lots of health benefits. It is great for weight loss, aids in digestion and controls the release of sugar into the bloodstream, therefore making it a great lentil for diabetics. Apart from health benefits, it tastes great too.

name: Ambe Dal Recipe - Maharashtrian Salad with Raw Mango & Chana Dal
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch highproteinvegetarian  bengalgramdal, raw, dependingonthetartnesstheamountcanbeadjusted, raikadugu, jeera, hing
description: Ambe Dal Recipe with Green Mango and Chana Dal is a traditional Maharashtrian preparation, specially made during the hot summer months, when green Mangoes are abundant.

name: Chickpea Salad Recipe With Raw Mango
main_tag: indian appetizer highproteinvegetarian  whitechickpeas, raw, dhania, pudina
description: Beat the heat with this Chickpea Salad Recipe with Raw Mango, protein packed chickpeas boiled and tossed with fresh ingredients to make a healthy salad.

name: Cucumber, Red Radish, Tomatoes & Onion Salad Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer diabeticfriendly  dhania
description: The Cucumber, Red Radish, Tomatoes & Onion Salad Recipe, is a simple wholesome and delicious salad that you can make in a jiffy if you have all the ingredients handy. And it is completely oil free and fat free. The salad is packed with flavors from black pepper, green chillies, coriander, lemon and salt.

name: Carrot Cucumber Tomato Salad with Lemon and Coriander Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer vegetarian  gajjar, dhania
description: Carrot Tomato Salad is delicious and simple salad made with grated carrots and a lemon coriander dressing. A great starter salad to introduce to children. You can make many variations to this recipe, by adding finely chopped cucumber, pomegranates, chopped apples, green chillies or event steamed lentils.

name: Chicken In Curry Leaves Gravy Recipe
main_tag: indian sidedish nonvegeterian  dhania, pudina, optional
description: Chicken In Curry Leaves Gravy Recipe is a mouthwatering spicy recipe where chicken is cooked in a coriander, mint, curry gravy. Green chilli paste and ginger garlic is also used in this gravy which makes it more tasty and flavourful.

name: Murgh Malaiwala Recipe - Chicken In Rich Creamy Gravy
main_tag: northindian lunch nonvegeterian  badam, elaichi, dalchini, tejpatta, driedfenugreekleaves
description: Murgh Malaiwala recipe is a perfect combination of marinated and roasted chicken pieces in rich malai and milk gravy.

name: Chicken Tikka Recipe
main_tag: punjabi appetizer nonvegeterian  haldi, besan, caromseeds, jeera, dhania, dahiyogurt
description: Chicken Tikka Recipe is a traditional recipe that has its roots from Punjab. The dish has become more popular in India and Pakistan.

name: Kadai Chicken Recipe - Chicken Cooked With Onion And Capsicum
main_tag: northindian sidedish nonvegeterian  capsicum, jeera, haldi, dhania
description: Kadai Chicken Recipe is a very famous dish which was brought down from Pakistan and North India. The recipe is known for its rich and spiciness that is mixed along with chunks of chicken.

name: आम की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Mango Curry Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: आम सारे फलो का राजा कहा जाता है. कोई भी ऐसा व्यक्ति नहीं है जिसे आम पसंद न हो. यह एक सरल सब्ज़ी है जिसमे आम को मसालों के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह सब्ज़ी तीखी, मीठी और खट्टी होती है और इसे रोटी या चावल के साथ बनाया जाता है.

name: तोक दाल रेसिपी - Bengali Style Raw Mango Dal
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian
description: तोक दाल जिसे आम दाल भी कहा जाता है बंगाल की प्रदीश दाल है जिसमे कच्चे आम का प्रयोग किआ जाता है. यह बनाने में आसान है और कच्चा आम इस दाल को और भी स्वादिष्ट बना देता है. आप इस दाल को अपने रोज के खाने के लिए परोस सकते है.

name: कच्चे आम का रायता रेसिपी - Raw Mango Raita
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: कच्चे आम का रायता एक बहुत ही सरल और स्वादिष्ट रायता है जिसे आप अपने खाने के साथ बनाया जाता है. यह रायता ताज़ा, और स्वादिष्ट है, और रोटियों के साथ-साथ चावल के व्यंजनों के साथ भी परोसा जा सकता है. आम के मौसम में इससे अधिकतर बनाया जाता है और कच्चे आम का खट्टापन इस रायते को और भी स्वादिष्ट बना देता है.

name: Raw Mango Prawns Curry Recipe
main_tag: southindian maincourse nonvegeterian  raw, elaichi, dalchini, haldi
description: Raw Mango Prawns Curry Recipe is a wonderful blend of raw mango with shrimps cooked in a luscious coconut gravy. The coconut, curry leaves and onions are ground to a fine paste which gives the curry a wonderful aroma and flavor as you mix it along with the shrimps and raw mango.

name: पोतोलेर डोलमा रेसिपी - Potoler Dolma Recipe
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian
description: परवल को बंगाली में पोतोल कहाँ जाता है और डोलमा का मतलब होता है भरमा सब्ज़ी। इस रेसिपी को ज्यादातर प्रॉन्स या फिश के साथ बनाया जाता है लेकिन यहाँ पर हमने मसाले के लिए पनीर और ड्राई फ्रूट्स का इस्तेमाल किया है. इन भरमा परवल को फिर टमाटर काजू ग्रेवी में डाला जाता है.

name: चाउ चाउ गाजर कूटू रेसिपी - Chow Chow and Carrot Kootu
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian
description: चाउ चाउ गाजर कूटू तमिल नाडु की प्रसिद्ध रेसिपी है जिसे हर घर में बनाया जाता है. चाउ चाउ गाजर कूटू में नरिययल और हरी मिर्च का प्रयोग भी किया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है. यह बनाने में आसान है इसलिए आप इसे अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: वेंडकाई पुली कूटू रेसिपी - Vendaikai (Okra) Puli Kootu
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian
description: वेंडकाई पुली कूटू तमिल नाडु की प्रसिद्ध रेसिपी है जिसे हर घर में बनाया जाता है. वेंडकाई पुली कूटू में इमली का प्रयोग भी किया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है. यह बनाने में आसान है इसलिए आप इसे अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: Bottle Gourd Peel Chutney Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  lauki, haldi, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, split, hing, dhania
description: Bottle Gourd Peel Chutney is a delicious chutney which is made from bottle gourd, green chillies, tomatoes and dry spices.

name: Dahi Sabudana Recipe (Savory Tapioca Pearls Seasoned with Yogurt)
main_tag: indian northindianbreakfast vegetarian  tapiocapearls, dahiyogurt, orusebuttermilk, jeera
description: Dahi Sabudana Recipe (Savory Tapioca Pearls Seasoned with Yogurt) is a typical Maharashtrian recipe made during religious fasts. This is a quick recipe (leaving the soaking time) and can be easily made by amateur cooks too.

name: Sama Khichdi Recipe - Barnyard Millet Khichdi -Navratri Fasting - Vrat Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  aloo, gajjar, tejpatta, dalchini, dhania, rocksalt
description: Sama Khichdi Recipe - Barnyard Millet Khichdi is a one pot dish made with Barnyard Millet with an assortment of vegetables flavoured with Indian spices. It is made in a pressure cooker which helps in cooking faster as well as gives a creamy texture to the dish.

name: सुरन मूंगफली करी रेसिपी - Suran Moongphali Curry
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: सुरन जिसे येम भी कहा जाता है सेहत के लिए अच्छाा माना जाता है. सुरन में विटामिन B6, विटामिन C, एंटीऑक्सिडेंट्स की मात्रा अधिक होती है.

name: Raw Mango Sambar Recipe - South Indian Mangai Sambar Recipe
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, raw, raikadugu, jeera, haldi, raikadugu, split, hing
description: Raw Mango Sambar Recipe is a delicious Tamil Nadu Style Sambar where dal is cooked with raw mango and other South Indian spices. Whole spices like mustard seeds, dry red chilli, hing, urad dal are also poured over the dal as a tempering that helps to add more flavours.

name: चेटिनाड मुत्तई मसाला रेसिपी - Chettinad Muttai Masala
main_tag: chettinad lunch eggetarian
description: चेटिनाड मुत्तई मसाला स्वाद से भरपूर अंडे की करी है जिसे दक्षिण भारत में बनाया जाता है. इसमें चेटिनाड मसाले का प्रयोग किया जाता है को इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है.

name: गोअन मूलयाचो रोस रेसिपी - Goan Moolyacho Ross
main_tag: goan lunch vegetarian
description: गोअन मूलयाचो रोस एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है.  मूलयाचो मतलब मूली होता है. इस करी को ड्रमस्टिक करी की तरह बनाया जाता है और चावल के साथ परोसा जाता है. यह बनाने में आसान है इसलिए आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है.

name: कच्चे आम की चटनी रेसिपी - Sweet and Spicy Raw Mango Chutney
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: कच्चे आम की चटनी एक बहुत ही स्वादिष्ट चटनी है जिसे आप अपने भोजन के साथ परोस सकते है. इसमें कच्चे आम की खटास होती है जो इसको और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है.

name: Horsegram And Foxtail Millet Idli Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  split, kollukulith, flattenedrice, fenugreekseeds
description: A super healthy yet delicious idli recipe, this Horsegram And Foxtail Millet Idli Recipe is a must try recipe in your kitchen.

name: कच्चे आमवाली मसूर दाल रेसिपी - Raw Mango Masoor Dal Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner highproteinvegetarian
description: आमवाली मसूर दाल एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसमे कच्चे आम का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इस सब्ज़ी को बनाने के लिए सरसों के तेल का प्रयोग किया जाता है जिससे इसका फ्लेवर और भी बढ़ जाता है.

name: Foxtail Millet Rava Idli Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  dahiyogurt, gajjar, adjust, dhania, raikadugu, split, bengalgramdal
description: Foxtail Millet Rava Idli Recipe is an instant idli recipe made of healthy foxtail millet and semolina, and needs no fermentation time

name: Snake Gourd Salan Recipe (Snake Gourd Cooked In Tangy Spicy Peanut Sesame Curry)
main_tag: andhra dinner vegetarian  pudulangai, jeera, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, haldi, dhania, dhania, moongphali, tilseeds
description: Snake Gourd Salan Recipe is a twist the traditional recipe from the Hyderabadi/ Andhra cuisine served on the Eid festival. Salan is hot and spicy and has a tangy gravy. All the spiciness comes from chillies and tamarind, and the gravy blended with other freshly ground spices and peanuts. In this recipes, instead of Mirchi we are using snake gourd and it blends brilliantly into the salan gravy.

name: Coorg Style Kulae Puttu Recipe- Puttu with Jackfruit & Jaggery
main_tag: coorg southindianbreakfast vegetarian  kathal, adjusttotaste, elaichi
description: Coorg Style Kulae Puttu is a traditional Coorgi dish made from seasonal fruit - Jackfruit.

name: Sindhi Tahiri Recipe - Sindhi Style Sweet Rice
main_tag: sindhi maincourse vegetarian  saunf, elaichi
description: A traditional recipe, Sindhi Tahiri is influenced by the Awadhi cuisine. This sweet rice preparation is cooked with simple aromatic masalas and topped with dry fruits which gives it a unique flavour. This rice is usually made on special occasions and festivals.

name: चकुंदर सांबर रेसिपी - Beetroot Sambar (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: southindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  ग र न शक ल ए
description: चकुंदर सांबर दक्षिण भारतीय रेसिपी है जिसमे दाल और चकुंदर का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इस दाल को सांबर पाउडर से फ्लेवर किया जाता है. यह सांबर से पोषण से भरपूर है और बनाने में भी बहुत आसान है.

name: काबुली चना रसम रेसिपी - Kabuli Chana Rasam (Recipe in Hindi)
main_tag: southindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: काबुली चना रसम एक स्वादिष्ट दक्षिण भारतीय रेसिपी है जिसमे चना का पानी का प्रयोग किया जाता है. दाल के पानी का प्रयोग करने के बजाए, चने के पानी का प्रयोग किया जाता है.

name: किरई सांबर रेसिपी - Keerai Sambar (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: southindian dinner diabeticfriendly
description: किरई सांबर एक दक्षिण भारतीय दाल है जिसमे पालक, अमरंथ और अन्य हरी पत्तियों का प्रयोग किया जाता है. इस सांबर में इमली और सांबर पाउडर का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है.

name: कोलम्बी भात रेसिपी - Maharashtrian Prawn Rice Recipe
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch nonvegeterian
description: कोलम्बी भात महाराष्ट्रियन स्टाइल पुलाव है जिसमे प्रॉन्स का प्रयोग किया जाता है. यह टमाटर राइस की तरह बनाया जाता है और इसमें प्रॉन्स का इस्तेमाल किया जाता है. आप इस डिश को रायते के साथ या अपने पुरे खाने के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: मट्टा राइस मटर पुलाव रेसिपी - Matta Rice Peas Pulao
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: मट्टा राइस मटर पुलाव एक स्वादिष्ट पुलाव रेसिपी है जिसमे केरला में प्रसिद्ध मट्टा राइस (चावल) का प्रयोग किया जाता यही. आप इस पुलाव को किसी भी दक्षिण भारतीय ग्रेवी के साथ परोस सकते है. मट्टा राइस को रेड राइस भी कहाँ जाता है और इससे आप कहीं और पुलाव भी बना सकते है.

name: Maakhmi Dal Recipe-Sindhi Style Moong Dal
main_tag: sindhi maincourse vegetarian  split, dalchini, laung, elaichi, haldi, dhania, jeera, pudina
description: Maakhmi Dal, is the classic yellow moong dal cooked in sindhi style. Starting with a tadka of ghee and whole spices along with a robust bhuna masala of onions, tomatoes and dry masalas, this masala makes all the difference.

name: आलू सागु रेसिपी - Potato Saagu Recipe For Rava Idli
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian
description: आलू भाजी को हर क्षेत्र में अलग अलग तरीके से पकाया जाता है. उन्ही में से एक है आलू सागु जिसे दक्षिण भारत में रवा इडली के साथ परोसा जाता है. यह इडली और सागु दक्षिण भारत में बहुत से रेस्टोरेंट्स में परोसा जाता है. इसे अपने नाश्ते के लिए बनाए और अपने परिवार के साथ इसका आनंद ले.

name: केरला स्टाइल अरबी की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Kerala Style Arbi Curry
main_tag: kerala lunch vegetarian
description: केरला स्टाइल अरबी की सब्ज़ी में अरबी को ताज़े नारियल के साथ पकाया जाता है और चावल के साथ परोसा जाता है. मालाबार इमली का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इस करी के स्वाद को और भी बढ़ता है. आप इसमें इमली की जगह कोकुम का भी प्रयोग कर सकते है.

name: Gond Ke Ladoo Recipe - Edible Gum Ladoo
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  ediblegum, kopra, badam
description: Gond Ke Ladoo is an old and traditional recipe which reminds of our childhood. It is mostly prepared during the winter to prevent us from catching colds. It is a very simple recipe and can be prepared with few ingredients.

name: Andhra Style Chicken Fry Recipe
main_tag: andhra appetizer highproteinnonvegetarian  haldi, greekyogurt, saunf, dhania
description: Filled with the goodness of spicy chillies and the local flavour, this Andhra Chicken Fry is a must try recipe. It is best to serve during your weekday meals to take a break from the regular food. It is easy to make and requires less time to cook. Try this and we are sure you will make it again and again.

name: Chicken Masala Fry Recipe
main_tag: indian appetizer nonvegeterian  dahiyogurt, dhania
description: Chicken Masala Fry recipe is one of our favourite chicken side dishes that is very easy to make and gets ready in no time. You just need yogurt and everyday masalas to make this mouth watering chicken starter.

name: Peanut Butter Chicken Recipe
main_tag: asian dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  canbesubstitutedwith18teaspoonsmokedpaprika
description: When the heart wants Indian but the tastebuds want a bit more what do you do? You make peanut butter chicken, douse it with Chinese chilli oil, serve it on a bed of lemon rice and you are set.

name: Chicken Bharta Recipe - Dhaba Style Chicken Masala
main_tag: indian dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  elaichi, laung, tejpatta, dalchini, badielaichi, jeera, dhania, haldi, dahiyogurt, salted, driedfenugreekleaves, dhania, chopped
description: Chicken Bharta which tastes heavenly is a dhaba style preparation where shredded chicken is cooked in spicy creamy gravy. Chicken Bharta is deliciously creamy in taste due to the use of mashed egg yolk, fresh cream and yogurt in it.

name: Veggie Rava Idli Recipe- Healthy Breakfast Idli
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  semolinarava, dahiyogurt, matar, gajjar, dhania, adjustable, raikadugu, bengalgramdal
description: Veggie Rava Idli is a lovely recipe that has the added goodness of an array of vegetables incorporated into an idli made of rava/semolina making it a healthy breakfast option and an interesting way of sneaking vegtables into your child's diet.

name: Sabbakki Rava Idli Recipe- Sabudana Rava Idli
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  semolinarava, raikadugu, jeera, bengalgramdal, split, hing, dhania, tapiocapearls, dahiyogurt
description: Sabbakki Rava Idli Recipe is an idli made with a combination of suji/semolina and sabakki/sabudana.

name: Barley Rava Idli Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  semolinarava, seeds, dahiyogurt, raikadugu, split, bengalgramdal
description: Barley Rava Idli is a healthy breakfast/dinner recipe which doesn’t require any fermentation.

name: Classic South Indian Rava Idli Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  semolinarava, dahiyogurt, dhania, gajjar, raikadugu, split, hing
description: The Rava Idli Recipe is a classic South Indian breakfast dish that you can make in just 20 minutes if you have all the ingredients ready. The addition is simple spices like ginger and curry leaves, makes this dish bring out the flavors of the steamed rava idli.  You can get creative and add a variety of vegetables and make the rava idli more nutritious for your family.

name: Chicken Meatballs In A Makhni Gravy Recipe
main_tag: northindian maincourse nonvegeterian  elaichi, javitri, tejpatta, driedfenugreekleaves, salted, dhania
description: Chicken Meatballs In A Makhni Gravy is a usual butter chicken recipe which gets a delicious twist by adding chicken meatballs flavoured with onions, green chillies and garlic in a rich and creamy Makhni gravy. Addition of honey balances the flavour of the gravy and the cream adds the richness to it.

name: Meetha Daliya With Milk & Fruits Recipe - Broken Wheat Porridge
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast vegetarian  daliagodumairava, iusedthesmallergrains, saunf
description: Daliya or Broken Wheat porridge breakfast bowl is loaded with fruits and is a healthy, handy and delicious breakfast option for weekdays. You can roast the broken wheat and cook it in milk on the weekend and chill it in fridge. All that you need to do on the busy week day morning is throw in fruits of your choice, nuts or seeds and serve.

name: Javvarisi Dosa Recipe - Soft & Instant Sabudana Dosa Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  tapiocapearls, dahiyogurt, dhania
description: Javvarisi Dosa Recipe is a delicious dosa that is made from sabudana pearls also known as sago or tapioca pearls. Sago, is ground along with rice and spices with black pepper corns and cooked similar to how the Rava dosa is made.

name: Oatmeal Dosa Recipe - Healthy Instant Oats Dosa Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  oatmeal, semolinarava, dahiyogurt, jeera, dhania
description: Oatmeal Dosa recipe is a super simple and quick preparation of this savoury dosa. The quick cooking oats are combined along with whole wheat flour and spiced with green chillies and ginger and flavoured with a bountiful of coriander leaves.

name: Tamil Nadu Style Vengaya Sambar Recipe - Pearl Onion Sambar
main_tag: tamilnadu southindianbreakfast vegetarian  splittoordal, sambaronions, haldi, raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, hing
description: Tamil Nadu Style Vengaya Sambar Recipe also known as the Pearl Onion Sambar Recipe is a simple and yet delicious sambar recipe that is made authentic with a homemade sambar powder.

name: Badam Halwa Recipe - Delicious Almond Halwa With Khoya
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  badam, mawa
description: Badam Halwa Recipe is a classic Indian dessert recipe that is packed with flavors from badam and made along with khoya to make it rich and delicious.

name: Inji Thogayal Recipe - Spicy & Delicious Ginger Chutney
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  fenugreekseeds, split, gingelly, raikadugu, split, hing
description: Inji Chutney or Thogayal is a delicious and healthy South Indian accompaniment for rice. Finely chopped ginger is sauteed along with garlic, tamarind, green and red chillies and ground into a smooth paste and tempered with mustard seeds.

name: सरागवो नु शाक रेसिपी - Drumstick Masala Sabzi
main_tag: gujarati﻿ lunch vegetarian
description: सरागवो नु शाक एक गुजराती रेसिपी है जिसमे ड्रमस्टिक को रोज के मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है. हम अक्सर ड्रमस्टिक का कढ़ी या सांबर में प्रयोग करते है, लेकिन यह ड्रमस्टिक सब्ज़ी बहुत ही स्वादिष्ट है. इसे जरूर बनाए और हमे बताए की यह आपको कैसे लगी?

name: Brinjal Prawns Masala Curry Recipe - Baingan Prawn Masala
main_tag: indian lunch nonvegeterian  bainganeggplant, dhania, haldi
description: Brinjal Prawns Masala Curry Recipe is a delicious combination of Prawns and eggplant/brinjal that is cooked in a tangy and spicy tomato based gravy that is flavored with sambar powder or curry powder.

name: Sindhi Bhuga Chawal Recipe - Sindhi Style Browned Rice Pulao
main_tag: sindhi maincourse vegetarian  tejpatta, laung, elaichi, dalchini
description: A classic recipe, Sindhi Bhuga Chawal Recipe is a sindhi delicacy where rice is cooked with whole spices and caramelised onions that are sauteed until they turn into a lovely dark brown colour. In Sindhi, 'bhuga' means 'cook until brown', and that is how this rice preparation gets its name.

name: Murgh Masala Recipe - Chicken Tangdi Masala
main_tag: northindian lunch nonvegeterian  dahiyogurt, elaichi, dalchini, tejpatta, haldi, jeera, dhania
description: Murgh Masala is an easy chicken recipe which is spicy and succulent and is alos loved by everyone. In Murgh Masala, chicken legs are marinated in a yogurt marinade and cooked on the bone in a spicy tomato onion gravy.

name: Kerala Style Chakka Varattiyathu Recipe- Ripe Jackfruit Halwa
main_tag: kerala dessert vegetarian  kathal, jeera, elaichi
description: Kerala Style Chakka Varattiyathu is a tasty dessert recipe made with jackfruit. It is a halwa made with ripe jackfruit, jaggery, ghee, and cardamom powder.

name: Jackfruit Idli Recipe - Pansu Idli
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  elaichi, kathal
description: Jackfruit idli or Pansu Idli recipe is a very famous dish from Coastal Karnataka. They are locally known as Halasina Hannina Idli or Kadubu or Gatti ".  Made of jackfruit, these soft and flavourful idlis have delectable aroma and taste of jackfruit.

name: Jackfruit Seed Modak Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  kathal, elaichi, gingelly, driedleaves
description: A twist to the classic Modak, this Jackfruit Seed Modak Recipe, is stuffed with a sweet mixture made of healthy jackfruit seeds, stuffed in a rice pocket.

name: Kerala Style Chakka Pal Kozhukattai Recipe-Rice Dumpling In Jackfruit flavored Coconut Milk
main_tag: kerala onepotdish vegetarian  kathal, elaichi
description: Kerala Style Chakka Pal Kozhukattai Recipe is a variation to the authentic style kerala breakfast made from rice dumpling dipped in sweet coconut milk. The recipe is flavored by ripe jackfruit which gives it a natural taste to the whole dish. No additional sweetner is required.

name: Enchorer Torkari Recipe - Bengali Style Raw Jackfruit in Semi-gravy
main_tag: bengali dinner vegetarian  kathal, cutintocubes, aloo, jeera, haldi, dalchini, elaichi, laung, tejpatta
description: An aromatic raw jackfruit dish, this Enchorer Torkari Recipe is a Bengali Style Raw Jackfruit cooked in mustard oil, and the jackfruit pieces have a lovely coating of thick gravy it is cooked in.

name: Tamil Nadu Style Pala Kottai Sambar Recipe - Mangalore Cucumber & Jackfruit Seed Sambar
main_tag: tamilnadu maincourse vegetarian  kathal, splittoordal, haldi
description: Tamil Nadu Style Pala Kottai Sambar also known as Mangalore Cucumber and Jackfruit Seed Sambar is a recipe taken from the roots from Tamil Nadu Cuisine.

name: Kerala Style Chakka Adai Recipe-Rice Flour and Jackfruit Flatbread
main_tag: kerala indianbreakfast vegetarian  kathal, elaichi
description: Kerala Style Chakka Adai Recipe is essentially a sweet flat bread made of rice flour and ripe jackfruit. Is a typical snack made in Kerala

name: लेमन सेवई रेसिपी - Lemon Sevai Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian
description: सेवई जिन्हे राइस नूडल्स भी कहाँ जाता है एक नाश्ते की सामग्री है जिसे तमिल ब्राह्मण घरो में बनाया जाता है. आप इसे लेमन सेवई, नारियल सेवई, एल सेवई, दही सेवई और भी बहुत साड़ी चीजे बना सकते है. आप इसे अपने बच्चो ले लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: Kakrar Jhal Recipe - Bengali Style Crab Curry
main_tag: bengali maincourse nonvegeterian  around500gm, aloo, haldi, jeera, dhania, elaichi, laung, dalchini
description: Bengali Style Crab Curry which is called as Kakrar Jhal in Bengali is a sea food gravy prepared using crab and potatoes. Onion, ginger, garlic and dry spices are used to prepare the base of this gravy.

name: Cranberry Whole Wheat Naan Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  dahiyogurt, badam, optional
description: Cranberry and Prune Chutney Whole Wheat Naan Recipe, an innovative version from the traditional Indian Naan Flat bread. It is topped with rich and sweet prunes and cranberries. Naan is an Indian flat bread that can be made very easily at home and that too on stove top. The result – soft, pillow, delicious naans!

name: Ragi Oatmeal Kanji Recipe - Healthy Diabetic Porridge Recipe
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  fingermilletnagli, oatmeal
description: The Ragi Oatmeal Porridge Recipe is one of the most nutritious breakfast dishes you can serve for your entire family. This Kanji recipe is made with the addition of oats and ragi flour and you can either make it sweet by adding jaggery, honey or even simply chop bananas and add it to the kanji. You can also make it savory by adding a pinch of salt and serve the Ragi Oatmeal Kanji for breakfast.

name: Ragi Arisi Vella Puttu Recipe - Sweet Jaggery Ragi Puttu Recipe
main_tag: kerala snack vegetarian  fingermilletnagli, elaichi, badam
description: Ragi Arisi Vella Puttu Recipe is a wholesome and delicious recipe made sweet by adding jaggery, coconut, cashew nuts and almonds which make it a perfect sweet dish to be served during any festival.

name: Masala Dosa Recipe With Vegetable Filling Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  split, fenugreekseeds, capsicum, raikadugu, jeera, hing, dhania
description: A unique sort of masala dosa recipe without the filling of the usual potato filling. The filling is prepared with red bell peppers and tomatoes that are sauteed along with onion ginger and garlic. The stuffing is aromatic and crunchy and makes a great filling for a dosa

name: Bengali Kosha Murgir Mangsho Recipe (Chicken in a Spicy Dry Gravy)
main_tag: bengali sidedish highproteinnonvegetarian  dahiyogurt, tejpatta, elaichi, laung, dalchini, haldi
description: Bengali Kosha Murgir Mangsho Recipe (Chicken in a Spicy Dry Gravy) is made of succulent chicken. The spicy chicken in dry gravy comes with sinfully caramelised onion, fragrance of ginger and a hint of cardamom. This recipe brings back memories redolent from the streets of Kolkata.

name: Sweet Ragi Malt Recipe - Healthy Ragi Kanji/ Porridge Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  fingermilletnagli, badampowder, elaichi
description: Sweet Ragi malt recipe is an age old traditional healthy drink prepared in Indian homes. It is also known as Ragi Kanji or porridge and is packed with nutrition and taste.

name: Ragi Tawa Paratha - Healthy Vitamin Rich & Diabetic Friendly Paratha
main_tag: indian sidedish diabeticfriendly  fingermilletnagli, jeera
description: Healthy Ragi Tawa Paratha Recipe is a delicious and nutty diabetic friendly paratha that is made from 50% ragi flour and 50% whole wheat flour.  The ingredients are kneaded to form a firm dough. It is then rolled and folded and rolled again to form a triangular shaped flat bread. The folding of the dough will help in creating more layers and it will help the bread to puff up once it is heated on griddle.

name: Ragi Halbai Recipe - Karnataka Style Ragi Halwa Recipe
main_tag: karnataka dessert vegetarian  fingermilletnagli
description: Halbai also known Halubai is a traditional sweet made in most homes in Karnataka.The word halubai literally means to extract the cream/milk out of a millet/grain and make a fudge out of it. It is popular in the malnad region and the havyaka cuisine. This recipe calls for 3-4 ingredients and can be a delicious treat when served on a plantain leaf.

name: Green Moong Dal Cheela Recipe - Savory Green Mung Bean Pancakes
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  whole, dhania, flaxmeal
description: The Green Moong Dal Cheela Recipe is made from whole green moong dal and spiced with green chillies, ginger, garlic and prepared like a thick pancake which is high in protein and also diabetic friendly.

name: Til Chikki Recipe - Healthy Sesame Bars
main_tag: indian snack vegetarian  tilseeds
description: Til Chikki Recipe (Healthy Sesame Crackers) is one of the easiest crackers you could ever make and it requires no baking. These chikkis are very nutritious because of the combination of sesame seeds and jaggery, both of which are good sources of iron and minerals.

name: Spicy & Tangy Goan Chicken Stew Recipe With Vegetables
main_tag: goan dinner highproteinnonvegetarian  preferablywithbones, gajjar, aloo, matar, dhania, jeera
description: Goan Chicken Stew is a delicately flavoured stew which has chicken and vegetables in it. A very tasty stew which is best served with rice. A bowl of piping hot stew is always comforting with steamed rice, during any weather.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinnonvegetarian  dahiyogurt, jeera, dhania, haldi, driedfenugreekleaves, jeera, dhania, laung, dalchini, elaichi, unsalted
description: Chicken Tikka Masala is a curry of roasted chicken pieces in a spicy sauce. The curry is known for its rich creamy texture. Chicken pieces are marinated in yogurt and spices and baked in an oven/pan fried. The fried pieces are then cooked in an aromatic  sauce and later, heavy cream is added to it to give a creamy texture.

name: Chicken Dum Biryani Recipe
main_tag: northindian onepotdish highproteinnonvegetarian  dhania, dhania, pudina, greekyogurt, haldi
description: Chicken Dum Biryani Recipe is one such recipe which is loved by everyone in the family.

name: Spicy Minced Chicken Keema Balls Curry Recipe
main_tag: northindian dinner nonvegeterian  cleanedandwashed, dhania, pudina, haldi, adjustaccordingtoyourchoice, dhania
description: A popular dish, this Keema Balls Recipe, is a favorite amongst meat lovers. The delicious keema ball  is spicy, juicy with flavours hidden inside it. It is simple and easy to cook. Unlike Chicken pieces, this minced meat is a lot easier to eat.

name: आंध्रा स्टाइल कंदी पचड़ी रेसिपी - Andhra Style Kandi Pachadi (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: andhra southindianbreakfast vegetarian  split
description: आंध्रा स्टाइल कंदी पचड़ी एक स्वादिष्ट चटनी है जिसे आंध्रा के हर घर में बनाया जाता है. इस चटनी में तुअर दाल को पीस कर उसमे सुखी लाल मिर्च, उरद दाल और राइ का तड़का दिया जाता है. इसमें इमली का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इस चटनी को और भी स्वादिष्ट बनाता है.

name: भोगिची भाजी रेसिपी - Bhogichi Bhaji (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian
description: भोगिची भाजी एक पारम्परिक महाराष्ट्रियन भाजी है जिसे मकर संक्रांति के एक दिन पहले बनाया जाता है. इसमें सर्दियों में आने वाली सब्जिओ का प्रयोग किया जाता है इसमें मूंगफली और तिल का प्रयोग किया जाता है. आप इसे अपने रोज के खाने के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: Lucknowi Murgh Biryani Recipe - Awadhi Style Chicken Biryani
main_tag: awadhi lunch nonvegeterian  adjustaccordingtoyourtaste, pudina, dhania, greekyogurt, dhania, haldi, tejpatta, dalchini, laung, elaichi, badielaichi, javitri, caromseeds
description: Biryani comes from the Mughlai cuisine and has some amazing variations done in different regions where the Mughals used to travel.

name: Andhra Style Kandi Attu Recipe (Toor Dal Dosa Recipe)
main_tag: andhra southindianbreakfast vegetarian  splittoordal, dhania
description: Andhra Style Kandi Attu Recipe (Toor Dal Dosa Recipe) is an authentic recipe that has been originated from Andhra. Dosa is one of the South Indian Breakfast dishes which is very popular among most south indians and is part of the menu of one of the days in a week.

name: Karnataka Style Heerekai Dosa Recipe-Ridge Gourd Dosa Recipe
main_tag: karnataka southindianbreakfast vegetarian  turaipeerkangai, bengalgramdal, whole, fenugreekseeds, dhania, jeera, haldi
description: Karnataka Style Heerekai Dosa Recipe (Ridge Gourd Dosa Recipe) is a famous coastal Karnataka dish which is also locally known as Heerekai Pathrode and Heerekai Chatti. It is also known by the name of Beerakaya Dosa.

name: Raw Banana Dosa Recipe
main_tag: indian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  haldi
description: Raw Banana Dosa Recipe is an innovative way by adding a vegetable into your everyday dosa batter to make it healthy. By adding the Banana Plantain into your dosa batter you will get a soft and fluffy dosa texture that can be had with any kind of chutney.

name: Sabbasige Soppu Dosa Recipe (Dill Leaves Sweet Dosa)
main_tag: karnataka southindianbreakfast vegetarian  flattenedrice, fenugreekseeds
description: Dill leaves are called as sabbasige soppu in Kannada. They are very aromatic in nature, has many culinary and medicinal uses. They are high in fibre, antioxidants and stimulate lactation in feeding mothers. They are a good source of iron and other minerals. So it’s a good idea to include these leaves in our routine in the form of any dish.

name: Carrot and Ginger Spiced Dosa Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast vegetarian  gajjar
description: Carrot and Ginger Spiced Dosa is a delicious way to incorporate healthy carrots into our diet. Carrots, as we all know contain high content of Vitamin A and beta carotene which are necessary for the healthy eye, skin and increasing the immunity.

name: Foxtail Millet Podi Dosa Recipe
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  split, fenugreekseeds, milagaipowder
description: The Foxtail Millet Podi Dosa Recipe is a wholesome dosa that is made using millets, rice and dal. The addition of foxtail millet makes the dosa extra nutritious and the taste is just as delicious as a regular dosa. Obviously none will notice the addition of millets here, trust me when I served this podi dosa for our weekend brunch everyone enjoyed thoroughly having these crispy dosas.

name: Aval Dosa | Poha Dosa Recipe (Savory Flattened Rice Crepe)
main_tag: southindian southindianbreakfast glutenfree  whole, flattenedrice, dahiyogurt
description: Dosas are one of the most popular South Indian breakfast. Dosas are usually made of fermented rice and lentil batter and a few varieties of Dosa can be prepared instantly. The Aval/ Poha Dosa Recipe is perfect for busy weekday breakfast or dinner option that is made from flattened rice. You can make it plain or optionally spice it with onions, green chilies and coriander. Since they are soft making it in the form of a Uttapam gives this Aval Dosa its special texture.

name: Andhra Style Palakura Pappu Recipe (Spinach Dal Recipe)
main_tag: andhra lunch vegetarian  splittoordal, split, palak, sambaronions, haldi, raikadugu
description: Andhra Style Palakura Pappu Recipe (Spinach Dal Recipe) is such a comforting dal that can be made in a jiffy. All you have to do is prep for the ingredients and add it in one pot to cook. “Pappu” is a traditional name given to most of the Andhra dishes that have dal as the main ingredient.  You can be innovative by adding any kind of green leaves to this dal to create various flavor.

name: Carrots Dill and Peanut Sadam - South Indian Style Stir Fried Rice
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  gingelly, raikadugu, hing, split, bengalgramdal, moongphali, tilseeds, gajjar
description: Carrots Dill and Peanut Sadam is lovely stir fried rice recipe tossed with some grated carrots and fresh Dill Leaves that can be put together in no time. The peanuts and sesame seeds give this dish a lovely nutty flavour.

name: Paniyaram Muttai Masala Recipe - Spicy Egg Curry Made In Paniyaram Pan
main_tag: southindian dinner nonvegeterian  dhania, jeera, dhania, saunf, pottukadalai, raikadugu
description: Paniyaram Muttai Masala is an Egg Curry, with the eggs whisked with chilies, coriander leaves and cooked in paniyaram pan. These cooked Paniyaram eggs are then added to a spicy tomato onion gravy that is cooked with freshly ground spice powders, tempered with mustard seeds and curry leaves.

name: Sundakkai And Methi Leaves Sambar Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch diabeticfriendly  turkeyberries, fenugreekleaves, splittoordal, haldi, dhania, raikadugu, jeera, hing, dhania
description: Sundakkai (Turkey berries) & Methi Leaves has immense health benefits & flavour. Both of them are widely used for those who are suffering from diabetes and kidney related problems. To get the perfect juice and flavour of turkey berry, you must slit them into two else the taste differs.

name: बंगाली छिरेर पुलाव रेसिपी - Bengali Chirer Pulao (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: bengali northindianbreakfast vegetarian
description: बंगाली छिरेर पुलाव बंगाली डिश है जो पोहे के समान होता है और नाश्ते में परोसा जाता है. आप इसमें अपनी पसंद की सब्जिआ भी डाल सकते है. इस डिश को आप अपने बच्चो के लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: Knol Khol Gravy Recipe - Kohlrabi In A Yogurt Based Gravy
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian  ganthgobikadam, dahiyogurt, dhania, jeera, dhania
description: This Knol Khol Gravy Recipe, is a unique recipe where the vegetable is cooked in a flavoursome onion-tomato based and the gravy also contains yoghurt that gives the gravy a lovely texture.

name: A Creamy & Delicious Gulkand Kulfi Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  use2 fatmilk, saunf, badam, supari
description: Gulkand Kulfi Recipe is makes a great twist to the classic Kulfi recipe where milk is thickened and nuts are added to it and set in kulfi moulds. In this recipe, we have added a twist to the traditional kulfi by adding Gulkand to make it more refreshing and inviting.

name: मूंग दाल पालक चीला रेसिपी - Moong Dal Palak Cheela (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian northindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian
description: प्रोटीन से भरपूर, मूंग दाल पालक चीला बहुत ही स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसे आप अपने नाश्ते के लिए बना सकते है. यह सेहतमंद रेसिपी है जिसमे प्रोटीन, विटामिन और मिनरल है. आप इसे अपने सुबह या शाम के नाश्ते के लिए बना सकते है. आप इसे अपने रात के खाने के लिए भी बना सकते है.
