description: Paatolyo, a Goan sweet dish made using turmeric leaves, coconut, jaggery and rice paste especially during Ganesh Chaturthi and on the day of Naag Panchami by the NKGSB community of Karwar. This dish typically uses the ingredients which are used by the NKGSB community in their daily cooking.

name: दाल बनजारा रेसिपी - Dal Banjara (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  स प ल ट
description: दाल बनजारा जिसे लंगर वाली दाल भी कहा जाता है बनाने में बहुत आसान है और वन पॉट रेसिपी है. इस दाल में काली दाल और चना दाल का प्रयोग किया जाता है जिसमे तक पत्ता और दाल चीनी भी डाली जाती है. इस दाल में लहसुन और प्याज का प्रयोग नहीं किया गया है इसलिए यह दाल सात्विक खाने में भी बनाई जा सकती है.

name: Khira Gaintha Recipe - Rice Dumplings In Sweetened Milk
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Khira Gaintha is a traditional odia sweet dish which consists of rice flour dumplings cooked in cardamom flavored milk. Khira Gainthas are soft rice flour balls that are cooked  in sweetened flavored milk. The rice flour is cooked with water and then kneaded to form a smooth dough. This dough are made into small balls, and dropped into simmering cardamom flavored milk and adorned with chopped nuts.

name: शकरकंदी की दाल रेसिपी - Sweet Potato Dal (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  स प ल ट
description: दाल सभी घरो में रोज बनाई जाती है. दाल सेहत के लिए बहुत अच्छी होती है और बनाने में बहुत आसान भी है. शकरकंदी की दाल में शकरकंदी और दाल को टमाटर और प्याज की ग्रेवी में पकाया जाता है. शकरकंदी से इस डिश में मीठापन आता है और मसालो से तीखापन।

name: पालक पप्पू रेसिपी -Spinach Dal (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: southindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: पालक पप्पू दक्षिण भारत के घरो में बहुत बनाया जाता है. पालक पप्पू, को चावल और घी के साथ परोसा जाता है. यह बनाने में आसान है और उन दिनों के लिए सबसे अच्छा है जब आप कुछ स्वादिष्ठ और सेहतमंद खाना चाहते है.

name: नवरंग दाल रेसिपी - Navrang Dal (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  स प ल ट, ग र न शक ल ए
description: नवरंग दाल में नौ दालो का प्रयोग होता है और इन् दालो को रोज के मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है. यह दाल बनाने में आसान है और प्रोटीन से भरपूर है. इसे आप अपने रोज के खाने के साथ परोस सकते है.

name: पम्पकिन दाल लहसुनि तड़के के साथ रेसिपी - Pumpkin Dal With Garlic Tadka (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: northindian dinner diabeticfriendly  पम पक न
description: पम्पकिन दाल तड़का में दाल, हरी मिर्च और रोज के मसालो का प्रयोग होता है. इसमें ऊपर से लहुसन का घी तड़का दिया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है. यह दाल बनाने में आसान है इसलिए आप इसे आपके रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है.

name: Rajasthani Kachri Ki Chutney Recipe (Wild Cucumber Chutney)
main_tag: rajasthani sidedish vegetarian  wildcucumber, jeera, divided, dahiyogurt
description: Chutney is an important part of indian food. Any Indian thali without chutney is not considered complete.We have varieties of chutney recipes, out of these there is one famous Rajasthani chutney recipe that is Kachri ki Chutney. It is spicy in taste and can be served with roti or rice during lunch or dinner. This recipe can be prepared with a few ingredients in hand. This is a wild cucumber recipe that is a bit rare ingredient to be used in other parts of India. Wild cucumber is similar to Mangalore cucumber but is smaller in size, and comes with a lot of seeds within. comparatively. Serve Kachri ki Chutney Recipe (Wild Cucumber Chutney) with Haldi Ki Sabzi Recipe (Fresh Turmeric Root Vegetable) and Tawa Paratha Recipe. This chutney comes in handy while preparing lunch box for weekdays.

name: Gajar Halwa Barfi Recipe (Carrot Fudge)
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  gajjar, mawa
description: You must have tried carrot halwa or carrot fudge/gajar milk barfi, but have you ever tried into pie plate like have shown over here? If no then must try on this Diwali to impress your guests or loved ones as it's very attractive and rich in look and delicious in taste!

name: Milk Sooji Fudge Recipe
main_tag: karnataka dessert vegetarian  semolinarava, badam, elaichi
description: Milk Sooji Fudge is rich creamy, aromatic fudge made of milk and milk products. It’s very simple to prepare with no fuss. The rava or semolina or sooji can be replaced with other flours like besan, maida or wheat flour. Do try this simple dessert suitable for any festive occasion. Serve Milk Sooji Fudge Recipe along with Masala Chai Recipe - Indian Spiced Tea when there are guests at home.

name: Goan Style Sana Recipe (Soft Steamed Rice Cakes)
main_tag: goan southindianbreakfast diabeticfriendly  split
description: Goan Style Sana Recipe (Soft Steamed Rice Cakes), these soft and steamed rice cakes that are similar to idli from South India. It is seen in Goa and Many parts of mangalore as well. The Sanas are best eaten when it is soaked in some chicken curry. The specialty of the Sana is that the batter is fermented with some toddy which is nothing but a fermented coconut milk. If you do not prefer to use toddy you as well ferment with some yeast.Sanas on the other hand are made with boiled rice which will create a softer texture. The shape of a Sanna is a perfect small round which is little bit thicker than idlis.

name: Goan Style Sando Recipe (Steamed Rice Cakes Filled With Sweet Coconut)
main_tag: goan dessert vegetarian  split, elaichi
description: Goan Style Sando Recipe (Steamed Rice Cakes Filled With Sweet Coconut) is a type of sweet made from the same batter of sana which has a light spongy texture once it steamed. The additional sweet filling inside the sana batter is what makes these sandon special. The filling is made from coconut and jaggery with a slight hint of cardamom. The batter is made from a mix of red rice and basmati rice, traditionally in goa red rice was consumed a lot as it is very healthy and tasty too.

name: Dahi Chivda Recipe (Fruit,Yogurt & Flattened Rice Breakfast Parfait)
main_tag: fusion worldbreakfast vegetarian  flattenedrice, dahiyogurt, orasrequired, ripe, hulledwashedandchoppedorsliced
description: Dahi Chivda Recipe is a Fruit, Yogurt and Flattened Rice Breakfast Parfait. This Dahi Chivda is a no-cook, gluten free, healthy breakfast parfait that is popular among everyone irrespective of ages.

name: अरहर की दाल रेसिपी - Arhar Ki Dal with Lahsun Tadka (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: awadhi lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: अरहर की दाल एक सरल और सुव्यवस्थित नुस्खा है, जो एक वन पॉट रेसिपी है। इसमें लहसुन का तड़का दिया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है. प्रेशर कुकर में अरहर दाल के साथ सभी मसालों को पकाया जाता है और अंत में तड़का दिया जाता है.

name: लहसुनि दाल रेसिपी - Garlic Dal (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: लहसुनि दाल बहुत ही स्वादिष्ठ दाल है और आपके रोज के खाने के लिए एक पर्याप्त है. इस दाल में लहसुन की मात्रा ज्यादा होती है जिससे इस दाल का स्वाद बाकि दालो से अलग होता है. दाल बनाने के बाद इसमें घी डाले और गरमा गरम परोसे।

name: Cauliflower Coconut Milk Stew Recipe
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  gobi, tejpatta, elaichi, haldi, dhania
description: The Cauliflower Coconut Milk Stew Recipe is different from a traditional stew that will be purely made with coconut milk or simply a spiced water. This stew is made with a combination of pureed tomatoes and coconut milk and mildly spiced with bay leaf and cardamom. The addition of tomatoes into the stew gives a light tart taste that blends well with a bread or even a bowl of rice.

name: Makhan Bada Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani dessert vegetarian  maida, asrequired, dahiyogurt, elaichi
description: Makhan Bada Recipe is a traditional festive recipe from Rajasthan. It is made by making maida dough balls which are deep fried and simmered in sugar syrup. They are beautiful golden brown in color having a flaky texture. Makhan Bada Recipe is crispy from the outside and soft from the inside.

name: रिंगन रवैया रेसिपी - Parsi Style Stuffed Eggplant (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: parsi lunch vegetarian
description: रिंगन रवैया एक पारसी रेसिपी है जिसमे बैंगन को पारसी धंसक मसाले में नारीयल और प्याज के साथ पकाया जाता है। बैंगन को प्रेशर कुकर मैं पकाया जाता है ताकि उसका  स्वाद अछि तरह से आए, और फिर उसे नारीयल और इमली की करी मैं कुछ देर तक मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है।

name: सेकता नी सिंग रेसिपी - Parsi Style Sweet & Spicy Drumsticks Cooked In Coconut Water/Toddy (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: parsi lunch vegetarian
description: सेकता नी सिंग एक पारसी रेसिपी हैं जिसमे मोरिंगा को नारियल पानी कि करी में पकाया जाता हैं। नारियल से इस करी में हल्का मीठापन आजाता हैं। हरी मिर्च, धनिया और अदरक, नारियल की करी के साथ अच्छे से जाते हैं और इसमें स्वाद डालते हैं।

name: North Indian Style Green Raw Papaya Curry Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  saunf, dhania, haldi, dhania
description: North Indian Style Green Raw Papaya Curry Recipe is a comforting curry that can quickly made in a one pot pressure cooker. The flavors are simple and uses the basic ingredients that are available at our kitchen. The flavor of fennels seeds goes really well with sautéed onions and tomatoes. Finally it is cooked along with some Indian spices like red chili powder, turmeric and coriander powder and then pressure cooked with green papaya.

name: Microwave Ashoka Halwa Recipe | Moong Dal Halwa
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  split, iusednaturalfoodcoloring, elaichi
description: Ashoka Halwa or Moong dal Halwa is one of my favorite sweet recipe. Protein rich Moong dal is the main ingredient for this dish. Ghee gives richness to this halwa while cardamom powder makes this sweet and exotic dish. Cooked moong dal merges well with these ingredients and transforms into a mouthwatering sweet.

name: गोभी फ्राइड राइस रेसिपी - Cauliflower Fried Rice (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  हर,
description: गोभी फ्राइड राइस उन रेसिपीज में से एक है जो बहुत कम समय में बन जाती है. इस रेसिपी में चावल का प्रयोग नहीं किया जाता है. गोभी का चुरा करके उसको चावल की तरह सब्ज़िओ के साथ पकाया जाता है. खाने में स्वादिष्ट और सेहत के लिए अच्छी, यह रेसिपी आप अपने बच्चो के लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: लेमन राइस रेसिपी - Lemon Rice (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: southindian lunch noonionnogarlic  split
description: लेमन राइस जिसे चित्रना भी कहा जाता है बनाने में बहुत आसान है और खाने में बहुत स्वादिष्ट। इसमें हरी मिर्च और कढ़ी पत्ते का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है, जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है. आप इस रेसिपी में बचे हुए चावल का भी प्रयोग कर सकते है. यह काम समय में बन जाता है इसलिए आप इसे लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: Shakarkandi Ka Halwa Recipe (Sweet Potato Halwa)
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Shakarkandi Ka Halwa Recipe(Sweet Potato Halwa) is an easy and quick sweet dish. Softened sweet potato with crunchy nuts give a good texture while cardamom gives it a nice aroma to the recipe. Sweet Potato is loaded with Iron, fiber, and minerals. They are high in vitamins B6 and C. Peanuts are also a rich source of nutrients and minerals. They contain higher protein ratio when compared to any other tree nut varieties available. Shakarkandi Ka Halwa is a great recipe for breakfast or kids snack box or can also be served as a dessert.

name: Urulaikizhangu Podi Poriyal Recipe (Spicy Potato Sabzi from Tamil Nadu)
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch vegetarian  aloo, donotboilthemtoosoft, gingelly, gingelly, bengalgramdal, split, splittoordal, hing
description: Urulaikizhangu Podi Poriyal Recipe is a popular Tamil Nadu recipe in which potato is cooked along with the skin, grated and mixed with dry spices to give it a crumbly texture. This Podi tastes great when mixed with steaming hot rice and ghee. It’s an interesting recipe and you can try making it if you want to experiment something new with potatoes.

name: Traditional Rasmalai Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  homemadecottagecheese, semolinarava, badam
description: Rasmalai or 'Rosomalai' (in bengali )is a very popular Bengali sweet, now it is also popular not only in India but also in Pakistan and Bangladesh. In Rasmalai, flat shaped spongy rasgullas or dumpling made with paneer or ricotta cheese is then soaked in sweet, thickened, chilled and saffron flavored milk. Traditional Rasmalai Recipe is an amazing recipe to indulge in this festive season to oomph the fervour of festive a notch higher!

name: पम्पकीन ओमभाल रेसिपी - Pumpkin Ombhal (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: nagaland lunch vegetarian  छ लक औरब जन क ल ह ए
description: यह नागालैंड स्टाइल पम्पकीन ओमभाल खट्टी मीठी करी है जिसमे पम्पकीन को इमली के रस और गुड के साथ पकाया गया है। आप इस सब्ज़ी को अपने दिन या रात के खाने के लिए परोस सकते है.

name: Yellow Cucumber Pachadi Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  raikadugu, fenugreekseeds, whole, haldi, hing
description: Yellow Cucumber Pachadi is a good accompaniment for rice. It is a spicy and tangy pachadi recipe from South India. It is usually served as a side dish along with your meal. It is easy to make and requires very few ingredients to make this dish.

name: Poshto Phoolkopi Recipe (Cauliflower & Potato In Poppy Seeds Gravy)
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian  gobi, aloo, onionnigellaseeds, haldi, dhania
description: This is traditional Bengali dish made of poppy seeds gravy. Cauliflower and potatoes are the main vegetable used in this dish. Frozen peas or fresh peas can be added too. Thick gravy like poppy seeds curry is delicious curry and is paired best with steamed rice. Highly recommend to use mustard oil for this curry to get the authentic taste.

name: पत्ता गोभी पुलाव रेसिपी - Spiced Cabbage Rice (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: मसालेदार पत्ता गोभी पुलाव एक स्वस्थ नुस्खा है जिसमे पत्ता गोभी के साथ कढ़ी पत्ता और धनिये का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है। आप इस पुलाव में अपनी इच्छा से और भी अलग अलग सब्ज़िओ का प्रयोग कर सकते है. यह एक पोषण से भरपूर डिश है और आप इसे अपने लंच बॉक्स के लिए भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: Maharashtrian Batatyacha Kees Recipe (Spicy Roasted Potatoes With Peanuts)
main_tag: maharashtrian lunch vegetarian  aloo, jeera, hing, haldi, moongphali, dhania
description: Batatyacha Kees is a spicy aloo/potato recipe that is made with a delicious combination of cooking potatoes along with peanuts, cumin and green chillies.

name: Maharastrian Style Kurkure Batate Recipe (Spicy & Crispy Roasted Potatoes)
main_tag: maharashtrian dinner vegetarian  aloo, haldi, jeera
description: Kurkure Batate is a simple and delectably tasty dish that makes a delicious weekday lunch with Phulkas. It is simple to make for the quick lunches or dinner. The spices can always be adapted to make it spicier or tone it down, depending on your taste.

name: मटर की तेहरी रेसिपी - Matar Ki Tehri (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: awadhi onepotdish vegetarian
description: मटर की तेहरी उत्तर प्रदेश की एक ट्रेडिशनल डिश है जिसमे चावल को मटर और मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है. दो तरह की तेहरी होती है, एक में आलू, गोभी और गाजर का प्रयोग किया जाता है और दूसरी में हरे मटर का. यह रेसिपी उत्तर प्रदेश के हर घर में बनाई जाती है और बनाने में बहुत आसान भी है.

name: Sweet Potato & Oatmeal Kofta Curry (Non Fried)
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  about2cupsmashed, oatmeal, besan, haldi, dhania, elaichi, driedfenugreekleaves
description: The Non Fried Sweet Potato and Oatmeal Kofta Curry is a perfect blend of the goodness of sweet potatoes and the nutrition from the oats. The addition of oats into the kofta’s makes them nutritious and a great way to get them into your diet. The sweet potato kofta recipe is a non-fried healthy recipe; I used the technique of using a Kuzhi Paniyaram pan or even sometimes bake them in the oven when I make large quantities.

name: Mughalai Shahi Kaju Aloo Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: mughlai dinner vegetarian  aloo, jeera, tejpatta, haldi, dhania, dahiyogurt
description: Mughlai cuisine is one of the famous cuisines of the medieval period and originated during the Mughalai empires. Their dishes are known for their rich taste, flavourful aroma and whole ground spices. The cuisine is strongly influenced by the central Asian cuisine and also the regional cuisines of India, Pakistan, and Bangladesh.  This Mughalai Shahi Kaju Aloo Ki Sabzi is a rich creamy curry prepared with cashews, milk, and curd. The curry is a must-have on the dinner feast as it not only shows grandeur but also flavourful. Traditionally, pieces of potato are deep fried in the oil and then, later cooked with spices. But, to make it healthier, potato pieces are oven baked and then cooked with spices. Now, you can enjoy your favorite curry in a healthy way. Prepare this delicious creamy curry and serve with parathas.

name: Rajasthani Kaddu Aur Aloo Ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: rajasthani dinner vegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, aloo, raikadugu, saunf, fenugreekseeds, hing, haldi, drymangopowder
description: Pumpkin is the most neglected vegetable, yet it is the most nutritional one. Pumpkin is known to have the highest amount of dietary fibre making it a super food to be included in our diets. It is also known to lower the blood pressure making it suitable for heart patients. Rajasthani Kaddu Aur Aloo Ki Sabzi recipe is a spicy sweet and sour dish making it a perfect winter dish to be devoured.

name: Nepali Aloo Tareko Recipe
main_tag: nepalese sidedish vegetarian  aloo, fenugreekseeds, caromseeds, haldi, dhania, nepalitimur
description: Nepali cuisine is robust, flavourful and is a blend of Indian and Tibetan influences. Rice and dal forms the staple food with the sides of stir fried leafy vegetables, deep fried vegetables or meat adds to the smoky flavour. Tareko means fried in nepali. Nepali Aloo Tareko Recipe is a flavourful potato fry dish. Easy to make with few ingredients yet bursting with flavours. Serve the Nepali Aloo Tareko Recipe along with hot Steamed Rice and Dal Fry for a comforting weeknight dinner.

name: Kasuri Methi Aur Aloo Rasedar Recipe
main_tag: northindian sidedish vegetarian  aloo, driedfenugreekleaves, adjust, saunf, jeera, fenugreekseeds, dhania, jeera, haldi, drymangopowder
description: Kasuri Methi Aur Aloo Rasedar Recipe is an easy to make potato dish with the goodness of dried fenugreek leaves. It is spicy and tangy making it a perfect accompaniment to be had with parathas or puri's. The dried fenugreek leaves (kasuri methi) adds a wonderful flavour to the dish. This recipe doesn't have onion or garlic, hence can also be consumed during the fasts. Serve the Kasuri Methi Aur Aloo Rasedar Recipe along with Parathas or Puri's for the weekend brunch.

name: गोअन मशरुम विंडालू रेसिपी - Goan Style Mushroom Vindaloo (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: goan dinner vegetarian
description: गोवा में पोर्क विंडालू बहुत ही घरो में बनाया जाता है. गोअन मशरुम विंडालू रेसिपी इसी डिश से मिलती जुलती है. इस डिश को गोवा में पोर्तुगीस लाये थे और तभी से यह डिश बहुत ही प्रसिद्ध है. गोअन मशरुम विंडालू में सिरका और गोअन मसलो का प्रयोग किया जाता है.

name: Aloo Methi Paratha Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast vegetarian  aloo, fenugreekleaves, dhania, dhania
description: Aloo Methi Paratha is a great combination of ingredients making the much loved stuffed paratha recipe. Paratha is everyones favourite and this recipe is perfect for Sunday’s breakfast. Everyone loves traditional Aloo paratha but a hot of methi gives it a nice twist.

name: Potato Paneer Curry Without Onion And Garlic Recipe (Vrat Wale Aloo Paneer)
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  aloo, homemadecottagecheese, dhania, jeera, dhania
description: The easiest and tastiest fasting recipe for a curry cooked without onion and garlic which is perfect for Navratri. It can be served with kuttu(buckwheat flour) roti or puri, some raita and salad. It tastes great with rice and chapati too.

name: Chana Aur Aloo Ki Sookhi Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  whitechickpeas, aloo, haldi, dhania, drymangopowder, jeera, dhania, longthinstrips
description: Chana Aur Aloo Ki Sookhi Sabzi is a winning combination with everyone loving chickpeas and potatoes. If you have boiled chickpeas and potatoes in hand, you can prepare this in no time for your kids lunch box in the morning. Serve the Chana Aur Aloo Ki Sookhi Sabzi along with phulkas or parathas for your kids lunch box or for the weeknight dinner.

name: Stuffed Masala Aloo Naan Recipe Made Without Oven
main_tag: northindian maincourse vegetarian  sodawater, aloo, drymangopowder, caromseeds, dhania
description: The Stuffed Masala Aloo Naan Recipe is a wholesome recipe of the naan that is packed with the goodness of whole wheat flour and stuffed with a chatpata aloo.The naan is made crisp by cooking it in the tawa and then cooking it directly over the flame. This gives a naan a delicious crispness making it perfect to serve for breakfast or a snack.

name: Bengali Aloo Potol er Dalna Recipe - A Traditional Vegetable Side Dish
main_tag: bengali dinner vegetarian  parval, aloo, haldi, tejpatta, jeera, dalchini, laung, elaichi, dhania, hing
description: The Aloo Potol er Dalna Recipe is a traditional vegetable side dish from bengal. The parwal also known as the potol is a very native vegetable to the bangalis. This is a traditional Bengali Niramish (pure veg) cuisine and is very easy to cook. Dalna in Bengali Cooking is a thick gravy dish unlike a jhol where the gravy is more liquid, this Dalna is more of a thicker gravy.

name: Aloo Posto Recipe (Potatoes In Poppy Seed Paste)
main_tag: bengali lunch vegetarian  aloo, optional, onionnigellaseeds, haldi, dhania
description: Aloo Posto or Potatoes in Poppy Seed Paste is an authentic and traditional Bengali recipe and no special occasion is complete without this dish. Poppy seeds are soaked and ground to make a fine paste, later cooked with potatoes. Khus Khus or poppy seeds are known as Posto in Bengali. A quintessential dish that is served mostly with Rice, Bengali Luchi and Phalguni dal with a dash of lemon juice, is easy and quick to make and is a total fuss-free dish with an amazing aroma and taste.

name: Aloo Gobhi Methi Tuk Recipe
main_tag: sindhi appetizer vegetarian
description: Aloo Gobhi Methi Tuk Recipe is a simple and very flavourful dish from the Sindhi Cuisine. Traditionally, the recipe calls to deep fry the potatoes and cauliflower florets in oil, but here we have shallow fried for a healthier version. Methi or fenugreek leaves and chaat masala blends beautifully together with subtly flavoured potatoes and cauliflower.

name: Vegan Soya Aloo Curry Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner highproteinvegetarian  nuggets, aloo, jeera, hing, haldi, dhania, driedfenugreekleaves, dhania
description: Vegan Soya Aloo curry, makes a perfect pair to serve along with some flaky parathas or with puffy naans. With easy ingredients, less efforts, this curry is very much quick to dish out.

name: Bihari Style Aloo Ka Chokha Recipe - Spiced & Mashed Potatoes With Mustard Oil
main_tag: bihari lunch vegetarian  aloo, dhania
description: The Bihari Style Aloo Ka Chokha Recipe is a delicious combination of mashed potatoes combined with green chilies, onions and coriander. Traditionally it is served along with Litti and popularly known as Litti Choka. But you can serve the Bihari Style Aloo Ka Chokha, as a spread over breads like pav and top it with sev or bhujia. Or you can also serve it over a cracker and make it as an appetizer for parties.

name: Broccoli And Aloo Lifafa Paratha Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian  aloo, jeera, dhania
description: Broccoli And Aloo Lifafa Paratha Recipe is a paratha which is stuffed with the goodness of broccoli and potatoes. Lifafa here means envelope of paratha which is filled with Broccoli and potato mixture. Delight your guests by serving these Broccoli And Aloo Lifafa Paratha Recipe as it ill be something new for them to try.

name: Saunf Aloo (Fennel Potato Curry) Recipe
main_tag: punjabi lunch vegetarian  aloo, saunf, haldi, dhania
description: Sauf Aloo is a Punjabi gravy based dish in which potatoes are cooked with the goodness of creamy sauce and fennel seeds. It is best for the people who do not prefer onion and garlic in their meals. Saul Aloo can be made in a jiffy and yet tastes elaborate, making it a perfect weeknight preparation.

name: Jhure-Jhure Aloo Bhaja Recipe
main_tag: bengali snack vegetarian  aloo
description: Bhaja is a traditional bengali side dish. Bengalis use variety of vegetable to prepare these goodies. This delicately spiced crisp bhajas are usually fried in pungent mustard oil until crisp. Jhure-Jhure Aloo Bhaja is a potato fry with a hint of spices sprinkled on top. The addition of curry leaves gives it an extra edge. You can also sprinkle some roasted peanuts and dry herbs of your choice. You can use refined oil for frying if that is what you are used to.

name: Achari Aloo Parwal Sabzi Recipe (Pointed Gourd And Potato Stir Fry In Pickle Spices)
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  parval, aloo, onionnigellaseeds, haldi, drymangopowder, dhania, jeera, raikadugu, saunf, onionnigellaseeds, fenugreekseeds
description: Achari Aloo Parwal Sabzi Recipe is semi dry preparation of pointed gourd (parwal) and aloo in pickle spices. The pungency of mustard oil along with tomatoes and pickle spices gives this sabzi a unique flavour and makes it an excellent side dish for an Indian meal. You can make this sabzi in a pressure cooker when pinched for time, and if you find the fragrance of mustard oil too strong, you can make the same sabzi in regular cooking oil. Serve this with Phulkas, Matar Ki Puri and Dal Banjara for a wholesome weeknight dinner.

name: Aloo Kulcha Recipe (Spiced Potato Stuffed Indian Flat Bread)
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian  maida, greekyogurt, aloo, jeera, dhania, dhania, caromseeds, adjust
description: Aloo Kulcha Recipe is one of the most popular North Indian flat breads there are. Crisp on the outside, soft on the inside, filled with a spiced potato stuffing, these kulcha are delicious accompaniment to any Indian meal. Quite different from Aloo Paranthas, these are also very popular in Amritsar. they’re perfect for a dinner party, or even a homely meal served along with Chole Pindi and a simple Mooli Raita or Salad for a quick wholesome lunch or dinner.

name: Potato Vindaloo Recipe (Spicy Goan Potato Curry)
main_tag: goan lunch vegetarian  fenugreekseeds, jeera, haldi, aloo, raikadugu
description: Potato Vindaloo Recipe is a spicy Goan potato curry that has a distinct taste, influenced by the Portuguese Culinary traditions. It has many variations depending on the ingredients available regionally, but is universally high on spice levels. Fiery in colour and to taste, it is also made with meat, but this recipe is a vegetarian take on the same. Potato Vindaloo can be served with a simple Vegetable Biryani and Raita or Bread.

name: आलू मखाना की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - No Onion No Garlic Aloo Makhana Sabzi (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: नवरात्री और श्रावण के महीने में बहुत लोग उपवास रखते है. इस समय लोग प्याज़ और लहसुन का प्रयोग अपने खाने में नहीं करते। इसलिए ऐसी सब्ज़िया बनायीं जाती है जिसमे इन दो का प्रयोग न हो. आलू मखाना की सब्ज़ी एक स्वादिष्ठ सब्ज़ी है जिसमे आलू और मखानों को रोज के मसलो में पकाया जाता है. व्रत के दिनों में आलू मखाना की सब्ज़ी को सत्तू के पराठे के साथ परोसे।

name: Makhana Ka Raita Recipe
main_tag: awadhi sidedish vegetarian  dahiyogurt, lotusseeds, jeera, dhania
description: Makhana Ka Raita Recipe is a simple Indian relish made from yogurt (curd) which is mixed with toasted makhana (puffed Lotus seeds) and Indian spice powders. This is very easy to make and is a variation to the normal raitha made from vegetables.

name: Makhana ki Sabzi Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  lotusseeds, matar, tejpatta, elaichi, dalchini, laung
description: Makhana ki Sabzi Recipe is made from Phool Makhana or the Lotus seeds, which are these light airy seeds that are used in a lot of varieties of dishes, both sweet and savoury. This Makhana ki Sabzi Recipe is a creamy curry that is rich and goes really well with roti, whole wheat naan, butter naan or phulkas and makes a wholesome dinner idea.

name: जयपुरी आलू प्याज की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Jaipuri Aloo Pyaz Ki Sabzi (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: rajasthani lunch vegetarian
description: जयपुरी आलू प्याज की सब्ज़ी एक राजस्थानी सब्ज़ी है जिसमे प्याज और आलू को टमाटर की ग्रेवी में पकाया जाता है. यह सब्ज़ी खट्टी और तीखी होती है और इसे रोटी के साथ परोसा जाता है. जयपुरी आलू प्याज की सब्ज़ी को तड़का रायता और फुल्के के साथ दिन के खाने के लिए परोसे।

name: चना और आलू की सुखी सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Chana Aur Aloo Ki Sookhi Sabzi (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  ग र न शक ल ए, ग र न शक ल ए
description: चना और आलू की सुखी सब्ज़ी एक सरल सब्ज़ी है जिसमे आलू और चने को रोज के मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है. अगर आपके पास आलू और चना उबला हुआ है तो इस सब्ज़ी को बनाने में बहुत कम समय लगता है. इस सब्ज़ी को आप अपने बच्चो के लंच बॉक्स में भी दाल सकते है. चना और आलू की सुखी सब्ज़ी को पंचमेल दाल और रोटी के साथ दिन के खाने के लिए परोसे।

name: आलू पोतोल पोस्तो रेसिपी - Aloo Parwal In Poppy Seed Masala (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: bengali dinner vegetarian
description: आलू पोतोल पोस्तो एक बहुत ही प्रसिद्ध बंगाली रेसिपी है जिसे आलू और परवल के साथ बनाया जाता है. मसाले क अलग से सेक कर पिसा जाता है और अंत में सब्ज़ी में डाला जाता है. इससे सब्ज़ी का स्वाद और भी बाद जाता है.

name: आलू अमृतसरी रेसिपी - Aloo Amritsari (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: punjabi lunch vegetarian
description: आलू अमृतसरी एक सरल डिश है जिसमे आलू को प्याज, टमाटर और भारतीय मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है. इस सब्ज़ी को पंजाब के घर में अक्सर बनाया जाता है. आप यह सब्ज़ी अपने घर की पार्टियों में भी परोस सकते है. यह स्वाद में तो अच्छी है ही और आप इसे पॉट लक के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: आलू गाजर मटर की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - No Onion And No Garlic Aloo Gajar Matar Ki Sabzi (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  व रतक ल एकल नमक, ग र न शक ल ए
description: आलू गाजर मटर की सब्ज़ी एक सरल सब्ज़ी है और इस सब्ज़ी में प्याज और लहसुन का प्रयोग नहीं किया गया है. यह सब्ज़ी बहुत ही स्वादिष्ठ होती है और आप इसे व्रत के दौरान भी खा सकते है. इतना ही नहीं, आप इस सब्ज़ी को अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है क्यूंकि इससे बनाने में ज्यादा देर नहीं लगती।

name: आलू गोभी मटर की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Aloo Gobhi Matar Ki Sabzi (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian
description: आलू गोभी मटर की सब्ज़ी में आलू, फूल गोभी और मटर को मसालो में पकाया जाता है. यह सब्ज़ी बनाने में बहुत आसान है और इसमें रोज की सामग्री का प्रयोग होता है. इस सब्ज़ी को आप अपने और अपने बच्चो के लंच बॉक्स में भी डाल सकते है.

name: लाहोरी आलू रेसिपी - Lahori Aloo (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: pakistani lunch vegetarian
description: लाहोरी आलू एक तीखी सब्ज़ी है जिसकी ग्रेवी में टमाटर से खट्टापन आता है. इसकी ग्रेवी में नारियल, खुस खुस और दूध का इस्तेमाल होता है जिससे इसका स्वाद और भी बढ़ जाता है. इस ग्रेवी को आप अपने नाश्ते में भी बना सकते है.

name: वेगन सोया आलू की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Vegan Soya Aloo Curry (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian dinner highproteinvegetarian
description: वेगन सोया आलू की सब्ज़ी को आप लच्छा पराठा के साथ परोसे और इसका आनंद ले. इस सब्ज़ी में रोज के मसालो का प्रयोग होता है और इसे बनाना भी बहुत आसान है. यह सब्ज़ी कम समय में बन जाती है और आप इसे अपने व्यस्त वाले दिन बना सकते है.

name: आलू गाजर की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - No Onion No Garlic Aloo Gajar Ki Sabzi (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: आलू गाजर की सब्ज़ी में आलू और गाजर को रोज के मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है. इसमें प्याज और लहसुन का प्रयोग नै किआ जाता इसलिए आप इसे व्रत के दिनों में भी बना सकते है. यह बनाने में आसान है और कम समय में बनाई जा सकती है.

name: निरामिष आलू दम रेसिपी - Niramish Aloo Dum (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  थ ड़,
description: निरामिष आलू दम नवरात्रों में बहुत बनाया जाता है क्यूंकि इसमें प्याज और लहसुन का प्रयोग नहीं किआ जाता। इस सब्ज़ी को चना दाल पूरी के साथ परोसा जाता है. बंगाली घरो में इससे अक्सर नाश्ते में बनाया जाता है. नवरात्रों के अलावा इस सब्ज़ी को बंगाली घरो में हर त्यौहार या पूजा के दौरान बनाया जाता है.

name: Aloo Matar Masala Khichdi Recipe
main_tag: indian maincourse vegetarian  matar, aloo, badielaichi, tejpatta, elaichi, dalchini, laung, jeera, dhania, jeera, dhania
description: Aloo Matar Masala Khichdi Recipe is a mildly spicy Bhojpuri khichdi dish made with potatoes and peas. The whole spices in the recipe adds a nice aromatic taste. This khichdi recipe is very different from the regular khichdi we make at home as this does not have lentils in it. The texture and the flavours differs from the regular khichdi due to addition of potatoes and peas. Serve the Aloo Matar Masala Khichdi Recipe along with Cauliflower & Cucumber Raita Recipe and Papad for a simple yet delightful weeknight dinner.

name: जीरा हींग आलू रेसिपी - Jeera Hing Aloo (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: आलू एक ऐसी सब्ज़ी है जिसे घर में सब पसंद करते है. आलू से हम बहुत तरह की सब्जिआ, स्टार्टर्स और कई दूसरे व्यंजन भी बना सकते है. जीरा आलू एक ऐसी ही सब्ज़ी है जो बनाने में आसान तो है ही, और खाने में स्वाद से भरपूर भी है.

name: धनिया वाले आलू रेसिपी - Dhania Wale Aloo (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  सफ़ द
description: नवरात्रि एक पवित्र त्योहार जहां देवी दुर्गा के लिए नौ दिन में विभिन्न प्रकार का खाना बनाया जाता है। भारत के उत्तरी भाग में कई लोग इन नौ दिनों में बिना प्याज और लहसुन में खाना खाते है। यह फ्लेवर से भरपूर डिश है जो आप कम समय में बना सकते हैं। इस रंगीन, स्वादिष्ट और खट्टी व्यंजन को एक दिलचस्प शाम के नाश्ते या घर पर दिन या रात के भोजन के लिए बना सकते है।

name: अचारी आलू गोभी रेसिपी - Achaari Aloo Gobhi (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian
description: अचारी आलू गोभी पकाने की विधि एक त्वरित और आसान नुस्खा है जिसमे अचारी मसालो का प्रयोग किआ जाता है। अचार प्रत्येक भारतीय परिवार में खाने के साथ परोसा जाता है। इस सब्ज़ी में भी आलू और गोभी को मसालो में पकाया जाता है.

name: तिल के आलू रेसिपी - Til Ke Aloo (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  सफ़ द
description: तिल के आलू स्वादिष्ट और ओमेगा 3 ,कैल्शियम और पोटैशियम से भरपूर व्यंजन है क्योकि यह तिल और आलू से बना है। हर रोज बनने वाले आलू के व्यंजन को इस तरह बनाकर हेल्थी ट्विस्ट दे। इस सब्ज़ी को आप अपने और अपने बच्चो के लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: आलू टमाटरी रेसिपी - Aloo Tamatari (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  ग र न शक ल ए
description: आलू टमाटरी पकाने की विधि एक टमाटर-आधारित ग्रेवी है जिसे आप रोज के खाने के लिए बना सकते है। इसमें रोज के मसालों का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो कि किसी भी भारतीय रसोई में आसानी से उपलब्ध होते है। यह सब्ज़ी मसालेदार, गर्म और बनाने में आसान है.

name: निरामिष आलू दम रेसिपी - Niramish Aloo Dum Sabzi (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  थ ड़,
description: निरामिष आलू दम नवरात्रि उत्सव के लिए एकदम सही है क्योंकि इसे प्याज और लहसुन के बिना बनाया जाता है. इस सब्ज़ी को आम तौर पर चना दाल और पूरी के साथ परोसा जाता है और बंगाली परिवारो में नाश्ते में पसंद किया जाता है। आप इस कॉम्बो को मुख्य रूप से कई बंगाली परिवारों में पूजा और अन्य त्योहारों के दौरान भी देखेंगे।

name: वन पॉट आलू गोभी रेसिपी - One Pot Aloo Gobi (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: northindian maincourse eggetarian
description: वन पॉट आलू गोबी सब्ज़ी पकाने की विधि इलेक्ट्रिक प्रेशर कुकर का इस्तेमाल करते हुए 20 मिनट से कम समय में बनाई जाती है। आलू गोबी सब्ज़ी एक क्लासिक उत्तर भारतीय डिश है जो हल्दी, जीरा और गरम मसाले जैसे साधारण मसाले के साथ पूरी तरह से मिश्रित है।

name: डुबकी वाले आलू रेसिपी - Dubki Wale Aloo (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian
description: डुबकी वाले आलू पकाने की विधि बहुत ही सरल है जिसमे लहसुन और प्याज का प्रयोग नहीं किया जाता है। इस सब्ज़ी को उपवास के दिनों में भी बनाया जा सकता है। यह बनाने में बहुत सरल है और खाने में उतनी ही स्वादिष्ट।

name: अचारी आलू रेसिपी - Achari Aloo (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: northindian dinner vegetarian
description: अचारी आलू एक खट्टी, तीखी साइड डिश है जो आलू को उबालकर बनाई जाती है. इसमें अचारी मसाले का प्रयोग किआ होता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ा देता है. यह एक बहुत ही सरल डिश है जो आप अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: Kalonji Gobi Aloo Recipe (Cauliflower & Potato Stir Fry with Nigella Seeds)
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  gobi, aloo, oranyothercookingoil, onionnigellaseeds, raikadugu, optional, dhania
description: Cauliflower Potato with Nigella Seeds is a gobi aloo Bengali style. This recipe combines the unique flavors of mustard oil and kalonji/nigella seeds. The taste, flavor, aroma and look of this dish is entirely different from the traditional Punjabi gobi aloo made at my home. It is simple and yet delectable to the palate. Serve Kalonji Gobi Aloo with hot Phulkas and Cholar Dal.

name: साबूदाना खीर रेसिपी - Sabudana Kheer (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian
description: साबूदाना खीर एक पारम्परिक भारतीय मिठाई है जिसे भारत के बहुत राज्यों में बहुत बनाया जाता है. कोई भी त्यौहार हो या फिर आपके घर मेहमान खाने पर आने वाले है, यह खीर बनाए और हम वादा करते है लोगो को यह खीर बहुत पसंद आएगी। बनाने में आसान, यह खीर बहुत स्वादिष्ठ है और कभी भी खायी जा सकती है.

name: Aloo Chana In Mint Coriander Gravy Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  whitechickpeas, aloo, bengalgramdal, capsicum, haldi, reserve12chiliforgarnish, dhania, pudina, jeera, dalchini, laung, elaichi, tejpatta
description: Aloo Chana in Mint Coriander Gravy is a delicious gravy recipe prepared with potatoes and chickpeas flavored with mint and coriander leaves. The freshness of mint and coriander in the gravy adds a refreshing taste to this dish. Serve Aloo Channa in Mint Coriander Gravy for lunch along with Aromatic Vegetable Pulao Recipe or phulkas.

name: गाजर और शिमला मिर्च पुलाव रेसिपी - Carrot And Capsicum Rice (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian  हर, ग र न शक ल ए
description: ऐसे बहुत से दिन होते है कुछ भी इच्छा नहीं करती। उन दिनों के लिए यह गाजर और शिमला मिर्च पुलाव एक दम सही है. इस पुलाव में गाजर और शिमला मिर्च का प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है. इस रेसिपी को आप अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: Moong Dal Rasam/Pesara Pappu Charu Recipe (Lemon Infused Indian Lentil Soup)
main_tag: southindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  split, haldi, dhania, raikadugu, jeera, hing
description: Pesara Pappu Charu Recipe also known as the Moong Dal Rasam is a very comforting and delicious lentil soup. The rasam has healing properties because the dal is infused with turmeric and cooked together with ginger, green chillies and coriander.

name: हरे सेब का रसम रेसिपी - Green Apple Rasam (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: southindian dinner highproteinvegetarian
description: अगर हम लाल सेब से हरे सेब की तुलना करें, तो हरे सेब के बहुत सारे फायदे होते है. हरे सेबो का स्वाद खट्टा और मीठा होता है. इसके खट्टे स्वाद की वजह से इसमें इमली का प्रयोग नहीं किआ जाता। आप इसको छिलका निकलकर या छिलके के साथ इस रसम में इसका प्रयोग कर सकते है.

name: घी चावल रेसिपी - Ghee Rice (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: southindian lunch glutenfree
description: घी चावल जिसे नेचोरु भी कहा जाता है एक स्वादिष्ट और भरपूर डिश है जिसे त्योहारों के दिनों में बनाया जाता है. इसमें घी का उपयोग ज्यादा किया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है.

name: Gulab Jamun Trifle Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian
description: Gulab Jamun Trifle is a rich, delicious, cold dessert prepared with layers of custard and gulab jamun. This is best party dessert to prepare if you have lot of gulab jamuns. This Diwali, instead of serving the usual gulab jamuns, you can make this trifle and impress your friends and family. Baked Banana Chips

name: गाजर पुलाव रेसिपी - Carrot Rice (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian
description: गाजर पुलाव दक्षिण भारत की एक डिश है जिसे अकसर घरो में बनाया जाता है. इस पुलाव में सांबर पाउडर और इलाइची पाउडर का भी प्रयोग किया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है. आप इस पुलाव को अपने या अपने बच्चो के लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है. यह बनाने में आसान है और आप इसमें बचे हुए चावल का भी प्रयोग कर सकते है.

name: पुदीना पुलाव रेसिपी - Pudina Rice (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian
description: पुदीना पुलाव एक सरल रेसिपी है जिसे ताज़ा पुदीने के पत्तो से बनाया जाता है. पुदीना चावल मेरे बच्चों के पसंदीदा व्यंजनों में से एक है और दही के कटोरे के साथ आसानी से दोपहर के भोजन के बॉक्स में आप इसे पैक कर सकते है.

name: एल्लु सादम रेसिपी - Ellu Sadam (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  सफ़ द, split
description: एल्लु सादम को तिल चावल भी कहा जाता है और इसमें चावल को तिल और मसालों के साथ पकाया जाता है. एल्लु सादम को तमिल नाडु के बहुत सारे मंदिरो में प्रसाद के रूप में भी बाटा जाता है.

name: टोफू पुलाव रेसिपी - Tofu Pulao (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian  हर,
description: टोफू पुलाव एक स्वादिष्ट भारतीय रेसिपी है जिसे आप रायते के साथ आपके मैं कोर्स के लिए परोस सकते है। आप यह टोफू पुलाव वीकडेस पर बना सकते है जब आप कुछ स्वादिष्ट और सरल खाना चाहते है. टोफू पुलाव फाइबर और प्रोटीन में उच्च है इसलिए यह सेहत के लिए भी अच्छा मन जाता है. आप इस पुलाव को अपने और अपने बच्चो के लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: जीरा राइस रेसिपी - Jeera Rice (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: जीरा राइस एक सरल रेसिपी है जो 15 मिनट में तैयार हो जाती है. इस रेसिपी में चावल को जीरे और घी के साथ पकाया जाता है. आप इस रेसिपी को ग्रेवी सब्ज़ी, दाल या कढ़ी के साथ परोसा।

name: Mixed Vegetable Paratha Recipe
main_tag: indian dinner vegetarian  morefordusting, adjust, aloo, gajjar, gobi, matar, dhania, dhania
description: Vegetable Paratha is nutritious and wholesome breakfast with the goodness of vegetables.You can top it with butter and serve it with curd or pickle. It is best to make when you have leftover vegetables in your fridge.

name: Stuffed Corn and Capsicum Paratha Recipe with Herbs
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast vegetarian  madeofvivattawholewheatflourchakkiatta, capsicum, dried
description: The Stuffed Corn and Capsicum Paratha are delicious parathas that is made in the form of an envelope and stuffed with colourful roasted vegetable. These stuffed parathas make a great dish to have for breakfast or even pack into a kids lunch box.

name: Mushroom Paratha Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  jeera, haldi
description: The Mushroom Paratha Recipe is a healthy and delicious stuffed paratha that you can make for breakfast or pack in your kids or your lunch box. These parathas are made from Whole Wheat Chakki Atta (Vivatta), and when combined with the mushrooms, green chilis and spices, makes it delicious and wholesome.

name: Tofu & Capsicum Paratha Recipe (Stuffed Tofu Flatbread)
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  capsicum, jeera, dhania
description: The Tofu & Capsicum Paratha Recipe is made from a whole wheat dough (Chakki Atta - Vivatta) that is stuffed with finely chopped green capsicum and tofu, spiced up with green chillies, coriander leaves and cumin powder. The addition of bell peppers, tofu along with fiber rich wheat flour, makes this paratha wholesome and delicious. The Tofu & Capsicum Paratha can make a meal in itself and can served with a pickle and some yogurt or raita. The paratha makes a great lunch box as well, as it does not brittle and remains soft when heated in a microwave oven. Serve The Tofu & Capsicum Paratha Recipe with boondi raita or dhaniya pudina chutney.

name: Beetroot Paratha Recipe Flavored With Peanuts
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast vegetarian  moongphali, jeera, roasted, dhania
description: Beetroot Paratha Recipe is made from whole wheat flour dough stuffed with grated beets that are sauteed until tender. The grated beets are then combined along with roasted crushed peanuts, cumin powder, finely chopped onion, green chillies and lots of coriander leaves. Making the Beetroot Paneer Paratha came out just like that like a part to my mind to see other ways to consume beets and the parathas and the combination worked out great. This thought process is my constant endeavor to make school lunch boxes fun and exciting for the kids. The Beetroot Paratha also makes a perfect meal for dinner when served along with a Raita and some pickles.

name: पालक पुलाव रेसिपी - Palak Pulao (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian lunch vegetarian
description: पालक पुलाव एक सरल और स्वस्थ रेसिपी है, जिसमे पालक और रोज के मसालों का प्रयोग किया जाता है। इस रेसिपी में सांबर पाउडर का प्रयोग किया गया है लेकिन आप अपने स्वाद के अनुरूप मसाले के संयोजन का उपयोग कर सकते हैं।

name: Khatua Recipe (Bhojpuri Style Khichdi)
main_tag: bihari dinner vegetarian  splittoordal, haldi
description: Khatua is a form of khichdi made with rice and toor dal famous from the Bhojpur region. Melon juice makes a mild flavour of fruit nice, making this khichdi light and flavourful. Pounded garlic and green chilli paste adds a nice flavour to the khichdi. Usually, it is made with the leftover rice and dal, however we will prepare it fresh. Add a variety by trying out this light and flavourful khichdi with this Khatua Recipe along with some curd, salad and papad for a light weeknight dinner.

name: Cheese and Spring Onion Stuffed Parathas
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast vegetarian  morefordusting, moreforsmearing, iusedamulcheese, bulb greens, dhania, adjus, jeera
description: Cheese and Spring Onion Stuffed Parathas make a great breakfast dish for a quick weeknight dinner. With simple ingredients like grated cheddar cheese and spring onions this paratha can be made quickly for all those busy mornings when you have to pack kids lunch boxes and yours too. Serve it along with a vegetable raita like Beetroot Raita Recipe to make your dinner or lunch wholesome.

name: टमाटर पुलियोगरे रेसिपी - Spicy Tomato Rice (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: southindian maincourse vegetarian
description: टमाटर पुलियोगरे एक स्वादिष्ट रेसिपी है जिसका स्वाद तंगी और तीखा होता है। इसमें टमाटर का प्रयोग ज्यादा किआ जाता है और चावल को टमाटर के साथ इमली और रोज के मसालो के साथ पकाया जाता है.

name: Karnataka Style Ranjaka Recipe (Red Chili Chutney Recipe)
main_tag: karnataka sidedish vegetarian  fenugreekseeds, raikadugu, hing
description: Karnataka Style Ranjaka Recipe (Red Chili Chutney Recipe) is a spicy red chutney that has ground red chiles tempered with mustard oil and crackled mustard seeds and curry leaves. The chutney is famous among the locals in Northern Karnataka.

name: Moong Dal Palak Cheela Recipe (Yellow Lentil And Spinach Crepes)
main_tag: indian northindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  split, dahiyogurt, palak, dhania, jeera, haldi
description: The Moong Dal Palak Cheela Recipe is a great way to start your day - a healthy breakfast which should be high in proteins, essential vitamins and minerals to keep you going whole day. The Moong Dal Palak Cheela makes its way to any meal, be it breakfast, a quick brunch, a full meal lunch or even dinner. This Cheela is an exceptional way to introduce the vegetables along with lentils for your kids or toddlers meal. The spiciness can be adjusted accordingly when making for the younger ones.

name: Whole Wheat Vegetable Chilla (Cheela) Recipe
main_tag: northindian northindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  capsicum, haldi, jeera, dhania
description: The Whole Wheat Vegetable Chilla (Cheela) Recipe is an easy to make recipe specially for breakfast. To make this cheela simply mix the whole wheat flour in water and make a thick lump free batter. Then mix the chopped vegetables in it. Spread this on a greased frying pan and fry it on both sides. Whole wheat flour made from Vivatta is the healthiest flour as it is loaded with vitamins, calcium, phosphorous, zinc,iron and folic acid. It is a good source of dietary fiber too. Since it is loaded with vegetables this is extremely nutritious too. The Aate Ka Chilla gets cooked within 20 Minutes.

name: Singhara Atta Cheela Recipe (No Onion No Garlic Navratri Fasting/Vrat Recipe)
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian  waterchestnut, dhania, jeera, haldi
description: Singhara Atta Cheela Recipe (No Onion No Garlic Navratri Fasting/Vrat Recipe) is a kind of pancake made from Singhara Atta/Water Chestnut flour.The batter is spiced up with green chilli coriander and the basic Indian spice.

name: Besan Aur Pyaz Ka Cheela Recipe - Roz Ka Khana With Figaro Olive Oil
main_tag: indian northindianbreakfast highproteinvegetarian  besan, saunf, dhania, coriander mint
description: I have many food stories and most of them happen when I travel around India and around the world. One of my favorites is Kolkata, where I have many stories to tell. It was the first time I had ever tasted cheela’s that were served with lip smacking garlic chutney and green chutney. The cold nights, along with hot cheela’s and ending it with Shikanji was an all time favorite.

name: Andhra Style Erra Kaaram Dosa Recipe (Spicy Red Chilli Chutney Dosa Recipe)
main_tag: andhra southindianbreakfast vegetarian  raikadugu, pottukadalai
description: Andhra Style Erra Kaaram Dosa Recipe (Spicy Red Chilli Chutney Dosa Recipe) is a popular dish in Rayalaseema region in Andhra Pradesh. The word “Erra Karam" refers to the red chutney that is being smeared on to the dosa while making. It is very similar to Karnataka Style masala dosa but the only difference is that the red chutney in Andhra is more pungent because of the ample use of Garlic and onion. The dosa is also sprinkle with garlic flavored gram flour for the extra taste.

name: सुखी दाल पालक की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Dry Palak Dal Sabzi (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: andhra dinner highproteinvegetarian
description: सुखी दाल पालक की सब्ज़ी एक ऐसी डिश है जो रोटी और चावल दोनों के साथ अच्छी लगती है. यह सब्ज़ी आंध्रा के घरो में बहुत बनाई जाती है और इसे पोड़ी पप्पू कहा जाता है. इसमें तुअर दाल और पालक का प्रयोग किआ जाता है. लेकिन आप इसमें मूंग दाल का भी प्रयोग कर सकते है.

name: Assamese Komolar Kheer Recipe (Orange Kheer)
main_tag: assamese dessert vegetarian  badam
description: This is a typical and very popular Assamese dessert that tastes different but enthralling. It is easy to make and is perfect to serve during special occasions or festivals.

name: Maharashtrian Gavachi Kheer Recipe (Whole Cracked Wheat Pudding)
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  daliagodumairava, badam
description: Wheat kheer is a traditional dessert usually made for festive fares in Maharashtra called Gavachi Kheer Recipe. Traditionally the Gavachi kheer is made using whole wheat grains which needs advance preparations like soaking and pounding them. This recipe uses whole cracked wheat (wheat daliya) which does not require these preparations and also cooks faster than the whole wheat berries. Gavachi kheer is flavoured with nutmeg and saffron, you may use cardamom. You can enrich the sweet with nuts and dry fruits of your choice. Jaggery imparts its distinct, earthy sweetness to the kheer and is healthier than refined sugar. Wheat Kheer can be served hot or cold and is a great dessert to celebrate festivities with friends and family.

name: Brown Rice Flakes Pudding / Desi Poha Kheer Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Brown Rice Flakes Pudding/Desi Poha Kheer Recipe is a classic twist to traditional Payasam recipe, one of the most popular Indian dessert recipes. It is a milk based pudding that is usually slow cooked over a low flame with constant stirring. Brown Rice Flakes Pudding/Desi Poha Kheer Recipe is a faster version since it is made in pressure cooker. Poha/beaten rice gets cook easily and pressure cooking helps to thicken the milk faster. The beaten rice version retains the nutrients and gives the added advantage simpler cooking.

name: Khira Gaintha Recipe (Kheer Puli)
main_tag: oriya dessert vegetarian  elaichi, badam
description: Khira Gaintha is a very delicate and extremely elevating dessert that’s unique to Odisha. This consists of balls of rice flour dough soaked in reduced cardamom flavoured milk. The rice flour is cooked with water and then kneaded to form a dough, moulded into balls, and dropped into simmering milk cream.

name: Foxtail Millet Kheer Recipe (Millet Pudding With Saffron & Nuts)
main_tag: tamilnadu dessert vegetarian  likealmonds pistachios
description: The Foxtail Millet Kheer Recipe (Millet Pudding with Saffron & Nuts) is a delicious addition to the traditional kheer that we make usually with rice. The foxtail millet is also known as thenai in tamil nadu and is very much a locally available millet that is rich in minerals, dietary fibers and antioxidants. The millet is very low in cholesterol. Foxtail millet is the second most commonly planted species of millet and it can be used to make variety of dishes ranging from soups and salads to an array of desserts. It is highly advisable to include it in our diet. Here is an easy to make Kheer recipe which uses Foxtail Millet as the star ingredient. Serve Foxtail Millet Kheer Recipe (Millet Pudding with Saffron & Nuts) as a dessert along with a meal of Steamed Rice, Tamil Nadu Style Pala Kottai Sambar Recipe, or after a meal of Kongunadu Special Pattani Biryani Recipe.

name: Black Currant Dates Kheer Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  dried
description: Black Currant Dates Kheer or Payasam is a nutritious sweet pudding, made by mixing dates, currants and dry fruits in coconut milk. The kheer is rich in Iron, Magnesium and the B-Complex Vitamins, making this pudding a tasty and filling dessert option especially during parties or family occasions. Dates Kheer is usually prepared by grinding dates, and adding the sugar and coconut milk. In this recipe, we have chopped the dates for that added texture.

name: पोहा लड्डू रेसिपी - Poha Ladoo With Chocolate And Coconut (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian
description: पोहा लड्डू चॉकलेट और नारियल के साथ, दिलचस्प लगता है, है ना? चॉकलेट, बच्चों की पसंदीदा होती है और नारियल इस लड्डू का स्वाद और भी बढ़ाता है। यहां, मैंने सफेद पोहा का इस्तेमाल किया है, लेकिन आप लाल रंग के पोहे का भी उपयोग कर सकते हैं। ये लड्डू बनाने में आसान हैं, त्योहारों के दौरान आप इसे बना सकते हैं। मैंने जो ड्राई फ्रूट्स (काजू, किशमिश) का उपयोग किया है, उन्हें छोड़ा जा सकता है और आपकी पसंद के अन्य ड्राई फ्रूट्स का इस्तेमाल किआ जा सकता है.

name: कद्दू और नारियल के लड्डू रेसिपी - Pumpkin Coconut Ladoo (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian
description: कद्दू और नारियल के लड्डू पोषण से भरपूर लड्डू है जिसे कद्दू और नारियल से बनाया जाता है. कद्दू में एंटीऑक्सीडेंट और विटामिन की मात्रा अधिक होती है इसलिए यह हार्ट के लिए भी अच्छा होता है. इस रेसिपी में शक्कर की जगह केन शक्कर का प्रयोग किआ गया  है.

name: पारंपरिक पंजीरी लड्डू (जन्माष्टमी पसादम) रेसिपी - Panjiri Ladoo (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian
description: यह पारंपरिक पंजीरी लड्डू जन्माष्टमी के दिन ही खास बनाए जाते है। श्री कृष्ण मंदिर जैसे श्रीनाथजी मंदिर और ऐसे सब श्रीकृष्ण मंदिरो मे यह लड्डू भोग- प्रसाद के लिए बनाए जाते है। इस मे सूखे मेवे या मखाना नही डाले जाते।

name: Maharashtrian Dinkache Ladoo Recipe (Whole Wheat Flour Truffles With Edible Gum & Dry Fruits)
main_tag: maharashtrian snack vegetarian  split, kharikpud, almonds walnutsandcashewnuts, naturalgum, elaichi
description: Maharashtrian Dinkache Ladoo Recipe is the Whole Wheat Flour Truffles With Edible Gum & Dry Fruits. Dinkache ladoo are made using whole wheat flour, skinned and split black gram (Urad dal) flour , edible gum , dry fruits (dry dates , grated dry coconut , nuts), sugar and ghee. All the ingredients used in the recipe provide warmth and energy to our body which is much required during winters.

name: सेब का हलवा रेसिपी - Apple Halwa (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian
description: सेब का हलवा पौष्टिक मिठाई है जो आप कभी भी बना सकते है। त्यौहार पर या खास मौके पर आप यह हलवा बना सकते है। कहते है दिन मे एक सेब खाने से स्वास्थ्य अच्छा रहता है । बच्चो को भी खीला सकते है। यह मिठाई सेब, घी और मावा से बनी है। सेब के लाल कलर हेतु चुकंदर का रस इस्तेमाल किया है।

name: राजस्थानी हरे चने का हलवा रेसिपी - Rajasthani Hare Chane Ka Halwa (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: rajasthani dessert vegetarian
description: राजस्थानी हरे चने के हलवे को सर्दियों में बनाया जाता है. इस हलवे में फाइबर, विटामिन A और C की मात्रा बहुत अधिक होती है. हरे चने की बहुत सारी रेसिपीज बन सकती है लेकिन यह हलवा आप जरूर बनाए। हरे चने का हलवा राजस्थान में बहुत मशहूर है और हर त्यौहार या शादियों में बनाया जाता है.

name: ब्रेड हलवा रेसिपी - Bread Halwa (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: mughlai dessert vegetarian
description: ब्रेड हलवे को डबल का मीठा भी कहा जाता है. यह एक स्वादिष्ट हलवा है जिसे मुघल के ज़माने में बनाया जाता था. यह रेसिपी हैदराबाद में बहुत प्रसिद्ध है और अक्सर त्यौहार पर बनाई जाती है. यह मिठाई बनाने में आसान है और आप इसे जल्दी में अपने मेहमानो के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: Sooji Halwa Breakfast Bowl Recipe
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast vegetarian  semolinarava, elaichi, badam, iusedfigs choppedbananas pomegranate kiwi
description: Sooji Halwa Breakfast Bowl Recipe is simply a “Have more breakfast bowl” which gives you more nutrition than what we usually have as part of our breakfast.

name: Kerala Style Rice Halwa Recipe
main_tag: kerala dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Kerala Style Rice Halwa is a special halwa made with raw rice. This rice halwa is my grandmother's special recipe. She used to prepare it very often. This black halwa is very famous and made on all special occasions. It can be made at home with very few ingredients: raw rice, jaggery, coconut milk, and ghee. The colour of the halwa depends on the type of jaggery used.

name: Chocolate And Semolina Halwa Recipe
main_tag: southindian dessert vegetarian  semolinarava, elaichi, almondsandcashewnuts
description: Chocolate And Semolina Halwa Recipe is a popular semolina halwa with twist of chocolate. I am sure your kids gonna love it and will ask for making it again and again. You can make this delicious Chocolate And Semolina Halwa Recipe on kids gatherings or as a treat to them when they return from playtime, along with Curd Jantikalu Recipe (Crispy Curd Snacks) and Tea Sandwich Recipe With Beets, Radish, Avocado and Arugula.

name: Thulli Recipe (Broken Wheat Halwa)
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  daliagodumairava, saunf, elaichi
description: Thulli is a Halwa recipe which is made using broken wheat. This halwa has fennel seeds, saffron and cardamom which brings out the flavour in this dish. This is usually made during festivals and special occasions. It is easy to make and is loved by everyone in the family.

name: Mukhadi Halwa Recipe (Semolina & All Purpose Flour Halwa)
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  semolinarava, maida
description: This heirloom recipe, from my mother's side of the family, is a unique and decadent Suji Halwa. What makes it different from the regular halwa is it's unique and unusual method of preparing and cooking. Semolina and all purpose flour is soaked in milk and roasted along with caramelised sugar. I absolutely love this dessert for its inimitable flavours.

name: Rajasthani Hare Chane Ka Halwa Recipe (Choliya Halwa)
main_tag: rajasthani dessert vegetarian  elaichi
description: Hare Chane/ Fresh Green Chickpeas/Choliya is a winter produce. High in fibre, folate and many other vitamins like Vitamin A and C, the green chickpeas is also beneficial for weight management. The green chickpeas/choliya cooks quickly and can be added to many vegetables and curries. Interestingly, they make a great dessert. Choliya Halwa is a popular delicacy in Rajasthan. The green chickpeas is ground raw and cooked along with ghee and sugar to make this melt in the mouth halwa. A different, healthy and delicious recipe for you to try when green chana is in season.

name: Beetroot Halwa Recipe (With Vegan Option)
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  elaichi, badammilk, freshlyextracted, adjust
description: Beetroot Halwa Recipe is a healthy twist to halwa recipe. Halwa is one of the popular forms of Indian sweet recipe. This beet halwa is a great option when you have sweet cravings when there are no festivals around. This halwa has less added sweetness since the beetroot itself is a vegetable with sweet taste but lesser calories. Top Healthy Beetroot Halwa Recipe (With Vegan Option) with pistachios and enjoy either warm or chilled, for a yummy dessert.

name: WeetBix Halwa Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  almonds cashew pista, elaichi
description: Weetbix Halwa is something which I prepare very often at my home during festivals which fall on a working day. This is because they are healthy, quick & easier. The measurements given in this halwa is for 4 pieces of weet-bix, each with 15gms. The timings and other measurements would change based on the amount of weetbix we use. I had used palm sugar as they are healthier than refined sugar. This makes the dish completely guilt free too. The measurements of ghee are the most minimal one required for this halwa and you may wish to increase if you wish to do so. If you do not have time to soak the nuts, do not use almonds as it is a must to peel them and it needs to be soaked for 2 hours. You may also use the readymade almond milk instead of grinding the nuts to a nice paste. In that case, use 1-1/2 cup of almond milk and use only 1/2 a cup of water.

name: Doodhi Halwa Recipe (Bottle Gourd Halwa)
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  lauki, elaichi
description: Doodhi as a vegetable is not liked much by everyone. But the Doodhi Halwa tastes delicious and is also a healthy dessert option for the festive season. It has a tasty rich caramelized flavor and  can be served to the kids without them being fussy about eating it.

name: Singhare Atte Ka Halwa/Sheera Recipe (Water Chestnut Flour Halwa Recipe)
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  waterchestnut, elaichi
description: Singhare Atte Ka Halwa/Sheera Recipe (Water Chestnut Flour Halwa Recipe) is an Indian sweet made with water chestnut flour by roasting it with ghee and sugar till it becomes becomes dense and crumbly in texture. The halwa is then tossed with few toasted cashewnuts to give it a crunchy element.

name: Ragi Halwa Recipe | Healthy Indian Sweet Made With Ragi
main_tag: karnataka dessert highproteinvegetarian  elaichi
description: Ragi Halwa Recipe is a Healthy Indian Sweet Made With Ragi using the unrefined sugars (Jaggery). Ragi is a super millet with natural proteins and a cereal which helps in lowering the bad cholesterol and also slows down the process of aging, through its anti-oxidants. This dish has natural coolant properties and reduces gastritis.

name: Wheat Rava Halwa Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  daliagodumairava, demerarasugar, elaichi
description: Wheat Rava Halwa is a delicious sweet dish which is made with wheat rava, jaggery and cardamom powder. It is a popular prasad recipe for Sri Satyanarayana Swamy at Annavaram Temple located in Andhra Pradesh. I gave a little twist to the recipe with combination of brown sugar and jaggery.

name: Pumpkin Halwa (Kaddu Ka Halwa) Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  parangikaipumpkin, mawa, badam, elaichi
description: Pumpkin Halwa or Kaddu Ka halwa is a North Indian dessert which is typically cooked during the festivals or fasting days. This halwa is very simple to make. We can make it just like carrot halwa with khoya or condensed milk. An Addition of khoya makes the halwa delicious and nutritious. Even pumpkin haters will love this halwa as it is almost impossible for anyone to guess that the halwa is made from pumpkin. An Addition of sugar to this halwa can be altered depending on the sweetness of the pumpkin. If your kids or any family member does not like pumpkin, make this yummy halwa and serve. They will surely love it.

name: Sanjori Bread Recipe (Maharashtrian Sweet Flatbread Stuffed with Halwa)
main_tag: maharashtrian dessert vegetarian  daliagodumairava, elaichi
description: Sanjori Bread Recipe is a Maharashtrian dessert flatbread stuffed with halwa. It is similar to Puran Poli or Obbattu in that the outer covering is made of maida/wheat flour and then stuffed with a sweet filling. For stuffing, this recipe uses Sheera or halwa prepared with rava, sugar and milk and water. I have replaced rava with broken wheat rava and sugar with jaggery, making this an indulgent but wholesome recipe. For extra crunchiness, you could also add semi ground almonds, cashew or pistachio to the sheera.

name: Goan Style Banana Halwa Recipe (Kelyacho Halwo)
main_tag: goan dessert vegetarian  laung, elaichi
description: The Kelyacho Halwo, is a traditional Goan recipe that is made from a special variety of bananas called the Nendra bananas also popularly known as the Kerala bananas. The Banana Halwa is a quick sweet to make in just 20 minutes when you have all the ingredients ready.

name: Habshi Halwa Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  maida, elaichi, badam
description: Habshi Halwa is a milk halwa that is made by curdling, sweetening and flavoring milk. It is a slightly tedious task to cook the halwa as it takes long to get it to the right consistency. But it is worth the effort because it brings together the best of milk solids, ghee and nuts, into a right Indian dessert.

name: Moong Dal Halwa Recipe (A Low Calorie Version)
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  split, semolinarava, elaichi, almondsorcashewnuts
description: The Low Calorie Moong Dal Halwa Recipe is an idol if you want to enjoy goodness of Moong Dal Halwa without the consuming the of tons of calories that most often goes into a halwa. This halwa recipe is great for the festive season when all of us want to consume dishes that are healthy and not too heavy on the tummy as well.

name: Moong Dal Halwa Recipe (Warm Lentil Pudding with Nuts and Spices)
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  split, badam, elaichi
description: Moong Dal Halwa is a delicious lentil pudding that is made the roasted split yellow mung lentils that is then slow cooked in milk and ghee. Make this dish for a special occation or festival like Diwali or when you have a dinner party with an Indian Menu at home. It makes a perfect warm winter dessert as well.

name: Choco Badam Barfi / Choco Almond Fudge Recipe
main_tag: northindian dessert vegetarian  mawa, badampowder
description: Choco Badam Barfi / Choco Almond Fudge Recipe is a variation of Indian Barfi. Barfi is one of the popular simple mithai prepared out of mawa or khoya. Alteration in recipe is often made by adding different flavours, colours or even the fruit extracts. Normally it is a lengthy process to prepare mawa at home, but if you already have prepared mawa or store bought one, then burfi can be done within no time.

name: Shrikhand Vadi Recipe (Yogurt Barfi)
main_tag: maharashtrian snack vegetarian  greekyogurt
description: Shrikhand Vadi is a Maharashtrian sweet made using hung curd/yogurt and sugar. This sweet and tangy treat is utterly delicious yet simple to make. All you need is a few ingredients and some patience to continuously stir the mixture as it cooks. You can flavor Shrikhand Vadi with flavors of your choice like saffron, cardamom, cinnamon, nutmeg. You can also use nuts of your choice. Shrikhand Vadi makes for an indulgent snack or sweet treat, loved by kids as well as grownups. Make it for the upcoming festive season, and have friends and family become fans of the recipe.

name: Red Kidney Beans Chocolate Barfi Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  largekidneybeans, milksolids, elaichi
description: Red Kidney Beans Barfi made with rajma is a soft, delicious and creamy fudge. A richly-textured mixture of red kidney beans paste and crumbled mawa is cooked in beetroot, sugar syrup and flavoured with vanilla extract and cocoa powder. Make a delicious red kidney beans barfi that looks appetising and tastes delicious. Add this an exotic and healthy sweet dish to the list of your festival sweets.

name: Strawberry And Sooji Halwa Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  semolinarava, elaichi, iusedalmonds cashewnuts
description: Strawberry And Sooji Halwa Recipe is a popular classic sooji halwa recipe with a twist of strawberries. You can use milk instead of water to make halwa more royal. This is a recipe which needs a minimum effort. Sooji is roasted well and then mixed with other ingredients and cooked further. Serve Strawberry And Sooji Halwa Recipe as a party dessert along with Gujarati Badshahi Pulao Recipe - A Rich Preparation Of Rice, Vegetables, Nuts And Spices.

name: Saffron Milk Masala Recipe
main_tag: indian snack vegetarian  badam, elaichi
description: Masala dudh is traditionally prepared on Kojagiri Purnima or Ashwini Purnima night where all the family/ friends get together play games and eat some chat (like bhel) or Vada Pav and the warm masala dudh as dessert. The Masala dudh is made by boiling the milk and adding the special masala full of dry fruits. This masala can be stored in the fridge in a air tight box. This Masala doodh can be served on Haldi kumkum days, Pooja or during Fast.

name: पनीर बटर मसाला रेसिपी - Paneer Butter Masala (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian
description: पनीर बटर मसाला उत्तर भारतीय व्यंजनों की एक क्लासिक और पसंदीदा डिश है। इस डिश में पनीर को टमाटर की ग्रेवी में पकाया जाता है। पनीर बटर मसाला उत्तरी प्रांत में रेस्तरां के मेनू में सबसे लोकप्रिय शाकाहारी व्यंजन में से एक है। आप इस सब्ज़ी को अपनी घर की पार्टीज के लिए भी बना सकते है.

name: गाजर और बीन्स का पोरियल रेसिपी - Carrot and Beans Poriyal (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  split
description: गाजर और बीन्स पोरियल एक स्वादिष्ट सब्ज़ी है जो दक्षिण भारत के हर घर में बनाई जाती है. इस सब्ज़ी में गाजर और बीन्स को भाप कर राइ, उरद दाल और कढ़ी पत्ते के साथ पकाया जाता है. स्वाद और भी बढ़ने के लिए इसे नारियल से गार्निश करें।

name: शिमला मिर्च और मशरुम की सब्ज़ी रेसिपी - Pepper Mushroom Stir Fry (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: southindian lunch vegetarian  हर, ब र कक टल,
description: शिमला मिर्च और मशरुम की सब्ज़ी एक स्वादिष्ट और आसान नुस्खा है, जो स्वस्थ के लिए अच्छा है और एक सप्ताह के भोजन के लिए साइड डिश के रूप में परोसा जा सकता है। मैंने इस नुस्खा में बटन मशरूम का इस्तेमाल किया है क्योंकि मुझे लगा कि वे फ्लेवर को अवशोषित करने और इसके आकार को बनाए रखने में सर्वश्रेष्ठ काम करते हैं। इसमें शिमला मिर्च का भी प्रयोग किआ गया है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है.

name: बेसन अरबी रोस्ट रेसिपी - Besan Arbi Roast (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian worldbreakfast glutenfree
description: अर्बी या तारो रूट एक रूट सब्जी है जो एंटीऑक्सिडेंट्स, फाइबर, खनिज, विटामिन में समृद्ध है। इस सब्ज़ी में लहसुन और प्याज का प्रयोग नहीं किआ गया है इसलिए आप इसे त्योहारों के दिनों में भी बना सकते है. यह सब्ज़ी बनाने में बहुत आसान है और इसमें रोज के मसालों का ही प्रयोग किआ जाता है. इतना ही नहीं आप इस सब्ज़ी को अपने लंच बॉक्स में भी पैक कर सकते है.

name: पंजाबी साबुत मूंग की दाल रेसिपी - Punjabi Sabut Moong Ki Dal (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: पंजाबी साबुत मूंग दाल पंजाब की एक बहुत मशहूर दाल है जिसे रोज के खाने के लिए बनाया जाता है. यह दाल बनाने में आसान है और खाने में बहुत स्वादिष्ट है. यह दाल सेहत के लिए भी अच्छी मानी जाती है क्योंकि इसमें प्रोटीन की मात्रा अधिक है और यह पोषण से भरपूर है.

name: Vegan Black Beans Stuffed Paratha Recipe
main_tag: northindian lunch highproteinvegetarian  maida, fordusting, lobia, jeera
description: Protein rich Vegan Black Beans Stuffed Paratha makes an excellent meal for both lunch and dinner, served along with a spicy side dish anyone can have these healthy parathas without any fuss. You can try out this recipe if you are looking for something new for stuffing in parathas.

name: फालगुनी दाल रेसिपी - Phalguni Dal (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: bengali lunch highproteinvegetarian
description: हम हरे मटर का प्रयोग सर्दियों में ज्यादा करते है क्यूंकि इस समय मटर ताज़े मिलते है. फाल्गुनी दाल को मसूर दाल और हरे मटर के संयोजन से तैयार किया जाता है. यह दाल एक स्वादिष्ट और क्रीमयुक्त बंगाली दाल है। यह एक शाकाहारी और प्रोटीन युक्त भोजन है जिसे आप अपने दिन या रात के भोजन के लिए परोस सकते है.

name: Thengai Thogayal Recipe (Spicy and Tangy Coconut Chutney)
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  split, fenugreekseeds, raikadugu
description: Thengai Thogayal also known as the Tangy and Spicy Coconut Chutney is different from the regular chutney that you have along with the idlis and dosas. The thogayal recipe is made with roasted ingredients urad dal, red chilies, and curry leaves when ground along with tamarind into a paste along with the coconut gives a fresh aroma that makes it simply delicious. Thogayals are typically mixed with rice and eaten. The Thengai Thogayal can also be eaten with dosa, idli or any other way you choose to eat it.

name: South Indian Onion Chutney Recipe
main_tag: southindian sidedish vegetarian  jeera, split, raikadugu
description: South Indian Onion Chutney is a perfect chutney to serve along with your idli and dosa. One may think that this chutney may emanate the typical onion odour, but no, in fact the final chutney does not taste like onion at all, it tasted more like a mix between peanut and cabbage (indeed amusing). Onions are known as ullipaya or ulligadda in Telugu, thus this chutney is referred as ‘Ulli Pachadi’ in the Telugu language.

name: Punjabi Style Moth Beans Dal Recipe (Matki)
main_tag: punjabi lunch highproteinvegetarian  matki, jeera, drymangopowder, haldi
description: Punjabi Style Moth Beans Dal Recipe (Matki) is a delicious lentil curry made from moth beans. The dal is so comforting to be had with just plain phulka. One cup of this delicious dal won’t be enough to fill you up and you will keep going for more. Moth beans which is commonly called as mat beans or matki is a good supply of vitamin B, potassium and calcium too.  It is also a main source of protein as well.

name: अनारदाना चटनी रेसिपी - Pomegranate Chutney (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian sidedish vegetarian
description: अनार दाना चटनी अनार के रस से बनी है।यह चटाकेदार मजेदार स्वादिष्ट चटनी आप चपाती या ब्रेड के साथ नाश्ते मे ले सकते है। कचौड़ी और समोसा के साथ भी यह खट्टी मीठी चटनी परोस सकते है। स्वाद के साथ यह स्वास्थ्य वर्धक भी है।

name: Hyderabad Soy Biryani Recipe With Vegetables & Palak
main_tag: hyderabadi maincourse vegetarian  nuggets, gajjar, frenchbeans, matar, gobi, capsicum, aloo, dalchini, elaichi, laung, jeera, palak, dhania, pudina, badam, dalchini, elaichi, badielaichi, laung, tejpatta, caromseeds, javitri, haldi, dhania, dhania, pudina
description: Biryanis are synonymous with Hyderabad, capital of Telangana of South India. The Hyderabadi Dum Biryani is quite famous. So is the use of palak in their dishes. In Mumbai or outside Hyderabad, if at all you order for a Hyderabadi biryani in restaurants, whether veg or non veg, you are most likely to be served a greenish coloured biryani. To oomph up the appeal of this personal favourite- Hyderabadi biryani, I have added soy chunks to this recipe. I have also used palak to bring up that greenish colour and spiced it well to match up to the Hyderabadi recipe.

name: Soya Chunks Pepper Curry Recipe
main_tag: indian lunch highproteinvegetarian  nuggets, capsicum, jeera, sambaronions, dhania
description: Soya Chunks Pepper Curry is protein rich curry prepared with soya chunks and pepper/capsicums in South Indian style, onion-tomato based curry. Soya chunks also known as textured vegetable protein is a defatted soy flour product and a by-product of extracting soya bean oil. They are a great source of protein for vegetarians and known to provide more protein than meat.

name: Soya Chunks Sabzi
main_tag: indian lunch highproteinvegetarian  nuggets, dhania
description: Soya Chunks Sabzi is an easy Indian dry sabzi idea which is proteinaceous owing to soya chunks and delicious because of tempered onions and tomato. This recipe goes well with Indian bread like Phulka or Chapati/Tawa paratha. Pair it up with rice for a wholesome weekday meal.

name: माँ की दाल रेसिपी - Maa Ki Dal (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: punjabi dinner highproteinvegetarian  स प ल ट
description: मा की दाल रेसिपी (पंजाबी-स्टाइल स्लो कुक्ड ब्लैक उरद दाल) कई मायनों में दाल मखानी के समान है। लेकिन माँ की दाल में रोज के मसालों का प्रयोग किआ जाता है और ज्यादा देर तक पकाया जाता है जो इसके स्वाद को और भी बढ़ाता है। पंजाबी व्यंजनों में एक विशिष्ट विशेषता, इस दाल को लोकप्रिय दाल मखानी के नाम पर अक्सर पसंद किया जाता है जो रेस्तरां या उत्सव के भोजन के लिए यह एक बहुत ही अच्छी डिश है।

name: अजवाइन पूरी रेसिपी - Ajwain Puri (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast vegetarian
description: अजवाइन पुरी पकाने की विधि बहुत ही सरल है जो गेहूं के आटे से बनाई जाती है और इसमें हल्दी और अजवाइन का भी प्रयोग किआ जाता है। इस पूरी को तेल में तला जाता है जिससे इस पूरी का स्वाद और भी बढ़ जाता है.

name: Khichdi Roti रेसिपी - खिचड़ी रोटी (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: indian indianbreakfast vegetarian
description: हम सभी को गरम खिचड़ी और पोंगल घी के साथ खाना बहुत पसंद है। लेफ्टओवर खिचड़ी के बारे में क्या? आप इस खिचड़ी को अलग अलग प्रकार से प्रयोग कर सकते है। इसलिए आप इस खिचड़ी को आटे में मिलाकर रोटी बना सकते है.

name: ऑडीया स्टाइल चौला खीरी रेसिपी - Oriya Style Rice Kheer (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: oriya dessert vegetarian
description: चौलाई खीरी वैसे तो खीर है पर आम खीर से कुछ अलग तरीके से बनती है यह खीर । ओडीया स्टाइल यह खीरी गुलाब जल ,इलाइची और केसर डालकर बनाई गई है। और घी मे भूने हूए काजू से खीरी का जायका और बढ जाता है। यह स्वादिष्ट खीरी आप खास मौके पर और त्यौहार पर बनाए।

name: Sitaphal Rabdi Recipe
main_tag: indian dessert vegetarian  sitaphal, badam, elaichi
description: Rabdi is a traditional Indian dessert, made during the festivals or on special occasions. The milk is reduced to a creamy pudding texture and mildly sweetened. There is no short cut to a rich, creamy and luscious Rabdi recipe. The full fat milk needs to be slow cooked, and slowly keep collecting the layer of cream that forms at the surface. Sitaphal Rabdi Recipe is a delicious and clever way of sweetening the rabdi with the de-seeded custard apple chunks. Well ripe custard apple is pretty sweet on its own, so you would not need any sugar to be added to the recipe. Serve the chilled Sitaphal Rabdi Recipe at the Diwali party menu at home the coming season and let your guest rejoice in its sweetness, may be along with other Diwali dessert like Paneer Gulab Jamun Recipe (Delicious Diwali Sweet) and a snack like Pan Fried Onion Pakora Recipe (A Perfect Diwali & Evening Snack).

name: Bengali Style Chingri Macher Cutlet Recipe (Prawn Cutlet)
main_tag: bengali snack nonvegeterian  besan
description: Bengali's have array of fast food dishes which is only available at street food corner of Kolkata. During Durga Puja, beside Puja Mandap's variety of food trucks and food stall can be visible. Chingri Macher(prawn/lobster) Cutlet is one of them which can be considered as Bengali fast food delicacy. For making Chingri Cutlet we need peeled and divined headless prawn. Then prawn fillet need to be marinated in egg, onion and garlic paste with spices then it coated in breadcrumbs and fry in low flame.

name: Paruppu Urundai Mor Kuzhambu Recipe(Lentil Balls in Yogurt Curry)
main_tag: tamilnadu lunch highproteinvegetarian  splittoordal, hing, dhania, haldi, jeera, haldi, raikadugu
description: Paruppu Urundai Mor Kuzhambu Recipe(Lentil Balls in Yogurt Curry) is a comforting yogurt based curry that you must try for your lunch meal. It consist spicy lentil mixture that is shaped into medium sized balls and then steamed. These steamed lentil balls are then cooked in a simple buttermilk and coconut curry. The curry has all the nutrients needed for your body. It is best served over a hot steamed rice with a dollop of ghee.

name: नागालैंड स्टाइल काली दालरेसिपी - Nagaland Style Kali Dal (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: nagaland lunch vegetarian  स प ल ट, अदरकक लच छ,
description: नागालैंड स्टाइल काली दाल काली छिलके वाली उरद दाल से बनती है जिसमे पंच फौरन मसाले का प्रयोग किआ जाता है। यह बनाए में तो आसान है ही, आपके सेहत के लिए भी अच्छी मानी जाती है.

name: चटपटा आलू रेसिपी - Chatpata Baby Potato (Recipe In Hindi)
main_tag: northindian lunch vegetarian
